Sɛa za wɛ̃̀ bao e à gɛ̀ pɛ̀ wɛ̃̀ bàaↄ̃wa, tó gↄ̃ɛɛ, kpaaũkpɛ ã́nusu ↄwatɛ̃ blakwiɛ,
nↄɛ sↄ̃ baakwi.
Sɛa za wɛ̃̀ sↄo e à gɛ̀ pɛ̀ wɛ̃̀ baowa, tó nɛgↄ̃ɛɛ, ã́nusu ↄwatɛ̃ baoɛ, nɛnↄɛ sↄ̃ kwi.
Sɛa za mↄ do e à gɛ̀ pɛ̀ wɛ̃̀ sↄowa, tó nɛgↄ̃ɛnaɛ, ã́nusu ↄwatɛ̃ sↄoɛ, nɛnↄɛna sↄ̃ àaↄ̃.
Tó gↄ̃ɛ dɛ wɛ̃̀ bàaↄ̃la, ã́nusu ↄwatɛ̃ gɛ̃oɛ, nↄɛ sↄ̃ kwi.
Tó taasideɛ, mɛ́ aà gbãa i ka màao, aàli gɛ́ sa'ona le, sa'ona lí a bo'ↄ̃a dilɛ lá lɛgbɛ̃na a fↄ̃wa.
Tó pↄtuo pↄ́ wì sa'oò Diiwaɛ sↄ̃, pↄ́ pↄ́ wà aà gbà ali gↄ̃ aà pↄ́ ũɛ.
Wasuli lilɛo. Wasuli a maa lɛũkpakɛ ń a vãioo, ge a vãi ń a maaoo. Tó wà pↄtuo lɛũkpakɛ̀, a pla píi a gↄ̃ Dii pↄ́ ũɛ.
Tó pↄtuo pↄ́ wìli sa'oò Diiwaoɛ sↄ̃, wàli gɛò sa'ona kĩ́i,
sa'ona i a taa gwa, tó a maa ge a vãiɛ. Lá sa'ona dìlɛ, màa a ↄ̃a aↄ dɛ.
Tó pↄde ye bo, aàli a ↄ̃a sↄode nawà.
Tó gbɛ̃́ Dii gbà a kpɛ́, sa'ona lí a taa gwa, tó a maa ge a vãiɛ. Lá sa'ona dìlɛ, màa a ↄ̃a aↄ dɛ.
Tó kpɛde ye à a kpɛ́ sí, aàli a ↄ̃a sↄode nawà, kpɛ́pi i ɛa gↄ̃ aà pↄ́ ũ.
Tó gbɛ̃́ Dii gbà tↄↄlɛ pↄ́ á sɛ̀ kpaalɛ guu kĩni, a ↄ̃a líↄ doũ ń pↄ́wɛna pↄ́ a mↄ búpiwa ↄ̃ao. Pↄ́wɛna koko do ↄ̃a kà ã́nusu ↄwatɛ̃ sↄo.
Tó gↄ̃a wɛ̃́ɛↄ ũ wɛ̃ ↄ̃ à Dii gbàu sↄ̃, a ↄ̃a a gi àↄ ku a lɛgbɛuɛ.
Tó gↄ̃a wɛ̃́ɛↄ ũ wɛ̃ gɛ̃̀, sa'ona lí a ↄ̃a dilɛ wɛ̃ pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ e gↄ̃a wɛ̃́ɛↄ ũ wɛ̃̀ sìa lɛ́u, i a ↄ̃a lao màa.
Tó búde ye a bú sí, aàli a ↄ̃a sↄode nawà, i gↄ̃ aà pↄ́ ũ.
Tó i búpi boo, ge tó a yìa gbɛ̃pãlewaɛ, a boa zɛ́ kú lↄo.
Tó wàlɛ pↄ́ sↄaasↄaanɛ́ gↄ̃a wɛ̃́ɛↄ ũ wɛ̃u, buapi a gↄ̃ Dii pↄ́ ũɛ, lán pↄ́ pↄ́ wà Dii gbà ń a mìbaowaɛ, tↄↄlɛpi i gↄ̃ sa'onaↄnɛ.
Tó gbɛ̃́ Dii gbà tↄↄlɛ pↄ́ á lù, mɛ́ tↄↄlɛ pↄ́ a sɛ̀ kpaalɛ guu no,
sa'ona lí a ↄ̃a dilɛ wɛ̃ pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ e gↄ̃a wɛ̃́ɛↄ ũ wɛ̃̀ dasilɛu, gbɛ̃́pi i tↄↄlɛpi bo zĩbeezĩ gↄ̃̀ↄ, ↄ̃api i gↄ̃ Dii pↄ́ ũ.
Gↄ̃a wɛ̃́ɛↄ ũ wɛ̃ ↄ̃ wàli buapi sↄaa a yìana pↄ́ tↄↄlɛpi vĩ yãaɛ.
Lá wà ã́nusu lɛ́ dìlɛ kpaaũkpɛu, màa sa'onaↄ lí pↄ́ ↄ̃a dilɛ. Ãnusu do galaũ baoɛ.
Pↄtuo nɛ́ sɛ̃́iaↄá Dii pↄ́ɛ kↄ̀. Gbɛ̃e suli aà gbao zu ge sãn lò, asa Dii pↄ́ɛ.
Tó pↄtuo pↄ́ wìli sa'oòo nɛ́ sɛ̃́iaɛ sↄ̃, aàli bo lá sa'ona dìlɛ lɛ́u, i a ↄ̃a sↄode nawà. Tó i boo, wàli yía ↄ̃a pↄ́ sa'ona dìlɛ lɛ́u.
Pↄ́ pↄ́ gbɛ̃́ vĩ à Dii gbà ń a mìbao, gbɛ̃nazĩna ge pↄtuo ge tↄↄlɛ pↄ́ dɛ a buiↄ pↄ́ ũn lò, asuli yíao, asu bo sↄ̃o. Pↄ́ pↄ́ wà Dii gbà ń a mìbao á pↄ́ pↄ́ wìli booɛ.
Baa gbɛ̃nazĩna pↄ́ wà Dii gbà ń a mìbao, wà fↄ̃ boo, sema wà ade dɛ.
Bua pↄ́ↄ kwide líↄ dɛ Dii pↄ́ ũ, pↄ́wɛna ge libɛↄn lò. Aliↄ dɛ Dii pↄ́ ũɛ.
Tó gbɛ̃́ ye a pↄ́ kwidepiↄ bo, aàli a ↄ̃a sↄode nawà.
Pↄtuo kwide á Dii pↄ́ɛ. Tó wa nào, a kwideↄ líↄ dɛ aà pↄ́ ũ.
Wasuli a maa ge a vãi boo, mɛ́ wasuli a kee lɛũkpakɛo. Tó wà a lɛũkpakɛ̀, a pla píi gↄ̃̀ Dii pↄ́ ũɛ, mɛ́ wa fↄ̃ a kee boo.
Yã́ pↄ́ Dii dà Mↄiziɛ Sinai gbɛ musu a dìlɛ Isailiↄnɛn we.
Isailiↄ bↄa Egipi wɛ̃̀ plaade, a mↄ plaade gↄↄ sɛ̃́ia zĩ́, Dii yã'ò Mↄiziɛ kpaaũkpɛu Sinai guwaiwaiu à mɛ̀:
À Isailiↄ naokɛ daɛdaɛ ualɛ ń ualɛo, ní gↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́ dalau píi.
Mpi ń Aalonao à Isaili gↄ̃ɛ pↄ́ kà wɛ̃̀ bao ge aa dɛaↄ kãaa, í gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kà zĩkaapiↄ nao gã ń gão.
À gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛ uabele ũↄ sɛ bui ń buio guu dodo aa dↄálɛ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaↄ kúánↄpiↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Lubɛni buiↄ guu Sedeu nɛ́ Ɛlizuu.
Simɛↄ buiↄ guu Zulisadai nɛ́ Selumiɛ.
Yuda buiↄ guu Aminadabu nɛ́ Naasↄ̃.
Isakaa buiↄ guu Zuaa nɛ́ Nɛtanɛli.
Zabulↄni buiↄ guu Heloni nɛ́ Ɛliabu.
Yosɛfu nɛ́ Ɛflaiũ buiↄ guu Amihudu nɛ́ Ɛlisama. Yosɛfu nɛ́ Manase buiↄ guu Pedazuu nɛ́ Gamaliɛli.
Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ buiↄ guu Gidoni nɛ́ Abidã.
Dã buiↄ guu Amisadai nɛ́ Ahiɛzɛɛ.
Asɛɛ buiↄ guu Ɔkɛlana nɛ́ Pagiɛli.
Gada buiↄ guu Deuɛli nɛ́ Ɛliasafa.
Nɛfatali buiↄ guu Enana nɛ́ Ahila.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wà ń sɛ́ gbɛ̃́ↄ guu ń deziↄ buiↄ kía ũↄn we. Aamɛ Isaili bui dↄaanaↄ ũ.
Mↄizi ń Aalonao gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Dii ń tↄ́ dↄ̀dↄpiↄ sɛ̀,
ↄ̃ aa gbɛ̃́ↄ kã̀aa píi mↄ plaade gↄↄ sɛ̃́iazĩ. Aa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kà wɛ̃̀ bao ge aa dɛaↄ tↄ́ dàlau píi daɛdaɛ ualɛ ń ualɛo.
Mↄizi ń nao Sinai guwaiwaiu lá Dii dìlɛɛwa.
Wà gↄ̃ɛ pↄ́ kà wɛ̃̀ bao ge aa dɛaↄ nào, ↄ̃ wà gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kà zĩkaapiↄ tↄ́ dàlau dodo baade iawa daɛdaɛ ualɛ ń ualɛo.
Isaili nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́ia Lubɛni buiↄ guu, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kà zĩkaaↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bla ń sooloo ń ↄ̀aa pla ń basↄooɛ (46.500).
Simɛↄ buiↄ guu gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bàaↄ̃ mɛ̀ndosai ń ↄ̀aa do ń basↄooɛ (59.300).
<range>
Gada buiↄ guu gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ blasↄo ń ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ ń blakwioɛ (45.650).
<range>
Yuda buiↄ guu gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bàaↄ̃kwi ń síiↄ̃o ń ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃oɛ (74.600).
<range>
Isakaa buiↄ guu gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ blakwi ń síiↄ̃o ń ↄ̀aa plaoɛ (54.400).
<range>
Zabulↄni buiↄ guu gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ blakwi ń soplao ń ↄ̀aa plaoɛ (57.400).
<range>
Yosɛfu nɛ́ Ɛflaiũ buiↄ guu gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bla ń ↄ̀aa pla ń basↄooɛ (40.500).
<range>
Yosɛfu nɛ́ Manase buiↄ guu gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ baakwi ń plao ń ↄ̀aa dooɛ (32.200).
<range>
Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ buiↄ guu gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ baakwi ń sↄoo ń ↄ̀aa plaoɛ (35.400).
<range>
Dã buiↄ guu gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bàaↄ̃ ń plao ń ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ ń basↄooɛ (62.700).
<range>
Asɛɛ buiↄ guu gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bla ń mɛ̀ndoo ń ↄ̀aa pla ń basↄooɛ (41.500).
<range>
Nɛfatali buiↄ guu gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ blakwi ń àaↄ̃o ń ↄ̀aa plaoɛ (53.400).
<range>
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Mↄizi ń Aalonao ń Isailiↄ kía gbɛ̃ↄn kuɛplaↄ ń naoↄn we. Wà kíapiↄ sɛ̀ bui ń buio guu mɛ̀ndodoɛ.
Kɛ́ aa Isaili gↄ̃ɛ pↄ́ kà wɛ̃̀ bao ge aa dɛaↄ nào ualɛ ń ualɛo, Isaili pↄ́ kà zĩkaapiↄ
gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ ń àaↄ̃o ń ↄ̀aa pla ń basoplakwioɛ (603.550).
Wì Levii bui uadeↄ da nao guuo,
asa Dii ò Mↄiziɛ à mɛ̀:
Ńsu Levii buiↄ naoo. Ńsu ǹ ń tↄ́ dalau ń Isaili bui kĩniↄo.
Ikoyã zwã̀akpɛ zĩ na Levii buiↄnɛ ń ↄzĩ ń a pↄkeleↄ ń pↄ́ pↄ́ kú a guuↄ píi. Aamɛ aaliↄ zwã̀akpɛ sɛa ń a pↄkeleↄ píi, aaiↄ dɛ zwã̀akpɛpi zĩkɛnaↄ ũ, aali bòokpa aa liai.
Tó álɛ fɛlɛ, aamɛ aali zwã̀akpɛpi woɛwoɛ. Tó a ka bòokpakĩi, aali ɛa pɛ́ɛpɛɛ. Tó gbɛ̃pãle sↄ̃̀i, à gàɛ.
Isailiↄ lí bòokpakpa gã ń gão, baade ń a dàlapooo.
Levii buiↄ mɛ́ aali bòokpa aa lia ikoyã zwã̀akpɛi, kɛ́ másu pↄkũmabↄbↄ Isailiↄwao yã́i. Ikoyã zwã̀akpɛ gwaa mɛ́ Levii buiↄ zĩ ũ.
Ɔ̃ Isailiↄ kɛ̀ lá Dii ò Mↄiziɛwa.
Dii yã'ò Mↄiziɛ ń Aalonao à mɛ̀:
Isailiↄ baade lí bòokpa a dàlapoo gbáu ń a ua seelao pɛ́lɛa. Aali bòokpa wà lia kpaaũkpɛi kɛ̃awà yↄↄ.
Yuda bui gãliↄ mɛ́ aali bòokpa gukpɛ oi ń ń dàlapooo. An dↄaanan Aminadabu nɛ́ Naasↄ̃ ũ.
Aà zĩgↄ̃ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bàaↄ̃kwi ń síiↄ̃o ń ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃oɛ (74.600).
Isakaa bui gãliↄ lí bòokpa ń saɛ. An dↄaanan Zuaa nɛ́ Nɛtanɛli ũ.
Aà zĩgↄ̃ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ blakwi ń síiↄ̃o ń ↄ̀aa plaoɛ (54.400).
An saɛ Zabulↄni buiↄ. An dↄaanan Heloni nɛ́ Ɛliabu ũ.
Aà zĩgↄ̃ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ blakwi ń soplao ń ↄ̀aa plaoɛ (57.400).
Ampii an bòo wì mɛ Yuda buiↄ bòo, aa gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ ↄ̀aa do, gɛ̃o mɛ̀ndosai mɛ́ kuo, ń ↄ̀aa plaoɛ. (186.400) Aamɛ aali dazɛu káau.
Lubɛni bui gãliↄ mɛ́ aali bòokpa gɛↄmidↄkĩi oi ń ń dàlapooo. An dↄaanan Sedeu nɛ́ Ɛlizuu ũ.
Aà zĩgↄ̃ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ blakwi ń sooloo ń ↄ̀aa pla ń basↄooɛ (46.500).
Simɛↄ buiↄ lí bòokpa ń saɛ. An dↄaanan Zulisadai nɛ́ Selumiɛ ũ.
Aà zĩgↄ̃ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bàaↄ̃ mɛ̀ndosai ń ↄ̀aa do ń basↄooɛ (59.300).
An saɛ Gada buiↄ. An dↄaanan Deuɛli nɛ́ Ɛliasafa ũ.
Aà zĩgↄ̃ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ blasↄo ń ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ ń blakwioɛ (45.650).
Ampii an bòo wì mɛ Lubɛni buiↄ bòo, aa gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ basoplakwi ń mɛ̀ndoo ń ↄ̀aa pla ń blakwioɛ (151.450). Aamɛ aali dazɛu plaade ũ.
Levii bui bòodeↄ mɛ́ aali kpaaũkpɛ sɛ aa daò zɛ́u, aaiↄ bɛ guoguo. Lá an bòo kálɛa dɛ, màa aaliↄ bɛ zɛ́u. Baade iↄ ku a ↄi tɛa a dàlapoozi.
Ɛflaiũ bui gãliↄ lí bòokpa bɛ'aɛ oi ń ń dàlapooo. An dↄaanan Amihudu nɛ́ Ɛlisama ũ.
Aà zĩgↄ̃ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bla ń ↄ̀aa pla ń basↄooɛ (40.500).
Manase buiↄ líↄ kú ń saɛ. An dↄaanan Pedazuu nɛ́ Gamaliɛli ũ.
Aà zĩgↄ̃ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ baakwi ń plao ń ↄ̀aa dooɛ (32.200).
An saɛ Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ buiↄ. An dↄaanan Gidoni nɛ́ Abidã ũ.
Aà zĩgↄ̃ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ baakwi ń sↄoo ń ↄ̀aa plaoɛ (35.400).
Ampii an bòo wì mɛ Ɛflaiũ buiↄ bòo, aa gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ basↄokwi plasai ń basↄooɛ (108.100). Aamɛ aali dazɛu àaↄ̃de ũ Levii buiↄ gbɛa.
Dã bui gãliↄ mɛ́ aali bòokpa gugbãntoo oi ń ń dàlapooo. An dↄaanan Amisadai nɛ́ Ahiɛzɛɛ ũ.
Aà zĩgↄ̃ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bàaↄ̃ ń plao ń ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ ń basↄooɛ (62.700).
Asɛɛ buiↄ mɛ́ aali bòokpa ń saɛ. An dↄaanan Ɔkɛlana nɛ́ Pagiɛli ũ.
Aà zĩgↄ̃ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bla ń mɛ̀ndoo ń ↄ̀aa pla ń basↄooɛ (41.500).
An saɛ Nɛfatali buiↄ. An dↄaanan Enana nɛ́ Ahila ũ.
Aà zĩgↄ̃ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ blakwi ń àaↄ̃o ń ↄ̀aa plaoɛ (53.400).
Ampii an bòo wì mɛ Dã buiↄ bòo, aa gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ basoplakwi ń soplao ń ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃oɛ (157.600). Aali dazɛu gbɛzã ń ń dàlapooo.
Isaili pↄ́ wà ń nao ualɛ ń ualɛoↄn we. An zĩgↄ̃ↄ píi gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ ń àaↄ̃o ń basoplakwioɛ (603.550).
Kási wi Levii buiↄ da naopi guu ń ń Isaili deeↄo, lá Dii ò Mↄiziɛwa.
Isailiↄ kɛ̀ lá Dii ò Mↄiziɛwa, aa bòokpà ń ń dàlapooo màa, ↄ̃ aa dàzɛu daɛdaɛ ualɛ ń ualɛo.
Mↄizi ń Aalonao buiↄ yã́n kɛ gↄↄ pↄ́ Dii yã'ò Mↄiziɛ Sinai gbɛ musu.
Aalona nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Aà nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́ia Nadabu, Abiu, Ɛleazaa, Itamaa.
Aalona nɛ́ pↄ́ wà ń dílɛ sa'onaↄ ũ wà sa'ozĩ nànɛ́ ń ↄzĩↄ tↄ́n we.
Nadabu ń Abiuo gàga Dii aɛ Sinai guwaiwaiuɛ, kɛ́ aa mↄ̀ aà aɛ ń tɛ́ zĩ̀loo yã́i. Aai nɛ'i yãao, ↄ̃ Ɛleazaa ń Itamaao gↄ̃̀ sa'onaↄ ũ ń mae Aalona gↄↄ.
Dii yã'ò Mↄiziɛ à mɛ̀:
Mↄ́ ń Levii buiↄ, ní ń na Aalonaɛ a ↄzĩ, aali zĩkɛaànↄ.
Aali kpaaũkpɛ kpɛɛlɛ zĩ pↄ́ má dà Aalonaɛ ń Isailiↄ píi kɛ ń zwã̀akpɛpi zĩo lↄ.
Aali laaidↄ kpaaũkpɛ pↄkeleↄwa, aaiↄ zwã̀akpɛpi zĩ pↄ́ má dà Isailiↄnɛ kɛò.
Levii buiↄ na Aalona ń a nɛ́ↄnɛ ń ↄzĩ. Isaili pↄ́ wa kpàwà míↄmiↄↄn we.
Aalona ń a nɛ́ↄ dilɛ ma gbàgbanaↄ ũ. Tó gbɛ̃́ zĩ̀loe sↄ̃̀mazi, à gàɛ.
Dii yã'ò Mↄiziɛ à mɛ̀:
Mámɛ ma Levii buiↄ sɛ̀ Isailiↄ guu Isaili nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́iaↄ gbɛu. Levii buipiↄ iↄ dɛ ma pↄ́ ũ,
asa za gↄↄ pↄ́ ma Egipi nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́iaↄ dɛ̀dɛ, ma Isaili nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́iaↄ ń ń pↄtuo nɛsana sɛ̃́iaↄ dìlɛ ma pↄ́ ũɛ. Mámɛmaa Dii.
Dii yã'ò Mↄiziɛ Sinai guwaiwaiu à mɛ̀:
Levii buiↄ nao daɛdaɛ ualɛ ń ualɛo. An gↄ̃ɛↄ nao píi sɛa za nɛ́ mↄ doↄwa.
Ɔ̃ Mↄizi ń nao lá Dii òɛwa.
Levii nɛ́ↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Geesↄ̃, Kɛata ń Mɛlalio.
Geesↄ̃ nɛ́ↄ tↄ́n kɛ daɛdaɛ: Libeni ń Simɛio.
Kɛata nɛ́ↄ tↄ́n kɛ daɛdaɛ: Amlaũ, Isaa, Hɛblↄ̃ ń Uziɛlio.
Mɛlali nɛ́ↄ tↄ́n kɛ daɛdaɛ: Mali ń Musio. Levii buiↄn we daɛdaɛ ualɛ ń ualɛo.
Libeni buiↄ ń Simɛi buiↄ mɛ́ Geesↄ̃ buiↄ ũ.
Gↄ̃ɛ pↄ́ wà ń nao sɛa za nɛ́ mↄ doↄwaↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ sopla ń ↄ̀aa pla ń basↄooɛ (7.500).
Geesↄ̃ buipiↄ lí bòokpa zwã̀akpɛpi kpɛ naa bɛ'aɛ oi.
Laɛli nɛ́ Ɛlisafa mɛ́ ń kía ũ.
Geesↄ̃ buiↄ líↄ zwãa ń báa pↄ́ wàli kú kpaaũkpɛaↄ zĩ kɛ ń a kpɛɛlɛ zwãao
ń kaa lɛ́ zwãao ń kaa pↄ́ lia zwã̀akpɛpi ń sa'okĩiozi zwãao ń a baↄ píi.
Amlaũ buiↄ ń Isaa buiↄ ń Hɛblↄ̃ buiↄ ń Uziɛli buiↄ mɛ́ Kɛata buiↄ ũ.
Sɛa za nɛ́ mↄ doↄwa, an gↄ̃ɛↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ swaaↄ̃ ń ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃oɛ (8.600). Aamɛ aaliↄ zĩkɛ zwã̀akpɛu.
Kɛata buipiↄ mɛ́ aali bòokpa zwã̀akpɛpi saɛ naa gɛↄmidↄkĩi oi.
Uziɛli nɛ́ Ɛlizafã mɛ́ ń kía ũ.
Aaliↄ kpagolo ń táabũnuo ń dauo ń sa'okĩio ń tulaletikatɛakĩio ń zwã̀akpɛ zĩkɛbↄↄ ń suunao zĩ kɛ píi.
Sa'onkia Aalona nɛ́ Ɛleazaa mɛ́ Levii bui kíaↄ dↄaana ũ. Aàpi mɛ́ ì wɛ́tɛ zwã̀akpɛ zĩkɛnaↄzi.
Mali buiↄ ń Musi buiↄ mɛ́ Mɛlali buiↄ ũ.
Kɛ́ wà ń nao sɛa za nɛ́ mↄ doↄwa, an gↄ̃ɛↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ soolo ń ↄ̀aa dooɛ (6.200).
Abihaili nɛ́ Zuliɛli mɛ́ ń kía ũ. Aali bòokpa zwã̀akpɛ saɛ naa gugbãntoo oi.
Wà Mɛlali buiↄ dìlɛ aaliↄ wɛ́tɛ zwã̀akpɛ lipɛpɛɛↄzi ń a lipↄ̃ↄↄ ń a lipɛlɛↄ ń lipɛlɛpi zɛbↄↄ ń a pↄkeleↄ píi.
Aaliↄ kaa pↄ́ liaa zwã̀akpɛi lipɛlɛↄ ń a zɛbↄↄ ń a kũbↄↄ ń a baↄ zĩ kɛ lↄ.
Mↄizi ń Aalonao ń Aalonapi nɛ́ↄ lí bòokpa kpaaũkpɛ aɛ naa gukpɛ oi. Aamɛ aaliↄ luakukĩi zĩ kɛ Isailiↄnɛ. Tó gbɛ̃́ zĩ̀loe sↄ̃̀i, à gàɛ.
Levii bui pↄ́ Mↄizi ń Aalonao ń nao daɛdaɛ lá Dii òwaↄn we. Sɛa za nɛ́ mↄ doↄwa, aa gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bao ń plaoɛ (22.000).
Dii ò Mↄiziɛ à mɛ̀: Isaili nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́iaↄ nao píi sɛa za nɛ́ mↄ doↄwa, ní ń tↄ́ dalau.
Bee gbɛa ní Levii buiↄ dilɛ ma pↄ́ ũ Isaili nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́iaↄ gbɛu ḿpii, ní Levii buiↄ pↄtuoↄ dilɛ ma pↄ́ ũ Isailiↄ pↄtuo nɛsana sɛ̃́iaↄ gbɛu píi. Mámɛmaa Dii.
Ɔ̃ Mↄizi Isaili nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́iaↄ nào lá Dii òɛwa,
sɛa za nɛ́ mↄ doↄwa. Kɛ́ wà ń tↄ́ kà láu píi, an dasi kɛ̀ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bao ń ↄ̀aa do ń bàaↄ̃kwi ń àaↄ̃oɛ (22.273).
Ɔ̃ Dii yã'ò Mↄiziɛ à mɛ̀:
Levii buiↄ dilɛ ma pↄ́ ũ Isaili nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́iaↄ gbɛu, ní Levii buiↄ pↄtuoↄ dilɛ ma pↄ́ ũ Isailiↄ pↄtuo nɛsana sɛ̃́iaↄ gbɛu. Mámɛmaa Dii.
Isaili nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́iaↄ dasi dɛ Levii buiↄla gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa do ń bàaↄ̃kwi ń àaↄ̃o. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dìapiↄ boa yã́ musu,
ã́nusu ↄwatɛ̃ sↄ́sↄo símá an baade miwa, lá wà a gbia dìlɛ ma kúkĩiwa, ní kpá Aalona ń a nɛ́ↄwa. Ãnusu do gela baoɛ.
<range>
Ɔ̃ Mↄizi gbɛ̃bo'ↄ̃api sì gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ an dasi dɛ̀ Levii buiↄlapiↄwa.
À ↄ̃asì Isaili nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́iapiↄwa ã́nusu ↄwatɛ̃ ↄ̀aa soolo ń baswaaↄ̃sↄoo (1.365), lá wà a gbia dìlɛ luakukĩiwa.
Ɔ̃ a kpà Aalona ń a nɛ́ↄwa lá Dii òɛwa.
Dii yã'ò Mↄiziɛ ń Aalonao à mɛ̀:
Levii nɛ́ Kɛata buiↄ nao daɛdaɛ ualɛ ń ualɛo,
gↄ̃ɛ pↄ́ kà wɛ̃̀ baakwi e blakwi, aaì mↄ zĩkɛi kpaaũkpɛuↄ.
Zĩ pↄ́ Kɛata buipiↄ lí kɛ kpaaũkpɛu á ma pↄ́ɛ ń a mìbao.
Tó wàlɛ fɛlɛ bòou, Aalona lí mↄ́ ń a nɛ́ↄ, aali suuna zwãa polo aa ku ikoyã kpagoloa.
Aali ayo báa kua, aai gbasa zwãa pↄ́ wa kɛ̀ ń pↄ́lɛ búuna tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛo kua. Bee gbɛa aali kpagolo lipↄ̃ↄↄ sↄlↄu.
Aali zwã̀a búuna kú táabũnu pↄ́ kú ma aɛa, aai tapɛlɛntiↄ kálɛwà ń toonaↄ ń imibↄↄ ń lo pↄ́ wì vɛ̃ɛ kauↄ, aai pɛ̃ɛ pↄ́ wìↄ kpaa gↄↄpii kálɛ we lↄ.
Aali zwã̀a tɛ̃a ku pↄ́piↄla, aai ayo báa kua. Bee gbɛa aali táabũnupi lipↄ̃ↄↄ sↄlↄu.
Aali zwã̀a búuna sɛ ku daua ń a filiaↄ ń a dɛbↄↄ ń a túfukabↄↄ ń a nísikabↄↄ,
aai daupi ye ayo báau ń a pↄkelepiↄ píi, aai ye a lipↄ̃ↄↄwa.
Aali zwã̀a búuna kú tulaletikatɛakĩia, aai ayo báa kua. Bee gbɛa aali a lipↄ̃ↄↄ sↄlↄu.
Aali zĩkɛbↄ pↄ́ wàli zĩkɛò ma kúkĩiↄ sɛ́lɛ píi, aai ka zwã̀a búunau, aai ye ayo báau, aai gbasa ye a lipↄ̃ↄↄpiↄwa.
Aali sa'okĩi túfu bↄlɛ, aai zwã̀a gàalulade ku sa'okĩipia,
aai pↄkele pↄ́ wì zĩkɛoↄ ka sa'okĩipia, tɛ́sibↄↄ ń saaↄ ń pɛ́ɛluↄ ń au'ɛlɛbↄↄ ń sa'okĩi pↄkeleↄ píi, aai gbasa ye ayo báau, aai a lipↄ̃ↄↄ sↄlↄu.
Tó Aalona ń a nɛ́ↄ pↄkù ma kpɛ́ pↄ́ↄ ń a pↄkeleↄla píi aa làa, tó wàlɛ fɛlɛ bòou, Kɛata buiↄ lí gbasa mↄ́ pↄ́piↄ sɛ́lɛ. Aasuli ↄkã ma kpɛ́ pↄewao, kɛ́ aasu gagao yã́i. Kɛata buiↄ mɛ́ aaliↄ kpaaũkpɛ pↄ́piↄ sɛa.
Sa'onkia Aalona nɛ́ Ɛleazaa mɛ́ aliↄ wɛ́tɛ filia nísii ń tulaleti gĩnanao ń pↄ́wɛnti pↄ́ wìↄ mↄ ma gbai lá gu lɛ́ dↄo ń nísi pↄ́ wì pↄ́ dilɛò à gↄ̃ ma pↄ́ ũo, ìli wɛ́tɛ zwã̀akpɛi lↄ ń a pↄ́ↄ ń a pↄkeleↄ píi.
Dii yã'ò Mↄiziɛ ń Aalonao à mɛ̀:
Ásu to Kɛata buiↄ midɛ Levii buiↄ guuo.
Tó aa sↄ̃̀ ma kpɛ́ pↄ́piↄzi, Aalona ń a nɛ́ↄ mɛ́ aali dↄaa gɛ̃ zwã̀akpɛu, aai ń baade zĩ́ pↄ́ a kɛ ń aso pↄ́ a sɛo ↄlↄɛ̀, kɛ́ aasu gagao yã́i.
Kɛata buipiↄ suli gɛ̃ wɛ́kpalɛi ma kpɛ́ pↄ́piↄzi gↄↄ pↄ́ wàlɛ zwãa kuao, kɛ́ aasu gagao yã́i.
Dii yã'ò Mↄiziɛ à mɛ̀:
Geesↄ̃ buiↄ nao lↄ daɛdaɛ ualɛ ń ualɛo.
Gↄ̃ɛ pↄ́ kà wɛ̃̀ baakwi e blakwi, aaiↄ mↄ zĩkɛi kpaaũkpɛuↄ ↄ̃ ńyↄ̃ ń nao.
Zĩ pↄ́ Geesↄ̃ buiↄ lí kɛ ń aso pↄ́ aali sɛon kɛ:
Aali kpaaũkpɛzwãaↄ sɛ́ ń zwãa pↄ́ wì kuao ń ayo báa pↄ́ wì kuaↄ ń a kpɛɛlɛ zwãao
ń kaa pↄ́ liaa zwã̀akpɛ ń sa'okĩiozi zwãaↄ ń a lɛ zwãao ń a baↄ ń a pↄkeleↄ píi. Aali zĩ pↄ́ wì kɛoↄ kɛ píi.
Aalona ń a nɛ́ↄ mɛ́ aaↄ dɛ zĩ pↄ́ Geesↄ̃ buiↄ lí kɛ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ũ, asosɛan nò, zĩ pãle kɛan nò. Ampiↄ mɛ́ aali aso pↄ́ aa sɛ ↄlↄnɛ́.
Kpaaũkpɛ zĩ pↄ́ Geesↄ̃ buiↄ líↄ kɛn we. Sa'onkia Aalona nɛ́ Itamaa mɛ́ aliↄ wɛ́tɛ an zĩↄi.
Mɛlali buiↄ nao daɛdaɛ ualɛ ń ualɛo.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kà wɛ̃̀ baakwi e blakwi, aaiↄ mↄ zĩkɛi kpaaũkpɛuↄ ↄ̃ ńyↄ̃ ń nao.
Kpaaũkpɛ zĩ pↄ́ aaliↄ kɛn kɛ: Aamɛ aaliↄ zwã̀akpɛ lipɛpɛɛↄ sɛa ń a lipↄ̃ↄↄ ń a lipɛlɛↄ ń lipɛlɛpiↄ zɛbↄↄ
ń kaa pↄ́ liaai lipɛlɛↄ ń a zɛbↄↄ ń a kũbↄↄ ń a baↄ ń a pↄkele pↄ́ wì zĩkɛoↄ píi. Àli baade aso pↄ́ a sɛ ↄlↄɛ̀.
Kpaaũkpɛ zĩ pↄ́ Mɛlali buiↄ lí kɛn we. Sa'onkia Aalona nɛ́ Itamaa mɛ́ aliↄ wɛ́tɛ an zĩↄi.
Ɔ̃ Mↄizi ń Aalonao ń Isaili kíaↄ Kɛata buiↄ nào daɛdaɛ ualɛ ń ualɛo,
sɛa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kà wɛ̃̀ baakwi e blakwi, aaiↄ mↄ zĩkɛi kpaaũkpɛuↄ.
Aa gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa kuɛ'aaↄ̃ ń basoplakwioɛ (2.750).
Kɛata bui pↄ́ aaì zĩkɛ kpaaũkpɛuↄ dasilɛn we. Mↄizi ń Aalonao ń nao lá Dii ò Mↄiziɛwa.
Ɔ̃ aa Geesↄ̃ buiↄ nào daɛdaɛ ualɛ ń ualɛo,
sɛa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kà wɛ̃̀ baakwi e blakwi, aaiↄ mↄ zĩkɛi kpaaũkpɛuↄ.
Aa gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa kuɛ'aaↄ̃ ń baakwioɛ (2.630).
Geesↄ̃ bui pↄ́ aaì zĩkɛ kpaaũkpɛuↄ dasilɛn we. Mↄizi ń Aalonao ń nao lá Dii òwa.
Ɔ̃ aa Mɛlali buiↄ nào daɛdaɛ ualɛ ń ualɛo,
sɛa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kà wɛ̃̀ baakwi e blakwi, aaiↄ mↄ zĩkɛi kpaaũkpɛuↄ.
Aa gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa gɛ̃o ń mɛ̀ndooɛ (3.200).
Mɛlali buiↄ dasilɛn we. Mↄizi ń Aalonao ń nao lá Dii ò Mↄiziɛwa.
Màa Mↄizi ń Aalonao ń Isaili kíaↄ Levii buiↄ nào daɛdaɛ ualɛ ń ualɛo,
sɛa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kà wɛ̃̀ baakwi e blakwi, aaì mↄ zĩkɛi kpaaũkpɛu aaiↄ a aso sɛaↄ.
Ampii an dasi fɛ̀lɛ ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ swaaↄ̃ ń ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ baosaioɛ (8.580).
Kɛ́ Dii yãdìlɛ Mↄiziɛ, a ò gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ, wà baade zĩ́ ↄ̀lↄɛ̀ ń aso pↄ́ a sɛo. Ɔ̃ wà ń nao màa lá Dii ò Mↄiziɛwa.
Dii yã'ò Mↄiziɛ à mɛ̀:
O Isailiↄnɛ aa kusudeↄ ń kɛ̃nudeↄ ya bòou ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kã̀ gɛwa aa gbãlɛ̀ↄ.
À ń yá à ń kpá bòo kpɛ gↄ̃ɛ ń nↄɛo, kɛ́ aasu Isailiↄ bòo pↄ́ má kú a guu gbãlɛo yã́i.
Ɔ̃ Isailiↄ kɛ̀ màa, aa ń yá ń kpá bòo kpɛ, lá Dii ò Mↄiziɛwa.
Dii yã'ò Mↄiziɛ à mɛ̀:
O Isailiↄnɛ, tó gↄ̃ɛ ge nↄɛ duunakɛ̀ a gbɛ̃́ɛ à náaisaiyãkɛ̀ Diiɛ, à tàaekɛ̀n we.
Sema ade duuna pↄ́ a kɛ̀pi o gupuau, i a fĩabo gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ à tàaekɛ̀ɛpiɛ, i a ↄ̃a sↄode nawà.
Tó pↄde gà mɛ́ a daɛ fɛ̃̀ɛɛ vĩ wà fĩapi boɛ̀o, pↄ́pi a gↄ̃ ma pↄ́ ũɛ, wi kpa sa'onawa sãnu ń sãsakao pↄ́ wa lákaò aà duunapiao.
Sa pↄ́ Isailiↄ lí oa aliↄ dɛ sa'ona pↄ́ wà mↄ̀oɛ̀ pↄ́ ũɛ.
Pↄ́ pↄ́ gbɛ̃́ kpà Diiwa ali gↄ̃ sa'ona pↄ́ wà nàɛ̀ a ↄzĩ pↄ́ ũɛ.
Dii yã'ò Mↄiziɛ à mɛ̀:
O Isailiↄnɛ ǹ mɛ, tó gbɛ̃e nↄ pã̀zɛa à náaisaiyãkɛ̀ɛ̀,
gↄ̃ɛ pãle wùlɛaànↄ, aà zã́ a yã́ dↄ̃o, tó nↄɛpi gbãsĩkɛ̀ màa mɛ́ gbɛ̃e i aà eo, seelade kuo, kɛ́ wi aà kũòo yã́i,
tó gↄ̃ɛpi nↄ̀sɛ fɛ̀lɛ, mɛ́ àlɛ seakɛ a nↄpi yã́wa, àlɛ e à gbãsĩkɛ̀ yã̀, ge i gbãsĩkɛoa,
gↄ̃ɛpi i gɛ́ ń a napio sa'ona kĩ́i ń pↄ́wɛnti kiloo plao gba pↄ́ nↄɛpi a mↄò ũ. Asu nísikawào, mɛ́ asu tulaleti fã́wào, kɛ́ nↄ̀sɛfɛlɛgbaɛ yã́i. A dɛ dↄ̃́akpaagba pↄ́ ì to wà dↄ̃ tó wà tàaekɛ̀ sĩanaɛ ũɛ.
Sa'ona i mↄ́ ń nↄɛpio, i aà zɛ ma aɛ.
Sa'ona i ma kpɛ́ í dã ka oo nɛ́nau, i zwã̀akpɛ bùsu dã à zua.
I nↄɛpi falana go, i dↄ̃́akpaagba pↄ́ wì da nↄ̀sɛfɛlɛa yã́i na nↄɛpiɛ a ↄzĩ. Sa'onapi iↄ í pãsĩ pↄ́ ì láaizĩmápi kũa.
Sa'onapi i to nↄɛpi dↄ̃́akpa, i oɛ̀ à mɛ: Tó gↄ̃ɛe i wúlɛnnↄo, tó ni pã n zã́ ikoyãa n gbãsĩkɛ̀o, í pãsĩ pↄ́ ì láaizĩmápi a yãe inɛo.
Ãma tó n pã n zã́ ikoyãa, n gɛ n wulɛ ń gↄ̃ɛ pãleo n gbãsĩkɛ̀ɛ sↄ̃,
Dii a to n gbalaↄ ibaba, n gbɛɛ i sɛ́, n gbɛ̃́ↄ i láaizĩma, aai n ká.
Í pↄ́ ì láaizĩmáɛ beepi a taalɛ n mɛuɛ, i n gbɛɛ sɛ́, n gbalaↄ i ibaba. Nↄɛpi i gbasa mɛ: Ãmi! Aà kɛ màa!
Sa'ona i láai yã́piↄ kɛ̃ láwa, i pípi ń í pãsĩpio,
i í pãsĩ pↄ́ ì láaizĩmápi kpa nↄɛpiwa aà mi, i taalɛ aà mɛu à yãpãsĩ iɛ̀.
Ãma sa'ona lí nↄ̀sɛfɛlɛpↄwɛntipi si nↄɛpi ↄzĩ gĩa, i mↄ Diiɛ, i gbasa gɛò sa'okĩi.
Sa'onapi i pↄ́wɛntipi dã ↄkũ do yãdↄa Diigu gba ũ, i kpasa sa'okĩiwa, i gbasa ípi kpa nↄɛpiwa aà mi sa.
Tó nↄɛpi gbãsĩkɛ̀ à náaisaiyãkɛ̀ a zã́ɛɛ, gↄↄ pↄ́ à í pↄ́ ì láaizĩmápi mì, a taalɛ aà mɛuɛ, i yã'iɛ̀, aà gbɛɛ i sɛ́, aà gbalaↄ i ibaba, nↄɛpi i gↄ̃ láaipↄ ũ a gbɛ̃́ↄ guu.
Ãma tó nↄɛpi i gbãsĩkɛo mɛ́ a ku tàaesai, a bↄ aafiaɛ, iↄ nɛ'i.
Ikoyã pↄ́ má dìlɛ nↄ̀sɛfɛlɛa yã́ musun we. Tó nↄɛ pã̀ a zã́ baa à náaisaiyãkɛ̀ɛ̀,
ge tó gↄ̃ɛ nↄ̀sɛ mɛ́ fɛ̀lɛ, àlɛ seakɛ a nↄ yã́wa, a kɛkɛan we. Sa'ona lí mↄ́ ń nↄɛpio, i aà zɛ ma aɛ, i gbasa ikoyãpi kɛɛ̀ píi.
Aà gↄ̃pi aↄ tàae vĩ a guuo, ãma nↄɛpi duunapi a wi aàzĩa musuɛ.
Dii yã'ò Mↄiziɛ à mɛ̀:
O Isailiↄnɛ, tó gↄ̃ɛ ge nↄɛ lɛkɛ̀a à mɛ̀ a azĩa kpàa ma gbɛ̃́ ũɛ zálala,
ade vɛ̃ɛ ń í gbãao tɛ̃́. Asu vɛ̃ɛbɛ'i buie kã a lɛ́wao, mɛ́ asu vɛ̃ɛbɛ ísi ge a gii bleo.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ a ku ma gbɛ̃́ ũ zálala, asuli vɛ̃ɛli pↄe bleo, baa a wɛ́na ge a tɛɛ.
E lɛ́ pↄ́ a kɛ̀api gↄↄ gɛ paò, gɛ̃ su táa'o aà miwao. Aↄ dɛ ma pↄ́ ũ e gↄↄ pↄ́ à azĩa kpàapi lɛ́ gɛ paòɛ, i to a mikã gbã a laaiwa.
E gↄↄ pↄ́ à azĩa kpàa ma gbɛ̃́ zálala ũpi lɛ́ gɛ paò, asu sↄ̃ gɛio.
Baa tó aà mae ge aà da ge aà vĩ̀i ge aà dãuna gà, asu sↄ̃ aà gɛi à gbãlɛo, asa aàzĩa kpaaa seela ku aà miwaɛ.
Aↄ dɛ ma pↄ́ ũɛ e gↄↄ pↄ́ à azĩa kpàa ma gbɛ̃́ zálala ũpi lɛ́ gɛ paò.
Tó gbɛ̃e gà aà wáa kã́ndo, mɛ́ aà kua ma pↄ́ ũ mikã gbãlɛ̀, aà a mipi bo gbáigbai a gbãbↄgↄↄ, gↄↄ sopla gbɛa.
A gↄↄ swaaↄ̃de zĩ́ i mↄ sa'onaɛ ń felenaↄ ge felenguulu bↄlↄnaↄ mɛ̀n pla kpaaũkpɛ kpɛɛlɛ,
sa'ona i sa'o ń a mɛ̀ndoo duun awakpabↄ ũ, i sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ o ń a mɛ̀ndoo, i gbãbↄɛ̀ aà kua gɛ saɛ yã́i. Zĩbeezĩ i a mi bo,
i ɛa à azĩa kpaa e a kua ma pↄ́ ũ gↄↄ lɛ́u, i mↄ́ ń sãsa wɛ̃donao tàae fĩabobↄ ũ. Wasu aà kua ma gbɛ̃́ zálala ũ sɛ̃́ia gↄↄ dauo, asa aà kua ma gbɛ̃́ zálala ũ káaupi ↄ̃̀ↄkpàɛ.
Ikoyã pↄ́ má dìlɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ azĩa kpàaɛn kɛ lↄ. Tó gↄↄ pↄ́ a dìlɛ àↄ ku ma pↄ́ ũ pà, wà mↄaànↄ kpaaũkpɛ kpɛɛlɛ,
i sa'oa ń sãsa wɛ̃dona pↄ́ sãa vĩoo sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ obↄ ũ ń sãda wɛ̃dona pↄ́ sãa vĩoo duun awakpabↄ ũ ń sãsakao pↄ́ sãa vĩoo sáaukpa sa'obↄ ũ
apii ń a pↄ́wɛntio ń a vɛ̃ɛo ń kàao gbí do, kàa pↄ́ wa tòto ń nísioↄ ń kàawana pↄ́ wà nísi fã̀wàↄ.
Sa'ona i mↄ́ ń pↄ́piↄ ma aɛ píi, i sa pↄ́ wì o duuna awakpabↄ ũ o ń sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũo,
i sáaukpa sa'oa ń sãsakaoo ń a pↄ́wɛntio ń a vɛ̃ɛo ń kàao gbí do.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ azĩa kpàapi i a mi bo kpaaũkpɛ kpɛɛlɛ we, i a kua ma pↄ́ ũ mikã sɛ́lɛ kátɛu sáaukpasa nísi zĩ́lɛ.
Tó à a mi bò màa, sa'ona i sãsakao ↄ do pↄ́ wà a fùukɛ̀ sɛ́ ń kàa pↄ́ a bↄ̀ gbíuo mɛ̀ndo ń kàawanao mɛ̀ndo, i na gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ mibòpiɛ a ↄzĩ.
Sa'onapi i ɛa sí, i mↄmɛɛ. Lá pↄ́piↄá ma pↄ́ɛ, a gↄ̃ sa'onapi pↄ́ ũɛ ń a kùla pↄ́ wì mↄmɛɛo ń a gbá pↄ́ wì bↄ adoao. Bee gbɛa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ azĩa kpàapi i gbasa ɛa na vɛ̃ɛmiawa.
Ikoyã pↄ́ má dìlɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ azĩa kpàaɛn we ń sa pↄ́ a oa a lɛkɛa yã́io, pↄ́ pↄ́ asu ye kã́fĩ a gbãa lɛ́u bàasi. Lɛ́ pↄ́ a kɛ̀ gↄↄ pↄ́ à azĩa kpàa, sema aà a fĩabo.
Dii yã'ò Mↄiziɛ à mɛ̀:
O Aalonaɛ ń a nɛ́ↄ, tó aalɛ samaa'o Isailiↄnɛ, aali mɛ:
Dii báaadaágu, i ↄkuála,
Dii á gwa, i gbɛ̃kɛkɛɛ́,
Dii wɛ́tɛázi, i á nↄ̀sɛ daɛ́ doũ.
Aali samaa'o Isailiↄnɛ ń ma tↄ́o màa, míli báaadańgu.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ Mↄizi zwã̀akpɛ dↄ̀ a làa, à nísikàwà ń a pↄkeleↄ píi, à a sakɛ̃̀, ↄ̃ à nísikà sa'okĩiwa ń a pↄkeleↄ píi, à a sakɛ̃̀.
Ɔ̃ Isaili kíaↄ mↄ̀ ń gbao. Aamɛ aa ń deziↄ buiↄ kía pↄ́ wà ń dílɛ gbɛ̃naon dↄaanaↄ ũ.
Aa mↄ̀ ń ń gbao Diiɛ, zugo mɛ̀n soolo ń zuↄ mɛ̀n kuɛpla. Kía gbɛ̃ↄn plapla zugo mɛ̀ndodo, baade miwa zù mɛ̀ndodo, ↄ̃ aa gɛ̀ò zwã̀akpɛ kpɛɛlɛ.
Dii yã'ò Mↄiziɛ à mɛ̀:
Gba pↄ́ aa mↄ̀opiↄ sí, iↄ dɛ kpaaũkpɛ zĩkɛbↄↄ ũ, ní kpá Levii buiↄwa, lá a mↄ́má ń zĩ guuwa.
Ɔ̃ Mↄizi zugoↄ ń zupiↄ sì a kpà Levii buiↄwa.
À zugo mɛ̀n pla ń zù mɛ̀n síiↄ̃o kpà Geesↄ̃ buiↄwa ń zĩ lɛ́u.
À zugo mɛ̀n síiↄ̃ ń zù mɛ̀n swaaↄ̃o kpà Mɛlali buiↄwa ń zĩ lɛ́u. Sa'onkia Aalona nɛ́ Itamaa mɛ́ ń dↄaana ũ.
I asosɛbↄe kpa Kɛata buiↄwao, asa aa Dii kpɛ́ pↄ́ↄ sɛ́ ń gã̀uɛ.
Zĩ́ pↄ́ wà nísikà sa'okĩiwa, ↄ̃ kíapiↄ mↄ̀ ń ń gbaↄ sa'okĩipi aɛ sa'okĩipi sakɛ̃a yã́i.
Dii ò Mↄiziɛ yãa à mɛ̀, lá gu lɛ́ dↄ kíapiↄ líↄ mↄ dodo sa'okĩi sakɛ̃a yã́i.
Gↄↄ sɛ̃́ia zĩ́ Aminadabu nɛ́ Naasↄ̃, Yuda bui mɛ́ mↄ̀ ń a gbao. Gↄↄ plaade zĩ́ Zuaa nɛ́ Nɛtanɛli, Isakaa buiↄ kía mↄ̀ ń a gbao. Gↄↄ àaↄ̃de zĩ́ Heloni nɛ́ Ɛliabu, Zabulↄni buiↄ kía mↄ̀ ń a gbao. Gↄↄ síiↄ̃de zĩ́ Sedeu nɛ́ Ɛlizuu, Lubɛni buiↄ kía mↄ̀ ń a gbao. Gↄↄ sↄode zĩ́ Zulisadai nɛ́ Selumiɛ, Simɛↄ buiↄ kía mↄ̀ ń a gbao. Gↄↄ soolode zĩ́ Deuɛli nɛ́ Ɛliasafa, Gada buiↄ kía mↄ̀ ń a gbao. Gↄↄ soplade zĩ́ Amihudu nɛ́ Ɛlisama, Ɛflaiũ buiↄ kía mↄ̀ ń a gbao. Gↄↄ swaaↄ̃de zĩ́ Pedazuu nɛ́ Gamaliɛli, Manase buiↄ kía mↄ̀ ń a gbao. Gↄↄ kɛ̃okwide zĩ́ Gidoni nɛ́ Abidã, Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ buiↄ kía mↄ̀ ń a gbao. Gↄↄ kwide zĩ́ Amisadai nɛ́ Ahiɛzɛɛ, Dã buiↄ kía mↄ̀ ń a gbao. Gↄↄ kuɛdode zĩ́ Ɔkɛlana nɛ́ Pagiɛli, Asɛɛ buiↄ kía mↄ̀ ń a gbao. Gↄↄ kuɛplade zĩ́ Enana nɛ́ Ahila, Nɛfatali buiↄ kía mↄ̀ ń a gbao. Gba pↄ́ an baade mↄ̀on kɛ: Ãnusu tapɛlɛnti pↄ́ a gbia kiloo do ń kĩnio, au'ɛlɛbↄ pↄ́ wa pì ń ã́nusuo a gbia galaũ ↄ̀aa síiↄ̃ɛ, lá wà a gbia lɛ́ dìlɛ luakukĩiwa. Wà pↄ́wɛnti yãalɛa ń nísio kà tapiↄ pai pↄ́wɛn gba ũ. Vua toona pↄ́ a gbia galaũ basↄokwi, wà tulaletikà a pai. Sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ obↄↄn kɛ: Zugaaena do, sãsakao do, sãsa wɛ̃dona do. Duun awakpabↄn kɛ: Blesana do. Sáaukpasaↄn kɛ: Zu pla, sãsakao sↄo, blesana sↄo, sãsa wɛ̃dona sↄo.
