Ɔ̃ a ò sa'ona Ilikiaɛ ń Safana nɛ́ Aikaũo ń Mise nɛ́ Akabooo ń lakɛ̃na Safanao ń a ìwa Asaiao à mɛ̀:
À gɛ Dii lamɛɛ ń Yudaↄ píi lá pↄ́ wa bↄwàɛ bee yã́ musu. Dii pↄpaawázi à kɛ̀ zài, asa wá deziↄ i wá yã́ pↄ́ kú láɛ bee guu ma aa zĩkɛ̀wào.
Ɔ̃ sa'ona Ilikia ń Aikaũo ń Akabooo ń Safanao ń Asaiao gɛ̀ yã́pi ò nↄɛ ãnabi Uledaɛ. Nↄɛpi ku Yelusalɛũ fã́ani plaade guuɛ, aà zã́ tↄ́n Saluũ, Tikeva nɛ́, Halasa tↄũnaɛ. Halasapi mɛ́ Dii kpɛ́ ula'ulɛna ũ.
Dii Isailiↄ Lua yã'ò nↄɛpiɛ à mɛ̀: À gɛ o gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ á zĩ́aɛ,
ma Dii ma mɛ̀ má yã́yia guɛ beewa ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kúuↄ, lá a ku lá pↄ́ Yudaↄ kía a kyokɛ̀pi guuwa.
Má pↄkũmabↄbↄ guɛ beewaɛ, ma pↄkũmapi a kpálɛo, asa aa ma to we, aa tulaletikàtɛa dii pãleↄnɛɛ, aa ma pↄ fɛ̀lɛmɛɛ tã́a pↄ́ aa kɛ̀piↄ yã́i.
À o Yudaↄ kía pↄ́ á zĩ́ ma laiɛ, yã́ pↄ́ a màpi musu, ma Dii Isailiↄ Lua ma mɛ̀,
yã́ pↄ́ má ò guɛ bee musu ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kúuↄ, ma mɛ̀ a gↄ̃ yàaa láaipↄ ũɛ, lá à swãsɛ̀i à azĩa bùsamɛɛ, à a ulada ga kɛ̃̀ à ↄ́ↄlↄ̀, ma aà yãmà má sìaànↄ. Ma Dii mámɛ má ò.
A yã́i tò má tó aà ga, wi aà vĩ niɛ guu. Aà wɛ́ a si yã́ pↄ́ má yía guɛ beewapilɛo. Ɔ̃ zĩnapiↄ ɛ̀a tà kí kĩ́i ń yã́pio.
Kí Yelusalɛũ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ń Yudaↄ sìsi, ↄ̃ aa kã̀aaaàzi ḿpii.
À gɛ̀ńnↄ Dii ua ń sa'onaↄ ń ãnabiↄ ń Yelusalɛũdeↄ ń Yudaↄ píi, nɛ́fɛ̃nɛn gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ, ↄ̃ a tò wà Dii bàakuańnↄ lá pↄ́ wa è aà kpɛ́upi kyokɛ̀ ń wáa píi.
Kí zɛa mↄ̀pɛlɛ saɛ, ↄ̃ à ɛ̀a zɛ̀ ń Dii bàakuańnↄ yã́ↄ. À mɛ̀ á tɛ́ Diizi, íↄ aà yãdilɛaↄ ń aà yãdanɛↄ kũa, íↄ aà ↄtondↄkĩi gwa ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo teasisai, lá a ku lápi guuwa. Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃́pii zɛ̀ ń Dii bàakuańnↄ yã́o lↄ.
Kí ò sa'onkia Ilikiaɛ ń aà kwàasio ń Dii kpɛ́ bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ, aa pↄ́ pↄ́ wa kɛ̀ Baaliɛ ń Asetaatio ń luabɛ pↄ́ↄ sɛ́lɛ bↄò Dii kpɛ́u. Ɔ̃ à gɛ̀ tɛsↄ̃̀wà Yelusalɛũ bĩ́i kpɛ Sedↄ̃ guzulɛ bugbɛu, ↄ̃ wà a túfu sɛ̀lɛ tàò Bɛtɛli.
Ɔ̃ kí tã́agbagbana pↄ́ Yuda kíaↄ dìlɛ aa sa'ò Yuda wɛ̃́lɛ gulɛsĩↄwaↄ ń pↄ́ pↄ́ lìa Yelusalɛũziↄ yà ḿpii ń tã́agbagbana pↄ́ aa sa'ò Baali ń ĩatɛ̃o ń mↄvuao ń saan tↄdeↄ ń luabɛ pↄ́ↄwaↄ píi.
À Asetaati lipɛlɛ sɛ̀ Dii ua à bↄ̀ò à gɛ̀ tɛsↄ̃̀wà Yelusalɛũ bĩ́i kpɛ Sedↄ̃ guzulɛu, ↄ̃ à a tibò a fã̀ɛ táaaↄ miaↄwa.
À gↄ̃ɛ káaluaↄ kpɛ́ pↄ́ kú Dii uaↄ gbòo lↄ. Kpɛ́piↄ guu nↄɛↄ Asetaati zwã̀akpɛↄ tã̀u.
A tò sa'ona pↄ́ kú Yuda wɛ̃́lɛuↄ sù Yelusalɛũ, ↄ̃ à gulɛsĩ pↄ́ wa bò sa'onapiↄ tulaletikàtɛawàↄ gbãlɛ̀ za Gɛba e Bɛɛsɛba. À tã́agbagbakĩi pↄ́ kú wɛ̃́lɛ dↄaana Yozuee bↄlɛu wɛ̃́lɛ bↄlɛ ↄzɛɛ oiↄ gbòo.
I we gulɛsĩ gbàgbanapiↄ sa'ò Diiwa Yelusalɛũo, ãma aa kàa só ń ń gbɛ̃́ↄ.
A tò sa'okĩi pↄ́ kú Tofɛti, Bɛninↄũ guzulɛu gbãlɛ̀, kɛ́ gbɛ̃e su sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ o Mↄlↄkuwa ń a nɛgↄ̃ɛ ge ń a nɛnↄɛo lↄo.
À gò ń sↄ̃́ pↄ́ Yuda kíaↄ dìlɛ ĩatɛ̃ pↄ́ ũↄ Dii kpɛ́ kpɛɛlɛ, ↄ̃ à sↄ̃́piↄ góↄ kpàsa. Sↄ̃́piↄ ku yãa Dii ua Natãmɛlɛki kpɛ́ saɛɛ.
À sa'okĩi pↄ́ Yuda kíaↄ bò Aaza kpɛdiakↄ̃a musuↄ gbòo ń pↄ́ pↄ́ Manase bò Dii ua sɛ̃́ia ń a plaadeoↄ. Ɔ̃ a wìwi kɛ́lɛkɛlɛ, à a buuna sɛ̀lɛ kↄ̀lɛ Sedↄ̃ guzulɛu.
Ɔ̃ à gulɛsĩ pↄ́ wa bò Yelusalɛũ gukpɛ oi Kùkpɛ sĩ̀sĩpↄlɛu gɛↄmidↄkĩi oiↄ gbãlɛ̀. Isailiↄ kí Salomↄↄ mɛ́ sa'okĩipiↄ bò Sidↄ̃deↄ dii Asetaatiɛ ń Mↄabuↄ dii Kɛmↄsio ń Amↄniↄ dii Mↄlↄkuo.
À a gbɛ̀pɛlɛↄ wìwi, à a lipɛlɛↄ zↄ̃̀zↄ̃, ↄ̃ à gbɛ̃nazĩn gɛwaↄ kàlɛkalɛ gupiↄu à pà.
Baa gulɛsĩ pↄ́ Nɛba nɛ́ Yeloboaũ bò sa'okĩi ũ Bɛtɛli à Isailiↄ dàò duunkɛaupi, Yosia gulɛsĩpi ń a sa'okĩio gbòo. À gulɛsĩpi gbɛↄ wìwi à a tibò, à tɛsↄ̃̀ Asetaati lipɛlɛwa lↄ.
Kɛ́ à wɛzù, à miaↄ è sĩ̀sĩwa we, ↄ̃ à gɛwaↄ bↄ̀lɛu a kpàsa sa'okĩipiwa à a gbãlɛ̀, lá Dii dà Lua gbɛ̃́ɛ à dↄ̀aa òwa.
Ɔ̃ kí mɛ̀: Dé mia wà seelakɛ̀wà keei? Ɔ̃ wɛ̃́lɛpideↄ mɛ̀: Lua gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ bↄ̀ Yuda bùsuuɛ. Ɔ̃mɛ dↄ̀aa yã́ pↄ́ ń kɛ̀ Bɛtɛli sa'okĩiɛ beeɛ ò.
Ɔ̃ kí mɛ̀: À to we. Gbɛ̃e su aà wá sɛ́ sↄ̃òo. Ɔ̃ wà aà wáↄ tò we ń ãnabi pↄ́ bↄ̀ Samali wáo.
Gulɛsĩ kpɛ́ pↄ́ Isaili kíaↄ dↄ̀ Samali bùsu wɛ̃́lɛↄ guu aa Dii pↄ fɛ̀lɛoɛ̀ↄ ↄ̃ Yosia wìwi píi, a kɛ̀ sa'okĩipiↄnɛ lá a kɛ̀ Bɛtɛli pↄ́ɛwaɛ.
Ɔ̃ à gulɛsĩpiↄ gbàgbanaↄ kòlokpakpa sa'okĩi pↄ́ aaì sa'owàↄwa píi, à gbɛ̃nazĩn gɛwaↄ kpàsawà, ↄ̃ à ɛ̀a tà Yelusalɛũ.
Kí ò gbɛ̃́piiɛ à mɛ̀: À Gɛ̃amusu dikpɛkɛ Dii á Luaɛ, lá a ku Dii bàakuawanↄ taalaɛ bee guuwa.
Za gↄↄ pↄ́ dↄaanaↄ dↄ̀aa Isailiↄnɛ ń gↄↄ pↄ́ Isaili kíaↄ ń Yuda kíaↄ lɛ́ kpalableo píi, wi Gɛ̃amusu dikpɛpi kɛ à kà màao.
Kí Yosia kpalablea wɛ̃̀ bao plasaide guu ↄ̃ wà Gɛ̃amusu dikpɛpi kɛ̀ Yelusalɛũ.
Bee gbɛa à gɛ̀sisinaↄ ń wɛlɛndeↄ mìdɛ, à kpɛ́ guu tã́aↄ ń ua tã́aↄ ń tã́a pↄ́ pↄ́ wa è Yelusalɛũ ń Yuda bùsuoↄ dúuzↄ̃̀ píi míↄmiↄ, kɛ́ à zĩkɛ ikoyã pↄ́ kú taala pↄ́ sa'onkia Ilikia bↄ̀wà Dii kpɛ́upiↄwa.
Kí pↄ́ dↄ̀aaɛↄ ń kí pↄ́ kú aà gbɛaↄ guu, an gbɛ̃e i zɛ ń Diio ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo ń a pↄeão píi laaàwao. A Mↄizi ikoyã kũa píi a gbãa lɛ́uɛ.
Gia ń beeo Dii pↄfɛ̃a Yudaↄzi ń pↄkũma pãsĩo vãi pↄ́ Manase kɛ̀ yã́i i kpálɛo.
Dii mɛ̀: Má Yudaↄ yá mà ń gomala, lá ma Isailiↄ yà ma ń gomalawaɛ. Má gí Yelusalɛũ pↄ́ má sɛ̀i ń kpɛ́ pↄ́ ma mɛ̀ ma tↄ́ aↄ kuwàoɛ.
Yosia yã́ kĩniↄ ku Yuda kíaↄ ladau ń yã́ pↄ́ a kɛ̀ↄ píi.
Kí Yosia gↄↄ kɛ́ Egipiↄ kí Falaↄ̃ↄ Nɛko lɛ́ gɛ́ Asiliↄ kía lei Uflatai, ↄ̃ Yosia gɛ̀ zĩkaiaànↄ Mɛgido. Kɛ́ aa kↄ̃ lè, ↄ̃ Nɛko aà dɛ̀.
Aà ìwaↄ aà gɛ sɛ dà sↄ̃́go guu, aa sùò Yelusalɛũ wa vĩ̀. Ɔ̃ Yudaↄ aà nɛ́ Yoaaza kpà kía ũ aà gbɛu.
Yoaaza wɛ̃̀ bao ń àaↄ̃ode guu à kpalablè, à zↄ̃̀lɛ báawa Yelusalɛũ mↄ àaↄ̃ɛ. Aà da tↄ́n Amutali, Zelemii nɛ́, Libena gbɛ̃́ɛ.
À yã́ pↄ́ Dii yeio kɛ̀ lá a deziↄ kɛ̀waɛ.
Ɔ̃ Falaↄ̃ↄ Nɛko mↄkàwà Libla, Amata bùsuu, kɛ́ asu àↄ dɛ kía ũ Yelusalɛũo yã́i, ↄ̃ à mɛ̀ Yuda bùsudeↄ falubↄɛ ã́nusu tↄnu àaↄ̃ ń kĩnio ń vuao kiloo bla sↄosai.
Ɔ̃ à Yosia nɛ́ Ɛliakiũ dìlɛ kía ũ a mae Yosia gɛ̃ɛ ũ, ↄ̃ à aà tↄ́ lìlɛɛ̀ Yoakiũ. Ɔ̃ à Yoaaza sɛ̀ tàò Egipi, we à gàu.
Yoakiũ ã́nusu ń vua pↄ́ Falaↄ̃ↄ Nɛko gbɛ̀awa sì a bùsudeↄwa baade gbãa lɛ́u, ↄ̃ a kpàwà.
Yoakiũ wɛ̃̀ baasↄode guu ↄ̃ à kpalablè, à zↄ̃̀lɛ báawa Yelusalɛũ wɛ̃̀ kuɛdoɛ. Aà da tↄ́n Zebuda, Pedaia nɛ́, Luma gbɛ̃́ɛ.
À yã́ pↄ́ Dii yeio kɛ̀ lá a deziↄ kɛ̀waɛ.
Yoakiũ kiblegↄↄ ↄ̃ Babɛli kí Nɛbukanɛza mↄ̀ lɛ̀lɛ Yuda bùsuwa, ↄ̃ Yoakiũ gↄ̃̀ aà zↄ̀blena ũ e wɛ̃̀ àaↄ̃. A gbɛa à nↄ̀sɛ pãle sɛ̀, ↄ̃ à bↄ̀ aà yã́u.
Dii Babiloni gbãamↄnɛdeↄ gbàɛwà ń Siliↄ ń Mↄabuↄ ń Amↄniↄ. À ń gbáɛ Yudaↄ bùsuu aa kaalɛ, lá a dà a zↄ̀blena ãnabiↄnɛ aa òwa.
Yã́pi Yudaↄ lè, kɛ́ Dii mɛ́ ò yã́i, kɛ́ à ń yá ń goala duuna pↄ́ Manase kɛ̀ yã́i
ń yãesaide pↄ́ à ń dɛdɛↄ yã́io. Manasepi tò Yelusalɛũ pà ń yãesaide pↄ́ à ń dɛdɛↄ auo. Bee yã́i Dii i we sùuukɛ̀o.
Yoakiũ yã́ kĩniↄ ku Yuda kíaↄ ladau ń yã́ pↄ́ a kɛ̀ↄ píi.
Kɛ́ à gà, ↄ̃ aà nɛ́ Yɛkↄnia zↄ̃̀lɛ aà gbɛu.
Egipiↄ kía i ɛa bↄ̀ a bùsuu lↄo, asa Babɛli kía bùsu pↄ́ dɛ Egipi pↄ́ ũ yãa sìwà píiɛ za Egipi zɛ́ swai e Uflatai.
Yɛkↄnia wɛ̃̀ bao plasaide guu ↄ̃ à kpalablè, à zↄ̃̀lɛ báawa Yelusalɛũ mↄ àaↄ̃ɛ. Aà da tↄ́n Nɛuseta, Ɛlenatã nɛ́, Yelusalɛũ gbɛ̃́ɛ.
À yã́ pↄ́ Dii yeio kɛ̀ lá a mae kɛ̀waɛ.
Zĩbeezĩ Babɛli kí Nɛbukanɛza zĩgↄ̃ↄ mↄ̀ Yelusalɛũ aa koezↄ̃̀i, aa ku we.
Ɔ̃ Nɛbukanɛza mↄ̀ we gↄↄ pↄ́ aà ìwapiↄ liaai.
Ɔ̃ Yudaↄ kí Yɛkↄnia bↄ̀ gɛ̀ azĩa kpàwà, aàpi ń a dao ń a ìwaↄ ń a kía deeↄ ń a kwàasiↄ. Babɛli kíapi Yɛkↄnia kũ̀ a kpalablea wɛ̃̀ swaaↄ̃de guuɛ.
Ɔ̃ à Dii kpɛ́ àizɛɛↄ nàaa à bↄ̀ò we ń kibɛ àizɛɛↄ. À vua pↄ́ pↄ́ Isailiↄ kí Salomↄↄ kɛ̀ Dii kpɛ́ pↄ́ ũↄ zↄ̃̀ɛzↄ̃ɛ lá Dii dↄ̀aa òwa.
À Yelusalɛũ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ń zĩgↄ̃ↄ kũ̀kũ tàńnↄ zĩ̀zↄↄ ũ píi, aa kà gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ kwi (10.000). À tà ń li'ãnaↄ ń siaↄ lↄ. Gbɛ̃e i gↄ̃o, sema taasideↄ bàasio.
Màa à Yɛkↄnia kũ̀ Yelusalɛũ ń aà dao ń aà naↄ ń aà kwàasiↄ ń bùsu gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ, à tàńnↄ Babɛli zĩ̀zↄↄ ũ.
À tà Babɛli ń gↄ̃gbãaↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ sopla (7.000) ń li'ãnaↄ ń siaↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa sↄo. Ampii gↄ̃sa giiↄnɛ.
À Yɛkↄnia desɛ̃ Matania dìlɛ kía ũ aà gbɛu, ↄ̃ à aà tↄ́ lìlɛɛ̀ Zedekia.
Zedekia wɛ̃̀ bao ń mɛ̀ndoode guu ↄ̃ à kpalablè, à zↄ̃̀lɛ báawa Yelusalɛũ wɛ̃̀ kuɛdoɛ. Aà da tↄ́n Amutali, Zelemii nɛ́, Libena gbɛ̃́ɛ.
À yã́ pↄ́ Dii yeio kɛ̀ lá Yoakiũ kɛ̀waɛ.
Dii pↄkũma mɛ́ tò yã́pi Yelusalɛũ ń Yuda bùsuo lè píi e à gɛ̀ ń yá ń goala. Ɔ̃ Zedekia bↄ̀ Babɛli kía yã́u.
Zedekia kpalablea wɛ̃̀ kɛ̃okwide guu, a mↄ kwide gↄↄ kwide zĩ́ ↄ̃ Babɛli kí Nɛbukanɛza mↄ̀ lɛ́lɛi Yelusalɛũwa, aàpi ń a zĩgↄ̃ↄ píi. Aa bòokpà a bĩ́i saɛ, ↄ̃ aa gbà lɛsĩↄ dà aa lìai.
Aa liaa wɛ̃́lɛpizi màa e kí Zedekia kpalablea wɛ̃̀ kuɛdode guu.
A mↄ síiↄ̃de gↄↄ kɛ̃okwide zĩ́ nↄana gbãakũ̀ wɛ̃́lɛu, gbɛ̃e pↄblea vĩ lↄo.
Kɛ́ wà bĩ́i fↄ̃̀, ↄ̃ Yuda zĩgↄ̃ↄ lɛ̀kↄ̃wa píi, aa bↄ̀lɛ ń kibɛ kaao, aa bↄ̀lɛ wɛ̃́lɛ bↄlɛu gwã́, ↄ̃ aa pɛ̀lɛ Yuudɛ̃ sɛ̃u.
Ɔ̃ Babiloni zĩgↄ̃ↄ pɛ̀lɛ kí gbɛwa, aa aà lè sɛ̃piu Yeliko oi. Kɛ́ Zedekia zĩgↄ̃ↄ fã̀aa, aa aà tò we,
ↄ̃ wà aà kũ̀ tàò Babɛli kíaɛ Libla. We wà yãdàuaàla,
wà aà nɛ́ↄ dɛ̀dɛ aà wáa, ↄ̃ wà aà wɛ́ wìwi, wà mↄgotɛ̃ gala kpàɛ̀, wà tàaànↄ Babɛli.
Babɛli kía kpalablea wɛ̃̀ bao mɛ̀ndosaide guu, a mↄ sↄode gↄↄ soplade zĩ́ ↄ̃ aà ìwa Nɛbuzaladã mↄ̀ Yelusalɛũ. Aàpi mɛ́ Nɛbukanɛza dↄaiↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ.
À tɛsↄ̃̀ Dii kpɛ́wa ń kibɛo ń Yelusalɛũ kpɛ́ↄ píi. Kpɛ́ pↄ́ dɛ kpɛ́ zↄ̃ↄ ũ píi lé, à tɛsↄ̃̀wàɛ.
Ɔ̃ a tò Babiloni zĩgↄ̃ↄ Yelusalɛũ bĩ́i gbòo ḿpii.
À gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ wɛ̃́lɛpiuↄ nàaa tàńnↄ Babɛli ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gɛ̀ nà Babɛli kíawaↄ ń gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ.
Taasideↄ ↄ̃ à ń tó we aaↄ vɛ̃ɛbuↄ ń bugbɛↄ sɛ̃wa.
Babiloniↄ Dii kpɛ́ mↄgotɛ̃ pɛ́lɛↄ ń tadibↄↄ ń íkakĩi zↄ̃ↄo wìwi aa tàò Babɛli.
Aa túfukabↄↄ ń pɛ́ɛluↄ ń filiadɛbↄↄ ń gↄ̃̀ↄnaↄ ń mↄgotɛ̃ pↄpãle pↄ́ wì Dii kpɛ́ zĩ kɛòↄ nàaa tàò lↄ.
Ɔ̃ dↄaiↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi tàasoↄ ń au'ɛlɛbↄↄ ń pↄ́ pↄ́ wa pì ń vuao ge ń ã́nusuoↄ sɛ̀lɛ píiɛ.
Mↄ̀pɛlɛ mɛ̀n pla ń íkakĩipio ń tadibↄ pↄ́ Salomↄↄ pì Dii kpɛ́ pↄ́ ũↄ, wi fↄ̃ wà a mↄgotɛ̃ yↄ̃̀ kiloowao, a gbia kɛ̀ zài.
Mↄ̀pɛlɛpiↄ lɛsĩ gã̀sĩsuu bao plaplasaiɛ, mɛ́ a fùa pↄ́ kú musuↄ lɛsĩ gã̀sĩsuu sↄ́sↄoɛ. Mↄdaona tãa ń gↄ̃ina pↄ́ wa kɛ̀ lán gbɛafu bɛwaↄ liaa fùapiↄzi píiɛ. Mↄ̀pɛlɛ mɛ̀n plapiↄ doũɛ.
Dↄaiↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi sa'onkia Selaia kũ̀ ń aà plaade Zefaniao ń bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃ana gbɛ̃ↄn àaↄ̃ↄ.
À zĩgↄ̃ↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ kũ̀ wɛ̃́lɛ guu ń kí ìwa gbɛ̃ↄn sↄo pↄ́ à bↄ̀má wɛ̃́lɛ guuↄ lↄ ń zĩgↄ̃ↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ lakɛ̃na pↄ́ ì gbɛ̃́ↄ tↄ́ dalauo ń gↄ̃ɛ gbɛ̃ↄn bàaↄ̃ pↄ́ wà bↄ̀má wɛ̃́lɛ guuↄ.
Nɛbuzaladãpi ń naaa tàńnↄ Babɛli kíaɛ Libla,
ↄ̃ Babɛli kíapi ń dɛdɛ Libla we Amata bùsuu. Màa wà Yudaↄ nàaa ń bùsuu wà tàńnↄ.
Babɛli kí Nɛbukanɛza Aikaũ nɛ́ Gedalia, Safana tↄũna dìlɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ Yuda bùsuuↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ.
Kɛ́ zĩgↄ̃ↄ dↄaanaↄ ń ń gbɛ̃́ↄ mà Babɛli kía Gedalia dìlɛ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ, ↄ̃ aa mↄ̀ aà kĩ́i Mizipa. Nɛtania nɛ́ Isimaɛla kú ń guu ń Kalea nɛ́ Yohananio ń Tanumɛ nɛ́ Selaia, Nɛtofa gbɛ̃́o ń Maaka gbɛ̃́ nɛ́ Yazaniao ń ń gbɛ̃́ↄ.
Ɔ̃ Gedalia lɛgbɛ̃̀nɛ́ ń ń gbɛ̃́piↄ à mɛ̀: Ásu vĩakɛ Babiloni gbãadeↄnɛo. À zↄ̃lɛ wá bùsuu la à zↄble Babɛli kíaɛ, íↄ aafia.
Ãma a mↄ soplade guu ↄ̃ Nɛtania nɛ́ Isimaɛla, Ɛlisama tↄũna pↄ́ dɛ kíabui ũ mↄ̀ ń gbɛ̃ↄn kwiↄ, à Gedalia dɛ̀ ń Yuda pↄ́ kuaànↄ Mizipaↄ ń Babiloni pↄ́ kuaànↄ weↄ.
Ɔ̃ Yudaↄ fɛ̀lɛ, nɛ́fɛ̃nɛn gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ píi ń zĩgↄ̃ↄ dↄaanapiↄ, aa bàalɛ̀ tà Egipi, kɛ́ aalɛ vĩakɛ Babiloniↄnɛ yã́i.
Yudaↄ kí Yɛkↄnia taa Babɛli wɛ̃̀ bla àaↄ̃saide, a mↄ kuɛplade gↄↄ baasↄo ń plaode zĩ́ ↄ̃ Babɛli kí Ɛvili Mɛlodaki aà bↄ̀ kpɛ́u a kpalablea wɛ̃̀ sɛ̃́ia guu, à aà sɛ̀ lɛsĩ.
À yãmaa òɛ̀, ↄ̃ à zↄ̃lɛkĩi pↄ́ dɛ a kía dee pↄ́ kuanↄ Babɛliↄ pↄ́a kpàwà.
Ɔ̃ Yɛkↄnia ↄzↄ̃̀ a dakpɛunakɛ'ulai, ìↄ pↄble ń kío sãnu e a wɛ̃ni lɛ́u.
Lá gu lɛ́ dↄ kí ìↄ pↄ́ pↄ́ a yei kpawàɛ e à gɛ̀ gàò.
Adamu, Sɛti, Ɛnↄsi,
Kena, Maalalee, Yɛlɛdi,
Ɛnↄki, Mɛtusela, Lemɛki,
Nↄee ń a nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ Sɛũ ń Haũo ń Yafɛtio.
Yafɛti nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Gomɛɛ, Magↄgu, Mɛdɛ, Gɛlɛsi, Tubali, Mɛsɛki ń Tilasio.
Gomɛɛ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Asɛnazi, Lifa ń Tↄgaamao.
Gɛlɛsi nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Ɛlisa, Taasisi, Sipi ń Lodanio.
Haũ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Etiopi, Egipi, Libii ń Kanaao.
Etiopi nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Saba, Avila, Sabata, Laama ń Sabatɛkao. Laama nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Seba ń Dedão ũ.
Niũlodiá Etiopi buiɛ lↄ. Ɔ̃mɛ dṹnia nɛgↄ̃n tↄde sɛ̃́ia ũ.
Egipi buiↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Ludiↄ, Anaũↄ, Lɛabaↄ, Nafɛtuↄ,
Patusiↄ, Kasuluↄ ń Kɛlɛti pↄ́ Filitɛ̃ↄ bↄ̀ ń guuↄ.
Kanaa nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́ian Sidↄ̃ ũ. Aà bui kĩniↄn kɛ: Iti buiↄ,
Yebusi buiↄ, Amↄle buiↄ, Giigasi buiↄ,
Ivi buiↄ, Aaka buiↄ, Sini buiↄ,
Aavadi buiↄ, Zɛmali buiↄ ń Amata buiↄ.
Sɛũ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Elaũ, Asili, Aapasa, Ludi ń Alaũo. Alaũ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Uzu, Hulu, Getɛɛ ń Mɛsɛkio.
Aapasa mɛ́ Sela ì, ↄ̃ Sela Ɛbɛlu ì.
Ɛbɛlupi nɛgↄ̃ɛ ì plaɛ. Ado tↄ́n Pɛlɛgi, asa aà gↄↄ ↄ̃ wà kɛ̃̀kↄ̃wa dṹniau. Aà dãuna tↄ́n Yotã.
Yotãpi buiↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Alɛmↄda, Sɛlɛfi, Azemavɛ, Yela,
Adolaũ, Uzali, Dikala,
Obali, Abimaɛ, Seba,
Ofii, Avila ń Yobabao. Yotã buiↄn we píi.
Sɛũ, Aapasa, Sela,
Ɛbɛlu, Pɛlɛgi, Leu,
Selugi, Nakↄↄ, Tela
ń Ablaũ pↄ́ wì mɛ lↄ Ablahaũo.
Ablahaũ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Izaaki ń Isimaɛlao.
An buiↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Isimaɛla nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́ian Nɛbai ũ. A gbɛa Kedaa, Adibɛɛli, Mibisã,
Misima, Duma, Masa, Adada, Tema,
Yetuu, Nafisi ń Kedemao. Isimaɛla nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn we.
Ablahaũ nↄ Kɛtula pↄ́ i mɛ́sɛdilɛɛ̀o nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Zimana, Yosã, Mɛdã, Madiã, Isebaki ń Suao. Yosã nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Seba ń Dedão ũ.
Madiã nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Efa, Efɛɛ, Anↄki, Abida ń Ɛlɛdaao. Kɛtulapi buiↄn we ḿpii.
Ablahaũ nɛ́ Izaaki nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Esau ń Yakↄbuo ũ.
Esau nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Ɛlifaza, Leuɛli, Yeusi, Yalaũ ń Kolao.
Ɛlifaza nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Temani, Omaa, Zefo, Gataũ, Kenazi ń Amalɛki pↄ́ a ì ń Timinao.
Leuɛli nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Naata, Zela, Sãma ń Mizao.
Sei nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Lotani, Sobala, Zibɛↄ̃, Ana, Disↄ̃, Ezɛɛ ń Disão.
Lotani nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Oli ń Omaũo ũ. Lotani dãen Timina ũ.
Sobala nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Alavã, Manaata, Ebali, Sefo ń Onaũo. Zibɛↄ̃ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Aya ń Anao ũ.
Ana nɛ́n Disↄ̃ ũ. Disↄ̃ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Ɛmadã, Ɛsebã, Ilana ń Kelanao.
Ezɛɛ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Bilana, Zaavã ń Akanao. Disã nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Uzu ń Alanao ũ.
Kía pↄ́ aa kpalablè Ɛdↄũ bùsuu Isaili kíaↄ ãaↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Bɛↄↄ nɛ́ Bɛla, Dinaba gbɛ̃́ɛ.
Kɛ́ Bɛla gà, ↄ̃ Bↄzɛla gbɛ̃́ Zela nɛ́ Yobaba zↄ̃̀lɛ aà gbɛu,
Kɛ́ Yobaba gà, ↄ̃ Temani bùsu gbɛ̃́ Usaũ zↄ̃̀lɛ aà gbɛu.
Kɛ́ Usaũ gà, ↄ̃ Aviti gbɛ̃́ Bedada nɛ́ Adada zↄ̃̀lɛ aà gbɛu. Ɔ̃mɛ zĩblè Madiãↄwa Mↄabu bùsuu.
Kɛ́ Adada gà, ↄ̃ Maseleka gbɛ̃́ Samala zↄ̃̀lɛ aà gbɛu.
Kɛ́ Samala gà, ↄ̃ Leobo pↄ́ kú Uflata saɛ gbɛ̃́ Saulu zↄ̃̀lɛ aà gbɛu.
Kɛ́ Saulu gà, ↄ̃ Akaboo nɛ́ Baalanana zↄ̃̀lɛ aà gbɛu.
Kɛ́ Baalanana gà, ↄ̃ Pau gbɛ̃́ Adada zↄ̃̀lɛ aà gbɛu. Aà na tↄ́n Mɛtabɛli, Malɛdi nɛ́ɛ, Mɛzaaba tↄũnaɛ.
Adadapi gà sↄ̃. Ɛdↄũ bui dezi káauↄn kɛ: Timina, Alava, Yɛtɛti,
Ɔhↄlibama, Ela, Pinↄ,
Kenazi, Temani, Mibizaa,
Magadiɛ ń Ilaũo. Ɛdↄũ bui dezi káauↄn we.
Isaili nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Lubɛni, Simɛↄ, Levii, Yuda, Isakaa, Zabulↄni,
Dã, Yosɛfu, Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ, Nɛfatali, Gada ń Asɛɛo.
Yuda nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Ɛɛ, Onani ń Selao. À nɛ́ mɛ̀n àaↄ̃piↄ ì ń Kanaa bùsu nↄɛ Sua nɛ́oɛ. Yuda nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́ia Ɛɛ yã́ i ka Diiguo, ↄ̃ à aà dɛ̀.
Yuda mɛ́ Pɛlɛzi ń Zelao ì ń a nɛ́pi gyaao, ↄ̃ aà nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ kɛ̀ píi sↄo.
Pɛlɛzi nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Ɛzↄ̃nↄ ń Amuluo ũ.
Zela nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Zimli, Etani, Emani, Kaloli ń Daadao. Aà nɛ́piↄ kɛ̀ píi sↄo.
Kaami nɛgↄ̃ɛn Akãa ũ. À yã'ì Isailiↄnɛ, à bↄ̀ Dii yã́ kpɛ à láaipↄ sɛ̀.
Etani nɛgↄ̃ɛn Azalia ũ.
Ɛzↄ̃nↄ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Yelamɛli, Laũ ń Kalɛbuo.
Laũ Aminadabu ì, Aminadabu Yudaↄ kía Naasↄ̃ ì,
Naasↄ̃ Salamↄ ì, Salamↄ Bↄazu ì,
Bↄazu Ɔbɛdi ì, Ɔbɛdi Yɛse ì,
Yɛse nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́ian Ɛliabu ũ, a plaade Abinadabu, a àaↄ̃de Sãma,
a síiↄ̃de Nɛtanɛli, a sↄode Ladai,
a soolode Ozɛũ, a soplade Davidi.
An dãeↄn Zeluia ń Abigailio ũ. Zeluia nɛgↄ̃ɛ àaↄ̃ɛ: Abisai, Yoabu ń Asaɛlio.
Abigaili mɛ́ Amasa ì. Amasapi den Isimaɛla bui Yɛtɛɛ ũ.
Ɛzↄ̃nↄ nɛ́ Kalɛbu nɛ́ↄ ì ń a na Azubao. Aà nɛnↄɛn Yelio ũ. Aà nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Yesɛɛ, Sobabu ń Aadↄ̃o.
Kɛ́ Azuba gà, ↄ̃ Kalɛbu Ɛflata sɛ̀ à Hulu ìò.
Hulu Uli ì, ↄ̃ Uli Bezalɛli ì.
Bee gbɛa kɛ́ Ɛzↄ̃nↄ kà wɛ̃̀ bàaↄ̃, ↄ̃ à Makii nɛ́ pↄ́ dɛ Galada da ũ sɛ̀ à Segubu ìò.
Segubupi mɛ́ Yaii ì. Yaiipi wɛ̃́lɛ vĩ Galada bùsuu mɛ̀n bao ń àaↄ̃o.
Ɔ̃ Gesuuↄ ń Alaũↄ lɛ̀lɛ Yaii wɛ̃́lɛpiↄwa ń Kenatio ń a bualoũↄ. Wɛ̃́lɛpiↄ kɛ̀ píi bàaↄ̃. Galada mae Makii buiↄn we píi.
Kɛ́ Ɛzↄ̃nↄ gà Kalɛbu Ɛflata, ↄ̃ aà na Abia Asuli ì. Asulipi mɛ́ Tekoa kàlɛ.
Ɛzↄ̃nↄ yoa Yelamɛli nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: A sɛ̃́ian Laũ ũ, a gbɛa Buna, Olɛni, Ozɛũ ń Ahiao.
Yelamɛli nↄ pãle vĩ, aà tↄ́n Atala. Ɔ̃mɛ Onaũ da ũ.
Yelamɛli yoa Laũ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: A sɛ̃́ian Maaza ũ, a gbɛa Yamini ń Ekɛɛo.
Onaũ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Samai ń Yadao ũ. Samai nɛgↄ̃ɛn Nadabu ń Abisuuo ũ.
Abisuu na tↄ́n Abihaili, ↄ̃ à Abani ń Mↄlidio ì.
Nadabu nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Sɛlɛdi ń Apaiũo ũ. Sɛlɛdi gà nɛ́saiɛ.
Apaiũ mɛ́ Isi ì, ↄ̃ Isi Sesã ì, ↄ̃ Sesã Alai ì.
Samai dãuna Yada nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Yɛtɛɛ ń Yonatãao ũ. Yɛtɛɛ gà nɛ́saiɛ.
Yonatãa nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Pɛlɛti ń Zazao ũ. Yelamɛli buiↄn we.
Sesã nɛgↄ̃ɛ vĩo, sema nɛnↄɛ. Sesã Etiopi gbɛ̃́ vĩ zↄ ũ, aà tↄ́n Yala.
Ɔ̃ Sesãpi a nɛnↄɛ kpà a zↄ Yalapiwa, ↄ̃ à Atai ìò.
Atai Natã ì, Natã Zabada ì,
Zabada Ɛflala ì, Ɛflala Ɔbɛdi ì,
Ɔbɛdi Yehu ì, Yehu Azalia ì,
Azalia Ɛlɛzi ì, Ɛlɛzi Ɛlasa ì,
Ɛlasa Sisemai ì, Sisemai Saluũ ì,
Saluũ Yekamia ì, Yekamia Ɛlisama ì.
Yelamɛli dãuna Kalɛbu nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: A sɛ̃́ia Mɛsa mɛ́ Zifi ì, a plaade Malesa mɛ́ Hɛblↄ̃ ì.
Hɛblↄ̃ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Kola, Tapua, Lɛkɛũ ń Sɛmao.
Sɛma Lahaũ ì, Lahaũ Yↄↄkaũ ì, Lɛkɛũ Samai ì.
Samaipi mɛ́ Maↄni pↄ́ Bɛzuu kàlɛ ì.
Kalɛbu mɛ́ Halana ń Mↄzao ń Gazezio ì ń a nↄ Efa pↄ́ i mɛ́sɛdilɛɛ̀oo, ↄ̃ Halanapi Gazezi ì.
Yadai nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Lɛgɛũ, Yotaũ, Gesã, Pɛlɛti, Efa ń Saafao.
Kalɛbu mɛ́ Sɛbɛɛ ń Tilanao ì ń a nↄ Maaka pↄ́ i mɛ́sɛdilɛɛ̀oo.
Ɔ̃ à Mademana mae Saafa ìò ń Gibɛa mae Mabenao. Kalɛbu nɛnↄɛn Akesa ũ.
Kalɛbu buiↄn kɛ lↄ. Aà na Ɛflata nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́ia Hulu nɛ́ↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Sobala pↄ́ Kiliayaaliũ kàlɛ
ń Salɛma pↄ́ Bɛtɛlɛũ kàlɛo ń Alefa pↄ́ Bɛgadee kàlɛo.
Sobala pↄ́ Kiliayaaliũ kàlɛ buiↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Aloedeↄ ń Manaata gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ
ń Kiliayaaliũ buiɛ beeↄ: Yɛtɛɛ buiↄ ń Pu buiↄ ń Suma buiↄ ń Misela buiↄ. Zↄladeↄ ń Ɛsɛtaodeↄ bↄ̀ buipiↄ guuɛ.
Salema buiↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Bɛtɛlɛũdeↄ, Nɛtofadeↄ, Atalobɛyoabudeↄ ń Manaata gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ ń Zↄladeↄ
ń lakɛ̃na pↄ́ kú Yabɛziↄ. Aamɛ Tila buiↄ ń Simɛa buiↄ ń Suka buiↄ ũ. Keni buipiↄ bↄ̀ Lekabu buiↄ guuɛ. Amata mɛ́ ń dezi káau ũ.
Davidi nɛ́ pↄ́ a ì Hɛblↄ̃ↄn kɛ: À a nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́ia Aminↄ ì ń Yezɛlɛɛ gbɛ̃́ Ainↄaũoɛ. À a plaade ì ń Kaamɛli gbɛ̃́ Abigailioɛ, ↄ̃n Daniɛli ũ.
À a àaↄ̃de ì ń Gesuu kí Talemai nɛ́ Maakaoɛ, ↄ̃n Abisaloũ ũ. À a síiↄ̃de ì ń Agitaoɛ, ↄ̃n Adonia ũ.
À a sↄode ì ń Abitalioɛ, ↄ̃n Sefatia ũ. À a soolode ì ń a nↄ Egelaoɛ, ↄ̃n Iteaũ ũ.
À nɛgↄ̃ɛ gbɛ̃ↄn soolopiↄ ì Hɛblↄ̃ɛ. À kpalablè we wɛ̃̀ sopla ń mↄ soolooɛ, mɛ́ à kpalablè Yelusalɛũ wɛ̃̀ baakwi ń àaↄ̃o.
Nɛ́ pↄ́ a ì Yelusalɛũↄ tↄ́n kɛ: À nɛgↄ̃ɛ gbɛ̃ↄn síiↄ̃ɛ beeↄ ì ń Amiɛli nɛ́ Basɛbaoɛ: Simɛa, Sobabu, Natã ń Salomↄↄo.
Bee gbɛa Ibaa, Ɛlisua, Ɛlifele,
Nↄga, Nɛfɛgi, Yafia,
Ɛlisama, Ɛliada ń Ɛlifeleo. Aà nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ kɛ̀ kɛ̃okwin we.
Davidi nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn we píi nↄ pↄ́ i mɛ́sɛdilɛ nɛ́oↄ nɛ́ↄ bàasi. An dãen Tamaa ũ.
Salomↄↄ Lↄbↄaũ ì, Lↄbↄaũ Abia ì, Abia Asa ì, Asa Yosafa ì,
Yosafa Yolaũ ì, Yolaũ Aazia ì, Aazia Yoasi ì,
Yoasi Amazia ì, Amazia Azalia ì, Azalia Yotaũ ì,
Yotaũ Aaza ì, Aaza Ezekia ì, Ezekia Manase ì,
Manase Amↄ ì, Amↄ Yosia ì.
Yosiapi nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: A sɛ̃́ia Yohanani, a plaade Yoakiũ, a àaↄ̃de Zedekia, a síiↄ̃de Saluũ.
Yoakiũ nɛ́ Yɛkↄnia mɛ́ zↄ̃̀lɛ aà gbɛu, ↄ̃ Zedekia zↄ̃̀lɛ Yɛkↄnia gbɛu.
Wà tà ń Yɛkↄniapio zĩ̀zↄ ũɛ. Aà nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Salatiɛli,
Malakilaũ, Pedaia, Sɛnazaa, Yekamia, Osama ń Nɛdabiao.
Pedaia nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Zolobabɛli ń Simɛio ũ. Zolobabɛlipi mɛ́ Mɛsulaũ ń Ananiao ì ń ń dãe Selomio.
À nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ ì lↄ gbɛ̃ↄn sↄo: Asuba, Oɛli, Bɛlɛkia, Asadia ń Yusabɛsɛdio.
Anania nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Pelatia ń Yesaiao ũ. Aà buiↄn Lefaia buiↄ ũ lↄ ń Aanana buiↄ ń Obadia buiↄ ń Sekania buiↄ.
Sekania nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Semaia, Atusu, Igali, Balia, Nɛalia ń Safatao, aa kɛ̀ soolo.
Nɛalia nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Ɛlioenai, Izikia ń Azikaũo, aa kɛ̀ àaↄ̃.
Ɛlioenai nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Odavia, Ɛliasibu, Pelaia, Akubu, Yohanani, Delaia ń Ananio, aa kɛ̀ sopla.
Yuda nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Pɛlɛzi, Ɛzↄ̃nↄ, Kaami, Hulu ń Sobalao.
Sobalapi nɛ́ Leaia mɛ́ Yaata ì, ↄ̃ Yaata Ahumai ń Laadio ì. Zↄla buiↄn we.
Etaũ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Yezɛlɛɛ, Isema ń Ibasio ũ. An dãe tↄ́n Azɛlɛponi.
Ɔ̃ à Penuɛli pↄ́ Gedoo kàlɛ ì ń Ezɛɛ pↄ́ Usa kàlɛo. Ɛflata yoa Hulu pↄ́ Bɛtɛlɛũ kàlɛ buiↄn we.
Asuli pↄ́ Tekoa kàlɛ nↄ vĩ plaɛ, aan Ɛla ń Naalao ũ.
Naala mɛ́ Ahuzaũ ń Efɛɛo ń Temɛnio ń Aasetalio ì.
Ɛla mɛ́ Zɛlɛti ń Zohaao ń Ɛnanio ì.
Kozu Anubi ń Zobebao ì. An guu ↄ̃ Aluũ nɛ́ Ahaleli buiↄ bↄ̀u.
Yabɛsi bɛɛɛ vĩ dɛ a gbɛ̃́ↄla. Aà da mɛ́ tↄkpàɛ̀ Yabɛsi, kɛ à aà ì ń wãwã zↄ̃ↄo yã́i.
Yabɛsi wiilɛ̀ Isailiↄ Luawa à mɛ̀: Báaadamagu, ní ma bùsu kã́fĩmɛɛ. Ɔdaa, ní ma bↄ vãiu, kɛ́ másu wãwãmao yã́i. Ɔ̃ Lua sìaànↄ.
Suha dãuna Kelubu mɛ́ Mɛhii ì, ↄ̃ Mɛhii Ɛsitoni ì.
Ɛsitoni mɛ́ Bɛlafa ń Paseao ń Tehinao ì. Tehinapi mɛ́ Naasa kàlɛ. Lekadeↄn we.
Kenazi nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Ɔniɛli ń Selaiao ũ. Ɔniɛli nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Hata ń Mɛↄnↄtaio ũ.
Mɛↄnↄtaipi mɛ́ Ɔfɛla ì. Selaia mɛ́ Yoabu ì. Ɔ̃mɛ sia pↄ́ kú Siaↄ Guzulɛuↄ dezi ũ.
Yefũnɛ nɛ́ Kalɛbu nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Ilu, Ela ń Naaũo. Elapi mɛ́ Kenazi ì.
Yalɛlɛli nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Zifi, Zifa, Tilia ń Asalɛo.
Ɛzala nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Yɛtɛɛ, Mɛlɛdi, Efɛɛ ń Yalonio. Mɛlɛdi mɛ́ Falaↄ̃ↄ nɛ́ Bitia sɛ̀, ↄ̃ à Miliaũ ń Samaio ìò ń Ɛsɛmↄa mae Isebao. Aà Yuda nↄ ↄ̃ à Gedoo mae Yɛlɛdi ń Soko mae Ɛbɛɛ ń Zanↄa mae Yekutiɛo ìò.

Odia na Nahaũ dãe buiↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Gaami bui pↄ́ kú Kɛilaↄ ń Maaka bui pↄ́ kú Ɛsɛmↄaↄ.
Simↄↄ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Aminↄ, Lina, Bɛnana ń Tilonio. Isi buiↄn Zoeti ń aà nɛgↄ̃ɛo ũ.
Yuda nɛ́ Sela buiↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Ɛɛ pↄ́ Leka kàlɛ, Laada pↄ́ Malesa kàlɛ ń zwã̀atãnaↄ bui pↄ́ kú Bɛtasebeaↄ
ń Yokiũo ń Kozebadeↄ ń Yoasio ń Salafa pↄ́ aa dɛ Mↄabu bùsu kíaↄ ũↄ ń Yasubilɛmao. Yã́piↄ kɛgↄↄ zi.
Gbɛ̃́piↄá oobonaↄnɛ, aa ku Nɛtaiũ ń Gedelao. We aaì zĩkɛu kíaɛ.
Simɛↄ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Nɛmuɛli, Yamini, Yalibu, Zela ń Sauluo.
Saulu Saluũ ì, Saluũ Mibisã ì, Mibisã Misima ì.
Misima Amuɛli ì, Amuɛli Zakuu ì, Zakuu Simɛi ì.
Simɛipi nɛgↄ̃ɛ ì gɛ̃o ń mɛ̀ndooɛ, nɛnↄɛ soolo. Aà gbɛ̃́piↄ sↄ̃ aai nɛ'i dasio. Bee yã́i Simɛↄ buiↄ dasi lán Yudaↄwao.
Wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ aa zↄ̃̀lɛuↄn kɛ: Bɛɛsɛba, Mↄlada, Azaasuali,
Bila, Ɛsɛũ, Tolada,
Bɛtuɛ, Ɔↄma, Zikilaga,
Bɛmaakabo, Azaasusiũ, Bɛbili ń Saalaiũo. An wɛ̃́lɛↄn we e à gɛ̀ pɛ̀ò Davidi kpalableawa.
Aa wɛ̃́lɛↄ vĩ mɛ̀n sↄo lↄ: Etaũ, Aini, Limↄ, Tokɛ̃ ń Asão
ń ń bualoũ pↄ́ liaa wɛ̃́lɛpiↄziↄ e à gɛ̀ pɛ̀ò Baalawa. An wɛ̃́lɛↄn we. Aa ń buiↄ tↄ́ dàlau, ↄ̃n kɛ:
Mɛsoba, Yamɛlɛki, Amazia nɛ́ Yosa,
Yoɛli, Yosibia nɛ́, Selaia tↄũna, Asiɛ sĩ́wɛna Yehu,
Ɛlioenai, Yaakoba, Yesohaia, Asaia, Adiɛli, Yesimiɛ, Benaia
ń Zizao. Zizapi mɛ́ Sifi nɛ́, Aloni tↄũna, Yedaia sĩ́wɛna, Simɛli sↄ̃kpaɛ, Semaia sĩsĩ ũ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wà ń tↄ́ dàda láupiↄ mɛ́ ń bui dↄaanaↄ ũ. An bɛdeↄ dasikũ̀ maamaa,
ↄ̃ aa fɛ̀lɛ gɛ̀ dã́dãkɛkĩi wɛɛlɛi Gedoo bɛ'aɛ oi guzulɛ gukpɛ oi.
Ɔ̃ aa bↄ̀ dã́dãkɛkĩi maa táaedewa we. Bùsupi yàasa mɛ́ a yãkele vĩo. Haũ buieↄ mɛ́ kú we yãa.
Gbɛ̃́piↄ gɛ̀ we Yudaↄ kí Ezekia gↄↄɛ. Aa sì Haũ buipiↄzi ń kpɛ́ↄ guu ń Mɛu bui pↄ́ kú weↄ. Aa ń dɛdɛ míↄ, ↄ̃ aa zↄ̃̀lɛ we aa kɛ̀ ń dã́dãkɛkĩi ũ e ń a gbão.
Ɔ̃ Simɛↄ bui gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa pla ń basↄoↄ lɛ̀lɛ Sei bùsu sĩ̀sĩdewa. Isi nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ Pelatia ń Nɛaliao ń Lefaiao ń Uziɛlio mɛ́ dↄ̀aanɛ́.
Aa Amalɛki bui kↄ̃na pↄ́ bↄ̀ yãaↄ dɛ̀dɛ, ↄ̃ aa ku we e ń a gbão.
Isaili nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́ia Lubɛni buiↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Ɔ̃mɛ yoa ũ, ãma kɛ́ à gbadà a mae nawa yã́i, ↄ̃ aà maepi aà yoakɛzɛ kpà Yosɛfu nɛgↄ̃ɛↄwa, wi aà tↄ́ dalau yoa ũ lↄo.
Baa kɛ́ Yuda gbãa a gbɛ̃́ↄ guu, mɛ́ dↄaana bↄ̀ aà buiↄ guu, Yosɛfu mɛ́ yoakɛzɛ vĩ.
Isaili yoa Lubɛni nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Anↄki, Palu, Ɛzↄ̃nↄ ń Kaamio.
Yoɛli Semaia ì, Semaia Gↄgu ì, Gↄgu Simɛi ì,
Simɛi Mika ì, Mika Leaia ì, Leaia Baali ì,
Baali Beela ì. Ɔ̃mɛ Lubɛni buiↄ dↄaana ũ, ↄ̃ Asiliↄ kí Pulu aà kũ̀ tàò zĩ̀zↄ ũ.
Beela gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wà ń tↄ́ dàda láu daɛdaɛↄn kɛ: Kí Yeiɛli, Zakali
ń Azaza nɛ́, Sɛma tↄũna, Yoɛli sĩ́wɛna Bɛlao. Aa zↄ̃̀lɛ Aloee ń Nɛboo ń Baali Mɛonao.
Aa zↄ̃̀lɛ gukpɛ oi e aa gɛ̀ nà guwaiwai pↄ́ pɛ̀ Uflatawa, kɛ́ an pↄtuoↄ dasikũ̀ Galada bùsuu yã́i.
Saulu gↄↄ aa zĩkà ń Ageli buiↄ, ↄ̃ aa zĩblèmá aa zↄ̃̀lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛↄ guu bùsu pↄ́ kú Galada gukpɛ oi píiu.
Gada buiↄ kú ń saɛ Basana bùsuu e à gɛ̀ pɛ̀ Salekawa.
Yoɛli mɛ́ ń dↄaana ũ Basana we, Safaũ mɛ́ aà plaade ũ, a gbɛa Yanai ń Safatao.
An gbɛ̃ↄn kɛ daɛdaɛ gbɛ̃ↄn sopla: Mikaila, Mɛsulaũ, Sɛba, Yolai, Yakã, Zia ń Ɛbɛluo.
Buzu Yado ì, Yado Yesisai ì, Yesisai Mikaila ì, Mikaila Galada ì, Galada Yaloa ì, Yaloa Huli ì, Huli Abihaili ì, Abihaili mɛ́ gbɛ̃́piↄ ì.
Abidiɛli nɛ́, Guni tↄũna Ahi mɛ́ gbɛ̃́piↄ uabele sɛ̃́ia ũ.
Gada buiↄ ku Galada ń Basana bùsu wɛ̃́lɛↄ guu ń Salↄna dã́dãkɛkĩio e a zↄ̃lɛwa.
Wà gbɛ̃́piↄ tↄ́ dàlau Yudaↄ kí Yotaũ ń Isailiↄ kí Yeloboaũo gↄↄɛ.
Lubɛni buiↄ ń Gada buiↄ ń Manase buiↄ lɛɛ doo gbɛ̃́ gbãa pↄ́ kú zĩ̀ sↄu guuↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bla ń síiↄ̃o ń ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ ń baswaaↄ̃oɛ (44.760). Wà zĩkaa dànɛ́, aa sɛ̀ngbao ń fɛ̃ndao vĩ, mɛ́ aa ka dↄ̃.
Aa zĩkà ń Ageli buiↄ ń Yetuuo ń Nafisio ń Nↄdabao.
Lua dↄ̀ńlɛ à Ageli buiↄ nànɛ́ ń ↄzĩ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kúńnↄↄ píi, kɛ́ aa wiilɛ̀wa zĩlau yã́i. A sìńnↄ, kɛ́ aa a náaikɛ̀ yã́i.
Ɔ̃ aa Ageli buiↄ pↄtuoↄ nàaa, yiongoↄ ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ blakwi (50.000), sãↄ ń bleↄ ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ ↄ̀aa do ń blakwio (250.000), zàa'ĩnaↄ ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ pla (2.000). Aa gbɛ̃́ↄ kũ̀kũ bɛ̃́ɛ lↄ ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ basↄo (100.000),
mɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gàga zĩpi guuↄ dasi, asa zĩpi bↄ̀ Dii kĩ́iɛ. Aa zↄ̃̀lɛ ń gbɛu e wà gɛ̀ Isailiↄ kũ̀kũ tàńnↄ.
Manase buiↄ lɛɛ do zↄ̃̀lɛ bùsupiu za Basana e Baali Ɛɛmↄ ń Seniio ń Ɛɛmↄ gbɛo. Aa dasi.
An uabele káauↄn kɛ: Efɛɛ, Isi, Ɛliɛli, Azeliɛ, Zelemii, Odavia ń Yadiɛlio. Gↄ̃sa gbãa tↄdeↄnɛ, mɛ́ uabeleↄnɛ lↄ.
Kási aa náai vĩ ń deziↄ Luaɛo, aa gbãsĩkɛ̀ ń bùsupi gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua ń mìdɛnɛ́ↄ tã́aↄɛ.
Ɔ̃ Isailiↄ Lua tɛkpà Asiliↄ kí Pulu pↄ́ wì mɛ lↄ Tigela Pilɛsɛɛgu, ↄ̃ Pulupi mↄ̀ Lubɛni buiↄ ń Gada buiↄ ń Manase buiↄ lɛɛ dopio kũ̀kũ tàńnↄ Ala ń Abooo ń Halao ń swa pↄ́ wì mɛ Gozã saɛo.
Levii nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Geesↄ̃, Kɛata ń Mɛlalio.
Kɛata nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Amlaũ, Isaa, Hɛblↄ̃ ń Uziɛlio.
Amlaũ nɛ́ↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Aalona, Mↄizi ń Miliaũo. Aalona nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Nadabu, Abiu, Ɛleazaa ń Itamaao.
Ɛleazaa Finɛasi ì, Finɛasi Abisua ì,
Abisua Buki ì, Buki Uzi ì,
Uzi Zelaia ì, Zelaia Mɛlaio ì,
Mɛlaio Amalia ì, Amalia Aitubu ì,
Aitubu Zadoki ì, Zadoki Aimaaza ì,
Aimaaza Azalia ì, Azalia Yohanani ì,
Yohanani Azalia ì. Ɔ̃mɛ Lua gbàgba kpɛ́ pↄ́ Salomↄↄ dↄ̀ Yelusalɛũ ua.
Azalia Amalia ì, Amalia Aitubu ì,
Aitubu Zadoki ì, Zadoki Saluũ ì,
Saluũ Ilikia ì, Ilikia Azalia ì,
Azalia Selaia ì, Selaia Yozada ì.
Kɛ́ Dii tò Nɛbukanɛza mↄ̀ Yelusalɛũdeↄ ń Yudaↄ píi kũ̀kũ tàńnↄ zĩ̀zↄↄ ũ, Yozadapi kú ń guuɛ.
Levii nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Geesↄ̃, Kɛata ń Mɛlalio.
Geesↄ̃ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Libeni ń Simɛio ũ.
Kɛata nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Amlaũ, Isaa, Hɛblↄ̃ ń Uziɛlio.
Mɛlali nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Mali ń Musio ũ. Levii buiↄn kɛ an dezi káauↄwa:
Geesↄ̃ Libeni ì, Libeni Yaata ì, Yaata Zima ì,
Zima Yoa ì, Yoa Ido ì, Ido Zela ì, Zela Yealai ì.
Kɛata Aminadabu ì, Aminadabu Kole ì, Kole Asii ì,
Asii Ɛlikana ì, Ɛlikana Abiasafa ì, Abiasafa Asii ì,
Asii Taatu ì, Taatu Uliɛli ì, Uliɛli Uzia ì, Uzia Saulu ì.
Ɛlikana nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Amasai ń Aimↄo.
Aimↄ Ɛlikana ì, Ɛlikana Zofai ì, Zofai Naata ì,
Naata Ɛliabu ì, Ɛliabu Yeloaũ ì, Yeloaũ Ɛlikana ì, Ɛlikana Samuɛli ì.
Samuɛli nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́ian Yoɛli ũ, a plaade Abia.
Mɛlali Mali ì, Mali Libeni ì, Libeni Simɛi ì, Simɛi Uza ì,
Uza Simɛa ì, Simɛa Agia ì, Agia Asaia ì.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Davidi ń dílɛ Dii kpɛ́ lɛ̀sin gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ũ kpagolo sua we gbɛaↄn kɛ:
Aaìↄ lɛsizĩ kɛ zwã̀akpɛ pↄ́ wì mɛ Kpaaũkpɛ kpɛɛlɛ e Salomↄↄ gɛ̀ kpɛdↄ̀ò Diiɛ Yelusalɛũ. Aa zĩkɛ̀ a zɛ́wa lá wa dìlɛnɛ́wa.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa zĩpi kɛ̀ↄ ń ń nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Lɛ̀sin dↄaana Emani, Kɛata bui deziↄ tↄ́n kɛ maeↄ ń ń nɛ́ↄ daalɛa Isailiwa: Isaili, Levii, Kɛata, Isaa, Kole, Abiasafa, Asii, Taatu, Zefania, Azalia, Yoɛli, Ɛlikana, Amasai, Maatu, Ɛlikana, Zufi, Toa, Ɛliɛli, Yeloaũ, Ɛlikana, Samuɛli ń Yoɛli pↄ́ Emanipi ìo.

An Levii deeↄ mɛ́ zwã̀akpɛ pↄ́ dɛ Lua kpɛ́ ũ zĩ kĩniↄ kɛ̀ píi.
Aalona ń a buiↄ mɛ́ ì pↄ́ↄ kpasa sa'okĩiwa ń tulaletikatɛakĩio. Aamɛ aaìↄ luakukĩi zĩ kɛ, aaì Isailiↄ duuna kɛ̃́má lá Lua zↄ̀blena Mↄizi dìlɛnɛ́wa.
Aalona buiↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Ɛleazaa Finɛasi ì, Finɛasi Abisua ì,
Abisua Buki ì, Buki Uzi ì, Uzi Zelaia ì,
Zelaia Mɛlaio ì, Mɛlaio Amalia ì, Amalia Aitubu ì,
Aitubu Zadoki ì, Zadoki Aimaaza ì.
Wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ wa kpàmá ń zↄ̃lɛkĩi ũↄn kɛ: Kɛata tↄũna Aalona buiↄ ↄ̃ wà gbɛlànɛ́ káau.
Ɔ̃ aa Hɛblↄ̃ pↄ́ kú Yuda bùsuu blè ń a dã́dãkɛkĩi pↄ́ liaaiↄ.
Ãma wà wɛ̃́lɛpi buaↄ ń a bualoũↄ kpà Yefũnɛ nɛ́ Kalɛbuwaɛ.
Aalona buiↄ mɛ́ Hɛblↄ̃ pↄ́ dɛ misiwɛ̃lɛ ũ blè ń Libenao ń Yatiio ń Ɛsɛmↄao
ń Ilɛnio ń Dɛbiio
ń Asão ń Bɛsɛmɛsio, ampii ń a dã́dãkɛkĩioɛ.
Aa Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ buiↄ wɛ̃́lɛↄ blè lↄ, Gɛba ń Alemɛo ń Anatoo, ampii ń a dã́dãkɛkĩioɛ. Wɛ̃́lɛ mɛ̀n kuɛ'aaↄ̃piↄá Aalona buiↄ pↄ́ɛ.
Kɛata bui kĩniↄ mɛ́ Manase bui pↄ́ kú bɛ'aɛ oiↄ wɛ̃́lɛↄ blè mɛ̀n kwi gbɛlaa guu.
Geesↄ̃ buiↄ mɛ́ Isakaa buiↄ ń Asɛɛ buiↄ ń Nɛfatali buiↄ ń Manase bui pↄ́ kú Basana bùsuuↄ wɛ̃́lɛↄ blè daɛdaɛ mɛ̀n kuɛ'aaↄ̃.
Mɛlali buiↄ mɛ́ Lubɛni buiↄ ń Gada buiↄ ń Zabulↄni buiↄ wɛ̃́lɛↄ blè daɛdaɛ mɛ̀n kwi gbɛlaa guu.
Ɔ̃ Isaili buipiↄ wɛ̃́lɛpiↄ ń ń dã́dãkɛkĩiↄ kpà Levii buiↄwa.
Yudaↄ ń Simɛↄ buiↄ ń Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ buiↄ wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ wà ń tↄ́ sìpiↄ kpàmá lↄ.
Kɛata buieↄ mɛ́ Ɛflaiũ buiↄ wɛ̃́lɛↄ blè lↄ.
Wà Ɛflaiũ bùsu sĩ̀sĩde misiwɛ̃lɛ pↄ́ wì mɛ Sikɛũ kpàmá ń Gɛzɛɛo
ń Yↄkemaũo ń Bɛtolonio
ń Ayalonio ń Galimↄo, ampii ń a dã́dãkɛkĩioɛ.
Manase bui pↄ́ kú bɛ'aɛ oiↄ mɛ́ Anɛɛ ń Bileaũo ń ń dã́dãkɛkĩio kpà Kɛata bui kĩniↄwa.
Wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ Geesↄ̃ buiↄ èn kɛ: Manase bui pↄ́ kú gukpɛ oi wɛ̃́lɛↄ Golana pↄ́ kú Basana bùsuu ń Asaloo ń ń dã́dãkɛkĩio.
Isakaa bui wɛ̃́lɛↄ Kɛdɛsi, Dabela,
Lamↄtu ń Anɛũo ń ń dã́dãkɛkĩiↄ.
Asɛɛ bui wɛ̃́lɛↄ Masala, Abedↄ̃,
Hukoko ń Leobɛo ń ń dã́dãkɛkĩiↄ.
Nɛfatali bui wɛ̃́lɛↄ Kɛdɛsi pↄ́ kú Galile, Hamↄ, Kiliataiũ ń ń dã́dãkɛkĩiↄ.
Levii nɛ́ Mɛlali buiↄ mɛ́ gↄ̃̀. Ɔ̃ aa Zabulↄni bui wɛ̃́lɛɛ beeↄ è: Yↄkenaũ, Kaata, Limↄnↄ ń Tabooo, ampii ń a dã́dãkɛkĩiↄ.
Aa Lubɛni bui pↄ́ kú Yuudɛ̃ baa bↄaa ń Yelikooↄ wɛ̃́lɛɛ beeↄ è lↄ: Bɛzɛɛ pↄ́ kú guwaiwaiu, Yaza,
Kedemↄ ń Mɛfaao, ampii ń a dã́dãkɛkĩiↄ.
Aa Gada bui wɛ̃́lɛɛ beeↄ è lↄ: Lamↄtu pↄ́ kú Galada bùsuu, Maanaiũ,
Ɛsɛbↄ̃ ń Yazɛɛo, ampii ń a dã́dãkɛkĩiↄ.
Isakaa nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ síiↄ̃ɛ: Tola, Pua, Yasubu ń Simɛlↄnio.
Tola nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Uzi, Lefaia, Yeliɛ, Yamai, Ibisaũ ń Samuɛlio. Uabeleↄnɛ ḿpii. Davidi gↄↄ Tola bui gↄ̃sa pↄ́ wà ń tↄ́ dàlauↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bao ń plao ń ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃oɛ (22.600).
Uzi mɛ́ Izilahia ì. Izilahia nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Mikaila, Obadia, Yoɛli ń Isiao ũ. An gbɛ̃ↄn sↄo píiá uabeleↄnɛ.
An bui zĩgↄ̃ pↄ́ wà ń tↄ́ dàlau daɛdaɛↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ baakwi ń soolooɛ (36.000), kɛ́ an nↄↄ ń ń nɛ́ↄ dasi yã́i.
Isakaa bui gↄ̃sa pↄ́ wà ń tↄ́ dàlauↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ basiiↄ̃ ń soplaoɛ (87.000).
Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ àaↄ̃ɛ: Bɛla, Bɛkɛɛ ń Yediaɛo.
Bɛla nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ sↄoɛ: Ɛzɛbↄ̃, Uzi, Uziɛli, Yelimↄ ń Ilio. Uabeleↄnɛ ḿpii. An bui gↄ̃sa pↄ́ wà ń tↄ́ dàlauↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bao n plao ń baakwi ń síiↄ̃oɛ (22.034).
Bɛkɛɛ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Zemila, Yoasi, Ɛliɛzɛɛ, Ɛlioenai, Ɔmɛli, Yelemↄ, Abia, Anato ń Alemɛo. Bɛkɛɛ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn we píi.
Wà ń uabeleↄ tↄ́ dàlau, mɛ́ an gↄ̃saↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bao ń ↄ̀aa dooɛ (20.200).
Yediaɛ mɛ́ Bilana ì. Bilana nɛ́ↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Yeusi, Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ, Ehudu, Kenaana, Zetã, Taasisi ń Aisahaao.
Yediaɛ buipiↄá uabeleↄnɛ ḿpii. An bui gↄ̃sa pↄ́ aaì bↄ gɛ́ zĩkaiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ gɛ̃o ń plao ń ↄ̀aa dooɛ (17.200).
Supiũ ń Hupiũoá Ili buiↄnɛ, mɛ́ Husiũá Ahee buiↄnɛ.
Bila nɛ́ Nɛfatali nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Yaziɛli, Guni, Yezɛɛ ń Sileũo.
Manase nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: À Asiɛli ń Makiio ì ń Sili bui nↄ pↄ́ i mɛ́sɛdilɛɛ̀ooɛ. Makii mɛ́ Galada ì.
Makii nↄsɛ̀ Hupiũɛ ń Supiũo. Aà dãe tↄ́n Maaka. Makii buie tↄ́n Zelofada. Nɛnↄɛↄ a ì atɛ̃ɛ.
Makii nɛgↄ̃ɛ ì ń a na Maakao, ↄ̃ à tↄkpàɛ̀ Pɛlɛsi. Aà dãuna tↄ́n Sɛlɛsi, aà nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Ulaũ ń Lakɛũo ũ.
Ulaũ mɛ́ Bedã ì. Makii nɛ́ Galada, Manase tↄũna nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn we.
Aà dãe Amↄlɛkɛ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Isodo, Abiɛzɛɛ ń Malao ũ.
Semida nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Ahiana, Sikɛũ, Liki ń Aniaũo ũ.
Ɛflaiũ Sutɛla ì, Sutɛla Bɛlɛdi ì, Bɛlɛdi Taatu ì, Taatu Ɛlada ì, Ɛlada Taatu ì,
Taatu Zabada ì, Zabada Sutɛla ì. Ezɛɛ ń Ɛladuo gɛ̀ Gatadeↄ pↄtuoↄ kṹkũi, ↄ̃ wà ń dɛdɛ we.
An mae Ɛflaiũ pↄsia kɛ̀ ń gaa yã́ musu à gↄↄplakɛ̀, ↄ̃ aà daɛↄ mↄ̀ aà nↄ̀sɛ nìniɛ̀.
Kɛ́ Ɛflaiũpi ɛ̀a wùlɛ ń a nao, ↄ̃ à nↄsì à nɛgↄ̃ɛ ì lↄ. Ɔ̃ à tↄkpàɛ̀ Bɛlia, kɛ́ yã'ↄ̃ma aà bɛdeↄ lè yã́i.
Aà nɛnↄɛ tↄ́n Sɛɛla. Ɔ̃mɛ Bɛtoloni Musu ń Bɛtoloni Zĩ́lɛo kàlɛ ń Uzɛni Sɛɛlao.
Lɛfa Lɛsɛfa ì, Lɛsɛfa Tɛla ì, Tɛla Taani ì,
Taani Ladã ì, Ladã Amihudu ì, Amihudu Ɛlisama ì,
Ɛlisama Nuni ì, Nuni Yozuee ì.
An bùsu wɛ̃́lɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Bɛtɛli ń a bualoũↄ, Naalana pↄ́ kú gukpɛ oi, Gɛzɛɛ pↄ́ kú bɛ'aɛ oi ń a bualoũↄ, Sikɛũ ń a bualoũↄ e à gɛ̀ pɛ̀ Aya ń a bualoũↄwa.
Bɛtɛsã ń Taanakio ń Mɛgidoo ń Dooo, ampii ń a bualoũↄ ku Manase buiↄ bùsuuɛ, ↄ̃ Isaili nɛ́ Yosɛfu buipiↄ ku wɛ̃́lɛpiↄ guu.
Asɛɛ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Imɛna, Iseva, Isevi ń Bɛliao. An dãen Sela ũ.
Bɛlia nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Ɛbɛɛ ń Biizai mae Malakiɛo.
Ɛbɛɛ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Yaflɛti, Somɛɛ ń Otaũo. An dãen Sua ũ.
Yaflɛti nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Pasaki, Bimali ń Asevao.
Somɛɛ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Ahi, Lↄga, Uba ń Alaũo.
Aà dãuna Otaũ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Zofa, Imɛna, Selɛsi ń Amaluo.
Zofa nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Sua, Aanɛfɛɛ, Suali, Beli, Imla,
Bɛzɛɛ, Odo, Sãma, Silesa, Yɛtɛɛ ń Beelao.
Yɛtɛɛ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Yefũnɛ, Pisipa ń Elao.
Ula nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Ala, Aniɛli ń Liziao.
Asɛɛ buiↄn we, mɛ́ uabeleↄnɛ ḿpii. Gↄ̃sa gbãa tↄdeↄnɛ mɛ́ dↄaana maaↄnɛ. An zĩgↄ̃ pↄ́ wà ń tↄ́ dàlauↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ baasↄo ń mɛ̀ndooɛ (26.000).
Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́ian Bɛla ũ, a plaade Asebe, a àaↄ̃de Ahala,
a síiↄ̃de Nↄha, a sↄode Lafa.
Bɛla nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Adaa, Ehudu mae Gela,
Abisua, Naamani, Ahoa,
Gela, Sefufã ń Hulaũo.
Ehudu nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Naamani, Ahia ń Gelao. Gelapi nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Uza ń Aihuduo ũ. Uabeleↄn ń ũ Gɛba, ↄ̃ Gela tò aa fɛ̀lɛ tà Manaata.

Saalaiũ a naↄ Husiũ ń Baalao yà, ↄ̃ à nɛ́ɛ beeↄ ì Mↄabu bùsuu
ń a na Odɛsio: Yobaba, Zibia, Mɛsa, Malekaũ,
Yeuzi, Sakia ń Miimao. Aà nɛ́piↄn we, ampii uabeleↄnɛ.
À Abitubu ń Ɛlipaao ì ń a na Husiũpio zadↄ̃ i aà yao.
Ɛlipaa nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Ɛbɛlu, Misaũ ń Sɛmɛdi pↄ́ Onↄ ń Lodio kàlɛ ń a bualoũↄ.
À Bɛlia ń Sɛmao ì lↄ. Uabeleↄn ń ũ Ayaloni. Aamɛ Gatadeↄ yà.
Bɛlia nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Ahio, Sasaki, Yelemↄ, Zebadia, Alade, Edɛɛ, Mikaila, Isepa ń Yohao.

Yeloaũ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Samɛselai, Sealia, Atalia, Yaalɛsia, Ɛlia ń Zikelio.
