Wà gbɛ̃́piↄ tↄ́ dàlau. Uabeleↄnɛ ḿpii. Aa kú ń gbɛ̃́ↄ saɛ Yelusalɛũɛ.
Kɛ́ Yeiɛli Gabaↄ̃ↄ kàlɛ, ↄ̃ a ku we. Aà na tↄ́n Maaka.
Aà nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́ian Abedↄ̃ ũ. A gbɛa Zuu, Kisi, Baali, Nɛɛ, Nadabu,
Gedoo, Ahio, Zekɛɛ
ń Simɛa mae Mikeloo. Aa kú ń gbɛ̃́ↄ saɛ Yelusalɛũɛ.
Nɛɛ Kisi ì, Kisi Saulu ì, Saulu Yonatãa ì ń Malakisuao ń Abinadabuo ń Isibosɛo.
Yonatãa mɛ́ Mika mae Mɛfibosɛ ì.
Mikapi nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Pitↄ̃, Mɛlɛki, Talea ń Aazao.
Aaza Yoada ì, Yoada Alemɛ ì ń Azemavɛo ń Zimlio. Zimli Mↄza ì,
Mↄza Binɛa ì, Binɛa Lafa ì, Lafa Ɛlasa ì, Ɛlasa Aseli ì.
Aseli nɛgↄ̃ɛ ì sooloɛ. An tↄ́n kɛ: Azikaũ, Bokelu, Isimaɛla, Sealia, Obadia ń Ananio. Aseli nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn we píi.
Aà gbɛ̃do Ɛsɛki nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Aà nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́ian Ulaũ ũ, a plaade Yeusi, a àaↄ̃de Ɛlifele.
Ulaũ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄá gↄ̃sa gbãa kàdↄ̃naↄnɛ. Aa nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ ń tↄũnaↄ vĩ dasi, aa kà basoplakwi. Gbɛ̃́piↄá Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ buiↄnɛ ḿpii.
Wà Isailiↄ tↄ́ dà Isaili kíaↄ ladau ḿpiiɛ. Wà Yudaↄ kũ̀kũ tàńnↄ Babɛli, kɛ́ aa bↄ̀ Lua kpɛ yã́i.
Sa'onaↄ ń Levii buiↄ ń Lua ua zĩkɛnaↄ ń Isaili kĩniↄ mɛ́ ɛ̀a sù ń bùsuu ń ń wɛ̃́lɛↄ guuo káau.
Yuda buiↄ ń Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ buiↄ ń Ɛflaiũ buiↄ ń Manase bui pↄ́ sù Yelusalɛũↄn kɛ:
Amihudu nɛ́ Utai, Ɔmɛli tↄũna, Imɛli sĩ́wɛna, Bani sↄ̃kpaɛ mɛ́ Yuda nɛ́ Pɛlɛzi buiↄ dↄaana ũ.
Asaia ń a dãunaↄ mɛ́ Yuda nɛ́ Sɛla buiↄ dↄaanaↄ ũ.
Yeuɛli mɛ́ Yuda nɛ́ Zela buiↄ dↄaana ũ. Yuda buipiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ ń basiiↄ̃kwioɛ (690).
Mɛsulaũ nɛ́ Salu, Odavia tↄũna, Asenua sĩ́wɛna mɛ́ Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ buiↄ dↄaana ũ
ń Yeloaũ nɛ́ Ibinɛiao ń Uzi nɛ́ Ela, Mikeli tↄũnao ń Sefatia nɛ́ Mɛsulaũ, Leuɛli tↄũna, Ibinia sĩ́wɛnao.
Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ bui pↄ́ wà ń tↄ́ dàlauↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa síiↄ̃ ń basoplakwi ń soolooɛ (956). Uabeleↄnɛ ḿpii.
Yedaia ń Yoialibuo ń Yakɛ̃o mɛ́ sa'onaↄ dↄaanaↄ ũ
ń Lua kpɛ́ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ Azalia, Ilikia nɛ́, Mɛsulaũ tↄũna, Zadoki sĩ́wɛna, Mɛlaio sↄ̃kpaɛ, Aitubu sĩsĩo
ń Yeloaũ nɛ́ Adaia, Pasuu tↄũna, Malakia sĩ́wɛnao ń Adiɛli nɛ́ Maasai, Yazela tↄũna, Mɛsulaũ sĩ́wɛna, Mɛsilemi sↄ̃kpaɛ, Imɛɛ sĩsĩo.
Sa'on uabeleↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa swaaↄ̃ ń baswaaↄ̃oɛ (1.760). Gↄ̃sa gbãaↄnɛ, Lua ua zĩkɛnaↄnɛ.
Mɛlali bui Asubu nɛ́ Semaia, Azikaũ tↄũna, Asabia sĩ́wɛna mɛ́ Levii buiↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ
ń Bakebakaao ń Ɛlɛsio ń Galalio ń Mika nɛ́ Matania, Zikeli tↄũna, Bɛlɛkia sĩ́wɛnao
ń Semaia nɛ́ Obadia, Galali tↄũna, Yedutu sĩ́wɛnao ń Asa nɛ́ Bɛlɛkia, Ɛlikana pↄ́ kú Nɛtofa tↄũnao.
Bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Saluũ, Akubu, Talemↄ, Aimani ń ń gbɛ̃́ↄ. Saluũ mɛ́ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ.
Ɔ̃mɛ ìↄ Kí Bĩ́ibↄlɛ pↄ́ kú gukpɛ oi dↄ̃́a e ń a gbão. Gbɛ̃́piↄ mɛ́ Levii buiↄ fã́ani bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ ũ.
Kole nɛ́ Saluũ, Abiasafa tↄũna, Kole sĩ́wɛna ń a gbɛ̃́ Kole buiↄ mɛ́ Lua kpɛ́ kpɛɛlɛ dↄ̃̀anaↄ ũ lá ń deziↄ dɛ Dii bòo bↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ ũ yãawa.
Ɛleazaa nɛ́ Finɛasi mɛ́ ń dↄaana ũ gↄↄ bee, mɛ́ Dii kuaànↄ.
Mɛsɛlɛmia nɛ́ Zakali mɛ́ Kpaaũkpɛ bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃ana ũ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wà ń sɛ́ bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ ũↄ píi gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa do ń kuɛplaoɛ (212). An tↄ́ↄ ku taalau ń wɛ̃́lɛↄ guu. Davidi ń gu'ena Samuɛlio mɛ́ zĩ gbiapi dà ń deziↄnɛ.
Ampiↄ ń ń buiↄ mɛ́ Dii ua bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ ũ.
Aaìↄ zɛzɛa kpɛ́pi gola síiↄ̃ↄwa, gukpɛ, bɛ'aɛ, gugbãntoo ń gɛↄmidↄkĩio.
Zĩeↄ an gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa ku wɛ̃́lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛoↄ ìↄ mↄ zĩkɛińnↄ gↄↄ soplapla.
Zĩpiá bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn síiↄ̃piↄ yã́ɛ. Levii buipiↄ mɛ́ ì Lua ua kpɛ́nɛↄ ń a làasiↄ dↄ̃́a.
Aaì zɛzɛ lia Lua uai gwã́, aaìↄ dↄ̃́a. Ampiↄ mɛ́ aaìↄ a zɛ́ kili kũa, aaìↄ wɛ̃ lá gu lɛ́ dↄ.
An gbɛ̃eↄ ìↄ laaidↄ Lua ua zĩkɛbↄↄwa. Tó wà gɛ̃̀ò ge tó wà bↄ̀ò, aamɛ aaìↄ nao.
Wà ń gbɛ̃eↄ dìlɛ aaↄ laaidↄ Lua kpɛ́ kpɛɛlɛ pↄ́ↄ ń a zĩkɛbↄↄwa ń pↄ́wɛntio ń vɛ̃ɛo ń nísio ń tulaletio ń pↄ́ gĩnanaↄ.
Sa'onaeↄ mɛ́ aaì pↄ́ gĩnanapiↄ yãalɛkↄ̃u.
Pɛ̃ɛkɛa mɛ́ Levii nɛ́ Kole bui Saluũ nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́ia Matitia zĩ ũ.
Aà gbɛ̃́ Kole buieↄ mɛ́ aaìↄ pɛ̃ɛ pↄ́ wì kálɛ dↄ̀ↄdↄↄ kã́mabogↄↄzĩ kɛ.
Levii bui uabele lɛ̀sinaↄ mɛ́ aaìↄ ku Lua ua kpɛ́nɛↄ guu. Wìli zĩ pãle danɛ́o, asa aaìↄ ń zĩ kɛ fãanɛ ń gwãasĩnaoɛ.
Ampiↄ mɛ́ Levii bui uabele pↄ́ kú Yelusalɛũↄ ũ, gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ pↄ́ wà ń tↄ́ dàlauↄ ũ.
Yeiɛli mɛ́ Gabaↄ̃ↄ kàlɛ, ↄ̃ a ku we. Aà na tↄ́n Maaka.
Aà yoan Abedↄ̃ ũ. A gbɛa Zuu, Kisi, Baali, Nɛɛ, Nadabu,
Gedoo, Ahio, Zakali
ń Simɛa mae Mikeloo. Aa kú ń gbɛ̃́ↄ saɛ Yelusalɛũɛ.
Nɛɛ Kisi ì, Kisi Saulu ì, Saulu Yonatãa ì ń Malakisuao ń Abinadabuo ń Isibosɛo.
Yonatãa mɛ́ Mika mae Mɛfibosɛ ì.
Mikapi nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Pitↄ̃, Mɛlɛki, Talea ń Aazao.
Aaza Yada ì, Yala Alemɛ ì ń Azemavɛo ń Zimlio. Zimli Mↄza ì,
Mↄza Binɛa ì, Binɛa Lefaia ì, Lefaia Ɛlasa ì, Ɛlasa Aseli ì.
Aseli nɛgↄ̃ɛ ì sooloɛ. An tↄ́n kɛ: Azikaũ, Bokelu, Isimaɛla, Sealia, Obadia ń Ananio. Aseli nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn we píi.
Filitɛ̃ↄ zĩkà ń Isailiↄ, ↄ̃ Isailiↄ bàalɛ̀nɛ́, an daside gàga Giliboa gbɛpↄlɛu.
Kɛ́ Filitɛ̃ↄ pɛ̀lɛ Saulu ń a nɛgↄ̃ɛↄzi, ↄ̃ aa aà nɛ́ↄ Yonatãa ń Abinadabuo ń Malakisuao dɛ̀dɛ.
Zĩ pↄ́ lìaa Sauluzi pãsĩkũ̀, ↄ̃ kàzunaↄ aà pà, à kɛ̀'ĩa.
Ɔ̃ a ò a zĩkabↄkũnaɛ: Ǹ ń fɛ̃nda wo, ní ma zↄ̃ ǹ ma dɛò. Tó ni kɛ màao, gyafↄↄdeɛ beeↄ mↄ kↄ̃̀ↄ'omanↄɛ. Ɔ̃ vĩa aà zĩkabↄkũnapi kũ̀, i weio, ↄ̃ Saulu a fɛ̃nda sɛ̀ à azĩa ò'oa.
Kɛ́ aà zĩkabↄkũnapi è à gà, ↄ̃ à azĩa ò'o a fɛ̃ndaa sↄ̃, aa gà ḿpii.
Màa Saulu ń a nɛgↄ̃ɛ gbɛ̃ↄn àaↄ̃ↄ ń a bɛdeↄ gàga ḿpii sãnu.
Kɛ́ Isaili pↄ́ kú guzulɛu weↄ è ń zĩgↄ̃ↄ bàalɛ̀ mɛ́ Saulu ń a nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ gàga, ↄ̃ aa bàalɛ̀ sↄ̃, aa ń wɛ̃́lɛↄ tò we, ↄ̃ Filitɛ̃ↄ mↄ̀ zↄ̃̀lɛu.
Kɛ́ a gu dↄ̀, ↄ̃ Filitɛ̃ↄ mↄ̀ pↄ́ↄ woloi gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gàgaↄwa, ↄ̃ aa Saulu ń a nɛgↄ̃ɛ gbɛ̃ↄn àaↄ̃ↄ gɛ è kálɛa Giliboa gbɛpↄlɛu.
Ɔ̃ aa Saulu mi zↄ̃̀ aa aà gↄ̃kɛbↄↄ wòlowà, ↄ̃ aa gbɛ̃́ↄ zĩ̀ aa a bao fã̀ɛ Filitɛ̃ↄ bùsuu píi ń ń tã́akpɛↄ.
Wà aà gↄ̃kɛbↄↄ kàlɛ ń tã́aↄ kpɛ́u, ↄ̃ wà aà mi lòo Dagↄ̃ kpɛ́u.
Kɛ́ Yabɛsi Galadadeↄ yã́ pↄ́ Filitɛ̃ↄ kɛ̀ Sauluɛpi mà màa,
ↄ̃ an nɛgↄ̃naↄ fɛ̀lɛ píi, aa Saulu ń a nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ gɛↄ sɛ̀lɛ tàò Yabɛsi. Aa ń vĩ́ gbɛ̃́nɛli gbáu we, ↄ̃ aa lɛyè e gↄↄ sopla.
Saulu gà kɛ́ à bↄ̀ Dii kpɛ yã́iɛ. I Dii yãdao, à gɛ̀ yãgbɛ̀a gɛ̀sisinawa se.
I yãgbɛa Diiwao. A yã́i Dii aà dɛ̀i, ↄ̃ à Yɛse nɛ́ Davidi kpà kpalau aà gbɛu.
Isailiↄ mↄ̀ Davidi kĩ́i ḿpii Hɛblↄ̃ aa mɛ̀: Wá au doũɛ.
Za zi, baa gↄↄ pↄ́ Saulu dɛ kía ũ, ḿmɛ ni dↄaawɛ̃ɛ zĩlau gɛa ń suao. Ɔ̃ Dii n Lua ònɛ ḿmɛ ńyↄ̃ↄ dɛ a gbɛ̃́ Isailiↄ dↄaana ũ, an kía ũ.
Kɛ́ Isaili gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ mↄ̀ kí Davidi kĩ́i Hɛblↄ̃ ḿpii, we à lɛdoũkɛ̀uńnↄ Dii aɛ, ↄ̃ aa nísikà aà miwa aa aà kpà Isailiↄ kpalau, lá Dii dà Samuɛliɛ a òwa.
Davidi ń Isailiↄ tↄ̃̀u Yelusalɛũ pↄ́ wì mɛ lↄ Yebusi ḿpii. Ɔ̃ Yebusideↄ
ò Davidiɛ: Ńyↄ̃ gɛ̃ lao. Ń beeo Davidi wɛ̃́lɛ bĩ́ide pↄ́ wì mɛ lↄ Siↄnapi sì, ↄ̃ à gↄ̃̀ aà wɛ̃́lɛ ũ.
Gↄↄ bee Davidi mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dↄ̀aa lɛ̀lɛ Yebusideↄwa káau mɛ́ a gↄ̃ zĩgↄ̃ↄ swana ũ, an gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ. Zeluia nɛ́ Yoabu mɛ́ gɛ̀ káau, ↄ̃ à gↄ̃̀ ń swana ũ.
Davidi bɛkpà wɛ̃́lɛ bĩ́idepiu, ↄ̃ wà tↄkpàɛ̀ Davidi Wɛ̃́lɛ.
À kpɛ́ↄ dↄ̀dↄ lìai za gu pↄ́ wà Milo ɛ kàka ń bùsuo e a bĩ́iwa, mɛ́ Yoabu wɛ̃́lɛpi gu pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ↄ kɛ̀kɛ.
Davidi gbãa lɛ́ dɛdɛɛ, asa Dii Zĩgↄ̃de kuaànↄɛ.
Davidi nɛgↄ̃naↄ kíaↄ yã́n kɛ. Ampiↄ ń Isailiↄ píi aa zɛ̀aànↄ aà kíakɛ yã́ musu. Aa aà kpà Isailiↄ kía ũ lá Dii òwa.
Davidi nɛgↄ̃napiↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Akemↄ gbɛ̃́ Yasↄbaũ mɛ́ nɛgↄ̃n tↄde gbɛ̃ↄn àaↄ̃ↄ swana ũ. Aàpi mɛ́ sↄ̃na sɛ̀ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa do ń basↄoↄzi, à ń zↄ̃zↄ̃ò píi gↄↄdoũzĩ.
Aà gbɛa Dodai nɛ́ Ɛleazaa, Ahoa gbɛ̃́ kú nɛgↄ̃n gbɛ̃ↄn àaↄ̃piↄ guu lↄ.
A kú ń Davidio gↄↄ pↄ́ Filitɛ̃ↄ kã̀aa aa zĩkà Pasadamiũ. Isailiↄ pↄ̀ↄbↄzãkɛ̀ gu pↄ́ naa bú kúu.
Aàpi ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ aamɛ zɛ̀ wà gì búpi guoguo. Aa Filitɛ̃ↄ dɛ̀dɛ, ↄ̃ Dii tò aa zĩ̀ zↄ̃ↄ blè gↄↄ bee.
Nɛgↄ̃n gbɛ̃ↄn baakwiↄ guu, gbɛ̃ↄn àaↄ̃ↄ mɛ́ bↄ̀ gɛ̀ Davidi kĩ́i Adulaũ gbɛ̀'ɛu. Filitɛ̃ↄ gãli bòo kálɛa Lefai guzulɛu.
Gↄↄ bee Davidi ku sɛ̃gbãu mɛ́ Filitɛ̃ gudↄ̃anaↄ ku Bɛtɛlɛũ.
Davidi lɛ́ a bɛ í nidɛ à mɛ̀: Démɛ a gɛ́ Bɛtɛlɛũ bↄlɛ lↄ̀ↄ'i tↄ́imɛɛi?
Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃ↄn àaↄ̃piↄ gɛ̀ gɛ̃̀ Filitɛ̃ↄ bòou, aa Bɛtɛlɛũ bↄlɛ lↄ̀ↄpi í tↄ̀ sùò Davidiɛ. Ɔ̃ i we mìo, a tↄ̃̀lɛ Diiɛ sa'o'i ũɛ.
À mɛ̀: Kai ma Lua, má fↄ̃ íɛ bee mio. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa gì ń wɛ̃niiↄ auɛ! I we mìo. Nɛgↄ̃n gbɛ̃ↄn àaↄ̃piↄ yãkɛan we.
Yoabu dãuna Abisai mɛ́ nɛgↄ̃n gbɛ̃ↄn baakwipiↄ swana ũ. Aàpi mɛ́ sↄ̃na sɛ̀ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa do ń basↄoozi à ń dɛdɛ, ↄ̃ à tↄbↄ̀ gbɛ̃ↄn baakwipiↄ guu.
À tↄbↄ̀ dɛ nɛgↄ̃n gbɛ̃ↄn àaↄ̃piↄla, ↄ̃ à gↄ̃̀ ń dↄaana ũ, kási a ku nɛgↄ̃n tↄde gbɛ̃ↄn àaↄ̃piↄ guuo.
Yoiada nɛ́ Benaia, Kabazee gbɛ̃́á zĩ̀kan wↄ́ↄdeɛ. Aà yãkɛaↄ dasi. À Mↄabu nɛgↄ̃n tↄdeↄ dɛ̀ gbɛ̃ↄn pla. À gɛ̃̀ ɛ guu gↄↄ pↄ́ lougbɛ kwɛ̀, à nↄ̀ↄmusu dɛ̀u.
À Egipi gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a gbã̀a kà gã̀sĩsuu sↄo dɛ̀. Egipi gbɛ̃́pi sↄ̃mpa dɛ lán zwã̀atãn àsaliwaɛ, ↄ̃ Benaia sↄ̃̀aàzi ń goo, à aà sↄ̃napi sìwà à aà dɛ̀ò.
Yoiada nɛ́ Benaia mɛ́ yã́piↄ kɛ̀, ↄ̃ à tↄbↄ̀ nɛgↄ̃n gbɛ̃ↄn baakwipiↄ guu.
À tↄbↄ̀ dɛ nɛgↄ̃n gbɛ̃ↄn baakwipiↄla, kási a ku nɛgↄ̃n tↄde gbɛ̃ↄn àaↄ̃piↄ guuo. Ɔ̃ Davidi aà dìlɛ a dↄaiↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ.
Nɛgↄ̃napiↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Yoabu dãuna Asaɛli, Dodo nɛ́ Ɛlana Bɛtɛlɛũ gbɛ̃́,
Alodi gbɛ̃́ Samↄ, Peloni gbɛ̃́ Ɛlɛzi,
Tekoa gbɛ̃́ Ikesi nɛ́ Ila, Anato gbɛ̃́ Abiɛzɛɛ,
Usa gbɛ̃́ Sibekai, Ahoa gbɛ̃́ Ilai,
Nɛtofa gbɛ̃́ Malai, Nɛtofa gbɛ̃́ Baana nɛ́ Ɛlɛbu,
Gibɛa pↄ́ kú Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ bùsuu gbɛ̃́ Libai nɛ́ Itai, Pilatↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ Benaia,
Gaasi guzulɛ gbɛ̃́ Idai, Alaba gbɛ̃́ Abiɛli,
Bauliũ gbɛ̃́ Azemavɛ, Saaleboni gbɛ̃́ Ɛliaba,
Gizoni gbɛ̃́ Asɛũ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ, gusĩsĩde gbɛ̃́ Sage nɛ́ Yonatãa,
gusĩsĩde gbɛ̃́ Sakaa nɛ́ Ahiaũ, Ulu nɛ́ Ɛlifala,
Mɛkɛla gbɛ̃́ Efɛɛ, Peloni gbɛ̃́ Ahia,
Kaamɛli gbɛ̃́ Ɛzɛlo, Ɛzɛbai nɛ́ Naalai,
Natã dãuna Yoɛli, Ageli nɛ́ Mibaa,
Amↄni bui Zɛlɛki, Beelo gbɛ̃́ Naalai, Zeluia nɛ́ Yoabu zĩkabↄkũna,
Yɛtɛɛ buiↄ Ila ń Galebuo
Iti bui Uli, Alai nɛ́ Zabada,
Siza nɛ́ Adina, Lubɛni buiↄ swana ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn baakwi.
Maaka nɛ́ Anana, Miti gbɛ̃́ Yosafa,
Asalo gbɛ̃́ Uzia, Aloee gbɛ̃́ Otaũ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ Sãma ń Yeiɛlio,
Simɛli nɛ́ Yediaɛ ń a dãuna Yoha Tizi gbɛ̃́o,
Maava gbɛ̃́ Ɛliɛli, Ɛlinaaũ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ Yelibai ń Yosaviao, Mↄabu gbɛ̃́ Itamaa,
Ɛliɛli ń Ɔbɛdio ń Mɛzobi gbɛ̃́ Yaasiɛo.
Kɛ́ Kisi nɛ́ Saulu Davidi yà, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa nà Davidiwa Zikilagaↄ tↄ́n kɛ. Aa ku nɛgↄ̃na pↄ́ dↄ̀aàlɛ zĩlauↄ guuɛ.
Aa sáↄ ń gbɛmaↄ kũa, aaì ka ge gbɛ zu ń ↄplaao ń ↄzɛɛo píiɛ. Saulu zĩa bui Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ buiↄnɛ, aan kɛ:
An swana Ahiɛzɛɛ, Gibɛa gbɛ̃́ Semaanɛ ń aà dãuna Yoasio, Azemavɛ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ Yeziɛli ń Pɛlɛtio, Belaka ń Anato gbɛ̃́ Yehuo,
Gabaↄ̃ↄ gbɛ̃́ Isimaia pↄ́ dɛ nɛgↄ̃n gbɛ̃ↄn baakwiↄ dↄaanaↄ do ũ,
Selemia, Yaaziɛ, Yohanani, Gedela gbɛ̃́ Yozaba,
Ɛluzai, Yelimↄ, Bealia, Semalia, Alufi bui Sefatia,
Ɛlikana, Isia, Azalɛli, Kole buiↄ Yoɛzɛɛ ń Yasↄbaũo
ń Gedoo gbɛ̃́ Yeloaũ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ Yoela ń Zebadiao.
Gada buieↄ ńzĩa kpà Davidiwa sɛ̃gbãu. Gↄ̃sa gbãaↄnɛ. Aaìↄ ku zĩ̀ sↄu guuɛ, mɛ́ aa sɛ̀ngbao ń sↄ̃nao dↄ̃. An oa bↄ̀ nↄ̀ↄmusuwa, mɛ́ aaìↄ wãa gusĩsĩdeu lán tuewa.
Ezɛɛ mɛ́ ń swana ũ, a plaade Obadia, a àaↄ̃de Ɛliabu,
a síiↄ̃de Misimana, a sↄode Zelemii,
a soolode Atai, a soplade Ɛliɛli,
a swaaↄ̃de Yohanani, a kɛ̃okwide Ɛlizaba,
a kwide Zelemii, a kuɛdode Mabanai.
Gada buipiↄá zĩgↄ̃ swanaↄnɛ. An gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a gbãa kɛ̃́sãańzi gbãa mɛ́ sáa ń gbɛ̃ↄn basↄoↄ gbãao. An gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛńlaↄ sↄ̃ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa sↄo pↄ́.
Ɔ̃mɛ bùa Yuudɛ̃wa mↄ sɛ̃́ia guu gↄↄ pↄ́ à pà, aa tò guzulɛdeↄ tilɛ̀ gukpɛ ń bɛ'aɛo píi.
Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ buieↄ ń Yudaeↄ mↄ̀ nà Davidiwa sɛ̃gbãu lↄ.
Davidi gɛ̀ dàńlɛ à mɛ̀: Tó aafia álɛ mↄa à dↄmalɛ, mí gbãakpaázi ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo. Tó álɛ mↄ́ ma kpái ma ibɛɛↄwa, baa kɛ́ mi yãpãsĩkɛɛ́oɛ sↄ̃, wá deziↄ Lua a e, i yã́gↄ̃gↄ̃wɛ̃ɛ.
Ɔ̃ Lua Nisĩna dɛ̀dɛ nɛgↄ̃n gbɛ̃ↄn baakwipiↄ swana Amasaiwa à mɛ̀: N gbɛ̃́ↄn wá ũ, Davidi, wa zɛnnↄɛ, Yɛse nɛ́. Lua aafia kã́fĩnɛ, Lua n dↄnlɛdeↄ gba aafia lↄ, asa n Lua a dↄnlɛɛ. Ɔ̃ Davidi ń dílɛ à ń kɛ́ a zĩgↄ̃ gbãamↄnɛdeↄ swanaↄ ũ.
Manase buieↄ nà Davidiwa gↄↄ pↄ́ aàpi ń Filitɛ̃ↄ lɛ́ gɛ́ zĩkai ń Sauluo. Ɔ̃ Davidi ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ i dↄ Filitɛ̃ↄlɛo, asa Filitɛ̃ kíaↄ mɛ́ lɛkpàaĩ, ↄ̃ aa aà gbàɛ aa mɛ̀: Tó à zɛ̀ ń a dii Sauluoɛ, aa wá mi zↄ̃zↄ̃ɛ.
Manase bui pↄ́ nà Davidiwa gↄↄ pↄ́ à tà Zikilagaↄn kɛ: Adena, Yozaba, Yediaɛ, Mikaila, Yozaba, Ɛlihu ń Ziletaio. Aamɛ Manase bui zĩgↄ̃ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄoↄ dↄaanaↄ ũ.
Aa dↄ̀ Davidilɛ gbãamↄnɛdeↄ yã́ musu, asa gↄ̃sa gbãaↄnɛ ḿpii, Davidi zĩgↄ̃ↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄnɛ.
Lá gu lɛ́ dↄ wìↄ mↄ Davidi kĩ́i dↄiaàlɛ e aà zĩgↄ̃ↄ gɛ̀ dasikũ̀ lán Lua ìwaↄwaɛ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa gↄ̃kɛbↄↄ kũa aa mↄ̀ Hɛblↄ̃ Davidi kpái kpalau Saulu gbɛu lá Dii òwaↄ dasilɛn kɛ:
Yuda pↄ́ sɛ̀ngbao ń sↄ̃naↄ kũaↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ soolo n ↄ̀aa síiↄ̃oɛ (6.800).
Simɛↄ buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ sopla ń basↄooɛ (7.100).
Levii buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ síiↄ̃ ń ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃oɛ (4.600).
Aalona buiↄ dↄaana Yoiada ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ àaↄ̃ ń ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ ń basↄooɛ (3.700).
Ɛ̀waaso nɛgↄ̃n Zadoki kú ń guu ń a bɛ'uabeleↄ gbɛ̃ↄn bao ń plao.
Saulu zĩa bui Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ àaↄ̃ɛ (3.000). Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ bui dasideↄ ku Saulu kpɛ e tiaɛ.
Ɛflaiũ buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bao ń ↄ̀aa síiↄ̃oɛ (20.800). Gↄ̃sa gbãa tↄdeↄnɛ ń gbɛ̃́ↄ guu.
Manase bui pↄ́ kú bɛ'aɛ oiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bao plasaiɛ (18.000). Gbɛ̃́piↄ wà ń plɛ́ aa gɛ́ Davidi kpái kpalau.
Isakaa bui dↄaanaↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa doɛ. Aa gↄↄ bee yã́ dↄ̃ mɛ́ aa laai vĩ a yã́ musu, aa dↄ̃ lá à kũ̀ Isailiↄ kɛ. Aa kú ń ń ìwaↄ píi.
Zabulↄni bui pↄ́ aa zĩ dↄ̃ mɛ́ aa gↄ̃kɛbↄ dↄ́ɛ dↄ̃ↄ píi gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ blakwiɛ (50.000). Aa ku aà kpɛ ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndooɛ
Nɛfatali bui dↄaanaↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa sↄoɛ ń ń ìwaↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ baakwi ń soplao (37.000), baade ń a sɛ̀ngbaoo ń a sↄ̃nao.
Dã bui pↄ́ aa ku zĩ̀ sↄu guuↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ baakwi plasaio ń ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃oɛ (28.600).
Asɛɛ bui pↄ́ zĩ dↄ̃ mɛ́ aa ku sↄu guuↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ blaɛ (40.000).
Lubɛni buiↄ ń Gada buiↄ ń Manase bui pↄ́ kú Yuudɛ̃ baaleↄ gbɛ̃ↄn sↄ́sↄo lɛɛ basooloɛ (120.000). An baade ń a gↄ̃kɛbↄↄ.
Gbɛ̃́piↄá zĩgↄ̃ↄnɛ ḿpii, aaìↄ ku sia zĩlau sↄu guuɛ. Aa mↄ̀ Hɛblↄ̃ ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo Davidi kpái kpalau, i gↄ̃ Isaili bui píi kía ũ. Ɔ̃ Isaili kĩniↄ làasoo doũpi kɛ̀ lↄ, aa ye Davidi kpaa kpalaui.
Ɔ̃ aa gↄↄ àaↄ̃ kɛ̀ ń Davidio we, aa pↄblè aa vɛ̃ɛmì, asa an bɛdeↄ kũ̀sũakɛ̀nɛ́ɛ.
Bee gbɛa an saɛde pↄ́ kú Isakaa buiↄ bùsuu ń Zabulↄni buiↄ bùsuo e à gɛ̀ pɛ̀ Nɛfatali bui pↄ́ kú zã̀ↄ bùsuwaↄ aa pↄblea dì zàa'ĩnaↄnɛ ń yiongoↄ ń sↄ̃baonaↄ ń zuↄ aa mↄ̀onɛ́ɛ. Pↄ́wɛnti diɛ ń kaadↄɛmbɛ giiↄ ń vɛ̃ɛbɛ giiↄ ń vɛ̃ɛo ń nísio ń zuↄ ń sãↄ, kɛ́ Isailiↄ lɛ́ pↄnakɛ yã́i.
Davidi lɛkpàaĩ ń a zĩgↄ̃ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄoↄ dↄaanaↄ ń a gbɛ̃ↄn basↄobasↄoↄ dↄaanaↄ píi.
Ɔ̃ a ò Isailiↄnɛ píi: Tó à kɛ̀ɛ́ maa, mɛ́ a dɛ Dii wá Lua pↄeã ũɛ, wà lɛ́kpãsãkɛ wá gbɛ̃́ kĩni pↄ́ kú Isaili bùsuuↄnɛ píi ń sa'onaↄ ń Levii bui pↄ́ kúńnↄ ń wɛ̃́lɛↄ guuↄ, aa mↄ kãaawanↄ,
wí gɛ wá Lua kpagolo sɛ́ suò wá kĩ́i, asa wi yãgbɛawà Saulu gↄↄo.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kãaaapiↄ wèi màa, asa à kɛ̀ ḿpiiɛ maaɛ.
Ɔ̃ Davidi Isailiↄ kã̀aa za Egipi swa Sikooi e à gɛ̀ pɛ̀ Amata bↄlɛwa, kɛ́ aa Lua kpagolo sɛ́ Kiliayaaliũ aa suò.
Ɔ̃ Davidi ń Isailiↄ gɛ̀ Kiliayaaliũ pↄ́ wì mɛ lↄ Baala, Yuda bùsuu ḿpii, kɛ́ aa gɛ wà Dii Lua kpagolo sɛ́ wà suò. Dii ìↄ kible kpagolopi musu malaika gã̀sĩadeↄ zãnguo ↄ̃ aà tↄ́ kuwà.
Ɔ̃ aa kpagolopi sɛ̀ Abinadabu bɛ, aa dà zugo dafu guu aa dàò zɛ́u, Uza ń Ahio mɛ́ lɛ́ gɛò.
Davidi ń Isailiↄ lɛ́ ↄ̃wã Lua aɛ ń gbãa pua lɛ́u ḿpii ń lɛsiao. Wàlɛ mↄↄnalɛ ń kúuo ń gã̀ao ń sɛ̃́sɛ̃naↄ ń kã̀aeↄ.
Kɛ́ aa kà Kidↄ̃ ésegbɛ̃kĩi, zuↄ gɛ̃nalɛ̀, ↄ̃ Uza ↄbↄ̀ kpagolopi kũ̀.
Ɔ̃ Dii pↄ pàaàzi à aà lɛ̀ we, kɛ́ à ↄnà kpagolopiwa yã́i, ↄ̃ à gà Lua aɛ we.
Davidi pↄ pà, kɛ́ Dii pↄ fɛ̃̀ Uzazi yã́i, ↄ̃ wì mɛ gupiɛ Pↄfɛ̃a'uzazi e ń a gbão.
Gↄↄ bee ↄ̃ vĩa Davidi kũ̀ Lua yã́ musu à mɛ̀: Kpelewa má kɛ mà Lua kpagolo sɛ́ mà taòi?
Ɔ̃ i sɛ sùò a wɛ̃́lɛu lↄo, à lìlɛ tàò Gata gbɛ̃́ Ɔbɛdɛdↄũ bɛ.
Lua kpagolopi ku aà bɛ e mↄ àaↄ̃, ↄ̃ Dii ɛ̀fãaikɛ̀ aà bɛdeↄnɛ ń pↄ́ pↄ́ a vĩↄ píi.
Tii kí Hilaũ gbɛ̃́ↄ zĩ̀ Davidiwa ń sɛdɛ líↄ ń gbɛ̀'ãnaↄ ń li'ãnaↄ kpɛdↄiɛ̀.
Ɔ̃ Davidi dↄ̃̀ sa kɛ́ Dii a kpa Isailiↄ kía ũɛ, mɛ́ à a kpala kã̀fĩɛ maamaa, kɛ́ Isailiↄ dɛ Luapi gbɛ̃́ↄ ũ yã́i.
Davidi ɛ̀a nↄeↄ sɛ̀ Yelusalɛũ lↄ, ↄ̃ à nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ ń nɛnↄɛↄ ì'ińnↄ.
Nɛgↄ̃ɛ pↄ́ à ń í Yelusalɛũpiↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Samua, Sobabu, Natã, Salomↄↄ,
Ibaa, Ɛlisua, Ɛlifele,
Nↄga, Nɛfɛgi, Yafia,
Ɛlisama, Ɛliada ń Ɛlifeleo.
Kɛ́ Filitɛ̃ↄ mà wà Davidi kpà Isaili bui píi kía ũ, ↄ̃ ampii aa gɛ̀ lɛ́ aà wɛ. Kɛ́ Davidi a baomà, ↄ̃ à gɛ̀ daińlɛ.
Filitɛ̃ↄ mↄ̀ lɛ̀lɛ Lefai guzulɛdeↄwa,
ↄ̃ Davidi gbɛ̀a Luawa à mɛ̀: Mà gɛ́ lɛ́lɛi Filitɛ̃ↄwa, ńyↄ̃ ń namɛɛ ma ↄzĩa? Dii wèwà à mɛ̀: Gɛ́, má ń nanɛ n ↄzĩ.
Ɔ̃ Davidi ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ gɛ̀ Baali Pelaziũ, ↄ̃ à zĩblèmá we. Davidi mɛ̀: Lua dↄ̀aamɛɛ à bↄ̀ mↄ̀ ma ibɛɛↄwa ń gbãao, lá í ì gufↄ̃ bùiwa. Ɔ̃ à tↄkpà gupiɛ Baali Pelaziũ.
Filitɛ̃ↄ ń tã́aↄ tò we, ↄ̃ Davidi mɛ̀ wà kpasa.
Ɔ̃ Filitɛ̃ↄ ɛ̀a mↄ̀ lɛ̀lɛ Lefai guzulɛdeↄwa lↄ.
Ɔ̃ Davidi ɛ̀a gbɛ̀a Luawa lↄ. Lua wèwà à mɛ̀: Ńsu gɛ́má súsuo. Liańzi, ní lɛ́lɛmá bↄaa ń kpɛ̃̀ kpɛ́o.
Tó a táa'okĩi mà lípiↄ mia, à bↄmá ń zĩo, asa ma bↄ dↄaaɛ́n we, kɛ́ mà zĩble Filitɛ̃ zĩgↄ̃ↄwa yã́i.
Davidi kɛ̀ màa lá Lua òɛwa, ↄ̃ aa zĩblè Filitɛ̃ zĩgↄ̃ↄwa za Gabaↄ̃ↄ e à gɛ̀ pɛ̀ Gɛzɛɛwa.
Davidi tↄ́ lì bùsuↄla píi, ↄ̃ Dii tò bui píi vĩakɛ̀ɛ̀.
Kɛ́ Davidi kpɛdↄ̀dↄ azĩaɛ a wɛ̃́lɛ guu, ↄ̃ à gukɛ̀kɛ Lua kpagoloɛ, à zwã̀akpɛ dↄ̀ɛ̀
à mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃e Lua kpagolo sɛa zɛ́ vĩo, sema Levii buiↄ bàasio, asa Dii mɛ́ ń dílɛ a sɛnaↄ ũ, aaiↄ a zĩ kɛ gↄↄpii.
À Isaili bui píi kã̀aa Yelusalɛũ, kɛ́ aa gɛ Dii kpagolopi sɛ suò gu pↄ́ a kɛ̀kɛɛ̀u.
Ɔ̃ à Aalona buiↄ ń Levii buiↄ sìsi:
Kɛata buiↄ dↄaana Uliɛli ń a gbɛ̃́ gbɛ̃ↄn basooloↄ.
Mɛlali buiↄ dↄaana Asaia ń a gbɛ̃́ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa do ń baooↄ.
Geesↄ̃ buiↄ dↄaana Yoɛli ń a gbɛ̃́ gbɛ̃ↄn basoolokwiↄ.
Ɛlizafã buiↄ dↄaana Semaia ń a gbɛ̃́ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa doↄ.
Hɛblↄ̃ buiↄ dↄaana Ɛliɛli ń a gbɛ̃́ gbɛ̃ↄn basiiↄ̃ↄ.
Uziɛli buiↄ dↄaana Aminadabu ń a gbɛ̃́ gbɛ̃ↄn basↄokwi ń plaoↄ.
Ɔ̃ Davidi sa'onkiaↄ Zadoki ń Abiataao sìsi ń Levii buiↄ Uliɛli, Asaia, Yoɛli, Semaia, Ɛliɛli ń Aminadabuo.
A ònɛ́: Levii bui dↄaanaↄn á ũ. Ápiↄ ń á gbɛ̃́ↄ à gbãbↄ ázĩaɛ, í gɛ́ Dii Isailiↄ Lua kpagolo sɛ́ à suò gu pↄ́ má kɛ̀kɛɛ̀u.
Dii wá Lua pↄ fɛ̃̀wázi káau, kɛ́ á Levii buiↄ ámɛ á sɛao yã́i. Wi yãgbɛawà a zɛ́wao.
Ɔ̃ Sa'onaↄ ń Levii bui kĩniↄ gbãbↄ̀ ńzĩaɛ, kɛ́ aa Dii Isailiↄ Lua kpagolo sɛ suò yã́i.
Ɔ̃ Levii buipiↄ gɛ̀ Lua kpagolo sɛ dà ń gã̀u, aalɛ suò ń a sɛ́liↄ lá Dii ò Mↄiziɛwa.
Ɔ̃ Davidi ò Levii bui dↄaanaↄnɛ aa ń gbɛ̃eↄ dilɛ aaↄ lɛsi ń pↄ́'ↄbↄnaↄ: Domaↄ ń mↄↄnaↄ ń sɛ̃́sɛ̃naↄ, an pↄna súu iↄ dↄ.
Ɔ̃ Levii buipiↄ Yoɛli nɛ́ Emani dìlɛ ń Bɛlɛkia nɛ́ Asafao ń Mɛlali bui Kusaia nɛ́ Etanio.
An kwàasiↄn kɛ: Zakali, Yaaziɛ, Semilamↄ, Yeiɛli, Uni, Ɛliabu, Benaia, Maasea, Matitia, Ɛlifeleu, Mikinɛia, Ɔbɛdɛdↄũ, Yeiɛli ń Azaziao.
Lɛ̀sin dↄaanaↄ Emani, Asafa ń Etanio lɛ́ mↄgotɛ̃ sɛ̃́sɛ̃naↄ lɛ́.
Zakali, Aziɛli, Semilamↄ, Yeiɛli, Uni, Ɛliabu, Maasea ń Benaiao lɛ́ doma'ↄ gèele lɛ́.
Matitia, Ɛlifeleu, Mikinɛia, Ɔbɛdɛdↄũ, Yeiɛli ń Azaziao lɛ́ mↄↄna'ↄ kelena lɛ́.
Levii bui dↄaana Kenania mɛ́ kpagolosɛnaↄ dↄaana ũ. Ì yãdanɛ́, kɛ́ a dↄ̃a vĩ a guu yã́i.
Bɛlɛkia ń Ɛlikanao mɛ́ kpagolopi dↄ̃̀anaↄ ũ.
Sa'onaɛ beeↄ mɛ́ lɛ́ kã̀aepɛ Lua kpagolo aɛ: Sebania, Yosafa, Nɛtanɛli, Amasai, Zakali, Benaia ń Ɛliɛzɛɛo. Ɔbɛdɛdↄũ ń Yehiao dɛ a dↄ̃̀anaↄ ũɛ lↄ.
Màa Davidi ń Isailiↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ń zĩgↄ̃ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄoↄ dↄaanaↄ gɛ̀ Dii bàakuańnↄ kpagolo sɛ̀ Ɔbɛdɛdↄũ bɛ, aalɛ suò ń pↄnao.
Lua dↄ̀ Levii bui pↄ́ kpagolopi sɛaↄlɛ, ↄ̃ wà sa'ò ń zuswanaↄ mɛ̀n sopla ń sãsakaoↄ mɛ̀n sopla lↄ.
Davidi bàabaa gomusu daa ń Levii bui pↄ́ kpagolo sɛaↄ ń ń dↄaana Kenaniao ń lɛ̀sinaↄ píi. Davidi bàabaa sa'o'ula daa lↄ.
Màa Isaili bui píi lɛ́ su ń Dii kpagoloo ń kúkuakɛao ń kuu'ↄo ń kã̀ae'ↄo ń sɛ̃́sɛ̃n ↄ́o ń domalɛao ń mↄↄnlɛao.
Kɛ́ Dii kpagolo lɛ́ gɛ̃ Davidi wɛ̃́lɛu, Saulu nɛ́ Mikali lɛ́ zĩ́lɛ gwa fɛnɛntiu. Kɛ́ a è kí Davidi lɛ́ ↄ̃wã, àlɛ pↄnakɛ Dii aɛ, ↄ̃ à sakàaàgu a sↄ̃ guu.
Wà sù ń Lua kpagoloo wa dìlɛ zwã̀akpɛ pↄ́ Davidi dↄ̀ɛ̀ guu. Ɔ̃ wà sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ ò Lua aɛ ń sáaukpasaↄ.
Kɛ́ Davidi sa'ò a làa, à báaadà gbɛ̃́ↄgu ń Dii tↄ́o.
Ɔ̃ à pɛ̃ɛ ń damina kàao ń vɛ̃ɛbɛ kàao bìilɛ Isaili pↄ́ kãaaa weↄnɛ ń miwa mɛ̀ndodo gↄ̃ɛↄ ń nↄɛↄ.
À Levii buieↄ dìlɛ aaↄ zĩkɛ Dii kpagolo aɛ, aaiↄ Dii Isailiↄ Lua tↄbↄ, aaiↄ aà sáaukpa, aaiↄ aà táasilɛ.
Asafa mɛ́ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ, Zakali mɛ́ aà plaade ũ, bee gbɛa Yaaziɛ, Semilamↄ, Yeiɛli, Matitia, Ɛliabu, Benaia, Ɔbɛdɛdↄũ ń Yeiɛlio. Aaliↄ domaↄ lɛ́ ń mↄↄnaↄ. Asafa sↄ̃ aliↄ sɛ̃́sɛ̃napa.
Sa'onaↄ Benaia ń Yaaziɛo mɛ́ aaliↄ kã̀aepɛ Luabaakuańnↄ kpagolo aɛ gↄↄpii.
Gↄↄ bee ↄ̃ Davidi Dii sáaukpazĩ dàalɛ, a nà Asafa ń a gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ ń ↄzĩ.
À Dii sáaukpa, í aà sísi, à to bui píi aà yãkɛaↄ dↄ̃.
À lɛsi à aà táasilɛ, í aà yãbↄnsaɛkɛaↄ galikɛ píi,
í ĩ́anadã ń aà tↄ́ pↄ́ a kua adoao. Á Dii kĩ́i wɛ̀ɛlɛnaↄ à pↄnakɛ,
à gɛ Dii le à gbãa gbɛawà, íↄ aà aɛya gↄↄpii.
À to yãbↄnsaɛ pↄ́ a kɛ̀ↄ dↄágu, aà dabudabukɛaↄ ń yã́ pↄ́ a dìlɛↄ.
Á Dii zↄ̀blena Isaili buiↄ, á Yakↄbu bui pↄ́ à á sɛ́piↄ,
Dii mɛ́ wá Lua ũ, ↄ̃mɛ ì yãdilɛ gbɛ̃́piiɛ.
Aà bàakuawanↄ yã́ lí sãaaguo, yã́ pↄ́ a òpi aↄ ku e wá buiwaɛ.
Aà bàa kú ń Ablahaũo, à ɛ̀a yã́ doũpi lɛgbɛ̃̀ Izaakiɛ lↄ.
Aà bàa ɛ̀a kú ń Yakↄbuo iko ũ, ↄ̃ a kú ń Isailiↄ e gↄↄpii.
À mɛ̀ á Kanaa bùsu kpámá, aↄ dɛ pↄ́ pↄ́ aa sɛ kpaalɛ guu ũ.
Gↄↄ bee aa dasio, wìli ń yãdao, aa ku Kanaa bùsuu bↄ̀mↄↄ ũɛ.
Aaìↄ liaaliaa bui ń buio guuɛ, aaìↄ bɛbɛ bùsu ń bùsuo.
I we gbɛ̃e ń wɛtã̀o, à kíaↄ lèle an yã́ musu à mɛ̀:
Aasu ↄkã gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a ń sɛ́piↄwao, aasu ĩada a ãnabipiↄwao.
Dṹnia gbɛ̃́pii, à lɛsi Diiɛ. Àↄ aà zĩblea baokpa lá gu lɛ́ dↄ.
À aà gawi yã'o buiↄnɛ, à aà yãbↄnsaɛↄ galikɛ gbɛ̃́piiɛ.
Dii zↄ̃ↄ, à kà wà aà táasilɛ, à kà wà vĩakɛɛ̀ dɛ diiↄla píi.
Buipãleↄ diiↄá pↄ́ gianaↄnɛ, Dii mɛ́ musu kɛ̀.
A zↄ̃ↄkɛ ń bɛɛɛo vĩ, gbãa ń pↄnao ku aà kĩ́iɛ.
À gawi ń gbãao dↄ̃ Diiɛ, bùsu píi gbɛ̃́ↄ, à dↄ̃ Diiɛ.
À Dii tↄ́ gawi dↄ̃ɛ̀, à mↄ aà aɛ, í aà gba pↄ́, à kúlɛ Diiɛ ń lousisi'ulaↄ daa.
Zĩ́lɛdeↄ à tó á mɛ àↄ kukɛ aà aɛ. À dṹnia kàlɛ gíũgiũ, a deea vĩo.
Musudeↄ, à pↄnakɛ, zĩ́lɛdeↄ, à vĩ àↄ kɛ̃aa, í o buiↄ guu Dii mɛ́ lɛ́ kible.
Ísia ń pↄ́ pↄ́ kúuↄ, à kↄ̃fĩkɛ, sɛ̃̀a ń pↄ́ pↄ́ kúuↄ, à kúkuakɛ píi,
lí pↄ́ kú lákpɛuↄ i gulakɛ, aai pↄnakɛ Dii aɛ, asa àlɛ mↄ́ yã́kpalɛkɛi ń dṹniaoɛ.
À Dii sáaukpa, asa a maa, aà gbɛ̃kɛ láaa vĩo.
À mɛ: Lua wá Suabana, wá suaba! Wá bↄlɛ buiↄ guu, ní wá kãaa, wí n tↄ́ kã́fĩ, asa a kua adoa, wí ĩ́anadã ń n táasilɛao.
Wà Dii Isailiↄ Lua sáaukpa za asĩnizĩ e gↄↄpii! Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃́pii mɛ̀: Ãmi! Àleluya!
Davidi Asafa ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ dìlɛ Dii bàakuańnↄ kpagoloi, kɛ́ aaliↄ zĩkɛ a aɛ lá gu lɛ́ dↄ lá wa dìlɛwa.
À Ɔbɛdɛdↄũ ń a gbɛ̃́ gbɛ̃ↄn bàaↄ̃kwi plasaiↄ dìlɛ we lↄ. Yedutu nɛ́ Ɔbɛdɛdↄũpi ń Osao mɛ́ bↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ ũ.
À sa'onkia Zadoki ń a gbɛ̃ sa'onaↄ dìlɛ Dii zwã̀akpɛ kĩ́i Gabaↄ̃ↄ gulɛsĩ pↄ́ wa bòu,
kɛ́ aaliↄ sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ o Dii gbagbakĩiwa kↄↄ ń oosio, lá a ku Dii ikoyã pↄ́ a dìlɛ Isailiↄnɛ lá guuwa.
Emani ń Yedutuo kúńnↄ we ń gbɛ̃́ kĩni pↄ́ wà ń tↄ́ sì wà ń sɛ́ↄ, kɛ́ aaↄ Dii sáaukpa, asa aà gbɛ̃kɛ láaa vĩo.
Kã̀aeↄ ń sɛ̃́sɛ̃naↄ ń pↄ́'ↄbↄn pãleↄ dɛ Emani ń Yedutupio yã́ ũɛ, kɛ́ wàli lɛsiò Luaɛ. Yedutupi nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ mɛ́ bↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ ũ.
Kɛ́ baade tà a bɛ, ↄ̃ Davidi ɛ̀a tà à samaa'ò a uadeↄnɛ.
Kɛ́ kí zↄ̃̀lɛ a bɛ, a ò ãnabi Natãɛ: Ée! Kpɛ́ pↄ́ wa dↄ̀ ń sɛdɛ lío ↄ̃ máↄ zↄ̃lɛu, Dii bàakuawanↄ kpagolo iↄ dilɛa zwã̀akpɛua?
Natã wèwà à mɛ̀: Lá à n pↄ gbàn kɛ, asa Lua kunnↄɛ.
Gwãasĩna bee Dii yã'ò Natãɛ à mɛ̀:
Gɛ ǹ o ma zↄ̀blena Davidiɛ ma mɛ̀ ↄ̃mɛ a bɛ pↄ́ máↄ ku a guu kpamɛɛo.
Za gↄↄ pↄ́ ma bↄ ń Isailiↄ Egipi e gbã mi bɛkpao. Miↄ sↄ̃kĩikpakpaɛ, zwã̀akpɛ mɛ́ ma zↄ̃lɛkĩi ũ.
Gu pↄ́ ma sↄ̃kĩikpàu ń ma gbɛ̃́ Isailiↄ píi mi dↄaanaↄ dilɛ aa dↄaanɛ́ɛ, kási mi o ń gbɛ̃eɛ, bↄ́yãi i kpɛdↄmɛɛ ń sɛdɛ líoo nio.
Gɛ ǹ o ma zↄ̀blena Davidipiɛ, ma Dii Zĩgↄ̃de ma mɛ̀ ma aà sɛ̀ sãdãdãkĩi, kɛ́ aàↄ dɛ ma gbɛ̃́ Isailiↄ dↄaana ũɛ.
Gu pↄ́ à gɛ̀u píi miↄ kuaànↄɛ, ↄ̃ ma aà ibɛɛↄ dɛ̀dɛɛ̀. Má aà tↄbↄ maamaa saɛ, iↄ dɛ dṹnia tↄdeↄ do ũ.
Ma bùsu kpà ma gbɛ̃́ Isailiↄwa ma ń kálɛu, ↄ̃ aa zↄ̃̀lɛu aa gↄ̃̀ vĩ. Aa sↄ̃̀deedeekɛ lↄo. Gbɛ̃vãiↄ e ń wɛtã lá aa ń wɛtã̀ káau
gↄↄ pↄ́ ma dↄaanaↄ dìlɛnɛ́wa lↄo. Má aà ibɛɛpiↄ busaɛ̀ píiɛ. Ma Dii málɛ oɛ̀, mámɛ má bɛkpaɛ̀ aà buiↄ gbãa'ekĩi ũ.
Tó aà gↄↄ pà à gà, má aà nɛgↄ̃ɛ mɛ̀ndo sɛ lɛsĩɛ, mí aà kpa kpalau.
Aàpi mɛ́ a kpɛdↄmɛɛ, iↄ ku kpalau e gↄↄpii.
Mámɛ máↄ dɛ aà mae ũ, aàpi iↄ dɛ ma nɛ́ ũ. Má gbɛ̃kɛ bↄaaaànↄ lá má bↄ̀aa ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú aà ãawao.
Má aà buipi kpa kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ ma kĩ́iu, iↄ ku we e gↄↄpii, iↄ dɛ ma gbɛ̃́ↄ kía ũ, mɛ́ aà kpalapi aↄ láaa vĩo.
Ɔ̃ Natã yã́pi dàu a sìu Davidiɛ lá Dii òɛwa píi.
Ɔ̃ kí Davidi gɛ̃̀ zↄ̃̀lɛ Dii aɛ à mɛ̀: Dii Lua, bↄ́n ma ũi? Deↄn ma bɛdeↄ ũ ↄ̃ n ma ka gweaɛ taawai?
Lua, bee kɛ̀nɛ fɛ̃́nɛũ e tia, ↄ̃ n mapi n zↄ̀blena bui pↄ́ aↄ ku zia yã'ò lↄ. Dii Lua, ↄ̃ n ma dilɛ lándↄ̃ má dɛ gbɛ̃́piilawaa?
Dii Lua, kpelewa má o sa mapi n zↄ̀blena kã́fĩa yã́ musu lↄi? Ń ma dↄ̃.
Dii, n yãzↄ̃ↄpi kɛ̀ lá ń yeiwa ma yã́iɛ, ↄ̃ ń tò mapi n zↄ̀blena má yãzↄ̃ↄpiↄ dↄ̃ píi.
Dii, gbɛ̃e muaannↄo. Diie kuo, n bàasio, lá wá màwa.
Démɛ muaa ń n gbɛ̃́ Isailiↄi? Dṹnia buiↄ guu bui mɛ̀ndopi ↄ̃ ń bò n gbɛ̃́ↄ ũ. N nzĩa tↄbↄ̀, n yãzↄ̃ↄ bↄnsaɛↄ kɛ̀ n gbɛ̃́piↄnɛ, n buieↄ yà n gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ n ń bó Egipiↄnɛ.
N Isailiↄ dìlɛ aaↄ dɛ n gbɛ̃́ↄ ũ e gↄↄpiiɛ. Dii, n gↄ̃ ń Lua ũ.
Dii, to lɛ́ pↄ́ ń gbɛ̃̀ mapi n zↄ̀blena ń ma buiↄ yã́ musu àↄ ku gↄↄpii. Kɛ lá ń òwa,
ní tↄbↄ maamaa e gↄↄpii, wi mɛ Dii Zĩgↄ̃deá Isailiↄ Luaɛ, mɛ́ mapi n zↄ̀blena Davidi, ńyↄ̃ ma buiↄ zĩ́napɛlɛ,
asa mpi ma Lua, ń òmɛɛ n mɛ̀ ńyↄ̃ bɛkpamɛɛ ma buiↄ gbãa'ekĩi ũɛ. A yã́i tò mapi n zↄ̀blena ma sↄ̃dìlɛ ma wabiɛ bee kɛ̀ma.
Dii, ḿmɛnn Lua, ↄ̃ n yãmaapi ò mapi n zↄ̀blenaɛ.
Báaada mapi n zↄ̀blena ma buiↄgu sa, níↄ wɛ́tɛńzi gↄↄpii. Dii, ḿmɛ n báaadàńgu, aaↄ báaa vĩ e gↄↄpiiɛ.
Bee gbɛa Davidi zĩblè Filitɛ̃ↄwa, à ń busa à Gata ń a wɛ̃́lɛↄ sìmá.
À zĩblè Mↄabuↄwa, ↄ̃ aa gↄ̃̀ aà zↄ̀blenaↄ ũ, aaiↄ falubↄɛ̀.
Davidi zĩblè Zoba kí Adadɛzɛɛwa Amata gↄↄ pↄ́ à ɛ̀a lɛ́ gɛ́ ↄtↄ̃i Uflata swasaɛdeↄwa.
À aà sↄ̃́goↄ kũ̀kũ mɛ̀n ↄ̀aa sↄo (1.000) ń sↄ̃́godeↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ sopla (7.000) ń kɛ̀sɛdeↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bao (20.000). À ń sↄ̃́ↄ kĩzã zↄ̃̀zↄ̃ píi, mɛ̀n basↄo mɛ́ è bↄ̀.
Kɛ́ Sili pↄ́ kú Damasi bùsuuↄ mↄ̀ dↄi Adadɛzɛɛlɛ, ↄ̃ Davidi ń gbɛ̃́ↄ dɛ̀dɛ ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bao ń plao (22.000).
À gudↄ̃anaↄ dìlɛdilɛ Sili bùsuu, ↄ̃ aa gↄ̃̀ aà zↄ̀blenaↄ ũ, aaiↄ falubↄɛ̀. Dii tò Davidi zĩblè gu pↄ́ à gɛ̀u píiɛ.
Davidi vua sɛ̀ngbao pↄ́ Adadɛzɛɛ ìwaↄ kũaↄ sɛ̀lɛ tàò Yelusalɛũ.
À mↄgotɛ̃ sɛ̀lɛ zↄ̃ↄzↄ̃ↄ Adadɛzɛɛ wɛ̃́lɛ Teba ń Kunio guu. Salomↄↄ íkakĩi pìò ń mↄ̀pɛlɛↄ ń Lua kpɛ́ pↄ́ↄ.
Kɛ́ Amata kí Tou mà Davidi zĩblè Zoba kí Adadɛzɛɛ zĩgↄ̃ↄwa píi,
ↄ̃ à a nɛ́ Adolaũ zĩ̀ fↄkpaiwà. À aà sáaukpà zĩ pↄ́ a blè Adadɛzɛɛwa yã́i, asa Tou zĩkàaànↄ yãaɛ. Ɔ̃ Adolaũpi mↄ̀ ń vua pↄ́ↄ ń ã́nusu pↄ́ↄ ń mↄgotɛ̃ pↄ́ↄ,
ↄ̃ kí Davidi dìlɛ Dii pↄ́ ũ, lá a kɛ̀ ń buipãle pↄ́ à gbãablèmáↄ ã́nusuↄ ń vuaↄwa píi, Ɛdↄũↄ ń Mↄabuↄ ń Amↄniↄ ń Filitɛ̃ↄ ń Amalɛki buiↄ.
Zeluia nɛ́ Abisai Ɛdↄũↄ dɛ̀dɛ Guzulɛ Wisideu gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bao plasai (18.000).
À gudↄ̃anaↄ dìlɛdilɛ Ɛdↄũ bùsuu lↄ, ↄ̃ Ɛdↄũↄ gↄ̃̀ aà zↄ̀blenaↄ ũ. Dii tò Davidi zĩblè gu pↄ́ à gɛ̀u píiɛ.
Davidi mɛ́ Isaili bui píi kía ũ, à yãmaa gↄ̃̀gↄ̃ a gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ a zɛ́wa.
Zeluia nɛ́ Yoabu mɛ́ aà zĩgↄ̃ↄ dↄaana ũ. Ailudi nɛ́ Yosafa mɛ́ aà kpàwakɛna ũ.
Aitubu nɛ́ Zadoki ń Abiataa nɛ́ Aimɛlɛkio mɛ́ sa'onkiaↄ ũ. Selaia mɛ́ aà lakɛ̃na ũ.
Yoiada nɛ́ Benaia mɛ́ aà dↄaiↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ. Davidipi nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ mɛ́ aà kwàasiↄ ũ aà saɛ.
Bee gbɛa kɛ́ Amↄniↄ kí Naasa gà, ↄ̃ aà nɛ́ zↄ̃̀lɛ aà gbɛu.
Davidi mɛ̀: Má gbɛ̃kɛkɛ Naasa nɛ́ Anuniɛɛ, kɛ́ aà mae gbɛ̃kɛkɛ̀mɛɛ yãa yã́i. Ɔ̃ Davidi a ìwaeↄ zĩ̀ aa gɛ́ Amↄni bùsuu aa aà nↄ̀sɛ níniɛ̀ aà mae gaa yã́ musu. Kɛ́ Davidi ìwapiↄ kà Anuni kĩ́i we aa aà nↄ̀sɛ níniɛ̀,
ↄ̃ Amↄni kíaↄ ò Anuniɛ: Ńlɛ e Davidi gbɛ̃́ↄ zĩ̀ n mae gɛ̀ kpɛlaa yã́i aà n nↄ̀sɛ níninɛ nɛe? Aa mↄ̀ wá bùsu asiigwaiɛ, aai ɛa mↄ lɛ́lɛwá.
Ɔ̃ Anuni Davidi ìwapiↄ kũ̀kũ à ń lɛkãna wà, à ń pↄkasaↄ zↄ̃̀ɛzↄ̃ɛ a guo an zí lɛ́u, ↄ̃ à ń gbáɛ.
Kɛ́ wà mↄ̀ wa ò Davidiɛ, ↄ̃ à gbɛ̃́ↄ zĩ̀ aa gɛ́ daińlɛ, asa wí ń kṹ maamaaɛ. Aa ònɛ́: Kí mɛ̀ à zↄ̃lɛ Yeliko e á lɛkãna kã́ bↄlɛ, í gbasa su.
Kɛ́ Anuni ń Amↄniↄ píi è Davidi ye ń gĩyãi lↄo, ↄ̃ aa gbɛ̃́ↄ zĩ̀ Mɛsↄpↄtami bùsuu ń Maaka bùsuo ń Zoba bùsuo ń ã́nusuo tↄnu bla sↄosai, aa fĩaboò zĩkasↄ̃goↄ yã́i.
Ɔ̃ aa fĩabò sↄ̃́go mɛ̀n ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ baakwi ń plao (32.000) ń ń diiↄ yã́ musu. Aa fĩabò Maaka kíaɛ ń a zĩgↄ̃ↄ lↄ. Aa mↄ̀ bòokpà Mɛdeba saɛ, ↄ̃ wà Amↄniↄ kã̀aa wɛ̃́lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛo, aa gɛ̀ zĩlau.
Kɛ́ Davidi a baomà, ↄ̃ à Yoabu zĩ̀ ń zĩgↄ̃ↄ píi.
Amↄniↄ bↄ̀ zĩ'ↄpòo ń wɛ̃́lɛ bĩ́ibↄlɛu mɛ́ kía pↄ́ mↄ̀piↄ ku sɛ̃u ńtɛ̃ɛ.
Kɛ́ Yoabu è wà zĩ'ↄpòo a aɛ ń a kpɛo, ↄ̃ à Isaili zĩgↄ̃ maaↄ plɛ̀ à ń kálɛ aa gɛ́ lɛ́lɛiɛ Siliↄwa.
À zĩgↄ̃ kĩniↄ nà a dãuna Abisaiɛ a ↄzĩ, à ń kálɛ aa gɛ́ lɛ́lɛi Amↄniↄwa
à mɛ̀: Tó Siliↄ gbãa sù lɛ́ ma fu, mↄ dↄmalɛ. Tó Amↄni buiↄ gbãa mɛ́ sù lɛ́ n fu sↄ̃, má mↄ́ dↄnlɛ.
À sↄ̃dilɛ! Wà gↄ̃ɛkɛ kɛ wá gbɛ̃́ↄ ń wá Dii wɛ̃́lɛↄ yã́ musu. Dii a yã́ pↄ́ kɛ̀ɛ maa kɛ.
Ɔ̃ Yoabu ń zĩgↄ̃ pↄ́ kuanↄↄ gɛ̀ lɛ́ zĩka ń Siliↄ, ↄ̃ Siliↄ bàalɛ̀nɛ́.
Kɛ́ Amↄniↄ è Siliↄ bàalɛ̀, ↄ̃ aa bàalɛ̀ Abisaiɛ sↄ̃, aa sì wɛ̃́lɛ guu, ↄ̃ Yoabu tà Yelusalɛũ.
Kɛ́ Siliↄ è Isailiↄ zĩblèmá, ↄ̃ aa gbɛ̃́ↄ zĩ̀ Uflata baa, aa gɛ̀ ń gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ nàaa sùńnↄ. Adadɛzɛɛ zĩgↄ̃ↄ dↄaana Sofaki mɛ́ dↄaaa.
Kɛ́ Davidi a baomà, à Isailiↄ kã̀aa píi, ↄ̃ à bùańnↄ Yuudɛ̃wa. Davidi gɛ̀ Siliↄ kĩ́i, à zĩ'ↄpòońzi, ↄ̃ aa sìkↄ̃u.
Aalɛ bàalɛ Isailiↄnɛ, ↄ̃ Davidi ń dɛdɛ sↄ̃́godeↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ sopla (7.000) ń kɛ̀sɛdeↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bla (40.000). We wà ń zĩgↄ̃ↄ dↄaana Sofaki dɛ̀u.
Kɛ́ Adadɛzɛɛ zↄ̀blenaↄ è Isailiↄ zĩblèmá màa, ↄ̃ aa lɛdoũkɛ̀ ń Davidio, aa gↄ̃̀ aà zↄ̀blenaↄ ũ. Ɔ̃ Siliↄ i we dↄ̀ Amↄniↄlɛ lↄo.
Kɛ́ í bↄ̀ ɛu, gↄↄ pↄ́ kíaↄ ì gɛ́ zĩkai, ↄ̃ Yoabu dↄ̀aa zĩgↄ̃ↄnɛ zĩlau. À Amↄni bùsu ásookɛ̀, ↄ̃ à gɛ̀ koezↄ̃̀ Labazi. Gↄↄ bee Davidi ku Yelusalɛũ. Ɔ̃ Yoabu lɛ̀lɛ Labawa a gbòo.
Ɔ̃ Davidi mↄ̀ ń kía vua fùa gò aà miwa. A gbia kà kiloo baakwi, mɛ́ gbɛ̀ bɛɛɛde kuwà. Ɔ̃ wa kpà Davidiɛ. À wɛ̃́lɛpi pↄ́ↄ nàaa dúuduuɛ,
ↄ̃ à gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú weↄ kũ̀kũ bↄ̀lɛńnↄ, à ń dá síi zĩu ń dúuduusu zĩo ń mↄo zĩo. Màa à kɛ̀ Amↄni wɛ̃́lɛↄnɛ píi, ↄ̃ à ɛ̀a tà Yelusalɛũ ń a zĩgↄ̃ↄ píi.
Bee gbɛa kɛ́ zĩ̀ fɛ̀lɛ ń Filitɛ̃ↄ Gɛzɛɛ, Usa gbɛ̃́ Sibekai mɛ́ gbɛ̃́ gbã̀a bui pↄ́ wì mɛ Sipai dɛ̀, ↄ̃ Isailiↄ gbãablè Filitɛ̃ↄwa.
Kɛ́ zĩ̀ ɛ̀a fɛ̀lɛ ń Filitɛ̃ↄ lↄ, Yaii nɛ́ Ɛlana mɛ́ Gata gbɛ̃́ Goliati dãuna Lami dɛ̀. Lami sↄ̃mpa dɛ lán zwã̀atãna àsaliwaɛ.
Aalɛ zĩkańnↄ Gata lↄ. Gↄ̃sa tìisie ku we, aà ↄnɛↄ soolosooloɛ, mɛ́ aà gbánɛↄ soolosoolo, apii kɛ̀ baasↄo mɛ̀ndosai, mɛ́ gbɛ̃́ gbã̀a buiɛ lↄ.
À kuabìi Isailiↄwa, ↄ̃ Davidi vĩ̀i Simɛa nɛ́ Yonatãa aà dɛ̀.
Gbɛ̃́piↄá Gata gbɛ̃́ gbã̀a buiↄnɛ. Davidi ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ mɛ́ ń dɛdɛ.
Setãu fɛ̀lɛ Isailiↄwa, ↄ̃ à kↄ̃nikɛ̀ Davidiɛ aà Isailiↄ nao.
Ɔ̃ Davidi ò Yoabuɛ ń zĩgↄ̃ dↄaanaↄ: À gɛ Isailiↄ nao za Bɛɛsɛba e à gɛ pɛò Dãwa, í ɛa su ma kĩ́i, kɛ́ mà e ń dasilɛ dↄ̃.
Ɔ̃ Yoabu wèwà à mɛ̀: Dii a gbɛ̃́ↄ kↄ̃nɛ lɛɛ basↄo! Ma dii kí, má dↄ̃ n gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ píi. Àkɛa ń ye kɛ màai? Bↄ́yãi ń ye yã'i Isailiↄnɛi?
Ń beeo kí yã́ Yoabu blè, ↄ̃ à bↄ̀ gɛ̀ Isaili bùsu kɛ̀ɛlɛ, à ɛ̀a sù Yelusalɛũ.
Ɔ̃ Yoabu gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a ń naoↄ lɛ́ ò Davidiɛ. Isaili bùsu guu píi gↄ̃ɛ pↄ́ aa fɛ̃nda dↄ̃ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn miliↄ̃ do ń ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ basↄooɛ (1.100.000). Yudaↄ sↄ̃ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ ↄ̀aa pla ń bàaↄ̃kwioɛ (470.000).
Yoabu i Levii buiↄ ń Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ buiↄ da nao guuo, asa yã́ pↄ́ kí dàɛpi i kaaàguo.
Yã́ pↄ́ Davidi kɛ̀pi kɛ̀ Luaɛ ĩ́i, ↄ̃ à ↄtↄ̃̀ Isailiↄwa.
Ɔ̃ Davidi ò Luaɛ: Ma duunakɛ̀ maamaa yã́pi kɛa guu. Mapi n zↄ̀blena, ma tàae kɛ̃a sa, asa ma sↄũyã kɛ̀ɛ.
Dii yã'ò Davidi gu'ena Gadaɛ à mɛ̀:
Gɛ ǹ o Davidiɛ ma mɛ̀ má yã́ mɛ̀n àaↄ̃ kpaaĩɛ̀. Aà yã́ mɛ̀ndo sɛ a guu, mí kɛɛ̀.
Ɔ̃ Gada gɛ̀ Davidi lè a òɛ̀: Dii mɛ̀ yã́ɛ beeↄ do gwa ǹ sɛ́.
Imina wɛ̃̀ àaↄ̃ ge bàalɛa n ibɛɛↄnɛ á dɛdɛa ń fɛ̃ndao mↄ àaↄ̃ ge Dii Malaika gagyãkaa Isaili bùsu gupiiu gↄↄ àaↄ̃ Dii fɛ̃nda ũ. A kpele ń sɛ̀i? Gwa ǹ sɛ́, mí dↄ̃ lá má gɛ́ o ma Zĩnaɛ.
Ɔ̃ Davidi ò Gadaɛ: Má kú yeelɛa zↄ̃ↄ guuɛ. Má sì wà lɛ́lɛ da Dii ↄzĩ, asa a sósobi vĩ maamaaɛ. Asu to mà lɛ́lɛ da gbɛ̃nazĩna ↄzĩo.
Ɔ̃ Dii gagyãkà Isailiↄgu, ↄ̃ Isailiↄ gàga gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bàaↄ̃kwi (70.000).
Ɔ̃ Lua malaikae zĩ̀ aà gɛ́ yã́yiai Yelusalɛũdeↄwa. Gↄↄ pↄ́ àlɛ ń dɛdɛ, ↄ̃ Dii a nↄ̀sɛ suumpà an dɛdɛapi yã́ musu, ↄ̃ a ò malaika pↄ́ lɛ́ ń dɛdɛpiɛ: Zɛ màa! Ǹ n ↄ sↄaa sa. Yebusi bui Alauna pↄ́wɛngbɛ̃zɛa ↄ̃ Dii Malaikapi kuu.
Kɛ́ Davidi wɛzù, ↄ̃ à malaikapi è zɛa gugbↄ̃u a musu yã́io a zĩ́lɛ yã́io, à a fɛ̃nda ↄ pooa Yelusalɛũa. Ɔ̃ Davidi ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ wùlɛ ń gbɛɛu zwã̀nkasaↄ kákaańla.
Ɔ̃ Davidi ò Luaɛ: Mámɛ má ò wà gbɛ̃́ↄ nao. Mámɛ ma duunapi kɛ̀ ma tàaekɛ̀. Gbɛ̃́piↄá ma kpàsa sãↄnɛ. Aai yãe kɛo. Dii ma Lua, to n ↄ sua ń ma de bɛdeↄ. Ńsu ǹ n gbɛ̃́ↄ dɛdɛ ń gagyãpioo.
Ɔ̃ Dii Malaikapi ò Gadaɛ aà o Davidiɛ aà gɛ́ Dii gbagbakĩi boi Yebusi bui Alauna pↄ́wɛngbɛ̃zɛu.
Ɔ̃ Davidi gɛ̀ lá Gada òɛ ń Dii tↄ́o kɛi.
Alauna lɛ́ ése gbɛ̃. Kɛ́ à lìli, à malaikapi è. Aà nɛ́ gbɛ̃ↄn síiↄ̃ pↄ́ kuaànↄↄ bↄ̀zã.
Kɛ́ Alauna gugwà, a è Davidi lɛ́ mↄ́ a kĩ́i, ↄ̃ à bↄ̀ pↄ́wɛngbɛ̃zɛa, à gɛ̀ kùlɛ Davidiɛ à wùlɛ a gbɛɛu.
Ɔ̃ Davidi òɛ̀: Ǹ n pↄ́wɛngbɛ̃zɛ yíaa mà Dii gbagbakĩi bou, kɛ́ gagyãpi e go gbɛ̃́ↄla. Yíaa a ↄ̃awa.
Ɔ̃ Alauna ò Davidiɛ: Sɛ́! Ma dii kí, lá à kɛ̀nɛ maa, kɛò. Gwa, má zuↄ kpa sa'obↄ ũ ń pↄ́wɛngbɛ̃goↄ yàa ũ ń éseo pↄ́wɛn gba ũ. Má n gba píiɛ.
Ɔ̃ kí Davidi òɛ̀: Aawo! Má lúmáɛ, mí a fĩabonɛ píi. Má pↄ́ pↄ́ dɛ n pↄ́ ũ sɛ mà kpa Diiwao. Má sa'oowà pã fĩabosaio.
Ɔ̃ à pↄ́wɛngbɛ̃zɛpi lùwà vua ↄwatɛ̃ mɛ̀n ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃.
À Dii gbagbakĩi bò we, ↄ̃ à sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ òwà ń sáaukpasao. Kɛ́ à lɛzù Diizi, ↄ̃ Dii wèwà à tɛ́ gbàɛ za musu, à sù gbagbakĩipiwa.
Dii yã'ò malaikapiɛ, ↄ̃ à a fɛ̃nda sↄ̀lↄ a kpɛ́u.
Kɛ́ Davidi è Dii sìanↄ Yebusi bui Alauna pↄ́wɛngbɛ̃zɛa, ↄ̃ à ɛ̀a sa'òwà we lↄ.
Gↄↄ bee Dii zwã̀akpɛ pↄ́ Mↄizi kɛ̀ guwaiwaiu ń a gbagbakĩio ku Gabaↄ̃ↄ gulɛsĩ pↄ́ wa bòu.
Davidi lí fↄ̃ gɛ̀ yãgbɛai Diiwa weo, asa àlɛ vĩakɛ Dii malaika fɛ̃ndaɛɛ.
Ɔ̃ Davidi mɛ̀: Lakĩi Dii Lua kpɛ́ aↄ kuu ń sa pↄ́ Isailiↄ ì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ okĩio.
Davidi ò wà bↄ̀mↄ pↄ́ kú Isaili bùsuuↄ kãaa píi, ↄ̃ à ń gbɛ̃eↄ dìlɛ gbɛ̀'ãnaↄ ũ aa gbɛↄ ã wà Lua kpɛ́ boò.
À mↄ kpà siaↄwa maamaa aa kusaↄ ń sanɛɛↄ kɛò gãmↄↄ ń bↄlɛↄ pↄ́ ũ. Mↄgotɛ̃ pↄ́ a kpà sↄ̃, à gɛ̃̀ oaa.
Sɛdɛ lí pↄ́ a kpàↄ dasi, wa a lɛ́ dↄ̃o, asa Sidↄ̃deↄ ń Tiideↄ mↄ̀ɛ̀ ń sɛdɛ líↄ à kɛ̀ zài.
Davidi mɛ̀: Ma nɛ́ Salomↄↄá ɛ̀waasonaɛ, a yãe yáasi dↄ̃ gĩao. À kũ̀ kpɛ́ pↄ́ wa dↄ Diiɛ aↄ zↄ̃ↄɛ, i ɛa aↄ kɛfɛũ lↄ maamaa, gbɛ̃́pii i a maabo. A yã́i tò málɛ a dↄa sↄukɛ. Ɔ̃ Davidi kpɛ́pi dↄa sↄukɛ̀ maamaa e àↄ gɛ́ gai.
Ɔ̃ à a nɛ́ Salomↄↄ sìsi, a òɛ̀ aà kpɛdↄ Dii Isailiↄ Luaɛ.
A òɛ̀: Ma nɛ́, ma zɛò ma sↄ̃ guu mà kpɛdↄ Dii ma Luaɛ, aà tↄ́ iↄ kuwà.
Ɔ̃ Dii yã'òmɛɛ à mɛ̀ ma gbɛ̃dɛ̀dɛ dasi zĩ pↄ́ má kàↄ guu. Má e kpɛ́pi dↄɛo gbɛ̃́ dasi pↄ́ ma ń dɛdɛ a aɛ yã́i.
À mɛ̀ nɛ́ pↄ́ má i mɛ́ aↄ dɛ aafia gbɛ̃́ ũ, asa á tó aà kã́mabo aà ibɛɛ pↄ́ liaiↄ yã́ musuɛ. Wa tↄ́kpa nɛ́piɛ Salomↄↄ. À mɛ̀ á tó Isailiↄ kua àↄ na kílikili aà gↄↄɛ.
Aàpi mɛ́ a kpɛdↄɛ, iↄ dɛ a nɛ́ ũ, íↄ dɛ aà mae ũ. Á aà zↄ̃lɛa kpalau Isailiↄ guu zɛdↄ, aà kpala aↄ láaa vĩo.
Tia sↄ̃ ma nɛ́, Dii aↄ kunnↄ, i n daɛ ń gòmio, ní kpɛdↄ Dii n Luapiɛ, lá a ò n yã́ musuwa.
Dii n gba ↄ̃nↄ ń wɛzɛ̃o gↄↄ pↄ́ a n dilɛ Isailiↄnɛ, kɛ́ ǹyↄ̃ aà ikoyã kũa.
Tó ń ikoyã pↄ́ Dii dà Mↄiziɛ a dìlɛ Isailiↄnɛ kũa, mɛ́ ńlɛ aà ↄtondↄkĩi gwa, ńyↄ̃ kã́fĩa e. Sↄ̃dilɛ, níↄ wↄ́ↄ vĩ. Ńsu to vĩa n kũo. Ńsu to sↄ̃ kɛ̃nguo.
Ma dɛ̃ɛkà ma vua kàlɛ Dii kpɛ́ pↄ́ ũ tↄnu ↄ̀aa gɛ̃o ń plao, ã́nusu sↄ̃ tↄnu ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ baakwi ń síiↄ̃o. Mↄ́ ń mↄgotɛ̃o sↄ̃, wa a lɛ́ dↄ̃o, a gbia kɛ̀ zài. Ma lí ń gbɛo kàlɛ we lↄ. Pↄ́piↄ kã́fĩ lↄ.
Ń zĩkɛnaↄ vĩ dasi, gbɛ̀'ãnaↄ ń li'ãnaↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gↄ̃i vĩ ↄzĩ píi guuↄ,
vua zĩ, ã́nusu zĩ, mↄgotɛ̃ zĩ ń mↄsi zĩo. N ↄzĩkɛnaↄ lɛ́ vĩo. Na zĩpiwa! Dii aↄ kunnↄ!
Ɔ̃ Davidi ò Isaili kíaↄnɛ aa mↄ dↄ a nɛ́ Salomↄↄlɛ
à mɛ̀: Dii á Lua kúánↄo lé? I á gba ĩ́ampakĩi gupiiuo lé? À gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú bùsuɛ beeu za káauↄ nàmɛɛ ma ↄzĩɛ, ↄ̃ bùsupi gↄ̃̀ Diipi ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ pↄ́ ũ sa.
À Dii á Lua kĩ́i wɛɛlɛ teasisai ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo sa, í na Dii Lua kúkĩi boawa, í su ń Dii bàakuaánↄ kpagoloo ń aà pↄ́ keleↄ kpɛ́ pↄ́ álɛ dↄɛ̀, aà tↄ́ iↄ kuwàpi guu.
Kɛ́ Davidi zikũ̀ táotao, ↄ̃ à Salomↄↄ kpà Isailiↄ kía ũ.
Davidi Isaili kíaↄ kã̀aa ń sa'onaↄ ń Levii buiↄ píi.
Wà Levii bui gↄ̃ɛ pↄ́ kà wɛ̃̀ baakwi ge aa dɛaↄ nào, aa gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bla plasaiɛ (38.000).
Ɔ̃ Davidi gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ baasↄo mɛ̀ndosaiↄ (24.000) dìlɛ aaↄ wɛ́tɛ Dii ua yã́ↄi, à gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ sooloↄ (6.000) dìlɛ lakɛ̃naↄ ń yãgↄ̃gↄ̃naↄ ũ.
Ɔ̃ à gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ síiↄ̃ↄ (4.000) dìlɛ bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ ũ, mɛ́ à gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ síiↄ̃ↄ (4.000) dìlɛ Dii táasilɛnaↄ ũ, aaliↄ aà táasilɛ ń pↄ́'ↄbↄna pↄ́ Davidi kpàↄ.
Davidi ń kpaalɛ̀ ń buiↄwa gã ń gão, Geesↄ̃ buiↄ, Kɛata buiↄ ń Mɛlali buiↄ.
Geesↄ̃ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Ladã ń Simɛio ũ.
Ladã nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ àaↄ̃ɛ: A sɛ̃́ia Yeiɛli, a gbɛa Zetaũ ń Yoɛlio.
Simɛi nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ àaↄ̃ɛ: Selomↄ, Haziɛli ń Halanao. Ladã bui uabele káauↄn we.
Simɛi nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ síiↄ̃ɛ: Yaata, Ziza, Yeusi ń Bɛliao.
A sɛ̃́ia Yaata, a plaade Ziza. Yeusi ń Bɛliao buiↄ dasio, ↄ̃ wà ń dílɛ bui doũ zĩ doũ guu.
Kɛata nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ síiↄ̃ɛ: Amlaũ, Isaa, Hɛblↄ̃ ń Uziɛlio.
Amlaũ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Aalona ń Mↄizio ũ. Wà Aalona ń a buiↄ dìlɛ ń zɛ́i, aaↄ laaidↄ Lua pↄ́ↄwa, aaↄ Luapi gbagba, aaↄ tulaletikatɛaɛ̀, aaↄ zĩkɛ aà kúkĩi, aaↄ samaa'o gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ ń aà tↄ́o gↄↄpii.
Wà Lua gbɛ̃́ Mↄizi buiↄ dìlɛ lán Levii bui kĩniↄwa.
Mↄizi nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Geesoũ ń Ɛliɛzɛɛo ũ.
Geesoũ nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́ian Sebuɛli ũ.
Ɛliɛzɛɛ nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́ian Lɛabia ũ. I nɛgↄ̃ɛe i lↄo, ãma Lɛabiapi nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ ì dasi maamaaɛ.
Isaa nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́ian Selomi ũ.
Hɛblↄ̃ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: A sɛ̃́ia Yelia, a plaade Amalia, a àaↄ̃de Yaaziɛ, a síiↄ̃de Yekamaũ.
Uziɛli nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: A sɛ̃́ia Mika, a plaade Isia.
Mɛlali nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Mali ń Musio ũ. Mali nɛgↄ̃ɛↄn Ɛleazaa ń Kisio ũ.
Ɛleazaa gà nɛgↄ̃ɛsaiɛ, nɛnↄɛↄ a ì tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ. An desɛ̃ Kisi nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ mɛ́ ń sɛsɛ.
Musi nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ àaↄ̃ɛ: Mali ń Edɛɛo ń Yelemↄo.
Levii buiↄn we sɛa an dezi pↄ́ dɛ uabele káau ũↄwa. Lua ua zĩkɛna pↄ́ kà wɛ̃̀ bao ge aa dɛaↄ, wà ń baade tↄ́ dàlau an buipiↄwaɛ.
Davidi mɛ̀: Lá Dii Isailiↄ Lua a gbɛ̃́ↄ gbà ĩ́ampakĩi mɛ́ à sù Yelusalɛũ àↄ ku we gↄↄpiiɛ,
Levii buiↄ zwã̀akpɛ ń a zĩkɛbↄↄ sɛ táa'oò lↄo.
Yã́ pↄ́ Davidi ò gbɛzã yã́i ↄ̃ wì Levii bui pↄ́ kà wɛ̃̀ bao ge aa dɛaↄ naoi.
Levii buipiↄ líↄ dↄ Aalona buiↄlɛ ń Dii ua zĩo. Aaliↄ wɛ́tɛ Lua uai ń a kpɛ́ↄ ń gbãbↄa Lua pↄ́ↄnɛↄ ń zĩ pↄ́ wì kɛ weo
ń pɛ̃ɛ pↄ́ wì kpa Luawao ń pↄ́wɛnti gbao ń kàawanao ń a totoao ń a zaao ń a zↄ̃ↄ lɛ́o.
Aaliↄ Dii sáaukpa ń aà táasilɛao kↄↄ ń oosio
ń gↄↄ pↄ́ wàlɛ sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ o Diiwa kã́mabogↄↄzĩↄ ń mↄ gↄↄ sɛ̃́ia zĩ́ↄ ń dikpɛ pↄ́ wa dìlɛↄ. Aaliↄ zĩkɛ Diiɛ gↄↄpii màa, mɛ́ an dasi lí ká lá wa dìlɛnɛ́wa.
Ampiↄ mɛ́ aali laaidↄ kpaaũkpɛ ń a pↄkeleↄ zĩwa, mɛ́ an gbɛ̃́ Aalona buiↄ lí laaidↄ Dii kpɛ́ zĩwa.
Aalona bui gãliↄn kɛ: Aalona nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Nadabu, Abiu, Ɛleazaa ń Itamaao.
Nadabu ń Abiuo gàga ń mae wáaɛ, aai nɛgↄ̃ɛ i sↄ̃o. Ɔ̃ Ɛleazaa ń Itamaao gↄ̃̀ sa'onaↄ ũ.
Davidi ń Ɛleazaa bui Zadokio ń Itamaa bui Aimɛlɛkio sa'onaↄ kpaalɛ̀ gã ń gão, aaↄ kↄ̃ gba zɛ́ zĩ yã́ musu.
Aa dↄaanaↄ è dasi Ɛleazaa buiↄ guu dɛ Itamaa buiↄ guula, ↄ̃ aa Ɛleazaa bui uabeleↄ sɛ̀ gbɛ̃ↄn gɛ̃o ń mɛ̀ndoo, Itamaa bui uabeleↄ sↄ̃ swaaↄ̃.
Aa ń kpaalɛ̀ ń gbɛlaaoɛ an wɛgwasai, asa Ɛleazaa buieↄ ń Itamaa buieↄ dɛ Lua kpɛ́ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ń sa'onkiaↄ ũ ḿpiiɛ.
Levii bui lakɛ̃na Semaia, Nɛtanɛli nɛ́ ń tↄ́ dàlau kía ń aà ìwaɛ beeↄ wáaɛ: Sa'onkia Zadoki, Abiataa nɛ́ Aimɛlɛki, sa'ona uabeleↄ ń Levii bui uabeleↄ. Tó wà gbɛ̃́ sɛ̀ Ɛleazaa bui guu do, ↄ̃ wì sɛ Itamaa bui guu do.
Yoialibu mɛ́ sɛ̃́ia, a plaade Yedaia,
a àaↄ̃de Aliũ, a síiↄ̃de Seoliũ,
a sↄode Malakia, a soolode Miamɛ,
a soplade Akozi, a swaaↄ̃de Abia,
a kɛ̃okwide Yesua, a kwide Sekania,
a kuɛdode Ɛliasibu, a kuɛplade Yakiũ,
a kuɛ'aaↄ̃de Hupa, a gɛ̃o mɛ̀ndosaide Yɛsɛba,
a gɛ̃ode Bilega, a gɛ̃o ń mɛ̀ndoode Imɛɛ,
a gɛ̃o ń plaode Ezii, a bao plasaide Apisɛsi,
a bao mɛ̀ndosaide Petaia, a baode Yeezekɛli,
a bao ń mɛ̀ndoode Yakɛ̃, a bao ń plaode Gamulu,
a bao ń àaↄ̃ode Delaia, a baasↄo mɛ̀ndosaide Maazia.
Lá aali gɛ́ zĩkɛi Dii kpɛ́u aaↄ kↄ̃ gba zɛ́n we, lá Dii Isailiↄ Lua dà an dezi Aalonaɛ a dìlɛwa.
Levii bui kĩniↄn kɛ: Amlaũ bui Sebuɛli nɛ́ Yedeia.
Lɛabia yoa Isia.
Isaa bui Selomↄ nɛ́ Yaata.
Hɛblↄ̃ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Yelia, Amalia, Yaaziɛ ń Yekamaũo.
Uziɛli bui Mika nɛ́ Samii.
Mika dãuna Isia nɛ́ Zakali.
Mɛlali nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ Mali ń Musio.
Mɛlali bui Yaazia nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Bɛnↄ, Soaũ, Zakuu ń Ibelio.
Mali nɛ́ Ɛleazaa i nɛgↄ̃ɛ io.
Mali nɛ́ Kisi bui Yelamɛli.
Musi nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Mali, Edɛɛ ń Yelimↄo. Levii buiↄn we an dezi buiↄwa.
Ampiↄ sↄ̃ aa gbɛlà lá an gbɛ̃́ Aalona buiↄ kɛ̀wa kí Davidi ń Zadokio ń Aimɛlɛkio ń sa'ona uabeleↄ ń Levii bui uabeleↄ wáaɛ. Vĩ̀i buiↄ ń dãuna buiↄ, yã́ doũ wa kɛ̀nɛ́.
Davidi ń Isaili kíaↄ mɛ́ Asafa nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ ń Emani nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ ń Yedutu nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ dìlɛ ń zɛ́i aa ãnabikɛkɛ ń mↄↄnaↄ ń domaↄ ń sɛ̃́sɛ̃naↄ. Zĩpikɛnaↄ tↄ́n kɛ:
Asafa nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Zakuu, Yosɛfu, Nɛtania ń Asalɛlao. Asafa mɛ́ aↄ wɛ́tɛ a nɛ́piↄzi, kía sↄ̃ iↄ wɛ́tɛ ń ãnabikɛkɛai.
Yedutu nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ sooloɛ: Gedalia, Zeli, Yesaia, Simɛi, Asabia ń Matitiao. An mae Yedutu mɛ́ ìↄ wɛ́tɛńzi, ↄ̃ ìↄ ãnabikɛkɛ ń mↄↄnlɛao, ìↄ Dii sáau kpa àↄ aà táasilɛò.
Emani nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Bukia, Matania, Uziɛli, Sebuɛli, Yelemↄ, Anania, Anani, Ɛliata, Gidaleti, Lomantiɛzɛɛ, Maloti, Yↄsebekasa, Otii ń Maazioo.
Gbɛ̃́piↄá kí gu'ena Emani nɛgↄ̃ɛↄnɛ ḿpii. Lua lɛgbɛ̃̀ɛ̀ à mɛ̀ á aà gba gbãa, ↄ̃ à aà gbà nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ gɛ̃o mɛ̀ndosai ń nɛnↄɛↄ lↄ àaↄ̃.
Gbɛ̃́piↄ ìↄ lɛsi Dii ua ń sɛ̃́sɛ̃naↄ ń domaↄ ń mↄↄnaↄ ḿpiiɛ. An maeↄ Asafa ń Yedutuo ń Emanio mɛ́ aaìↄ wɛ́tɛńzi Lua ua zĩpi guu. Kí sↄ̃ ìↄ wɛ́tɛ ń maepiↄzi.
Ampiↄ ń ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa lɛsia Diiɛ dàda aa dↄ̃ↄ, ampii gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa do ń basiiↄ̃kwi plasaioɛ (288).
Wà likpà lá aali kↄ̃ gba zɛ́ zĩpi yã́ musuɛ, nɛ́fɛ̃nɛn gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ, yãdanɛdeↄ ń yãdadanaↄ píi.
Wà gbɛ̃́piↄ sɛ̀ baade ń a nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ ń a dãunaↄ gbɛ̃ↄn kuɛplaplaɛ: A sɛ̃́ia Asafa nɛ́ Yosɛfu, a plaade Gedalia,
a àaↄ̃de Zakuu,
a síiↄ̃de Zeli,
a sↄode Nɛtania,
a soolode Bukia,
a soplade Yesalela,
a swaaↄ̃de Yesaia,
a kɛ̃okwide Matania,
a kwide Simɛi,
a kuɛdode Azalɛli,
a kuɛplade Asabia,
a kuɛ'aaↄ̃de Sebuɛli,
a gɛ̃o mɛ̀ndosaide Matitia,
a gɛ̃ode Yelimↄ,
a gɛ̃o ń mɛ̀ndoode Anania,
a gɛ̃o ń plaode Yↄsebekasa,
a bao plasaide Anani,
a bao mɛ̀ndosaide Maloti,
a baode Ɛliata,
a bao ń mɛ̀ndoode Otii,
a bao ń plaode Gidaleti,
a bao ń àaↄ̃ode Maazio,
a baasↄo mɛ̀ndosaide Lomantiɛzɛɛ.
Bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ gãliↄn kɛ: Sɛ̃́ia Kole buiↄ. Kole nɛ́ Mɛsɛlɛmia, Abiasafa tↄũna.
Mɛsɛlɛmia nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: A sɛ̃́ia Zakali, a plaade Yediaɛ, a àaↄ̃de Zebadia, a síiↄ̃de Yaniɛli,
a sↄode Elaũ, a soolode Yohanani, a soplade Ɛlioenai.
Ɔbɛdɛdↄũ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: A sɛ̃́ia Semaia, a plaade Yozaba, a àaↄ̃de Yoa, a síiↄ̃de Sakaa, a sↄode Nɛtanɛli,
a soolode Amiɛli, a soplade Isakaa, a swaaↄ̃de Puletai. Asa Lua mɛ́ ɛ̀fãaikɛ̀ Ɔbɛdɛdↄũpiɛ.
Aà nɛ́ Semaia nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ ì lↄ, aa kpalablè ń dezi buiↄ guu, asa bɛɛɛdeↄnɛ.
Semaia nɛ́piↄn kɛ: Ɔtɛni, Lefaɛli, Ɔbɛdi ń Ɛlizabao. Aà dãunaↄ Ɛlihu ń Semakiaoá bɛɛɛdeↄnɛ lↄ.
Gbɛ̃́piↄá Ɔbɛdɛdↄũ buiↄnɛ ḿpii. Ampiↄ ń ń nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ ń ń dãunaↄá bɛɛɛdeↄnɛ, an gbãa kà zĩpi kɛa. Aa gbɛ̃ↄn bàaↄ̃ ń plaoɛ.
Mɛsɛlɛmia nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ ń a dãunaↄá bɛɛɛdeↄnɛ lↄ. Aa gbɛ̃ↄn bao plasaiɛ.
Mɛlali bui Osa nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ tↄ́n kɛ: A sɛ̃́ia Simɛli, ãma nɛ́ sɛ̃́ia no, aà mae mɛ́ aà dìlɛ yoa ũ.
A plaade Ilikia, a àaↄ̃de Tabalia, a síiↄ̃de Zakali. Osa nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ ń a dãunaↄ gbɛ̃ↄn kuɛ'aaↄ̃ɛ.
Wà zĩdà bui dↄaanapiↄnɛ, baade ń a bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃an gãliↄ, lá wa dà ń daɛ pↄ́ lɛ́ zĩkɛ Dii uaↄnɛwa.
Wà likpànɛ́ ń buiwaɛ, nɛ́fɛ̃nɛn gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ń bↄlɛ pↄ́ an baade aↄ dↄ̃́ao.
Mɛsɛlɛmia gukpɛ oi bↄlɛ blè, ↄ̃ aà nɛ́ Zakali pↄ́ dɛ lɛdamade ↄ̃nↄna ũ gugbãntoo oi bↄlɛ blè.
Ɔbɛdɛdↄũ gɛↄmidↄkĩi oi bↄlɛ blè, mɛ́ aà nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ mɛ́ dↄ̃ↄ dↄ̃́aa blè.
Osa bɛ'aɛ oi bↄlɛ blè ń zɛda pↄ́ kú musu bↄlɛ pↄ́ wì mɛ Salɛkɛ Bↄlɛo. Bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ ìↄ kↄ̃ lɛũkpakɛɛ.
Levii buipiↄ ìↄ ku gukpɛ oi lá gu lɛ́ dↄ gbɛ̃ↄn soolosoolo, gugbãntoo oi gbɛ̃ↄn síiↄ̃siiↄ̃, gɛↄmidↄkĩi oi gbɛ̃ↄn síiↄ̃siiↄ̃, dↄ̃ↄ saɛ gbɛ̃ↄn plapla.
Bɛ'aɛ oi gbɛ̃ↄn síiↄ̃siiↄ̃ ìↄ ku zɛdau, ua oi sↄ̃ gbɛ̃ↄn plapla.
Kole buiↄ ń Mɛlali bui bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃ana gãliↄn we.
An gbɛ̃́ Levii buiↄ mɛ́ Lua kpɛ́ làasiↄ ń pↄ́ pↄ́ wì Lua gba làasiↄ dↄ̃̀anaↄ ũ.
Geesↄ̃ bui Ladã bui uabeleↄn kɛ: Yeiɛli
ń a nɛ́ Zetaũo ń Zetaũpi dãuna Yoɛlio. Ampiↄ mɛ́ aaìↄ wɛ́tɛ Dii kpɛ́ làasiↄi.
Amlaũ bui gbɛ̃eↄ ń Isaa bui gbɛ̃eↄ ń Hɛblↄ̃ bui gbɛ̃eↄ ń Uziɛli bui gbɛ̃eↄ ku we lↄ. Ampiↄn kɛ:
Mↄizi nɛ́ Geesoũ bui Sebuɛli mɛ́ làasi gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ.
Aà deziↄ do Ɛleazaa mɛ́ Lɛabia ì, Lɛabia Yesaia ì, Yesaia Yolaũ ì, Yolaũ Zikeli ì, Zikeli Selomi ì.
Selomipi ń a daɛↄ mɛ́ pↄ́ pↄ́ wa Lua gbà làasiↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ũ. Kí Davidi ń uabele pↄ́ dɛ zĩgↄ̃ dↄaanaↄ ũↄ mɛ́ gbapiↄ dà.
Aa pↄ́ pↄ́ aa nàaa zĩ guuↄ kpà Luawa wà aà kpɛ́ kɛkɛò.
Selomi ń a daɛↄ mɛ́ aaìↄ wɛ́tɛ pↄ́ pↄ́ gu'ena Samuɛli ń Kisi nɛ́ Sauluo ń Nɛɛ nɛ́ Abinɛɛo ń Zeluia nɛ́ Yoabuo kpàↄi ń pↄ́ pↄ́ gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ kpàↄ píi.
Wà bàasi zĩ dà Isaa bui Kenaniaɛ ń a nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ. Aamɛ Isailiↄ lakɛ̃naↄ ń ń yãgↄ̃gↄ̃naↄ ũ.
Hɛblↄ̃ bui Asabia ń a daɛↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa swaaↄ̃ ń basↄooɛ (1.700). Bɛɛɛdeↄnɛ ḿpii. Aaìↄ wɛ́tɛ Isaili bùsu pↄ́ kú Yuudɛ̃ baa bɛ'aɛzi Dii yã́ musu ń zĩ pↄ́ kí dànɛ́ yã́ musuo píi.
Yelia mɛ́ Hɛblↄ̃ buiↄ kía ũ. Davidi kpalablea wɛ̃̀ blade guu ↄ̃ à wɛtɛ̀tɛ Hɛblↄ̃ buipi tↄ́ pↄ́ wa kà láuↄzi, ↄ̃ wà gɛ̀ bↄ̀ an bɛɛɛdeↄwa an bɛ wɛ̃́lɛu Yazɛɛ, Galada bùsuu.
Yelia daɛ uabeleↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa kuɛ'aaↄ̃ ń basↄooɛ (2.700). Bɛɛɛdeↄnɛ ḿpii, ↄ̃ kí Davidi ń dílɛ aaↄ wɛ́tɛ Lubɛni buiↄzi ń Gada buiↄ ń Manase bui pↄ́ kú gukpɛ oi weↄ Lua yã́ ń azĩa yã́o kɛkɛa yã́i.
Isaili uabeleↄ ń zĩgↄ̃ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄoↄ dↄaanaↄ ń zĩgↄ̃ gbɛ̃ↄn basↄobasↄoↄ dↄaanaↄ ń ń lakɛ̃na pↄ́ aaìↄ zĩkɛ kíaɛ yã́pii musuↄn kɛ: Zĩgↄ̃ gãliↄ ìↄ kↄ̃ lɛũkpakɛ mↄ ń mↄoɛ e wɛ̃ gɛ́ bↄlɛi, gãlipiↄ baade zĩgↄ̃ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ baasↄo mɛ̀ndosaiɛ (24.000).
Zadiɛli nɛ́ Yasↄbaũ mɛ́ mↄ sɛ̃́iadeↄ gãli dↄaana ũ.
Pɛlɛzi buiɛ. Ɔ̃mɛ zĩgↄ̃ↄ dↄaana píi gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ mↄ sɛ̃́ia guu.
Ahoa nɛ́ Dodai mɛ́ mↄ plaadeↄ gãli dↄaana ũ. Mikelo mɛ́ aà plaade ũ.
Sa'ona Yoiada nɛ́ Benaia mɛ́ mↄ àaↄ̃deↄ gãli dↄaana ũ.
Benaiapi mɛ́ nɛgↄ̃n gbɛ̃ↄn baakwiↄ dↄaana ũ lↄ. Aà nɛ́ Amizaba ku aà gãli guuɛ.
Yoabu dãuna Asaɛli mɛ́ mↄ síiↄ̃deↄ gãli dↄaana ũ. Kɛ́ à gà, ↄ̃ aà nɛ́ Zebadia gↄ̃̀ aà gɛ̃ɛ ũ.
Izala bui Samu mɛ́ mↄ sↄodeↄ gãli dↄaana ũ.
Tekoa gbɛ̃́ Ikesi nɛ́ Ila mɛ́ mↄ soolodeↄ gãli dↄaana ũ.
Ɛflaiũ bui Ɛlɛzi, Peloni gbɛ̃́ mɛ́ mↄ sopladeↄ gãli dↄaana ũ.
Zela bui Sibekai, Usa gbɛ̃́ mɛ́ mↄ swaaↄ̃deↄ gãli dↄaana ũ.
Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ bui Abiɛzɛɛ, Anato gbɛ̃́ mɛ́ mↄ kɛ̃okwideↄ gãli dↄaana ũ.
Zela bui Malai, Nɛtofa gbɛ̃́ mɛ́ mↄ kwideↄ gãli dↄaana ũ.
Ɛflaiũ bui Benaia, Pilatↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ mɛ́ mↄ kuɛdodeↄ gãli dↄaana ũ.
Ɔniɛli bui Ɛlɛdai, Nɛtofa gbɛ̃́ mɛ́ mↄ kuɛpladeↄ gãli dↄaana ũ.
Isaili buiↄ kíaↄn kɛ: Lubɛni buiↄ kí Ɛliɛzɛɛ, Zikeli nɛ́, Simɛↄ buiↄ kí Sefatia, Maaka nɛ́,
Levii buiↄ kí Asabia, Kɛmuɛ nɛ́, Aalona buiↄ kí Zadoki,
Yudaↄ kí Ɛlihu, Davidi vĩ̀i, Isakaa buiↄ kí Ɔmɛli, Mikaila nɛ́,
Zabulↄni buiↄ kí Isimaia, Obadia nɛ́, Nɛfatali buiↄ kí Yelimↄ, Azeliɛ nɛ́,
Ɛflaiũ buiↄ kí Ozee, Azazia nɛ́, Manase bui pↄ́ kú bɛ'aɛ oiↄ kí Yoɛli, Pedaia nɛ́,
Manase bui pↄ́ kú Galada bùsuuↄ kí Ido, Zakali nɛ́, Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ buiↄ kí Yaasiɛ, Abinɛɛ nɛ́,
Dã buiↄ kí Azalɛli, Yeloaũ nɛ́. Isaili buiↄ kíaↄn we.
Davidi i gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kà wɛ̃̀ bao ge aai kaoↄ naoo, asa Dii mɛ̀ á tó Isailiↄ dasikũ lán saanaↄwaɛ.
Kɛ́ Zeluia nɛ́ Yoabu nà ń naoawa, i a midɛo. Naopi yã́i Lua pↄ fɛ̃̀i Isailiↄzi, ↄ̃ wì ń dasilɛ kɛ̃́ kí Davidi ladauo.
Adiɛli nɛ́ Azemavɛ mɛ́ kibɛ làasi gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ. Uzia nɛ́ Yonatãa mɛ́ dↄ̃ pↄ́ kú bua ń mɛɛwiaↄ ń zↄ̃ɛwiaↄ ń gudↄ̃akĩiↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ.
Kelubu nɛ́ Ɛzali mɛ́ buazĩkɛnaↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ.
Lama gbɛ̃́ Simɛi mɛ́ vɛ̃ɛbudeↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ. Sefã gbɛ̃́ Zabedi mɛ́ ziia ũ vɛ̃ɛbɛ ń vɛ̃ɛ kũ̀sũao yã́ musu.
Gɛdɛɛ gbɛ̃́ Baalanana mɛ́ kuliↄ ń kaadↄɛnliↄ zĩkɛnaↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ. Yoasi mɛ́ ziia ũ kù nísi yã́ musu.
Salↄna gbɛ̃́ Sitelai mɛ́ Salↄna zùdãnaↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ. Adelai nɛ́ Safata mɛ́ guzulɛ zùdãnaↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ.
Isimaɛla bui Obili mɛ́ yiongodãnaↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ. Mɛlↄnↄ gbɛ̃́ Yedeia mɛ́ zàa'ĩndãnaↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ.
Ageli bui Yazizi mɛ́ sãↄ ń bleↄ dãnaↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ. Gbɛ̃́piↄá kí Davidi ziiaↄnɛ ḿpii.
Davidi desɛ̃ Yonatãaá lɛdamadeɛ. Aà wɛ́ zɛ̃a mɛ́ lakɛ̃naɛ. Aàpi ń Akemↄ nɛ́ Yeiɛlio mɛ́ Davidi nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ gwana ũ.
Aitofɛli mɛ́ Davidi lɛdamade ũ. Aaki gbɛ̃́ Usai mɛ́ kí kwàasi ũ.
A gbɛa Benaia nɛ́ Yoiada ń Abiataao gↄ̃̀ Aitofɛli gɛ̃ɛ ũ. Yoabu mɛ́ kí zĩgↄ̃ↄ dↄaana ũ.
Davidi Isaili kíaↄ kã̀aa Yelusalɛũ píi, Isaili bui kíaↄ ń zĩgↄ̃ↄ dↄaana pↄ́ lɛ́ zĩkɛɛ̀ↄ, zĩgↄ̃ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄoↄ dↄaanaↄ ń gbɛ̃ↄn basↄobasↄoↄ dↄaanaↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛ kía ń a nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ àizɛɛ ziia ũↄ ń a ìwaↄ ń a nɛgↄ̃naↄ ń a gↄ̃ gɛ̀bɛɛↄ píi.
Ɔ̃ kí Davidi fɛ̀lɛ zɛ̀ à mɛ̀: Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, à swã́sɛmazi! Ma zɛò ma sↄ̃u mà kpɛdↄ Dii wá Lua bàakuawanↄ kpagolo pↄ́ dɛ aà gbadibↄ ũɛ, ↄ̃ ma sↄu mà ń a dↄao.
Ɔ̃ Lua òmɛɛ i kɛ mámɛ mà kpɛ́pi dↄɛo, asa zĩgↄ̃n ma ũ, ma gbɛ̃dɛ̀dɛ dasidasiɛ.
Ń beeo Dii wá Isailiↄ Lua ma sɛ ma bɛdeↄ guu, kɛ́ mapi ń ma buiↄ wàↄ dɛ Isailiↄ kía ũ gↄↄpiiɛ. À Yuda sɛ̀ yãa dↄaana ũ, ↄ̃ à ma bɛdeↄ sɛ̀ aà buiↄ guu. À kàaàgu, ↄ̃ à ma kpa Isailiↄ kía ũ.
Dii ma gba nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ dasi, ↄ̃ à Salomↄↄ sɛ̀ ń guu, à aà kpà kpala pↄ́ a dìlɛ Isailiↄnɛu.
A òmɛɛ à mɛ̀: N nɛ́ Salomↄↄ mɛ́ a kpɛdↄmɛɛ ń a uao, asa ma aà sɛ̀ ma nɛ́ ũɛ, míↄ dɛ aà mae ũ.
Tó a ma yãdilɛaↄ ń ma ikoyãↄ kũa lá a kũa gbãwa, má tó aà kpala àↄ ku gↄↄpiiɛ.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, ma naɛ́ wá Luazi Isailiↄ bui pↄ́ kãaaa Dii aɛↄ wáa píi, àↄ tɛ Dii wá Lua yãdilɛaↄi ń laaio, kɛ́ àↄ ku bùsu maaɛ beeu, i gↄ̃ á buiↄnɛ e gↄↄpii.
Mpi sↄ̃, ma nɛ́ Salomↄↄ, ǹyↄ̃ ma Lua dↄ̃, ní zↄbleɛ̀ ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo teasisai, asa Dii ì wá sↄ̃ yↄɛ à wá làasooↄ ń yã́ pↄ́ wa zɛòↄ dↄ̃. Tó n aà kĩ́i wɛ̀ɛlɛ, ńyↄ̃ aà e. Tó n pãkpàaàzi sↄ̃, à gìnzin we e gↄↄpii.
Ǹyↄ̃ dↄ̃ kɛ́ Dii n sɛ ǹ kpɛdↄɛ a kúkĩi ũɛ. Sↄ̃dilɛ, ní zĩpi kɛ.
Ɔ̃ Davidi Lua kpɛ́ ń a kpɛɛlɛo taa pↄ́ a kɛ̀ taalau kpà a nɛ́ Salomↄↄwa ń a làasiↄ ń a kpɛa pↄ́ kú musu ń zĩ́lɛoↄ ń a duunkɛ̃makĩio.
Yã́ pↄ́ kú aà sↄ̃u Dii ua ń a kpɛ́nɛ pↄ́ liaaiↄ musu, à a taataa pↄ́ a kɛ̀ taalau kpàwà lↄ: Lua kpɛ́pi làasiↄ, pↄ́ pↄ́ wì Lua gba kálɛkĩiↄ,
Dii kpɛ́ zĩkɛbↄↄ ń lá wa sa'onaↄ ń Levii bui gãliↄ dilɛdilɛ aa Dii kpɛ́ zĩ kɛo.
À vua ń ã́nusu pↄ́ wa zĩkɛbↄpiↄpiò gbia dìlɛdilɛ:
Vua dauↄ ń a filiaↄ, ã́nusu dauↄ ń a filiaↄ,
vua táabũnu pↄ́ wì pɛ̃ɛ kálɛwàↄ, ã́nusu táabũnuↄ,
vua saaↄ, au'ɛlɛbↄ pↄ́ wa pì ń vuaoↄ, vua loↄ, vua taↄ, ã́nusu taↄ
ń tulaletikatɛakĩi pↄ́ wa pì ń vuao. À vua malaika gã̀sĩade pↄ́ an gã̀sĩa aↄ pooa Dii bàa kua ń Isailiↄ kpagoloa aà zĩkasↄ̃go ũ taa pↄ́ a kɛ̀ taalau kpàwà lↄ.
Davidi mɛ̀: Ma yã́piↄ taa dàlau píi, asa Dii gbãa mↄ̀a à ma wɛ́ kɛ̃̀mɛɛɛ.
Ɔ̃ Davidi ò a nɛ́ Salomↄↄɛ: Sↄ̃dilɛ, zĩpi kɛ ń wↄ́ↄo. Ńsu to vĩa n kũo. Ńsu bílikɛo, asa Dii ma Lua a pãkpanzio, a n to weo. Aↄ kunnↄɛ e ǹ gɛ ǹ kpɛ́ zĩpi midɛò.
Sa'onaↄ ń Levii buiↄ gãliↄ ku sↄu guu wà Dii kpɛ́pi zĩ kɛ, mɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa gↄ̃i vĩ mɛ́ an pↄ gbàↄ kunnↄ aa zĩpi kɛ. Gbɛ̃́pii ń ń kíaↄ aa n yãma.
Ɔ̃ kí Davidi ò gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kãaaaↄnɛ píi: Ma nɛ́ Salomↄↄ pↄ́ Lua aà sɛ̀piá ɛ̀waason bↄlↄnaɛ. Zĩpi zↄ̃ↄ, asa uapiá gbɛ̃nazĩna pↄ́ no, Dii Lua pↄ́ɛ.
Ma Lua kpɛ́pi dↄa sↄukɛ̀ maamaa ma gbãa lɛ́uɛ, ma vua kpà vua zĩ pↄ́ ũ ń ã́nusuo ã́nusu zĩ pↄ́ ũ ń mↄgotɛ̃o mↄgotɛ̃ zĩ pↄ́ ũ ń mↄsio mↄsi zĩ pↄ́ ũ ń lío lí zĩ pↄ́ ũ ń gbɛo gbɛ̀ zĩ pↄ́ ũ ń onisio ń tiikↄazio ń gbɛ̀ bɛɛɛde bui píio ń gbɛpuao.
Bee gbɛa lá ma Lua kpɛ́ yã́ kàmagu, vua ń ã́nusu àizɛɛ pↄ́ má vĩↄ, ↄ̃ má kpá ma Lua kpɛ́ pↄ́ ũ pↄ́ pↄ́ ma a sↄukɛ̀ↄ bàasi:
Ofii bùsu vua tↄnu basↄo ń ã́nusu tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛo tↄnu ↄ̀aa do ń blao, kɛ́ wà kpa kpɛ́pi gĩↄwa a guu.
Vuaá vua zĩ pↄ́ɛ, ã́nusuá ã́nusu zĩ pↄ́ɛ ń zĩ pↄ́ gↄ̃ideↄ kɛↄ píi. Á démɛ zɛ̀ò gbã à kpa Diiwa sↄũsↄũi?
Ɔ̃ uabeleↄ ń Isaili bui kíaↄ ń zĩgↄ̃ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄoↄ dↄaanaↄ ń gbɛ̃ↄn basↄobasↄoↄ dↄaanaↄ ń kíapi ziiaↄ vua ń ã́nusuo kpà.
Aa vua kpà tↄnu baswaaↄ̃kwi (170) wà Lua kpɛ́pi zĩ kɛò ń ã́nusuo tↄnu ↄ̀aa do ń basoplao (340) ń mↄgotɛ̃o tↄnu ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ ń kwio (610) ń mↄsio tↄnu ↄ̀aa gɛ̃o ń plao (3.400).
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gbɛ̀ bɛɛɛdeↄ vĩↄ nà Geesↄ̃ bui Yeiɛliɛ a ↄzĩ Dii kpɛ́ làasiu.
Gbɛ̃́pii pↄ kɛ̀na pↄ́ pↄ́ wa kpàpi yã́ musu, asa aa kpà Diiwa ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndooɛ. Kí Davidi pↄ kɛ̀na maamaa,
ↄ̃ à Dii sáaukpà gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kãaaa weↄ wáa à mɛ̀: Ɛ̀fãaide Dii wá dezi Isaili Lua za asĩnizĩ e gↄↄpii!
Dii, ḿmɛ ń zↄ̃ↄkɛ ń gbãao ń bɛɛɛo ń dɛnlao ń gawio vĩ, asa pↄ́ pↄ́ kú musu ń zĩ́lɛoↄá n pↄ́ɛ píi. Ḿmɛ ń kía ũ, ḿmɛ ń pↄ́pii mide ũ.
Àizɛɛ ń bɛɛɛo ì bↄ n kĩ́iɛ, ni kible pↄ́piiwa. Iko ń gbãao ku n ↄzĩɛ, ń gbɛ̃́pii kã́fĩa zɛ́ vĩ, mɛ́ ń ń gbaa gbãa zɛ́ vĩ lↄ.
Tiasa wá Lua, wálɛ n sáaukpa, wálɛ n tↄ́ bɛɛɛde bↄ.
Ée, dén ma ũ ge ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, kɛ́ wà gbasa pↄ́ kpama màai? Pↄ́pii ì bↄ n kĩ́iɛ. Pↄ́ pↄ́ wa kpàma bↄ̀ n ↄzĩɛ.
Wá dɛnɛ bↄ̀mↄↄ ũ, nibↄↄ ũ lán wá deziↄwaɛ. Wá kua dṹniau dɛ lán uenawa tãmaasaiɛ.
Dii wá Lua, pↄzↄ̃ↄ pↄ́ wá kpà n kpɛ́ dↄa yã́i, kɛ́ n tↄ́ pↄ́ a kua adoa e àↄ kuwà, apii bↄ̀ n ↄzĩɛ, n pↄ́ɛ.
Ma Lua, má dↄ̃ kɛ́ sↄ̃̀ tàasikanan n ũ, yãkɛa a zɛ́wa mɛ́ ì kangu. Ma pↄ́piↄ kpàma píi ń nↄ̀sɛpuaoɛ, ↄ̃ má è n gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú laↄ pↄ́ kpàma ń pↄnao sↄ̃.
Dii wá deziↄ Ablahaũ ń Izaakio ń Isailio Lua, to n gbɛ̃́ↄ lí zɛò beewa ń sↄ̃ guu, ní tó an sↄ̃ àↄ kuma gↄↄpii.
Ma nɛ́ Salomↄↄ gba zɛ́ aàↄ n yãdilɛaↄ ń n ikoyãↄ kũa ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo, i n ↄtondↄkĩi gwa à zĩkɛwà píi, i n kpɛ́ pↄ́ ma a sↄukɛ̀ dↄ.
Ɔ̃ Davidi ò gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kãaaa weↄnɛ: À Dii á Lua sáaukpa! Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kãaaa weↄ Dii ń deziↄ Lua sáaukpà, aa mipɛ̀lɛ aa kùlɛ Diiɛ, aa kùlɛ kíaɛ lↄ.
Kɛ́ gu dↄ̀ aa sa'ò Diiwa. Aa sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ òwà ń zuswanaↄ mɛ̀n ↄ̀aa sↄo ń sãsakaoↄ mɛ̀n ↄ̀aa sↄo ń sãsa bↄlↄnaↄ mɛ̀n ↄ̀aa sↄo. Aa vɛ̃ɛ ɛ̀lɛwà aa sáaukpa sa'òwà dúuduu Isaili píi pↄ́ ũ.
Gↄↄ bee aa pↄblè aa vɛ̃ɛmì Dii aɛ ń pↄna zↄ̃ↄo. Ɔ̃ aa Davidi nɛ́ Salomↄↄ kpaa kía ũ gbãa kã̀fĩ. Aa aà kpà kía ũ Dii aɛ sa, ↄ̃ aa Zadoki dìlɛ sa'onkia ũ.
Ɔ̃ Salomↄↄ zↄ̃̀lɛ kpalau a mae gbɛu kía pↄ́ Dii kpà ũ. À gwea è mɛ́ Isaili bui píi misìilɛɛ̀.
Kíaↄ ń nɛgↄ̃naↄ ń kí Davidi nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ píi mikpà kí Salomↄↄwa.
Dii tò Salomↄↄ zↄ̃ↄkɛ kã̀fĩ maamaa, Isaili bui píi wɛ́ è. Dii kíakɛgawi kpàwà, Isailiↄ kía pↄ́ dↄaaaɛ̀ↄ, an kee i kaaàwao.
Yɛse nɛ́ Davidiá Isaili buiↄ píi kíaɛ.
À kɛ̀ kpalau wɛ̃̀ blaɛ, Hɛblↄ̃ wɛ̃̀ sopla, Yelusalɛũ sↄ̃ wɛ̃̀ baakwi ń àaↄ̃o.
À zikũ̀ táotaoɛ, ↄ̃ à gà. Ɔdeɛ mɛ́ a bɛɛɛ vĩ. Ɔ̃ aà nɛ́ Salomↄↄ zↄ̃̀lɛ aà gbɛu.
Kí Davidi yãkɛaↄ ku gu'ena Samuɛli taalau ń ãnabi Natã láo ń gu'ena Gada láo za a daalɛawa e a midɛawa,
aà kpalablea yã́ↄ ń aà nɛgↄ̃nkɛyãↄ ń yã́ pↄ́ aà lèↄ ń yã́ pↄ́ Isailiↄ ń bùsu pↄ́ liaai kíaↄ lèↄ.
Davidi nɛ́ Salomↄↄ kpala zĩ́napɛ̀lɛ gíũgiũ, asa Dii aà Lua kuaànↄɛ, ↄ̃ à aà zↄ̃ↄkɛ kã̀fĩ maamaa.
Salomↄↄ yãdìlɛ Isailiↄnɛ píi, gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄoↄ dↄaanaↄ ń gbɛ̃ↄn basↄobasↄoↄ dↄaanaↄ ń yã́kpalɛkɛnaↄ ń kíaↄ píi ń Isailiↄ uabeleↄ píi,
ↄ̃ à gɛ̀ńnↄ gulɛsĩ pↄ́ wa bò Gabaↄ̃ↄ, asa kpaaũkpɛ pↄ́ Dii zↄ̀blena Mↄizi kɛ̀ guwaiwaiu kú weɛ.
Davidi tò wà Dii kpagolo sɛ̀ yãa Kiliayaaliũ, wà gɛ̀ò gu pↄ́ a kɛ̀kɛɛ̀u Yelusalɛũ, asa we à zwã̀akpɛ dↄ̀uɛ̀.
Mↄgotɛ̃ sa'okĩi pↄ́ Uli nɛ́ Bezalɛli, Hulu tↄũna pì sↄ̃ a ku Gabaↄ̃ↄ Dii zwã̀akpɛ kpɛɛlɛ, ↄ̃ Salomↄↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kãaaapiↄ yãgbɛ̀awà we.
Salomↄↄ sↄ̃̀ kpaaũkpɛ sa'okĩipizi Dii aɛ, ↄ̃ à sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ òwà ń pↄ́ mɛ̀n ↄ̀aa sↄoↄ.
Ɔ̃ Lua bↄ̀ mↄ̀wà gwãasĩna à mɛ̀: Pↄ́ pↄ́ ń yei gbɛaa.
Salomↄↄ wè Luawa à mɛ̀: N gbɛ̃kɛkɛ̀ ma mae Davidiɛ maamaaɛ, ↄ̃ n ma kpa kpalau aà gɛ̃ɛ ũ.
Dii Lua, lɛ́ pↄ́ ń gbɛ̃̀ ma mae Davidiɛ kɛ sa, asa n ma dilɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa dasi lán dṹnia bùsu'ũfãawaↄ kía ũ.
Ma gba ↄ̃nↄ ń dↄ̃ao sa, kɛ́ mà e dↄaaò gbɛ̃́piↄnɛ. Tó màa no kpelewa máli yã́gↄ̃gↄ̃ n gbɛ̃́ dasipiↄnɛi?
Ɔ̃ Lua òɛ̀: Lá yã́ bee mɛ́ kú n sↄ̃u, mɛ́ ni ↄda ge àizɛɛ ge gawi ge n ibɛɛↄ gaa ge wɛ̃ni gbã̀a gbɛaao, sema ↄ̃nↄ ń dↄ̃ao, kɛ́ ǹ e yã́gↄ̃gↄ̃ ma gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ma n dilɛ ń kía ũɛ beeↄnɛ,
má n gba ↄ̃nↄ ń dↄ̃apio, mí ɛa mà n gba ↄda ń àizɛɛo ń gawio lↄ. Kí pↄ́ kú n ãae ge kí pↄ́ aↄ ku n gbɛae a kanwao.
Ɔ̃ Salomↄↄ bↄ̀ kpaaũkpɛ pↄ́ kú gulɛsĩpia kĩ́i Gabaↄ̃ↄ, à tà Yelusalɛũ, ↄ̃ àlɛ kible Isailiↄwa.
Salomↄↄ zĩkasↄ̃goↄ ń sↄ̃́ↄ kã̀aa, aà sↄ̃́gopiↄ kà ↄ̀aa sopla (1.400), aà sↄ̃́ↄ sↄ̃ ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ kuɛpla (12.000). Wì aà sↄ̃́piↄ gwa aà sↄ̃́go wɛ̃́lɛↄ guu ń aà bɛ Yelusalɛũoɛ.
Kí tò ã́nusu ń vuao di Yelusalɛũ lán gbɛwa, mɛ́ sɛdɛ lí pↄ́ wà kpɛdↄ̀ò dasi lán bɛ̀lɛ líwa sɛ̃u.
Salomↄↄ sↄ̃́piↄ bↄ̀ Egipi ń Silisi bùsuoɛ. Kí laatanaↄ mɛ́ lùlu Silisi.
Aaì sↄ̃́goↄ lúlu Egipi ã́nusu kiloo soplaplaɛ, sↄ̃́ↄ sↄ̃ kiloo plapla taawa, ↄ̃ aaì ɛa sↄ̃́piↄ yía Itiↄ ń Siliↄ kíaↄwa lↄ.
Ɔ̃ Salomↄↄ dìlɛ wà kpɛdↄ Diiɛ ń azĩa bɛo.
Salomↄↄ gbɛ̃́ↄ dà gbɛ'ãzĩu gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ basiiↄ̃ (80.000), a sɛ̀sɛnaↄ sↄ̃ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bàaↄ̃kwi (70.000) ń ń dↄaanaↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ àaↄ̃ ń ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃o (3.600).
Ɔ̃ à gbɛ̃́ↄ zĩ̀ Tii kí Hilaũwa à mɛ̀: Sɛdɛ líↄ kpã́sãmɛɛ lá ń kpã̀sã ma mae Davidiɛ ↄ̃ à bɛkpàòwa.
Málɛ kpɛdↄ Dii ma Luaɛ. Aà pↄ́ɛ, we waↄ tulaletikauɛ̀ tɛ́a, wiↄ pɛ̃ɛ kálɛɛ̀, wiↄ sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ owà kↄↄ ń oosio ń kã́mabogↄↄzĩo ń mↄ dafu gↄↄↄ ń Dii wá Lua dikpɛↄ. Ɔ̃ Luapi dìlɛ Isailiↄnɛ aaↄ kɛ màa gↄↄpii.
Kpɛ́ pↄ́ málɛ dↄɛ̀pi zↄ̃ↄ, asa wá Lua zↄ̃ↄ dɛ diiↄla píi.
Ń beeo démɛ kpɛdↄaɛ̀ gbãa vĩi? Asa musu a fↄ̃ aà sio, baa musumusu. Dén ma ũ mà kpɛdↄɛ̀i, mɛ́ i kɛ àↄ dɛ aà gbagbakĩi ũ bàasio.
Bee yã́i gↄ̃ide kpã́sãmɛɛ aà zĩkɛ ń vuao ń ã́nusuo ń mↄgotɛ̃o ń mↄsio ń wↄ̃ↄtɛ̃nao ń bà gàaluladeo ń babuunao ń wɛ̃̀sãkɛ̃a pↄ́ↄwao, i zĩkɛ Yelusalɛũ ń Yuda bùsuo ń gↄ̃ide pↄ́ ma mae Davidi dìlɛmɛɛↄ.
Ǹ n Libã bùsu sɛdɛ líↄ kpã́sãmɛɛ ń pɛ̃liↄ ń lí bɛɛɛde pãleↄ, asa má dↄ̃ kɛ́ n bùsu zĩkɛnaↄ lizↄ̃ dↄ̃. Ma zĩkɛnaↄ lí zĩkɛ ń n zĩkɛnaↄ,
aai lí kɛkɛmɛɛ dasidasi, asa kpɛ́ pↄ́ málɛ dↄpi, sema àↄ zↄ̃ↄ mɛ́ àↄ muaa ń kpɛ́eoo.
Má mase kpa n zĩkɛna pↄ́ lɛ́ lizↄ̃piↄwa koko ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ ↄ̀aa do (200.000) ń naao koko ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ ↄ̀aa do (200.000) ń vɛ̃ɛo sela ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bao (20.000) ń nísio koko ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bao (20.000).
Ɔ̃ Tii kí Hilaũ lá kpã̀sã Salomↄↄɛ à mɛ̀: Kɛ́ Dii ye a gbɛ̃́ↄzi yã́i, ↄ̃ à n kpa ń kía ũ.
À ɛ̀a ò lↄ: Wà Dii Isailiↄ Lua pↄ́ musu ń zĩ́lɛo kɛ̀ sáaukpa! Asa à kí Davidi gbà nɛ́ ↄ̃nↄna pↄ́ dↄ̃a ń wɛzɛ̃o vĩ, ↄ̃ àlɛ kpɛdↄɛ̀ ń azĩa bɛo.
Málɛ gↄ̃ide pↄ́ zĩ dↄ̃ gbaɛnɛ, aà tↄ́n Hulaũ Abi.
Aà daá Dã buiɛ, mɛ́ aà maeá Tii gbɛ̃́ɛ. A vua ń ã́nusuo ń mↄgotɛ̃o ń mↄsio ń gbɛo ń lío ń bà gàaluladeo ń babuunao ń wↄ̃ↄtɛ̃nao ń bàabaao zĩ dↄ̃. A wɛ̃̀sãkɛ̃a pↄ́ↄwa dↄ̃, mɛ́ zĩ pↄ́ wa dàɛ̀ píi ì kɛɛ. Àli zĩkɛ ń n ↄzĩkɛnaↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛ n mae Davidi ↄzĩkɛna ũ yãaↄ.
Kí, mase ń naao ń nísio ń vɛ̃ɛ pↄ́ n a lɛgbɛ̃̀o kpã́sã wápiↄ ń zĩkɛnaↄnɛ,
wí Libã bùsu lí zↄ̃zↄ̃nɛ lá ń yei lɛ́u, wí yeye wà gbɛ̃́ↄ zĩò ísiaa e Zope, ní taò Yelusalɛũ.
Salomↄↄ bↄ̀mↄ pↄ́ kú Isaili bùsuuↄ nào píi, aà mae Davidi gbɛ̃́ↄ naoa bàasi. Aa kà gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ basoplakwi ń àaↄ̃o ń ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃o (153.600).
À ń gbɛ̃eↄ dìlɛ gbɛ̀'ãnaↄ ũ gusĩsĩdeu gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ basiiↄ̃ (80.000), a sɛ̀sɛnaↄ sↄ̃ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bàaↄ̃kwi (70.000), an dↄaana pↄ́ aaↄ wɛ́tɛ zĩpiziↄ sↄ̃ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ àaↄ̃ ń ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃oɛ (3.600).
Ɔ̃ Salomↄↄ nà Dii kpɛ́ boawa Mↄlia gbɛ musu Yelusalɛũ, gu pↄ́ Dii bↄ̀ mↄ̀u a mae Davidiwau. Davidi mɛ́ Yebusi bui Alauna pↄ́wɛngbɛ̃zɛpi dìlɛ kpɛ́pi dↄkĩi ũ.
À nà zĩpiwa a kpalablea wɛ̃̀ síiↄ̃de mↄ plaade gↄↄ plaade zĩ́ɛ.
Ɛ̃ pↄ́ a bò Lua kpɛ́ pↄ́ ũ gbã̀a kà gã̀sĩsuu bàaↄ̃, a yàasa bao.
Kpɛ́pi bilandaa vĩ, a yàasa sáa ń kpɛ́pioɛ gã̀sĩsuu bao, a lɛsĩ kwi. À vua tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ kpà kpɛ́pi guu.
À pɛ̃́ lipɛpɛɛↄ kpà kpɛɛlɛ gĩwa, ↄ̃ à vua maa kùlɛwà. À gↄ̃inakɛ̀wà lán daminaliↄwa ń mↄdaonaↄ.
À zãblè kpɛ́piwa ń gbɛ̀ bɛɛɛdeↄ. Vuapi sↄ̃ à bↄ̀ Paavaiũɛ.
À vua kùlɛ kpɛ́pi balazaↄwa ń a kpɛɛlɛ líↄ ń a gĩↄ ń a bↄlɛ gbaↄ, mɛ́ à gↄ̃inakɛ̀ gĩpiↄwa lán malaika gã̀sĩadeↄwa.
À luakukĩi kɛ̀, a gbã̀a sáa ń kpɛ́pi yàasao gã̀sĩsuu bao, a yàasa bao. À vua tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ kùlɛwà tↄnu bao.
Vua kusaↄ gbia dɛ kiloo kĩnia. À vua kùlɛ kpɛa pↄ́ kú musuↄwa lↄ.
À li'ã̀ malaika gã̀sĩadeↄ ũ mɛ̀n pla, a kpà ń vuao.
Malaikapiↄ gã̀sĩa pooa, a gbã̀a gã̀sĩsuu sↄ́sↄo, ampii gã̀sĩsuu baoɛ. Ado gã̀sĩa gɛ̀ pɛ̀ gĩwa le, ado pↄ́ pɛ̀ gĩwa la, ↄ̃ an gã̀sĩa pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ↄ pɛ̀kↄ̃wa.

Malaikapiↄ gã̀sĩaↄ poopooa màa e gã̀sĩsuu bao. Aa zɛa mɛ́ an aɛ dↄa kpɛɛlɛ oi.
À zwãa pↄ́ wa da tã̀ ń babuunao ń bà gàaluladeo ń wↄ̃ↄtɛ̃nao ń bàabaao, ↄ̃ à gↄ̃inakɛ̃̀wà lán malaika gã̀sĩadeↄwa.
À mↄ̀pɛlɛ pì mɛ̀n pla kpɛ́pi kpɛɛlɛ pↄ́ ũ. A pla píi lɛsĩ gã̀sĩsuu bao plaplasaiɛ, a fùa lɛsĩ sↄ̃ gã̀sĩsuu sↄ́sↄo.
À mↄdaonaↄ pì, ↄ̃ a fĩ̀ fùapiↄwa yàbaa ũ. À pↄ́ↄ pì lán gbɛafu bɛↄwa mɛ̀n basↄobasↄo, a dↄ̀dↄ mↄdaonapiↄwa.
À mↄpiↄ pɛ̀lɛ kpɛ́ kpɛɛlɛ ↄplaai ń zɛɛio. À tↄkpà ↄplaa pↄ́ɛ Yakɛ̃, ↄzɛɛ pↄ́ sↄ̃ Bↄazu.
Salomↄↄ sa'okĩi kɛ̀ ń mↄgotɛ̃o. A gbã̀a ń a yàasao gã̀sĩsuu baobao, a lɛsĩ kwi.
À íkakĩi bò bòoloo. A lɛ́la e a lɛ́le gã̀sĩsuu kwiɛ, a lɛsĩ sↄo, a zↄ̃ↄ sↄ̃ baakwi.
À gↄ̃inakɛ̀ íkakĩipiwa lán tùuↄwa, a lìa a lɛ́i zĩ́lɛ dↄ̀ↄ pla, gã̀sĩsuu dodo tùu mɛ̀n kwikwi. À íkakĩipi pì sãnu ń tùu gↄ̃inapioɛ.
Íkakĩipi di zuswana mɛ̀n kuɛplaↄwa. Zù mɛ̀n àaↄ̃ↄ mi dↄ gugbãntoo oi, mɛ̀n àaↄ̃ↄ bɛ'aɛ oi, mɛ̀n àaↄ̃ↄ gɛↄmidↄkĩi oi, mɛ̀n àaↄ̃ↄ lↄ gukpɛ oi. Íkakĩipi di ń musu, ↄ̃ an pↄ̀ↄↄ dↄdↄ guo.
Íkakĩipi gèele ↄtã doɛ, mɛ́ a swã́ dɛ lán ta swã́wa, lán tↄ̃́ↄngbelezĩwa. Galuba zↄ̃ↄ lɛ ↄ̀aa do ń basↄoo í ↄ̃ ta sapi ì sí.
Ɔ̃ à dàa pì mɛ̀n kwi nↄ̀ↄpipibↄↄ ũ, a kàlɛ Lua kpɛ́ ↄplaa oi mɛ̀n sↄo, ↄzɛɛi mɛ̀n sↄo. Sa'onaↄ ì dàapiↄ idada sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ nↄ̀ↄwa. Sa'onapiↄ sↄ̃ aaì zu'o ń íkakĩipi íoɛ.
À vua dau pì mɛ̀n kwi lá wà a kɛa dìlɛwa. A kàlɛ Lua kpɛ́u, mɛ̀n sↄo ↄplaa oi, mɛ̀n sↄo zɛɛi.
À táabũnu kɛ̀ mɛ̀n kwi, a kàlɛ Lua kpɛ́u, mɛ̀n sↄo ↄplaa oi, mɛ̀n sↄo zɛɛi. À ta au'ɛlɛbↄↄ pì ń vuao mɛ̀n basↄo.
À sa'onaↄ ua kpànɛ́ ń Lua kpɛ́ uadao ń a bↄlɛ gbaↄ, ↄ̃ à mↄgotɛ̃ kùlɛ gbapiↄwa.
Ɔ̃ à íkakĩipi dìlɛ Lua kpɛ́ kpɛɛlɛ ↄplaa oi gɛↄmidↄkĩi oi ń gukpɛo zãnguo.
À túfukabↄↄ ń pɛ́ɛluↄ ń ta au'ɛlɛbↄↄ pì lↄ. Màa Hulaũ Lua kpɛ́ zĩ kɛ̀ kí Salomↄↄɛ, à a lɛkpàaĩ. Zĩ pↄ́ a kɛ̀piↄn kɛ:
Mↄ̀pɛlɛↄ pla. Fùa pↄ́ bↄ̀ lán lowa, a ku mↄ̀pɛlɛpiↄ musuↄ pla. Mↄdaona pↄ́ à zãblèò fùapiↄwaↄ pla.
Gↄ̃ina pↄ́ a dↄ̀dↄ mↄdaonapiↄwa lán gbɛafu bɛↄwaↄ ↄ̀aa pla. A kɛ̀ dↄ̀ↄ plapla, à zãblèò fùapiↄwa.
Tadibↄↄ ń a taↄ.
Íkakĩi do ń zuswana pↄ́ kú a zíɛↄ kuɛpla.
Túfukabↄↄ ń pɛ́ɛluↄ ń saaↄ ń a pↄkeleↄ píi. Pↄ́ pↄ́ Hulaũ pì kí Salomↄↄɛ Dii kpɛ́ pↄ́ ũↄ píi, a pì ń mↄgotɛ̃ pↄ́ wa yↄ̀ↄoɛ.
Kí mɛ̀ wà kása ń Yuudɛ̃ dã̀na gĩ pↄ́ kú Suko ń Zalɛtão zãnguoo.
Pↄ́ pↄ́ Salomↄↄ pì ń mↄgotɛ̃opiↄ, wi yↄ̃ kiloowa wà a gbia dↄ̃̀o, kɛ́ a dasi kɛ̀ zài yã́i.
Salomↄↄ pↄ́ pↄ́ kú Lua kpɛ́ guuↄ pì lↄ, tulaletikatɛakĩi pↄ́ wa kɛ̀ ń vuao ń vua táabũnu pↄ́ wì Dii pɛ̃ɛ kálɛwàↄ
ń dau pↄ́ wa pì ń vua tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛoↄ ń a filia pↄ́ ìↄ naa luakukĩi aɛↄ lá wa dìlɛwa.
Wà gↄ̃inakɛ̀ daupiↄwa lán kↄpɛkĩi fùaↄwa. Wà a filiaↄ ń a kpàoↄ pì ń vua tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛoɛ.
Vua filiadɛbↄↄ ń taↄ ń gↄ̃̀ↄnaↄ ń tàasoↄ ń kpɛa pↄ́ wì mɛ luakukĩi gbaↄ ń kpɛɛlɛ pↄ́ↄ.
Kɛ́ Salomↄↄ Dii kpɛ́ zĩpi kɛ̀ a làa píi, ↄ̃ à mↄ̀ ń vuao ń ã́nusuo ń pↄ́ pↄ́ a mae Davidi dìlɛ Lua pↄ́ ũↄ, a kà Lua kpɛ́ làasiu.
Ɔ̃ kí Salomↄↄ Isaili gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ sìsi Yelusalɛũ, an bui dↄaanaↄ ń ń uabeleↄ píi, aa mↄ Dii bàakuańnↄ kpagolo sɛ́ Davidi wɛ̃́lɛ Siↄna wà suò.
Ɔ̃ Isailiↄ kã̀aaaàzi ḿpii mↄ soplade dikpɛgↄↄzĩ.
Kɛ́ Isaili gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ kà píi, ↄ̃ Levii buiↄ Dii kpagolopi sɛ̀
ń kpaaũkpɛo ń Dii pↄ́ pↄ́ kú a guuↄ. Levii bui pↄ́ dɛ sa'onaↄ ũ mɛ́ pↄ́piↄ sɛ̀,
ↄ̃ kí Salomↄↄ ń Isaili pↄ́ kã̀aaàziↄ sa'ò ń sãↄ ń zuↄ kpagolopi aɛ. Pↄ́ pↄ́ à sa'òopiↄ dasi kɛ̀ zài, wi fↄ̃ nàoo.
Ɔ̃ sa'onaↄ gɛ̃̀ ń Dii bàakuańnↄ kpagoloo a kpɛ́u e kpɛa pↄ́ wì mɛ luakukĩi. Aa dìlɛ a dilɛkĩi we malaika gã̀sĩadeↄ zíɛ.
Malaikapiↄ gã̀sĩa poopooa gu pↄ́ kpagolo ń a sɛ́liↄ kuua.
A sɛ́lipiↄ gbã̀a, wì a lɛ́ e kpɛ́pi kpɛɛlɛ, wìli e uao. Lípiↄ ku we e gbã.
Pↄe ku kpagolopi guuo, mɛ́ i kɛ gbɛ̀ pɛ̀pɛɛ mɛ̀n pla pↄ́ Mↄizi dàu Olebu, gu pↄ́ Dii mɛ̀ a bàa aↄ kú ń Isailiↄ ń bↄa Egipi gbɛa bàasio.
Ɔ̃ sa'onaↄ bↄ̀lɛ Dii kpɛ́u. Gↄↄ bee sa'ona gãli pↄ́ kú we gbãbↄ̀ ńzĩaɛ píi kↄ̀.
Levii bui pↄ́ dɛ lɛ̀sina ũↄ, Asafa ń Emanio ń Yedutuo ń ń nɛ́ↄ ń ń dãunaↄ sĩ píi sa'okĩi gukpɛ oi ń bàabaa pↄkasaↄ dadaa, aalɛ sɛ̃́sɛ̃naↄ lɛ́ ń mↄↄnaↄ ń domaↄ. Sa'on kã̀aepɛnaↄ kú ń guu lↄ gbɛ̃ↄn basoolo.
Kã̀ae'ↄ ń lɛo dàkↄ̃i lán pↄ mɛ̀ndowa, aalɛ Dii táasilɛ, aalɛ lɛ́mawà. Aalɛ lɛsi ń kã̀aeↄ ń sɛ̃́sɛ̃naↄ ń pↄ́'ↄbↄn pãleↄ, aalɛ Dii táasilɛ aalɛ mɛ: A maa, aà gbɛ̃kɛ láaa vĩo. Tɛlu Dii kpɛ́pi pà,
ↄ̃ sa'onaↄ i fↄ̃ gɛ̃̀ zĩkɛi weo tɛlupi yã́i, asa Dii gawi kpɛ́pi pàɛ.
Ɔ̃ Salomↄↄ mɛ̀: Dii mɛ̀ áↄ ku tɛlu sia guuɛ.
Ɔ̃ a ò Diiɛ: Ma kpɛ́ lɛsĩɛ bee dↄ̀nɛ kɛ́ ǹyↄ̃ kuu gↄↄpiiɛ.
Ɔ̃ à lìli aɛdↄ̀ bílawa à samaa'ònɛ́.
Ɔ̃ à mɛ̀: Wà gbãakpa Dii Isailiↄ Luazi! À lɛgbɛ̃̀ ma mae Davidiɛ, ↄ̃ à kɛ̀ɛ̀ lá a òwa. Asa à mɛ̀
za gↄↄ pↄ́ a a gbɛ̃́ↄ bↄ̀lɛ Egipi, i Isaili wɛ̃́lɛe dilɛ wà kpɛdↄuɛo, mɛ́ i gbɛ̃e dilɛ a gbɛ̃́ Isailiↄ dↄaana ũo,
ↄ̃ à Yelusalɛũ dìlɛ kɛ́ a tↄ́ àↄ kuwà, mɛ́ à Davidi dìlɛ a gbɛ̃́ Isailiↄ dↄaana ũ.
Kɛ́ ma mae Davidi ye kpɛdↄ Dii Isailiↄ Luaɛ,
ↄ̃ Diipi òɛ̀ kpɛdↄaɛ kɛ́ a tↄ́ e àↄ kuwà làasoo pↄ́ a kɛ̀pi maaɛ,
ãma i kɛ aàpi mɛ́ a dↄɛo, aàzĩa nɛ́e mɛ́ a dↄɛ.
Dii kɛ̀ lá à lɛgbɛ̃̀ɛ̀wa, ↄ̃ ma gↄ̃ ma mae Davidi gɛ̃ɛ ũ, ma zↄ̃lɛ kpalau Isailiↄ guu, lá Dii Isailiↄ Lua a lɛgbɛ̃̀wa, ↄ̃ ma kpɛ́pi dↄ̀ɛ̀, kɛ́ aà tↄ́ e àↄ kuwà yã́i.
We ma Dii kpagolo dìlɛu. Dii bàa kua ń a gbɛ̃́ Isailiↄ yã́ kú a guu.
Salomↄↄ gɛ̀ zɛ̀ Dii gbagbakĩi kpɛɛlɛ Isaili pↄ́ kãaaa weↄ wáa píi, ↄ̃ à ↄsɛ̀ musu plapla.
Salomↄↄpi gĩ́na bò yãa ń mↄgotɛ̃o ua guoguoɛ. A gbã̀a ń a yàasao gã̀sĩsuu sↄ́sↄoɛ, a lɛsĩ sↄ̃ àaↄ̃. Ɔ̃ à dɛ̀dɛ gĩ́napiwa à kùlɛ a kosowa Isaili pↄ́ kãaaa weↄ aɛ, à ↄsɛ̀ musu
à mɛ̀: Dii Isailiↄ Lua, gbɛ̃e muaannↄ musu ge zĩ́lɛo. N gbɛ̃kɛ guu n bàa kú ń n zↄ̀blena pↄ́ aa ku lá ń yeiwa ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndooↄɛ.
N yã́ pↄ́ n a lɛgbɛ̃̀ n zↄ̀blena ma mae Davidiɛ kɛ̀. Ń ò ń lɛ́o yãaɛ, gbã sa ↄ̃ ń kɛ̀.
Tia kɛ́wa Dii Isailiↄ Lua, n lɛgbɛ̃̀ n zↄ̀blena ma mae Davidiɛ n mɛ̀, tó aà buiↄ ńzĩa kũa dↄ̃ mɛ́ aa ku lá ń yeiwa, aa n ikoyã kũa laaàwa, aaↄ zↄ̃lɛa kpalau Isailiↄ guu gↄↄpiiɛ.
Dii Isailiↄ Lua, to yã́ pↄ́ ń ò n zↄ̀blena Davidiɛ kɛ sĩana ũ sa.
Lua, ńyↄ̃ↄ kú ń gbɛ̃nazĩnaↄ zĩ́lɛ la yãma yã̀? Gwa, n bɛ pↄ́ kú musu ń gu pↄ́ kú musumusuo píi a fↄ̃ n sio, belenkɛ kpɛ́ pↄ́ má dↄ̀nɛɛ bee sa.
Dii ma Lua, mapi n zↄ̀blenawa wɛgwa, ní ma wabikɛa ń ma sùuugbɛaamao sí. Swã́sɛ wii pↄ́ mapi n zↄ̀blena málɛ lɛ́ma ń wabi pↄ́ málɛ kɛmaozi.
To n wɛ́ àↄ pɛa kpɛ́ɛ beewa gwãasĩna ń fãanɛo, gu pↄ́ n mɛ̀ n tↄ́ aↄ kuwàɛ beepi. Wabi pↄ́ mapi n zↄ̀blena málɛ kɛ ń aɛo dↄa gupiwa ma.
Tó mapi n zↄ̀blena ge n gbɛ̃́ Isailiↄ aɛdↄ̀ guɛ beewa, mɛ́ wa wabikɛ̀ma, nìli wá wabikɛa si za n kúkĩi musu, ní sùuukɛwanↄ.
Tó gbɛ̃́ tàaekɛ̀ a gbɛ̃́deeɛ, mɛ́ wa òɛ̀ aà mɛ á sì ń n tↄ́o, tó à mↄ̀ mɛ́ à mɛ̀ á sì ń n tↄ́o n gbagbakĩi kpɛɛlɛ kpɛ́ɛ beeu,
nìli síńnↄ kua za musu, ní ↄlↄnɛ́. Nìli yã́gↄ̃gↄ̃ n zↄ̀blenaↄnɛ, ní fĩabo tàaedeɛ, aà yãkɛa i wi aà musu, ní tó yã́ bↄ ń yãesaideo na, wí e dↄ̃ kɛ́ i yãe kɛo.
Tó n gbɛ̃́ Isailiↄ ibɛɛↄ zĩblèmá duuna pↄ́ aa kɛ̀ yã́i, mɛ́ aa tàńnↄ, mɛ́ aa ɛ̀a sùma aa n sisi, tó aa wabikɛ̀ma aa sùuugbɛ̀ama kpɛ́ɛ beeu,
kua za musu nìli síńnↄ, ní ń duuna kɛ̃́má, ní suńnↄ bùsu pↄ́ ń kpà ń deziↄwaɛ beeu.
Tó luabɛ gↄ̃̀ da wáiwai, lou lɛ́ mao kɛ́ aa duunakɛ̀nɛ yã́i, tó aa aɛdↄ̀ guɛ beewa, aa wabikɛ̀ma aa n sisi, mɛ́ aa mikɛ̃̀ ń duunaↄnɛ kɛ́ n ń wɛtã̀ yã́i,
kua za musu nìli síńnↄ, ní ń duuna kɛ̃́má. Nìli ń da zɛ́ maawa, ní tó lou ma bùsu pↄ́ ń kpà n gbɛ̃́ↄwa an pↄ́ ũɛ beeu.
Tó nↄana ge gagyã kà bùsuɛ beeu, ge pↄ́wɛn gbↄ̃si ge pↄ́ fukpaa ge kwasutɛ̃ↄ ge sɛ̃sɛwɛkwaↄ ge tó ibɛɛↄ koezↄ̃̀ ń wɛ̃́lɛezi ge tó músi ge gyã gɛ̃̀ńgu,
tó an gbɛ̃e yã́ pↄ́ a le dↄ̃̀ ń wãwã pↄ́ àlɛ kɛo, mɛ́ à ↄdↄ̀ kpɛ́ɛ bee oi, mɛ́ à wabikɛ̀ma à sùuugbɛ̀ama,
kua za musu nìli siaànↄ. Nìli sùuukɛaànↄ, ní fĩaboɛ̀ aà yãkɛawa, asa ń aà nↄ̀sɛ dↄ̃. Ḿmɛ ń gbɛ̃́pii nↄ̀sɛ dↄ̃.
Màa aaliↄ vĩakɛnɛ, aaↄ ku lá ń yeiwa e ń wɛ̃ni lɛ́u bùsu pↄ́ ń kpà ń deziↄwaɛ beeu.
Tó bↄ̀mↄ pↄ́ dɛ n gbɛ̃́ Isaili bui ũo bↄ̀ bùsu zã̀zãu à mↄ̀ n tↄ́ zↄ̃ↄ yã́i ń n ikoyão ń n ↄ pↄ́ pooa yã́o, tó à aɛdↄ̀ kpɛ́ɛ beewa à wabikɛ̀ma,
kua za musu nìli siaànↄ, ní yã́ pↄ́ a gbɛ̀ama kɛɛ̀, kɛ́ dṹnia bui píi e n tↄ́ dↄ̃, aai vĩakɛnɛ, lá n gbɛ̃́ Isailiↄ ì kɛnɛwa, aaiↄ dↄ̃ kɛ́ n tↄ́ kú kpɛ́ pↄ́ má dↄ̀ɛ beewa.
Tó n gbɛ̃́ↄ bↄ̀lɛ gɛ̀ zĩkai ń ń wɛ̀lɛↄ zĩlau, gu pↄ́ n ń zĩ́u píi, tó aa aɛdↄ̀ wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ ń dìlɛɛ bee ń kpɛ́ pↄ́ má dↄ̀nɛɛ beeowa, mɛ́ aa wabikɛ̀ma,
kua za musu nìli síńnↄ sùuu pↄ́ aa gbɛ̀ama yã́ musu, ní tó yã́ bↄńnↄ na.
Tó aa duunakɛ̀nɛ, lá gbɛ̃e ku à gí duunakɛio, mɛ́ n pↄ pàńzi n ń ná ń wɛ̀lɛↄnɛ ń ↄzĩ, mɛ́ aa tàńnↄ ń bùsuu zĩ̀zↄↄ ũ bùsu zã̀zã ge a kãina guun nò,
tó aa nↄ̀sɛlìlɛ bùsu pↄ́ aalɛ zↄblepiu, mɛ́ aa ɛ̀a sùuugbɛ̀ama we aa mɛ̀ wà duunakɛ̀, wà tàaekɛ̀, wà yãvãikɛ̀,
tó aa ɛ̀a sùma ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo ń pↄeão píi za bùsu pↄ́ wà tàuńnↄ, aalɛ zↄbleu, tó aa aɛdↄ̀ bùsu pↄ́ ń kpà ń deziↄwa ń wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ ń dìlɛo ń kpɛ́ pↄ́ má dↄ̀nɛɛ beeowa, mɛ́ aa wabikɛ̀ma,
kua za musu nìli síńnↄ sùuu pↄ́ aa gbɛ̀ama yã́ musu, ní tó yã́ bↄńnↄ na, ní sùuukɛ ń n gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa duunakɛ̀nɛↄ.
Tia kɛ́wa ma Lua, to n wɛ́ àↄ pɛa guɛ beewa, ní swã́sɛ wabi pↄ́ wa su kɛma lai.
Dii Lua, pila su n kúkĩi sa, mpi ń n gbãa kpagoloo. Dii Lua, to gbɛ̃́ↄ suabaa àↄ dↄ n sa'onaↄ sↄ̃wa, to n yãmanaↄ pↄnakɛ n maa yã́i.
Dii Lua, ńsu bↄ kía pↄ́ ń kpà kpɛo. To gbɛ̃kɛ pↄ́ ń kɛ̀ n zↄ̀blena Davidiɛ yã́ àↄ dↄngu.
Kɛ́ Salomↄↄ wabikɛ̀ a làa, tɛ́ bↄ̀ luabɛ à sù sa pↄ́ a ò pↄ́ↄwa à tɛkũ̀, ↄ̃ Dii gawi kpɛ́pi pà.
Sa'onaↄ i fↄ̃ gɛ̃̀uo, Dii gawi pↄ́ kpɛ́pi pà yã́i.
Kɛ́ Isailiↄ tɛ́pi sua è ń Dii gawipio a kpɛ́ musu, aa wùlɛ ń gbɛɛu aa misìilɛɛ̀, aa Dii sáaukpà aa mɛ̀: A maa, aà gbɛ̃kɛ láaa vĩo.
Ɔ̃ kí ń gbɛ̃́piio sa'ò Diiwa.
Kí Salomↄↄ sa'òwà ń zuↄ ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bao ń plao (22.000) ń sãↄ ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ basoolo (120.000). Màa kí ń gbɛ̃́piio Dii kpɛ́ sakɛ̃̀.
Sa'onaↄ zɛa ń zɛkĩi, mɛ́ Levii buiↄ ku we, aalɛ Dii sáaukpa ń pↄ́'ↄbↄna pↄ́ kí Davidi kɛ̀, à Dii táasilɛ̀òↄ à mɛ̀: Aà gbɛ̃kɛ láaa vĩo. Sa'on kã̀aepɛnaↄ kú ń aɛ, mɛ́ Isaili bui píi gↄ̃̀ sĩa.
Salomↄↄ gbãbↄ̀ ua pↄ́ kú Dii kpɛ́ kpɛɛlɛɛ, ↄ̃ à sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ ò we ń pↄ́wɛn gbao ń sáaukpaa sa'obↄ nísio, asa sa'okĩi pↄ́ a kɛ̀ ń mↄgotɛ̃o i fↄ̃ pↄ́piↄ sì píio.
Zĩbeezĩ Salomↄↄ ń Isailiↄ píi aa dikpɛkɛ̀ e gↄↄ sopla. Wa dasi maamaaɛ, wà bↄ̀ za Amata bↄlɛi e à gɛ̀ pɛ̀ Egipi zɛ́ swawa.
A gↄↄ swaaↄ̃de zĩ́ wà kↄ̃ kã̀aa, asa wà sa'okĩi sakɛ̃a dikpɛkɛ̀ gↄↄ soplaɛ, ↄ̃ wà ɛ̀a wà Lákpɛdↄa dikpɛkɛ̀ gↄↄ sopla lↄ.
Mↄ soplade gↄↄ bao ń àaↄ̃ode zĩ́ ↄ̃ à ń kɛ̃́, aa tà ń bɛ ń pↄnao. An pↄ kɛ̀na yãmaa pↄ́ Dii kɛ̀ Davidi ń Salomↄↄo ń a gbɛ̃́ Isailiↄnɛ yã́ musu.
Kɛ́ Salomↄↄ Dii kpɛ́ mìdɛ ń azĩa bɛo ń zĩ pↄ́ a pↄ dↄwà à kɛ Dii kpɛ́u ń a bɛpio, a làa píi,
ↄ̃ Dii bↄ̀ mↄ̀wà gwãasĩna, a òɛ̀: Ma wabi pↄ́ ń kɛ̀a mà, ma guɛ bee dìlɛ ma kpɛ́ pↄ́ wàli sa'oua ũɛ.
Tó ma musu zɛ́ tà mɛ́ lou lɛ́ mao, ge tó ma kwaↄ gbàɛwá, aalɛ á bùsu pↄ́ↄ ble, ge tó ma gagyãkà ma gbɛ̃́ↄgu,
tó ma gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ma tↄ́ kúmápiↄ ńzĩa bùsa, aalɛ wabikɛa, aalɛ ma aɛya, aalɛ ń zɛ́ vãiↄ tó, kua za musu má síńnↄ, mí ń duuna kɛ̃́má, mí ń bùsu gba aafia.
Ma wɛ́ iↄ pɛa guɛ beewa, mí swã́sɛ wabi pↄ́ wàlɛ kɛui.
Ma kpɛ́ɛ bee sɛ̀ má dìlɛ ma pↄ́ ũɛ, kɛ́ ma tↄ́ e àↄ kuwà gↄↄpii. Ma wɛ́ iↄ pɛwà, ma pↄ iↄ dↄwà gↄↄpii.
Mpi sↄ̃, tó ń tɛmazi lá n mae Davidiwa, mɛ́ ń yã́ pↄ́ má dìlɛnɛↄ kũa ń ma yã'onɛↄ, mɛ́ ńlɛ ma ↄtondↄkĩi gwa,
má n zↄ̃lɛa kpalau zɛdↄ, lá ma a lɛgbɛ̃̀ n mae Davidiɛwa, ma mɛ̀ aà buiↄ aaↄ zↄ̃lɛa kpalau Isailiↄ guu gↄↄpiiɛ.
Tó a bↄ ma kpɛ sↄ̃, tó a pãkpà ma ikoyãↄ ń yã́ pↄ́ má dìlɛɛ́ↄzi, mɛ́ a gɛ lɛ́ zↄble dii pãleↄnɛ, álɛ ń sisi,
má á bↄlɛ bùsu pↄ́ má kpàwáuɛ, mí gí kpɛ́ pↄ́ má dìlɛ ma pↄ́ ũpizi, i gↄ̃ láanipↄ ũ, bui píi i yãadaò.
Baa ń kpɛ́pi lɛsĩkɛo, a yã́ a di gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ gɛ̃ weↄwa, aa mɛ: Bↄ́ yã́ mɛ́ tò Dii kɛ̀ bùsuɛ bee ń kpɛ́ɛ beeoɛ màai?
Wi onɛ́: Kɛ́ aa pãkpà Dii ń deziↄ Lua pↄ́ ń bↄ́lɛ Egipizi yã́iɛ. Aa zɛ̀ ń dii pãleↄ, aa ń sisi aa zↄblènɛ́ɛ. Bee mɛ́ yã́piↄ ìnɛ́ píi.
Salomↄↄ Dii kpɛ́ ń azĩa kpɛ́o dↄ̀ wɛ̃̀ baoɛ. A gbɛa
à wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ Hilaũ kpàwaↄ kɛ̀kɛ kàlɛ, ↄ̃ a kpà Isailiↄwa, aa zↄ̃̀lɛu.
À gɛ̀ ń zĩo Amata Zoba, ↄ̃ a sì.
À Tamↄↄ pↄ́ kú guwaiwaiu kɛ̀kɛ kàlɛ lↄ ń kũ̀sũakalɛwɛ̃lɛ pↄ́ a kàlɛ Amata bùsuuↄ.
À Bɛtoloni Musu ń Bɛtoloni Zĩ́lɛo kɛ̀kɛ kàlɛ wɛ̃́lɛ bĩ́ideↄ ũ. Bĩ́ipiↄ bↄlɛ gbaↄ ń gbã́aↄ vĩ.
Màa a kɛ̀ Baalata ń wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ a kũ̀sũa kálɛuↄ píi ń wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ aà sↄ̃́goↄ kuuↄ. Kpɛ́ pↄ́ a ye dↄ Yelusalɛũ ń Libão ń bùsu pↄ́ àlɛ kiblewàↄ píi, a dↄ̀.
Bui pↄ́ dɛ Isaili ũoↄ: Itiↄ, Amↄleↄ, Pɛliziↄ, Iviↄ ń Yebusi kↄ̃naↄ píi,
gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Isailiↄ i ń midɛoↄ, an bui pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ ń bùsuupiↄ ↄ̃ Salomↄↄ ń dá zↄzĩu, ↄ̃ aaìↄ zĩkɛ màa e ń a gbão.
I Isailiↄ da zↄzĩpiuo. Ampiↄ ↄ̃ à ń dílɛ a zĩgↄ̃ↄ ń a kía deeↄ ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ dↄaanaↄ ń a zĩkasↄ̃godeↄ ń a sↄ̃deↄ ũ.
An gbɛ̃́ↄ mɛ́ zĩ pↄ́ kí Salomↄↄ lɛ́ kɛpi gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ũ lↄ, aa gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa do ń blakwioɛ.
Salomↄↄ bↄ̀ Davidi wɛ̃́lɛu ń a nↄ Falaↄ̃ↄ nɛnↄɛo, à mↄ̀aànↄ kpɛ́ pↄ́ a dↄ̀ɛ̀u, asa à mɛ̀: Ma napi a e àↄ ku Isailiↄ kí Davidi bɛo, asa gu pↄ́ Dii kpagolo gɛ̃̀u a kua adoaɛ.
Salomↄↄ ìↄ sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ o Dii gbagbakĩi pↄ́ a bò Dii kpɛ́ bilandaa kpɛɛlɛwa.
Ìↄ o lá gu lɛ́ dↄ lá Mↄizi dìlɛ wà owa ń kã́mabogↄↄzĩ pↄ́ↄ ń mↄ dafu pↄ́ↄ ń dikpɛ mɛ̀n àaↄ̃ pↄ́ wì kɛ wɛ̃ ń wɛ̃o pↄ́ↄ, Kàaso dikpɛ ń Pↄkɛkɛ dikpɛo ń Lákpɛdↄa dikpɛo. Màa à Dii kpɛ́ yã́ↄ kɛ̀ lá à kũ̀wa.
À sa'on gãliↄ dìlɛdilɛ baade ń a zĩo lá a mae Davidi òwa. À Levii bui kĩniↄ dìlɛdilɛ lↄ, an gbɛ̃eↄ lí dↄaa ń Dii táasilɛao, an gbɛ̃eↄ lí dↄ sa'onaↄlɛ ń zĩ pↄ́ aalɛ kɛ lá gu lɛ́ dↄo. À ń gbɛ̃eↄ dìlɛ bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ ũ gã ń gão, bↄlɛ ń bↄlɛo, asa màa Lua gbɛ̃́ Davidi ò.
Sa'onaↄ ń Levii buiↄ i bↄ yã́ pↄ́ kí dìlɛnɛ́e kpɛo, baa làasi yã́.
Wà zĩ pↄ́ Salomↄↄ dànɛ́ kɛ̀ píiɛ, za gↄↄ pↄ́ wà Dii kpɛ́ ɛ̃ kpàlɛ e wà gɛ̀ a mìdɛò. Màa wà Dii kpɛ́ dↄ̀ wa làa.
Kí Salomↄↄ gɛ̀ Ɛziↄ̃gɛbɛɛ ń Elatao Ɛdↄũ bùsuu ísia saɛ.
Hilaũ a gode pↄ́ ísia dↄ̃ↄ zĩ̀wà ń gó'ilɛnaↄ, ↄ̃ aa dà ísiaa sãnu ń Salomↄↄ gbɛ̃́ↄ. Aa gɛ̀ Ofii aa vua nàaa we tↄnu gɛ̃o ń mɛ̀ndoo, ↄ̃ aa sùò kí Salomↄↄɛ.
Kɛ́ Seba bùsu nↄɛ kía Salomↄↄ bao mà, ↄ̃ à mↄ̀ aà lɛ́i à gwa Yelusalɛũ ń yã́ zĩ'ũ laawào. À kà ń a ìwaↄ dasidasi ń pↄ́ gĩnanaↄ ń vuao zↄ̃ↄzↄ̃ↄ ń gbɛ̀ bɛɛɛde pↄ́ yiongo sɛaↄ, ↄ̃ à gɛ̀ Salomↄↄ kĩ́i à yã́ pↄ́ kú a nↄ̀sɛ guu faai bòaànↄ píi.
Salomↄↄ yã́ pↄ́ a làwaↄ bↄↄlɛkɛ̀ɛ̀ píi. A kee poloa i aà fuo.
Kɛ́ nↄɛ kíapi Salomↄↄ ↄ̃nↄyã mà, mɛ́ à kpɛ́ pↄ́ a dↄ̀ è
ń blɛ pↄ́ ì bleo ń aà ìwaↄ gweao ń aà bɛ zĩkɛnaↄ kuao ń ń pↄkasaↄ ń vɛ̃ɛbↄlɛnaↄ ń ń pↄkasaↄ ń sa pↄ́ a ò Dii uaↄ, yã́pi dìwà, ↄ̃ aà lɛ́ gↄ̃̀ ɛlɛa.
Ɔ̃ a ò kíɛ: N yãkɛaↄ ń n ↄ̃nↄ bao pↄ́ má mà za ma bùsuuoá sĩanaɛ.
Mi n yã́piↄ sio e ma gɛ kaò la, tia ↄ̃ ma wɛsìɛ sa. Wi n ↄ̃nↄ zↄ̃ↄ yã'omɛɛ píio fá! Ń dɛ lá ma n bao màa.
Minadeↄn n gbɛ̃́ↄ ũ, n ìwa pↄ́ aaìↄ kunnↄ gↄↄpii aaì swãdↄ n ↄ̃nↄyãiↄ!
Wà Dii n Lua sáaukpa, asa n yã́ kàaàguɛ, ↄ̃ à n kpa kpala pↄ́ a dìlɛu kía ũ. Kɛ́ n Lua ye Isailiↄzi, ìↄ zɛńnↄ gↄↄpii yã́ mɛ́ tò à n kpa ń kía ũ, kɛ́ ǹ yã́gↄ̃gↄ̃nɛ́ a zɛ́wa.
Ɔ̃ à kía gbà vua tↄnu síiↄ̃ ń pↄ́ gĩnanaↄ dasidasi ń gbɛ̀ bɛɛɛdeↄ. Pↄ́ gĩnana pↄ́ à kí Salomↄↄ gbàpiↄ zↄ̃ↄ, gbɛ̃e i mↄoɛ̀ à kà màa lↄo.
Hilaũ gó'ilɛna pↄ́ sù ń Ofiio ń vuaoↄ sù ń lí bɛɛɛdeo maamaa ń gbɛ̀ bɛɛɛdeↄ lↄ.
Kí Dii kpɛ́ ń azĩa kpɛ́o pↄ́ↄ kɛ̀ò, mɛ́ à mↄↄnaↄ ń kúuↄ kɛ̀ò lɛ̀sinaↄnɛ lↄ. Wi mↄ́ ń lípi buio à kà màa lↄo, wi wɛsiɛ beewa lↄo e gbã.
Pↄ́ pↄ́ Seba bùsu nↄɛ kía yei, a gbɛ̀a kí Salomↄↄwa, ↄ̃ à aà gbà. À gbadàɛ̀ dɛ pↄ́ pↄ́ à mↄ̀oɛa. Ɔ̃ nↄɛpi ɛ̀a tà a bùsuu ń a ìwaↄ.
Vua pↄ́ Salomↄↄ ìↄ e wɛ̃ ń wɛ̃oↄ ì ka tↄnu bao ń àaↄ̃o,
falu pↄ́ tagɛnaↄ ń laatanaↄ ì bↄɛ̀ bàasi. Laalubu kíaↄ ń bùsu gbãadeↄ ì mↄɛ̀ ń vuao ń ã́nusuo lↄ.
À sɛ̀ngbao zↄ̃ↄↄ kɛ̀ ń vua pↄ́ wa gbɛ̃̀gbɛ̃o mɛ̀n ↄ̀aa do, an baade gbia kiloo àaↄ̃'aaↄ̃ ń kĩnioɛ.
À sɛ̀ngbao nɛ́naↄ kɛ̀ò lↄ, an baade gbia ye kai kiloo plapla. À sɛ̀ngbaopiↄ kàlɛ kpɛ́ pↄ́ wì mɛ Libã Líkpɛu.
Kí a kiblekila zↄ̃ↄ kɛ̀ ń wesa swaao, ↄ̃ à vua tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ kùlɛwà.
Kìlapi dɛdɛkĩi vĩ, a gbápɛkĩiↄ sooloɛ, mɛ́ à gbadibↄ kɛ̀ kìlapiwa ń vuao. A gã̀sĩdikĩiↄ vĩ, nↄ̀ↄmusu pↄ́ wa kɛ̀ↄ zɛzɛ gã̀sĩdikĩipiↄ saɛ.
Nↄ̀ↄmusu kɛapiↄ zɛzɛ gbápɛkĩipiↄwa plapla ↄplaai ń zɛɛo, apii kɛ̀ kuɛpla. Wi kìlapi taa kɛ bùsueu yãao.
Kí Salomↄↄ imibↄↄá vuaɛ píi. Kpɛ́ pↄ́ wì mɛ Libã Líkpɛ pↄ́ↄ píiá vua tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛɛ, ã́nusu pↄe ku weo, asa wìli ã́nusu dilɛ pↄe ũ Salomↄↄ gↄↄo.
Kí ísia gó'ilɛnaↄ ìↄ daa ísiaa ń Hilaũ gbɛ̃́ↄ. Wɛ̃̀ àaↄ̃ ń wɛ̃̀ àaↄ̃o ↄ̃ aaìↄ su ń vuao ń ã́nusuo ń wesa swaao ń gbaũↄ ń bã bui maaↄ.
Kí Salomↄↄ àizɛɛ ń a ↄ̃nↄo zↄ̃ↄ dɛ dṹnia kíaↄ pↄ́a píi.
Dṹnia kíaↄ zɛwɛ̀ɛlɛ píi wà wɛsi Salomↄↄlɛ, wi swã́sɛ ↄ̃nↄ pↄ́ Lua dàɛ̀ aà sↄ̃uzi.
Wɛ̃ ń wɛ̃o wìↄ mↄɛ̀ baade ń a gbao: Ãnusu pↄ́ↄ, vua pↄ́ↄ, ulaↄ, gↄ̃kɛbↄↄ, pↄ́ gĩnanaↄ, sↄ̃́ↄ ń a baonaↄ.
Salomↄↄ sↄ̃́ pↄ́ ì gó gálɛↄ kɛ̃́ɛ ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ síiↄ̃ɛ (4.000), a pↄ́ wì dikpɛↄ sↄ̃ ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ kuɛpla (12.000). Aa ku sↄ̃́go wɛ̃́lɛↄ guu ń aà bɛ Yelusalɛũo.
Sɛa za Uflatai ń Filitɛ̃ bùsuo e à gɛ̀ pɛ̀ Egipi bùsu lɛ́wa, ↄ̃mɛ bùsupiↄ píi kía ũ.
Kí tò ã́nusu di Yelusalɛũ lán gbɛwa, mɛ́ sɛdɛ lí pↄ́ wà kpɛdↄ̀ò dasi lán bɛ̀lɛ líwa sɛ̃u.
Salomↄↄ sↄ̃́piↄ bↄ̀ Egipi ń bùsu pãleↄɛ.
