Gbɛ̃eↄ bↄ̀ Tɛmɛla ń Tɛlaasao ń Kelubuo ń Adↄ̃o ń Imɛɛo, ↄ̃ aai e ń buibↄkĩi ònɛ́o, tó Isailiↄn ń ũ.
Delaia ń Tobiao ń Nɛkodao buiↄnɛ, mɛ́ aa kà gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ ń blakwi ń plao (652).
Sa'ona bui pↄ́ dɛ Ɔbaia ń Akozio ń Baazilaio buiↄ ũ sù lↄ. Baazilaipi Galada bùsu gbɛ̃́ Baazilai nɛ́ sɛ̀ yãa, ↄ̃ à a ã̀nsuepi tↄ́ sɛ̀.
Gbɛ̃́piↄ ń tↄ́ wɛ̀ɛlɛ buibↄkĩi taalau, kási aai bↄwào, ↄ̃ wà gìnɛ́ ń sa'ozĩo.
Bùsu dↄaana ònɛ́, mɛ́ i kɛ sa'ona ń yã́ gwà ń Uliũo ń Tumiũo bàasio, aasu sa'oblɛ bleo.
Gbɛ̃́piↄ píi gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bla ń plao ń ↄ̀aa doo ń baswaaↄ̃oɛ (42.360).
An zↄ̀blenaↄ gↄ̃ɛ ń nↄɛo ku lↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ sopla ń ↄ̀aa doo ń basopla àaↄ̃saio (7.337). Lɛ̀sinaↄ gↄ̃ɛ ń nↄɛo kúńnↄ lↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa do.
Aa sↄ̃́ vĩ mɛ̀n ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ ń basopla síiↄ̃saio (736), sↄ̃baona ↄ̀aa do ń blasↄoo,
yiongo ↄ̀aa pla ń bla sↄosaio (435), zàa'ĩna ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ soolo ń ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃o ń basooloo (6.720).
Kɛ́ aa kà Dii kpɛ́ dↄkĩi Yelusalɛũ, an uabeleeↄ gbadàda, kɛ́ aa e Lua kpɛ́ kɛkɛ dↄò a gbɛu.
Aa gbadà kpɛ́ zĩ kpagolo guu ń gbãa lɛ́u, vua kiloo ↄ̀aa pla ń basↄoo (500), ã́nusu tↄnu àaↄ̃ ń sa'ona ulataoↄ basↄo.
Sa'onaↄ ń Levii buiↄ ń lɛ̀sinaↄ ń bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ ń Lua ua zĩkɛnaↄ ń gbɛ̃pãleeↄ zↄ̃̀lɛzↄ̃lɛ wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ wa kɛ̀kɛnɛ́ↄ guu, ↄ̃ Isaili kĩniↄ zↄ̃̀lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛↄ guu.
Kɛ́ wɛ̃̀ mↄ soplade kà, Isailiↄ sù zↄ̃̀lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛↄ guu píi. Ɔ̃ aa kã̀aa Yelusalɛũ lán gbɛ̃́ mɛ̀ndowa.
Yozada nɛ́ Yesua ń a sa'on deeↄ ń Salatiɛli nɛ́ Zolobabɛlio ń a gbɛ̃́ Isailiↄ Lua gbagbakĩi bò, kɛ́ aa sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ owà, lá Lua gbɛ̃́ Mↄizi ò a ikoyã guuwa.
Baa kɛ́ aalɛ vĩakɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú bùsupi guuↄnɛ, aa gbagbakĩipi bò a gbɛuɛ, ↄ̃ aa sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ ò Diiwa kↄↄ ń oosio.
Aa Lákpɛdↄa dikpɛkɛ̀ lá a ku lápi guuwa, aaìↄ sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ o lá gu lɛ́ dↄ, lá wà a lɛ́ dìlɛwa.
Bee gbɛa aa sa pↄ́ wìↄ o gↄↄpii ò ń mↄ dafu pↄ́o ń dikpɛ pↄ́ Dii dìlɛↄ pↄ́o ń gba pↄ́ wì mↄoɛ̀ↄ.
Mↄ soplade gↄↄ sɛ̃́ia zĩ́ ↄ̃ aa nà Dii gbagbaawa màa, baa kɛ́ wi aà kpɛ́ dↄ yãao.
Aa ↄ̃a kpà gbɛ̀'ãnaↄ ń li'ãnaↄwa, ↄ̃ aa pↄblea ń imiao ń nísio kpà Sidↄ̃deↄ ń Tiideↄwa, kɛ́ aa sɛdɛ lí zↄ̃zↄ̃ Libã bùsuu, aa yeye gɛò Zope daa ísiaa, lá Pɛɛsiↄ kía Kilusi ń gbá zɛ́wa.
An kaa Lua kpɛ́ dↄkĩi Yelusalɛũ wɛ̃̀ plaade mↄ plaade guu, Salatiɛli nɛ́ Zolobabɛli ń Yozada nɛ́ Yesuao nà zĩwa ń ń gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ, sa'onaↄ ń Levii buiↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ bↄ̀ zĩ̀zↄkɛu aa sù Yelusalɛũↄ píi. Aa Levii bui pↄ́ kà wɛ̃̀ bao ge aa dɛaↄ dìlɛ Dii kpɛ́ zĩpi gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ũ.
Yesua ń a buiↄ nàkↄ̃wa ń Kamiɛlio ń aà nɛ́ Odavia buiↄ, ↄ̃ aa gↄ̃̀ zĩpi gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ũ ń Enadao ń aà buiↄ. Levii buiↄnɛ ḿpii.
Kɛ́ Dii kpɛbonaↄ lɛ́ kpɛ́pi ɛ̃ kpálɛ, sa'onaↄ zɛzɛ we sa'on pↄkasaↄ dadaa, aa ń kuuↄ kṹkũa, mɛ́ Levii nɛ́ Asafa buiↄ ku we lↄ ń sɛ̃́sɛ̃naↄ aa Dii táasilɛò, lá Isailiↄ kí Davidi ò yãawa.
Aa lɛsì aa Dii táasilɛ̀, aa aà sáaukpà aa mɛ̀: Dii maa, aà gbɛ̃kɛkɛa wá Isailiↄnɛ láaa vĩo. Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃́pii wii gbãa lɛ̀ aa Dii táasilɛ̀, kɛ́ wà Dii kpɛ́ ɛ̃ kpàlɛ yã́i.
Kási sa'on daside ń Levii buiↄ ń uabele pↄ́ zikũ̀ aa wɛsì kpɛ́ káaulɛↄ, kɛ́ aa kpɛ́pi ɛ̃boa è, aa búbuapɛ̀ɛ. Gbɛ̃́ dasideↄ sↄ̃ aalɛ pↄna wii lɛ.
Gbɛ̃e pↄna wii dↄ̃kↄ̃ɛ ń búbua pↄ́ wàlɛ pɛ́o lↄo, kɛ́ baade lɛ́ wii gbãa lɛ yã́i, mɛ́ wà kↄ̃fĩpi mà zã̀.
Kɛ́ Yudaↄ ń Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ buiↄ ibɛɛↄ mà zĩ̀zↄ pↄ́ sùↄ lɛ́ kpɛ́ bo Dii Isailiↄ Luaɛ,
aa mↄ̀ Zolobabɛli ń uabeleↄ lè, aa ònɛ́: À to wà kpɛ́ boánↄ, asa wi á Lua kĩ́i wɛɛlɛ lááwa sↄ̃ɛ. Wiↄ aà gbagbaɛ za gↄↄ pↄ́ Asiliↄ kí Esaadↄ̃ sùwanↄ la.
Ɔ̃ Zolobabɛli ń Yesuao ń Isaili uabele kĩniↄ ònɛ́: Wá Lua kpɛ́ boa dɛ á yã́ ũo. Wá wá pↄ́ bo Dii Isailiↄ Luaɛ wátɛ̃ɛ, lá Pɛɛsiↄ kí Kilusi dìlɛwɛ̃ɛwaɛ.
Ɔ̃ bùsupideↄ lɛ́ wɛɛlɛ Yudaↄ kãdɛ, aalɛ ĩadamá, kɛ́ aasu kpɛ́pi boo yã́i.
Aa fĩabò kía lɛdamadeↄnɛ za Kilusi gↄↄ e à gɛ̀ pɛ̀ Pɛɛsiↄ kí Daliusi kpalablegↄↄwa, ↄ̃ aa gìnɛ́ ń yã́ pↄ́ aalɛ yáo.
Aa lakɛ̃ Aasueluɛ aà kpalablea daalɛgↄↄ, aa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú Yelusalɛũↄ ń Yuda bùsuo píi káalakɛ̀ɛ̀.
Biselaũ ń Miledao ń Tabeelio ń ń gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ lakɛ̃ Pɛɛsiↄ kí Aatasasaɛ lↄ aà kpalablegↄↄ. Aa kɛ̃̀ɛ̀ ń Sili yã́o, ↄ̃ wà a bↄↄlɛkɛ̀ɛ̀.
Bùsu gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ Leuũ ń a lakɛ̃na Simɛsaio lakɛ̃ kí Aatasasaɛ Yelusalɛũ yã́ musu lↄ aa mɛ̀:
Bùsu gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ Leuũ ń a lakɛ̃na Simɛsaio ń ń gbɛ̃́ kĩni Dinadeↄ ń Afaasatadeↄ ń Taapɛlideↄ ń Afaasideↄ ń Ɛlɛkideↄ ń Babɛlideↄ ń Susade pↄ́ bↄ̀lɛ Elaũ bùsuuↄ
ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kía zↄ̃ↄ bɛɛɛde Asenapa ń bↄ́lɛ ń bùsuu aa ń zↄ̃́lɛzↄ̃lɛ Samali wɛ̃́lɛu ń Uflata baala gupãleuↄ,
wá Uflata baaladeↄ n zↄ̀blenaↄ mɛ́ lápi kɛ̃̀nɛ kí Aatasasa, wa mɛ̀:
Kí, ǹyↄ̃ dↄ̃ kɛ́ Yuda pↄ́ bↄ̀ n kĩ́i aa sù laↄ gɛ̀ lɛ́ Yelusalɛũ wɛ̃́lɛ vãi pãsĩpi kálɛ, aa ɛ̀a lɛ́ a bĩ́ibo lↄ, aalɛ a bɛzia fɛlɛ.
Kí, ǹyↄ̃ dↄ̃ lↄ, tó aa ɛ̀a wɛ̃́lɛpi kàlɛ aa a bĩ́ibò wa làa, aa falubↄnɛ lↄo ge ɛlɛ'ↄ̃a ge wɛ̃̀'ↄ̃a, aai n ↄ̃a pↄ́ ni si kɛ̃́sã.
Tia kɛ́wa kí, lá ḿmɛ ń wá ũ, i kũ wà n kpɛ eo. A yã́i wa láɛ bee kpã̀sãinɛ kɛ́ wà yã́pi onɛ.
Wɛɛlɛ n deziↄ láↄ guu ǹ gwa, ní e dↄ̃ lá wɛ̃́lɛpideↄ swã́ gbãa, aa ĩadà kíaↄwa ń bùsu gbãadeↄ. Za zi wɛ̃́lɛpideↄ yãkele kɛ̀ zài. Bee yã́ mɛ́ tò wà wɛ̃́lɛpi dúuzↄ̃̀i.
Kí, wálɛ onɛ, tó wà ɛ̀a wɛ̃́lɛpi fɛ̀lɛ, wà ɛ̀a a bĩ́ibò wa làa, ńyↄ̃ↄ pↄe vĩ Uflata baala lↄo.
Bee gbɛa kía lá kpã̀sãnɛ́ à mɛ̀: Bùsu gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ Leuũ ń a lakɛ̃na Simɛsaio ń á gbɛ̃́ kĩni pↄ́ kú Samali ń Uflata baaleↄ, ma fↄkpàwá.
Lá pↄ́ á kpã̀sãmɛɛ, wà a kyokɛ̀ wà a bↄↄlɛkɛ̀mɛɛ.
Má ò wà wɛɛlɛ lá ziↄ guu, ↄ̃ wa è sĩanaɛ, wɛ̃́lɛpideↄ ìↄ bↄ kíaↄ kpɛɛ. Za zi yãkeledeↄnɛ.
Kía zↄ̃ↄↄ kpalablè Yelusalɛũ we, aa gbãablè Uflata baaledeↄwa píi, wà falubↄ̀nɛ́ ń ɛlɛ'ↄ̃ao ń wɛ̃̀'ↄ̃ao.
À yãdilɛ gbɛ̃́piↄnɛ aa kã́mabo sa. Aasu ɛa wɛ̃́lɛpi vuo e mà ń gba lɛ́.
À laaika! Ásu niazĩkpa yã́pizio, kɛ́ vãipi su ↄta, aa wá ásookɛo yã́i.
Kɛ́ wà kí Aatasasa lápi kyokɛ̀, wà a bↄↄlɛkɛ̀ Leuũɛ ń a lakɛ̃na Simɛsaio ń ń gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ, ↄ̃ aa fɛ̀lɛ gɛ̀ Yudaↄ lè Yelusalɛũ gↄ̃̀ↄ. Aa gìnɛ́ pãsĩpãsĩ aa mɛ̀ aa kã́mabo.
Beewa aa kã́mabò ń Lua kpɛ́ zĩ pↄ́ aalɛ kɛ Yelusalɛũo e Pɛɛsiↄ kí Daliusi kpalablea wɛ̃̀ plaade guu.
Ãnabi Age ń ãnabi Zakali, Ido nɛ́o ãnabikɛkɛ̀ Yuda pↄ́ kú Yelusalɛũↄ ń Yuda bùsuo píi ń Isailiↄ Lua tↄ́o.
Ɔ̃ Salatiɛli nɛ́ Zolobabɛli ń Yozada nɛ́ Yesuao fɛ̀lɛ nà Lua kpɛ́ boawa Yelusalɛũ. Lua ãnabipiↄ kúńnↄ, aalɛ dↄńlɛ.
Wegↄ̃ↄ Uflata baala dↄaana Tatɛnai ń Setaa Bozenaio ń ń gbɛ̃́ↄ mↄ̀ ń lé, aa ń lá aa mɛ̀: Démɛ á gbá zɛ́ à kpɛ́ɛ bee kɛkɛ boi?
Aa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ kpɛ́pi boↄ tↄ́ gbɛ̀a lↄ.
Ń beeo Lua lɛ́ wɛ́tɛ Yuda gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpiↄzi, ↄ̃ aai onɛ́ aa kã́maboo. Aa mɛ̀ wà lɛ́kpãsãkɛ Daliusiɛ gĩa, aai lá pↄ́ a kɛ̃ a yã́ musu e.
Uflata baala dↄaana Tatɛnai ń Setaa Bozenaio ń ń gbɛ̃́ Pɛɛsi buiↄ lakɛ̃, ↄ̃ aa kpã̀sã kí Daliusiɛ.
Lɛ́kpãsã pↄ́ aa kɛ̀ɛ̀n kɛ, aa mɛ̀: Kí Daliusi, wa fↄkpàma maamaa.
Kí, ǹyↄ̃ dↄ̃ kɛ́ wa gɛ Yuda bùsuu e Lua zↄ̃ↄde kpɛ́u. Wàlɛ kpɛ́pi bo ń gbɛ̀ gbɛ̃̀nɛↄ, wàlɛ lí da kpɛ́pi gĩↄwa. Wàlɛ zĩpi kɛ ń laaio, àlɛ táa'o.
Wa yãlàla ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄwa wa mɛ̀: Démɛ á gbá zɛ́ à kpɛ́ɛ bee kɛkɛ boi?
Wa ń tↄ́ gbɛ̀a kɛ́ wà e onɛ, ↄ̃ wa ń dↄaanapiↄ tↄ́ dàlau.
Lá aa yã́zãsìwán kɛ: Aa mɛ̀ musu ń zĩ́lɛo Lua zↄ̀blenaↄn ń ũ. Kpɛ́ pↄ́ wa bò yãa à wɛ̃ kɛ̀, ↄ̃ wa kɛ̀kɛ lɛ́ bo lↄ. Isailiↄ kí zↄ̃ↄ mɛ́ bò yãa.
Aa mɛ̀ ń deziↄ Lua Musude pↄ fɛ̀lɛ, ↄ̃ à ń ná Babiloni bui Nɛbukanɛza, Babɛli kíaɛ a ↄzĩ, ↄ̃ à kpɛ́pi wìwi à gbɛ̃́piↄ sɛ̀lɛ tàńnↄ Babɛli.
Bee gbɛa Babɛli kí Kilusi kpalablea wɛ̃̀ sɛ̃́ia guu à yãdìlɛ à mɛ̀ wà ɛa Lua kpɛ́pi bo lↄ.
Baa vua ń ã́nusu pↄ́ pↄ́ Nɛbukanɛza sɛ̀lɛ Lua kpɛ́u Yelusalɛũ, a kàlɛ a tã́akpɛu Babɛliↄ, kí Kilusi bↄ̀lɛ kpà Sesebazaa pↄ́ à aà dìlɛ bùsu dↄaana ũwaɛ.
A òɛ̀ aà pↄ́piↄ sɛ gɛ kálɛ Lua kpɛ́u Yelusalɛũ, tó wà kpɛ́pi kɛ̀kɛ dↄ̀.
Ɔ̃ Sesebazaa mↄ̀ Lua kpɛ́ ɛ̃ kpàlɛ. Wàlɛ kpɛ́pi bo za gↄↄ beeɛ e gbã, kási i láa yãao.
Kí, tó à kɛ̀nɛ maa, lá wɛɛlɛ kíaↄ lákalɛkĩi Babɛli, ní gwa tó kí Kilusi yãdìlɛ wà Lua kpɛ́ dↄ Yelusalɛũɛ. Lá ń è, ní lɛ́kpãsãkɛwɛ̃ɛ.
Kí Daliusi yãdìlɛ, ↄ̃ wà lápi wɛ̀ɛlɛ taala pↄ́ wa kàlɛ Babɛli lákalɛkĩiↄ guu.
Ɔ̃ wà bↄ̀ lá kooawa Ɛbatana wɛ̃́lɛ bĩ́ideu Mɛdɛ bùsuu. Yã́ɛ bee ku a guu, kɛ́ asu sã́ńguo yã́i:
Kí Kilusi kpalablea wɛ̃̀ sɛ̃́ia guu à yãdìlɛ Lua kpɛ́ pↄ́ kú Yelusalɛũ musu, à mɛ̀ wà kpɛ́pi dↄ sa'okĩi ũ. Wà a ɛ̃bo a lɛsĩ ká gã̀sĩsuu bàaↄ̃, a yàasa gã̀sĩsuu bàaↄ̃.
Wàli gbɛ̀ gbɛ̃̀nɛ di àaↄ̃, lí mɛ̀ndo, gbɛ̀ gbɛ̃̀nɛ àaↄ̃, lí mɛ̀ndo. Wa a fĩabo ń kibɛ ↄ̃ao.
Vua ń ã́nusu pↄ́ pↄ́ Nɛbukanɛza sɛ̀lɛ Lua kpɛ́u Yelusalɛũ à sùò Babɛliↄ sↄ̃, wa ɛa gɛ kálɛ a gbɛu Lua kpɛ́u Yelusalɛũ.
Ɔ̃ kí Daliusi lɛ́kpãsãkɛ̀ à mɛ̀: Tiasa Uflata baale dↄaana Tatɛnai ń Setaa Bozenaio ń á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú Uflata baa weↄ, à ázĩa ga we.
À Lua kpɛ́ dↄ̀na dãↄ to tɛɛɛ. À to Yudaↄ dↄaana ń ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ Lua kpɛ́pi kɛkɛ dↄ.
Málɛ yã́ pↄ́ ásu kɛ Yuda gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄnɛ Lua kpɛ́pi dↄa musu dilɛɛ́. À pↄ́ pↄ́ aa yeiↄ sɛ́lɛ ma làasiu we ń Uflata baale falu pↄ́ wa bↄ̀o, í kpámá píi, kɛ́ zĩpi su zɛ lↄo yã́i.
Pↄ́ pↄ́ aa yei píi, zugaae, sãsakao, sãnɛbↄlↄ pↄ́ aaì Lua Musude gbagbaò, pↄ́wɛna, wisi, vɛ̃ɛ, nísi, àↄ kpa Yelusalɛũ sa'onaↄwa lá gu lɛ́ dↄ lá aa gbɛ̀awáwa pãkpaisai,
kɛ́ aa e sa pↄ́ kà Lua Musudegu owà, aai wabikɛwàmɛɛ ń ma nɛ́ↄ.
Tó gbɛ̃e yã́ pↄ́ má dìlɛɛ bee lìlɛ, wa ade kpɛ́ lí wo, wi aà pawà wà pɛ́lɛ, wi aà bɛ kɛ tufua ũ.
Tó kíae ge buie lɛ́ wɛɛlɛ yã́pi lilɛ ge àlɛ wɛɛlɛ Lua kpɛ́ pↄ́ kú Yelusalɛũpi wí, Lua pↄ́ tò a tↄ́ kú gupiwa, aà ade fu. Ma Daliusi mámɛ ma yã́pi dìlɛ. Wà zĩkɛwà maamaa.
Kɛ́ kí Daliusi lɛ́kpãsãpi kɛ̀ màa, Uflata baala dↄaana Tatɛnai ń Setaa Bozenaio ń ń gbɛ̃́ↄ yã́pi kɛ̀ ń laaio.
Ɔ̃ Yuda gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ kpɛdↄa lɛ́ gɛ́ aɛ lá ãnabi Age ń ãnabi Zakali Ido nɛ́o ãnabikɛkɛ̀wa. Aa kpɛ́pi dↄ̀ wa làa lá Isailiↄ Lua òwa, lá Pɛɛsiↄ kíaↄ Kilusi ń Daliusio ń Aatasasao a yãdìlɛwa.
Aa Lua kpɛ́ mìdɛ Adaa gↄↄ àaↄ̃de zĩ́ kí Daliusi kpalablea wɛ̃̀ soolode guuɛ.
Ɔ̃ Isailiↄ Lua kpɛ́ sakɛ̃̀ ń pↄnao, sa'onaↄ ń Levii buiↄ ń gbɛ̃́ kĩni pↄ́ sù ń zĩ̀zↄkɛoↄ píi.
Lua kpɛ́ sakɛ̃api yã́i aa sa'ò ń zuswanaↄ mɛ̀n basↄo ń sãsakaoↄ mɛ̀n ↄ̀aa do ń sãnɛbↄlↄↄ mɛ̀n ↄ̀aa pla, ↄ̃ aa sa'ò ń blesanaↄ mɛ̀n kuɛpla Isaili bui dasilɛu ampii duun awakpabↄ ũ.
Aa sa'onaↄ dìlɛdilɛ gã ń gão, mɛ́ aa Levii buiↄ dìlɛdilɛ gã ń gão lↄ, kɛ́ aa zĩkɛ Luaɛ Yelusalɛũ, lá a ku Mↄizi lá guuwa.
Mↄ sɛ̃́ia gↄↄ gɛ̃o mɛ̀ndosaide zĩ́, zĩ̀zↄ pↄ́ sùpiↄ Gɛ̃amusu dikpɛ kɛ̀.
Sa'onaↄ ń Levii buiↄ gbãbↄ̀ ńzĩaɛ aa gↄ̃̀ gbãlɛsai ḿpii, ↄ̃ aa Gɛ̃amusu sã kòlokpakpa zĩ̀zↄ pↄ́ sùↄnɛ ń ń sa'on deeↄ pↄ́o ń ńzĩa pↄ́o.
Isaili zĩ̀zↄ pↄ́ sùpiↄ mɛ́ sò ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa gbãlɛa buipãleↄ yã́ musu tò, aalɛ Dii Isailiↄ Lua kĩ́i wɛɛlɛↄ.
Ɔ̃ aa Kàaso dikpɛkɛ̀ ń pↄnao e gↄↄ sopla. Dii tò an pↄ kɛ̀na, asa a tò Asiliↄ kía nↄ̀sɛlìlɛ ń yã́ musuɛ, ↄ̃ à dↄ̀ńlɛ a kpɛdↄa zĩ guu, Isailiↄ Luapi.
Yã́ beeↄ gbɛa Pɛɛsiↄ kí Aatasasa kpalablegↄↄ Ɛzala bↄ̀ Babɛli à sù. Sa'onkia Aalona mɛ́ Ɛleazaa ì, Ɛleazaa Finɛasi ì, Finɛasi Abisua ì, Abisua Buki ì, Buki Uzi ì, Uzi Zelaia ì, Zelaia Mɛlaio ì, Mɛlaio Azalia ì, Azalia Amalia ì, Amalia Aitubu ì, Aitubu Zadoki ì, Zadoki Saluũ ì, Saluũ Ilikia ì, Ilikia Azalia ì, Azalia Selaia ì, ↄ̃ Selaia Ɛzalapi ì.

Ɛzalaá yãdanɛdeɛ, a Mↄizi ikoyã pↄ́ Dii Isailiↄ Lua dìlɛ dↄ̃ sã́asã. Lá Dii aà Lua ↄkùaàla, kía pↄ́ pↄ́ à a wabikɛ̀wa kpàwà píiɛ.
Kí Aatasasa kpalablea wɛ̃̀ soplade guu Isailieↄ sù Yelusalɛũ lↄ. Sa'onaↄ kú ń guu ń Levii buiↄ ń lɛ̀sinaↄ ń bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ ń Lua ua zĩkɛnaↄ.
Ɛzala kà Yelusalɛũ kí kpalablea wɛ̃̀ soplade mↄ sↄode guu.
À fɛ̀lɛ Babɛli mↄ sɛ̃́ia gↄↄ sɛ̃́ia zĩ́ɛ, ↄ̃ à kà Yelusalɛũ mↄ sↄode gↄↄ sɛ̃́iazĩ. Aà Lua ↄ kuaàla,
asa Ɛzala mɛkpà Dii ikoyã wàaipaawa ń a kɛao, kɛ́ à e aà yãdilɛnɛↄ ń aà ikoyãↄ dada Isailiↄnɛ.
Taala pↄ́ kí Aatasasa kpà sa'on Ɛzala pↄ́ ì Dii yãdilɛaↄ ń aà yãdilɛnɛↄ da Isailiↄnɛwa yã́n kɛ:
Aatasasa, kíaↄ kía mɛ́ láɛ bee kɛ̃̀ sa'ona Ɛzala, Lua Musude ikoyãdanaɛ. Ma fↄkpàma.
Ma yãdìlɛ ma mɛ̀ Isaili bui ge sa'ona ge Levii bui pↄ́ kú ma bùsuu aa ye gɛnnↄ Yelusalɛũↄ píi, aa gɛ́.
Mapi ń ma lɛdamade gbɛ̃ↄn soplaↄ mɛ́ n gbaɛ, kɛ́ ǹ gɛ́ Yelusalɛũ ń Yuda bùsuo píi yã́ gwagwai n Lua ikoyã pↄ́ ń kũa musu.
Ãnusu ń vua pↄ́ mapi ń ma lɛdamadeↄ wa Isailiↄ Lua pↄ́ aà bɛ ku Yelusalɛũ gbà sɛ́lɛ wà gɛò
ń ã́nusuo ń vua pↄ́ ń è Babɛli bùsuuo píi ń pↄ́ pↄ́ gbɛ̃́ↄ ń sa'onaↄ kpà ń Lua kpɛ́ pↄ́ ũ Yelusalɛũo.
Zuswanaↄ ń sãsakaoↄ ń sãnɛbↄlↄↄ lúlu ń ↄ̃apio n laaiwa, ní sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ oò n Lua kpɛ́ gbagbakĩiwa Yelusalɛũ ń pↄ́wɛnti gbao ń imia gbao.
Mpi ń n gbɛ̃́ↄ à kɛ ń ã́nusuo ń vua pↄ́ gↄ̃̀o lá à kɛ̀ɛ́ maawa, lá á Lua yeiwa.
Pↄ́ pↄ́ wà nànɛ n ↄzĩ lousisia Lua kpɛ́u pↄ́ ũↄ kpa n Luapiwa Yelusalɛũ.
Tó ń ye Lua kpɛ́ pↄ́ kĩniↄi, tó a kɛkɛa gↄ̃̀ n yã́ ũɛ, sɛ ma làasiu we.
Mámɛmaa kí Aatasasa, ma yãdìlɛ Uflata baale ↄ'ulɛnaↄnɛ píiɛ. À wabi pↄ́ sa'ona Ɛzala, Lua Musude ikoyãdana kɛ̀wá kpawà gↄ̃̀ↄ píi.
Ãnusu su dɛ tↄnu àaↄ̃ao. Pↄ́wɛna su dɛ tↄnu baakwiao. Vɛ̃ɛ ń nísio su dɛ litili ↄ̀aa baobaoao. Wisi sↄ̃, lá a yei lɛ́u.
Lá Lua Musude dìlɛ píi, à kpa gↄ̃̀ↄ aà kpɛ́ pↄ́ ũ, kɛ́ asu kpɛ̃nɛkɛ ń ma kíakɛo ge ma nɛ́ↄo.
Àↄ dↄ̃ sↄ̃ kɛ́ á zɛvĩ à falu ge ɛlɛ'ↄ̃a ge wɛ̃̀'ↄ̃a sí Lua ua zĩkɛnaↄ ge sa'onaↄ ge Levii buiↄ ge lɛ̀sinaↄ ge bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ ge zĩkɛnpãleↄwao.
Mpi sↄ̃ Ɛzala, yã́kpalɛkɛnaↄ ń yãgↄ̃gↄ̃naↄ dilɛdilɛ ↄ̃nↄ pↄ́ n Lua kpàma lɛ́u, kɛ́ aa yãkɛkɛ a zɛ́wa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú Uflata baaleↄnɛ píi. Aaↄ dɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa n Lua ikoyã dↄ̃ↄ ũ. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dↄ̃oↄ sↄ̃, dadanɛ́.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ n Lua ikoyã ń bùsu ikoyão kũa ↄplaplao, wa yãdaaàla, aà dɛa ge aà ya bↄa bùsuu ge aà àizɛɛ siawà ge aà daakpɛun nò.
Ɔ̃ Ɛzala mɛ̀: Wà Dii wá deziↄ Lua sáaukpa! À làasoo maa dà kíɛ a sↄ̃u, ↄ̃ kípi gbãakpà aà kpɛ́ pↄ́ kú Yelusalɛũwa màa.
A tò ma yã́ kà kía ń a lɛdamadeↄgu ń aà ìwa gbãaↄ píi. Lá Dii ma Lua ↄ kuamala, ma sↄ̃dìlɛ, ↄ̃ ma Isaili dↄaanaↄ kã̀aa aa gɛmanↄ.
Uabele pↄ́ wa bↄ Babɛli bùsuu Aatasasa kpalablegↄↄ wa su sãnuↄ tↄ́ↄn kɛ ń ń buibↄkĩio:
Finɛasi buiↄ uabele Geesoũ, Itamaa buiↄ uabele Daniɛli, Davidi buiↄ uabele Atusu.
Palↄsi bui Zakali ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn basoplakwi.
Paata Mↄabu bui Zelaia nɛ́ Ɛlioenai ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa do.
Zatu bui Yaaziɛ nɛ́ Sekania ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa do ń basↄoo.
Adini bui Yonatãa nɛ́ Ɛbɛdɛ ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn blakwi.
Elaũ bui Atalia nɛ́ Yesaia ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn bàaↄ̃kwi.
Sefatia bui Mikaila nɛ́ Zebadia ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn basiiↄ̃.
Yoabu bui Yeiɛli nɛ́ Obadia ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa do ń gɛ̃o ń àaↄ̃o.
Bani bui Yosifia nɛ́ Selomi ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn baswaaↄ̃.
Bebai bui Bebai nɛ́ Zakali ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn baasↄo ń àaↄ̃o.
Azegada bui Akatã nɛ́ Yohanani ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn basↄokwi.
Adonikaũ bui pↄ́ sù gbɛzãↄ, Ɛlifele ń Yeiɛlio ń Semaiao ń ń gbɛ̃́ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn bàaↄ̃.
Bigivai buiↄ Zakuu ń Utaio ń ń gbɛ̃́ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn bàaↄ̃kwi.
Ma ń kãaa swa pↄ́ ì dↄ Aavai, ↄ̃ wa bòokpà we gↄↄ àaↄ̃. Kɛ́ ma gbɛ̃́ↄ fãnkɛ ń sa'onaↄ, má è Levii buiↄ kú ń guuo.
Ɔ̃ ma dↄaanaɛ beeↄ sìsi: Ɛliɛzɛɛ, Aliɛli, Semaia, Ɛlenatã, Yalibu, Ɛlenatã, Natã, Zakali ń Mɛsulaũo. Ma yãdanɛdeↄ Yoialibu ń Ɛlenatão sìsi lↄ.
Ma ń zĩ́ Ido pↄ́ dɛ dↄaana ũ gu pↄ́ wì mɛ Kasifia kĩ́i. Ma yã́ pↄ́ aa oɛ̀ ń aà gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú weↄ dànɛ́, kɛ́ aa suwɛ̃ɛ ń wá Lua ua zĩkɛnaↄ.
Lá wá Lua ↄ kuawála maannↄ, aa sùwɛ̃ɛ ń gbɛ̃́ laaideo, Levii tↄũna Mali bui Selebia ń aà nɛ́ↄ ń aà dãunaↄ gbɛ̃ↄn bao plasai.
Aa sù ń Mɛlali buiↄ Asabia ń Yesaiao lↄ ń ń dãunaↄ ń ń nɛ́ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn bao.
Aa sù ń Lua ua zĩkɛna pↄ́ Davidi ń a ìwaↄ ń dílɛ aa dↄ Levii buiↄlɛↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa do ń baoo. Wà ń tↄ́ dàlau ḿpii.
Ma lɛye kpàwakɛ̀ Aava swa saɛ we, kɛ́ wà wázĩa busa wá Luaɛ, wí tá na wabikɛwà wápiↄ ń wá nɛ́ↄ ń wá àizɛɛↄ yã́ musu.
Ma sosaↄ ń sↄ̃deↄ gbɛaa kíawa aa kàedawázi zɛ́u ibɛɛↄ yã́i oa widɛ̀, asa wá ò kíaɛ wa mɛ̀: Wá Lua ì ↄku gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaì a kĩ́i wɛɛlɛↄla maannↄɛ, ↄ̃ ì a pↄkũma zↄ̃ↄ bↄbↄ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ pãkpàaziↄwa.
Wa lɛyè wa wabikɛ̀ wá Luawa yã́piↄ musu, ↄ̃ a sìwanↄ.
Ma sa'on dↄaanaↄ sɛ̀ gbɛ̃ↄn kuɛpla ń Selebiao ń Asabiao ń ń gbɛ̃́ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn kwi.
Ɔ̃ ma ã́nusu ń vuao yↄ̃̀nɛ́ kiloowa ń pↄ́ pↄ́ kí ń a lɛdamadeↄ ń aà ìwaↄ ń Isaili pↄ́ kú weↄ a labakɛ̀ wá Lua kpɛ́ gba ũo.
Wa ã́nusu yↄ̃̀nɛ́ kiloowa tↄnu bao ń plao ń ã́nusu pↄ́ↄ tↄnu àaↄ̃ ń vuao tↄnu àaↄ̃.
Vua taↄ ku lↄ mɛ̀n bao, aa kà kiloo swaaↄ̃, mɛ́ mↄgotɛ̃ ta maa tɛkɛaↄ ku mɛ̀n pla, a bɛɛɛ kà vuawa.
Má ònɛ́: Ápiↄ ń pↄ́piↄá Dii pↄ́ɛ. Ãnusu ń vuaoá pↄ́ pↄ́ wà Dii á deziↄ Lua gbàɛ.
À itɛ̃kɛ à pↄ́piↄ dↄ̃́a e a gɛ yↄ̃ kiloowa Dii kpɛ́ kpɛ́nɛↄ guu Yelusalɛũ sa'onaↄ ń Levii buiↄ ń uabeleↄ wáa.
Ɔ̃ sa'onaↄ ń Levii buiↄ ã́nusu ń vuao ń pↄ́ pↄ́ wa yↄ̃̀ kiloowapiↄ sì aa gɛò wá Lua kpɛ́u Yelusalɛũ.
Wa fɛlɛ Aavai, wa da Yelusalɛũ zɛ́u mↄ sɛ̃́ia gↄↄ kuɛpladezĩ. Wá Lua ↄkùwála, à kàedàwázi zɛ́u ibɛɛↄ ń kpã́iwɛliwɛↄ yã́i.
Kɛ́ wa ka Yelusalɛũ, wa kã́mabò we gↄↄ àaↄ̃.
A gↄↄ síiↄ̃de zĩ́ wa ã́nusu ń vuao ń pↄ́piↄ yↄ̃̀ kiloowa wá Lua kpɛ́u, ↄ̃ wá kpà sa'ona Ulia nɛ́ Mɛlemↄwa. Finɛasi nɛ́ Ɛleazaa kuaànↄ ń Yesua nɛ́ Yozabao ń Binui nɛ́ Nↄadiao. Levii buiↄnɛ ḿpii.
Wà apii nào wa yↄ̃̀ kiloowa, ↄ̃ wà a gbia lɛ́ dàlau zĩbeezĩ.
Ɔ̃ zĩ̀zↄ pↄ́ sùↄ sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ ò'o Isailiↄ Luawa, zuswana kuɛpla Isaili bui píi pↄ́ ũ, sãsakao basↄo síiↄ̃sai, sãnɛbↄlↄↄ basiiↄ̃ àaↄ̃sai, blesanaↄ kuɛpla duun awakpabↄ ũ. Wà sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ òò Diiwa píiɛ.
Wà yã́ pↄ́ kía dìlɛ taala kpà aà ìwaↄ ń Uflata baala dↄaanaↄwa, ↄ̃ aa gbãkà Isailiↄnɛ ń Lua kpɛ́ dↄao.
Yã́pi kɛa gbɛa kíaↄ mↄ̀ ma kĩ́i aa mɛ̀: Wá gbɛ̃́ↄ ń sa'onaↄ ń Levii buiↄ aai kɛ̃kↄ̃wa ń bui pↄ́ liaawáziↄ ń ń yãbɛ̃ɛkɛaↄo, Kanaaↄ, Itiↄ, Pɛliziↄ, Yebusiↄ, Amↄniↄ, Mↄabuↄ, Egipiↄ ń Amↄleↄ.
Aa nↄsɛ̀ ń guu, aa sɛ̀ ń nɛ́ↄnɛ lↄ. Aa wá bui pↄ́ wá dɛ Lua gbɛ̃́ ũↄ kɛ̀ kↄ̃gbɛ̃ ũ ń bui pↄ́ liaawáziↄ. Kíaↄ ń dↄaanaↄ mɛ́ bↄ̀ Lua kpɛ màa.
Kɛ́ ma yã́pi mà, ma a ula ń ma ulataoo gà má kɛ̃̀, ma a mikãeↄ ń ma lɛkãna kã́eↄ wò. Ɔ̃ ma zↄ̃lɛ, yã́pi dìa.
Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ yã́ pↄ́ Isailiↄ Lua ò vĩa vĩↄ kã̀aamazi píi zĩ̀zↄ pↄ́ sùↄ bↄa Lua kpɛpi yã́i. Lá yã́pi dìa, ma gↄ̃ zↄ̃lɛa we e sa oosi ogↄↄ.
Kɛ́ sa oosi ogↄↄ kà, ma fɛlɛ mazĩa busaa guu, ma ula ń ma ulataoo kɛ̃a, ↄ̃ ma gɛ kulɛ ma kosowa, ma a ↄ pòopoo Dii ma Luaɛ
ma mɛ̀: Ma Lua, wí ma kũ, ma gɛɛ gↄ̃̀ kpa ma wɛ́i. Ma Lua, má fↄ̃ wɛ́sɛ mà n gwao, asa wá duuna kùwála, wá tàaeↄ zↄ̃̀ma.
Za wá deziↄ gↄↄ e ń a gbão wá tàae zↄ̃ↄ. Wá duuna yã́i ↄ̃ n wá ná buipãleↄ kíaↄnɛ ń ↄzĩ, wápiↄ ń wá kíaↄ ń wá sa'onaↄ, ↄ̃ aa wá gbɛ̃eↄ dɛ̀dɛ ń fɛ̃ndao, aa wá gbɛ̃eↄ kũ̀ zĩ̀zↄↄ ũ, aa wá pↄ́ↄ nàaa, ↄ̃ wí wá kṹ lá à wá kṹ gbãɛwa.
Dii wá Lua, tia kɛ́wa n wá wɛgwà gĩa yↄↄ, n gbɛ̃́ kↄ̃naↄ tòwɛ̃ɛ, ↄ̃ ń wá gbá tepɛkĩi n kpɛ́u. Wá Lua, ń tò wá oa wèe, n wá lɛ́ ń láo yↄↄ wá zↄbleu.
Wá Lua, baa kɛ́ zↄↄn wá ũ, ni wá tó wá zↄbleuo. Ń tò Pɛɛsiↄ kíaↄ gbɛ̃kɛkɛ̀wɛ̃ɛ. N wá lɛ́ ń láo, ↄ̃ wa n kpɛ́ gbooaↄ kɛ̀kɛ wá dↄ̀. Wá Lua, n kàedàwázi Yelusalɛũ ń Yuda bùsuo píi.
Tia kɛ́wa wá Lua, yã́ kpele wá fↄ̃ onɛ lↄi? Asa wa pãkpà n yã́
pↄ́ ń dìlɛ n zↄ̀blena ãnabiↄnɛ aa òↄziɛ. Aa mɛ̀ bùsu pↄ́ wá deziↄ lɛ́ gɛ́ síi dɛ bùsu pↄ́ gbãlɛ̀ bui pↄ́ kú weↄ yãbɛ̃ɛkɛa yã́i ũɛ. An bↄlↄ bùsupi pà za a lɛ́le ń a lɛ́lao an yãbɛ̃ɛkɛa yã́iɛ.
Aa mɛ̀ wásu wà wá nɛnↄɛↄ kpã́sãmáo, mɛ́ wásu ń nↄ sɛ́ wá nɛ́ↄnɛo. Wásu wɛdↄ ń aafia ń ń gwea maaozi bauo, kɛ́ wà e gbãakũ, wí bùsu pↄmaaↄ ble, wà tó wá nɛ́ↄnɛ e gↄↄpii.
Yã́piↄ wá lé píi wá vãikɛa ń wá tàae zↄ̃ↄo yã́iɛ. Ń beeo wá Lua, ni ĩadawá e wá duuna lɛ́wao, n gbɛ̃́ kↄ̃naↄ tòwɛ̃ɛ kɛ́wa.
Ɔ̃ wa ɛa n yãdilɛaↄ gbòo, wa bui yãbɛ̃ɛkɛnaↄ sɛ̀ nↄ ũ. Lá wá kɛ̀ màa, n pↄ a pawázi, ní wá dɛdɛ míↄmiↄɛ, gbɛ̃́ kↄ̃nae a bↄ lↄo.
Dii Isailiↄ Lua, n yã́ kuɛ, ↄ̃ wa gↄ̃ gbãgbɛ̃ kↄ̃naↄ ũ. Tàaedeↄn wá ũ. A yã́i wá gbɛ̃e a fↄ̃ wɛsɛ à n gwao.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ Ɛzala lɛ́ lousisi màa, a kúlɛa Lua kpɛ́ kpɛɛlɛ, àlɛ ń duunaↄ o Luaɛ, àlɛ ↄ́ↄlↄ, Isailiↄ kã̀aaaàzi dasidasi, gↄ̃ɛↄ ń nↄɛↄ ń nɛ́fɛ̃nɛnaↄ, ↄ̃ aalɛ ↄ́ↄlↄ maamaa.
Ɔ̃ Elaũ bui Yeiɛli nɛ́ Sekania fɛ̀lɛ yã'ò Ɛzalaɛ à mɛ̀: Wa bↄ wá Lua kpɛ, wa bui pↄ́ liaawáziↄ sɛ̀ nↄ ũ. Ń beeo bↄkĩi kú wá Isailiↄnɛ e tia.
Wà lɛdoũkɛ ń wá Luao sa, wí nↄɛpiↄ ya ń ń nɛ́ↄ, lá n a lɛdàwáwa, mpi ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa wá Lua yãdilɛaↄ vĩa vĩↄ. Wà kɛ lá aà ikoyã'òwa.
Fɛlɛ! À gↄ̃̀ n yã́ ũɛ. Wa zɛnnↄɛ. Sↄ̃dilɛ ǹ zĩkɛ yã́piwa.
Ɔ̃ Ɛzala fɛ̀lɛ, a tò kíaↄ ń sa'onaↄ ń Levii buiↄ ń Isailiↄ píi lɛgbɛ̃̀ yã́pi musu.
Ɔ̃ à gò Lua kpɛ́ kpɛɛlɛ, à gɛ̀ ì Ɛliasibu nɛ́ Yohanani kpɛ́nɛu. I pↄbleo, i imio, kɛ́ àlɛ zĩ̀zↄ pↄ́ sùↄ náaisaikɛ ↄ́ↄlↄ yã́i.
Ɔ̃ wà kpàwakɛ̀ Yelusalɛũ ń Yuda bùsuo píi wà mɛ̀, zĩ̀zↄ pↄ́ sùↄ aa kãaa Yelusalɛũ píi.
E gↄↄ àaↄ̃ àↄ gɛ́ pai, tó gbɛ̃́ i mↄo, aà àizɛɛↄ gↄ̃̀ Dii pↄ́ ũɛ, wi ade ya bↄ zĩ̀zↄ pↄ́ sùↄ guu. Kíaↄ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ mɛ́ zɛ̀ò màa.
Ɔ̃ Yuda gↄ̃ɛↄ ń Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ bui gↄ̃ɛↄ kã̀aa Yelusalɛũ píi e gↄↄ àaↄ̃pi gɛ̀ pàò. Mↄ kɛ̃okwi gↄↄ baode zĩ́ aa zↄ̃lɛa Lua kpɛ́ gãaɛ ḿpii, aalɛ lualua yã́pi ń lou pↄ́ lɛ́ mao yã́i.
Ɔ̃ sa'ona Ɛzala fɛ̀lɛ yã'ònɛ́ à mɛ̀: A bↄ Lua kpɛ, a wá Isailiↄ tàae kã̀fĩ, a buipãleↄ sɛ̀ nↄ ũ.
À á duunaↄ o Dii á deziↄ Luaɛ, í aà pↄeã kɛ sa. À kɛ̃kↄ̃wa ń bui pↄ́ liaaáziↄ ń nↄ pↄ́ á sɛ̀ ń guuↄ.
Bíla wèwà ń lↄↄ gbãao aa mɛ̀: Màaɛ, wá kɛ lá ń òwɛ̃ɛwa.
Ãma wá dasi mɛ́ lou ku, wá fↄ̃ wàↄ zɛa bàasi lao. Wá fↄ̃ yã́pi kɛkɛ gↄↄ do ge gↄↄ plao, asa wá tàae kɛ̀ zↄ̃ↄ yã́pi musu.
Tó wá kíaↄ gↄ̃ la bíla gɛ̃ɛ ũ. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ buipãleↄ sɛ̀ nↄ ũↄ i bↄ wɛ̃́lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛo, aai mↄ gↄↄ pↄ́ wa dìlɛnɛ́wa ń ń wɛ̃́lɛ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ń yã́kpalɛkɛnaↄ, wá Lua pↄ i weewá yã́pi musu.
Asaɛli nɛ́ Yonatãa ń Tikeva nɛ́ Yaziao mɛ́ bↄ̀ yã́pi kpɛ ḿpla, ↄ̃ Levii buiↄ Mɛsulaũ ń Sabetaio zɛ̀ńnↄ.
Ɔ̃ zĩ̀zↄ pↄ́ sùↄ kɛ̀ lá wa òwa. Sa'ona Ɛzala uabeleↄ sɛ̀ daɛdaɛ mɛ̀ndodo. À ń tↄ́ dàlau píi. Mↄ kwide gↄↄ sɛ̃́ia zĩ́ ↄ̃ gbɛ̃́piↄ zↄ̃̀lɛ yã́pi gwàgwa.
Mↄ sɛ̃́ia gↄↄ sɛ̃́ia zĩ́ aa buipãle sɛnapiↄ yã́ gwàgwa aa làa píi.
Sa'ona pↄ́ aa buipãle nↄ sɛ̀ↄn kɛ: Yozada nɛ́ Yesua buiↄ ń a dãunaɛ beeↄ Maasea, Ɛliɛzɛɛ, Yalibu, Gedalia.
Aa ↄdà kↄ̃ ↄu aa mɛ̀ wa ń nↄpiↄ yá, ↄ̃ an baade sãsa kpà ń tàae fĩabobↄ ũ.
Imɛɛ buiↄ Anani ń Zebadiao.
Aliũ buiↄ Maasea, Ɛlia, Semaia, Yeiɛli, Uzia.
Pasuu buiↄ Ɛlioenai, Maasea, Isimaɛla, Nɛtanɛli, Yozaba, Ɛlasa.
Levii buiↄ Yozaba, Simɛi, Kelaia pↄ́ wì mɛ lↄ Kelita, Petaia, Yuda, Ɛliɛzɛɛ.
Lɛ̀sina Ɛliasibu ń bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ Saluũ ń Teleũo ń Ulio.
Isaili kĩni pↄ́ aa buipãle nↄ sɛ̀ↄn kɛ: Palↄsi buiↄ Lamia, Izia, Malakia, Miamɛ, Ɛleazaa, Malakia, Benaia.
Elaũ buiↄ Matania, Zakali, Yeiɛli, Abadi, Yelemↄ, Ɛlia.
Zatu buiↄ Ɛlioenai, Ɛliasibu, Matania, Yelemↄ, Zabada, Aziza.
Bebai buiↄ Yohanani, Anania, Zabai, Atalai.
Bani buiↄ Mɛsulaũ, Maluku, Adaia, Yasubu, Seali, Yelemↄ.
Paata Mↄabu buiↄ Adena, Kelala, Benaia, Maasea, Matania, Bezalɛli, Binui, Manase.
Aliũ buiↄ Ɛliɛzɛɛ, Isia, Semaia, Simɛↄ,
Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ, Maluku, Semalia.
Asuũ buiↄ Matenai, Matata, Zabada, Ɛlifele, Yelemai, Manase, Simɛi.
Bani buiↄ Maadai, Amlaũ, Uɛli,
Benaia, Bedea, Kelui,
Vania, Mɛlemↄ, Ɛliasibu,
Matania, Matenai, Yaasu.
Binui buiↄ Simɛi,
Selemia, Natã, Adaia,
Manadebai, Sasai, Salai,
Azalɛli, Selemia, Semalia,
Saluũ, Amalia, Yosɛfu.
Nɛbo buiↄ Yeiɛli, Matitia, Zabada, Zebina, Yadai, Yoɛli, Benaia.
Gbɛ̃́piↄ buipãle nↄ sɛ̀ɛ ḿpii, mɛ́ an nↄpi keeↄ nɛ́ↄ ì'ińnↄ.
Akalia nɛ́ Nɛɛmii yã́n kɛ: Aatasasa kpalablea wɛ̃̀ baode mↄ pↄ́ wì mɛ Kisele guu má kú kibɛ Susa mɛɛwiau.
Ɔ̃ ma dãuna Anani bↄ̀ Yuda bùsuu à mↄ̀ ń gbɛ̃eↄ. Ma yãlàlamá Yuda gbɛ̃́ kↄ̃na pↄ́ bↄ̀ zĩ̀zↄkɛuↄ ń Yelusalɛũo musu.
Aa wèa aa mɛ̀, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ bↄ̀ zĩ̀zↄkɛu aa tà Yuda bùsuuↄ lɛ́ taasikɛ maamaaɛ, wàlɛ ń láanikɛ, asa Yelusalɛũ bĩ́i gbooaɛ, mɛ́ a bↄlɛ gbaↄ tɛ́kũa.
Kɛ́ ma yã́pi mà, ma zↄ̃lɛ, ↄ̃ wɛ́'i bↄ̀a. Ma ↄ́ↄlↄ̀ gↄↄpla, málɛ lɛye, málɛ wabikɛ Lua Musudewa
ma mɛ̀: N yã́ na Dii Lua Musude. Lua zↄ̃ↄ pↄ́ ì tó ń mɛ séenatan n ũ. Gbɛ̃kɛ guu n bàa ìↄ kú ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ yenzi aaìↄ n yãdilɛaↄ kũaↄ.
Wɛ́tɛ mapi n zↄ̀blenai. Swã́kpa wabi pↄ́ málɛ kɛma fãanɛ ń gwãasĩnao n zↄ̀blena Isailiↄnɛzi. Málɛ duuna pↄ́ wá kɛ̀nɛ o. Baa mapi ń ma de bɛdeↄ wa duunakɛ̀ sↄ̃ɛ.
Wa yãvãikɛ̀nɛ maamaaɛ, wi n yãdilɛaↄ dao, wi n ↄtondↄkĩi gwao, wá n ikoyã pↄ́ ń dìlɛ n zↄ̀blena Mↄiziɛ kũao.
To yã́ pↄ́ ń dìlɛ n zↄ̀blena Mↄiziɛɛ bee dↄngu. N mɛ̀ tó wa bↄ n kpɛ, ńyↄ̃ wá fãaa buipãleↄ guuɛ.
N mɛ̀ lↄ, tó wa ɛa suma, mɛ́ wá n yãdilɛaↄ kũa wálɛ zĩkɛwà, baa kɛ́ n wá yá e dṹnia lɛ́wa, ńyↄ̃ wá kãaa, ńyↄ̃ suwanↄ gu pↄ́ ń sɛ̀ n tↄ́ kuwàu.
Gbɛ̃́piↄá n zↄ̀blenaↄnɛ, n gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ n ń bó ń n iko zↄ̃ↄo ń n gã̀sa gbãaoↄnɛ.
N yã́ na Dii, swãdↄ mapi n zↄ̀blena wabikɛai ń n zↄ̀blena pↄ́ n yã́ ì kɛnɛ́ na aa n vĩa vĩↄ wabikɛao. Mapi n zↄ̀blena ma daɛ ń gòmio gbã, kí i ma wɛgwa. Gↄↄ bee sↄ̃ kípi vɛ̃ɛbↄlɛnan ma ũ.
Aatasasa kpalablea wɛ̃̀ baode mↄ pↄ́ wì mɛ Nisã guu kí ye vɛ̃ɛmi, ↄ̃ má sɛ̀ má kpàwà. A ma dↄ̃ ń oosisio yãao,
ↄ̃ à ma la à mɛ̀: Bↄ́yãi n oosìsii? Ńlɛ gyãkɛo. N pↄ mɛ́ yàa? Vĩa ma kũ maamaa,
ↄ̃ má òɛ̀: Lua n dↄ̃ ń aafiao, Záai! Ma oosìsi, asa wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ ma deziↄ mia kuu gↄ̃̀ bɛzia ũɛ. A bĩ́ibↄlɛ gbaↄ tɛ́kũa.
Ɔ̃ a òmɛɛ: Ń ye mà kɛ kpelewa ni? Ma wabikɛ̀ Lua Musudewa gĩa,
ↄ̃ má wèwà ma mɛ̀: Kí, tó à kɛ̀nɛ maa, mɛ́ mapi n zↄ̀blena ma yã́ kànguɛ, ma zĩ Yuda bùsu wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ ma deziↄ mia kuupi, kɛ́ mà e kɛkɛ kálɛ.
Kípi na zↄ̃lɛa aà saɛ, ↄ̃ à ma la à mɛ̀: Ńyↄ̃ kɛ we gↄↄ ũma ni? Gↄↄ kpele ńyↄ̃ sui? Kɛ́ kí wè ma gɛai, ↄ̃ ma gↄↄdìlɛɛ̀.
Má òɛ̀: Tó à kànguɛ, lákɛ̃ Uflata baale dↄaanaↄnɛ ǹ kpaa. Onɛ́ aa to mà pã́ ń bùsua e mà gɛ kaò Yuda bùsuu.
Lákɛ̃ n líkpɛ dↄ̃̀ana Asafaɛ lↄ. Oɛ̀ aà ma gba lí mà zɛgikĩi pↄ́ kú Lua kpɛ́ saɛ gbaↄ kɛò ń bĩ́ibↄlɛ gbaↄ ń kpɛ́ pↄ́ máↄ kuu pↄ́o. Ɔ̃ kí lá pↄ́ má gbɛ̀awaↄ kpàa, asa ma Lua ↄ kuamalaɛ.
Kí sosa badeↄ ń sↄ̃deↄ dàmɛɛ aa gɛmanↄ. Ɔ̃ ma gɛ Uflata baale dↄaanaↄ lè, ma kí láↄ kpàmá.
Kɛ́ Oloni gbɛ̃́ Sambala ń a ìwa Tobia, Amↄni buio mà gbɛ̃e mↄ̀ Isailiↄ gwea kã́fĩi, à kɛ̀nɛ́ ĩ́i maamaaɛ.
Kɛ́ ma ka Yelusalɛũ, ma kã́mabò gĩa gↄↄ àaↄ̃.
Ɔ̃ ma fɛlɛ gwãasĩna ń gbɛ̃eↄ, mi yã́ pↄ́ ma Lua dà ma sↄ̃u mà kɛ Yelusalɛũ o gbɛ̃eɛo. Ma di zàa'ĩna kpɛ, gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ bɛ kɛ̀sɛ.
Ma bↄ Guzulɛ Bↄlɛu gwã́, ma mipɛ̀ Gbɛ̃gbon lↄ̀ↄwa ń Tufua Bↄlɛo. Málɛ Yelusalɛũ bĩ́i pↄ́ daaĩa gwagwa ń a bↄlɛ gbà tɛ́kũaↄ.
Ɔ̃ ma gɛ aɛ e Nibↄna Bↄlɛ ń kí íkalɛkĩio. Gue ku we, ma zàa'ĩna i fↄ̃ gɛ̃̀uo,
ↄ̃ má bɛ swa'ɛu gwã́, málɛ bĩ́i gwagwa. Ɔ̃ ma ɛa su, ma gɛ̃ Guzulɛ Bↄlɛu.
Gbãadeↄ gu pↄ́ ma gɛu ge yã́ pↄ́ má kɛ̀ dↄ̃o, asa mi yãe o Yudaↄnɛ gĩao, baa sa'onaↄ ge kíabuiↄ ge gbãadeↄ ge gbɛ̃́ kĩni pↄ́ aa zĩpi kɛↄ.
Ɔ̃ má ònɛ́: A taasi pↄ́ wá lé èó? Yelusalɛũ gↄ̃̀ bɛzia ũ, a bĩ́ibↄlɛↄ tɛ́kũa. À to wà ɛa bĩ́iboi lↄ, kɛ́ wásu wàↄ dɛ láanipↄ ũ lↄo yã́i.
Má ònɛ́ lↄ lá ma Lua ↄkùmala ń yã́ pↄ́ kí òmɛɛo. Ɔ̃ aa mɛ̀: Wà fɛlɛ na a boawa. Ɔ̃ aa nà zĩ maapiwa ↄplapla.
Kɛ́ Oloni gbɛ̃́ Sambala ń a ìwa Tobia, Amↄni buio ń Laalubu bui Gɛsɛũo a baomà, aa wá àlafiikɛ̀, aa sakàwágu aa mɛ̀: Bↄ́ álɛ kɛ wei? Álɛ bↄ kí yã́ kpɛ yↄ̃oo?
Ɔ̃ ma a zãsìmá ma mɛ̀: Lua Musude a wá daɛ ń gòmio. Wápiↄ aà zↄ̀blenaↄ, Yelusalɛũ bĩ́iboa wálɛ nawà kɛ. Ápiↄ sↄ̃ á baa ku lao. Á yã́ kú la lↄo, á tↄ́ àↄ dↄ gbɛ̃egu wɛ̃́lɛpi guu la lↄo.
Sa'ona Ɛliasibu ń a gbɛ̃ sa'onaↄ ɛ̀a Sã Bↄlɛ bò. Aa a sakɛ̃̀, ↄ̃ aa a gbaↄ pɛ̀lɛpɛlɛ. Aa bĩ́i sakɛ̃̀ e za Basↄo Kalanga ń Ananɛli Kalangao.
An saɛ Yelikodeↄ bĩ́ibò. An saɛ Imɛli nɛ́ Zakuu bĩ́ibò.
Asenaa bɛdeↄ ɛ̀a Kpↄ̀ Bↄlɛ bò, aa a zaↄ dàda, aa a gbaↄ pɛ̀lɛpɛlɛ, aa a mↄↄ ń a gbã́aↄ dàu.
An saɛ Ulia nɛ́ Mɛlemↄ, Akozi tↄũna bĩ́i kɛ̀kɛ bò. Aà saɛ Bɛlɛkia nɛ́ Mɛsulaũ, Mɛsezabɛli tↄũna kɛ̀kɛ bò. Aà saɛ Baana nɛ́ Zadoki kɛ̀kɛ bò.
Aà saɛ Tekoadeↄ bĩ́i kɛ̀kɛ bò, kási an gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ gì zĩ gbãa pↄ́ dↄaana dànɛ́ kɛiɛ.
An saɛ Pasea nɛ́ Yoiada ń Besodia nɛ́ Mɛsulaũo Bↄlɛ Zi bò. Aa a zaↄ dàda aa a gbaↄ pɛ̀lɛpɛlɛ, aa a mↄↄ ń a gbã́aↄ dàu.
An saɛ Gabaↄ̃ↄ gbɛ̃́ Mɛlatia ń Mɛlↄnↄ gbɛ̃́ Yadↄ̃o bĩ́i kɛ̀kɛ bò ń Gabaↄ̃ↄdeↄ ń Mizipadeↄ e za Uflata baala dↄaana bɛ.
An saɛ Alaia nɛ́ Uziɛli pↄ́ ì vua zĩ kɛ bĩ́i kɛ̀kɛ bò. Aà saɛ tulalekɛna Anania kɛ̀kɛ bò e za bĩ́i yàasa kĩ́i.
Aà saɛ Hulu nɛ́ Lefaia, Yelusalɛũ kpɛdo kía, bĩ́i kɛ̀kɛ bò.
Aà saɛ Alumafa nɛ́ Yedaia bĩ́i pↄ́ bↄaa ń a bɛo kɛ̀kɛ bò. Aà saɛ Asabana nɛ́ Atusu kɛ̀kɛ bò.
Aliũ nɛ́ Malakia ń Paata Mↄabu nɛ́ Asubuo gupãle kɛ̀kɛ bò ń Kĩna Kalangao.
An saɛ Aloese nɛ́ Saluũ, Yelusalɛũ kpɛdo kía, bĩ́i kɛ̀kɛ bò sãnu ń a nɛnↄɛↄ.
Anuni ń Zanↄadeↄ Guzulɛ Bↄlɛ kɛ̀kɛ. Aa ɛ̀a bò aa a gbaↄ pɛ̀lɛpɛlɛ, aa a mↄↄ ń a gbã́aↄ dàu. Aa bĩ́i kɛ̀kɛ bò lↄ gã̀sĩsuu ↄ̀aa sↄo e à gɛ̀ pɛ̀ Pↄtuogbↄ̃ Bↄlɛwa.
Lekabu nɛ́ Malakia, Bɛtakɛlɛũ fã́ani kí, Pↄtuogbↄ̃ Bↄlɛ kɛ̀kɛ. À ɛ̀a bò, à a gbaↄ pɛ̀lɛpɛlɛ, à a mↄↄ ń a gbã́aↄ dàu.
Kↄloze nɛ́ Saluũ, Mizipa fã́ani kí, Nibↄna Bↄlɛ kɛ̀kɛ. À ɛ̀a bò a dↄ̀, à a gbaↄ pɛ̀lɛpɛlɛ, à a mↄↄ ń a gbã́aↄ dàu. À bĩ́i pↄ́ kú Siloe Íkalɛkĩi saɛ kɛ̀kɛ bò lↄ za kibɛ kaa saɛ e à gɛ̀ pɛ̀ Davidi Wɛ̃́lɛ dɛdɛkĩiwa.
A gbɛa Azebu nɛ́ Nɛɛmii, Bɛzuu fã́ani kpɛdo kí, bĩ́i kɛ̀kɛ bò e Davidi bɛ gɛvĩkĩi saɛ ń íkalɛkĩi pↄ́ wa yↄ̃̀o ń Nɛgↄ̃naↄ Kpɛ́o.
A gbɛa Bani nɛ́ Leuũ ń Levii buiↄ bĩ́i kɛ̀kɛ bò. A gbɛa Asabia, Kɛila fã́ani kpɛdo kí, a fã́ani bĩ́i kɛ̀kɛ bò.
A gbɛa Enada nɛ́ Bavai, Kɛila fã́ani kpɛdo kí, a fã́ani bĩ́i kɛ̀kɛ bò.
Aà saɛ Yesua nɛ́ Ezɛɛ, Mizipa kí, bĩ́i pↄ́ bↄaa ń gↄ̃kɛbↄkpɛo kɛ̀kɛ bò e bĩ́i golawa.
A gbɛa Zabai nɛ́ Baluku kↄaikɛ̀ à bĩ́i kɛ̀kɛ bò za golawa e à gɛ̀ pɛ̀ sa'onkia Ɛliasibu bɛ kpɛɛlɛwa.
A gbɛa Ulia nɛ́ Mɛlemↄ, Akozi tↄũna gupãle kɛ̀kɛ bò za Ɛliasibu bɛ kpɛɛlɛ e aà ua lɛ́wa.
A gbɛa sa'ona pↄ́ kãi ń Yelusalɛũↄ bĩ́i kɛ̀kɛ bò.
A gbɛa Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ ń Asubuo bĩ́i pↄ́ bↄaa ń ń bɛo kɛ̀kɛ bò. A gbɛa Maasea nɛ́ Azalia, Anania tↄũna bĩ́i pↄ́ kú a bɛ saɛ kɛ̀kɛ bò.
A gbɛa Enada nɛ́ Binui gupãle kɛ̀kɛ bò za Azalia bɛ e à gɛ̀ pɛ̀ bĩ́i golawa.
Uzai nɛ́ Palala bĩ́i kɛ̀kɛ bò za golawa e kalanga pↄ́ bↄaa ń kibɛo dakpɛunaↄ ua saɛ. A gbɛa Palↄsi nɛ́ Pedaia
ń Lua ua zĩkɛna pↄ́ kú Ofɛli sĩ̀sĩ musuↄ bĩ́i kɛ̀kɛ bò Í Bↄlɛ kpɛɛlɛ gukpɛ oi e à gɛ̀ pɛ̀ kalangapiwa.
A gbɛa Tekoadeↄ bĩ́i kɛ̀kɛ bò za kalanga zↄ̃ↄpi saɛ e sĩ̀sĩpi bĩ́iwa.
Sa'onaↄ bĩ́i pↄ́ kú Sↄ̃́ Bↄlɛ saɛ kɛ̀kɛ bò, baade ń bĩ́i pↄ́ kú a bɛ saɛo.
A gbɛa Imɛɛ nɛ́ Zadoki bĩ́i pↄ́ kú a bɛ saɛ kɛ̀kɛ bò. A gbɛa Sekania nɛ́ Semaia pↄ́ dɛ Gukpɛ Bↄlɛ dↄ̃̀ana ũ bĩ́i kɛ̀kɛ bò.
A gbɛa Selemia nɛ́ Anania ń Zalafa nɛgↄ̃ɛ soolode Anunio gupãle kɛ̀kɛ bò. A gbɛa Bɛlɛkia nɛ́ Mɛsulaũ bĩ́i pↄ́ kú a kpɛ́ saɛ kɛ̀kɛ bò.
A gbɛa vuazĩkɛna Malakia bĩ́i kɛ̀kɛ bò e Lua ua zĩkɛnaↄ ń laatanaↄ bɛ Mifɛka Bↄlɛ saɛ e à gɛ̀ pɛ̀ kpɛ́ pↄ́ kú bĩ́i golawa.
Vuazĩkɛnaↄ ń laatanaↄ mɛ́ bĩ́i kɛ̀kɛ bò kpɛ́ pↄ́ kú bĩ́i golawa ń Sã Bↄlɛo zãnguo.
Kɛ́ Sambala mà wá Yudaↄ wálɛ Yelusalɛũ bĩ́i bo, aà pↄ pà, aà za fɛ̃̀ maamaa, ↄ̃ àlɛ wá awiambↄ.
A ò a gbɛ̃́ↄ ń Samali zĩgↄ̃ↄ wáa à mɛ̀: Bↄ́ Yuda gianapiↄ lɛ́ kɛɛɛɛ? Aa fↄ̃ ɛa bĩ́ipi boe? Aa sa'o aai zĩpi nɛ gↄↄ do nia? Aa fↄ̃ wɛ̃́lɛpi vu ń gbɛ pↄ́ tɛkũ̀ à dàaĩpiↄe?
Amↄni bui Tobia ku aà saɛ, ↄ̃ à mɛ̀: Bĩ́i pↄ́ aalɛ bopi, tó gbɛ̃gbona dɛ̀dɛwà, a gbɛↄ gbooɛ fá!
Ɔ̃ ma mɛ̀: Wá Lua, wá yãma, asa aa nifɛ̃̀wáziɛ. Tó wá awiana pↄ́ aalɛ bↄ wi ń musu. To wà ń kṹkũ wà táńnↄ zĩ̀zↄↄ ũ.
Ńsu láka ń tàaeↄlao. Ńsu ǹ ń duuna bãdɛo, asa aa bĩ́ibonaↄ sↄ̃̀sↄ̃ɛ.
Màa wa bĩ́ipi bò e à pɛ̀kↄ̃wa mɛ́ a lɛsĩ kà guo, asa gbɛ̃́ↄ lɛ́ zĩpi kɛ ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndooɛ.
Kɛ́ Sambala ń Tobiao ń Laalubuↄ ń Amↄniↄ ń Asedodadeↄ mà Yelusalɛũ bĩ́ikɛkɛa lɛ́ gɛ́ aɛ mɛ́ gufooↄ lɛ́ tata, an pↄ pà maamaa.
Ɔ̃ aa lɛkpàaĩ ḿpii, aa mɛ̀ wa mↄ lɛ́lɛ Yelusalɛũwa, wi yãkele liańzi.
Ɔ̃ wa wabikɛ̀ wá Luawa, mɛ́ wa gudↄ̃anaↄ dìlɛdilɛ fãanɛ ń gwãasĩnao an yã́i.
Ɔ̃ wá Yudaeↄ mɛ̀: Asosɛnaↄ yɛ̃̀ɛɛ lɛ́ láa. Gbɛ pↄ́ wa gbòo wa dàaĩ zↄ̃ↄ, wá fↄ̃ bĩ́ipi bo wà a midɛo.
Wá ibɛɛↄ mɛ̀, e wàↄ gɛ́ ń yã́ dↄ̃i, wa siwágu, wi wá dɛdɛɛ, zĩpi i gↄ̃ kpaa zɛ́u.
Wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú ń saɛↄ mↄ òwɛ̃ɛ à kà gɛ̃n kwi aa mɛ̀: Aalɛ bↄ gupiiu, aa ye mↄ lɛ́lɛiwáɛ.
Ɔ̃ ma gbɛ̃́ↄ dìlɛdilɛ bĩ́ifooↄ guu ń a gu pↄ́ ɛɛũↄ. Ma ń dílɛdilɛ daɛdaɛ, baade ń a fɛ̃ndao ń a sↄ̃nao ń a sáo.
Kɛ́ ma wɛtɛ̀ guↄi, ma fɛlɛ ò kíabuiↄnɛ ń gbãadeↄ ń gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ ma mɛ̀: Ásu vĩakɛnɛ́o. Àↄ dↄ̃ kɛ́ Dii zↄ̃ↄ, ì tó ń mɛ séenata. À zĩka á gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ ń á nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ ń á nɛnↄɛↄ ń á naↄ ń á bɛↄ.
Kɛ́ wá ibɛɛↄ mà Lua ń fú, a tò wa ń lɛkpaaĩ feena mà, ↄ̃ wápii wa ɛa na bĩ́iboawa, baade ń a zĩo.
Za gↄↄ bee ma gbɛ̃́ↄ kpaalɛ̀ lɛɛ pla. Gbɛ̃eↄ lɛ́ zĩkɛ mɛ́ gbɛ̃eↄ sↄ̃na kũa ń sɛ̀ngbaoo ń sáo ń mↄ̀ ulao daa. Kíaↄ sĩ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ bĩ́iboↄ kpɛ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aso sɛaↄ aso kũa ↄ do, gↄ̃kɛbↄ ↄ do.
Bĩ́ibonaↄ fɛ̃nda dↄa ń pi ḿpii. Kuupɛna ìↄ ku ma saɛ.
Ɔ̃ má ò kíabuiↄnɛ ń gbãadeↄ ń gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ: Zĩ dasi mɛ́ bĩ́ipi gbã̀a, ↄ̃ wa kↄ̃kpaalɛ̀kpaalɛ a lɛ́u.
Gu pↄ́ á mà wàlɛ kuupɛu, à kãaawázi we, wá Lua i zĩkawɛ̃ɛ.
Ɔ̃ wa ɛa na zĩwa, gbɛ̃eↄ sↄ̃na kũa za guluuluui e saanaↄ gɛ̀ bìlɛò.
Zĩbeezĩ má ò gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ: Á baade lí i Yelusalɛũ la ń a ìwaↄ, kɛ́ aàli e gudↄ̃a gwã́, aàli zĩkɛ fãanɛ.
Mapi ń ma dãunaↄ ń ma ìwaↄ ń gudↄ̃ana pↄ́ kumanↄↄ, wili wá pↄkasa bↄo, baade ìↄ a gↄ̃kɛbↄ kũa a ↄplaauɛ.
Gↄↄ bee wá Yudaeↄ ń ń naↄ lɛ́ wiilɛ ń gbɛ̃́ↄwa maamaa.
An gbɛ̃eↄ mɛ̀: Wápiↄ ń wá nɛ́ↄ, wá dasi. Wá ye pↄ́wɛnai wà pↄble, wí e wàↄ aafia.
An gbɛ̃eↄ mɛ̀ lↄ: Nↄana ku, ↄ̃ wa wá buaↄ ń wá vɛ̃ɛbuↄ ń wá kpɛ́ↄ tↄ̀ↄma dìlɛ pↄ́wɛna yã́i.
An gbɛ̃eↄ mɛ̀: Wa ↄ̃a sɛ̃̀a, kɛ́ wà wá buaↄ ń wá vɛ̃ɛbuↄ falu kpa kíwa yã́i.
Baa tó wá bui doũɛ, mɛ́ wá nɛ́ↄ doũ ń ń nɛ́ↄ, wálɛ wá nɛ́ↄ yiamá zↄↄ ũ teasi. Wá nɛnↄɛeↄ lɛ́ zↄble kↄ̀, mɛ́ wá gbãa i ka wà pↄe kɛo, asa wá buaↄ ń wá vɛ̃ɛbuↄ gↄ̃̀ ń pↄ́ ũɛ.
Kɛ́ ma ń wiipi mà ń gbɛ̃́ↄ káala pↄ́ aa kɛ̀o, ma pↄ pà maamaa.
Ma yã́pi wàaipà ma sↄ̃ guu, ↄ̃ ma zↄadↄ̀ kíabuiↄ ń gbãadeↄwa má ònɛ́: Á baade lɛ́ ↄ'idia a gbɛ̃́deeɛ. Ɔ̃ ma mɛ̀ wà bíla kãaa an yã́pi yã́i.
Má ònɛ́: Wa wá gbɛ̃́ Yuda pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ buipãleↄ pↄ́ ũↄ bò wá gbãa lɛ́u, ↄ̃ á tò á gbɛ̃́ↄ lɛ́ ńzĩa yiawá lↄa? Ɔ̃ aa nílɛ kpɛ̃́, aai yãe e òo.
Ɔ̃ ma ɛa ma mɛ̀: Yã́ pↄ́ álɛ kɛpi maao. Àↄ wá Lua vĩa vĩ, kɛ́ wá ibɛɛ buipãleↄ su wá sↄ̃́sↄ̃o yã́i.
Mapi ń ma daɛↄ ń ma ìwaↄ, wa ↄ̃a ń pↄ́wɛnao sɛ̃̀anɛ́ sↄ̃. À ↄ'idianɛ́ tó sa,
í ń buaↄ ń ń vɛ̃ɛbuↄ ń ń kù kpɛ́ↄ ń ń kpɛ́ↄ sↄaanɛ́ ń pↄ́ basↄode pↄ́ álɛ símá ↄ'i ũo, ↄ̃a ń pↄ́wɛnao ń vɛ̃ɛo ń nísio píi.
Ɔ̃ aa mɛ̀: Wá sↄaanɛ́, wá pↄe wɛɛlɛmá lↄo. Wá kɛ lá ń òwa. Ɔ̃ ma sa'onaↄ sìsi, má tò gbɛ̃́piↄ lakpà ńzĩala lá aa a lɛgbɛ̃̀wa.
Ma a ulada kpòɛ ma mɛ̀: Lua gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ i zĩkɛ lɛ́ pↄ́ á gbɛ̃̀piwao kpoɛ màa, i aà bɛ ń aà àizɛɛↄ siwà. Lua aà kpoɛ aà gↄ̃ gii màa. Bíla mɛ̀: Ãmi! Ɔ̃ aa Dii sáaukpà. Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃́ↄ kɛ̀ lá aa a lɛgbɛ̃̀wa.
Bee gbɛa za gↄↄ pↄ́ Aatasasa ma dilɛ Yuda bùsu dↄaana ũ a kpalablea wɛ̃̀ baode zĩ́ e a wɛ̃̀ baakwi ń plaode guu, à kà wɛ̃̀ kuɛpla, mapi ń ma daɛↄ wi dↄaanakɛblɛ bleo.
Dↄaana káau pↄ́ dↄ̀aamɛɛↄ aso gbia tↄ̃̀ gbɛ̃́ↄwa, aa pↄblea ń vɛ̃ɛo sì baadewa ń ã́nusu ↄwatɛ̃ blablao. An ìwaↄ gbãablèmá lↄ. Mapi sↄ̃ mi kɛ màao, asa má Lua vĩa vĩ.
Ma mɛkpà bĩ́ipi boawa, mi tↄↄlɛ sɛ́ ma pↄ́ ũo. Ma ìwaↄ kãaaa we zĩpi yã́iɛ.
Yudaↄ ìↄ pↄble ma bɛ gbɛ̃ↄn basoplakwikwi, gbãadeↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ bↄ̀ bui pↄ́ liaawáziↄ kĩ́iↄ.
Lá gu lɛ́ dↄ wìↄ zu kɛkɛmɛɛ mɛ̀ndodo ń sã mɛkpaaↄ mɛ̀n soolosoolo ń koↄ, mɛ́ wìↄ vɛ̃ɛ ba zↄ̃ↄzↄ̃ↄ gↄↄ kwi ń gↄↄ kwio. Gia ń beeo mi dↄaanakɛblɛ gbɛamáo, asa zĩ pↄ́ gbɛ̃́ beeↄ lɛ́ kɛ zↄ̃ↄ.
Ma Lua, yãmaa pↄ́ má kɛ̀ gbɛ̃́ beeↄnɛ píi àↄ dↄngu.
Ma bĩ́ibò má làa, a fòo ku guei lↄo, ãma mi a bↄlɛ gbaↄ pɛ́lɛpɛlɛ gĩao. Kɛ́ Sambala ń Tobiao ń Laalubu bui Gɛsɛũo ń ma ibɛɛ kĩniↄ a baomà,
Sambala ń Gɛsɛũpio lɛ́kpãsãkɛ̀mɛɛ aa mɛ̀ mà mↄ dańlɛ Onↄ guzulɛ wɛ̃́lɛe guu. Vãi ↄ̃ aalɛ wɛɛlɛmanↄ.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ zĩ̀má ma mɛ̀: Málɛ zĩ zↄ̃ↄ kɛɛ, má e mà mↄo. Má e mà zĩpi to we mà mↄ á kĩ́io.
Aa lɛ́kpãsãpi kɛ̀mɛɛ gɛ̃n síiↄ̃ɛ, mɛ́ ma yã́pi zãsìmá màa píi.
A gɛ̃n sↄode Sambala a ìwae zĩ̀a. A taala pↄ́ wi kã́n'ↄ nawào kũa.
Wa kɛ̃̀ lápi guu wà mɛ̀: Wà yãe feena mà buipãleↄ kĩ́i, ↄ̃ Gɛsɛũ mɛ̀ sĩanaɛ. À mɛ̀ mpi ń Yuda kĩniↄ a zɛò à bↄ kí yã́ kpɛɛ. A yã́i álɛ bĩ́ipi boi. Wà mɛ̀ lↄ ń ye ǹ gↄ̃ Yudaↄ kía ũɛ,
ↄ̃ n ãnabiↄ dìlɛ aa o Yelusalɛũ ḿmɛ ń dɛ ń kía ũ. Kí a yã́pi ma. Ayãmɛto mↄ wà lɛkpaaĩ.
Ɔ̃ ma lɛ́kpãsãkɛ̀ɛ̀ ma mɛ̀: Yã́ pↄ́ ńlɛ o kuo. Ḿmɛ n yã́pi ò nzĩawa.
Ampii aa ye vĩa ma kũ aa mɛ̀ wá ↄ a gↄ̃ dↄwáziɛ, wá e zĩpi midɛo. Ma Lua, ma ↄ gba gbãa.
Gↄↄewa ma gɛ Delaia nɛ́ Semaia, Mɛtabɛli tↄũna bɛ, asa à azĩa yè a kpɛ́u. À mɛ̀: Wà kpaaũ Lua kpɛ́u, wí a gbatawálɛ, asa gbɛ̃́ↄ lɛ́ mↄ́ n dɛiɛ. Aa mↄ n dɛi gwã́aɛ.
Ɔ̃ ma mɛ̀: Ma taa ì bàalɛa? Ma taa a fↄ̃ gɛ ulɛ Lua kpɛ́u mazĩa misia yã́ia? Má gɛo.
Má dↄ̃ mazĩawa aà yã́pi i bↄ Lua kĩ́io. À ãnabikɛpi kɛ̀ ma yã́ musu, kɛ́ Tobia ń Sambalao fĩabòɛ̀ yã́iɛ.
Màa à fĩabòɛ̀, kɛ́ vĩa e ma kũ mà duunakɛ mà gɛ́ we, aai gbasa ma tↄ́ ↄ̃̀ↄkpa aa ma sↄ̃́sↄ̃.
Ma Lua, to Tobia ń Sambalao yãkɛapi àↄ dↄngu. To nↄɛ ãnabi Nↄadia yã́ àↄ dↄngu lↄ ń ãnabi kĩni pↄ́ aa ye vĩa ma kũↄ.
Gↄↄ blakwi ń plao gbɛa wa bĩ́ipi mìdɛ mↄ pↄ́ wì mɛ Ɛlulu gↄↄ baasↄodezĩ.
Kɛ́ wá ibɛɛↄ a baomà, mɛ́ bui pↄ́ liaawáziↄ wɛsìɛ, an kã́ gà, aa dↄ̃̀ sa kɛ́ wa zĩpi kɛ̀ ń wá Lua gbãaoɛ.
Gↄↄbeezĩ Yuda kíabuiↄ lɛ́ lá kpã́sã Tobiaɛ mↄ̀ↄmↄↄ, mɛ́ Tobiapi lɛ́ kpã́sãnɛ́.
Yudaↄ yãyèaànↄ dasi, asa Ala nɛ́ Sekania mɛ́ aà ã̀nsue ũ, mɛ́ Bɛlɛkia nɛ́ Mɛsulaũ mɛ́ Tobiapi nɛ́ Yohanani ã̀nsue ũ.
Aaì aà sáaukpa ma wáa lↄ, ↄ̃ aaì ɛa ma yã́ dau siuɛ̀. Tobiapi láↄ kpã̀sãmɛɛ lↄ, kɛ́ vĩa e ma kṹ.
Kɛ́ wà bĩ́ibò mɛ́ ma a bↄlɛ gbaↄ pɛ̀lɛpɛlɛ, wà bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ ń lɛ̀sinaↄ ń Levii buiↄ dìlɛ.
Ɔ̃ ma a dãuna Anani dìlɛ Yelusalɛũ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ ń kibɛ ziia Ananiao, asa gbɛ̃́ náaideɛ. A Lua vĩa vĩ dɛ gbɛ̃́ dasidela.
Má ònɛ́: Wasuli Yelusalɛũ bↄlɛ gbaↄ wɛ̃o e ĩatɛ̃ gɛ lí gbãakũ. Wàli zɛtata wà gbã́aↄ dau e bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ tá. Wà Yelusalɛũdeↄ dilɛdilɛ gudↄ̃anaↄ ũ lↄ, an gbɛ̃eↄ aaↄ ku gudↄ̃akĩi, an gbɛ̃eↄ ń bɛ saɛ.
Wɛ̃́lɛpi zↄ̃ↄ mɛ́ a bàlumaↄ vĩ, mɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú weↄ bílao. Wi e ɛ̀a a kpɛ́ↄ dↄ̀dↄ yãao.
Ma Lua làasoo dàmɛɛ ma sↄ̃u, ↄ̃ ma kíabuiↄ kã̀aa ń gbãadeↄ ń gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ píi, kɛ́ wà ń tↄ́ dalau ń buiwa yã́i.
Babɛli kí Nɛbukanɛza Isailiↄ kũ̀kũ zĩ̀zↄↄ ũ yãa, à tàńnↄ Babɛli. An gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ bↄ̀ zĩ̀zↄkɛpiu aa sù Yelusalɛũ ń Yuda bùsuo, baade ń a bɛoↄn kɛ:
Aa sù ń Zolobabɛlio ń Yesuao ń Nɛɛmiio ń Azaliao ń Laamiao ń Naamanio ń Maadoseo ń Bilisão ń Misipaao ń Bigivaio ń Leuũo ń Baanao sãnu. Isaili gↄ̃ɛ pↄ́ sùpiↄ naoan kɛ:
Palↄsi buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ pla ń baswaaↄ̃kwi ń plao (2.172).
Sefatia buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa do ń baswaaↄ̃kwi ń plao (372).
Ala buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃o ń blakwi ń plao (652).
Paata Mↄabu bui pↄ́ dɛ Yesua ń Yoabuo buiↄ ũↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ pla ń ↄ̀aa síiↄ̃ ń bao plasaio (2.818).
Elaũ buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa soolo ń blakwi ń síiↄ̃o (1.254).
Zatu buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa síiↄ̃ ń blasↄoo (845).
Zakai buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ ń baswaaↄ̃o (760).
Binui buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ ń blakwi plasaio (648).
Bebai buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ ń baasↄo ń àaↄ̃o (628).
Azegada buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ pla ń ↄ̀aa do ń basoolo ń plao (2.322).
Adonikaũ buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ ń bàaↄ̃sↄo ń plao (667).
Bigivai buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ pla ń bàaↄ̃sↄo ń plao (2.067).
Adini buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ ń bàaↄ̃ sↄosaio (655).
Atee pↄ́ dɛ Ezekia bui ũ buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn basↄo plasai (98).
Asuũ buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa do ń basoolosↄo ń àaↄ̃o (328).
Bezai buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa do ń basoolosↄo mɛ̀ndosaio (324).
Alifi buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn basↄokwi ń plao (112).
Gabaↄ̃ↄ buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn basↄo sↄosai (95).
Bɛtɛlɛũdeↄ ń Nɛtofadeↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa do kuɛplasai (188).
Anatodeↄ gbɛ̃ↄn basoolosↄo ń àaↄ̃o (128).
Bɛtazamavɛdeↄ gbɛ̃ↄn bla ń plao (42).
Kiliayaaliũdeↄ ń Kefiladeↄ ń Beelodeↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ ń basopla ń àaↄ̃o (743).
Lamadeↄ ń Gɛbadeↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ ń bao ń mɛ̀ndoo (621).
Mimasadeↄ gbɛ̃ↄn basoolo ń plao (122).
Bɛtɛlideↄ ń Aideↄ gbɛ̃ↄn basoolo ń àaↄ̃o (123).
Nɛbo pãle buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn blakwi ń plao (52).
Elaũ pãle buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa soolo ń blakwi ń síiↄ̃o (1.254).
Aliũ buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa do ń basooloo (320).
Yelikodeↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa do ń basoplasↄoo (345).
Lodideↄ ń Adidadeↄ ń Onↄdeↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ ń basoolo ń mɛ̀ndoo (721).
Senaadeↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ àaↄ̃ ń ↄ̀aa síiↄ̃ ń basoolokwio (3.930).
Sa'ona bui pↄ́ sùↄn kɛ: Yesua bui Yedaia buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa sↄo baasↄo ń plao sai (973).
Imɛɛ buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa sↄo ń blakwi ń plao (1.052).
Pasuu buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa soolo ń blasↄo ń plao (1.247).
Aliũ buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa sↄo ń gɛ̃o ń plao (1.017).
Levii bui pↄ́ sùↄn kɛ: Odeva bui Yesua ń Kamiɛlio buiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn bàaↄ̃kwi ń síiↄ̃o (74).
Asafa bui lɛ̀sinaↄ gbɛ̃ↄn basoplasↄo ń àaↄ̃o (148).
Saluũ ń Ateeo ń Talemↄo ń Akubuo ń Atitao ń Sobaio bui bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ gbɛ̃ↄn basopla plasai (138).
Lua ua zĩkɛnaↄá gbɛ̃́ɛ beeↄ buiↄnɛ: Ziha, Asufa, Tabao,
Kelosi, Siaa, Padoni,
Lebana, Agaba, Salemai,
Anana, Gideli, Gaaa,
Leaia, Lezini, Nɛkoda,
Gazaũ, Uza, Pasea,
Besai, Mɛuniũ, Nɛfusiũ,
Babuku, Akufa, Aluu,
Bazelu, Mɛida, Aasa,
Baakosi, Sisela, Tɛma,
Nɛzia ń Atifao.
Salomↄↄ zↄ̀blena buiↄá gbɛ̃́ɛ beeↄ buiↄnɛ: Sotai, Sofɛlɛ, Peluda,
Yala, Daakↄ̃, Gideli,
Sefatia, Atili, Pokɛlɛ Azebaiũ ń Amↄo.
Lua ua zĩkɛnapiↄ ń Salomↄↄ zↄ̀blena buipiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa pla swaaↄ̃saiɛ (392).
Gbɛ̃eↄ bↄ̀ Tɛmɛla ń Tɛlaasao ń Kelubuo ń Adↄ̃o ń Imɛɛo, ↄ̃ aai e ń buibↄkĩi ↄ̀lↄnɛ́o, tó Isailiↄn ń ũ.
Delaia ń Tobiao ń Nɛkodao buiↄnɛ, aa gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ ń bla ń plaoɛ (642).
Sa'ona bui pↄ́ dɛ Ɔbaia ń Akozio ń Baazilaio buiↄ ũ sù lↄ. Baazilaipi Galada bui Baazilainɛ sɛ̀ yãa nↄ ũ, ↄ̃ à a ã̀nsue tↄ́pi sɛ̀.
Gbɛ̃́piↄ ń tↄ́ wɛ̀ɛlɛ buibↄkĩi taalau, aai bↄwào, ↄ̃ wà gìnɛ́ ń sa'ozĩo.
Bùsu dↄaana ònɛ́, mɛ́ i kɛ sa'ona ń yã́ gwà ń Uliũo ń Tumiũo bàasio, aasu Lua blɛ bleo.
Gbɛ̃́piↄ píi gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bla ń plao ń ↄ̀aa do ń baswaaↄ̃o (42.360).
An zↄ̀blenaↄ gↄ̃ɛↄ ń nↄɛↄ ku lↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ sopla ń ↄ̀aa do ń basopla àaↄ̃saio (7.337). Lɛ̀sinaↄ gↄ̃ɛↄ ń nↄɛↄ kúńnↄ lↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa do ń blasↄoo (245).
Aa sↄ̃́ↄ vĩ ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ ń basooloo ń gɛ̃o ń mɛ̀ndoo (736), sↄ̃baonaↄ ↄ̀aa do ń blasↄoo (245), yiongoↄ ↄ̀aa pla ń bla sↄosaio (435), zàa'ĩnaↄ ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ soolo ń ↄ̀aa àaↄ̃ ń basooloo (6.720).
An uabeleeↄ gbadàda zĩ yã́ musu. Bùsu dↄaana gbadà Lua kpɛ́ zĩ kpagolo guu vua kiloo swaaↄ̃ ń kĩnio ń vua taↄ mɛ̀n blakwi ń sa'on ulataoↄ mɛ̀n ↄ̀aa pla ń basoolokwio (530).
Uabeleeↄ gbadàda Lua kpɛ́ zĩ kpagolo guu, vua kiloo baswaaↄ̃kwi (170) ń ã́nusuo tↄnu do ń kiloo ↄ̀aa doo.
Gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ gbadàda lↄ, vua kiloo baswaaↄ̃kwi (170) ń ã́nusuo tↄnu do ń kiloo basↄoo ń sa'on ulataoↄ mɛ̀n bàaↄ̃sↄo ń plao (67).
Sa'onaↄ ń Levii buiↄ ń bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ ń lɛ̀sinaↄ ń gbɛ̃pãleeↄ ń Lua ua zĩkɛnaↄ ń Isaili kĩniↄ zↄ̃̀lɛzↄ̃lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛↄ guu.
Gbɛ̃́pii kã̀aa ń lɛdoũo gãaɛ pↄ́ kú Í Bↄlɛ saɛ, ↄ̃ wa ò yãdanɛde Ɛzalaɛ aà bↄ ń Mↄizi ikoyã pↄ́ Dii dìlɛ Isailiↄnɛ láo.
Mↄ sopla gↄↄ sɛ̃́ia zĩ́ sa'ona Ɛzala bↄ̀ ń Mↄizi ikoyão bíla aɛ. Gↄ̃ɛↄ ń nↄɛↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa fↄ̃ yãmaↄ píi kú we.
À aɛdↄ̀ gãaɛ pↄ́ kú Í Bↄlɛpi saɛwa, ↄ̃ àlɛ lápi kyokɛ za kↄↄkↄↄ e ĩatɛ̃ minanguo gↄ̃ɛↄ ń nↄɛↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa fↄ̃ maↄ wáa. Gbɛ̃́pii swãdↄ̀ Mↄizi ikoyã lápi kyokɛai.
Yãdanɛde Ɛzala zɛ gbà lɛsĩ pↄ́ wa dà ń lío lápi kyokɛa yã́i musu. Matitia ń Sɛmao ń Anaiao ń Uliao ń Ilikiao ń Maaseao ku aà ↄplaai. Pedaia ń Misaɛlio ń Malakiao ń Asuũo ń Asadanao ń Zakalio ń Mɛsulaũo ku aà ↄzɛɛi.
Kɛ́ Ɛzala lá wɛ̃̀, gbɛ̃́pii è, asa aà zɛkĩi lɛsĩ dɛńla. Kɛ́ a wɛ̃̀, gbɛ̃́pii fɛ̀lɛ zɛ̀.
Ɛzala Dii Lua zↄ̃ↄde sáaukpà, ↄ̃ gbɛ̃́pii ↄsɛ̀ musu aa mɛ̀: Ãmi! Ãmi! Ɔ̃ aa mipɛ̀lɛ tↄↄlɛ, aa kùlɛ Diiɛ.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ gbɛ̃́ↄ zɛa we, Levii buieↄ Mↄizi ikoyã dàdanɛ́. Levii buipiↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Yesua, Bani, Selebia, Yamini, Akubu, Sabetai, Odia, Maasea, Kelita, Azalia, Yozaba, Anana ń Pelaiao.
Aa Lua ikoyã lápi kyokɛ̀, ↄ̃ aa a bↄↄlɛkɛ̀, aa a wɛ́ wɛ̃̀nɛ́, kɛ́ aa e kyópi ma.
Ɔ̃ bùsu gbãade Nɛɛmii ń yãdanɛde sa'ona Ɛzalao ń Levii bui pↄ́ lɛ́ yãdada gbɛ̃́ↄnɛↄ ònɛ́: Gↄↄɛ beeá Dii á Lua pↄ́ɛ. Ásu wɛ̃nakɛo, ásu ↄ́ↄlↄo. Asa kɛ́ aalɛ Mↄizi ikoyã ma, aalɛ ↄ́ↄlↄ ḿpiiɛ.
Nɛɛmii mɛ̀: À gɛ pↄ́ níside ble, í í nana mi. À li gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ pↄe vĩoↄnɛ. Gↄↄɛ beeá wá Dii pↄ́ɛ. Ásu búbuapɛo, asa pↄna pↄ́ Dii ì kpámá dɛ á gbãa'ekĩi ũ.
Levii buiↄ gɛ̀ gbɛ̃́ↄ nↄ̀sɛ nìninɛ́ aa mɛ̀: À nílɛ! Gↄↄɛ beeá Lua pↄ́ɛ, ásu búbuapɛo.
Ɔ̃ aa fɛ̀lɛ gɛ̀ pↄblè aa imì, aa lìkↄ̃ɛ aa pↄnakɛ̀ maamaa, asa aa yã́ pↄ́ wa ònɛ́ mà sa.
Mↄpi gↄↄ plaade zĩ́ uabeleↄ ń sa'onaↄ ń Levii buiↄ kã̀aa yãdanɛde Ɛzalazi, kɛ́ aa e wɛ́tɛ Mↄizi ikoyãi.
Ɔ̃ aa yã́ pↄ́ Dii dìlɛ Mↄiziɛ è we à mɛ̀, Isailiↄ aaↄ ku lákpɛↄ guu mↄ soplade dikpɛgↄↄzĩ,
mɛ́ aa yã́ɛ bee kpàwakɛ ń zↄ̃ɛwiaↄ guu ń Yelusalɛũo aa mɛ: À bↄlɛ gɛ́ sɛ̃u, í kulaↄ kaso suò ń baalalaↄ ń gbɛ́laↄ ń daminalaↄ ń lí uede láↄ, kɛ́ à lákpɛↄ dↄò lá a ku taalauwa.
Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃́ↄ gɛ̀ kàsokaso aa sùò, baade lákpɛ dↄ̀ò a kpɛ́ musu ge ua ge Lua ua ge Í Bↄlɛ gãaɛ ge Ɛflaiũ Bↄlɛ gãaɛ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ bↄ̀ zĩ̀zↄkɛupiↄ lákpɛↄ dↄ̀dↄ ḿpii, ↄ̃ aa ku a guu. Za Nuni nɛ́ Yozuee gↄↄ e gↄↄ bee Isailiↄ i dikpɛpi kɛ màao. Ɔ̃ aa pↄnakɛ̀ maamaa.
Ɛzala ìↄ Lua ikoyã lá kyokɛ lá gu lɛ́ dↄ sɛa za dikpɛgↄↄ sɛ̃́ia zĩ́ e à gɛ midɛò. Aa dikpɛpi kɛ̀ gↄↄ soplaɛ. A gↄↄ swaaↄ̃de zĩ́ ↄ̃ aa kↄ̃kãaakɛ̀ lá wa dìlɛwa.
Mↄ doũpi gↄↄ baasↄo mɛ̀ndosaide zĩ́ Isailiↄ kↄ̃ kã̀aa ń lɛyeo ń zwã̀nkasaↄ dadaa, mɛ́ bùsu kákaa ń miu.
Aa ńzĩa kɛ̃̀ buipãleↄwa ↄ̃ aa sĩa, aalɛ ń duunaↄ ń ń deziↄ yãvãikɛaↄ o.
Aa gↄ̃̀ sĩa gu pↄ́ aa kuu, ↄ̃ wà Dii ń Lua ikoyã lá kyokɛ̀nɛ́ e mↄ̀ àaↄ̃, ↄ̃ aa ń duunaↄ ò aa kùlɛ Dii ń Luaɛ e mↄ̀ àaↄ̃.
Levii buieↄ zɛ gba pↄ́ wa dànɛ́ musu, aa lɛzù Dii ń Luazi gbã́ugbãu. An tↄ́ↄn kɛ: Yesua, Bani, Kamiɛli, Sebania, Buni, Selebia, Bani ń Kenanio.
Levii buiↄ Yesua ń Kamiɛlio ń Banio ń Asaniao ń Selebiao ń Odiao ń Sebaniao ń Petaiao mɛ̀: À fɛlɛ Dii á Lua táasilɛ! A ku za asĩnizĩ e gↄↄpii. To wà n tↄbↄ, asa n gawi dɛ lɛ́maama ń táasiola píi.
Ḿmɛ ń Dii ũ ndo. N bàluma kɛ̀ ń n bɛ pↄ́ kú musuo ń pↄ́ pↄ́ kú weↄ píi. N dṹnia kɛ̀ ń pↄ́ pↄ́ kuwàↄ, n ísia kɛ̀ ń pↄ́ pↄ́ kú a guuↄ. Ni wɛ̃ni kpa ḿpiiwa, n bɛ malaika dasiↄ ì kúlɛnɛ.
Ḿmɛ ń Dii Lua pↄ́ Ablaũ sɛ̀ ũ, n bↄaànↄ Ulu, Babiloni bùsuu, n aà tↄ́ lìlɛɛ̀ Ablahaũ.
Ń è a n náai vĩ a sↄ̃ guu, ↄ̃ n mɛ̀ n bàa aↄ kuaànↄ, ńyↄ̃ Kanaa bùsu kpawà ń aà buiↄ, bùsu pↄ́ Itiↄ ń Amↄleↄ kuu ń Pɛliziↄ ń Yebusiↄ ń Giigasiↄ. Ɔ̃ n lɛ́ pↄ́ ń gbɛ̃̀ɛ̀pi kɛ̀, kɛ́ ń maa yã́i.
N taasi pↄ́ wá deziↄ kɛ̀ Egipi è, n wii pↄ́ aa lɛ̀ Ísia Tɛ̃ai mà.
N seelaↄ ń dabudabuↄ kɛ̀ Falaↄ̃ↄɛ, ń kpàaàzi ń aà ìwaↄ ń aà bùsudeↄ píi, asa ń dↄ̃ lá aa ãiapãsĩkɛ̀ ń wá deziↄ. N tↄbↄ̀ lá a ku e ń a gbãowa.
N ísia zↄ̃̀ɛnɛ́, ↄ̃ aa táa'ò gugiiu aa bùa. N gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ pɛ̀lɛńziↄ zù ísiu, n ń zú lán gbɛwa í zↄ̃ↄpi guu.
N dↄaa n gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ tɛlu guu fãanɛ, gwãasĩna sↄ̃ tɛ́ guu. N zɛ́ pↄ́ dɛ aa sɛ pùnɛ́.
N pila Sinai gbɛ̀sĩsĩ musu, n yã'ònɛ́ za musu. N ikoyã zɛde sĩande kpàmá ń yãmaa pↄ́ ń dìlɛↄ.
Ń tò aa kã́mabogↄↄ dↄ̃̀ ń pↄ́ ũ. N n yãdilɛaↄ ń n ↄtondↄkĩio ń n ikoyão dà n zↄ̀blena Mↄiziɛ, ↄ̃ a kpàmá.
Kɛ́ nↄana ń dɛ́, n blɛ gbàɛnɛ́ za musu. Kɛ́ imi ń dɛ́, n ibↄ̀nɛ́ gbɛsiu. Bùsu pↄ́ n a lɛgbɛ̃̀nɛ́ n mɛ̀ ńyↄ̃ kpámá ↄ̃ ń ònɛ́ aa gɛ sí ń pↄ́ ũ.
Ń beeo wá dezipiↄ kàamai vĩ, an swã́ gbãakũ̀, aaliↄ n yãdilɛaↄ kũao.
Aa gì n yãmai, dabudabu pↄ́ ń kɛ̀nɛ́ↄ yã́ sã̀ńgu. An swã́ gbãakũ̀, aa bↄ̀ n yã́ kpɛ, aa dↄaana dìlɛ aà ɛa táńnↄ zↄbleu. Lua, ni gbɛ̃́ↄ duuna kɛ̃́má, ń sùuu vĩ ń sósobio, n pↄ lí pa kpaao, ń gbɛ̃kɛ vĩ zↄ̃ↄ, ↄ̃ ni pãkpańzio.
Baa kɛ́ aa mↄkàsa lán gáaenawa, aa mɛ̀ ń dii pↄ́ ń bↄ́lɛ Egipin we, mɛ́ aa dↄ̀ɛnnↄ maamaa,
ni pãkpańzi guwaiwaiuo n sósobi zↄ̃ↄ yã́i. Tɛlupi dↄ̀aa zɛ'ↄ̀lↄnɛ́ fãanɛ, tɛ́pi zɛ́ pↄ́ dɛ aa sɛ pùnɛ́ gwã́, i ń tó we ziio.
N n Nisĩna kpàmá à yãdànɛ́. Ni ń tɛ̃́ manao. Kɛ́ imi lɛ́ ń dɛ, n ń gbá í.
N ń gwá guwaiwaiu wɛ̃̀ bla, pↄe i kɛ̃́sãmáo. An pↄkasaↄ i yaao, an gbá i sɛ́sɛo.
N buiↄ kpàmá ń ń bùsuↄ, n ń bùsupiↄ kpaalɛ̀nɛ́ míↄ. Aa Ɛsɛbↄ̃ kí Siↄ̃ bùsu sì ń pↄ́ ũ ń Basana kí Ogu pↄ́o.
Ń tò an bui dasikũ̀ lán saanaↄwa, n gɛ̃ńnↄ bùsu pↄ́ ń ò ń maeↄnɛ aa gɛ sí ń pↄ́ ũ guu.
Kɛ́ an nɛ́ↄ gɛ̀ bùsupi sì ń pↄ́ ũ, ↄ̃ n Kanaa pↄ́ kú weↄ kãdɛ̀nɛ́, n ń nánɛ́ ń ↄzĩ ń ń kíaↄ píi, n bùsupi buiↄ kpàmá, aa ń pↄeã kɛ̀má.
Aa wɛ̃́lɛ bĩ́ideↄ sì ń tↄↄlɛ maao, aa kpɛ́ↄ sì ń pↄmaa pↄ́ kúuↄ ń lↄ̀ↄ pↄ́ wa yↄ̃̀ↄ ń vɛ̃ɛbuↄ ń kù kpɛ́ↄ ń lí pↄ́ wì a bɛ bleↄ à kɛ̀ zài. Aa pↄblè aa kã̀ aa mɛ̀kpa, aa namablè n ɛ̀fãai zↄ̃ↄ yã́i.
Ń beeo an swã́ gbãakũ̀, ↄ̃ aa bↄ̀ n yã́ kpɛ, aa gì n ikoyãi. Aa ãnabi pↄ́ lɛdàmá aa sumaↄ dɛ̀dɛ, aa dↄ̀ɛnnↄ maamaa.
N ń ná ń ibɛɛↄnɛ ń ↄzĩ, aa gbãamↄ̀nɛ́, ↄ̃ aa wiilɛ̀nzi ń taasikɛa guu. Kua za musu ń sìńnↄ n sósobi zↄ̃ↄ yã́i, n suabanaↄ dìlɛnɛ́, ↄ̃ aa ń bↄ́ ń ibɛɛpiↄ ↄzĩ.
Tó aa niɛ è, aaì ɛa yã́ pↄ́ vãinɛ kɛɛ, ↄ̃ n ń kpá ń ibɛɛↄwa aa gbãablèmá. Aa ɛ̀a wiilɛ̀nzi, ↄ̃ kua za musu ń sìńnↄ, n ń bↄ́ gɛ̃n ũma'ũma n sósobi yã́i.
N lɛdàmá aa zɛ ń n ikoyão, kási aa zazakũ̀ma, aaliↄ n yãdilɛaↄ kũao, n yã́ pↄ́ tó gbɛ̃́ kũa, aↄ ku a sabaiɛ. Aa zã̀ n yã́piↄwa aa mikpɛlìnɛ, an swã́ gbãakũ̀ aa gì n yãmai.
N mɛnakɛ̀ńnↄ a wɛ̃ dasi, n Nisĩna yãdà ń ãnabiↄnɛ, ↄ̃ aa lɛdàomá, aai swãdↄio, ↄ̃ n ń ná buipãleↄnɛ ń ↄzĩ.
N sósobi zↄ̃ↄ guu ni ń midɛo, Lua sùuude sósobiden n ũ, ni pãkpańzio.
Ayãmɛto wá Lua, Lua zↄ̃ↄ gbãade pↄ́ ni tó ń mɛ séenata, lá n bàa ìↄ kúwanↄ gbɛ̃kɛ guu, taasi pↄ́ wá lé ń wá kíaↄ ń wá dↄaanaↄ ń wá sa'onaↄ ń wá ãnabiↄ ń wá deziↄ ń n gbɛ̃́ↄ píi za Asili kíaↄ gↄↄ e ń a gbão, ńsu to à kɛnɛ fɛ̃́nɛũo.
Yã́ pↄ́ wá léↄ píi musu ń maa, baa kɛ́ wa yãvãikɛ̀, ń náai vĩ.
Wá kíaↄ ń wá dↄaanaↄ ń wá sa'onaↄ ń wá deziↄ aai zĩkɛ ń ikoyãwao, aai laaidↄ ń yãdilɛaↄwao ge lɛ́ pↄ́ ń dàmáↄ.
Baa gↄↄ pↄ́ aa ńzĩa vĩ, mɛ́ aa pↄmaa dasi pↄ́ n ń gbáↄ vĩ ń bùsu yàasa táaede pↄ́ ń kpàmáo, aai zↄblenɛo, aai mikɛ̃ ń yãvãiↄwao.
Gwa! Zↄↄn wá ũ gbã. Bùsu pↄ́ ń kpà wá deziↄwa aa a libɛↄ ń a pↄmaaↄ ble, zↄↄn wá ũ a guu.
Wá bugbɛ yàasaↄ gↄ̃̀ kí pↄ́ ń tò aa gbãablèwáↄ pↄ́ ũ wá duuna yã́i. Aaì kiblewá ń wá pↄtuoↄ lá aa yeiwa. Wá kú wɛ́tɛ̃a zↄ̃ↄ guu.
Yã́ beeↄ yã́i píi wálɛ lɛdoũkɛnnↄ ń sĩanao, wálɛ kɛ̃́ lá guu. Wá dↄaanaↄ ń Levii buiↄ ń wá sa'onaↄ lɛ́ ń seela kɛwà.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa ń seela kɛ̀wàↄn kɛ: Bùsu gbãade Nɛɛmii Akalia nɛ́, Zedekia,
Selaia, Azalia, Zelemii,
Pasuu, Amalia, Malakia,
Atusu, Sebania, Maluku,
Aliũ, Mɛlemↄ, Obadia,
Daniɛli, Ginɛtↄ̃, Baluku,
Mɛsulaũ, Abia, Miamɛ,
Maazia, Bilegai ń Semaiao. Gbɛ̃́piↄá sa'onaↄnɛ.
Levii buiↄn kɛ: Azania nɛ́ Yesua, Enada nɛ́ Binui, Kamiɛli
ń ń gbɛ̃́ↄ: Sebania, Odia, Kelita, Pelaia, Anana,
Mise, Leobɛ, Asabia,
Zakuu, Selebia, Sebania,
Odia, Bani ń Beninuo.
Isaili dↄaanaↄn kɛ: Palↄsi, Paata Mↄabu, Elaũ, Zatu, Bani,
Buni, Azegada, Bebai,
Adonia, Bigivai, Adini,
Atee, Ezekia, Azuu,
Odia, Asuũ, Bezai,
Alifi, Anato, Nɛbai,
Mapiasi, Mɛsulaũ, Ezii,
Mɛsezabɛli, Zadoki, Yadua,
Pelatia, Anana, Anaia,
Ozee, Anania, Asubu,
Aloese, Pila, Sobɛki,
Leuũ, Asabana, Maasea,
Ahia, Anana, Ana,
Maluku, Aliũ ń Baanao.
Isaili kĩniↄ, sa'onaↄ ń Levii buiↄ ń bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ ń lɛ̀sinaↄ ń Lua ua zĩkɛnaↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa kɛ̃̀ bui pↄ́ liaańziↄwa aa Lua ikoyã kũaↄ nàkↄ̃wa ń ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛ gbãade ũↄ. An naↄ ń ń nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ ń ń nɛnↄɛↄ nàmá lↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ yã́pi mà mɛ́ aa dↄ̃ↄ píi.
Aa lɛgbɛ̃̀ aa mɛ̀: Wá sì ń Luao, wáↄ tɛ Lua ikoyã pↄ́ a kpà a zↄ̀blena Mↄiziwai. Wáↄ Dii wá Lua yãdilɛaↄ kũa ń aà yãdanɛↄ, wíↄ aà ↄtondↄkĩi gwa.
Wá wá nɛnↄɛↄ kpã́sã bui pↄ́ liaawáziↄwa lↄo. Wá ń nɛnↄɛↄ sɛ́ wá nɛ́ↄnɛ sↄ̃o.
Aa mɛ̀ lↄ: Tó bui pↄ́ liaawáziↄ mↄ̀ ń laao ge pↄ́wɛnae aa yía kã́mabogↄↄ, wá lúmá kã́mabogↄↄzĩ ge lousisigↄↄzĩo. Wɛ̃̀ sopla ń wɛ̃̀ soplao wáli tó tↄↄlɛ ĩ́ampa, wíli gbɛ̃́ↄ kɛ̃́ ń ń fĩaↄ.
Wá dìlɛ wázĩa yã́ ũɛ, wá baade lí ã́nusu kpa wɛ̃ ń wɛ̃o galaũ síiↄ̃ wá Lua ua zĩ yã́ musu.
Iↄ dɛ pɛ̃ɛ pↄ́ wì kpa Luawa pↄ́ ũ ń pↄ́wɛnti pↄ́ wìↄ kpawà lá gu lɛ́ dↄo ń sa pↄ́ wìↄ a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ lá gu lɛ́ dↄo ń sa pↄ́ wìↄ o kã́mabogↄↄ ń mↄ dafu dikpɛgↄↄo ń dikpɛ pãle zĩ́o ń sa pↄ́ wì o sáaukpaa yã́io ń Isailiↄ duun awakpabↄↄ ń wá Lua ua yã́ kĩniↄ píi.
Wá sa'onaↄ ń Levii buiↄ ń gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ píi, wa gbɛlà mↄa ń yàao wá Lua ua yã́ musu, wàli mↄò ualɛ ń ualɛo gↄↄ pↄ́ wa dìlɛwa wɛ̃ ń wɛ̃o. A dɛ Dii wá Lua gbagbakĩi pↄ́ ũɛ lá a ku Mↄizi ikoyã guuwa.
Wáliↄ mↄ Dii kpɛ́u wɛ̃ ń wɛ̃o ń wá buapↄ́ káauↄ ń libɛ sɛ̃́iaↄ píi.
Wáliↄ mↄ wá Lua ua ń wá nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́iaↄ ń wá zunɛ sɛ̃́iaↄ ge sã ge ble, wíli kpá sa'ona pↄ́ lɛ́ zĩkɛ weↄwa, lá a ku Mↄizi ikoyã guuwa.
Wáli mↄ́ ń wá pↄ́wɛn sɛ̃́iao ń wá kàa sɛ̃́iaↄ ń wá libɛ sɛ̃́iaↄ ń wá vɛ̃ɛ sɛ̃́iaↄ ń wá nísi sɛ̃́iao, wí kálɛ làasiu wá Lua ua sa'onaↄnɛ. Wáli wá buapↄ́ↄ kwide bↄ Levii buiↄnɛ, asa Levii buiↄ mɛ́ ì a kwide si zↄ̃ɛwia ń zↄ̃ɛwiao.
Tó Levii buiↄ lɛ́ a kwide sí, Aalona bui sa'onaeↄ líↄ kúńnↄ. Levii buiↄ sↄ̃ aali pↄ́ kwide pↄ́ aa sìpi kwide sɛ gɛò wá Lua ua, aali kálɛ làasiu.
Levii buiↄ ń Isaili kĩniↄ píi lí pↄ́wɛna ń vɛ̃ɛo ń nísio labakɛ, aali kálɛ làasiu Lua ua, gu pↄ́ luakukĩi pↄ́ↄ kuu ń sa'ona pↄ́ lɛ́ zĩkɛ weↄ ń bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ ń lɛ̀sinaↄ. Màa wáli pãkpa wá Lua uaio.
Isaili dↄaanaↄ zↄ̃̀lɛ Yelusalɛũ, ↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ gbɛlà an gbɛ̃́ↄ kwide mↄ zↄ̃lɛa Lua wɛ̃́lɛpi guu yã́ musu, an gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ i gↄ̃ zↄ̃ɛwiaↄ guu.
Wà uabele pↄ́ dↄ̀aa zɛ̀ ń kua Yelusalɛũoↄ sáaukpà.
Yuda bùsu dↄaana pↄ́ zↄ̃̀lɛ Yelusalɛũↄ tↄ́ↄn kɛ: Isaili kĩniↄ, sa'onaↄ ń Levii buiↄ ń Lua ua zĩkɛnaↄ ń Salomↄↄ zↄ̀blen buiↄ zↄ̃̀lɛ Yuda bùsu wɛ̃́lɛↄ guu, baade ń a tↄↄlɛo,
ↄ̃ Yudaeↄ ń Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ buieↄ zↄ̃̀lɛ Yelusalɛũ. Yudaↄ dↄaanaↄ tↄ́n Ataia ń Maaseao. Pɛlɛzi Maalalee ì, Maalalee Sefatia ì, Sefatia Amalia ì, Amalia Zakali ì, Zakali Uzia ì, ↄ̃ Uzia Ataiapi ì.
Sela Zakali ì, Zakali Yoialibu ì, Yoialibu Adaia ì, Adaia Azaia ì, Azaia Kↄloze ì, Kↄloze Baluku ì, ↄ̃ Baluku Maaseapi ì.
Pɛlɛzi bui gↄ̃gbãa pↄ́ kú Yelusalɛũↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa pla ń bàaↄ̃kwi plasaioɛ (468).
Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ buiↄ dↄaana Salu. Yesaia Itiɛli ì, Itiɛli Maasea ì, Maasea Kolaia ì, Kolaia Pedaia ì, Pedaia Yoedi ì, Yoedi Mɛsulaũ ì, ↄ̃ Mɛsulaũ Salupi ì.
Aàpi gbɛa Gabai ń Salaio. Ampii gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa síiↄ̃ ń basoolokwi plasaioɛ (928).
Zikeli nɛ́ Yoɛli mɛ́ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ, mɛ́ Asenua nɛ́ Yuda mɛ́ wɛ̃́lɛ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ plaade ũ.
Sa'on dↄaanaↄ Yoialibu nɛ́ Yedaia ń Yakɛ̃o
ń Selaiao. Lua ua dↄaana Aitubu Mɛlaio ì, Mɛlaio Zadoki ì, Zadoki Mɛsulaũ ì, Mɛsulaũ Ilikia ì, ↄ̃ Ilikia Selaiapi ì.
An gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ Lua kpɛ́ zĩ kɛↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa síiↄ̃ ń bao ń plaoɛ (822). Sa'on dↄaana Adaia. Malakia Pasuu ì, Pasuu Zakali ì, Zakali Amɛzi ì, Amɛzi Pelalia ì, Pelalia Yolaũ ì, ↄ̃ Yolaũ Adaiapi ì.
Aà gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa dɛ uabeleↄ ũↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa do ń bla ń plaoɛ (242). Sa'on dↄaana Amasai. Imɛɛ Mɛsilemↄ ì, Mɛsilemↄ Azai ì, Azai Azalɛli ì, ↄ̃ Azalɛli Amasaipi ì.
Aà gbɛ̃́ↄá gↄ̃sa gbãaↄnɛ, aa gbɛ̃ↄn basoolokwi plasaiɛ (128). Agedoliũ nɛ́ Zadiɛli mɛ́ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ.
Levii buiↄ dↄaana Semaia. Buni Asabia ì, Asabia Azikaũ ì, Azikaũ Asubu ì, ↄ̃ Asubu Semaiapi ì.
Levii buiↄ dↄaanaↄ Sabetai ń Yozabao mɛ́ Lua ua gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ũ.
Lɛ̀sin dↄaana Matania pↄ́ dɛ lousisin dↄaana ũ. Asafa Zabedi ì, Zabedi Mise ì, ↄ̃ Mise Mataniapi ì. Babukia mɛ́ aà plaade ũ. Bee gbɛa Samua nɛ́ Abeda, Galali tↄũna, Yedutu bui.
Levii bui pↄ́ kú Lua wɛ̃́lɛuↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa do ń basiiↄ̃sↄo mɛ̀ndosaioɛ (284).
Bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ Akubu ń Talemↄo ń ń gbɛ̃́ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn baswaaↄ̃kwi ń plaoɛ.
Isaili kĩniↄ ń sa'onaↄ ń Levii buiↄ ku Yuda bùsu wɛ̃́lɛↄ guu, baade ń a tↄↄlɛo.
Lua ua zĩkɛnaↄ ku Ofɛli sĩ̀sĩ musu. Ziha ń Gisepao mɛ́ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ũ.
Levii bui pↄ́ kú Yelusalɛũↄ dↄaanan Uzi ũ. Mise Matania ì, Matania Asabia ì, Asabia Bani ì, ↄ̃ Bani Uzipi ì. Aàpi mɛ́ Asafa bui pↄ́ aaì dↄaa ń lɛsiyão Lua uaↄ gbɛ̃do ũ.
Pɛɛsiↄ kía mɛ́ yãdìlɛ lɛ̀sinaↄnɛ, à yã́ pↄ́ aa kɛ lá gu lɛ́ dↄ dànɛ́.
Mɛsezabɛli nɛ́ Petaia pↄ́ dɛ Yuda nɛ́ Zela bui ũ ku kíapi kĩ́i Isailiↄ yã́gↄ̃gↄ̃a yã́i.
Yudaeↄ zↄ̃̀lɛ zↄ̃ɛwiaɛ beeↄ guu ń ń fã́anio: Kiliataaba ń a bualoũↄ, Dibↄ̃ ń a bualoũↄ, Kabazee ń a bualoũↄ,
Yesua, Mↄlada, Bɛpele,
Azaasuali, Bɛɛsɛba ń a bualoũↄ,
Zikilaga, Mɛkona ń a bualoũↄ,
Ɛnilimↄ, Zↄla, Yaamu,
Zanↄa, Adulaũ ń a zↄ̃ɛwiaↄ, Lakisi ń a fã́anio ń Azekao ń a bualoũↄ. Aa bɛkpà za Bɛɛsɛba e Bɛninↄũ guzulɛu.
Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ buiↄ bɛkpà wɛ̃́lɛɛ beeↄ guu: Gɛba, Mimasa, Ai, Bɛtɛli ń a bualoũↄ,
Anato, Nↄbu, Anania,
Azoo, Lama, Gitaiũ,
Adida, Zeboiũ, Nɛbala,
Lodi, Onↄ ń Siaↄ guzulɛo.
Levii bui gãli pↄ́ kú Yuda bùsuu yãaeↄ bɛkpà Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ buiↄ bùsuu.
Sa'onaↄ ń Levii bui pↄ́ aa sù ń Salatiɛli nɛ́ Zolobabɛlio ń Yesuaoↄn kɛ: Selaia, Zelemii, Ɛzala,
Amalia, Maluku, Atusu,
Sekania, Leuũ, Mɛlemↄ,
Ido, Ginɛtↄ̃, Abia,
Miamɛ, Maadia, Bilega,
Semaia, Yoialibu, Yedaia,
Salu, Amↄku, Ilikia, Yedaia. Gbɛ̃́piↄ mɛ́ sa'ona ń ń gbɛ̃́ Levii buiↄ dↄaanaↄ ũ sa'onkia Yesua gↄↄ.
Levii buiↄ dↄaanaↄn kɛ: Yesua, Binui, Kamiɛli, Selebia, Yuda, Matania. Matania ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ mɛ́ aaì dↄaa ń táasilɛao,
mɛ́ Babukia ń Unio ń ń gbɛ̃́ↄ mɛ́ lɛ̀sinaↄ gãli plaade ũ.
Yesua Yoakiũ ì, Yoakiũ Ɛliasibu ì, Ɛliasibu Yoiada ì,
Yoiada Yonatãa ì, ↄ̃ Yonatãa Yadua ì.
Sa'ona pↄ́ aa dɛ uabeleↄ ũ Yoakiũ gↄↄↄn kɛ: Selaia bui Mɛlaia, Zelemii bui Anania,
Ɛzala bui Mɛsulaũ, Amalia bui Yohanani,
Maluku bui Yonatãa, Sebania bui Yosɛfu,
Aliũ bui Adena, Mɛlaio bui Ɛlekai,
Ido bui Zakali, Ginɛtↄ̃ bui Mɛsulaũ,
Abia bui Zikeli, Miyãmɛ bui, Maadia bui Piletai,
Bilega bui Samua, Semaia bui Yonatãa,
Yoialibu bui Matenai, Yedaia bui Uzi,
Salu bui Kalai, Amↄku bui Ɛbɛɛ,
Ilikia bui Asabia ń Yedaia bui Nɛtanɛlio.
Wà sa'ona uabeleↄ tↄ́ dàlau za gↄↄ pↄ́ Ɛliasibu ń Yoiadao ń Yohananio ń Yaduao dɛ sa'onkiaↄ ũ e Pɛɛsiↄ kí Daliusi kpalablegↄↄɛ.
Wà Levii bui uabeleↄ tↄ́ dà ladau e Ɛliasibu tↄũna Yohanani gↄↄ.
Levii bui dↄaanaↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Asabia, Selebia, Binui, Kamiɛli ń Yesuao. An gbɛ̃́ↄ ì yãwemá táasilɛa ń sáaukpaao guu gã ń gãoɛ, lá Lua gbɛ̃́ Davidi dìlɛwa.
Gbɛ̃́ɛ beeↄ mɛ́ bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃ana pↄ́ aaì Lua ua làasiↄ ń a bↄlɛↄ dↄ̃́aↄ ũ: Matania, Babukia, Obadia, Mɛsulaũ, Talemↄ ń Akubuo.
Gbɛ̃́piↄ ku gↄↄ pↄ́ Yesua nɛ́ Yoakiũ, Yozada tↄũna dɛ sa'onkia ũɛ. Nɛɛmii mɛ́ bùsu dↄaana ũ, sa'ona Ɛzala mɛ́ yãdanɛde ũ.
Yelusalɛũ bĩ́i sakɛ̃gↄↄ wà Levii buiↄ wɛ̀ɛlɛwɛɛlɛ gu pↄ́ aa kuu, wà gɛ̀ńnↄ Yelusalɛũ aa bĩ́i sakɛ̃ ń pↄnao ń sáaukpaao ń lɛsiao ń sɛ̃́sɛ̃naↄ ń mↄↄnaↄ ń kúuↄ.
Lɛ̀sina pↄ́ kãi ń Yelusalɛũↄ kↄ̃ kã̀aa we, Nɛtofa bualoũdeↄ
ń Bɛgiligalideↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú Gɛba ń Azemavɛo saɛↄ, asa lɛ̀sinaↄ ńzĩa bualoũↄ kpà Yelusalɛũ saɛ weɛ.
Sa'onaↄ ń Levii buiↄ gbãbↄ̀ ńzĩaɛ, ↄ̃ aa gbãbↄ̀ gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄnɛ, ↄ̃ aa gbãbↄ̀ bĩ́iɛ ń a bↄlɛↄ.
Má tò Yuda dↄaanaↄ dɛ̀dɛ bĩ́iwa, ↄ̃ ma lɛ̀sinaↄ kã̀aa gãli zↄ̃ↄ lɛɛ pla, aa dↄaanɛ́ bĩ́i musu. An gãli do bɛ ↄplaa oi, aa bɛ bĩ́i musu Tufua Bↄlɛ oi.
Osaia ń Yuda dↄaana lɛɛ doↄ tɛ́ ń kpɛ
ń Azaliao ń Ɛzalao ń Mɛsulaũo
ń Yudao ń Bɛ̃yãmɛɛo ń Semaiao ń Zelemiio.
Sa'onaeↄ kúńnↄ lↄ, aa kùuↄ kṹkũa. Bee gbɛa Yonatãa nɛ́ Zakali. Asafa mɛ́ Zakuu ì, Zakuu Mise ì, Mise Matania ì, Matania Semaia ì, Semaia Yonatãapi ì.
Aà gbɛ̃́ beeↄ kuaànↄ: Semaia, Azalɛli, Milalai, Gilalai, Maai, Nɛtanɛli, Yuda ń Ananio. Aa Lua gbɛ̃́ Davidi pↄ́'ↄbↄnaↄ kũa. Yãdanɛde Ɛzala mɛ́ dↄaaanɛ́.
Kɛ́ aa kà Nibↄna Bↄlɛ musu, aa dɛ̀dɛ Davidi wɛ̃́lɛ dɛdɛkĩi pↄ́ kú ń aɛↄwa, gu pↄ́ bĩ́i sĩ̀sĩ kũ̀u. Aa dↄ̀ Davidi bɛi, ↄ̃ aa kà Í Bↄlɛ musu gukpɛ oi.
Lɛ̀sinaↄ gãli plaadeↄ gɛ̀ ↄzɛɛ oi. Má tɛ́ńzi bĩ́i musu ń gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ. Wa dↄ Kĩna kalangai, wa gɛ e bĩ́i yàasa kĩ́i.
Ɔ̃ wa gɛ̃ Ɛflaiũ Bↄlɛa ń Bↄlɛ Zio ń Kpↄ̀ Bↄlɛo. Wa dↄ Ananɛli kalangai ń Basↄo kalangao e Sã Bↄlɛ musu, ↄ̃ aa zɛ̀ Dakpɛunaↄ Bↄlɛ musu.
Ɔ̃ lɛ̀sinaↄ gãli plapiↄ kↄ̃ kã̀aa Lua ua. Má kú we lↄ ń gbãade lɛɛ doↄ
ń sa'onaɛ beeↄ: Ɛliakiũ, Maasea, Miyãmɛ, Mise, Ɛlioenai, Zakali ń Ananiao. Aa ń kùuↄ kṹkũa.
Maasea ku we lↄ ń Semaiao ń Ɛleazaao ń Uzio ń Yohananio ń Malakiao ń Elaũo ń Ezɛɛo. Lɛ̀sinaↄ lɛ́ lɛsi, Yezahia mɛ́ ń dↄaana ũ.
Gↄↄ bee aa sa'ò maamaa, ↄ̃ aa pↄnakɛ̀, asa Lua tò an pↄ kɛ̀na à kɛ̀ zàiɛ. Nↄɛↄ ń nɛ́ↄ lɛ́ pↄnakɛ lↄ. Wà Yelusalɛũdeↄ pↄnakɛapi súu mà zã̀.
Zĩbeezĩ aa gↄ̃ɛeↄ dìlɛ làasi gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ũ, gu pↄ́ gbaↄ ń buapↄ káauↄ ń pↄ́ kwideↄ kálɛu. Gbɛ̃́piↄ lí buapↄ́ pↄ́ Mↄizi ikoyã dìlɛ a dɛ sa'onaↄ ń Levii buiↄ baa ũ sɛ́lɛ zↄ̃ɛwia ń zↄ̃ɛwiao aa kãaa we, asa sa'onaↄ ń Levii bui pↄ́ aaì zĩkɛ weↄ yã́ kà Yudaↄguɛ.
Lua ua zĩ ń gbãbↄanɛ́o dɛ ń yã́ ũɛ. Lɛ̀sinaↄ ń bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ líↄ ń zĩ kɛ lá Davidi ń a nɛ́ Salomↄↄo dìlɛwa.
Asa za Davidi ń Asafao gↄↄ lɛ̀sin dↄaanaↄ kuɛ, aaì dↄaa ń Lua táasilɛao ń aà sáaukpaao.
Zolobabɛli ń Nɛɛmiio gↄↄ Isailiↄ píi ìↄ lɛ̀sinaↄ ń bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ kámasa ká lá gu lɛ́ dↄɛ. Aaì Levii buiↄ asea kpámá, mɛ́ Levii buiↄ ì Aalona buiↄ asea kpámá sↄ̃.
Zĩbeezĩ wà Mↄizi lá kyokɛ̀ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ, ↄ̃ wa è we kɛ́ Amↄni ge Mↄabu buie suli gɛ̃ Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ guuo,
asa aai da Isailiↄlɛ ń pↄbleao ń íoo. Aa fĩabò Balaaũɛ aà láaikɛmáɛ, ↄ̃ wá Lua aà yã́ lìlɛ samaa'oa ũ.
Kɛ́ aa ikoyãpi mà, aa buipãleↄ bↄ̀lɛ ń guu.
E yã́pi àↄ gɛ́ kɛi wà sa'ona Ɛliasibu dìlɛ wá Lua ua làasi gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ. Amↄni bui Tobia daɛɛ,
à kpɛ́nɛ zↄ̃ↄ kpà Tobiapiwa. Wì pↄ́wɛnti kálɛu we yãa ń tulaletio ń Lua ua pↄ́ↄ ń pↄ́wɛna kwideo ń vɛ̃ɛo ń nísi pↄ́ dɛ Levii buiↄ ń lɛ̀sinaↄ ń bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anaↄ pↄ́ ũo ń laba pↄ́ wa kɛ̀ sa'onaↄnɛo.
Gↄↄ bee má kú Yelusalɛũo, asa Babɛli kí Aatasasa kpalablea wɛ̃̀ baakwi ń plaode guu ma ɛa gɛ aà kĩ́i. Gↄↄpla gbɛa ma wabikɛ̀wà,
ↄ̃ ma su Yelusalɛũ. Ma yãvãi pↄ́ Ɛliasibu kɛ̀ bao mà, lá à Lua ua kpɛ́nɛ kpà Tobiawa.
Yã́pi kɛ̀mɛɛ ĩ́i maamaaɛ, ↄ̃ ma aà pↄ́ↄ sɛ̀lɛ kↄ̀lɛɛ̀ bàasi.
Ma mɛ̀ wà gbãbↄ kpɛ́nɛpiɛ, ↄ̃ ma ɛa Lua ua pↄ́ↄ kàlɛ we ń pↄ́wɛntio ń tulaletio.
Má mà lↄ wìli Levii buiↄ ń lɛ̀sinaↄ asea kpámáo, ↄ̃ aa ↄbↄ̀lɛ Lua ua zĩu, an baade tà bua.
Ma zↄadↄ̀ gbãadeↄwa ma mɛ̀: Àkɛa a pãkpà Lua uaii? Ɔ̃ ma Levii buiↄ kã̀aa, ma ń baade dà a zĩu.
Ɔ̃ Yudaↄ mↄ̀ ń pↄ́wɛn kwide bↄ̀ ń vɛ̃ɛo ń nísio ḿpii, aa kàka làasiu.
Ma sa'ona Selemia ń lakɛ̃na Zadokio ń Levii bui Pedaiao dìlɛ làasipiↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ũ, ↄ̃ ma Zakuu nɛ́ Anana, Matania tↄũna dìlɛ ń dↄnlɛde ũ, asa wa ń dↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ náaideↄ ũɛ. Làasi pↄ́ↄ biilɛa ń gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ dɛ ń yã́ ũɛ.
Ma Lua, ma yã́pi àↄ dↄngu. Ńsu yãmaa pↄ́ má kɛ̀ n kpɛ́ zĩ yã́ musu suumpao.
Gↄↄbeezĩ ma Yudaeↄ è, aalɛ ↄ̃zↄ̃ vɛ̃ɛwa a ífɛ̃kĩi kã́mabogↄↄzĩ. Ma gbɛ̃eↄ è lↄ, aalɛ su Yelusalɛũ ń pↄ́wɛnao kã́mabogↄↄzĩ. Aa yè zàa'ĩnaↄnɛ ń vɛ̃ɛbɛ'io ń vɛ̃ɛbɛo ń kaadↄɛmbɛo ń aso pãleↄ, ↄ̃ ma ń gba laai blɛyiaa gↄↄpi zĩ́ yã́ musu.
Tiideↄ ku Yelusalɛũ, aaì su ń kpↄo ń laa bui píio, ↄ̃ aaì yía Yudaↄwa kã́mabogↄↄzĩ.
Ma zↄadↄ̀ Yuda gbãadeↄwa ma mɛ̀: Yãvãi pↄ́ álɛ kɛɛ bee sↄ̃ bɛ! Álɛ kã́mabogↄↄ gbãlɛɛ.
Màa á deziↄ lɛ́ kɛ, ↄ̃ wá Lua yãyìa wɛ̃́lɛɛ beewao lò? Ɔ̃ álɛ kã́mabogↄↄ gbãlɛ, álɛ aà pↄ fɛlɛ sↄ̃a?
Má dìlɛ tó gu sì ãsↄ̃adazĩ oosi, wàli Yelusalɛũ bↄlɛ gbaↄ tata, wasuli wɛ̃o e kã́mabogↄↄ gɛ̃. Ma azĩa gbɛ̃́ↄ kàlɛ bↄlɛpiↄu, kɛ́ gbɛ̃e su gɛ̃ ń asoo kã́mabogↄↄo yã́i.
Laatanaↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ pↄ́ yiaↄ ì bĩ́i kpɛ gɛ̃n do ge gɛ̃n pla.
Ɔ̃ ma lɛzàmá ma mɛ̀: Tó a i we sa, má á kṹkũɛ. Za gↄↄ bee ↄ̃ aai mↄ kã́mabogↄↄzĩ lↄo.
Ɔ̃ má ò Levii buiↄnɛ aa gbãbↄ ńzĩaɛ, aai gɛ́ bↄlɛdↄ̃ai, kɛ́ wà kã́mabogↄↄ dↄ̃ Lua pↄ́ ũ yã́i. Ma Lua, to ma yã́pi àↄ dↄngu, ní ma wɛgwa n gbɛ̃kɛ zↄ̃ↄ lɛ́u.
Gↄↄbeezĩ lↄ ma Yudaeↄ è, aa nↄↄ sɛ̀ Asedodadeↄ ń Amↄniↄ ń Mↄabuↄ guu.
Ɔ̃ an nɛ́eↄ ì Asedoda yã́ ge buipãle yã́ ma, aali Ɛbɛlu yãmao.
Ɔ̃ ma zↄadↄ̀má ma ń ká, ma ń gↄ̃ɛeↄ gbɛ̃̀, ma ń gbɛ̃eↄ mikã gà má wò. Ɔ̃ má tò aa mɛ̀ wa sì ń Luao, wa ń nɛnↄɛↄ kpã́sã ń nɛgↄ̃ɛnaↄwao. Wa ń nɛnↄɛↄ sɛ́ ń nɛgↄ̃ɛↄnɛ ge ńzĩa pↄ́ ũo.
Màa Isailiↄ kí Salomↄↄ duunakɛ̀o lò? Buie kía i kaaàwao. Aà Lua yeaàzi, ↄ̃ à aà kpà Isailiↄ píi kía ũ, kási baa aàpi, buipãle nↄɛↄ mɛ́ aa aà dà duunau.
Ɔ̃ wá mà ápiↄ sↄ̃ a yãvãi zↄ̃ↄpi kɛ̀, a zĩbↄnkpɛkɛ̀ wá Luaɛ, a buipãleↄ sɛ̀ nↄ ũ.
Yoiada nɛ́ↄ do pↄ́ dɛ sa'onkia Ɛliasibu tↄũna ũ mɛ́ Oloni gbɛ̃́ Sambala nɛ́ sɛ̀ yãa, ↄ̃ ma aà yà.
Ma Lua, to an yã́ àↄ dↄngu, asa aa sa'onkɛ gbãlɛ̀ɛ, aa n bàa kua ń sa'onaↄ ń Levii buiↄ yãdilɛa gbòo.
Ma buipãleↄ yã́ↄ píi bↄ̀ sa'onaↄ ń Levii buiↄnɛ, ↄ̃ ma ń baade dàzĩu.
Ma ɛa yàa labakɛa gↄↄ dìlɛ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ ń buapↄ́ káauↄ kpaao. Ma Lua, to ma yã́ àↄ dↄngu a maa ũ.
Kí Aasuelu gↄↄ bùsu mɛ̀n basoolo ń soplaoↄ ↄ̃ a dɛ a kía ũ sɛa za India bùsuu e à gɛ̀ pɛ̀ Etiopi bùsuwa.
Zↄ̃lɛa a bɛ Susa mɛɛwiau
aà kpalablea wɛ̃̀ àaↄ̃de guu à gbãadeↄ ń a ìwaↄ kã̀aa píi blɛsableawa. Pɛɛsi ń Mɛdɛo bùsu zĩgↄ̃ badeↄ ku we ń gbɛ̃́ gbiaↄ ń bùsu gbãadeↄ.
À a kpala àizɛɛ zↄ̃ↄↄ ń a zↄ̃ↄkɛ gawio ↄ̀lↄnɛ́ e mↄ soolo.
Kɛ́ gↄↄ beeↄ pà, à blɛsakɛ̀ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú Susaↄnɛ, kíabuiↄ ń táaaↄ píi. Wà blɛsapi blè e gↄↄ sopla aà bɛ'ua líkpɛu.
Wà zwã̀a pua ń zwã̀a búunao dↄ̀dↄ ã́nusu tãanaↄwa ń bà puaↄ ń bà gàaluladeↄ, ↄ̃ wa lòo kpɛ́ gbapɛlɛ pↄ́ wa kɛ̀ ń gbɛpuↄwa. Vua ń ã́nusu wúlɛbↄↄ kálɛa gusalala pↄ́ wa kɛ̀ ń gbɛpuo ń gbɛtɛ̃o ń gbɛsio ń gbɛ̀ búunaowa.
Wà vɛ̃ɛ kpàkpamá we ń vua imibↄↄ. Imibↄpiↄ dodoa kↄ̃ɛ píiɛ. Kí vɛ̃ɛpi kpàmá sↄũsↄũ.
Kí dìlɛ wasu vɛ̃ɛminaↄ wɛtão. A ò a bɛ ziiaɛ aà kpa baadewa lá ade yei.
Kí Aasuelu na Vasiti blɛsakɛ̀ nↄɛↄnɛ kibɛ lↄ.
A gↄↄ soplade zĩ́ kí pↄ kɛ̀na vɛ̃ɛ yã́i, ↄ̃ a ò a dↄai gbɛ̃ↄn soplaↄnɛ: Mɛumanu, Bizita, Aabona, Bigita, Abaga, Zetaa ń Kaakasio,
aa mↄɛ ń a na Vasitio ń a kía na fùao kpaa, kɛ́ à aà kɛfɛnkɛ ↄlↄ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ ń gbãadeↄ, asa nↄɛpiá nↄɛ.
Kɛ́ kí dↄaipiↄ yã́pi ò aà naɛ, à gì mↄ́i, ↄ̃ kí pↄ pà à fɛ̃̀aàzi maamaa.
Kí yã́pi ò wɛzɛ̃n saanyãdↄ̃naↄnɛ, asa ìↄ yã́pii gbɛa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ bùsu ikoyã dↄ̃ↄwaɛ.
Pɛɛsi ń Mɛdɛo gbãade pↄ́ aaìↄ ku aà saɛ gbɛ̃ↄn soplaↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Kaasena, Setaa, Ademata, Taasisi, Mɛlɛsi, Maasena ń Mɛmukão. Ampiↄ mɛ́ aa aà kwàasiↄ ũ, aà kpala ikodeↄ ũ.
A ònɛ́: Ma a dↄaiↄ zĩ̀ aa yãdìlɛ ma na Vasitiɛ, ↄ̃ à gì mai. Wá sɛaànↄ kpelewa ni? Ikoyã mɛ̀ kpelewa ni?
Ɔ̃ Mɛmukã ò kíɛ ń gbãadepiↄ à mɛ̀: Kí, ḿmɛ n na Vasiti tàaekɛ̀nɛ ndoo, à tàaekɛ̀ gbãadeↄnɛ ń n bùsu gbɛ̃́piiↄɛ.
Yã́ pↄ́ n napi kɛ̀ a ligua, nↄɛ píi i ma, aai saka ń zã́ↄgu aa mɛ: Kí Aasuelu mɛ̀ wà a na Vasiti sísiɛ, ↄ̃ à gì gɛ́i.
Pɛɛsi ń Mɛdɛo bùsu gbãadeↄ nↄ pↄ́ n na yã́pi màↄ, aa yãbↄbↄ ń zã́ↄ lɛ́zĩ tia. Lɛ́'ɛakↄ̃wa ń zↄao a kɛ zài.
Kí, tó à kànguɛ, yãdilɛ Vasitiɛ asu tó á wɛsikↄ̃lɛ lↄo, ní nↄɛ pↄ́ dɛaàla kpa aà kpalau. Wa yã́pi kɛ̃ Pɛɛsi ń Mɛdɛo ikoyã pↄ́ wìli a bãdɛo lá guu.
Tó wà yã́ pↄ́ ń dìlɛ kpàwakɛ̀ n bùsu zↄ̃ↄ guu píi, nↄɛↄ bɛɛɛ dↄ̃ ń zã́ↄnɛ, nↄgbãaↄ ń nↄ nɛ́naↄ píi.
Yã́pi kà kíagu ń gbãadeↄ píi, ↄ̃ a kɛ̀ lá Mɛmukã òɛwa.
Ɔ̃ à lɛ́kpãsãkɛ̀ bùsu pↄ́ a dɛ ń kía ũ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ píi, bùsu ń bùsuo ń a lákɛ̃ao, bui ń buio ń ń yã́o. À mɛ̀ gↄ̃ɛ mɛ́ aↄ a ua kía ũ mɛ́ aà buiyã ↄ̃ wàli o uapiu.
Yã́ beeↄ gbɛa kɛ́ kí Aasuelu pↄ wèe, yã́ pↄ́ Vasiti kɛ̀ɛ̀ ń yã́ pↄ́ a dìlɛ aà yã́ musuo i sãaàguo.
Ɔ̃ kí ìwaↄ òɛ̀: Kí, to wà wɛ̃́ndia kɛfɛnaↄ wɛɛlɛnɛ.
Gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ dilɛ n bùsuↄ guu píi aa wɛ̃́ndia kɛfɛnaↄ naaa mↄ ka n nↄɛↄ guu Susa la. N nↄɛↄ ziia Ege i ń gwa ń n naↄ, wi ń kɛkɛ ń nↄamblebↄↄ wásawasa.
Nↄɛ pↄ́ kàngu i gↄ̃ n na ũ Vasiti gɛ̃ɛ ũ. Yã́pi kɛ̀ kíɛ na, ↄ̃ à zɛ̀ò.
Yudae ku Susa Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ bui ũ, aà tↄ́n Maadose, Yaii nɛ́ɛ. Simɛi ń Kisio ku aà deziↄ guu.
A ku zĩ̀zↄ pↄ́ Babɛli kí Nɛbukanɛza ń kũkũ Yelusalɛũ ń Yudaↄ kí Yɛkↄniao à tàńnↄↄ guuɛ.
Àlɛ a desɛ̃ nɛ́ Adasa pↄ́ wì mɛ lↄ Ɛsitɛɛ gwa, asa aà de ń aà dao kuo. Wɛ̃́ndiapi kákaa maa mɛ́ a kɛfɛũ. Kɛ́ aà de ń aà dao gà, Maadose aà sɛ̀ a nɛ́ ũ.
Kɛ́ wà yã́ pↄ́ kí dìlɛpi mà, ↄ̃ wà gɛ̀ ń wɛ̃́ndiaↄ dasidasi Susa, wà ń ná Egeɛ a ↄzĩ. Ɔ̃ wà Ɛsitɛɛ sɛ̀ gɛ̀ò kibɛ kí nↄɛↄ ziiapiɛ.
Wɛ̃́ndiapi kɛ̀ɛ̀ maa, ↄ̃ à gbɛ̃kɛkɛ̀ɛ̀ à mɛ̀, wà aà kɛkɛ ń nↄamblebↄↄ wásawasa gↄ̃̀ↄ, wi blɛ maa kpawà. À kibɛ wɛ̃́ndia pↄ́ a sɛ̀ gbɛ̃ↄn soplaↄ kpàwà, ↄ̃ à kpɛ́ maa kpàwà kí nↄɛↄ bɛ.
Ɛsitɛɛ i a bui ge a bɛ bùsu o gbɛ̃eɛo, asa Maadose òɛ̀ asu to gbɛ̃e dↄ̃o.
Lá gu lɛ́ dↄ Maadose ìↄ kí nↄɛↄ bɛ gãaɛ baa vĩvĩ, kɛ́ à e àↄ Ɛsitɛɛ kua dↄ̃ ń yã́ pↄ́ lɛ́ aà leo.
E wɛ̃́ndiaↄ aaↄ zɛ'e aaↄ gɛ́ ii ń kí Aasueluo, sema aa yã́ pↄ́ wa dìlɛnɛ́ kɛ gĩa e mↄ kuɛpla. Wìↄ nísi pↄ́ wa kɛ̀ ń lí'ↄ gĩ nao dↄↄmá e mↄ soolo, ↄ̃ wìↄ ń kɛkɛ ń tulaleↄ ń nↄɛ mɛkɛkɛbↄↄ e mↄ soolo.
Wɛ̃́ndia pↄ́ kí mɛ̀ ia kàwà, nↄɛↄ bɛpↄ pↄ́ a gbɛ̀a píi wì kpawà aà gɛòɛ.
Ì gɛ́ oosi, ì su nↄɛↄ bɛ kↄↄ ziia pↄ́ wì mɛ Saasagaza fã́ani. Aàpi mɛ́ ì ↄlia kí nↄ pↄ́ i mɛ́sɛdilɛnɛ́opiↄzi. Ìli e ɛ̀a gɛ̀ kí kĩ́i lↄo, sema aà yã́ kà kípigu à aà gbɛ̀a aà tↄ́wa bàasio.
Kɛ́ ia kà Abihaili nɛ́ Ɛsitɛɛ pↄ́ aà desɛ̃ Maadose aà sɛ̀ a nɛ́ ũpiwa, i pↄe gbɛao, sema pↄ́ pↄ́ kí nↄɛↄ ziia Ege òɛ̀ bàasio. Ɛsitɛɛ yã́ kà gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wɛsìaàlɛↄgu píi.
Kí kpalablea wɛ̃̀ soplade guu wà gɛ̀aànↄ aà bɛ mↄ kwide Tebe guu.
Kí ye Ɛsitɛɛzi dɛ a nↄ kĩniↄla píi. Aà yã́ kàaàgu, à kɛ̀ɛ̀ na dɛ wɛ̃́ndia kĩniↄla píi, ↄ̃ à kía na fùa kpàɛ̀, à aà dìlɛ a na Vasiti gɛ̃ɛ ũ.
Ɔ̃ kípi blɛsakɛ̀, à gbãadeↄ ń a ìwaↄ kã̀aa Ɛsitɛɛ sɛa yã́ musu. A dìlɛ wà dikpɛ zↄ̃ↄ kɛ, ↄ̃ wà a kpàwakɛ̀ bùsu ń bùsuo, ↄ̃ à gbadà gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ sↄũsↄũ.
Wɛ̃́ndiaↄ kãaaa gɛ̃n plaade, Maadose zↄ̃lɛa kibɛ bↄlɛu.
Ɛsitɛɛ i a bɛ bùsu ge a buiyã'ò gbɛ̃e mào lá Maadose òɛ̀wa. Ìↄ Maadose yãmaɛ, lá ìↄ ma za gↄↄ pↄ́ àlɛ aà gwawa.
Kɛ́ Maadose zↄ̃lɛa kibɛ bↄlɛu màa, kí Aasuelu dↄai bↄlɛdↄ̃ana gbɛ̃ↄn plaↄ pↄ pà kízi, ↄ̃ aa lɛkpàaĩaàzi. An tↄ́n kɛ: Bigana ń Tɛlɛsio.
Kɛ́ Maadose yã́pi feena mà, a ò kía na Ɛsitɛɛɛ, ↄ̃ Ɛsitɛɛ ò kíɛ ń Maadose tↄ́o.
Kɛ́ wà yã́pi gwàgwa, wa è sĩanaɛ, ↄ̃ wà gbɛ̃ↄn plapiↄ lòo líwa aa gà. Wà yã́pi kɛ̃̀ bùsu ladau kí wáa.
Yã́ beeↄ gbɛa kí Aasuelu Amɛdata nɛ́ Amani, Agaga bui kpɛlà, à aà gbà gbãa, à zↄ̃lɛkĩi pↄ́ dɛ gbãade pↄ́ kuaànↄↄ pↄ́a píi kpàwà.
Kí ìwa pↄ́ kú aà bɛ bↄlɛuↄ ì wúlɛ ń gbɛɛu ge aa misiilɛ Amaniɛ, lá kí dìlɛwa, kási Maadose lí wúlɛ a gbɛɛu à misiilɛɛ̀o.
Ɔ̃ kí ìwapiↄ Maadose là aa mɛ̀: Àkɛa ńlɛ kí yãmao ni?
Lá gu lɛ́ dↄ aaìↄ oɛ̀ màa, kási ìli ń yãmao, à mɛ̀ Yudan a ũ. Ɔ̃ aa ò Amaniɛ kɛ́ aa e dↄ̃ tó a Maadose yãkɛapi fↄ̃́.
Kɛ́ Amani è Maadose lí wúlɛ a gbɛɛu à misiilɛɛo, ↄ̃ aà pↄ pà.
Kɛ́ wà Maadose bui òɛ̀, aà dɛa ado kɛ̀ɛ̀ fɛ̃́nɛũ, ↄ̃ àlɛ zɛwɛɛlɛ à Maadose bui Yuda pↄ́ kú Aasuelu bùsuↄ guuↄ míↄnzↄ̃ píi.
Kí Aasuelu kpalablea wɛ̃̀ kuɛplade guu a mↄ sɛ̃́ia pↄ́ wì mɛ Nisãnu guu, Amani gbɛ pↄ́ wì mɛ puliũ là, kɛ́ à e mↄ pↄ́ á yã́pi kɛwà dↄ̃ ń a gↄↄo. Ɔ̃ mↄ kuɛpla Adaa bↄ̀ àsi guu.
Ɔ̃ Amani ò kí Aasueluɛ: Buie ku, a gbɛ̃́ↄ fã̀aa buipãleↄ guu n bùsu dasiↄu píi. An fɛlɛkaayãↄ dodo ń buipãleↄɛ píi, aali n ikoyã dao. I kũ ǹ ń tó tɛɛɛo.
Kí, tó à kɛ̀nɛ naɛ, yãdilɛ wà ń midɛ, mí ã́nusu tↄnu ↄ̀aa pla kpá yã́pikɛnaↄwa aa ka n làasiu.
Kí a tãana seela kɛbↄ bↄ̀ a kpà Amɛdata nɛ́ Amani, Agaga bui Yudaↄ wɛ̀lɛpiwa
à mɛ̀: Kɛ buipiɛ lá à kɛ̀nɛ maawa, níↄ ã́nusupi kũa n pↄ́ ũ.
Mↄ sɛ̃́ia gↄↄ kuɛ'aaↄ̃de zĩ́ Amani kí lakɛ̃naↄ sìsi. Aa yã́ pↄ́ Amani dìlɛ kí ìwaↄ ń kía pↄ́ kú bùsu ń bùsuoↄ ń bui ń buio gbãadeↄnɛ dàlau. Aa kɛ̃̀ bui ń buioɛ ń baade buiyão, bùsu ń bùsuo ń a lákɛ̃ao. Aa kɛ̃̀ ń kí Aasuelu tↄ́o, ↄ̃ aa aà seela kɛ̀ láwa ń aà tãanao.
Aa lápiↄ nà zĩnaↄnɛ ń ↄzĩ, aa ń gbáɛ kí bùsu dasiↄ guu. Lápi guu wà mɛ̀ wà Yudaↄ dɛdɛ wà ń midɛ wà ń buibↄ, nɛ́fɛ̃nɛn gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ, gↄ̃ɛↄ ń nↄɛↄ gↄↄ doũ zĩ́, mↄ kuɛplade pↄ́ wì mɛ Adaa gↄↄ kuɛ'aaↄ̃de zĩ́, wi ń pↄ́ↄ naaa.
Wa yã́ pↄ́ a dìlɛpi lá kpã́sã bùsu ń bùsuo píi, kɛ́ àↄ dɛ ikoyã ũ, wi a kpàwakɛ bui píiɛ, kɛ́ aaↄ ku sↄu guu gↄↄpizĩ.
Zĩnaↄ wã̀ gɛ̀ màa yã́ pↄ́ kí dìlɛpi yã́i, ↄ̃ wà a kpàwakɛ̀ Susa mɛɛwiau. Kí ń Amanio zↄ̃̀lɛ lɛ́ imi. Susadeↄ sↄ̃ aa bílikɛ̀ yã́piwa.
Kɛ́ Maadose yã́ pↄ́ wa kɛ̀pi mà, à a pↄkasaↄ ga kɛ̃̀, ↄ̃ à zwã̀nkasaↄ dà à túfu gbɛ̃̀ a miwa, ↄ̃ a bɛ wɛ̃́lɛ guu, àlɛ wɛ̃na'ↄ gbãa dↄ.
À gɛ̀ e za kibɛ gãaɛ, asa gbɛ̃e a fↄ̃ gɛ̃ kibɛ bↄlɛu ń zwã̀nkasaↄ daao.
Wà yã́ pↄ́ kí dìlɛ iko ũpi kpàwakɛ̀ bùsu ń bùsuo píi, ↄ̃ Yudaↄ nà ↄↄlↄwa maamaa gupiiu ń lɛyeo. An wɛ́'i lɛ́ kwɛ́, aalɛ búbuapɛ. An gbɛ̃́ daside zwã̀nkasaↄ daa, aa túfu gbɛ̃̀ ń miwa.
Kɛ́ Ɛsitɛɛ ìwaↄ, nↄɛ ń gↄ̃ɛo píi, mↄ òɛ̀, à pelembò. À pↄkasaↄ kpã̀sã Maadoseɛ aà da zwã̀nkasaↄ gbɛu, kási i we sìo.
Ataki mɛ́ dↄai pↄ́ kí dìlɛ aàↄ ku aà saɛ ũ. Ɛsitɛɛ aà sìsi à aà zĩ̀ Maadosewa, aà gɛ́ aà laiɛ: Bↄ́ yã́ mɛ́ mↄ̀? Bↄ́yãi àlɛ kɛi màai?
Ataki bↄ̀ kibɛ gãaɛ à Maadose lè.
Maadose yã́ pↄ́ a le sìuɛ̀ píi, ↄ̃ à ã́nusu pↄ́ Amani mɛ̀ á ká kí làasiu Yudaↄ dɛdɛa yã́i lɛ́ òɛ̀ kyáukyau.
À yã́ pↄ́ wa dìlɛ Yudaↄ dɛdɛa yã́ musu wà a kpàwakɛ̀ Susa taala kpàwà lↄ, aà ↄlↄ Ɛsitɛɛɛ, i a bↄↄlɛkɛɛ̀. À mɛ̀ aà o Ɛsitɛɛɛ aà gɛ́ kí kĩ́i, aà awakpaɛ̀, i wabikɛwà a gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ.
Ataki tà à yã́ pↄ́ Maadose ò dàu a sìuɛ̀.
Ɔ̃ Ɛsitɛɛ òɛ̀ aà gɛ o Maadoseɛ.
Kí ìwaↄ ń a bùsu gbɛ̃́ↄ dↄ̃ píi, tó gↄ̃ɛ ge nↄɛ sↄ̃̀ kízi aà kpɛ́u, mɛ́ i aà sísio, ikoyã kú mɛ̀ndoɛ. Wì ade dɛɛ, mɛ́ i kɛ kí a vua gopana dↄ̀ɛ̀ kɛ́ à e àↄ ku bàasio. Mapi sↄ̃, à kà gↄↄ baakwi wi ma sísi mà gɛ́ kí kĩ́io.
Kɛ́ à gɛ̀ Ɛsitɛɛ yã́pi dàu a sìu Maadoseɛ,
ↄ̃ Maadose ɛ̀a lɛ́kpãsãkɛ̀ɛ̀ à mɛ̀: Ńsu ǹyↄ̃ e ḿmɛ ńyↄ̃ bↄ ndo Yudaↄ guu n kua kibɛ yã́io.
Tó ń nílɛ yã́ bee taa gↄↄzĩ, suabana a bↄ guei à Yudaↄ misi, aai bↄ. Mpi ń n de bɛdeↄ sↄ̃, á gaga. Tó gↄↄɛ bee taa yã́i n gↄ̃i kía na ũ, démɛ dↄ̃i?
Ɔ̃ Ɛsitɛɛ lɛ́kpãsãkɛ̀ Maadoseɛ à mɛ̀:
Gɛ ǹ Yuda pↄ́ kú Susaↄ kãaa píi, í lɛye ma yã́ musu. Ásu pↄbleo, ásu imio gↄↄ àaↄ̃ fãanɛ ń gwãasĩnao. Mapi ń ma ìwaↄ wá lɛye màa sↄ̃. Bee gbɛa mí gɛ́ kí kĩ́i, baa tó má gɛa zɛvĩo. Tó má su gaɛ, ma gan we.
Ɔ̃ Maadose tà à yã́ pↄ́ Ɛsitɛɛ òɛ kɛ̀ píi.
A gↄↄ àaↄ̃de zĩ́ Ɛsitɛɛ a kíanakɛ zwãaↄ yè, ↄ̃ à gɛ̀ zɛ̀ kípi bɛ'ua, kpɛ́ pↄ́ a kuu kpɛɛlɛ. Kí zↄ̃lɛa a gĩ́naa kpɛ́u we, aà aɛ dↄa kpɛɛlɛwa.
Kɛ́ à a na Ɛsitɛɛ è zɛa kpɛɛlɛ, à aà wɛgwà, ↄ̃ à a vua gopana pↄ́ á kũa dↄ̀ɛ̀. Ɛsitɛɛ sↄ̃̀aàzi à ↄkã̀ aà gopanapi lɛ́wa.
Kí aà là à mɛ̀: Ɛsitɛɛ, bↄ́ ń yeii? Bↄ́ ńlɛ gbɛaai? Baa ma kpala guo má n gba.
A wèwà à mɛ̀: Kí, tó à kɛ̀nɛ maa, Amani sísi blɛ pↄ́ málɛ kɛnɛ gbãwa.
Ɔ̃ kí mɛ̀ wà mↄ́ ń Amanio gↄ̃̀ↄ, kɛ́ aa gɛ yã́ pↄ́ Ɛsitɛɛ gbɛ̀a kɛ. Ɔ̃ kí ń Amanio gɛ̀ blɛ pↄ́ Ɛsitɛɛ lɛ́ kɛnɛ́pi blei.
Kɛ́ aalɛ vɛ̃ɛmi, kí Ɛsitɛɛ là à mɛ̀: Bↄ́ ńlɛ a wabikɛai? Má kɛnɛ. Yã́ kpele ńlɛ gbɛaai? Baa ma kpala guo má n gba.
Ɛsitɛɛ wèwà à mɛ̀: Yã́ pↄ́ málɛ a wabikɛman kɛ:
Kí, tó n ma wɛgwàɛ, tó à kàngu ǹ yã́ pↄ́ málɛ a wabikɛma kɛmɛɛɛ, à mↄ blɛ pↄ́ má kɛɛ́ zia blei, mí yã́ pↄ́ n ma lai onɛ.
Kɛ́ Amani bↄ̀ gↄↄ bee, aà pↄ kɛ̀na, àlɛ yáalↄ. Kási kɛ́ à Maadose è kibɛ bↄlɛu, i fɛlɛɛo, a aà vĩa vĩo, ↄ̃ aà pↄ fɛ̃̀aàzi.
A azĩa kũa à tà bɛ. Kɛ́ à a gbɛ̃naↄ sìsi ń a na Zɛlɛsio,
ↄ̃ àlɛ ĩ́anadã a àizɛɛ sà zↄ̃ↄ ń a nɛgↄ̃ɛ dasiↄ yã́ musu. À mɛ̀ kí a kpɛlà, à a gba gbãa dɛ a ìwaↄ ń gbãadeↄla píi.
À mɛ̀ lↄ: Kía na Ɛsitɛɛ ma sisi, à blɛkɛ̀mɛɛ ń kío sãnu, gbɛ̃pãle kuo. À ɛ̀a ma sisi mà ble ń kío zia lↄ.
Ń beeo tó ma Yuda bui Maadose è zↄ̃lɛa kibɛ bↄlɛu, yã́ beeↄ píi lí kɛmɛɛ pↄe ũo.
Ɔ̃ aà na Zɛlɛsi ń aà gbɛ̃naↄ òɛ̀: To gbɛ̃́ↄ lípɛlɛnɛ a lɛsĩ kà gã̀sĩsuu blakwi, ní wabikɛ kíwa zia kↄↄ aà n gba zɛ ǹ Maadose loowà, ní gbasa gɛ́ ń kío blɛpi blei ń pↄnao. Yã́pi kà Amanigu maamaa, ↄ̃ à lípi pɛ̀lɛ.
Gwãasĩna bee kí i fↄ̃ i'òo. Ɔ̃ à mɛ̀ wà mↄ́ ń a bùsu ladao. Wà a kyokɛ̀ɛ̀,
ↄ̃ wà Maadose yã́ è we, lá kí dↄai bↄlɛdↄ̃ana gbɛ̃ↄn plaↄ Bigana ń Tɛlɛsio lɛkpàaĩaàzi, ↄ̃ Maadose bↄ̀ò.
Kí a ìwaↄ là à mɛ̀: Wà Maadose kpɛlà wà aà gbà gbãa yã́pi yã́i kpeletaawa ni? Aa wèwà aa mɛ̀: Wi yãe kɛɛ̀o.
Ɔ̃ kí mɛ̀: Démɛ kú ua wei? À mↄ lè Amani gɛ̃̀ kibɛ ua gↄ̃̀ↄ Maadose looa lí pↄ́ á pɛ̀lɛɛpiwa yã'oiɛ̀.
Ɔ̃ kí ìwaↄ wèwà aa mɛ̀: Amani mɛ́ kú ua we. Ɔ̃ kí mɛ̀ aà mↄ gɛ̃.
Kɛ́ à gɛ̃̀, kí aà là à mɛ̀: Bↄ́ wa kɛ gↄ̃ɛ pↄ́ má ye aà kpɛlaɛi? Amani làasookɛ̀ à mɛ̀: Dé kí ye aà kpɛla, mɛ́ i kɛ ma bàasio ni?
Ɔ̃ a wèwà à mɛ̀: Tó ń ye ǹ gbɛ̃́ kpɛlaɛ,
wa kía gomusu pↄ́ ń dà yãa sɛ mↄò ń n sↄ̃́ pↄ́ kíafua kpaao.
Gomusupi ń sↄ̃́pio kpa n gbãade bɛɛɛdeↄ dowa, i gomusupi da gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ń ye ǹ aà kpɛlaɛ, i aà di sↄ̃́pi kpɛ, iↄ bɛ aà aɛ wɛ̃́lɛ zɛaↄ guu, iↄ pũna àↄ mɛ: Màa kí ì kɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ á ye à aà kpɛlaɛ.
Ɔ̃ kí òɛ̀: Gɛ ǹ gomusupi sɛ gↄ̃̀ↄ ń sↄ̃́o lá ń òwa, ní yã́pi kɛ Yuda bui Maadose pↄ́ ìↄ zↄ̃lɛ ma bɛ bↄlɛuɛ. Ńsu yã́ pↄ́ n mɛ̀ wà kɛɛ̀pi kee too.
Amani gɛ̀ gomusupi sɛ̀ ń sↄ̃́pio à sùò. Ɔ̃ à gomusupi dà Maadoseɛ, à aà dì sↄ̃́pi kpɛ, a bɛ aà aɛ wɛ̃́lɛ zɛaↄ guu, àlɛ pũna àlɛ mɛ: Màa kí ì kɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ á ye à aà kpɛlaɛ.
Kɛ́ aa sù, Maadose gɛ̀ zↄ̃̀lɛ kibɛ bↄlɛu, ↄ̃ Amani ↄkù a wɛ́wa, àlɛ tá a bɛ ń ↄↄlↄo.
À yã́ pↄ́ a le dàu a sìu a na Zɛlɛsiɛ ń a gbɛ̃naↄ píi. Ɔ̃ aà lɛdamadepiↄ ń Zɛlɛsio òɛ̀: Lá Maadose pↄ́ ńlɛ gↄ̃ kpɛɛ aà yã́ musupiá Yuda buiɛ, ńyↄ̃ aà fↄ̃ lↄo, ńyↄ̃ↄ kɛ̃́sãaàzi ǹyↄ̃ gɛɛ.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ aalɛ yã́pi oɛ̀, kí dↄaiↄ kà, ↄ̃ aa aà sɛ̀ ń wãao, aa gɛ̀aànↄ blɛ pↄ́ Ɛsitɛɛ kɛ̀ blei.
Ɔ̃ kí ń Amanio gɛ̀ pↄblei ń Ɛsitɛɛo.
Kɛ́ aalɛ vɛ̃ɛmi a gↄↄ plaadepi zĩ́, ↄ̃ kí Ɛsitɛɛ là à mɛ̀: Ɛsitɛɛ, bↄ́ ńlɛ a wabikɛai? Má kɛnɛ. Yã́ kpele ńlɛ gbɛaai? Baa ma kpala guo má n gba.
A wèwà à mɛ̀: Tó n ma wɛgwà, mɛ́ yã́pi kànguɛ, to màↄ ku wɛ̃ni guu. Wabi pↄ́ má kɛ̀man we. To ma gbɛ̃́ↄ aaↄ wɛ̃ni vĩ. Yã́ pↄ́ má gbɛ̀an we.
Asa mapi ń ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, wa dìlɛ wà wá dɛdɛ wà wá midɛ wà wá buibↄɛ. Tó wàlɛ wá yia zↄↄ ũ yãaɛ, dↄ̃ má nílɛ. Taasi bee taa i ka mà ĩadamao.
Ɔ̃ kí aà là à mɛ̀: Dé ni? Démɛ a fↄ̃ yã́ bee taa kɛa làasoo da a sↄ̃ui?
A wèwà à mɛ̀: Amani bɛ̃̀ɛɛ bee mɛ́ ibɛɛ pↄ́ zawágupi ũ. Sↄ̃ kɛ̃̀ Amanigu kí ń a napio yã́ musu.
Kí fɛ̀lɛ a vɛ̃ɛa ń pↄkũmao, à gɛ̀ líkpɛu a ua. Amani gↄ̃̀ we ń Ɛsitɛɛo, ↄ̃ Amani lɛ́ kulɛkɛɛ̀ a wɛ̃ni yã́ musu, asa a è kí zɛ̀ò à vãikɛɛɛ.
Amanipi kùlɛ Ɛsitɛɛ gbázĩ wúlɛbↄ pↄ́ a zↄ̃lɛwà saɛ. Wegↄ̃ↄ kí bↄ̀ líkpɛu à sù pↄblekĩi, ↄ̃ à mɛ̀: A ye kusi ma nawa ma wáa kpɛ́u la yã̀? Kɛ́ yã́pi bↄ̀ kí lɛ́u gↄ̃̀ↄ, wà mↄ̀ pↄ́ yè Amani oawa.
Kí dↄaiↄ do Aabona òɛ̀: Lí pɛ́lɛa Amanipi bɛ saɛ à kà gã̀sĩsuu blakwi. Aàpi lípi pɛ̀lɛ kɛ́ à e Maadose pↄ́ yãmaakɛ̀nɛ loowàɛ. Ɔ̃ kí mɛ̀: À aàpi loowà.
Kɛ́ aa Amani lòo lí pↄ́ a pɛ̀lɛ Maadoseɛpiwa, kí pↄ wèe.
Gↄↄbeezĩ kí Aasuelu Yudaↄ wɛ̀lɛ Amani bɛ kpà a na Ɛsitɛɛwa. Ɛsitɛɛ ò kíɛ Maadose mɛ́ a daɛ ũ, ↄ̃ Maadose sↄ̃̀ kízi.
Kí a tãana pↄ́ à ɛ̀a sì Amaniwa bↄ̀ à dà Maadoseɛ, ↄ̃ Ɛsitɛɛ Amani bɛ nàɛ̀ aà ↄzĩ.
