Lua, kɛ́ n dↄaa n gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ, kɛ́ n bɛɛlɛńnↄ guwaiwaiu,
tↄↄlɛ lùalua, lou kwɛ̀ n aɛ, n Lua pↄ́ n yã'ò Sinai gbɛ musu, Lua, Isailiↄ Lua.
Lua, n ɛ̀fãai pìsinɛ́ kↄ̃sↄ̃kↄ̃sↄ̃, ↄ̃ n ń bùsu kpɛɛna gbà gbãa.
N gbɛ̃́ↄ zↄ̃̀lɛ a guu Lua, n wɛ̃nadeↄ gbà pↄ́ n maakɛa yã́i.
Dii yã'ò, ↄ̃ bíla gↄ̃̀ aà baokpanaↄ ũ.
Kíaↄ ń ń zĩgↄ̃ↄ lɛ́ tílɛ kpakpa, gↄ̃ɛ pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ bòouↄ lɛ́ ń pↄ́ↄ kpaalɛ.
Baa kɛ́ a i sã kaaↄ sↄ̀ↄu, ã́nusu kú ma felena gã̀sĩaa, a kã́ↄ lɛ́ tɛkɛ lán vuawa.
Kɛ́ Gbãapiide kíaↄ fã̀aa, aa lì tↄↄlɛa lán Zalamↄ gbɛ̀ nɛɛziwa.
Basana gbɛ̀sĩsĩ dɛ a kĩniↄla, Basana gbɛ̀sĩsĩ misonaↄ dasi.
Á gbɛ̀ misonaↄ, bↄ́yãi álɛ wɛbii gbɛ pↄ́ Lua sɛ̀ a kiblekĩi ũwai? Dii mɛ́ aↄ ku we gↄↄpii.
Dii sↄ̃́goↄ lɛ́ vĩo, à kà miliↄ̃ do. Dii bↄ̀ò za Sinai, à mↄ̀ pìla a gu pↄ́ a kua adoau.
N dɛdɛ musu ń zĩ̀zↄↄ, n gba sì gbɛ̃́ↄwa falu ũ, baa swã́gbãadeↄ, ↄ̃ n zↄ̃lɛ we, Dii Lua.
Wà Dii sáaukpa, Lua wá Suabana, ìↄ wá aso kũawɛ̃ɛ lá gu lɛ́ dↄɛ.
Wá Luaá Lua pↄ́ ì gbɛ̃́ suabaɛ, Dii Lua mɛ́ ì wá bↄ ga lɛ́zĩ.
Lua a a ibɛɛↄ mi wíwinɛ́, gbɛ̃nazĩn mikã dↄ̀ɛ pↄ́ aa tɛ́ ń duunawaↄ.
Dii mɛ̀: Má á bↄlɛ Basana bùsuu, má á bↄlɛ ísia títiu,
kɛ́ à á gbáↄ pípi ń á ibɛɛↄ auo, á gbɛ̃ↄ lɛ́naↄ i ń baa ewà.
Lua, wa n gbɛ̃́ↄ è aa dↄ̀dↄkↄ̃wa, ma Lua ma Kía, aalɛ mↄ́ n kúkĩi.
Lɛ̀sinaↄ dↄaaa, pↄlɛnaↄ tɛ zã́, wɛ̃́ndia sɛ̃́sɛ̃mpanaↄ ku guo.
À Lua tↄbↄ balu guu, à Dii kpɛla Isailiↄ kↄ̃kãaau.
Nɛ́ gↄ̃zãna Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ buiↄ mɛ́ dↄaaa, bee gbɛa Yuda kíaↄ ń ń gbɛ̃́ↄ ń Zabulↄni bui kíaↄ ń Nɛfatali bui kíaↄ.
Á Lua dìlɛɛ́ àↄ gbãa. Lua, bↄ ń n gbãa pↄ́ ń ↄ̀lↄwɛ̃ɛo.
Kíaↄ mↄnɛ ń ń gbaↄ n kpɛ́ pↄ́ kú Yelusalɛũ yã́i.
Zↄa dↄ ílɛnↄbↄ Egipiwa, zↄadↄ buiↄ swanaↄ ń ń gbɛ̃́ↄwa. Ãnusu gopana tↄ̃́má, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ zĩkaa ì kɛnɛ́ naↄ fãaa.
Egipiↄ gbɛ̃́ↄ zĩma, Etiopiↄ wã aa ↄdↄnzi, Lua.
Dṹnia kpalablenaↄ, à lɛsi Luaɛ, à Dii táasilɛ.
A di lounaa kpɛ musumusu za zizi, à ma, àlɛ pũna gbã́ugbãu.
À Lua gbãa galikɛ, wa aà zↄ̃ↄkɛ dↄ̃ Isailiↄwa, aà gbãa ku luabɛpuanau.
Lua, kua n kúkĩi ń zↄ̃ↄ, Isailiↄ Lua ì gbãa ń ikoo kpa a gbɛ̃́ↄwa. Wà Lua sáaukpa!
Davidi lɛ.
Lua, ma suaba, asa í ma kũ ma nↄɛɛ.
Dɛɛ lɛ́ ma mↄ́, ma ka zã̀, tepɛkĩi kuo. Ma kpalɛ ísiu, ísↄ̃ lɛ́ damala.
Ma wiilɛ̀ ma kpasa, ma kòlo nàaa, ma wɛdↄ̀ ma Luazi e ma wɛ́ gɛ̀ lɛ́ wo.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa zamagu pãↄ dasi dɛ ma mikãa, ma ibɛɛ pↄ́ aa ye ma dɛ pↄewiwinɛ́saiↄ lɛ́ vĩo. Pↄ́ pↄ́ mi a kpã́i'oo ↄ̃ aa mɛ̀ mà a nɛ'i mà kpá.
Lua, ń ma mìsaiyãↄ dↄ̃, ma tàaeↄ ulɛanɛo.
Dii Lua Zĩgↄ̃de, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ an wɛ́ dↄnziↄ ńsu to wí ń kṹ ma yã́io. Isailiↄ Lua, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaì n kĩ́i wɛɛlɛↄ ńsu to an tↄ́ ↄ̃̀ↄkpa ma yã́io.
Asa n yã́i mi sↄ̃́sↄ̃a fↄ̃i, ↄ̃ ma gɛɛ gↄ̃̀ kpa ma wɛ́i.
Ma gↄ̃ zĩ̀lo ũ ma gbɛ̃́ↄ guu, ma gↄ̃ gbɛ̃ando ũ ma da bɛdeↄ guu.
N kpɛ́ yã́ ma kũ gbãa, àlɛ ma ibaba, n sↄ̃̀sↄ̃naↄ n sↄ̃́sↄ̃a gↄ̃̀mɛɛ.
Mi lɛye pↄsia guu, ↄ̃ wìↄ ma sↄ̃sↄ̃.
Mi zwã̀nkasaↄ fĩfĩa, ↄ̃ wìↄ ma kɛ pↄ́ↄpↄↄ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ zↄ̃lɛ gãaɛↄ ì ma pe, ígbãaminaↄ ì lɛdamanↄ.
Dii, málɛ wabikɛma, ńsu to à bↄ n pↄ kpɛo, wea Lua, n gbɛ̃kɛ zↄ̃ↄ yã́i, ní ma suaba sĩana.
Ma bↄ bɛ̀lɛu, ńsu to mà kpálɛuo. Ma bↄ ísiu, ma si ma zangudeↄwa.
Ńsu to ísↄ̃ damalao, ńsu to mà kpálɛ ísiuo, ńsu to wà tɛ̃́ɛna kamalao.
Wea Dii, asa n gbɛ̃kɛ maa, ma wɛgwa n sùuu zↄ̃ↄ guu.
Ńsu mikpɛli n zↄ̀blenaɛo, wea kpakpa, asa ma gↄ̃ yeelɛaɛ.
Sↄ̃mazi, ma misi, ma suaba ma ibɛɛↄ yã́i.
Ń ma sↄ̃́sↄ̃a ń widaaao ń ma kpɛbↄao dↄ̃, ńlɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa yã́kũamanↄↄ e.
Sↄ̃́sↄ̃a ma sↄ̃ zↄ̃̀, ma gↄ̃ yɛ̃̀ɛɛsai, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a ma wɛgwa ↄ̃ má wɛ̀ɛlɛ, mi eo, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a ma nↄ̀sɛ nínimɛɛ ↄ̃ ma wɛdↄ̀i, a kuo.
Aa ɛsɛ vãi kàmɛɛ blɛu, kɛ́ imi ma kũ gbãa, aa vɛ̃ɛ kũ̀ma kpàa.
To an dikpɛkɛa gↄ̃nɛ́ bai ũ, wà ń kṹ, to an kua aafia yã'inɛ́.
To an wɛ́ siakũ, kɛ́ aasu gu'eo, to an wó gↄ̃ koolonnↄ gↄↄpii.
Ǹ n kpɛ̃nɛmuu bↄbↄmá, ǹ n pↄkũma pãsĩ pisimá.
An bòo gↄ̃ bòo zia ũ, an gbɛ̃e su àↄ ku kɛ́ à zↄ̃lɛ ń kpɛ́u lↄo,
asa aaì ĩada gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ń gbɛ̃̀waɛ, aaì gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ń zↄ̃̀ wãwã galikɛ.
Ǹ ń yã́ píi tàaeↄ dańla, an baa su àↄ ku n gbɛ̃suabaa guuo.
Ǹ ń tↄ́ waa wɛ̃ni taala guu, an tↄ́ su àↄ ku lá doũ guu ń gbɛ̃maaↄ tↄ́oo.
Lua, má kú taasi ń yã'ↄ̃mao guu, ma sɛ lɛsĩ mà bↄu aafia.
Má Lua tↄbↄ lɛsia guu, má aà sáaukpa mà aà kã́fĩ.
Bee a ka Diigu dɛ sa'oa ń zuoa, a kɛɛ̀ na dɛ zugaaena kↄ́badea.
Taasideↄ e, aai pↄnakɛ, á luakĩiwɛɛlɛnaↄ á sↄ̃ i níni.
Asa Dii ì wɛ̃nadeↄ yãma, ìli saka a gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛ zĩ̀zↄ ũↄguo.
À aà táasilɛ musu ń tↄↄlɛo, ísia ń pↄ́ pↄ́ kú a guuↄ píi.
Asa Lua a Siↄna suaba, a ɛa Yuda wɛ̃́lɛↄ kálɛ, aà gbɛ̃́ↄ i zↄ̃lɛu ń pↄ́ ũ.
Aà zↄ̀blenaↄ nɛ́ↄ mɛ́ aa gↄ̃ vĩ, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ye aà tↄ́ naipiↄ iↄ ku a guu.
Davidi lɛ.
Lua, ma misi, Dii, kɛ kpakpa mↄ dↄmalɛ.
To wí gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ ma wɛↄ kṹ, aa ń mi pɛlɛ. To gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ye mà taasikɛↄ kpɛkpa, an gɛɛ gↄ̃ kpá ń wɛ́i.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaì omɛɛ, tàalɛ tàalɛↄ, to aa ɛa ń wío.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ n kĩ́i wɛɛlɛↄ, to an pↄ kɛma na aa yáalↄ. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ an wɛ́ dↄi ǹ ń suabaↄ, aa o láasai Lua zↄ̃ↄ.
Taaside wɛ̃naden ma ũ, Lua, kɛ kpakpa. Ḿmɛ ń ma Dↄnlɛde ũ, ḿmɛ ń ma Mìsina ũ, Dii, ńsu gɛ̃gɛ̃o.
Dii, ma nanziɛ, ńsu to wí ma kũ bauo.
Ma misi, ma bↄ n maakɛa yã́i, swã́kpamazi, ma suaba.
Ma gbɛsi pↄ́ máli gɛ́ ulɛi a guun n ũ. Ń dìlɛ ǹ ma suaba, asa ma gbɛsi ń ma zɛgikĩion n ũ.
Ma Lua, ma bↄ vãikɛnaↄ ↄzĩ, ma si gbɛ̃́ bɛ̃̀ɛ pãsĩↄwa.
Ḿmɛ ma wɛ́ dↄnzi, Dii Lua, ḿmɛ má n náai vĩ za ma ɛ̀waasogↄↄ.
Ma sↄ̃ kpálɛanzi za nɛasakpɛuɛ, ḿmɛ n ma bↄ ma da nↄ̀sɛu. N táasi miↄ lɛ gↄↄpii.
Ma kua dɛ yãbↄnsaɛ ũ gbɛ̃́ dasideɛ, asa ḿmɛ ń ma ulɛkĩi gbãa ũ.
N táasilɛa ìↄ dↄ ma lɛ́u, miↄ n maabo kↄↄ ń oosio.
Ńsu pãkpamazi ma zikũa yã́io, ńsu ma vũaa ma gbãa láaa yã́io.
Asa ma ibɛɛↄ lɛ́ ma yã'o, ma wɛ̀lɛↄ lɛ́ lɛkpaaĩ ma wɛ̃nibↄai.
Aa mɛ̀: Lua gìaàziɛ, wà aà ya kṹ, gbɛ̃e ku à aà suabao.
Lua, ńsu ǹyↄ̃ kumanↄ zã̀o, ma Lua, kɛ kpakpa mↄ dↄmalɛ.
To wí gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ yãdↄaↄ kṹ, aa midɛ, to sↄ̃́sↄ̃a da gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ ĩadaaↄla, an tↄ́ ↄ̃̀ↄkpa.
Mapi sↄ̃, ma wɛ́ ìↄ dↄnzi láasaiɛ, miↄ n táasilɛ màↄ gɛ́.
N maakɛa aↄ dↄ ma lɛ́u gↄↄpiiɛ ń n gbɛ̃suabaa pↄ́ má a lɛ́ dↄ̃oo.
Má mↄ mà Dii Lua gↄ̃sakɛyãↄ galikɛ, n mɛ̀ndo maakɛa má dↄ gbɛ̃́ↄgu.
N yãdàdamɛɛ za ma ɛ̀waasogↄↄ, Lua, e tia málɛ n yãbↄnsaɛↄ o'o.
Baa kɛ́ ma zikũ̀, ma mikã pua, ńsu ma to weo, Lua, kɛ́ mà e n gbãa galikɛ tiadeↄnɛ, mí n gↄ̃sakɛyã dau siu gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ fɛlɛↄnɛ.
Lua, n maakɛa zↄ̃̀ma, n yãzↄ̃ↄkɛ̀, démɛ muaannↄi?
Ń tò taasi pãsĩ ma le dasidasi, ãma ńyↄ̃ ɛa ǹ ma gba wɛ̃ni, ńyↄ̃ ɛa ǹ ma bↄ tↄↄlɛ nↄnau.
Ńyↄ̃ ma bɛɛɛ kã́fĩmɛɛ, ńyↄ̃ ɛa ma nↄ̀sɛ nínimɛɛ lↄ.
Ma Lua, má n sáaukpa ń mↄↄnao n náai yã́i. Isailiↄ Lua pↄ́ n kua adoa, má n táasilɛ ń kúuo.
Gula aↄ dↄ ma lɛ́u. Ma gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ n ma mìsi, má n táasilɛ.
Máↄ n maakɛa o gↄↄpiiɛ, asa wí gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ ma vãi wɛɛlɛↄ kũ̀, an gɛɛ gↄ̃̀ kpá ń wɛ́i.
Lua, ǹ n iko kpa kíawa, ǹ n maakɛ kpa kíabuipiwa,
kɛ́ aà dↄaa n gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ a zɛ́wa, i yã́gↄ̃gↄ̃ táaaↄnɛ a zɛ́wa,
gbɛ̀sĩsĩↄ i mↄ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ ń aafiao, sĩ̀sĩↄnaↄ i to aaↄ ku nama guu.
Kía a to yã́ bↄ ń táaaↄ na, a taaside nɛ́ↄ suaba, i gbãamↄnɛdeↄ wíwi.
Aↄ ku lá ĩatɛ̃ ìↄ ku gↄↄpiiwa, lán mↄvua kua wɛ̃ ń wɛ̃owa.
Aↄ dɛ lán zuↄ louwa, lán mↄ̀sɛ pↄ́ ì pisi tↄↄlɛwawa.
Gbɛ̃maaↄ ↄta aà gↄↄ, nama a kɛ zài e mↄ gɛ midɛò.
A kible za ísialɛ la ń a lɛ́leo, za Uflata e dṹnia lɛ́wa.
Bui pↄ́ kú guwaiwaiuↄ mↄ kúlɛɛ̀, aà ibɛɛↄ wúlɛ ń gbɛɛu aà aɛ.
Taasisi ń ísia baa kíaↄ falubↄɛ̀, Seba ń Saba kíaↄ mↄ gbadaɛ̀.
Kíaↄ mↄ kúlɛɛ̀ ḿpii, bui píi a misiilɛɛ̀.
Asa a wɛ̃nade pↄ́ an wii dↄↄ bↄɛ, a taaside pↄ́ dↄnlɛde vĩoↄ misi.
A yɛ̃̀ɛɛsaideↄ wɛ̃nagwa, a taasideↄ bↄ ga lɛ́zĩ.
A ń bↄ gbãamↄnɛdeↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pãsĩↄ ↄzĩ, asa an kua bɛɛɛ vĩɛ̀.
Lua kía dↄ̃ ń aafiao! Wiↄ aà gba Seba bùsu vua, wiↄ wabikɛɛ̀ Luawa gↄↄpii, wiↄ samaa'oɛ̀ láasai.
Bua pↄ́ↄ kɛ aà bùsuu maamaa, a láↄ aↄ da sĩ̀sĩↄ musu síii, aa nɛ'i aa pia lán Libã lákpɛwa, aa gbã lán kàsapuwa sɛ̃saou.
Aà tↄ́ aↄ ku gↄↄpii lán ĩatɛ̃waɛ, bui píi a báaa e aà sabai, aai aà tↄnasi.
Wà Dii Lua, Isailiↄ Lua sáaukpa! Ɔ̃mɛ ì yãbↄnsaɛↄ kɛ ado.
Wàↄ Lua gawidepi tↄbↄ gↄↄpii, aà gawi i li dṹniaa píi. Ãmi! Ãmi!
Yɛse nɛ́ Davidi wabikɛa lɛ́n we.
Lua ì ɛ̀fãaikɛ Isailiↄnɛ sĩanaɛ, ì maakɛ nↄ̀sɛpuadeↄnɛ.
Mapi sↄ̃ ma kãikũ̀ ń lɛ́lɛao, ma gbá ye zãi guwa yãaɛ.
Kɛ́ ma vãikɛnaↄ kua maa è, ma ĩ́andãnapiↄ gwea nidɛ̀.
Yãe lí kpàlikpanɛ́o, aa aafia mɛ́ aa mɛkpaa.
An wá lí wã lán dãↄwao, aali gyãkɛ lán deↄwao.
Aaì ĩ́andãa da ń nↄɛ yàbaa ũ, aaì pãsĩ nańzi pↄkasa ũ.
An oa ìↄ nísi bↄ, an kàamai dɛ ń pia.
Aa gbɛ̃́laani vĩ, aaì boo gbɛ̃̀nɛ onɛ́, aaì naɛnaɛmá ń zↄ̃ↄkɛ yã́i.
Aaì mɛ: Lua pila wà dɛ̃ɛka, mɛ́ an yã́ ì li dṹniaa.
Ayãmɛto wì kɛnɛ́ kɛ̀kɛ, wì yã́ pↄ́ aa ò píi sí sĩana ũ.
Aaì mɛ: Lua a dↄ̃ má ni? Musude dↄ̃a kà màae?
Vãikɛnapiↄ gwa, aa yãe kã̀a vĩo, an gwea ìↄ kã́fĩ gↄↄpiiɛ.
Asi ma nↄ̀sɛ pua pã yã̀? Ma a ↄbↄ̀lɛ tàaeu wásawasa pãɛa?
Niↄ ma gbɛ̃ gↄↄpiiɛ, niↄ ma swã́gaga lá gu lɛ́ dↄ.
Tó ma zɛ ń yã́ bee taa oaoɛ, bee aↄ dɛ bↄa n gbɛ̃́ↄ kpɛ ũɛ.
Kɛ́ ma làasookɛ̀ yã́piwa mà dↄ̃, à kɛ̀mɛɛ zĩ'ũɛ,
e ma gɛ gɛ̃ò Lua kúkĩi, ↄ̃ ma wɛ́ gbàsa kɛ̃̀ an láaa yã́ musu.
Ni ń da gu zãandeu, ni ↄzↄ̃ńzi aa gↄ̃ ń liaao.
Aaì gↄ̃ kaalɛpↄ ũ kã́ndo, vĩa pↄ́ↄ ì ń le, aa midɛ.
Lá nana ì gɛ̃zɛa, tó gbɛ̃́ vù, tó n fɛlɛ Dii, ńyↄ̃ to aa gɛ̃ ń ĩ́anao màaɛ.
Kɛ́ ma nↄ̀sɛ ↄ̃̀ↄkpà, mɛ́ ma pↄ yà,
ma sↄũkũ̀, má yãe dↄ̃o, ma gↄ̃ n kĩ́i lán nↄ̀bↄwa.
N beeo má kunnↄ gↄↄpiiɛ, n ma kũ ma ↄplaawa.
Ni dↄaamɛɛ ń n lɛdaaao, bee gbɛa ńyↄ̃ ma ka àizãnawa.
Ma wɛ́ dↄ gbɛ̃ezi musuo, n bàasio, kuannↄ guu pↄe ni lɛ́ ma dɛ tↄↄlɛo.
Baa tó ma mɛ ń ma sↄ̃o yɛ̃̀ɛɛ lɛ́ láa, Lua mɛ́ ì to ma sↄ̃ gbãakũ, ↄ̃mɛ ma baa ũ gↄↄpii.
Asa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kɛ̃̀maↄ midɛɛ, ńyↄ̃ n gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ bↄ̀ n kpɛↄ bãdɛ.
Lua, sↄ̃́aanzi mɛ́ kɛ̀mɛɛ na, Dii Lua, ma n kɛ ma ulɛkĩi ũɛ. Má n yãkɛaↄ dau mà siunɛ́.
Lua, bↄ́yãi n giwázi e gↄↄpiii? Àkɛa ńlɛ pↄbↄ n níu n kpàsa sãↄ yã́ musui?
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ n ń sí za ziↄ yã́ dↄngu, bui pↄ́ ń bò aa gↄ̃̀ ń pↄ́ ũↄ ń Siↄna gbɛ̀sĩsĩ pↄ́ ń kɛ̀ n kúkĩi ũo.
N ibɛɛↄ n kúkĩi dàaĩ míↄmiↄ. Dɛdɛ ń laaio, à ↄ̃̀ↄkpà píi.
N wɛ̀lɛↄ kã̀aa gu pↄ́ ni dauwálɛ, aa ńzĩa seelaↄ pɛ̀lɛ we.
Wá è, an mↄona dↄ musu, aalɛ kɛ lá wìↄ dào gbɛ̃wa.
Lí yↄↄa kɛfɛna pↄ́ wa kpà a gĩwa, aa gbɛ̃̀ wa gbòo ń mↄoo ń fɛ̃nkĩnio.
Aa tɛsↄ̃̀ n kúkĩiwa, à kwɛ̀, aa tò kpɛ́ pↄ́ n tↄ́ kuwàpi gbãlɛ̀.
Aa ò ń nↄ̀sɛu: Wà ↄtↄ̃má míↄmiↄ. Aa tɛsↄ̃̀ wá bùsu lousisikpɛↄwa.
N kpɛ́ lousisibↄↄ gɛ̃̀zɛa, ãnabie ku lↄo. Wáↄ ku màa e bↄɛn yã̀? Wá gbɛ̃e dↄ̃o.
Lua, ńyↄ̃ to n ibɛɛↄ aaↄ n yáalↄ e bↄɛ ni? N wɛ̀lɛↄ aaↄ sakangu láasai yã̀?
Bↄ́yãi n ↄ kpaaũai? Ɔgo n kùɛ, ní ń dɛdɛ.
Lua mɛ́ ma kía ũ za asĩnizĩ, ↄ̃mɛ ì gbɛ̃́ suaba dṹniau.
Ḿmɛ n ísia zↄ̃̀ɛ ń n gbãao, n kwãsa mi wì í guu.
N Egipiↄ mìdɛ we, n ń gɛↄ kpà wàiↄwa pↄblea ũ.
N swaↄ bↄ̀, n zɛwɛ̃̀ nibↄnaↄnɛ, n swa pↄ́ a í baa vĩo zↄ̃̀ɛ.
Fãanɛ ń gwãasĩnao dɛ n pↄ́ ũɛ, n mↄvua ń ĩatɛ̃o kúkĩi dìlɛnɛ́.
Ḿmɛ n kↄↄ dàda bùsu píiu, n saɛ ń buziɛo gↄↄ dìlɛ.
Yá pↄ́ n ibɛɛↄ dↄ̀ yã́ dↄngu Dii, mìsaidepiↄ sakà n tↄ́uɛ.
Ńsu ǹ n felena kpá wàiↄwao, n wɛ̃nadeↄ yã́ su sãnguo.
Laaidↄ n bàakuawanↄwa, asa wá bùsu gbɛ̀'ɛↄ pãsĩkũ̀ píiɛ.
Wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wàlɛ gbãamↄwɛ̃ɛↄ, ńsu to wà kpɛkpa ń wíoo. To wɛ̃nadeↄ ń taasideↄ n táasilɛ.
Lua, fɛlɛ gí ń nzĩao. N yá pↄ́ mìsaideↄ lɛ́ dↄ zɛsai màé!
Ńsu zↄa pↄ́ n ibɛɛↄ lɛ́ kánzi kpa swã́ao, n wɛ̀lɛpiↄ kↄ̃fĩ dↄ gↄↄpiiɛ.
Asafa lɛ.
Wa n sáaukɛ̀ Lua, wa n sáaukɛ̀. Tó wà n yãbↄnsaɛↄ galikɛ̀, ń kú kãi.
Lua mɛ̀: Ma gↄↄdìlɛ, má yã́kpalɛkɛ a zɛ́wa.
Tó dṹnia dèe, a gbɛ̃́ↄ lɛ́ kɛ sèee, mámɛ mi a gbapɛlɛ kṹ gíũgiũ.
Mi o yↄ̃̀ↄdeↄnɛ aasu ń gasa fɛlɛo, mi o vãikɛnaↄnɛ aasu káakuo.
Ásu à á gasa fɛlɛao, ásu kàamai kɛmanↄo.
Asa gbãa lí bↄ gukpɛ ge bɛ'aɛo, ìli bↄ guwaiwai guu no,
Lua mɛ́ yã́kpalɛkɛna ũ, ↄ̃mɛ ì gbɛ̃do sↄ̃ↄlɛ, ì gbɛ̃do fɛlɛ.
Imibↄ ku Dii ↄzĩ, í gbãa ka a pai, àlɛ pí aà pↄkũma ũ. Ì kↄ́lɛ dṹnia vãikɛnaↄwa píi, ↄ̃ aaì mi wesai ń a gbↄ̃ↄ.
Mapi sↄ̃ máↄ yã́pi o gↄↄpiiɛ, mí Yakↄbu Lua táasilɛ.
Má vãikɛnaↄ gasa kwɛ́, gbɛ̃maaↄ gasa iↄ ku musu.
Asafa lɛ. Wì sí ń kúuↄɛ.
Wa Lua dↄ̃ Yuda bùsuuɛ, aà tↄ́ gbãa Isailiↄnɛ.
Aà zwã̀akpɛ kú Salɛma, aà kúkĩi kú Siↄna.
Kua we à kà wãaↄ ɛ̀'ɛ ń sɛ̀ngbaoↄ ń fɛ̃ndaↄ ń zĩkabↄↄ.
Ni gupu, niↄ tɛkɛ, n zↄ̃ↄ dɛ gbɛ̀sĩsĩ pↄ́ kú gↄↄpiia.
N gbãa dɛnla kɛ̀ gↄ̃sa gbãaↄnɛ, aa wúlɛa ń ń i gbɛzão, gↄ̃ gɛ̀bɛɛpiↄ gbɛ̃e i fↄ̃ ↄsɛ̀o.
Yakↄbu Lua, n ń lele, ↄ̃ sↄ̃deↄ ń ń sↄ̃́ↄ gↄ̃̀ kálɛa ń izↄ̃ↄo.
Ḿmɛ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛ wà vĩakɛɛ̀ ũ, tó n pↄbↄ̀ n níu, démɛ a fↄ̃ zɛ n aɛi?
Kua musu n yã́kpalɛkɛ̀, ↄ̃ vĩa dṹnia kũ̀, à gↄ̃̀ kílikili.
Lua, n fɛlɛ n yãgↄ̃̀gↄ̃ dṹniaɛ, n yɛ̃̀ɛɛsaideↄ suabà.
Gbɛ̃nazĩna pↄkũma ì n tↄbↄ, n pↄkũma kĩni ìↄ dↄa n piɛ.
À lɛkɛ Dii á Luawa, í a fĩabo. Á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ á liaawáziↄ, à mↄ Lua pↄ́ dɛ wàↄ aà vĩa vĩ gba pↄ́.
Ì kpalablenaↄ kãdɛ, ì to vĩa dṹnia kíaↄ kṹ.
Asafa lɛ.
Ma lɛzù Luazi, ma wiilɛ̀wà, ma lɛzù Luazi aà ma yãma.
Kua taasi guu ma Dii kĩ́i wɛ̀ɛlɛ, ma ↄ dↄa Luazi gwã́ kpasasai, ma nↄ̀sɛ i nínio.
Kɛ́ ma làasoo tà Lua kĩ́i, ↄ̃ málɛ kãsãnkɛ, kɛ́ ma aà wàaipà, ma nisĩna vùa.
Ń ma wɛ́ kũa, mi e i'òo, ma gↄ̃ bíli guu, mi dↄ̃ lá má oo.
Ma làasookɛ̀ yãawa ń wɛ̃̀ zizi pↄ́ gɛ̃̀ↄ yã́o.
Lɛ pↄ́ má dà yãa dↄ̀magu gwã́, ma làasookɛ̀wà mà wɛɛlɛ dↄ̃.
Ma mɛ̀: Dii wá vũaa gↄↄpii yã̀? Wá yã́ a kaaàgu lↄoa?
Aà gbɛ̃kɛ mìdɛ míↄmiↄ yã̀? Aà yã́ aↄ gbooa gↄↄpii yã̀?
Wá wɛ̃nagwaa yã́ sã̀ Luagu yã̀? Aà pↄ pàwázi, a wá wɛgwa lↄoa?
Ɔ̃ ma mɛ̀: Yã́ pↄ́ má kũan kɛ: Musude ↄzɛɛdↄ̀wɛ̃ɛɛ.
Má làasookɛ Dii yãbↄnsaɛↄwa, mí aà yã́ pↄ́ a kɛ̀ yãaↄ dↄ gbɛ̃́ↄgu.
Má n dabudabukɛaↄ wàaipa píi, mí n yãzↄ̃ↄkɛaↄ onɛ́.
Lua, n zɛ́ gbãsĩ vĩo. Dii kpele mɛ́ zↄ̃ↄ lán Luawai?
Ḿmɛ ń Lua dabudabukɛna ũ, n n gbãa ↄ̀lↄ buiↄnɛ.
N n gbɛ̃́ↄ mìsi ń n gã̀sa gbãao, wá Yakↄbu ń Yosɛfuo buiↄ.
Ísia wɛsìnlɛ Lua, ísia wɛsìnlɛ ↄ̃ à kↄ̃dɛ̀, à lùalua za a ɛu.
Lou kwɛ̀, a pũnaa kↄ̃fĩ dↄ̀ luabɛ, n kà tɛdeↄ kpa loupilɛa ũ.
N pũnaa kↄ̃fĩ dↄ zàa'ĩana guu, loupilɛa dṹnia pù píi. Tↄↄlɛ gbãlɛ à lùalua.
N zɛ́ dà ísiau, n gɛ̃kĩi bↄ̀ í zↄ̃ↄ guu, wi n kɛ̀sɛgbɛ eo.
N dↄaa n gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ lán sã waiwa Mↄizi ń Aalonao sabai.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, à ma lɛdama ma, à swã́kpa ma yã́i.
Má yã'oɛ́ ń yáasio, má yã́ pↄ́ ulɛa za zi bↄↄlɛkɛɛ́,
yã́ pↄ́ wá mà mɛ́ wá dↄ̃, yã́ pↄ́ wá maeↄ a galikɛ̀wɛ̃ɛ.
Wá yã́pi ulɛ wá nɛ́ↄnɛo, wá Dii táasilɛa da wá tↄũnaↄnɛ ń aà gbãao ń yãbↄnsaɛ pↄ́ a kɛ̀ↄ.
À yãdìlɛ Yakↄbu buiↄnɛ, à a ikoyã dà Isailiↄnɛ. A ò wá deziↄnɛ aa tó ń nɛ́ↄ dↄ̃,
i gↄ̃ ń bui pↄ́ kpɛ́ↄnɛ fɛlɛkaa ũ, aai fɛlɛ dada ń nɛ́ↄnɛ sↄ̃,
kɛ́ aa e Lua náaikɛ, kɛ́ Lua yãkɛaↄ su sã́ńguo, aaiↄ aà yãdilɛaↄ kũa,
kɛ́ aasu wàↄ dɛ lán ń deziↄwao, asa aa swã́gbãakɛ̀ aa gì Lua yã́i, an sↄ̃ ku Luawao, aa náai vĩɛ̀o.
Ɛflaiũ buiↄá kàzunaↄnɛ, ↄ̃ aa kpɛkpà zĩ guu.
Aai zɛ ń Luabaakuańnↄoo, aa gì tɛ́i aà ikoyãi.
Aà yãkɛaↄ sã̀ńgu ń aà yãbↄnsaɛ pↄ́ a ↄ̀lↄnɛ́ↄ.
À dabudabuↄ kɛ̀ an deziↄ wáa Zoã wɛ̃́lɛu, Egipi bùsuu.
À ísia zↄ̃̀ɛ à bùańnↄ, à í bĩ́ibò.
À dↄ̀aanɛ́ tɛlu guu fãanɛ, gwãasĩna sↄ̃ ń tɛ́ gupuao.
À gbɛsi pàa guwaiwaiu, à í kpàmá zↄ̃ↄ lán ísia íwa.
A tò í bↄ̀nɛ́ gbɛu, ípi bàalɛ̀ lán swadawa.
Ɔ̃ aa gì tɛ duunawa, aa gì Musude yãmai guwaiwaiu.
Aa gí kɛ̀ aa Lua lɛwɛ, aa ń pↄeã blɛ gbɛ̀awà.
Aa Lua bɛ̃̀ɛbò aa mɛ̀: A fↄ̃ ↄpi'i dilɛwɛ̃ɛ sɛ̃u lae?
Gwa, à gbɛ lɛ̀, í bↄ̀ dàgua mɛ! A fↄ̃ blɛ ge nↄ̀ↄ kpáwá sↄ̃a?
Kɛ́ Dii yã́pi mà, aà pↄ pà, ↄ̃ tɛ́ kũ̀ Yakↄbu buiↄwa, à pↄkũmabↄ̀bↄ Isailiↄwa.
Asa aai Lua yã́ sio, aa aà gbɛ̃́ suabaa gbãa náai vĩo.
À yãdà bàlumaɛ, à zɛwɛ̃̀ musu,
ↄ̃ mana kwɛ̀nɛ́ blɛ ũ, à musu pↄ́wɛna gbↄ̃ yònɛ́.
Aa malaikaↄ blɛ blè, à kũ̀sũakɛ̀nɛ́, à dìńla.
A tò ĩ́an gbãa bↄ̀ gukpɛ, ń aà gbãao à bↄ̀ gɛↄmidↄkĩi oi lↄ,
ↄ̃ à nↄ̀ↄ kwɛ̀nɛ́ lán luutɛ̃wa, bãↄ lìńla lán ísialɛ ũfãawa.
A tò aa kwɛ̀ ń bòou, aa gↄ̃̀ kálɛa liaa ń kpɛ́ↄi.
Lua pↄ́ pↄ́ aa a ni vĩ kpàmá, ↄ̃ aa sò aa kã̀ pã́upãu.
E a ni àↄ gɛ́ bↄińla, gↄↄ pↄ́ blɛpi da ń lɛ́u,
Lua fɛ̀lɛ fɛ̃̀ńnↄ, à Isaili gↄ̃gbãaↄ dɛ̀dɛ, à ń ɛ̀waasoↄ kwɛ̀.
Gia ń beeo aa gì tɛ duunawaɛ, ń aà yãbↄnsaɛkɛaↄ aai aà náaikɛo.
Ɔ̃ à ń wɛ̃ni kɛ̀nɛ́ lán lɛ́'ĩanawa, a tò ↄ̃̀ↄnɛkɛa ń mìdɛ.
Tó à ń pisabò, aaì aà aɛya, aaì ɛa wà aà kĩ́i wɛɛlɛ ń wãao.
Aa dↄ̃̀ sa Lua mɛ́ ń gbɛsi ũ, Lua Musude mɛ́ ń Mìsina ũ.
Ãma aaì lɛ́mawà, aaì ɛɛtoɛ̀,
an sↄ̃ kuwào, aa aà bàakuańnↄ yã́ gbòo.
Aàpi sↄ̃ à ń wɛ̃nagwà, à ń duuna kɛ̃̀má, i ń midɛo. Ìↄ azĩa zùukɛ mↄ̀ↄmↄↄɛ, i a pↄkũmabↄbↄmá píio.
À ń gbɛ̃nazĩnkɛ dↄ̃̀má, asa aaì gɛ̃zɛa susai lán ĩ́anawaɛ.
Aa swã́gbãakɛ̀ guwaiwaiu gɛ̃n ũma'ũma! Aa aà pↄ yàɛ̀ sɛ̃u we à kɛ̀ zài.
Aa Lua lɛwɛ, aa Lua lɛwɛ, aa Isailiↄ Lua pↄ́ a kua adoa fɛ̃̀.
Aà iko gbãa sã̀ńgu, lá à ń sí ń ibɛɛↄwa,
lá à dabudabuↄ kɛ̀ Egipi, mɛ́ à yãbↄnsaɛↄ kɛ̀ Zoã bùsuu.
À ń swa'iↄ lìlɛ au ũ, ↄ̃ aai fↄ̃ aa a imì lↄo.
À ũsĩnaↄ kàńgu, aa ń soso, ń blↄↄↄ lↄ, aa yãyìamá.
A tò kwaↄ ń pↄ́wɛnaↄ blè, à kwasutɛ̃ kà ń buapↄ́ↄu.
A tò lougbɛ ń vɛ̃ɛbuↄ kɛ̀ kɛ́lɛkɛlɛ, a zàa'ĩana ń kaa líↄ ɛ̀'ɛ.
À ń pↄtuoↄ músikɛ̀ ń lougbɛpio, lua sù ń kpàsaↄwa.
À a pↄkũma zↄ̃ↄ bↄ̀bↄmá, à ĩ́isɛ̀ńnↄ ń pↄfɛ̃o ń kpɛ̃nɛo, à músi malaikaↄ gbàɛmá.
À a pↄkũma gbà zɛ́, i zɛzↄ̃ gaɛ lↄo, à gagyãkàńgu.
À Egipi nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́iaↄ dɛ̀dɛ píi, Haũ bui gↄ̃sakɛ nɛ́piↄ gàga.
À bↄ̀ ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ lán sãↄwa, à dↄ̀aanɛ́ guwaiwaiu lán sã waiↄwa.
A bɛńnↄ, aa ku dↄdↄa vĩasai, an ibɛɛↄ sↄ̃, ísia kũ̀aamá.
À kàńnↄ a bùsu zↄ̃lɛu, gusĩsĩde pↄ́ a sì ń a gbãaopiu.
À buipãleↄ yànɛ́, ↄ̃ à ń bùsu kpaalɛ̀nɛ́ ń pↄ́ ũ, à uakpàkpa Isaili buipiↄnɛ.
Ɔ̃ aa Lua lɛwɛ aa gì aà yãmai, aa Musude yãdilɛaↄ kũao.
Aa kpɛkpà aa bↄ̀ aà kpɛ lán ń maeↄwa, aa náai vĩo lán sá gia baiwa.
Aa aà pↄ fɛ̀lɛɛ̀ ń ń sa'okĩio, aa aà zafɛ̃̀ɛ̀ ń ń tã́aↄ.
Kɛ́ Lua è màa, ↄ̃ aà pↄ pà, à ↄzↄ̃̀ Isailiↄzi pãsĩpãsĩ.
À a zwã̀akpɛ tò Silo we, aà bɛ pↄ́ a kpà gbɛ̃nazĩnaↄ guupi.
A tò an wɛ̀lɛↄ mↄ̀ a kpagolo sɛ̀, ↄ̃mɛ aà gbãa ń aà gawio kúkĩi ũ.
A tò wà a gbɛ̃́ↄ dɛ̀dɛ ń fɛ̃ndao, aà pↄ pà bui pↄ́ a sɛ̀pizi.
An ɛ̀waasoↄ tɛkũ̀ zĩ guu, an wɛ̃́ndiaↄ i zãkɛlɛ dↄ̃ lↄo.
Wà ń sa'onaↄ dɛ̀dɛ ń fɛ̃ndao, an gyaaↄ i fↄ̃ ↄ́ↄlↄ̀o.
Ɔ̃ Dii vù ń io sa, lán gↄ̃sa pↄ́ vù ń wɛ̃'iowa.
À ń wɛ̀lɛↄ gbɛ̃̀, aa kpɛkpà, a tò aa gↄ̃̀ ń wío gↄↄpii.
Ɔ̃ à gì Ɛflaiũ buiↄzi, i Yosɛfu buipi sɛ lↄo.
Yuda bui ↄ̃ a sɛ̀ sa ń Siↄna gbɛ̀sĩsĩ pↄ́ á yeio.
À a kúkĩi dↄ̀ musumusu we, aↄ ku gↄↄpii lán dṹnia kálɛawa.
Ɔ̃ à a zↄ̀blena Davidi sɛ̀, à aà bↄ̀ sã kaau.
À aà bↄ̀ sãdãu, à dↄ̀aa Isailiↄnɛ, Lua gbɛ̃́ Yakↄbu buipiↄ kíaɛ.
Davidi ń kpá a kpɛ ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo, à dↄ̀aanɛ́ ń a ↄ báaadeo.
Lua, buipãleↄ sì ń bùsuu, aa n kpɛ́ pↄ́ a kua adoa ↄ̃̀ↄkpà, aa Yelusalɛũ dɛ̀ɛlɛ.
Aa n zↄ̀blenaↄ dɛ̀dɛ aa ń gɛ kpà bãↄwa, aa n yãmanaↄ gɛ tò wàiↄnɛ blɛ ũ.
An au bàalɛ̀ lán íwa Yelusalɛũ bĩ́i kpɛ, gbɛ̃e ku à ń vĩo.
Wa gↄ̃ pↄ́ yáalↄaↄ ũ wá saɛdeↄnɛ, láanipↄ ũ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ liaawáziↄnɛ.
Dii, n pↄ aↄ paawázi e bↄɛ ni? N kpɛ̃nɛ tɛ́ aↄ kũ gↄↄpii yã̀?
Pↄkũma bↄbↄ bui pↄ́ aa n dↄ̃oↄwa, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aali ń sísioↄ bùsuↄwa.
Asa aa Yakↄbu buiↄ blè, aa ń bùsu ↄ̃̀ↄkpàɛ.
Ńsu wá maeↄ duuna wi wá musuo. Wɛ̃nadↄ̃wɛ̃ɛ kpakpa, asa wa busa dúuduuɛ.
Dↄwálɛ, Lua wá Suabana. Wá misi, kɛ́ ǹ tↄbↄ, wá duuna kɛ̃́wá n tↄ́ yã́i.
Bↄ́yãi ńyↄ̃ to buipãleↄ wá lá: Wá Lua ku máɛ la? To buipãleↄ dↄ̃ wá aɛ, kɛ́ ni n zↄ̀blenaↄ dɛdɛa tↄsimá.
To zĩ̀zↄↄ ↄↄlↄ gɛ̃ n swã́u, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú ga lɛ́zĩpiↄ bↄ ń n gã̀sa gbãao.
Láani pↄ́ wá saɛdeↄ zĩ̀ma, fĩabonɛ́ gɛ̃n sopla, Dii.
Wápiↄ n gbɛ̃́ↄ, n kpàsa sãↄ, wíↄ n sáaukpa gↄↄpii, wíↄ n tↄ́ galikɛ e wá buiwa.
Asafa lɛ.
Swã́kpa Isailiↄ Dↄaana, n gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ni Yosɛfu buiↄ dã lán sãↄwa. Bↄ gupuau, n gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ń zↄ̃lɛa malaika gã̀sĩadeↄ zãnguo,
ní dↄaa Ɛflaiũ buiↄnɛ ń Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ buiↄ ń Manase buiↄ. Fɛlɛ ń n gbãao, mↄ ǹ wá suaba!
Lua, to wà ɛa su wá pá ziu. Wá wɛgwa wà aafiaʼe.
Dii Lua Zĩgↄ̃de, ńlɛ pↄbↄ n níu e tia, ńyↄ̃ n gbɛ̃́ↄ wabikɛa mamá bↄɛ ni?
N wɛ́'i kpàmá blɛ ũ, n ń wɛ́'i yↄ̃̀nɛ́ pↄ́ pai aa mì.
Ń tò wa gↄ̃ láanipↄ ũ wá saɛdeↄnɛ, wá ibɛɛpiↄ lɛ́ wá kɛ pↄ́ↄpↄↄ.
Lua Zĩgↄ̃de, to wà su wá pá ziu, wá wɛgwa wà aafiaʼe.
N vɛ̃ɛli wò Egipi, n buipãleↄ yà ↄ̃ ń pɛ̀ ń gbɛu.
N gukɛ̀kɛɛ̀, à zĩ́napɛ̀lɛ, ↄ̃ à ↄtà à a bùsu pà.
A uedà gbɛ̀sĩsĩↄla, a gↄ̃naↄ dɛ sɛdɛ lí zↄ̃ↄↄla.
À ↄtà à gɛ̀ e ísialɛ, a ↄnɛↄ gɛ̀ e Uflatai.
Bↄ́yãi n a kaa gbòo, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ gɛ̃zɛaↄ ìↄ ↄmalɛii?
Dào sàwa ì lɛ́ kái, sɛ̃̀anↄbↄↄ ì mↄ a lá blei.
N yã́ na! Lua Zĩgↄ̃de, wá wɛgwa! Kua za musu wɛzu ǹ gwa! Laaidↄ vɛ̃ɛlipiwa,
bui pↄ́ ń pɛ̀ nzĩa, nɛ́ pↄ́ ń sì n pↄ́ ũpi.
Wà n vɛ̃ɛlipi zↄ̃̀ wà tɛsↄ̃̀wà. Wɛpãsĩ biimá aa midɛ.
Ɔda gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú n ↄplaaiwa, gbɛ̃nazĩn nɛ́ pↄ́ ń sì n pↄ́ ũ.
Wá kɛ̃ma lↄo. Wá lɛ́ ń láo, wí n sísi.
Dii Lua Zĩgↄ̃de, to wà su wá pá ziu, wá wɛgwa wà aafiaʼe.
Asafa lɛ.
À guladↄ Lua wá gbãawa. À kúkuakɛ Yakↄbu buiↄ Luaɛ.
À bↄ ń lɛo, í bala lɛ́ ń mↄↄna'ↄ nao ń domao.
À kuupɛ mↄbↄzĩ, í pɛ́ a vua zã́ wá dikpɛgↄↄ,
asa a dɛ ikoyã ũ Isailiↄnɛɛ. Yã́ pↄ́ Yakↄbu buiↄ Lua dìlɛn we.
À yã́pi dà Yosɛfu buiↄnɛ gↄↄ pↄ́ à ã̀na Egipiↄwa. Aa lↄↄ pↄ́ aai ma yãao mà à mɛ̀:
Ma aso gò á gã̀u, ma á ↄ bↄ̀ ɛ̃u.
A wiilɛ̀a taasikɛgↄↄ, ↄ̃ ma á bↄ́, má wèwá asii guu ń louvĩao. Ma á lɛ́ ma á gwá Mɛliba í kĩ́i.
À swã́kpa ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, mí lɛdawá. Á Isailiↄ, à ma yãma lé!
Ásu àↄ dii pãle vĩo, ásu kúlɛ dii zĩ̀loɛo.
Mámɛ má Dii á Lua ũ, ma á bↄ́lɛ Egipiɛ. À á lɛ́ ɛlɛ, mí tó à kã́.
Ɔ̃ Isailiↄ i ma yãmao, ma gbɛ̃́piↄ i misiilɛmɛɛo.
Ɔ̃ ma ń tó ń ń swã́gbãao, aa tɛ́ ńzĩa pↄeãi.
Tó Isailiↄ sↄ̃́amazi, tó ma gbɛ̃́piↄ tɛ ma yã́i,
dↄ̃ ma ń ibɛɛↄ bùsanɛ́ gↄ̃̀ↄgↄ̃ↄ, ma ↄzↄ̃̀ ń wɛ̀lɛpiↄzi.
Ma zangudeↄ i vlãnau ma aɛ, an ĩadama aↄ láaa vĩo.
Mí á gwa ń pↄ́wɛn gawideo, mí gbɛ̀ zↄ́'i kpáwá à kã́.
Lua zↄ̃lɛa balu guu, àlɛ yã́gↄ̃gↄ̃ gbãadeↄnɛ à mɛ̀:
Bↄɛ á yã́kpalɛkɛ a zɛ́wai? Áↄ kɛ vãikɛnaↄnɛ kɛ̀kɛ gↄↄpii yã̀?
À yãnakpa yɛ̃̀ɛɛsaideↄwa ń tonɛ pↄ́ gwana vĩoↄ. À zɛ ń taasideↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wàlɛ ĩadamáↄ.
À yɛ̃̀ɛɛsaideↄ ń wɛ̃nadeↄ misi à ń bↄ vãikɛnaↄ ↄzĩ.
Gbãadepiↄ yãe dↄ̃o, aa a kee gbáɛo. Aa ku gusiauɛ, ↄ̃ dṹnia zĩ́na lɛ́ fu.
Ma mɛ̀ luaↄn á ũ, Musude nɛ́ↄn á ũ ápii.
Ń beeo á ga gbɛ̃nazĩna ũɛ, á kpagua lán kía pãleↄwaɛ.
Lua, fɛlɛ yã́kpalɛkɛ ń dṹniao, asa bui píiá n pↄ́ɛ.
Asafa lɛ.
Lua, ńsu ǹyↄ̃ nílɛao, ń lɛ́ su àↄ kpaaũao, ńsu ǹyↄ̃ ku kílikilio, Lua.
Ǹ ń ibɛɛↄ gwa, asa aalɛ kãa, n wɛ̀lɛpiↄ lɛ́ ń mi fu.
Aalɛ ↄ̃nↄsↄpɛ́lɛ n gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ, aalɛ lɛkpaaĩ ń yenzideↄzi.
Aalɛ mɛ: À mↄ wà ń buibↄ, an tↄ́ Isaili su àↄ dↄ gbɛ̃egu lↄo.
Aa lɛkpàaĩ, an lɛ́ kↄ̃sɛ̀, aa lɛdoũkɛ̀ ń kↄ̃o aa fɛlɛnnↄ.
Ɛdↄũↄ ń Isimaɛla buiↄ ń Mↄabuↄ ń Hagaa buiↄ
ń Gebalideↄ ń Amↄniↄ ń Amalɛkiↄ ń Filitɛ̃ↄ ń Tiideↄ.
Baa se Asiliↄ nàmá lↄ, aalɛ ↄda Lↄtu buipiↄwa.
Kɛnɛ́ lá ń kɛ̀ Madiãↄnɛwa, lá ń kɛ̀ Sisela ń Yabɛ̃oɛ Kisↄ̃i.
N ń kɛ́ kɛ́lɛkɛlɛ Ɛndoo, aa gↄ̃̀ kálɛa tↄↄlɛ lán pↄgbↄ̃wa.
Kɛ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄnɛ lá wa kɛ̀ Olebu ń Zeebuoɛwa. Kɛ ń kíaↄnɛ lá wa kɛ̀ Zɛba ń Zalemunaoɛwa.
Ampiↄ mɛ́ ò yãa aa mɛ̀, wà Lua dã́dãkɛkĩi sɛ́ ń pↄ́ ũ.
Ma Lua, to aa gↄ̃ lakɛɛ ũ lán ése ṹa pↄ́ ĩ́ana ì sɛ́lɛwa.
Lá dào ì tɛ́kũ, ge lá tɛ́ ì gbɛ̀sĩsĩ sãsã,
pɛ́lɛńzi ń n zàao màa, n ĩ́an pãsĩ i to sↄ̃ kɛ̃́ńgu.
To an gɛɛ gↄ̃ kpá ń wɛ́i, aai n gbãa dↄ̃ Dii.
Wí líↄ ń kṹ gↄↄpii ń bílio, aa kpɛbↄ aa midɛ,
kɛ́ aa e dↄ̃ kɛ́ n tↄ́n Dii, ḿmɛ ń Musude ũ dṹniau píi.
Kole buiↄ lɛ.
N kúkĩi maa fá, Dii Zĩgↄ̃de!
Málɛ Dii ua bɛɛkɛ e gu gɛ̀ lɛ́ lia, ma nisĩna ń ma mɛo lɛ́ lua Lua bɛ̃́ɛi.
Dii Zĩgↄ̃de, ma Kía, ma Lua, gòlegolena kpɛ́ è ń gbagbakĩi saɛ, luakibãna sakpɛdà we à a nɛ́ↄ kàu.
Báaadeↄn gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú n ua aaìↄ n táasilɛ gↄↄpiiↄ ũ.
Báaadeↄn gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ an gbãa bↄ̀ n kĩ́i mɛ́ n kpɛ́ gɛa yã́ kú ń sↄ̃ guuↄ ũ.
Tó aalɛ pã Baka guzulɛa, aaì to à gↄ̃ lán gu nibↄnadewa, káabuan lou ì to ɛ̀fãai ligua.
An gɛa guu an gbãa ìↄ kã́fĩɛ e aa gɛ kaò n kĩ́i Siↄna.
Dii Lua Zĩgↄ̃de, ma wabikɛa sí, swã́sɛ ma yã́i, Yakↄbu buiↄ Lua.
Lua, kía wá sɛ̀ngbao gwa, wɛ́tɛ kía pↄ́ ń kpài.
Kua n kpɛ́ kpɛɛlɛ gↄↄ do maa dɛ kua gupãlei gↄↄ ↄ̀aa sↄola. Ma Lua ua bĩ́ibↄlɛdↄ̃anakɛ sì dɛ kua ua doũ ń vãikɛnaↄla.
Dii Lua dɛnɛ́ ĩatɛ̃ ń sɛ̀ngbaoo ũ. Dii ì báaadańgu ń kã́fĩao, ìli gí maakɛi tàaesaideɛo.
Dii Zĩgↄ̃de, báaaden gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ n náaikɛ ũ.
Kole buiↄ lɛ.
N báaadà n bùsuu, Dii, n su ń Yakↄbu buiↄ ń pá ziu.
N n gbɛ̃́ↄ tàaeↄ wòlomá, n ń duuna kɛ̃̀má píi.
N pↄ wèemá, n n pↄkũma pãsĩ kpà kpɛ.
Suwanↄ wá pá ziu, Lua wá Suabana, kpɛ̃nɛ pↄ́ ń kɛ̀wanↄ suumpa.
N pↄ aↄ paawázi gↄↄpii yã̀? Ńyↄ̃ↄ n pↄfɛ̃gↄↄ gága wɛ̃ ń wɛ̃o yã̀?
Ńyↄ̃ ɛa ǹ n gbɛ̃́ↄ lɛ́ ń láo kɛ́ an pↄ e kɛma nao lé?
Dii, ǹ n gbɛ̃kɛ ↄlↄwɛ̃ɛ, wá suaba ń n gbãao.
Ma swã́ dↄ Dii Lua yã'oai, asa ì aafia lɛgbɛ̃ a yãmanaↄnɛɛ, tó aai ɛa sù ń mìsaiyãↄwao.
Aà vĩakɛnaↄ suabaa zã̀o, kɛ́ aà gawi e àↄ kú wá bùsuu yã́i.
Gbɛ̃kɛ ń náaio kpàaũ, yã́zɛde ń aafiao dàkↄ̃lɛ.
Náai ì ↄ poo musu, yã́zɛde ì ↄnↄnↄ zĩ́lɛi.
Dii a maakɛwɛ̃ɛ, wá tↄↄlɛ i blɛkɛ.
Yã́zɛde ìↄ bɛ aà aɛ, ì zɛkɛkɛɛ̀.
Dii, swã́kpa ma yã́i, ní wea, asa taaside wɛ̃naden ma ũ.
Ma wɛ̃ni dↄ̃́a, asa má n yã́ↄ kũaɛ. Ǹ n zↄ̀blena suaba, ḿmɛ ń ma Lua ũ, málɛ n náaikɛ.
Sùuukɛmanↄ, Dii, asa miↄ lɛzunzi kↄↄ ń oosioɛ.
Ǹ n zↄ̀blena pↄ kɛ na, asa ma laai tà n kĩ́i, Dii.
Ń maa mɛ́ ń sùuu vĩ, Dii, n gbɛ̃kɛ zↄ̃ↄ n sìsinaↄnɛ.
Dii, swã́kpa ma wabikɛai, laaidↄ ma wɛ̃na wiiwa.
Má lɛzunzi ma taasikɛgↄↄzĩ, asa ni wea.
Tã́ae muaannↄo, Dii, gbɛ̃e lí fↄ̃ n kɛa kɛ̀o.
Bui pↄ́ ń kɛ̀ↄ mↄ́ kúlɛnɛ, aa n tↄbↄ ḿpii.
Asa ń zↄ̃ↄ mɛ́ ni dabudabuↄ kɛ, ḿmɛ ń Lua ũ ndo.
Ǹ n zɛ́ ↄlↄmɛɛ Dii, míↄ bɛ n sĩana guu. Ma sↄ̃ damɛɛ doũ, míↄ n vĩa vĩ.
Má n sáaukpa ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo, Dii ma Lua, máↄ n tↄbↄ gↄↄpiiɛ.
Asa gbɛ̃kɛ pↄ́ ń kɛ̀mɛɛ zↄ̃ↄ, n ma wɛ̃ni sì bɛda ɛ̀ títiwa.
Lua, kàamaideↄ lɛ́ fɛlɛmanↄ, gbɛ̃́ pãsĩↄ lɛ́ ma wɛ, aali n yãdao.
Mpi Dii, Lua sósobiden n ũ, ń sùuu vĩ mɛ́ n pↄ lí pa kpaao, ń gbɛ̃kɛ ń náaio vĩ zↄ̃ↄ.
Ma wɛgwa, wɛ̃nadↄ̃mɛɛ. Ǹ n zↄ̀blena gba gbãa, mapi n nↄɛ zĩkɛna nɛ́ suaba.
Maakɛamɛɛ seela kɛ, ma wɛ̀lɛↄ i e, wí i ń kṹ, asa Dii, n dↄmalɛ, n ma nↄ̀sɛ nìnimɛɛ.
Lua a wɛ̃́lɛ kàlɛ gbɛ̀sĩsĩ pↄ́ a kua adoa musu,
Dii ye Siↄna bĩ́ibↄlɛↄi dɛ Yakↄbu buiↄ wɛ̃́lɛ kĩniↄla píi.
Lua gawi yã'ò wɛ̃́lɛpi musu à mɛ̀:
Má Egipiↄ ń Babɛlideↄ da gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa ma dↄ̃ↄ guu. Filitɛ̃ↄ ku a guu lↄ ń Tiideↄ ń Etiopiↄ. Wa mɛ wà gbɛ̃́ beeↄ ì weɛ.
Wa o Siↄna yã́ musu: Wà wã́anɛ ń wã́anɛo ì weɛ, Musude mɛ́ ì a zɛdↄ gíũgiũ.
Tó Dii lɛ́ gbɛ̃́ↄ tↄ́ dalau, a mɛ: Wà gbɛ̃́ beeↄ ì weɛ.
Lɛ̀sinaↄ ń ↄ̃wãnaↄ píi aa mɛ: Wá maa píi ì bↄ Siↄnaɛ.
Ɛzala bui Emani lɛ.
Dii Lua ma Suabana, málɛ wiilɛma fãanɛ ń gwãasĩnao.
To ma wabikɛa kama, swã́kpa ma wiilɛai.
Asa yã'ↄ̃ma kↄ̃̀ ma nↄ̀sɛuɛ, ma wɛ̃ni sↄ̃̀ ɛ̀ lɛ́i.
Wà ma da gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ si bɛdauↄu, ma gↄ̃ lán yɛ̃̀ɛɛsaidewa.
Wà ma ya ma kpa gɛↄ guu lán gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wúlɛa miau sↄlↄlↄↄwa. An yã́ dↄngu lↄo, aa bↄ̀ n ↄu.
N ma zu ɛ̀ zòolo guu e tↄↄlɛ nↄna gbã́o gusiau.
N pↄkũma tↄ̃̀a, a ísↄ̃ lɛ́ ma lɛ́.
Ń tò ma gbɛ̃́ↄ ma vũaa, ń tò aa ye ma gĩyãio. Wà ma kaka, bↄkĩi kuo.
Ĩadama ma wɛ́ siakũ̀, málɛ lɛzunzi za kↄↄ e oosi, ma ↄↄ dↄanzi.
Gɛↄ ni yãbↄnsaɛkɛnɛ́a? Gyaadeↄ mɛ́ aaì fɛlɛ n sáaukpaa?
Wì n gbɛ̃kɛ galikɛ miau yã̀? Wì n náaiyã'ò kaalɛu yã̀?
Wa n dabudabuↄ dↄ̃ a gusiau yã̀? N maakɛaↄ dↄ̃a ku wɛ́sia guu yã̀?
Dii, mi wiilɛma, ma wabikɛa kↄↄ ì ka n kĩ́i.
Bↄ́yãi ńlɛ gímazii, Dii? Àkɛa n mikpɛlìmɛɛi?
Má kú ga lɛ́zĩ wɛ̃nannↄ za ma ɛ̀waasogↄↄ, n wɛ́tɛ̃amↄanɛ́ tↄ̃̀a, ma gↄ̃ sã̀ii.
N pↄpaamazi mà ma mia, n vĩa pↄ́ↄ lɛ́ ma midɛ.
A daamala lán íwa za kↄↄ e oosi, à kũ̀aaa míↄmiↄ.
Ń tò ma gbɛ̃́ yenzideↄ ma vũaa, gusia mɛ́ gↄ̃̀ ma gbɛ̃na ũ.
Ɛzala bui Etani lɛ.
Dii, máↄ lɛsi n gbɛ̃kɛ yã́ musu láasaiɛ, máↄ n náaiyã kpàwakɛ wɛ̃ ń wɛ̃o.
Má o n gbɛ̃kɛ líↄ kpálɛa vĩo, n náaidekɛ zĩ́napɛlɛa musu n bɛ.
N mɛ̀ n bàa kú ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ń sɛ̀o, n lɛgbɛ̃̀ n zↄ̀blena Davidiɛ.
Ńyↄ̃ to aà bui àↄ kible gↄↄpiiɛ, ńyↄ̃ aà kpala gba gbãa e aà buiwa.
Musudeↄ n dabuyãↄ sáaukpa, Dii, malaikaↄ n náaiyã'ò balu guu.
Asa gbɛ̃e ku musu à kà Diiwao, malaikae muaaaànↄo.
Baa malaikaↄ kã̀aa, Lua mɛ́ fuańla, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ liaaaàziↄ mɛ ì seena ta.
Dii Lua Zĩgↄ̃de, démɛ muaannↄi? Ń gbãa ń náaio vĩ yã́pii guu.
Ni gbãamↄ ísiaɛ, tó à fɛ̀lɛ ń vĩvĩao, ni a zùukɛ.
N Egipiↄ suumpà aa gↄ̃̀ gɛↄ ũ, n n wɛ̀lɛpiↄ fã̀aa ń n gã̀sa gbãao.
Musu ń zĩ́lɛoá n pↄ́ɛ, n dṹnia kàlɛ ń pↄ́ pↄ́ kú a guuↄ.
N gugbãntoo ń gɛↄmidↄkĩio kɛ̀, Taboo ń Ɛɛmↄ gbɛↄ ì guladↄma.
N gã̀saá gↄ̃sa pↄ́ɛ, n ↄ gbãa mɛ́ n ↄplaa dↄ musu.
Yãmaa ń yã́zɛdeo mɛ́ n gĩ́na ɛ̃kpalɛ ũ, gbɛ̃kɛ ń náaio mɛ́ dia n aɛwa.
Báaadeↄn gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa guladↄama dↄ̃, aaìↄ bɛ n aɛ gupuauↄ ũ, Dii.
Aaìↄ pↄnakɛ ń n tↄ́o gↄↄpii, aaì ĩ́anadã ń n maakɛao.
Asa an gawi ń ń gbãaon n ũ, n zɛawanↄ yã́i wá mi daa ía.
Wá sɛ̀ngbaoá Dii pↄ́ɛ, wá kíapiá wá Isailiↄ Lua pↄ́ɛ.
N yã'ò n yãmanaↄnɛ yãa wɛ́pungu'ea guu n mɛ̀: Ma dↄnlɛkɛ̀ nɛgↄ̃naɛ, ma ɛ̀waasopi sɛ̀ lɛsĩ a gbɛ̃́ↄ guu.
Ma a zↄ̀blena Davidi è, ma a nísikàwà ma aà dìlɛ.
Máↄ aà kũa ma ↄzĩɛ, ma gã̀sa gbãa aↄ kuaànↄ.
Ibɛɛ a fↄ̃ falusiwào, gbɛ̃vãi a e ↄnaalɛwào.
Má aà wɛ̀lɛↄ wíwi aà aɛ, má aà zangudeↄ kwɛ́.
Máↄ náai vĩɛ̀ ń gbɛ̃kɛo, aà mi iↄ daa ía ń ma tↄ́o.
Má ísia naɛ̀ a ↄzĩɛ, iↄ iko vĩ swaↄwa.
A lɛzumazi à mɛ, má dɛ a Mae ń a Luao ũ, a gbɛsi ń a Suabanao ũ.
Má aà kɛ ma yoa ũ, iↄ dɛ dṹnia kíaↄ mide ũ.
Máↄ gbɛ̃kɛ vĩaànↄ gↄↄpiiɛ, ma bàa pↄ́ kuaànↄ gbooa vĩo.
Má tó aà bui àↄ kible gↄↄpiiɛ, aà kpala iↄ ku e dṹnia gɛ láaò.
Tó aà buiↄ pãkpà ma ikoyãi, mɛ́ aai tɛ ma yãdilɛaↄzio,
tó aa bↄ̀ ma yã́ kpɛ, mɛ́ aa ma yãdanɛↄ kũao,
má gotↄ̃má an tàaeↄ yã́iɛ, mí ń kɛ búubuu an vãi yã́ musu,
ãma gbɛ̃kɛ pↄ́ má vĩaànↄ a midɛo, má fↄ̃ náaisaiyãkɛo.
Má a bàa pↄ́ kuaànↄ yã́ gbooo, má lɛ́ pↄ́ má gbɛ̃̀ɛ̀ lilɛo.
Ma lɛgbɛ̃̀ ń mazĩa kuao gɛ̃n do, má ɛɛto Davidiɛo, ma mɛ̀,
aà bui aↄ ku gↄↄpiiɛ, aà kpala aↄ ku ma aɛ lán ĩatɛ̃wa.
Lá mↄvua dɛ seela náaide ũ musu, màa aà kpala aↄ ku gↄↄpii.
Ń beeo n gi kía pↄ́ ń kpài, n ↄkpàaàzi, n kolokɛ̀aànↄ.
N n bàa kua ń n zↄ̀blenao yã́ gbòo, n sakà aà kíafuau, ń zù zĩ́lɛ.
N aà wɛ̃́lɛ bĩ́iↄ gbòo, n aà zɛgikĩiↄ kwɛ̀ ń dàaĩ.
Gɛ̃zɛadeↄ lɛ́ ń baa sɛu, à gↄ̃̀ láanipↄ ũ a saɛdeↄnɛ.
Ń tò aà wɛ̀lɛↄ gã gbã̀ɛ, ń tò aà ibɛɛↄ pↄnakɛ̀.
N aà fɛ̃nda lɛ́ dɛ̀, ni zɛaànↄ zĩ guuo.
N aà gawi kↄ'ɛ̀, n aà báa bↄ̀aàla.
Ń tò à zikũ̀ a gbãau, n widàwà.
Dii, ńyↄ̃ↄ ulɛawɛ̃ɛ gↄↄpii yã̀? N pↄkũma tɛ́ aↄ kũ e bↄɛ ni?
Làasookɛ ma wɛ̃ni kulunkɛwa, n gbɛ̃nazĩna kɛ̀ pã yã̀?
Gↄ̃sa kpele mɛ́ aↄ ku à gí gaii? Démɛ a fↄ̃ azĩa si mia ikowai?
Dii, gbɛ̃kɛ pↄ́ ń vĩ yãa gɛ̀ má ni? Lɛ́ pↄ́ ń gbɛ̃̀ Davidiɛ ń náaio sↄ̃ bɛ?
To n zↄ̀blena láanikɛa yã́ dↄngu, buiↄ ma kɛa pↄ́ↄpↄↄ ma sↄ̃ zↄ̃̀.
N ibɛɛↄ kía pↄ́ ń kpà láanikɛ̀, e gu pↄ́ aà kɛ̀sɛ zɛ̀u, Dii.
Wà Dii sáaukpa gↄↄpii! Ãmi! Ãmi!
Dii, wá ulɛkĩin n ũ wɛ̃ ń wɛ̃o.
E ǹyↄ̃ gɛ́ gbɛ̀sĩsĩↄ kɛi, e ǹyↄ̃ gɛ́ tↄↄlɛ ń dṹniao kálɛi, Luan n ũ za asĩnizĩ e gↄↄpii.
Ni dilɛ gbɛ̃nazĩnaɛ aà gɛ̃ tɛ̃́ɛnau, ni to aà ɛa gↄ̃ bùsuti ũ.
Wɛ̃̀ ↄ̀aa sↄo dɛnɛ lán gↄↄ dowa, ì gɛ̃nɛ lán gĩa ge gwãasĩnawa.
Ni to i dańla aai gaga, aa dɛ lán sɛ̃ pↄ́ ì bↄlɛ kↄↄwa,
ì bↄlɛ kↄↄ, i gbã́, ì i'o oosi, i giigaga.
N pↄkũma ì wá suumpa, n kòlokɛa ì gili gɛ̃wágu.
Wá yãvãiↄ kálɛa n aɛ, wá asiiyãↄ bↄ̀ gupuau n kuu.
Wá gↄↄ ì gɛ̃kↄ̃u n kpɛ̃nɛ yã́i, wá wɛ̃ni ì midɛ wá wea dóũdoũnau.
Wá wɛ̃ ì ka bàaↄ̃kwi taawa, tó wá gbãa sↄ̃, basiiↄ̃. Wɛ̃piↄ guu baa a pↄ́ pↄ́ na ì mↄ́ ń taasio ń pↄsiaoɛ, ì gɛ̃zɛa kpakpa, ↄ̃ wi kpagui.
Démɛ n pↄkũma gbãa lɛ́ dↄ̃i? Démɛ n kpɛ̃nɛ lɛ́ dↄ̃ à vĩakɛɛ̀i?
Dadawɛ̃ɛ wàↄ wá wɛ̃ni dↄ̃ màa, kɛ́ wà ↄ̃nↄ e wá sↄ̃ guu.
Dii, ńyↄ̃ ɛa wá wɛgwa bↄɛ ni? Wɛ̃nadↄ̃ n zↄ̀blenaↄnɛ.
Tó gu dↄ̀, to n gbɛ̃kɛ mↄ́wá, wíↄ pↄnakɛ ń gulakɛao gↄↄpii.
Wá gba pↄna ↄ pↄ́ ń tↄ̃̀wá gↄↄ lɛ́u, taasi pↄ́ wá kɛ̀ wɛ̃̀ lɛ́u.
Ǹ n yãkɛaↄ ↄlↄ n zↄ̀blenaↄnɛ, ní tó wá nɛ́ↄ n iko gbãa dↄ̃.
Dii wá Lua, báaadawágu nana, ɛ̀fãaida wá zĩu wàↄ kã́fĩakɛ, ao, ɛ̀fãaida wá zĩu wàↄ kã́fĩakɛ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ulɛa Musude ↄ guu, mɛ́ a ku Gbãapiide uei,
ì mɛ Dii mɛ́ a zɛgikĩi ũ, a Lua mɛ́ a ulɛkĩi ũ, á aà náai vĩ.
A n si kaiwa, a n suaba ń gagyão.
A n sↄlↄ a pↄlɛu, ńyↄ̃ↄ ulɛa aà kúlukulunau. Aà náai mɛ́ aↄ dɛ n sɛ̀ngbao ũ.
Gwãasĩn pↄ́ↄ ń fãanɛ kà kpán'ãaↄ an kee vĩa a n kũo,
ge gagyã pↄ́ ìↄ bɛ gusiau ge gyãkawɛ̃lɛ pↄ́ ì ń le fãanɛ gbãa.
Baa tó gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa sↄo lɛ́ kwɛ́ n saɛ, ge gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ kwi lɛ́ fu n ↄplaai, pↄe a n leo.
Wɛzu ǹ gwa, ńyↄ̃ e lá wì ĩada vãikɛnaↄwa.
Tó n Musude dìlɛ n ulɛkĩi ũ, mɛ́ n Dii dìlɛ n kúkĩi ũ,
vãie a sↄ̃nzio, músi a gɛ̃ n uao.
Asa a n yã'o a malaikaↄnɛ aa n dↄ̃́a gu pↄ́ ńlɛ gɛ́u píiɛ.
Aa ↄdama, kɛ́ ńsu gɛ̃nalɛ gbɛwao yã́i.
Ńyↄ̃ táa'o nↄ̀ↄmusuwa ń kyã́o, ńyↄ̃ ↄ̃zↄ̃ nↄ̀ↄkusiwa ń mlɛ̃̀ pãsĩo.
Dii mɛ̀: Lá à nàmazi, má aà bↄ, lá a ma dↄ̃, má aà sɛ musu.
A lɛzumazi, mí wewà. Tó yã́ nàɛwà, máↄ kuaànↄ, má aà suaba, mí aà kpɛla.
Má báaadaaàgu ń wɛ̃ni gbã̀ao, má aà suaba, i pↄnakɛò.
Kã́mabogↄↄ lɛ.
A maa wà n sáaukpaɛ, Dii, wá lɛsi wà n tↄbↄ, Musude,
wí n gbɛ̃kɛ galikɛ kↄↄ, wí n náaiyã'ò gwã́,
wí n táasilɛ ń mↄↄnao ń domao ń kotilio.

Dii, n yãkɛaↄ zↄ̃ↄ maamaaɛ, n làasooↄ gbia à kɛ̀ zài.
Sↄũ yã́pi dↄ̃o, mìsaide a fↄ̃ mao.
Baa tó gbɛ̃vãiↄ ↄtà lán kàewa, mɛ́ vãikɛnaↄ kã́fĩa è ḿpii, an zia dɛ kaalɛ láasai ũɛ.
Mpi sↄ̃ Dii, ńyↄ̃ↄ kã́fĩa gↄↄpiiɛ.
Ǹ n ibɛɛↄ gwa, aalɛ midɛ, vãikɛnaↄ lɛ́ fãaa píi.
N ma gba gbãa lán zùsɛ̃lɛwa, n nísi ↄde kà ma miwa.

Gbɛ̃maaↄ gbã lán daminaliↄwa, aa zↄ̃ↄkũ lán Libã sɛdɛ líↄwa.
Pɛ́lɛa Dii kpɛ́ kpɛɛlɛ aa gbã wá Lua ua.

Dii, aaì táa'o n gbɛ̃́ↄwa, aaì gbãamↄ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ n ń sɛ́piↄnɛ.

Dii gbɛ̃nazĩna làasooↄ dↄ̃, a dↄ̃ kɛ́ aa yãfũu lán gbɛ́ tíwa.

Mɛ́ i kɛ Dii dↄnlɛkɛ̀mɛɛ yãa no, dↄ̃ má kú miau kílikili gↄ̃̀ↄ.
Kɛ́ ma mɛ̀ zãana lɛ́ ma sɛ́lɛ, n ma kũ n gbɛ̃kɛ guu, Dii.
Kɛ́ ma làasoo kↄ̃̀ ma sↄ̃u, n ma sↄ̃ nìnimɛɛ n ma pↄ kɛ̀na.

Aaì lɛkpaaĩ gbɛ̃maazi, aaì yãda tàaesaidea wà aà dɛ.

ásu swã́gbãakɛ lá á deziↄ kɛ̀ Mɛliba gↄↄ pↄ́ aa ku Masa guwaiwaiuwao.
Baa kɛ́ aa ma yãkɛaↄ è, aa ma yↄ̃ aa ma gbãa lɛgwà.

Má ò ń mazĩao ń pↄfɛ̃o ma mɛ̀, aa gɛ̃ ma kã́mabokĩiuo.

Buipãleↄ diiↄá pↄ́ gianaↄnɛ, Dii mɛ́ musu kɛ̀.
Zↄ̃ↄkɛ ń bɛɛɛo kuwà, gbãa ń gawio ku aà kĩ́iɛ.

À Dii tↄ́ gawi dↄ̃ɛ̀, à mↄ aà ua, í aà gba pↄ́.

í o bui píiɛ, Dii mɛ́ lɛ́ kible. À dṹnia kàlɛ gíũgiũ, a deea vĩo. A yã́kpalɛkɛ ń gbɛ̃́piio a zɛ́wa.
Musudeↄ, à pↄnakɛ, zĩ́lɛdeↄ, à vĩ àↄ kɛ̃aa, ísia ń pↄ́ pↄ́ kúuↄ, à kↄ̃fĩkɛ.
Sɛ̃̀a ń pↄ́ pↄ́ kúuↄ, à kúkuakɛ, lí pↄ́ kú lákpɛuↄ i gulakɛ píi.
Aa pↄnakɛ Dii aɛ, asa àlɛ mↄ́, àlɛ mↄ́ yã́kpalɛkɛi ń dṹniaoɛ. A yã́kpalɛkɛ ń dṹniao a zɛ́wa, a yã́gↄ̃gↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ ń sĩanao.
Dii mɛ́ lɛ́ kible! Dṹnia gbɛ̃́ↄ, à pↄnakɛ, ísiabaadeↄ, àↄ ku pↄna guu.

Tɛ́ ìↄ dↄaaaɛ̀, ì kũ aà ibɛɛ pↄ́ liaaaàziↄwa.

Tó Siↄnadeↄ mà, aa pↄnakɛ, Yuda wɛ̃́lɛdeↄ aaↄ ku pↄna guu n yã́kpalɛkɛaↄ yã́i, Dii.

Gbɛ̃kɛ ń náai pↄ́ a vĩ ń wá Isailiↄ dↄaàgu. E dṹnia lɛ́wa wa è lá wá Lua zĩblè.

ń kã̀aepɛao ń kuu'ↄo, à pↄna wii dↄ Dii wá Kíawa.
Ísia ń pↄ́ pↄ́ kúuↄ, à kↄ̃fĩkɛ, ń tↄↄlɛo ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kuwàↄ píi.
Swaↄ, à gã̀alɛ Dii aɛ. Gbɛ̀sĩsĩↄ, à gulakɛ sãnusãnu,
asa àlɛ mↄ́ yã́kpalɛkɛi tↄↄlɛɛ. A yã́kpalɛkɛ ń dṹniao a zɛ́wa, a yã́gↄ̃gↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ ń sĩanao.
Dii mɛ́ lɛ́ kible, bui píi lɛ́ lualua, a zↄ̃lɛa malaika gã̀sĩadeↄ zãnguo, dṹnia lòo.
Dii zↄ̃ↄ Siↄna, a ku musu, a dɛ bui píila.
Aa aà tↄ́ zↄ̃ↄ pↄ́ ì to vĩa ń kṹ bↄ, asa aà kua adoaɛ.

À Dii wá Lua tↄbↄ, à kúlɛ aà gbadibↄ saɛ, aà kua adoaɛ.
Mↄizi ń Aalonao mɛ́ aà gbàgbanaↄ ũ, Samuɛli mɛ́ aà sìsinaↄ do ũ. Aa lɛzùaàzi, ↄ̃ a wèmá.
Kua tɛlu guu à yã'ònɛ́, aa aà ikoyã ń aà yãdilɛnɛↄ kũa.
Dii wá Lua, ń wèmá, Lua sùuuden n ũ. Ń beeo n ń yãvãiↄ wìnɛ́ ń musu.

Dṹnia gbɛ̃́pii, à kúkuakɛ Diiɛ.
À zↄble Diiɛ ń pↄnao, à mↄ aà kĩ́i ń gulakɛao.
Àↄ dↄ̃ kɛ́ Dii mɛ́ Lua ũ, ↄ̃mɛ wá kɛ́, wá dɛ aà pↄ́ ũɛ. Wá dɛ aà gbɛ̃́ↄ ũ, aà kpàsa sãↄ ũ.
À gɛ̃ aà ua lɛ́u ń sáaukpaao, à gɛ̃ aà ua ń aà táasilɛao, à aà sáau kpa à aà tↄbↄ.
Asa Dii maa, aà gbɛ̃kɛ láaa vĩo, ìↄ náai vĩ gↄↄpiiɛ.
Má lɛsi gbɛ̃kɛ ń yã́zɛdeo musu, má soũ dannↄ, Dii.
Má laaidↄ kua tàaesaiwa, bↄɛ ńyↄ̃ mↄai? Máↄ ku ma ua ń nↄ̀sɛpuao,
má pↄvãi dↄ ma wɛ́io. Má za yãdↄↄsaikɛau, a naao.
Má yãdↄↄsai fↄ̃o, ma bàa aↄ kú ń yãvãioo.
Má gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì a gbɛ̃́dee pe suumpaɛ, má yↄ̃̀ↄdeↄ ń ĩ́andãnaↄ fↄ̃o.
Ma wɛ́ dↄ ma bùsu náaideↄzi aaↄ kumanↄ, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ìↄ bɛ tàaesai mɛ́ aↄ dɛ ma zĩkɛna ũ.
Má we gbɛ̃sãsãna àↄ ku ma bɛo, má tó mↄafilide àↄ ku ma saɛo.
Máↄ a bùsu gbɛ̃vãiↄ suumpa lá gu lɛ́ dↄ, máↄ vãikɛnaↄ midɛ Dii wɛ̃́lɛ guuɛ.
Wɛ̃nade yɛ̃̀ɛɛsaide pↄ́ lɛ́ a yã'ↄ̃maↄ bↄlɛ Diiɛ wabikɛa.
Dii, ma wabikɛa ma, to ma wiilɛama ká.
Ńsu bↄ ma kpɛ ma taasikɛgↄↄo, swã́kpamazi. Tó ma lɛzùnzi, wea kpakpa,
asa ma gↄↄ lɛ́ gɛ̃ lán súɛlɛwaɛ, ma mɛ lɛ́ pusu bↄ lán tɛyↄ̃wa.
Ma sↄ̃ lɛ́ wo, málɛ ibaba lán sɛ̃wa, blɛblea yã́ lí dↄmagu mà bleo.
Ma aaukɛa mɛ́ tò ma gↄ̃ wákambaau ũ.
Ma gↄ̃ lán gbáa gbaonawa, lán bɛzia koowa.
I lí gɛ̃ ma wɛ́uo lán bã mɛ̀ndona pↄ́ pɛ́ kpɛ́ musuwa.
Ma ibɛɛↄ ìↄ ma sↄ̃sↄ̃ gↄↄpiiɛ, ma láanikɛnaↄ ì gbɛ̃́ ká ń ma tↄ́o.
Túfu mi ble blɛ ũ, ma wɛ́'i ì ka ma imia guu
n pↄkũma ń n kpɛ̃nɛo yã́i, asa n ma sɛ n ma pãlɛɛ.
Ma wɛ̃ni lɛ́ gɛ̃zɛa lán uenawa, ↄ̃ málɛ giigaga lán sɛ̃wa.
Mpi Dii, ń zↄ̃lɛa báawa gↄↄpii, ńyↄ̃ↄ dɛ tↄde ũɛ e wá buiwa.
Ńyↄ̃ fɛlɛ wɛ̃nadↄ̃ Siↄnaɛ, asa n sùuukɛaaànↄ gↄↄ kà sa.
Aà gbɛↄ kɛ̀ n zↄ̀blenaↄnɛ maa, aà daaĩa ìↄ kɛwɛ̃ɛ wɛ̃naɛ.
Bui píi a vĩakɛnɛ, Dii, dṹnia kíaↄ gawi dↄ̃nɛ ḿpii.
Asa Dii a ɛa Siↄna kálɛ lↄ, i bↄ mↄ́má we ń gawio.
A gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ yↄ́ↄyↄↄↄ wabikɛa sí, a ń wiilɛawa kpa swã́ao.
Wa yã́pi kɛ̃ ziadeↄ yã́iɛ, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kuopiↄ i Dii táasilɛ.
Dii wɛkpàlɛ zĩ́lɛ za a kúkĩi, kua za musu à wɛzù tↄↄlɛ,
kɛ́ à e gbɛ̃́ↄ zↄblewii ma, i ń bↄ ga lɛ́zĩ yã́i,
wi Dii tↄbↄ Siↄna, wi aà táasilɛ Yelusalɛũ.
Gↄↄ bee bùsu píi gbɛ̃́ↄ kãaa we, bùsu píi gbɛ̃́ↄ mↄ misiilɛiɛ̀.
Kua ma sápaagↄↄ à ma busa, à ma wɛ̃ni kulun kṹ.
Ɔ̃ ma mɛ̀: Ma Lua, ńsu ma sɛ kpóoo, n gbɛ̃́ bee, n wɛ̃ni láaa vĩo.
N tↄↄlɛ kàlɛ za asĩnizĩ, musuá n ↄzĩkɛaɛ.
Ampii a gɛ̃, ãma ńyↄ̃ↄ kuɛ. Aa zikũ lán pↄkasawa píiɛ, ńyↄ̃ ń lilɛ lán ulawa aa gɛ̃lɛ.

Ì ma bↄ ga lɛ́zĩ, ì maakɛmɛɛ a gbɛ̃kɛ guu.
Ì to pↄmaaↄ mↄa, mí ɛa su ɛ̀waaso ũ lán kúuwa.
Dii ì yãkɛ a zɛ́wa, ì to yã́ bↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wàlɛ gbãamↄnɛ́ↄnɛ na.
A tò Mↄizi a pↄeã dↄ̃̀, à a yãkɛaↄ ↄ̀lↄ Isailiↄnɛ.
Dii sùuu vĩ ń sósobio, aà pↄ́ lí pa kpaao, a gbɛ̃kɛ vĩ maamaaɛ.
Ìliↄ zↄadↄmá láasaio, aà pↄ líↄ fɛ̃a gↄↄpiio.
Ìli yãkɛwɛ̃ɛ wá duunawao, ìli ĩadawá wá vãikɛawao.
Lá luabɛ lɛsĩ dɛ ń tↄↄlɛo, màa a gbɛ̃kɛ vĩ zↄ̃ↄ ń a vĩakɛnaↄ.
Lá gukpɛ zã̀ kↄ̃ɛ ń bɛ'aɛo, màa ì wá tàaeↄ kɛ̃́wá.
Lá mae ì a nɛ́ↄ wɛ̃nagwa, màa Dii ì wɛ̃nadↄ̃ a vĩakɛnaↄnɛ,
asa a wá kɛbↄ dↄ̃, wá dɛa bùsuti ũ dↄaàgu.
Gbɛ̃nazĩna wɛ̃ni dɛ lán sɛ̃waɛ, ìↄ gawi vĩ gↄↄpla lán lávuwaɛ.
Tó ĩ́anapɛ̀wà, ì gɛ̃lɛɛ, a kúkĩi líↄ dↄ gbɛ̃egu lↄo.
Dii ìↄ gbɛ̃kɛ vĩ ń a vĩakɛnaↄ za asĩnizĩ e gↄↄpii, ì maakɛ ń nɛ́ↄnɛ ń ń tↄũnaↄ,
gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ zɛ̀ ń aà bàakuańnↄ yã́o aa yã́ pↄ́ a dìlɛↄ kũaↄ.
Dii a kpalabaa kpàlɛ musu, a iko vĩ gbɛ̃́piiwa.
À Dii sáaukpa aà malaikaↄ, ikode pↄ́ i aà yã'onɛ ma à zĩkɛwàↄ.

Má Dii sáaukpa. Dii ma Lua, ń zↄ̃ↄ maamaaɛ, ń gawi daa pↄkasa ũ, àlɛ tɛkɛ,
gupua fĩfĩama zwãa ũ. N musu kpàlɛ lán pɛwa,
n bɛkpà lousisiaa. N luabɛpuana kɛ̀ ń sↄ̃́go ũ, niↄ bɛ ń ĩ́anao.
Ni ĩ́ana gbaɛ n zĩnaↄ ũ, ni tɛ́ zĩ n zĩkɛnaↄ ũ.
N dṹnia kàlɛ, n a zĩ́napɛ̀lɛ, a deea vĩ bauo.
N ísia lɛ̀aàla pↄkasa ũ, í kù gbɛ̀sĩsĩↄla.
N ípi lèle ↄ̃ à bàasi, n pũnawà ↄ̃ gili gɛ̃̀u.
Gbɛ̀sĩsĩↄ lɛsĩ kũ̀, gusalalaↄ ɛɛnkũ, ↄ̃ í tà gu pↄ́ ń dìlɛɛ̀u.
N kↄↄ dà ípiɛ, a e vĩao, a e ɛa da tↄↄlɛa bau lↄo.
Ń tò nibↄnaↄ ì í pisi swa'ↄnaↄu, ↄ̃ a í ìↄ bàalɛ gbɛ̀sĩsĩↄ zãnguo.
Sɛ̃̀a pↄ́pii ìↄ a imi, a í ì sɛ̃̀a zàa'ĩnaↄ imi bↄ.
Bãↄ ìↄ ka swapiↄ saɛ, aaìↄ pɛa a dào guu, an wii ìↄ dↄu.
Za n bɛ ni lou gbaɛ gbɛ̀sĩsĩↄwa, n zĩ gbɛ ì dṹnia kã́.
Ni to sɛ̃ bↄlɛ pↄtuoↄnɛ, ni blɛ bui kpa sɛ̃̀wanaↄwa. Ni blɛ bↄlɛ tↄↄlɛ, aai ble.
Vɛ̃ɛ pↄ́ ì ń pↄ kɛ na ń nísi pↄ́ ì ń lɛkpɛ yↄo ń blɛ pↄ́ ì ń gba gbãao.
Dii líↄ ì mↄ̀sɛ e maamaa, sɛdɛ lí pↄ́ a bà Libãpiↄ.
We bãↄ ì sakpɛdadau, wàalianaↄ ì bɛkpa pɛ̃li láu.
Gbɛ̀sĩsĩ lɛsĩↄ dɛ tueↄ kúkĩi ũ, gbɛtↄↄↄ dɛ ɛ̃́n'ui'uinaↄ ulɛkĩi ũ.
N mↄvua kɛ̀ gↄↄ tàasikabↄ ũ ń ĩatɛ̃ pↄ́ a gɛ̃a kpɛ́u gↄↄ dↄ̃o.
Ni to gu si, ↄ̃ gwãasĩna ì kɛ, ↄ̃ lákpɛ pↄ́ↄ ì fɛlɛ ń táo píi.
Nↄ̀ↄmusuↄ ì ↄ́ↄlↄ maafɛi, aaì pↄblea wɛɛlɛ Luawa.
Tó ĩatɛ̃ bìlɛ, aaì lↄ̀ↄ gá, aaì ta wúlɛi ń tòou.
Gbɛ̃nazĩna ì bↄ gɛ́ zĩkɛi, ìↄ yãma azĩawa e oosi.
Dii, n yãkɛaↄ dasi fá! Apii bↄ̀ n ↄ̃nↄ guuɛ. Dṹnia pà ń pↄ́ pↄ́ ń kɛ̀ↄ.
Ísia ku, a zↄ̃ↄ mɛ́ a yàasa, pↄ́ bɛ̃́ɛ pↄ́ kú a guuↄ lɛ́ vĩo, a nɛ́na a zↄ̃ↄ píi.
Gó'ilɛnaↄ ìↄ bɛu ń kwãsa pↄ́ ń kɛ̀ à kↄ̃̀ↄ'ouo.
Pↄ́piↄ wɛ́ dↄnzi ḿpii, kɛ́ ǹ blɛ kpámá a gↄↄwa.
Ni kpámá, aaì sɛ́lɛ, ni ↄ poonɛ́ ↄ̃ pↄmaaↄ ì ń kã́.
Tó n mikpɛlìnɛ́, bíli ì ń kũɛ, tó n wɛ̃ni sìmá, aaì ga aa ɛa ta tɛ̃́ɛnauɛ.
Tó n n Nisĩna gbàɛ, pↄ́ bɛ̃́ɛↄ ì bↄ, ni to tↄↄlɛ ɛa dafukũ.
Dii gawipi aↄ ku gↄↄpiiɛ, Dii pↄ i kɛ na a yãkɛaↄwa.
Ì dṹnia gwa ↄ̃ dṹnia ì lua, ì ↄkã gbɛ̀sĩsĩↄwa ↄ̃ súɛlɛ ì bↄ.

À ĩ́anadã ń Dii tↄ́ pↄ́ kú adoao. Á Dii kĩ́i wɛ̀ɛlɛnaↄ à pↄnakɛ,
à gɛ Dii le à gbãa gbɛawà, íↄ aà aɛya gↄↄpii.
À to yãbↄnsaɛ pↄ́ a kɛ̀ↄ dↄágu, aà dabudabukɛaↄ ń ikoyã pↄ́ a òↄ,
á Dii zↄ̀blena Ablahaũ buiↄ, á Yakↄbu bui pↄ́ à á sɛ́ↄ.
Dii mɛ́ wá Lua ũ, ↄ̃mɛ ì yãdilɛ gbɛ̃́piiɛ.
Aà bàakuawanↄ yã́ lí sãaaguo, yã́ pↄ́ a òpi aↄ kuɛ e wá buiwa.
Aà bàa kú ń Ablahaũo, à ɛ̀a à a lɛgbɛ̃̀ Izaakiɛ lↄ.
Aà bàa ɛ̀a kú ń Yakↄbuo iko ũ, ↄ̃ a kú ń Isailiↄ e gↄↄpii.
À mɛ̀ á Kanaa bùsu kpámá, aↄ dɛ pↄ́ pↄ́ aa sɛ kpaalɛ guu ũ.

aasu ↄkã gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a ń sɛ́piↄwao, aasu ĩada a ãnabipiↄwao.

Ɔ̃ à Yosɛfu gbàɛ à dↄ̀aanɛ́, wà aà yìa zↄ ũ.

À a zↄ̀blena Mↄizi zĩ̀má ń Aalona pↄ́ a sɛ̀o.

À yã'ò ↄ̃ kwaↄ kàńgu, kwasutɛ̃ↄ kà, aa lɛ́ vĩo.

Aa wabikɛ̀wà, ↄ̃ à mↄ̀nɛ́ ń bùuↄ, à musu blɛ kpàmá aa kã̀.
À gbɛsi pàa, ↄ̃ í bↄ̀u, ípi bàalɛ̀ guwaiwaiu we lán swawa.
Asa lɛ́ pↄ́ a gbɛ̃̀ yã́ dↄaàguɛ, yã́ pↄ́ a ò a zↄ̀blena Ablahaũɛpi.

Démɛ a fↄ̃ Dii yãzↄ̃ↄkɛaↄ oi? Démɛ a fↄ̃ à aà táasilɛ píii?
Báaadeↄn gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaìↄ yãmaa kũa aaìↄ yãkɛ a zɛ́wa gↄↄpiiↄ ũ.
Tó ńlɛ na kɛ n gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ, ma yã́ aↄ dↄngu, Dii. Tó ńlɛ ń suaba, ma wɛgwa,
kɛ́ ma baa e àↄ ku n gbɛ̃́ↄ namau, mí pↄnakɛ ń bui pↄ́ ń sɛ̀ↄ, mí ń táasilɛ n gbɛ̃́piↄ guu.
Wa duunakɛ̀ lán wá deziↄwa, wa tàaekɛ̀ wa yãvãikɛ̀.
Kɛ́ wá deziↄ ku Egipi, aai Dii dabudabukɛaↄ yãdao, yãmaa dasi pↄ́ a kɛ̀nɛ́ↄ sã̀ńguɛ, ↄ̃ aa swã́gbãakɛ̀ Ísia Tɛ̃a saɛ.
Ń beeo à ń suabà a tↄ́ yã́i, kɛ́ wà e a gbãa dↄ̃.
À gbãamↄ̀ Ísia Tɛ̃aɛ ↄ̃ gugii bↄ̀, à sìńnↄ a ɛu, aa bùawà guwaiwai ũ.
À ń bↄ́ ń ibɛɛↄ ↄzĩ, à ń sí ń zangudeↄ gbãawa.
Í dà ń wɛ̀lɛpiↄla, baa an gbɛ̃́ mɛ̀ndo i bↄo.
Ɔ̃ aa yã́ pↄ́ a ò sì, aa aà táasilɛ̀.
Ɔ̃ aà yãkɛaↄ sã̀ńgu gↄ̃̀ↄ, aai aà dã aà lɛdamáo.
Aalɛ ń pↄblea bɛɛkɛ guwaiwaiu, ↄ̃ aa Dii lɛwɛ sɛ̃gbãu we.
À pↄ́ pↄ́ aa gbɛ̀awa kpàmá, ↄ̃ à mɛ'ibabagyã zĩ̀má.
Aa ĩ́isɛ̀ ń Mↄizio bòou ń Aalona pↄ́ Dii aà dìlɛo.
Tↄↄlɛ wɛ̃̀aa à Datani mↄ̀, à kũ̀aa Abilaũ ń a gbɛ̃́ↄwa.
Tɛ́ sù an ìwaↄwa, tɛ́vua kùlɛ gbɛ̃vãipiↄwa.
Aa mↄ pì Olebu lán gáaenawa, ↄ̃ aa kùlɛ ń dii pↄ́ aa kàsapiɛ.
Aa Lua gawide lɛũkpakɛ̀ ń zù sɛ̃̀sona taao.
Lua ń suabà ↄ̃ aà yã́ sã̀ńgu. À yãzↄ̃ↄkɛ̀nɛ́ Egipi,
à dabudabuↄ kɛ̀ Haũ buiↄ bùsuu, à yã́ pↄ́ ì to vĩa ń kṹ kɛ̀ Ísia Tɛ̃ai.
À mɛ̀ á a gbɛ̃́piↄ midɛ, ↄ̃ aà gbɛ̃́ Mↄizi aà zùukɛ̀, a tò aà pↄ wèe, ↄ̃ i ń midɛo.
Aa pãkpà ń pↄeã bùsui, aa gì Dii yã́ síi.
Aa yã́kũtɛ̃kà ń zwã̀akpɛↄ guu, aai swã́sɛ Dii yã́io.
Ɔ̃ à ↄlɛ̀lɛnɛ́ à mɛ̀ á tó aa kwɛ guwaiwaiuɛ,
á tó an buiↄ lɛ́lɛ buiↄ guu, í ń fãaa bùsu ń bùsuo.
Aa nà tã́a Peoowa, aa pↄ́ pↄ́ wà sa'òò pↄgɛↄwa sò.
An yãkɛaↄ Dii pↄ fɛ̃̀, ↄ̃ gaga gɛ̃̀ńgu.
Finɛasi fɛ̀lɛ yã́pi tɛdɛ̀, ↄ̃ gagapi zɛ̀nɛ́.
Ɔ̃ Dii tò yã́ bↄ̀aànↄ na, aà bàa kuaànↄ e aà buiwa.
Aa Dii zafɛ̃̀ Mɛliba í kĩ́i, ↄ̃ Mↄizi yã'ì azĩaɛ an yã́i.
Asa aa aà nↄ̀sɛ ↄ̃̀ↄkpàɛ̀ɛ, ↄ̃ à yã'ò làasoosai.
Aai bùsupideↄ kɛ kɛ́lɛkɛlɛ, lá Dii dìlɛnɛ́wao.
Aa gↄ̃̀ kↄ̃gbɛ̃ↄ ũ ń buipiↄ, aa ń ↄlɛsɛ̀.
Aa zↄblè ń diiↄnɛ, ↄ̃ yã́pi ń sↄ̃ blè.
Aa ń nɛgↄ̃ɛnaↄ dɛ̀dɛ sa'obↄ ũ, aa sa'ò tã́aↄwa ń ń nɛnↄɛnaↄ.
Aa yãesaideↄ kòlokpakpa, an nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ ń ń nɛnↄɛpiↄ. Aa sa'òńnↄ Kanaa bùsu tã́aↄwa, ↄ̃ an bùsupi gbãlɛ̀.
An yãkɛaↄ mɛ́ tò aa gbãlɛ̀, an dàaↄ tò aa gↄ̃̀ Luaɛ káaluaↄ ũ.
Ɔ̃ Dii pↄkũmabↄ̀bↄmá, a ye gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a ń sɛ́piↄ gĩyãi lↄo.
À ń kpá buiↄwa, an zangudepiↄ ikokɛ̀má.
An ibɛɛↄ wɛ́tɛ̃amↄ̀nɛ́, aa ↄtↄ̃̀ↄlɛmá.
Ìↄ ń bↄ mↄ̀ↄmↄↄ, ãma aa zɛ̀ ń ń swã́gbãaoɛ, ↄ̃ an duuna dàńla.
Tó à ń wii mà, ì taasi dↄ̃nɛ́ɛ.
Aà bàakuańnↄ yã́ i sãaàguo, ↄ̃ à nↄ̀sɛlìlɛ a gbɛ̃kɛ zↄ̃ↄ guu.
A tò gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa ń kũkũ zĩ̀zↄↄ ũↄ wɛ̃nadↄ̃̀nɛ́.
Dii wá Lua, wá suaba! Wá bↄlɛ buiↄ guu, ní wá kãaa, wí n tↄ́ pↄ́ kú adoa bↄ, wí ĩ́anadã ń n táasilɛao.
Wà Dii, Isailiↄ Lua sáaukpa za asĩnizĩ e gↄↄpii! Gbɛ̃́pii mɛ, ãmi! Àleluya!
À Dii sáaukpa, asa a maa, aà gbɛ̃kɛ láaa vĩo.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Dii ń bóↄ o màa, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ à ń bↄ́ ń ibɛɛↄ ↄzĩↄ.
À ń bↄ́ bùsu ń bùsuo à ń kãaa za gukpɛ oi ń bɛ'aɛ oio, za gugbãntoo oi ń gɛↄmidↄkĩi oio.
An gbɛ̃eↄ bɛ sã́sãa guwaiwaiu ń sɛ̃gbão, aai wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ aa zↄ̃lɛu zɛ́ dↄ̃o.
Nↄana ń imio lɛ́ ń dɛ, an wɛ̃ni gↄ̃̀ lɛɛnnↄ.
Ɔ̃ aa wiilɛ̀ Diizi ń taasikɛau, ↄ̃ à ń bↄ́ ń wɛ́tɛ̃a guu.
À ń dá zɛ́ súsuwa, ↄ̃ aa kà wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ aa zↄ̃lɛu.
Aa Dii sáaukpa aà gbɛ̃kɛ yã́i ń yãbↄnsaɛ pↄ́ ì kɛnɛ́o.
Asa ì imidɛnaↄ kòlo níninɛ́, ì pↄmaa kpa nↄandɛnaↄwa aa kã́.
An gbɛ̃eↄ ku gusiau ga lɛ́zĩ, aalɛ taasikɛ yea ń mↄdaonao.
Asa aa gì Lua yãmai, aa sakà Musude lɛdamauɛ.
A tò wà ń busa ń zĩ gbãao, aalɛ lɛ́ gálɛ, gbɛ̃e ku à dↄńlɛo.
Ɔ̃ aa wiilɛ̀ Diizi ń taasikɛa guu, ↄ̃ à ń bↄ́ ń wɛ́tɛ̃api guu.
À ń bↄ́ gusiau ń gao lɛ́zĩ, à ń mↄdaonapiↄ kɛ̃̀kɛ̃má.
Aa Dii sáaukpa aà gbɛ̃kɛ yã́i, ń yãbↄnsaɛ pↄ́ ì kɛnɛ́o.
Asa ì bĩ́ibↄlɛ gba pↄ́ wa pì ń mↄgotɛ̃o gbooɛ, ì mↄsi gbãa zɛ́kakabↄↄ ɛ́'ɛ.
An gbɛ̃eↄ lìaa ń swã́gbãa yã́i, aa gↄ̃̀ suuunnↄ ń tàaeↄ yã́i.
Aa ye pↄblea gĩyãio, aa kà gaa.
Ɔ̃ aa wiilɛ̀ Diizi ń taasikɛau, ↄ̃ à ń bↄ́ ń wɛ́tɛ̃api guu.
Aà lɛ́kpãsã ń gbãgbã, à ń sí mia'ɛwa.
Aa Dii sáaukpa aà gbɛ̃kɛ yã́i, ń yãbↄnsaɛ pↄ́ ì kɛnɛ́o.
Aa sáaukpa sa'owa, aai aà yãkɛaↄ galikɛ ń gulakɛao.
An gbɛ̃eↄ gɛ̃̀ gó'ilɛnaↄu, aa dàzɛu ísiaa, aaìↄ bɛ í zↄ̃ↄpia aaↄ gɛ́ laatai.
Gbɛ̃́piↄ Dii yãkɛaↄ è, ń yãbↄnsaɛ pↄ́ ì kɛ í guoↄ.
À yã'ò ↄ̃ zàa'ĩan gbãa kàka, ísia fɛ̀lɛ ń bútɛ̃mbaao.
Aa gɛ̀ musu aa sù zĩ́lɛ, kua kaipi lɛ́zĩ sↄ̃ kɛ̃̀ńgu.
Aa dèedee, aa tàlaatalaabò lán wɛ̃dɛnawa, an ílɛ'ↄ̃nↄ mìdɛ.
Aa wiilɛ̀ Diizi ń taasikɛau, ↄ̃ à ń bↄ́ ń wɛ́tɛ̃api guu.
À ĩ́an gbãa zɛ̀ à gↄ̃̀ ĩ́an fɛɛɛna ũ, à í zùukɛ̀ à kɛ̀ kílikili.
Kɛ́ gu nìni gↄ̃̀ↄ, an pↄ kɛ̀na, ↄ̃ à gɛ̀ńnↄ godↄkĩi pↄ́ aalɛ yáu.
Aa Dii sáaukpa aà gbɛ̃kɛ yã́i, ń yãbↄnsaɛ pↄ́ ì kɛnɛ́o.
Aa aà tↄbↄ balu guu, aa aà táasilɛ dↄaanaↄ kãaa guu.
À swaↄ zↄ̃̀ɛ à gↄ̃̀ gugii ũ, a tò nibↄnaↄ gↄ̃̀ tↄↄlɛ inidɛnaↄ ũ.
À tↄↄlɛ báaade lìlɛ gu wiside ũ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ zↄ̃lɛuↄ vãi yã́i.
À guwaiwai lìlɛ dã̀na ũ, a tò gugii gↄ̃̀ nibↄna ũ.
À nↄandɛnaↄ dìlɛ we, ↄ̃ aa wɛ̃́lɛ kàlɛ aa zↄ̃̀lɛu.
Aa buapↄ́ↄ tↄ̃̀ aa vɛ̃ɛliↄ bà, ↄ̃ à nɛ'ìnɛ́ maamaa.
À báaadàńgu, ↄ̃ aa dasikũ̀ à kɛ̀ zài, i to an pↄtuoↄ làoo.
Ɔ̃ à ń láo lↄ, aa gↄ̃̀ yↄↄnnↄ gbãamↄanɛ́ ń músio ń pↄsiao yã́i.
Lua ì saikɛ kpalablenaↄwa, ì to aa liaaliaa gugii pↄ́ zɛvĩo guu.
Ì wɛ̃nadeↄ bↄ taasiu à ń sɛ́ lɛsĩ, ì to an uadeↄ dasikũ.
Tó gbɛ̃maaↄ è, aaì pↄnakɛ, gbɛ̃vãiↄ sↄ̃ aaì ń lɛ́ kpaaũ.
Nↄ̀sɛde laaidↄ yã́piↄwa, i Dii gbɛ̃kɛ gwa lá a dɛ.
Davidi lɛ.
Ma sↄ̃ dilɛa, Lua, má lɛsi mà ń táasilɛ ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo.
Ma mↄↄna ń ma domao, vu! Mí gbãakpa gudↄazi.
Dii, má ń sáaukpa buiↄ guu, má ń táasilɛ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ.
Asa n gbɛ̃kɛ zↄ̃ↄ zↄ̃̀maɛ, mɛ́ n náai zↄ̃̀ luabɛpuanawa.
Lua, tↄbↄ e à zↄ̃ma, to n gawi li dṹniaa píi.
Wea, wá suaba ń n gã̀sa gbãao, kɛ́ wápiↄ n gbɛ̃́ yenzideↄ e bↄ.
Lua yã'ò za a kúkĩi à mɛ̀: Má Sikɛũ kpaalɛ ń tidↄanlaoɛ, mí Suko guzulɛ kpámá.
Galada bùsuá ma pↄ́ɛ, Manase buiↄ bùsuá ma pↄ́ɛ, Ɛflaiũ buiↄ bùsuá ma mↄ̀ fùaɛ, Yuda bùsuá ma lípanaɛ.
Mↄabuↄ bùsuá ma zion zu'obↄɛ, mi a kyale kálɛ Ɛdↄũↄ bùsuwa, mi kúkua dↄ Filitɛ̃ↄ bùsuwa.
Démɛ a gɛ̃manↄ wɛ̃́lɛ bĩ́ideui? Démɛ a dↄaamɛɛ e Ɛdↄũↄ bùsuui?
Lua, mɛ́ i kɛ n gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ n wá vũaa nili bↄ ń wá zĩgↄ̃ↄ lↄo bàasio.
Ɔdawá wá ibɛɛↄ yã́i, asa gbɛ̃nazĩna gbɛ̃suabaaá pãɛ.
Wá zĩble ń Lua gbãao, ↄ̃mɛ a ↄ̃zↄ̃ wá ibɛɛↄwa.
Lua, ḿmɛ mi n táasilɛ, ńsu ǹyↄ̃ nílɛao.
Asa gbɛ̃vãi bↄnkpɛdeↄ ì ma yaa, aaì lɛkↄↄlɛkamazi ń ɛɛo.
Aaì liamazi ń yã́'ĩio, aaì sòlekɛmanↄ pↄewiwinɛsai.
Aaì ma yeańzi fĩabomɛɛ ń yãdↄmao, mapi sↄ̃ miↄ wabikɛma.
Aaì maa fĩabomɛɛ ń vãio, ma yeańzi sↄ̃ ń zaamaguo.
Gbɛ̃vãi sóikɛ ń dↄaanawa, ǹ aà na gudɛnaɛ a ↄzĩ.
To yã́kpalɛ bↄaànↄ vãi, to aà wabikɛa yã'iɛ̀.
Aà wɛ̃ni su àↄ gbã̀ao, gbɛ̃pãle i zↄ̃lɛ aà gbɛu.
Aà nɛ́ↄ gↄ̃ desai, aà na i gↄ̃ gyaa ũ.
Aà nɛ́ↄ gↄ̃ lìaanaↄ ũ aaↄ baakɛ, aaↄ pↄ́ wɛɛlɛwɛɛlɛ pↄ́kↄlɛkĩi.
Aà fĩade aà pↄ́ↄ naaa píi, buipãleↄ aà zĩ ài siwà.
Gbɛ̃e su gbɛ̃kɛkɛɛ̀o, wasu wɛ̃nadↄ̃ aà nɛ́ pↄ́ a tòↄnɛo.
Aà buiↄ midɛ, an tↄ́ ga gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ fɛlɛↄ guu.
Aà deziↄ vãikɛa yã́ dↄngu, Dii, ńsu ǹ aà da duuna kɛ̃wà bauo.
An duuna aↄ dↄngu gↄↄpii, Dii, an yã́ i sã gbɛ̃́ↄgu dṹniau,
kɛ́ ìli làasookɛ gbɛ̃kɛwao yã́i, ì ĩada taasideↄ ń wɛ̃nadeↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ an kã́ gàↄwa e aa ga.
A ye savãi'oa gbɛ̃́ɛi, to à wi aà musu. Sa maa oa gbɛ̃́ɛ lí kaaàguo, a kɛ báaa vĩ sↄ̃o.
À lɛkɛanɛ́ ula dà, à gɛ̃̀ aà nↄ̀sɛu lán íwa, à tàalɛaàgu lán nísiwa.
Àↄ fĩwà gↄↄpii zwãa ũɛ, iↄ dↄ aàpi asana ũ.
Dii fĩabo ma yãdↄmadeↄnɛ màa ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaì vãi o ma musuↄ.
Dii Gbãapiide, ma wɛgwa n tↄ́ yã́i, ma bↄ n maa ń n gbɛ̃kɛo yã́i.
Asa taaside wɛ̃naden ma ũ, ma pↄ yà dúuduu.
Málɛ sãalɛ lán oosi uenawa, málɛ gɛ̃zɛa lán ĩ́ana kwasɛawa.
Lɛye tò ma gbá lɛ́ sɛ́ lↄo, ma fɛ̃fɛ̃ e ma gↄ̃ wákambaau ũ.
Ma gↄ̃nɛ́ pↄ́sↄ̃sↄ̃a ũ, aaì ma gwa aa mikɛ déũdeũ.
Dↄmalɛ Dii ma Lua, ma suaba n gbɛ̃kɛ yã́i,
aai dↄ̃ kɛ́ n ↄdàa, kɛ́ ḿmɛ ń kɛ̀mɛɛ, Dii.
Tó aa ma ka, ńyↄ̃ báaadamagu, tó aa fɛ̀lɛmanↄ, wí a ń kṹ, mapi n zↄ̀blena mí pↄnakɛ.
Tↄ́ ĩ́i a gↄ̃ ma yãdↄmadeↄnɛ ula ũ, aa wida ńzĩawa lán gomusuwa.
Má Dii sáaukpa ń lↄↄ gbãao, má aà táasilɛ balu guu.
Asa ì zɛ ń wɛ̃nadeↄɛ, ì ń sí gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ yãdańlaↄwa.
Dii ò ma diiɛ aà zↄ̃lɛ a ↄplaai e aà aà ibɛɛↄ kɛɛ̀ aà gbadibↄ ũ.
Dii a to n iko ligua, ńyↄ̃ kible n ibɛɛↄwa Siↄna.
N gbɛ̃́ↄ ńzĩa kpama n ikokɛgↄↄ ń lousisi'ulaↄ daa. N ɛ̀waasoↄ mↄ n kĩ́i gudↄlɛia lán fíiwa.
Dii lɛgbɛ̃̀, a lɛ́ lilɛa vĩo à mɛ̀: Ńyↄ̃ↄ dɛ sa'ona ũ gↄↄpii lán Mɛkizɛdɛwaɛ.
Dii ku n ↄplaai, a kíaↄ míↄnzↄ̃ a pↄfɛ̃gↄↄ.
A tↄsi buiↄwa, an gɛↄ gupa, a dṹnia bṹu kíaↄ míↄnzↄ̃,
i swa'i mi zɛ́ lɛ́. Bee yã́ mɛ́ tò aà mi aↄ daa ía.
Àleluya! Má Dii sáaukpa ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo ń gbɛ̃maaↄ sãnu balu guu.
Dii yãkɛaↄ zↄ̃ↄ, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ à kàńguↄ ì a wàaipa.
Aà yãkɛaↄ bɛɛɛ ń gawio vĩ, aà yãkɛa a zɛ́wa láaa vĩo.
Dii tò a yãbↄnsaɛkɛaↄ dↄ̀wágu, a sùuu ń sósobio vĩ.
Ì blɛ kpa a vĩakɛnaↄwa, aà bàakuańnↄ yã́ lí sãaaguo.
À a gbãa ↄ̀lↄ a gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ yãkɛa guu, à buipãleↄ bùsuↄ kpàmá.
Yã́ pↄ́ a kɛ̀ↄ náai vĩ mɛ́ a zɛvĩ, yã́ pↄ́ a dìlɛↄ sĩana vĩ píiɛ.
Yã́piↄ zĩ́naↄ pɛ́lɛa gↄↄpii, ì yãkɛ a zɛ́wa náai guu.
À suabana zĩ̀ à a gbɛ̃́ↄ bò, aà bàa kúńnↄ gↄↄpii. Aà tↄ́ kua adoa mɛ́ ì to vĩa ń kṹ.
Vĩakɛa Diiɛ mɛ́ ↄ̃nↄ zĩ́na ũ, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì vĩakɛɛ̀ wɛzɛ̃ gbãa. Aà táasilɛa aↄ láaa vĩo.
Àleluya! Báaaden gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Dii vĩa vĩ, mɛ́ Diipi yãdilɛaↄ ì kaaàgu ũ.
Aà nɛ́ↄ gↄ̃ gbãadeↄ ũ ń bùsuu, asa nↄ̀sɛpuade buiↄá báaadeↄnɛ.
Pↄ́mↄama ń àizɛɛo di aà bɛɛ, aà yãkɛa a zɛ́wa láaa vĩo.
Baa gusiau gu ì pu gbɛ̃maaↄnɛɛ, nↄ̀sɛpuade pↄ́ sùuu ń sósobio vĩↄ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gbɛ̃kɛ vĩ ì pↄ́ sɛ̃anɛ́, ì a yã́ↄ kɛ a zɛ́wa, yã́ ì bↄɛ̀ maaɛ.
Gbɛ̃maa lí fu bauo, aà yã́ aↄ dↄńguɛ gↄↄpii.
Bao ĩ́i lí aà vĩakũo, aà sↄ̃ ìↄ dilɛa, ìↄ Dii náai vĩ.
Aà sↄ̃ lí vĩo, vĩa lí aà kũo, e à gɛ tidↄò a ibɛɛↄla.
Ì pↄ́ fã́ɛ taasideↄnɛ, aà yãkɛa a zɛ́wa láaa vĩo. Aà mi ìↄ daa ía ń gawioɛ.
Gbɛ̃vãi líↄ ye aà ea yã́io, ì lɛ́sakãaàzi, ì lↄ̀ↄ gá. Yã́ pↄ́ vãikɛna wɛ́ dↄi ì midɛwàɛ.
Àleluya! Dii zↄ̀blenaↄ, à aà táasilɛ, í aà tↄbↄ!
Gbɛ̃́pii Dii sáaukpa za gbã e gↄↄpii.
Gbɛ̃́pii Dii tↄbↄ sɛa za ĩatɛ̃bilɛa e a gɛ̃kpɛukĩi.
Dii ku musu, a dɛ bui píila, à tↄbↄ̀ e à mà musua.
Gbɛ̃e i ka Dii wá Luawao, a zↄ̃lɛa báawa musu.
Ì wɛ́kpalɛ zĩ́lɛ, ì musu ń tↄↄlɛo gwa.
Ì yɛ̃̀ɛɛsaideↄ bↄ bùsutiu, ì ń fɛlɛ, ì wɛ̃nadeↄ bↄ túfuu, ì ń sɛ́ lɛsĩ.
Ì ń da kíabuiↄ guu, anzĩa gbɛ̃́ kíabuiↄ guu.
Ì to fĩi nɛ́ bↄbↄ, i gↄ̃ nɛade pↄnade ũ. Àleluya!
Kɛ́ Isailiↄ bↄ̀ Egipi, kɛ́ Yakↄbu buiↄ bↄ̀ bui zĩ̀loↄ guu,
Yuda bùsu gↄ̃̀ Dii kúkĩi ũ, Isaili bùsu gↄ̃̀ aà kiblekĩi ũ.
Ísia Tɛ̃a è ↄ̃ à bàalɛ̀, Yuudɛ̃ í kpɛkpà.
Gbɛ̀sĩsĩↄ vĩ̀vĩ lán sãↄwa, sĩ̀sĩↄ ↄyaayè lán bleↄwa.
Ísia, bↄ́mɛ n le n bàalɛ̀i? Yuudɛ̃, àkɛa n kpɛkpài?
Gbɛ̀sĩsĩↄ, bↄ́yãi a vĩvĩ lán sãↄwai? Sĩ̀sĩↄ, àkɛa a ↄyaayè lán bleↄwai?
Dṹnia, lualua Dii mↄa guu, dee Yakↄbu Luapi aɛ.
À gbɛsi kɛ̀ ibↄkĩi ũ, à gbɛkão lìlɛ nibↄna ũ.
I kɛ wá tↄ́ mɛ́ a bↄo Dii, i kɛ wá tↄ́ mɛ́ a bↄo. Ǹ nzĩa tↄbↄ n gbɛ̃kɛ ń n náaio yã́i.
Àkɛa buipãleↄ ì wá la aa mɛ wá Lua kú má niɛi?
Wá Lua ku musu, yã́ pↄ́ a yei ì kɛɛ.
Aa ń diiↄ pì ń ã́nusuo ń vuao, gbɛ̃nazĩna ↄgbɛɛ.
Aa lɛ́ vĩ, aali yã'oo, aa wɛ́ vĩ, aali gu'e sↄ̃o.
Aa swã́ vĩ, aali yãmao, aa ní vĩ, kási aali pↄ́ gĩmao.
Aa ↄ vĩ, aali kã́ pↄ́wao, aa gbá vĩ, kási aali táa'oo. Aali kolokɛkɛo.
An pinaↄ gↄ̃ńwaɛ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ ń náaikɛↄ.
Isailiↄ, à Dii náaikɛ! Ɔ̃mɛ á sɛ̀ngbao ũ, ì dↄálɛ.
Aalona buiↄ, à Dii náaikɛ! Ɔ̃mɛ á sɛ̀ngbao ũ, ì dↄálɛ.
Dii vĩakɛnaↄ, à Dii náaikɛ! Ɔ̃mɛ á sɛ̀ngbao ũ, ì dↄálɛ.
Wá yã́ lí sã́ Diiguo, a báaadawágu. A báaada Isaili buiↄgu, a báaada Aalona buiↄgu.
Dii a báaada a vĩakɛnaↄgu, nɛ́fɛ̃nɛn gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ.
Dii kã́fĩakɛɛ́, ápiↄ ń á nɛ́ↄ.
Dii mɛ́ a báaadaágu, musu ń tↄↄlɛo Kɛnapi.
Musuá Dii bɛɛ, ↄ̃ à tↄↄlɛ nà gbɛ̃nazĩnaↄnɛ ń ↄzĩ.
I kɛ gɛↄ mɛ́ lí Dii táasilɛo, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú bɛdauↄ ìↄ ku kílikiliɛ.
Wápiↄ, wáↄ Dii sáaukpa za gbã e gↄↄpiiɛ. Àleluya!
Má ye Diizi, asa à ma yãmàɛ, à ma wiilɛawa mà.
Máↄ aà sísi e ma wɛ̃ni lɛ́uɛ, kɛ́ à swãdↄ̀mazi yã́i.
Ga fùa kpàmɛɛ yãa, má kú yeelɛa zↄ̃ↄ guu, taasi ń pↄsiao tↄ̃̀a.
Ɔ̃ ma lɛzù Diizi ma mɛ̀: Dii, n yã́ na, ma misi.
Dii sùuu vĩ mɛ́ a maa, wá Lua sósobi vĩ.
Dii ì yɛ̃̀ɛɛsaideↄ dↄ̃́a. Kɛ́ ma gↄ̃ dↄ̀lↄlↄ, à ma suabà.
Ma nↄ̀sɛ aↄ nínia sa, asa Dii yãmaakɛ̀mɛɛ.
Dii ma bↄ ga lɛ́zĩ, à wɛ́'i gògomɛɛ, i to ma gɛ̃nalɛ̀o,
kɛ́ màↄ ku dṹnia guu, míↄ bɛ aà aɛ.
Kɛ́ taasi tↄ̃̀a, ma gↄ̃ búɛbuɛ. Ma aà náaikɛ̀, ↄ̃ ma yã'ò.
Gili gɛ̃̀magu ma mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃e mↄafilisaio.
Bↄ́ má fĩaboò Diiɛ maa pↄ́ a kɛ̀mɛɛ píi yã́ musui?
Má Dii gbɛ̃́ suabaa imibↄ sɛ musu, mí aà sísiò.
Má lɛ́ pↄ́ má kɛ̀ Diiwaↄ fĩabo aà gbɛ̃́ↄ wáa píi.
Dii yãmanaↄ gaa gbiaɛ̀.
Dii, n yã́ na, n zↄ̀blenan ma ũ. Nↄɛ pↄ́ zↄblènɛ nɛ́n ma ũ, n ma bↄ bau.
Má sáaukpa sa'oma, mí ń sísiò, Dii.
Má lɛ́ pↄ́ má kɛ̀ Diiwaↄ fĩabo aà gbɛ̃́ↄ wáa píi.
Má fĩaboɛ̀ aà ua Yelusalɛũ. Àleluya!
Bui píi, à Dii táasilɛ, bùsu píi gbɛ̃́ↄ, à aà tↄbↄ,
asa a gbɛ̃kɛ vĩwanↄ à kɛ̀ zài. Dii náai vĩ gↄↄpiiɛ. Àleluya!
À Dii sáaukpa, asa a maa, aà gbɛ̃kɛ láaa vĩo.
Isailiↄ o, aà gbɛ̃kɛ láaa vĩo.
Aalona buiↄ o, aà gbɛ̃kɛ láaa vĩo.
Aà vĩakɛnaↄ o, aà gbɛ̃kɛ láaa vĩo.
Ma lɛzù Diizi ma yeelɛa guu, ↄ̃ a wèa à ma gba dɛ̀ɛpookĩi.
Dii kumanↄ, vĩa a ma kũo, bↄ́ gbɛ̃nazĩna a fↄ̃ kɛmɛɛi?
Dii kumanↄ ma dↄnlɛde ũ, má tidↄ ma ibɛɛↄlaɛ.
Naa Diizi maa dɛ gbɛ̃nazĩna náaikɛala.
Naa Diizi maa dɛ gbãadeↄ náaikɛala.
Bui píi lìamazi, ↄ̃ ma ń kwɛ́ ń Dii tↄ́o.
Aa lìamazi ↄplaai ń zɛɛo, ↄ̃ ma ń kwɛ́ ń Dii tↄ́o.
Aa fĩ̀a lán zↄdaↄwa, ↄ̃ aa mìdɛ lán sɛ̃̀ tɛ́kũawa, ma ń kwɛ́ ń Dii tↄ́o.
Aa ↄzↄ̃̀mazi pãsĩpãsĩ, má ye lɛ́lɛi, ↄ̃ Dii dↄ̀malɛ.
Dii mɛ́ ma gbãa ũ, aà táasi mi lɛ́, à gↄ̃̀ ma Suabana ũ.
À ma, kúkua dↄ gbɛ̃maaↄ bòou, Dii ↄplaa gbãa zĩkɛ̀.
Dii ↄplaa dↄa musu, Dii ↄplaa gbãa zĩkɛ̀.
Má gao, máↄ kuɛ, míↄ Dii yãkɛaↄ galikɛ.
Dii ma swãgàga maamaa, ãma i to ga ma sɛo.
À gbɛ̃́ suabaa bↄlɛ gbaↄ wɛ̃mɛɛ mà gɛ̃ mà Dii sáaukpa.
Dii ua bↄlɛ kɛ, gbɛ̃maaↄ mɛ́ ì gɛ̃u.
Ma n sáaukɛ̀ Dii, asa ń wèa, n gↄ̃ ma Suabana ũ.
Gbɛ pↄ́ ɛ̃bonaↄ pãkpài mɛ́ gↄ̃̀ gbɛↄ mide ũ.
Dii mɛ́ bee kɛ̀, ↄ̃ à kɛ̀wɛ̃ɛ yãbↄnsaɛ ũ.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ Dii dìlɛn kɛ. Wà pↄnakɛu wà yáalↄ.
N yã́ na Dii! Wá suaba! Suɛ Dii! Wá daɛ ń gòmio!
Báaaden gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ mↄ́ ń Dii tↄ́o ũ, kua Dii ua wálɛ gbãakpanzi.
Dii mɛ́ Lua ũ, à gupùwɛ̃ɛ. À ba dↄdↄ sa'obↄↄwa, í poo gbagbakĩizi.
Ma Luan n ũ, má n sáaukpa, ma Lua, má n tↄbↄ.
À Dii sáaukpa, asa a maa, aà gbɛ̃kɛ láaa vĩo.
Báaadeↄn gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa ku tàaesai aa Dii ikoyã kũaↄ ũ.
Báaadeↄn gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaì Dii yã'onɛ ma aaì aà kĩ́i wɛɛlɛ ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndooↄ ũ.
Aali yãkpaanlakɛo, aaì aà dↄ̀ↄ sɛ́.
N n ↄtondↄkĩi ↄ̀lↄwɛ̃ɛ, kɛ́ wàↄ tɛi ń laaio.
Má ye màↄ ku ma dↄ̀ↄwaɛ, míↄ n yãdilɛnɛↄ kũa.
Tó má n yãdilɛaↄ kũa píi, bee a to wí ma kũo.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ málɛ n yãmaapiↄ dada, má n sáaukpa ń nↄ̀sɛpuaoɛ.
Máↄ n yãdilɛnɛↄ kũaɛ, ńsu ma to we míↄmiↄo.
Kpelewa ɛ̀waaso a kɛ àↄ ku gbãlɛsaii? Sema aà yãkɛa kpaaĩ ń n yã́o.
Málɛ n kĩ́i wɛɛlɛ ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo, ńsu to mà pãalɛ n yãdilɛaↄnɛo.
Ma n yã́ dà ma sↄ̃ guu, kɛ́ másu duunakɛnɛo yã́i.
Ma n sáaukɛ̀, Dii, ǹ n yãdilɛnɛↄ damɛɛ.
N ikoyã pↄ́ bↄ̀ ń lɛ́uↄ píi, má dau siu nɛ́ɛ.
Málɛ pↄnakɛ ń n yã'onɛↄ lá wì kɛ ń àizɛɛowa.
Málɛ n ↄtondↄkĩi wàaipa, ma làasoo ku n kɛkɛáↄwa.
Ma pↄ kɛ̀na n yãdilɛaↄwa, n yã́ a sãmaguo.
Yãmaakɛ mapi n zↄ̀blenaɛ, mí e màↄ ku màↄ n yã́ kũa.
Ma wɛ́ kɛ̃́mɛɛ, kɛ́ mà wɛsi n ikoyã bↄnsaɛↄlɛ.
Bↄ̀mↄn ma ũ dṹnia guu, ńsu ǹ n yãdilɛaↄ ulɛmɛɛo.
N ikoyãↄ nidɛa gↄↄpii mɛ́ tò ma nisĩna vùa.
Ni waladeↄ lele, ni láaikɛmá, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ pã̀alɛ n yãdilɛaↄnɛpiↄ.
Ma bↄ sↄ̃́sↄ̃a ń sa pↄ́ aaì kamaguou, asa má n yã'onɛↄ kũaɛ.
Baa kɛ́ kíaↄ zↄ̃̀lɛ lɛkpàaĩmazi, ma làasoo aↄ ku n yãdilɛnɛↄwaɛ.
N yã'onɛↄ mɛ́ ì ma pↄ kɛ na, n yã́pi mɛ́ ì lɛdaa.
Ma nisĩna naa líwa. Ma misi lá ń òwa.
Ma a yãkɛaↄ dↄ̀dↄnɛ, ↄ̃ ń wèa. Ǹ n yãdilɛnɛↄ damɛɛ.
To mà n ↄtondↄkĩiↄ dↄ̃, ma làasoo iↄ ku n yãbↄnsaɛↄwa.
Kua pↄsiau ma nↄ̀sɛ ↄ́ↄlↄ̀. Ma gba gbãa lá ń òwa.
Ma kɛ̃ sã́sãzɛwa, ní ma gba zɛ́ mà zɛ ń n ikoyão.
Ma sĩana zɛ́ sɛ̀, ma sↄ̃ ìↄ ku n ikoyãwa.
Má n yã'onɛↄ kũa ↄplapla. Dii, ńsu to wí ma kũo.
Má wãa ń n yãdilɛaↄ, asa n ma sↄ̃ dàmɛɛ doũɛ.
Dii, ǹ n yãdilɛnɛↄ zɛ́ ↄlↄmɛɛ màↄ kũa e ma wɛ̃ni lɛ́u.
Ma gba ↄ̃nↄ màↄ n ikoyã kũa, míↄ zĩkɛwà ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo.
Ma da n yãdilɛaↄ zɛ́u, asa bee mɛ́ ì kamagu.
To ma sↄ̃ ta n yã'onɛↄwa, asu tá gbɛ̃ble'aiwao.
To ma wɛma pↄ́ gianaↄla, ma lɛ́ ń láo n zɛ́ guu.
Yã́ pↄ́ ń ò kɛ mapi n zↄ̀blenaɛ, lɛ́ pↄ́ ń gbɛ̃̀ n vĩakɛnaↄnɛpi.
To sↄ̃́sↄ̃a pↄ́ má a vĩa vĩ gɛ̃ ma swã́ kpɛ, asa n yãkɛkɛa maaɛ.
Má ye n ↄtondↄkĩii fá, ma lɛ́ ń láo n maakɛa guu.
Dii, mↄ gbɛ̃kɛkɛmɛɛ, ma suaba lá ń òwa,
mí yã́zãsi ma sↄ̃̀sↄ̃nawa, asa málɛ n yã́ náaikɛ.
Ńsu to màↄ ku sĩana'oanɛ́ saio, asa n ikoyãↄ ↄ̃ ma wɛ́ dↄi.
Máↄ n ikoyãↄ kũa za gbã e gↄↄpiiɛ,
míↄ bɛ ma laaiwa, asa ma n ↄtondↄkĩi wɛ̀ɛlɛɛ.
Má n yã'onɛↄ o kíaↄnɛ, wí a ma kũo.
N yãdilɛaↄ ì ma pↄ kɛ na, asa má ye yã́piↄiɛ.

To yã́ pↄ́ ń ò n zↄ̀blenaɛ dↄngu, asa ń tò ma wɛ́ dↄiɛ.
Ma nↄ̀sɛ ì níni ma taasikɛa guu, asa n yã́ mɛ́ ì ma lɛ́ ń láo.
Waladeↄ lɛ́ ma yáalↄ maamaaɛ, ń beeo má pãalɛ n ikoyãɛo.
Mi làasookɛ n ikoyã yãaↄwa, ↄ̃ aaì ma nↄ̀sɛ nínimɛɛ, Dii.
Ma pↄ ì pa maamaa vãikɛnaↄ pãkpaa n ikoyãi yã́i.
Mi lɛsi n yãdilɛnɛↄ musu ma kua dṹniau bↄ̀mↄ ũ guu.
N yã́ ìↄ dↄmagu gwã́, Dii, ↄ̃ miↄ n ikoyãↄ kũa.
Má yã́ beeↄ dↄ́ɛ dↄ̃, asa miↄ n ↄtondↄkĩi gwaɛ.
Dii mɛ́ ma baa ũ, ma lɛgbɛ̃̀ ma mɛ̀ má n yãma.

Máↄ wãa, má zɛzɛo, má n yãdilɛaↄ da.

N maakɛ̀ mapi n zↄ̀blenaɛ, lá ń òwa, Dii.

E ǹyↄ̃ gɛ́ ↄtↄ̃ↄlɛia, má sã́sãaɛ, ãma tiasa má n yã́ kũa.
Ń maa mɛ́ ni yãmaakɛ. Ǹ n yãdilɛnɛↄ damɛɛ.
Baa kɛ́ waladeↄ yã́sia lì wa nànaa, miↄ n ↄtondↄkĩi gwa ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndooɛ.
An swã́ yìaa, aa sↄũkũ̀, mapi sↄ̃ ma pↄ na n ikoyãwa.
N ↄtↄ̃ↄlɛaa kɛ̀ maaɛ, asa ma e ma n yãdanɛↄ dàdaɛ.

N ↄ mɛ́ ma ikàsa, ↄ̃ n ma kɛ. Ma gba ↄ̃nↄ mà n yãdilɛaↄ dada.

Mↄ ǹ wɛ̃nadↄ̃mɛɛ màↄ ku aafia, asa n ikoyãↄ mɛ́ ma pↄnakɛbↄ ũ.

Tó n ikoyã mɛ́ ma pↄnakɛbↄ ũo, dↄ̃ ma mìdɛ ma taasikɛa guu.
N ↄtondↄkĩi a sãmagu bauo, asa a sabai ↄ̃ n ma lɛ ń láo.

Ma ↄ̃nↄ dɛ maezↄ̃ↄↄla, asa miↄ n ↄtondↄkĩiↄ gwaɛ.

Mi kɛ̃ n ikoyãↄwao, asa ḿmɛ ń dàmɛɛ.

N yã́ mɛ́ filia ũ ma gbázĩ, ì gupumɛɛ zɛ́u.
