Kɛ́ aà ìwaↄ è, ↄ̃ an pↄ fɛ̀lɛ aa mɛ̀: Bↄ́n pↄ́ pãkɛa bee ũi?
Dↄ̃ yãa wà tulalepi yìa ń ↄ zↄ̃ↄo, wi a ↄ̃a kpá taasideↄwa.
Yesu dↄ̃̀má, ↄ̃ a ònɛ́: Bↄ́yãi álɛ ĩadai nↄɛpiwai? Yã́ pↄ́ a kɛ̀mɛɛ maaɛ.
Taasideↄ ìↄ kúánↄ gↄↄpiiɛ, ãma máↄ kúánↄ gↄↄpiio.
Kɛ́ à tulalepi kà ma mɛwa, a kɛ̀ ma gɛ̀ kpɛlaa yã́iɛ.
Sĩana málɛ oɛ́: Gu pↄ́ wàlɛ ma baokpau dṹnia gupiiu, waↄ yã́ pↄ́ nↄɛpi kɛ̀ o aà dↄngu yã́iɛ.
Bee gbɛa gbɛ̃ↄn kuɛplaↄ do pↄ́ wì mɛ Yudasi Isaliↄti gɛ̀ sa'onkiaↄ kĩ́i
à mɛ̀: Tó ma Yesu kpàwá, bↄ́ á we kpaai? Ɔ̃ aa ã́nusu ↄwatɛ̃ baakwi nào aa kpàwà.
Za gↄↄ bee ↄ̃ àlɛ zɛwɛɛlɛ à aà kpámá.
Kàaso dikpɛgↄↄ sɛ̃́ia zĩ́ Yesu ìwaↄ mↄ̀ aà là aa mɛ̀: Má ń ye wà Gɛ̃amusu blɛble sↄukɛunɛi?
A wèmá à mɛ̀: À gɛ́ wɛ̃́lɛdau gbɛ̃e kĩ́i, í oɛ̀ Mɛtulu mɛ̀ a gↄↄ kà kãi. Aà bɛ á Gɛ̃amusu blɛ bleu ń a ìwaↄ.
Yesu ìwaↄ kɛ̀ lá a dànɛ́wa, aa Gɛ̃amusu blɛble sↄukɛ̀.
Kɛ́ oosi kɛ̀, Yesu zↄ̃̀lɛ táabũnui ń a gbɛ̃ↄn kuɛplapiↄ.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ aalɛ pↄble à mɛ̀: Sĩana málɛ oɛ́, á gbɛ̃do a ma kpámá.
An pↄ yà maamaa, an baade fɛ̀lɛ lɛ́ aà la dodo: Asa mámɛo yó, Dii?
Yesu wèmá à mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wálɛ ↄkãaa ta doũ mɛ́ a ma kpámá.
Gbɛ̃nazĩn Nɛ́ a ã́nuato lá wà a yã'ò taalauwa, ãma waiyoo gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a aà kpámápi. A maa wà aà ì yãao.
Ɔ̃ Yudasi pↄ́ a aà kpámápi mɛ̀: Asa mámɛo yó, Mɛtulu? Yesu òɛ̀: Ɔ̃mɛ dↄ n lɛ́u we.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ aalɛ pↄble, Yesu kàa sɛ̀ à báaadàu, ↄ̃ a ɛ̀'ɛ a kpà a ìwaↄwa à mɛ̀: À si só. Kɛ́ beeá ma mɛɛ.
Ɔ̃ à imibↄ sɛ̀ lↄ. À sáaukpà, ↄ̃ a kpàmá à mɛ̀: À mi ápii.
Kɛ́ beeá ma auɛ. A dɛ Lua bàa kua ń gbɛ̃́ dasiↄ au pↄ́ a bↄlɛa an duunakɛ̃ama yã́i ũɛ.
Málɛ oɛ́, za gbã má vɛ̃ɛbɛ'i mi lↄo. Sema tó kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ ma Mae kĩ́i bↄ̀ gupuau, ↄ̃ má a dafu miánↄ.
Kɛ́ aa lɛsì, ↄ̃ aa bↄ̀lɛ gɛ̀ Kùkpɛ sĩ̀sĩpↄlɛu.
Bee gbɛa Yesu ònɛ́: Ápii á ma to we gwãasĩnaa, asa a kɛ̃a láu wà mɛ̀, Lua a pↄdãna lɛ́, aà kpàsa pↄ́ↄ i fãaa.
Ma vua gbɛa má dↄaaɛ́ Galile.
Ɔ̃ Piɛɛ òɛ̀: Baa tó ma gbɛ̃́ↄ n to we ḿpii, má n to we bauo.
Yesu òɛ̀: Sĩana málɛ onɛ, gwãasĩnaa e ko àↄ gɛ́ lɛzui, ńyↄ̃ lelekpamazi gɛ̃n àaↄ̃.
Piɛɛ òɛ̀: Baa tó má su gannↄ, má lelekpanzi bauo. Ɔ̃ aà ìwaↄ ò màa sↄ̃ ḿpii.
Bee gbɛa Yesu ń a ìwaↄ kà gu pↄ́ wì mɛ Gɛsɛmani, ↄ̃ a ònɛ́: À zↄ̃lɛ la e mà gɛ wabikɛ le.
À Piɛɛ ń Zebedee nɛ́ gbɛ̃ↄn plaↄ sɛ̀ gɛ̀ńnↄ. Aà pↄ siakũ̀, tòlobi zùaàgu.
Ɔ̃ a ònɛ́: Pↄsia ma kũ gbãa e ma ka gaa. À zɛ la, í itɛ̃kɛmanↄ.
Ɔ̃ à gɛ̀ aɛ yↄↄ, à wùlɛ a gbɛɛu à wabikɛ̀ à mɛ̀: Baa, tó a zɛkɛ, to taasi kɛɛonaɛ bee dↄmazi. Ãma i kɛ lá má yeiwa no, sema lá ń yeiwa.
Ɔ̃ à ɛ̀a sù a ìwaↄ lè, aalɛ i'o. Ɔ̃ a ò Piɛɛɛ: Màa yã̀? I fↄ̃ itɛ̃kɛ̀manↄ baa yↄↄoa?
À itɛ̃kɛ àↄ wabikɛ, kɛ́ ásu fu yↄ̃awao yã́i. Á nisĩna yei, ãma á mɛ mɛ́ busɛ.
Aà kɛ̃amá gɛ̃n plaade, à wabikɛ̀ à mɛ̀: Baa, tó taasi kɛɛona í a dↄmazi a imisaio, to n pↄeã kɛ.
Kɛ́ à ɛ̀a sù ń lé, a è aalɛ i'o lↄ, asa an wɛ́ gbiakũ̀ɛ.
Ɔ̃ à ń tó we lↄ, à gɛ̀ wabikɛ̀ a gɛ̃n àaↄ̃de, à yã́ doũpi ò lↄ.
Ɔ̃ à ɛ̀a sù a ìwaↄwa a ònɛ́: Àlɛ i'o álɛ kã́mabo e tiaa? À gwa! Gbɛ̃nazĩn Nɛ́ kpaa duunkɛnaↄwa gↄↄ kà.
À fɛlɛ wà tá. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ ma kpámá lɛ́ mↄ́.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ àlɛ yã́pi o, ↄ̃ aà ìwa gbɛ̃ↄn kuɛplaↄ do Yudasi kà ń bíla pↄ́ aa bↄ̀ sa'onkiaↄ ń Yuda gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ kĩ́iↄ. Aa fɛ̃ndaↄ kṹkũa ń goↄ.
Bↄnkpɛdepi sↄ̃ à seela ònɛ́ à mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ma su lɛpɛ̀wà, aàpin we. À aà kṹ.
Ɔ̃ à táa'ò Yesuwa gↄ̃̀ↄ à mɛ̀: Fↄ Mɛtulu. Ɔ̃ à lɛpɛ̀wà.
Yesu òɛ̀: Ma gbɛ̃́, ǹ n kɛa kɛ! Ɔ̃ wà mↄ̀ ↄpɛ̀lɛ Yesuwa, wà aà kũ̀.
Ɔ̃ Yesu ìwaↄ do a fɛ̃nda wò, à sa'onkia zĩkɛna lɛ̀ò à aà swã́ gò.
Ɔ̃ Yesu òɛ̀: Ǹ n fɛ̃nda pɛ a gbɛu. Asa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ zɛ̀ ń fɛ̃ndao, fɛ̃nda mɛ́ a aà dɛ.
Tó má ye ma Mae malaika zĩgↄ̃ↄ gbaɛmɛɛ gↄ̃̀ↄ dɛ gãli kuɛplaↄla, ń dↄ̃ má fua a wabikɛwà yã̀?
Tó má kɛ̀ màa sↄ̃, kpelewa yã́ pↄ́ kɛ̃a Luayãtaalau wà mɛ̀ a kɛ a kɛi?
Ɔ̃ Yesu ò bílaɛ: Kpã́i wɛliwɛn ma ũ, ↄ̃ a mↄ ma kṹi ń fɛ̃ndaↄ ń goↄa? Gↄↄpii miↄ zↄ̃lɛ Lua ua màↄ yãdanɛ́, i ma kũo.
Ãma yã́pi kɛ̀ píi, kɛ́ yã́ pↄ́ ãnabiↄ ò kɛ yã́iɛ. Ɔ̃ aà ìwaↄ aà tò we ḿpii, aa bàasi.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa Yesu kũ̀ↄ gɛ̀aànↄ sa'onkia Kaaifa bɛ. Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdeↄ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ kãaaa we.
Piɛɛ tɛ Yesu kpɛ kãaa e sa'onkiapi bɛ. À gɛ̃̀ ua à zↄ̃̀lɛ ń dↄaiↄ, kɛ́ à yã́pi midɛa e.
Sa'onkiaↄ ń Yuda gbãadeↄ píi lɛ́ yã́ wɛɛlɛ dↄ Yesuwa aa e wà aà dɛ.
Baa kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ↄ mↄ̀ yãdↄ̀dↄwà dasi, i kɛo. Gbɛzã gbɛ̃ↄn plaeↄ mↄ̀
aa mɛ̀: Dee mɛ̀ á fↄ̃ Lua kpɛ́ wí, í ɛa dↄ gↄↄ àaↄ̃ɛ sɛ́!
Ɔ̃ sa'onkia fɛ̀lɛ zɛ̀ a ò Yesuɛ: Yã́ pↄ́ wàlɛ dↄdↄmapi dɛa ni? Ńyↄ̃ yãe zã́sioa?
Kɛ́ Yesu nílɛ kpɛ̃́, ↄ̃ sa'onkiapi òɛ̀: Ma nanɛ Lua bɛ̃́ɛi, owɛ̃ɛ tó Lua Nɛ́ pↄ́ wì mɛ Mɛsiin n ũ.
Yesu wèwà à mɛ̀: Ɔ̃mɛ dↄ n lɛ́u we. Mapi sↄ̃ málɛ oɛ́, za gbã á Gbɛ̃nazĩn Nɛ́ e zↄ̃lɛa Gbãapiide ↄplaai, mɛ́ á aà e, àlɛ mↄ́ luabɛpuanau.
Ɔ̃ sa'onkiapi a pↄkasaↄ gà a kɛ̃̀ à mɛ̀: A dↄ́ɛ ń Luao! Wá bàa ũma n seeladeↄ lↄi? Á mà lá à dↄ̀ɛ ń Luao wea?
Á è kpelewai? Ɔ̃ aa wèwà aa mɛ̀: Aà tàae kà wà aà dɛ.
Ɔ̃ wà lɛ́'ikà aà oawa wà aà lɛ̀ ń ↄkũo. Gbɛ̃eↄ aà sãnkɛ̀kɛ
aa mɛ̀: Mɛsii, ãnabikɛkɛ ǹ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ n lɛ owɛ̃ɛ.
Piɛɛ zↄ̃lɛa ua, ↄ̃ nↄɛ zĩkɛnae mↄ òɛ̀: Mpi sↄ̃ iↄ sãnu ń Galile gbɛ̃́ Yesupioɛ.
Ɔ̃ à lelekpà gbɛ̃́pii wáa à mɛ̀: Má dↄ̃ yã́ pↄ́ ńlɛ oo.
Kɛ́ à gɛ̃̀ gↄ̃u, nↄɛ pãle aà è, ↄ̃ a ò gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú weↄnɛ: Gbɛ̃́ɛ bee sãnu ń Yesu Nazalɛtioɛ.
Piɛɛ ɛ̀a lelekpà à mɛ̀: Má sì ń Luao má gbɛ̃́pi dↄ̃o.
Kɛ́ à kɛ̀ sàa yↄↄ, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ zɛa weↄ sↄ̃̀ Piɛɛzi aa mɛ̀: Sĩanaɛ, an gbɛ̃don n ũ, asa wá n dↄ̃ n yã'oawaɛ.
Ɔ̃ à fɛ̀lɛ azĩa kà à mɛ̀: Ń Luao má gbɛ̃́pi dↄ̃o. Wegↄ̃ↄ ↄ̃ ko lɛzù.
Ɔ̃ yã́ pↄ́ Yesu ò dↄ̀aàgu kɛ́ à mɛ̀, e ko àↄ gɛ́ lɛzui a lelekpaazi gɛ̃n àaↄ̃. Ɔ̃ Piɛɛpi bↄ̀ bàasi, à ↄ́ↄlↄ̀ à kɛ̀ wɛ̃na.
Kɛ́ gu dↄ̀ kↄↄkↄↄ, sa'onkiaↄ ń Yuda gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ píi lɛkpàaĩ Yesuzi, kɛ́ aa e wà aà dɛ.
Aa aà yè, ↄ̃ aa gɛ̀ aà kpà bùsu gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ Pilatiwa.
Kɛ́ Yudasi pↄ́ aà kpàmá è yã́ zↄ̃̀lɛwa, à gↄ̃̀ déndↄ̃mɛɛ guu, ↄ̃ à gɛ̀ ã́nusu ↄwatɛ̃ baakwipi sↄaai sa'onkiaↄnɛ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ.
A ònɛ́: Ma duunakɛ̀, ma tàaesaide kpà gai. Ɔ̃ aa òɛ̀: Wá bàa ũmai? N yã́ɛ.
Ɔ̃ Yudasi ↄ̃api zù Lua kpɛ́u, ↄ̃ à tà à gɛ̀ azĩa lòo.
Ɔ̃ sa'onkiaↄ ↄ̃api sɛ̀lɛ aa mɛ̀: Ɔ̃api kaa Lua kpɛ́ kpagolo guu zɛvĩo, asa gbɛ̃dɛ'ↄ̃aɛ.
Kɛ́ aa lɛkpàaĩ, ↄ̃ aa oobona gĩtↄkĩi lù ń ↄ̃apio nibↄↄ vĩkĩi ũ.
Ayãmɛto e ń a gbão wì mɛ tↄↄlɛpiɛ Gbɛ̃dɛna tↄↄlɛ.
Ɔ̃ yã́ pↄ́ ãnabi Zelemii ò kɛ̀, à mɛ̀: Wà ã́nusu ↄwatɛ̃ baakwipi sɛ̀lɛ, ↄ̃a pↄ́ Isailiↄ zɛ̀ò aa kpà aà yã́ musupi,
ↄ̃ wà oobona gĩtↄkĩi lùò lá Dii òmɛɛwa.
Yesu zɛa bùsu gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ aɛ. Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi aà là à mɛ̀: Yudaↄ kían n ũa? Yesu wèwà à mɛ̀: Ɔ̃mɛ dↄ n lɛ́u we.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ sa'onkiaↄ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ lɛ́ yãdↄdↄwà, i yãe zã́simáo.
Ɔ̃ Pilati òɛ̀: Ńlɛ yã́ dasi pↄ́ wàlɛ dↄdↄma mao lé?
Kɛ́ Yesu i yãe o yã́piↄ kee musuo, à bↄ̀ bùsu gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi saɛ maamaaɛ.
Gɛ̃amusu dikpɛ zĩ́ píi, bùsu gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi ì dakpɛunaↄ do pↄ́ bíla yei gbaɛnɛ́ɛ.
Gↄↄ bee sↄ̃ dakpɛuna tↄdee ku we, wì mɛ Balaba.
Kɛ́ bíla kã̀aa, ↄ̃ Pilati ń lá à mɛ̀: Dé á ye mà kɛ̃́ɛ́i? Balaba yã̀, ge Yesu pↄ́ wì mɛ Mɛsiiɛ?
Asa a dↄ̃ kɛ́ wɛdↄa Yesuɛ yã́i ↄ̃ wà aà kpàiwa.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ Pilati zↄ̃lɛa gĩ́naa, aà na gbɛ̃́ zĩ̀wà à mɛ̀: Ńsu yãe kɛ gbɛ̃maapiɛo, asa nana pↄ́ má ò aà yã́ musu gĩa gwã́ ma kũ gbãa maamaaɛ.
Sa'onkiaↄ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ nàɛ bílawa aa Balaba gbɛa, wi Yesu dɛ.
Ayãmɛto kɛ́ bùsu gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi ń lá, gbɛ̃ↄn plapiↄ guu dé aa ye à kɛ̃́nɛ́i, ↄ̃ aa mɛ̀ Balabaɛ.
Ɔ̃ Pilati ń lá à mɛ̀: Kpelewa má kɛ ń Yesu pↄ́ wì mɛ Mɛsiioi? Gbɛ̃́pii mɛ̀: Ǹ aà páliwa.
Ɔ̃ à ń lá à mɛ̀: Vãi kpele a kɛ̀i? Ɔ̃ an wiilɛa kã̀fĩ aa mɛ̀: Ǹ aà páliwa.
Kɛ́ Pilati è á fↄ̃ yãe kɛo, mɛ́ zↄa lɛ́ kã́fĩ, ↄ̃ à idã̀ à ↄpì bíla wáa à mɛ̀: Ma ↄbↄ̀lɛ gbɛ̃́pi gaa yã́u. Á yã́ɛ.
Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃́piↄ mɛ̀: Aà dɛa yã́ wí wá musu ń wá nɛ́ↄ.
Ɔ̃ à Balaba kɛ̃̀nɛ́ à mɛ̀ wà Yesu gbɛ̃ ń flàalao, wi aà páliwa.
Bee gbɛa Pilati sosaↄ gɛ̃̀ ń Yesuo bùsu gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi bɛ, ↄ̃ an gãli píi lìaaàzi.
Aa aà pↄ́ↄ wòlowà, aa gomusu tɛ̃a dàɛ̀.
Aa lɛ̀ fùa tã̀ wa kpàɛ̀, aa fee nàɛ̀ a ↄplaau gopana ũ. Ɔ̃ aalɛ kúlɛkulɛɛ̀, aalɛ aà kɛ pↄ́ↄpↄↄ aalɛ mɛ: Fↄ, Yudaↄ kía!
Aa lɛ́'ikàwà, aa feepi sɛ̀ aa aà lɛ̀ò a miwa.
Kɛ́ aa aà kɛ̀ pↄ́ↄpↄↄ aa làa, aa gomusupi bↄ̀aàla aa aà pↄkasaↄ dàɛ̀, ↄ̃ aalɛ gɛ́ aà páiliwa.
Kɛ́ aa bↄ̀lɛ lɛ́ gɛ́, aa kpàaũ ń Silɛni gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wì mɛ Simↄↄo. Aa teasidàɛ̀, ↄ̃ à Yesu lipãakↄ̃a sɛ̀.
Kɛ́ aa kà gu pↄ́ wì mɛ Gↄgↄta, (bee mɛ̀ mitↄↄnagu),
ↄ̃ aa vɛ̃ɛ yãalɛa ń ɛsɛo dↄ̀ɛ̀ aà mi. Kɛ́ a ìɛ, ↄ̃ à gì mii.
Kɛ́ aa aà pàliwa, ↄ̃ aa tɛ́lɛpà aà pↄkasaↄ kpaalɛa yã́ musu.
Ɔ̃ aa zↄ̃̀lɛ lɛ́ aà dↄ̃́a we.
Wà aà tàae pↄ́ wa è kɛ̃̀ wa nà aà mia wà mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃́ɛ beeá Yesu Yudaↄ kíaɛ.
Ɔ̃ wà kpã́iwɛliwɛↄ pàliwa Yesupi saɛ gbɛ̃ↄn pla, ado ↄplaai, ado ↄzɛɛi.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ gɛ̃ weↄ lɛ́ ń midɛ, aalɛ aà sↄ̃sↄ̃
aalɛ mɛ: N mɛ̀ ńyↄ̃ Lua kpɛ́ wí, ní ɛa dↄ gↄↄ àaↄ̃ nolo? Tó Lua Nɛ́n n ũ, ǹ nzĩa suaba, pila líwa.
Màa sa'onkiaↄ ń Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdeↄ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ lɛ́ aà kɛ pↄ́ↄpↄↄ lↄ aa mɛ̀:
À gbɛ̃pãleↄ suabà mɛ́ a fↄ̃ à azĩa suabaoa? Isailiↄ kía nolo? Aà pila líwa sa, wí aà náaikɛ.
A Lua náai vĩ. Tó Lua yeaàziɛ, aà aà bↄ sa, asa à mɛ̀ Lua Nɛ́n a ũ.
Baa kpã́i pↄ́ wà ń páliwa sãnuↄ lɛ́ aà sↄ̃sↄ̃ màa lↄɛ.
Gusia kũ̀ bùsupi gupiiu za ĩatɛ̃ minanguo e aua gɛ̀ pìlaò.
Ĩatɛ̃'auapilaa ↄ̃ Yesu wii gbãa lɛ̀ à mɛ̀: Ɛli, Ɛli, lɛma sabatani! Bee mɛ̀ ma Lua, ma Lua, àkɛa n ma to wei?
Kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ zɛa weeↄ yã́pi mà aa mɛ̀: Àlɛ Ɛlia sisiɛ.
Wegↄ̃ↄ an gbɛ̃do bàalɛ̀ gɛ̀ sao sɛ kpàlɛ vɛ̃ɛ kũ̀mau, a pɛ̀ feea, ↄ̃ a dↄ̀ Yesuɛ aà mi.
Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ mɛ̀: Zɛ gĩa wà gwa tó Ɛlia a mↄ aà suabai.
Yesu ɛ̀a wii gbãa lɛ̀ lↄ, ↄ̃ à tà.
Ɔ̃ Lua kpɛ́ zwãa pↄ́ daa luakukĩi aɛ pàa pla za musu e zĩ́lɛ. Tↄↄlɛ lùalua, gbɛↄ pàapaa,
miaↄ wɛ̃̀wɛ̃, ↄ̃ Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ vù dasi aa bↄ̀ gau.
Yesu vua gbɛa aa bↄ̀lɛ miau aa gɛ̃̀ Lua wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ a kua adoau, gbɛ̃́ↄ ń é dasi.
Kɛ́ sosaↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ń a gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ Yesu dↄ̃́aↄ tↄↄlɛ lualuaapi è n yã́ pↄ́ kɛ̀ↄ píi, iwãa kà ń pↄa maamaa aa mɛ̀: Gↄ̃ɛpiá Lua Nɛ́ɛ sĩana.
Nↄɛↄ ku we dasi, aalɛ gugwa kãaa. Aa tɛ Yesuzi za Galileɛ, aaìↄ blɛkɛɛ̀.
Maliama Madelɛni kú ń guu ń Zaaki ń Yosɛfuo da Maliamao n Zebedee nɛ́ↄ dao.
Kɛ́ oosi kɛ̀, Alimate gbɛ̃́ ↄde pↄ́ wì mɛ Yosɛfu mↄ̀. Yesu ìwaɛ lↄ.
À gɛ̀ Yesu gɛ wabikɛ̀ Pilatiwa, ↄ̃ Pilati mɛ̀ wà kpawà.
Kɛ́ Yosɛfu gɛpi sɛ̀, à bàabaa dafu fĩ̀wà
à aà dà azĩa gbɛ̀'ɛ pↄ́ wa sↄ̀ mia ũ guu. Ɔ̃ à gbɛ̀ gbɛ̃̀nɛ gbeembo tà ɛpilɛ à tà.
Maliama Madelɛni ń Maliama pãlepio zↄ̃lɛa we, an aɛ dↄa miawa.
Kɛ́ gↄↄ lìlɛ, kã́mabogↄↄzĩ kà, ↄ̃ sa'onkiaↄ ń Falisiↄ gɛ̀ Pilati kĩ́i sãnu
aa mɛ̀: Yã́ pↄ́ gbɛ̃sãsãnapi ò a bɛ̃́ɛ zĩ́ dↄwágu, à mɛ̀ gↄↄ àaↄ̃de zĩ́ á vuɛ.
O wàↄ miapi dↄ̃́a e a gↄↄ àaↄ̃dezĩ. Tó màa no, aà ìwaↄ mↄ wà aà gɛ sɛ kpã́iɛ, aai o gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ à bↄ̀ gauɛ. Ɛɛ gbɛzã bee aↄ dɛ a sɛ̃́iala.
Ɔ̃ Pilati ònɛ́: À sosaↄ sí, í gɛ́ mia dↄ̃́a lá á fↄ̃́wa.
Ɔ̃ aa gɛ̀ seelakɛ̀ miagbɛtaɛwa, aa sosaↄ tò we aaↄ dↄ̃́a.
Kã́mabogↄↄ gbɛa, ãsↄ̃anɛnzĩ kↄↄkↄↄ Maliama Madelɛni ń Maliama pãlepio gɛ̀ mia gwai.
Ɔ̃ tↄↄlɛ lùalua gbã́ugbãu, asa Dii malaikae bↄ̀ musu à mↄ̀ gbɛpi gbeembò a gò mialɛɛ, ↄ̃ à zↄ̃̀lɛwà.
Aà oa dɛ lán loupilɛawa mɛ́ aà ula dɛ púntaitai.
Vĩa gudↄ̃anaↄ kũ̀, aalɛ lualua, ↄ̃ aa gↄ̃̀ sã́ii.
Ɔ̃ malaikapi ò nↄɛpiↄnɛ: Ásu to vĩa á kũo. Má dↄ̃ kɛ́ Yesu pↄ́ wa pàliwa ↄ̃ álɛ wɛɛlɛ.
A ku lao, à vù lá a òwa. À mↄ gu pↄ́ wà aà wùlɛu gwa,
í gɛ o aà ìwaↄnɛ kpakpa à bↄ̀ gau. A dↄaanɛ́ Galile, we an wɛ́ a siukↄ̃lɛ. Má òɛ́n we.
Ɔ̃ aa gò mia kĩ́i kpakpa ń vĩao, ãma an pↄ na zↄ̃ↄ. Aa bàalɛ̀ lɛ́ gɛ́ a baokpai aà ìwaↄnɛ.
Ɔ̃ Yesu dàńlɛ gↄ̃̀ↄ, à fↄkpàmá. Kɛ́ aa sↄ̃̀aàzi, aa kùlɛɛ̀, ↄ̃ aa ↄnà aà gbakpɛawa.
Ɔ̃ Yesu ònɛ́: Ásu to vĩa á kũo. À gɛ o ma gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ aa ta Galile. Wekĩi wá wɛsiukↄ̃lɛ.
Nↄɛↄ kpɛ ↄ̃ sosa gudↄ̃anaeↄ gɛ̃̀ wɛ̃́lɛ guu, aa yã́ pↄ́ kɛ̀ↄ ò sa'onkiaↄnɛ píi.
Ɔ̃ sa'onkiapiↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ sìsi aa lɛkpàaĩ, ↄ̃ aa ↄ zↄ̃ↄ kpà sosapiↄwa gusaɛ
aa mɛ̀: À o aà ìwaↄ mɛ́ mↄ̀ gwãasĩna, aa aà gɛ sɛ̀ kpã́i gↄↄ pↄ́ álɛ i'o.
Tó bùsu gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ sù yã́pi mà, wá awakpaɛ̀, í bↄ yãkeleu.
Sosaↄ ↄ̃api sì, ↄ̃ aa kɛ̀ lá wa dànɛ́wa. Ɔ̃ yã́pi gↄ̃̀ Yudaↄnɛ yãa ũ e ń a gbão.
Yesu ìwa gbɛ̃ↄn kuɛdoↄ tà Galile, sĩ̀sĩ pↄ́ à a yãnukɛ̀nɛ́ yãa musu.
Kɛ́ aa aà è, aa kùlɛɛ̀, ãma an gbɛ̃eↄ lɛ́ seakɛɛ.
Ɔ̃ Yesu sↄ̃̀ńzi à yã'ònɛ́ à mɛ̀: Lua musu ń dṹniao iko píi kpàa.
Ayãmɛto à gɛ bui píi kɛ ma ìwaↄ ũ, í ń da'ilɛkɛ ń Mae Lua tↄ́o ń aà Nɛ́ tↄ́o ń aà Nisĩna tↄ́o,
í yã́ pↄ́ má dìlɛɛ́ↄ danɛ́ aaↄ kũa píi. À ma, máↄ kúánↄ gↄↄpiiɛ e dṹnia gɛ láaò.
Lua Nɛ́ Yesu Kilisi baon kɛ:
À dàalɛ lá a ku ãnabi Isaia lá guuwaɛ à mɛ̀: Má a zĩna zĩ aà dↄaanɛ, i zɛkɛkɛnɛ.
Kpàwakɛna lↄↄ ma dↄ gbáau à mɛ̀: À zɛkɛkɛ Diiɛ, à zɛ́wɛwɛnaↄ pooɛ̀ súsu.
Beewa ↄ̃ Zãa Da'ilɛna kuò gbáau, àlɛ waasokɛ, a ò gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ aa nↄ̀sɛlilɛ aa da'ilɛkɛ, Lua i ń duuna kɛ̃́má.
Yude bùsudeↄ ń Yelusalɛũdeↄ gɛ̀ aà kĩ́i ḿpii, aa ń duunaↄ ò gupuau, ↄ̃ à ń da'ilɛkɛ̀ Yuudɛ̃i.
Zãapi ìↄ ula pↄ́ wa tã̀ ń yiongo kã́o daa, à báa sãntilii dↄ̀ a pi. Kwa ń zↄ́'io mɛ́ aà pↄblea ũ.
À waasokɛ̀ à mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃e a mↄ ma gbɛa, aà iko dɛmala. Mi ka mà kúlɛ mà aà sabala bↄbↄɛ̀o.
Mi á da'ilɛkɛ ń íoɛ. Gbɛ̃́pi sↄ̃, ↄ̃mɛ a á da'ilɛkɛ ń Lua Nisĩnao.
Gↄↄ bee Yesu bↄ̀ Nazalɛti, Galile bùsuu, à mↄ̀, ↄ̃ Zãa aà da'ilɛkɛ̀ Yuudɛ̃i.
Kɛ́ Yesu bùa gↄ̃̀ↄ, a è luabɛ lɛ́ kɛ̃aa, Lua Nisĩna lɛ́ su lán felenawa, à dìɛ.
Ɔ̃ à yã'o mà bↄa luabɛ à mɛ̀: Ma Nɛ́n n ũ, má yenzi, ma pↄ kɛ̀ma na.
Zĩbeezĩ Nisĩnapi nàɛwà à gɛ̀ gbáau,
ↄ̃ a ku we ń sɛ̃̀anↄbↄↄ e gↄↄ bla, Setãu lɛ́ aà yↄ̃. Ɔ̃ malaikaↄ mↄ̀ dↄ̀aàlɛ.
Zãa kũa gbɛa ↄ̃ Yesu tà Galile, àlɛ baona pↄ́ a mà Lua kĩ́i waasokpa
à mɛ̀: A gↄↄ kà, kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i kà kãi. À nↄ̀sɛlilɛ, í baonapi sí.
Kɛ́ Yesu lɛ́ dↄ Galile ísidai, à kpↄ̀wɛnaↄ è, Simↄↄ ń a dãuna Ãndeleeo, aalɛ táalu zu ísidapi guu.
Ɔ̃ Yesu ònɛ́: À mↄ tɛmazi, mí á kɛ gbɛ̃wɛɛlɛnaↄ ũ.
Wegↄ̃ↄ aa ń táaluↄ tò we, aa bↄ̀ tɛaàzi.
Kɛ́ à gɛ̀ aɛ yↄↄ, à Zebedee nɛ́ↄ è, Zaaki ń a dãuna Zãao. Aa ku gó'ilɛna guu, aalɛ ń táaluↄ kɛkɛ.
À ń sisi gↄ̃̀ↄ, ↄ̃ aa ń mae Zebedee ń zĩkɛnaↄ tò gó guu we, aa bↄ̀ tɛaàzi.
Aa kà Kapɛnaũ. Kɛ́ kã́mabogↄↄzĩ kà, Yesu gɛ̀ lousisikpɛu, àlɛ yãdadanɛ́.
Aà yãdaanɛ́ bↄ̀ gbɛ̃́ↄ saɛ, asa ì danɛ́ ń ikooɛ, ìli kɛ lán Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdeↄwao.
Zĩbeezĩ gↄ̃ɛ tã́adee ku kpɛ́pi guu. Aà tã́a mↄ̀, a pũ̀na à mɛ̀:
Bↄ́ wá vĩ ń kↄ̃oi Yesu Nazalɛti? N mↄ wá kaalɛi yã̀? Má dↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ń dɛ a ũ. Lua gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a kua adoan n ũ.
Ɔ̃ Yesu gì tã́apiɛ à mɛ̀: Nílɛ! Go gbɛ̃́piwa.
Ɔ̃ tã́api aà zĩ̀azĩa, à wii gbãa lɛ̀, ↄ̃ à gòwà.
Bíli gbɛ̃́pii kũ̀, aalɛ kↄ̃ lala aa mɛ̀: Bↄtaa bui yã́n wei? Yã́ dafu daanɛ́ yã̀? Ì danɛ́ ń ikooɛ. Baa tã́aↄ, tó à yãdìlɛnɛ́, aaì aà yãmaɛ.
Ɔ̃ kã́ndo Yesu tↄ́ lì Galile bùsua píi.
Kɛ́ Yesu bↄ̀ lousisikpɛu, ↄ̃ à tà Simↄↄ ń Ãndeleeo bɛ gↄ̃̀ↄ ń Zaakio ń Zãao.
Simↄↄ nada lɛ́ sionakɛ wúlɛa, ↄ̃ wà aà yã'ò Yesuɛ gↄ̃̀ↄ.
À gɛ̀ aà kĩ́i, à aà kũ̀ a ↄwa à aà fɛ̀lɛ. Ɔ̃ aà sionapi wèewà, ↄ̃ à blɛkɛ̀nɛ́.
Kɛ́ oosi kɛ̀, ĩatɛ̃ lɛ́ gɛ̃ kpɛ́u, wà mↄ̀ɛ̀ ń gyãeↄ ń tã́adeↄ píi.
Wɛ̃́lɛdeↄ kã̀aa aà kpɛ́ kpɛɛlɛ píi.
À gbɛ̃́ↄ gbã̀gbã dasi ń ń gyã bui píio, à tã́aↄ gò dasidasi. Ìli tã́aↄ gba zɛ́ aa yã'òo, asa aa dↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a dɛ a ũ.
Gufɛ̃nɛ káaukaau Yesu fɛ̀lɛ bↄ̀ gɛ̀ sɛ̃u gusaɛna, àlɛ wabikɛ we.
Ɔ̃ Simↄↄ ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ pɛ̀lɛaàzi.
Kɛ́ aa bↄ̀wà, aa òɛ̀: Gbɛ̃́pii lɛ́ n gbɛa.
Ɔ̃ a ònɛ́: Wà gɛ́ gupãlei, wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ kú wá saɛↄ guu, mí waasokɛ we lↄ, asa a yã́i ma mↄi.
Màa ìↄ bɛbɛ Galile bùsu gupiiu, ìↄ waasokɛ an lousisikpɛↄ guu, ìↄ tã́agonɛ́.
Ɔ̃ kusudee mↄ̀ aà kĩ́i, à kùlɛ à wabikɛ̀wà à mɛ̀: Tó ń yei, ńyↄ̃ to mà gↄ̃ sãasai.
À kɛ̀ Yesuɛ wɛ̃naũ, ↄ̃ à ↄbↄ à nàwà à mɛ̀: Má yei, gↄ̃ sãasai.
Wegↄ̃ↄ aà kusu làa, à gↄ̃̀ sãasai.
Ɔ̃ Yesu aà gbàɛ gↄ̃̀ↄ, à gìɛ̀ à mɛ̀:
Ńsu o gbɛ̃e mao. Gɛ ǹ nzĩa ↄlↄ sa'onaɛ, ní sa pↄ́ Mↄizi dìlɛ o n gↄ̃a sãasai seela ũ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ.
Kɛ́ à bↄ̀, à gɛ̀ lɛ́ yã́pi o'onɛ́. Yã́pi fã̀aa, ↄ̃ Yesu lí fↄ̃ gɛ̃̀ wɛ̃́lɛu gupuau lↄo. Ìↄ ku sɛ̃u gusaɛnaɛ, ↄ̃ wìↄ bↄ gupiiu wàↄ mↄ aà kĩ́i.
Gↄↄpla gbɛa Yesu ɛ̀a tà Kapɛnaũ. Kɛ́ wa mà a ku bɛ,
ↄ̃ wà kã̀aaaàzi dasidasi, gɛ̃kĩi kú lↄo baa kpɛɛlɛ, àlɛ Lua yã'onɛ́.
Ɔ̃ wà mↄ̀ɛ̀ ń gbɛ̃kaaũao, gbɛ̃ↄn síiↄ̃ↄ mɛ́ aa aà sɛa.
Lá aai e sↄ̃̀ò Yesuzio dasi yã́i, ↄ̃ aa dɛ̀dɛò musu, aa kpɛ́ fↄ̃̀ gu pↄ́ Yesu kúu, ↄ̃ aa gbɛ̃kaaũapi pìla wúlɛa mákɛlɛ guu.
Kɛ́ Yesu è aalɛ a náaikɛ, a ò gbɛ̃kaaũapiɛ à mɛ̀: Ma gbɛ̃́, n duuna kɛ̃̀ma.
Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdeeↄ zↄ̃lɛa we, aalɛ o ń nↄ̀sɛ guu:
Bↄ́yãi gbɛ̃́pi lɛ́ oi màai? Àlɛ dↄ́ɛ ń Luaoɛ! Démɛ a fↄ̃ duunakɛ̃mái, mɛ́ i kɛ Lua ado bàasio?
Wegↄ̃ↄ Yesu dↄ̃̀ a nↄ̀sɛ guu làasoo pↄ́ aalɛ kɛ, ↄ̃ à ń lá à mɛ̀: Bↄ́yãi álɛ làasoo bee taa kɛ á nↄ̀sɛ guui?
Tó má ò gbɛ̃kaaũapiɛ aà duuna kɛ̃̀wà, ge tó má òɛ̀ aà fɛlɛ a mákɛlɛ sɛ táa'o, a kpele mɛ́ àai?
Má ò màa kɛ́ àↄ dↄ̃ Gbɛ̃nazĩn Nɛ́ duunakɛ̃ama iko vĩ tↄↄlɛ laɛ. Ɔ̃ a ò gbɛ̃kaaũapiɛ à mɛ̀:
Málɛ onɛ, fɛlɛ ǹ n mákɛlɛ sɛ ta bɛ.
Ɔ̃ à fɛ̀lɛ gↄ̃̀ↄ, à a mákɛlɛpi sɛ̀ bↄ̀ò gbɛ̃́pii wáa. Yã́pi bↄ̀ ń saɛ, ↄ̃ aa Lua tↄbↄ̀ aa mɛ̀: Wi yã́ɛ taa e yãao.
Yesu ɛ̀a bↄ̀ gɛ̀ ísidalɛ. Wàlɛ mↄ́ aà kĩ́i dasidasi, ↄ̃ àlɛ yãdanɛ́.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ àlɛ gɛ̃, à Alafe nɛ́ Levii è zↄ̃lɛa a ↄsikpɛu, ↄ̃ a òɛ̀: Mↄ tɛmazi. Ɔ̃ à fɛ̀lɛ tɛ̀aàzi.
Zĩewa kɛ́ Yesu lɛ́ pↄble aà bɛ, ↄsinaↄ ń duunkɛnaↄ lɛ́ pↄbleaànↄ dasidasi ń aà ìwaↄ sãnu. Asa gbɛ̃́ bee taaↄ tɛaàzi dasiɛ.
Falisi pↄ́ aaì Mↄizi ikoyã danɛ́ↄ ku we. Kɛ́ aa è Yesu lɛ́ pↄble sãnu ń ↄsinaↄ ń duunkɛnaↄ, ↄ̃ aa aà ìwaↄ là aa mɛ̀: Bↄ́yãi ì pↄble sãnu ń ↄsinaↄ ń duunkɛnaↄi?
Kɛ́ Yesu yã́pi mà, a ònɛ́: Gbɛ̃́ gbãa bàa kú ń lòotoooo, sema gyãe. Mi mↄ gbɛ̃maaↄ sísiio, sema duunkɛnaↄ.
Zãa Da'ilɛna ìwaↄ ń Falisiↄ lɛ́ lɛye, ↄ̃ wà mↄ̀ Yesu là wà mɛ̀: Zãa ìwaↄ ń Falisiↄ ìwaↄ aaì lɛye, mɛ́ n ìwaↄ lí ye sↄ̃o bɛ?
Ɔ̃ Yesu ònɛ́: Nↄsɛna gbɛ̃́ↄ lɛye gↄↄ pↄ́ a kúńnↄ nↄsɛ guue? Aawo! Gↄↄ pↄ́ nↄsɛna kúńnↄ, aa lɛyeo.
A gↄↄ a mↄ kɛ́ wa nↄsɛna bↄ ń guu. Gↄↄ bee ↄ̃ aa lɛye sa.
À mɛ̀ lↄ: Wìli pↄ́lɛ dafu di ula zi guuo. Tó wa kɛ̀ màa, a dafu a sↄ̃ↄuɛ, aai kↄ̃ gá, ula zi fↄ̃a i kã́fĩ.
À mɛ̀ lↄ: Wìli vɛ̃ɛ dafu ká báa tùu zi guuo. Tó wa kɛ̀ màa, vɛ̃ɛ a a pũnaɛ, vɛ̃ɛ ń tùupio i ↄ̃̀ↄkpa píi. Wì vɛ̃ɛ dafu ká báa tùu dafu guuɛ.
Kã́mabogↄↄzĩ Yesu lɛ́ pã blɛ bua. Lá àlɛ gɛ́, aà ìwaↄ lɛ́ pↄ́wɛna wolo aalɛ só.
Ɔ̃ Falisiↄ ò Yesuɛ aa mɛ̀: Gwa! Aalɛ yã́ pↄ́ wìli kɛ kã́mabogↄↄzĩo kɛ sↄ̃ bɛ?
Ɔ̃ Yesu ń lá à mɛ̀: Lá Davidi kɛ̀ gↄↄ pↄ́ aàpi ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ aalɛ taasikɛ, nↄana lɛ́ ń dɛ, i a kyokɛ á èo lé?
À gɛ̃̀ Lua ua sa'onkia Abiataa gↄↄ, ↄ̃ à pɛ̃ɛ pↄ́ wa kàlɛ Luaɛ sò, ↄ̃ a kpà a gbɛ̃́ↄwa. Sa'onaↄ bàasio gbɛ̃e lí pɛ̃ɛpi so sↄ̃o.
Yesu ɛ̀a ònɛ́ lↄ à mɛ̀: Lua kã́mabogↄↄ dìlɛ gbɛ̃nazĩna aafia yã́iɛ. I kɛ kã́mabogↄↄ yã́i ↄ̃ à gbɛ̃nazĩna kɛ̀io.
Ayãmɛto Gbɛ̃nazĩn Nɛ́ iko vĩ kã́mabogↄↄwa sↄ̃.
Yesu ɛ̀a gɛ̀ lousisikpɛu. Gbɛ̃e ku we, aà ↄ do imia.
Falisiↄ lɛ́ Yesu tàasika, tó a su à aà gbã́gbã kã́mabogↄↄzĩ, wi e yãdaaàla.
Ɔ̃ Yesu ò gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a ↄ imiapiɛ à mɛ̀: Fɛlɛ mↄ zɛ zã guu la.
Ɔ̃ à ń lá à mɛ̀: Kã́mabogↄↄzĩ a zɛvĩ wà yãmaakɛa, ge vãiɛ? Wì gbɛ̃́ misi yã̀, ge wì dɛɛ? Ɔ̃ aai yãe oo.
Yesu wɛpã̀ńla à ń gwá ń pↄfɛ̃o, asa aà pↄ yà an nↄ̀sɛsai yã́iɛ. Ɔ̃ a ò gↄ̃ɛpiɛ à mɛ̀: Ǹ n ↄpi poo. Kɛ́ a pòo, ↄ̃ aà ↄpi sù a gbɛu.
Ɔ̃ Falisiↄ ń kí Elodi kpala zɛnkpɛdeↄ bↄ̀lɛ gɛ̀ lɛkpaaĩi Yesuzi gↄ̃̀ↄ, lá aa kɛ aa aà dɛ.
Yesu ń a ìwaↄ ńzĩa gànɛ́ we, aa gɛ̀ ísidalɛ. Ɔ̃ bíla bↄ̀ Galile aa tɛ̀aàzi. Aa bↄ̀ Yude lↄ
ń Yelusalɛũo ń Ɛdↄũ bùsuo ń Yuudɛ̃ baaleo ń Tiio ń Sidↄ̃o, aa mↄ̀ aà kĩ́i dasidasi, kɛ́ aa yã́ pↄ́ àlɛ kɛↄ bao mà yã́i.
Bílapi yã́i Yesu ò a ìwaↄnɛ aa gó'ilɛna sↄukɛɛ, kɛ́ wasu naɛwao yã́i.
Asa Yesu ìↄ gbɛ̃́ↄ gbãgbã dasiɛ, ↄ̃ gyãeↄ lɛ́ naɛwà dasi kɛ́ aa e ↄkãwà.
Tã́adeↄ sↄ̃, tó aa aà wɛpà, aaì mↄ wúlɛ aà aɛɛ, aaì wiilɛ aa mɛ: Lua Nɛ́n n ũ.
Ɔ̃ Yesu ì gínɛ́ aa o gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ á dɛ a ũ.
Kɛ́ Yesu dɛ̀dɛ sĩ̀sĩwa, à gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a yeiↄ sìsi, ↄ̃ aa mↄ̀ aà kĩ́i.
Ɔ̃ à gbɛ̃ↄn kuɛplaↄ dìlɛ aaↄ kuanↄ, kɛ́ àↄ ń zĩ waasokɛi
mɛ́ aaↄ tã́agoamá iko vĩ. À tↄkpànɛ́ zĩnaↄ.
An tↄ́n kɛ: Simↄↄ (Yesu tↄkpàɛ̀ Piɛɛ),
Zebedee nɛ́ↄ Zaaki ń a dãuna Zãao (Yesu tↄkpànɛ́ Bↄanɛɛgɛ, bee mɛ̀ loupũnaadeↄ),
bee gbɛa Ãndelee, Filipi, Batelemii, Matiee, Tomaa, Alafe nɛ́ Zaaki, Tade, Simↄↄ Gínzĩao
ń Yudasi Isaliↄti pↄ́ bↄ̀ aà kpɛo. Ɔ̃ Yesu ɛ̀a tà bɛ.
Bíla ɛ̀a kã̀aa lↄ, ↄ̃ Yesu ń a ìwaↄ aai zɛ'e baa aa pↄblèo.
Kɛ́ aà daɛↄ yã́pi mà, aa dà aà gbɛsizɛu, asa wàlɛ mɛ ĩ́ana kàwàɛ.
Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛde pↄ́ aa bↄ̀ Yelusalɛũ aa mↄ̀ↄ mɛ̀: Tã́aↄ kí Beezebu mɛ́ diɛ̀, ì tã́agonɛ́ ń aà tↄ́oɛ.
Ɔ̃ Yesu ń laai sìsi à yãtaa ònɛ́ à mɛ̀: Setãu a we azĩa gbɛ̃́ↄ goé?
Tó kpaladeↄ íbɛlɛsɛ̀ ń kↄ̃o aa kɛ̃̀aa lɛɛ pla, kpalapi a gɛ̃gɛ̃e?
Tó uadeↄ íbɛlɛsɛ̀ ń kↄ̃o aa kɛ̃̀aa lɛɛ pla, uapi a gɛ̃gɛ̃e?
Tó Setãu íbɛlɛsɛ̀ ń azĩa gbɛ̃́ↄ aa kɛ̃̀aakↄ̃wa, a gɛ̃gɛ̃o, a midɛɛ.
Gbɛ̃e a fↄ̃ gɛ̃ gↄ̃sa gbãa kpɛ́u à taiinakaɛ̀o, sema à aà ye gĩa bàasio, i gbasa a aà kpɛ́ yↄɛ.
Sĩana málɛ oɛ́, Lua a gbɛ̃́ↄ kɛ̃́ ń ń tàaeↄ ń a tↄ́ bɛ̃̀ɛ pↄ́ aaì siↄ píi,
ãma tó gbɛ̃́ aà Nisĩna tↄbɛ̃ɛsì, a aà kɛ̃o, à duuna pↄ́ lí kɛ̃́máo kɛ̀ɛ.
Yesu bee ò kɛ́ aa mɛ̀ a tã́a vĩ yã́iɛ.
Kɛ́ aà da ń aà dãunaↄ kà, aa zɛ̀ kpɛɛlɛ, ↄ̃ aa aà gbɛ̀a.
Wa kálɛa liaaaàzi dasidasi, ↄ̃ wa òɛ̀ wà mɛ̀: Gwa! N da ń n dãunaↄ zɛ kpɛɛlɛ, aalɛ n gbɛa.
Ɔ̃ à mɛ̀: Deↄn ma da ń ma dãunaↄ ũi?
Ɔ̃ à wɛpã̀ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kálɛa liaaaziↄla à mɛ̀: Ma da ń ma dãunaↄn kɛ.
Luapↄeãkɛnaↄ mɛ́ ma dãuna ń ma dãeo ń ma dao ũ.
Yesu ɛ̀a lɛ́ yãdanɛ́ ísida saɛ. Wà kã̀aaaàzi dasidasi, ↄ̃ à gɛ̃̀ zↄ̃̀lɛ gó'ilɛnau ía, dasipi kálɛa ḿpii ísida gↄ̃sↄ̃lɛ.
À yãdàdanɛ́ ń yãlɛɛũanɛo dasi. Lá àlɛ dadanɛ́ à mɛ̀:
À swã́kpa! Zↄ̃ɛe mɛ́ kú à bↄ̀ gɛ̀ pↄ́wɛnakɛɛlɛi.
Lá àlɛ kɛɛlɛ, ↄ̃ a keeↄ lɛ̀lɛ zɛ́ guu, bãↄ mↄ blè.
A keeↄ lɛ̀lɛ gbɛsɛɛna musu, gua pↄ́ tↄↄlɛ gèeleuo, ↄ̃ aa bↄ̀lɛ gↄ̃̀ↄ, kɛ́ tↄↄlɛ gèele weo yã́i.
Kɛ́ ĩatɛ̃ fɛ̀lɛ, ↄ̃ aa tɛkũ̀ aa giigàga, kɛ́ aa zĩ́na vĩo yã́i.
A keeↄ lɛ̀lɛ lɛ guu, ↄ̃ lɛ fɛ̀lɛ nàɛmá, aai nɛ'io.
A keeↄ sↄ̃ aa lɛ̀lɛ tↄↄlɛ maa guu. Aa bↄ̀lɛ aa zↄ̃ↄkũ̀ aa nɛ'ì. A keeↄ kã́fĩakɛ̀ baakwikwi, keeↄ bàaↄ̃baaↄ̃, keeↄ basↄobasↄo.
Ɔ̃ Yesu mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ nↄ̀sɛ vĩ aà yã́pi ma.
Kɛ́ Yesu gònɛ́ we, a ku ado, ↄ̃ aà zĩna gbɛ̃ↄn kuɛplaↄ ń aà ìwaↄ mↄ̀ yã́piↄ mi gbɛ̀awà.
Ɔ̃ a ònɛ́: Á kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i asii dↄ̃a zɛ́ vĩ, ãma mi yã́pii o gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄnɛ ń yãlɛɛũaoɛ,
kɛ́ aa wɛbiibii pↄe'esai mɛ́ aa swã́kpakpa yãmasai, kɛ́ aasu zɛ ń Luao, i sùuukɛńnↄo yã́i.
Ɔ̃ Yesu ń lá à mɛ̀: Á yã́pi dↄ̃oa? Kpelewa á a kĩniↄ ma lↄi?
À ma! Zↄ̃ɛpi Lua yã́ ↄ̃ àlɛ kɛɛlɛ.
Gbɛ̃eↄ dɛ lán pↄ́wɛna pↄ́ lɛ̀lɛ zɛ́ guuwaɛ, gu pↄ́ wà Lua yã́ kɛ̀ɛlɛu. Tó aa mà, ↄ̃ Setãu ì mↄ Lua yã́ pↄ́ wa kɛ̀ɛlɛ ń guupi símá gↄ̃̀ↄ.
Gbɛ̃eↄ dɛ lán pↄ́wɛna pↄ́ lɛ̀lɛ gbɛsɛɛna musuwa. Tó aa Lua yãmà, aaì sí ń pↄnao gↄ̃̀ↄ.
Ãma lá aa zĩ́na vĩo, ↄ̃ aali kɛ gↄↄplao. Tó wà ń wɛtã̀ ge wà ĩadàmá Lua yã́ yã́i, aaì fu gↄ̃̀ↄɛ.
Gbɛ̃eↄ dɛ lán pↄ́wɛna pↄ́ lɛ̀lɛ lɛ guuwaɛ. Aa Lua yãmà,
ãma aaì aafia kã̀akɛ, àizɛɛ ì ń sↄ̃ ble mɛ́ aaì pↄ́ kĩniↄ niaka, ↄ̃ yã́ beeↄ ì gupa Lua yã́pizi, à gↄ̃ àisai.
Gbɛ̃eↄ dɛ lán pↄ́wɛna pↄ́ lɛ̀lɛ tↄↄlɛ maawaↄwa. Aaì Lua yãma, aaì sí, ↄ̃ aaì kã́fĩakɛ, an keeↄ baakwikwi, keeↄ bàaↄ̃baaↄ̃, keeↄ basↄobasↄo.
Yesu ònɛ́: Wìli filia na wà pɛ̃na kùlɛwào. Wìli dilɛ lii zíɛo. Bábana ↄ̃ wì diwào lò?
Pↄe ku ulɛa kɛ́ à gí bↄi gupuauo. Asiie ku kɛ́ wà gí maio.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ nↄ̀sɛ vĩ, aà swã́kpa yã́pi ma.
A ònɛ́ lↄ: À laaidↄ yã́ pↄ́ álɛ mawa. Zaa pↄ́ á dàunɛ́, bee Lua a dauɛ́ sↄ̃, i ɛa kã́fĩɛ́.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ pↄ́ vĩ ↄ̃ Lua a ɛa kã́fĩɛ̀. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ pↄe vĩo, baa a yↄↄna pↄ́ a vĩ Lua a siwàɛ.
À mɛ̀ lↄ: Kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i dɛ lán pↄ́wɛna pↄ́ gbɛ̃́ kɛ̀ɛlɛ buawaɛ.
Gwãasĩna ń fãanɛo àlɛ i'on nò, a bɛ̃́ɛn nò, pↄ́wɛnapi ì bↄlɛ ì zↄ̃ↄkũ, gbɛ̃́pi líↄ dↄ̃ lá ì kɛo.
Tↄↄlɛ mɛ́ ì to à nɛ'i ń azĩao. Ì kakpa gĩaɛ, a gbɛa ì nↄsi, a gbɛa ↄ̃ ì pia.
Tó à mà, ↄ̃ wì kɛ̃́ ń kↄmao, asa a kɛkɛgↄↄ mɛ́ kà we.
À mɛ̀ lↄ: Kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i dɛa ni? Bↄ́ wa lɛɛũòi?
Doe ku lán ɛfↄwa. A tↄ̃gↄↄ a wɛ́na kele dɛ pↄ́wɛna pↄ́ kú dṹnia guuↄla píi.
Tó wa tↄ̃̀ sↄ̃, ì bↄlɛ à zↄ̃ↄkũ dɛ dò buiↄla píi. Ì gↄ̃n gèeleↄ pápa, bãↄ iↄ kaka a láu.
Yesu Lua yã'ònɛ́ dasi ń yãlɛɛũa bee taaↄ lá aa fↄ̃ ma lɛ́u.
I yã'onɛ́ yãlɛɛũsaio. Tó à gↄ̃̀ ń a ìwaↄ ńtɛ̃ɛ, ↄ̃ ì yã́pii bↄↄlɛkɛnɛ́.
Gↄↄ doũpi zĩ́ oosi Yesu ò a ìwaↄnɛ à mɛ̀: Wà bua baale.
Lá Yesu kú gó guu, aa gɛ̃̀uaànↄ aa dàzɛu màa, aa bíla tò we. Gó pãleↄ gɛ̀ńnↄ.
Ɔ̃ zàa'ĩan gbãa fɛ̀lɛ. Í lɛ́ gó zãampapa, àlɛ ká a guu e a ye pai.
Yesu kú gò pↄ̀ↄkpɛ, àlɛ i'o, aà mi di mìbↄↄwa. Ɔ̃ aà ìwaↄ aà vù aa òɛ̀: Mɛtulu! Kɛ́ wálɛ gaga, àlɛ kã̀adanlao lé?
Ɔ̃ Yesu fɛ̀lɛ gì ĩ́anaɛ, a ò íɛ à mɛ̀: Nílɛ! Zùukɛ we! Ɔ̃ ĩ́ana kpàlɛ, gu kɛ̀ kílikili.
Ɔ̃ à ń lá à mɛ̀: Àkɛa á sea vĩ màai? Asi álɛ ma náaikɛ e tiaoa?
Ɔ̃ aa gↄ̃̀ bíli guu, aalɛ kↄ̃ lala aa mɛ̀: Dén gbɛ̃́pi ũ sai? Baa ĩ́ana ń ío aaì aà yãmaɛ.
Aa kà Gadala bùsuu ísida baale.
Kɛ́ Yesu bↄ̀ gó guu gↄ̃̀ↄ, tã́adee bↄ̀ gɛvĩkĩi à mↄ̀ daiaàlɛ.
Ìↄ ku gbɛ̀'ɛ pↄ́ dɛ mia ũↄ guuɛ. Baa mↄdaona lí fↄ̃ aà kũ̀ lↄo.
Asa wìↄ aà ye ń mↄdaonaↄ, wìↄ aà daliu mↄ̀ↄmↄↄɛ, ãma ì mↄpiↄ kɛ̃́kɛ̃ɛ, ì lípiↄ gboogboo. Gbɛ̃e gbãa i ka à aà zùukɛo.
Gwãasĩna ń fãanɛo píi ìↄ bɛbɛ gɛvĩkĩi ń sĩ̀sĩpↄlɛↄɛ, ìↄ wiilɛ, ìↄ azĩa lili ń gbɛo.
Kɛ́ à Yesu è kãaa, ↄ̃ à bàalɛ̀ mↄ̀ wùlɛ aà aɛ.
Ɔ̃ Yesu mɛ̀ tã́api gowà, ↄ̃ à wii gbãa lɛ̀ à mɛ̀: Yesu, Lua Musude Nɛ́, bↄ́mɛ wá daaai? Ma nanɛ Luazi, ńsu ǹ ma wɛtão.
