Ɔ̃ Yesu aà là à mɛ̀: N tↄ́n kpelewai? Ɔ̃ a wèwà à mɛ̀: Ma tↄ́n Dasi, asa wá dasiɛ.
Ɔ̃ aa awakpà Yesuɛ maamaa aa mɛ̀ asu ń yá ń bↄ́lɛ bùsupiuo.
Gↄↄ bee sàwakusan waiↄ ku we, aalɛ pↄble sĩ̀sĩpↄlɛu.
Ɔ̃ tã́apiↄ wabikɛ̀ Yesuwa aa mɛ̀: Wá gbaɛ sàwaↄ guu wà dinɛ́.
Yesu ń gbá zɛ́, ↄ̃ tã́apiↄ gò gↄ̃ɛpiwa aa dì sàwapiↄnɛ. Ɔ̃ sàwa wai pↄ́ kà ↄ̀aa kwi taawapiↄ wì ń bao, aa pìla sòonawa aa sì ísidau, ↄ̃ aa gàga we.
Ɔ̃ an dãnaↄ bàalɛ̀ gɛ̀ yã́pi oinɛ́ wɛ̃́lɛu ń bualoũↄ. Ɔ̃ wà bↄ̀lɛ gɛ̀ yã́ pↄ́ kɛ̀pi gwai.
Kɛ́ aa mↄ̀ Yesu kĩ́i, aa gↄ̃ɛ pↄ́ tã́a diɛ̀ dasi yãapi è zↄ̃lɛa we, a ula daa, aà ĩ́anapi wèewà, ↄ̃ vĩa ń kṹ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ yã́pi è ń wɛ́oↄ yã́ pↄ́ tã́adepi ń sàwaↄ lè dàu aa sìunɛ́.
Ɔ̃ wà wabikɛ̀ Yesuwa aà bↄnɛ́ ń bùsuu.
Kɛ́ Yesu lɛ́ gɛ̃ gó'ilɛna guu, gↄ̃ɛpi wabikɛ̀wà à e taaànↄ.
Yesu i weio, a òɛ̀: Ta n bɛ n gbɛ̃́ↄ kĩ́i, ní yã́ pↄ́ Dii kɛ̀nɛ onɛ́ píi ń lá à wɛ̃nadↄ̃̀nɛo.
Ɔ̃ gↄ̃ɛpi tà, àlɛ yã́ pↄ́ Yesu kɛ̀ɛ kpàwakɛ Wɛ̃́lɛmɛnkwi bùsuu, ↄ̃ yã́pi kɛ̀ gbɛ̃́piiɛ dabuyã ũ.
Yesu ɛ̀a bùa ísidawa ń góo, ↄ̃ wà kã̀aaaàzi dasidasi ísidalɛ.
Lousisikpɛ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ Zailu mↄ̀ we. Kɛ́ à Yesu è, à wùlɛ aà gbázĩ,
ↄ̃ à awakpàɛ̀ maamaa à mɛ̀: Ma nɛnↄɛna lɛ́ kãsãnakɛ. Mↄ ǹ ↄnawà aà gbã́gbã, iↄ ku.
Ɔ̃ Yesu dàaànↄ zɛ́u. Bíla tɛaàzi, aalɛ naɛwà.
Nↄɛe ku we, au lɛ́ bↄlɛwà à kà wɛ̃̀ kuɛpla.
Ɛsɛdeↄ aà dà taasiu maamaa, à a ↄ̃a blè píi. I aafiaʼeo, ì kɛkɛ àↄ ká'ilɛɛ.
Kɛ́ à Yesu bao mà, ↄ̃ à bíla kɛ̃̀aa à sↄ̃̀aàzi aà kpɛ oi. Ɔ̃ à ↄkã̀ aà ulawa,
asa à mɛ̀: Baa aà ula, tó ma ↄkã̀wà, má gbã́gbãɛ.
Ɔ̃ aà aubↄlɛapi zɛ̀ gↄ̃̀ↄ. À dↄ̃̀ a mɛ guu kɛ́ a gbãgbã ń a gyãpio.
Wegↄ̃ↄ Yesu dↄ̃̀ azĩawa kɛ́ gbãa bↄ̀agu, ↄ̃ à lìli bíla guu à mɛ̀: Démɛ ↄkã̀ ma ulawai?
Ɔ̃ aà ìwaↄ òɛ̀: Ń è lá bíla lɛ́ naɛma, ↄ̃ ńlɛ mɛ démɛ ↄkã̀maia?
Ɔ̃ Yesu wɛpã̀ bílaa kɛ́ à gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ yã́pi kɛ̀ e.
Nↄɛpi lɛ́ lualua ń vĩao, asa a dↄ̃ yã́ pↄ́ kɛ̀ a mɛu, ↄ̃ à mↄ̀ wùlɛ aà gbázĩ, à a sĩana òɛ̀ píi.
Ɔ̃ Yesu òɛ̀: Nↄɛ, ma náai pↄ́ ń kɛ̀ mɛ́ n gbãgbã. Ta bɛ aafia, n gyãpi wèeman we.
Lá Yesu lɛ́ yã́ bee o, wà bↄ̀ lousisikpɛ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi bɛ wà mↄ̀ wa òɛ̀: N nɛ́pi kɛ̀sai. Ńsu tákpa mɛtuluzi pão.
Ãma Yesu i swã́sɛ ń yã́io. A ò gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpiɛ: Ńsu to n sↄ̃ vĩo, ma náaikɛ lé.
I wei gbɛ̃e gɛ́ zɛiɛo, sema Piɛɛ ń Zaakio ń Zaaki dãuna Zãao.
Kɛ́ aa kà gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi bɛ, Yesu è aà bɛ lòo, wàlɛ ↄ́ↄlↄ, wàlɛ búbuapɛ maamaa.
Kɛ́ à gɛ̃̀ kpɛ́u, à ń lá à mɛ̀: Bↄ́yãi á kĩ́i dↄ, álɛ ↄ́ↄlↄi? Nɛ́pi i gao, àlɛ i'oɛ.
Kɛ́ aalɛ aà kɛ pↄ́ↄpↄↄ, ↄ̃ à ń yá ń bↄ́lɛ píi. Ɔ̃ à nɛ́pi de ń aà dao sɛ̀ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa mↄ̀ sãnuↄ, à gɛ̃̀ńnↄ gu pↄ́ nɛ́pi kuu.
Ɔ̃ à aà ↄ kũ̀ a òɛ̀: Talita kuũ! (Bee mɛ̀ nɛnↄɛna, má ònɛ fɛlɛ.)
Wegↄ̃ↄ nɛ́pi fɛ̀lɛ táa'ò, asa aà wɛ̃ kà kuɛpla. Yã́pi ń kṹ gbãa maamaa.
Ɔ̃ Yesu gìnɛ́ fĩ́afĩa aasu o gbɛ̃e mao. Ɔ̃ à mɛ̀ wà pↄblea kpawà.
Yesu bↄ̀ we à gɛ̀ gu pↄ́ à nɛblèu. Aà ìwaↄ gɛ̀aànↄ.
Kɛ́ kã́mabogↄↄzĩ kà, ↄ̃ àlɛ yãdanɛ́ lousisikpɛu. Gbɛ̃́ dasi pↄ́ aa aà yãmàↄ bílikɛ̀ aa mɛ̀: Mákĩi gbɛ̃́pi yã́piↄ sɛ̀ui? Ɔ̃nↄ kpele a è, ↄ̃ àlɛ dabudabu bee taaↄ kɛi?
Gbɛ̃́piá li'ãna nolo? Maliama nɛ́ nolo? Zaaki ń Yosɛfuo ń Yudao ń Simↄↄo vĩ̀in weo lò? Aà dãeↄ kúwanↄ kɛo lé? Ɔ̃ bee tò aai aà náaikɛo.
Ɔ̃ Yesu ònɛ́: Ãnabi líↄ bɛɛɛsaio, mɛ́ i kɛ aà bɛ wɛ̃́lɛu ń aà daɛↄ ń aà uadeↄ kĩ́io bàasio.
Yesu i e dabudabue kɛ̀ weo, sema gyãe pↄ́ à ↄnàmá à ń gbãgbãeↄ bàasio.
Lá aai aà náaikɛo, an yã́ bↄ̀ aà saɛ maamaaɛ. Ɔ̃ à gɛ̀ wɛ̃́lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛo, àlɛ yãdadanɛ́.
Ɔ̃ à a gbɛ̃ↄn kuɛplaↄ sìsi à ń zĩ́ gbɛ̃ↄn plapla, à tã́agoa gbɛ̃́ↄwa iko kpàmá.
A ònɛ́ aasu pↄe sɛ aa gɛòo, kũ̀sũa ge babalabↄↄ ge ↄsↄ̃gbɛna, sema gopana.
À mɛ̀ aa kyalekpa, ãma aasu ulada mɛ̀n plao.
A ònɛ́ lↄ: Gu pↄ́ a pilau, àↄ ku we e à gɛ bↄò wɛ̃́lɛpi guu.
Gu pↄ́ wi gbãakpauázio, mɛ́ wi á yãmao, tó álɛ tá, à kↄↄlɛmá an toa ń Luao seela ũ.
Ɔ̃ aa dàzɛu. Aa nↄ̀sɛlilɛa kpàwakɛ̀ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ,
aa tã́agònɛ́ dasi, aa nísimàma gyãeↄwa dasi, aa ń gbãgbã.
Kí Elodi yã́piↄ mà, asa Yesu tↄ́ lìguaɛ. Gbɛ̃eↄ mɛ̀ Zãa Da'ilɛna mɛ́ bↄ̀ gau. Bee yã́i à gbãa'è, àlɛ dabudabukɛ.
Gbɛ̃eↄ lɛ́ mɛ Ɛliaɛ, gbɛ̃eↄ lɛ́ mɛ ãnabiɛ lán ãnabi yãaewa.
Kɛ́ Elodi mà à mɛ̀: Zãa pↄ́ ma aà mi zↄ̃̀ mɛ́ vù.
À mↄ lè Elodi doũpi mɛ́ a dãuna Filipi nↄ Elodia sìwà a sɛ̀ yãa. Kɛ́ Zãa ìↄ oɛ̀ aà dãuna nↄ siawà maao, ↄ̃ Elodipi tò wà Zãa kũ̀ wà mↄkàwà, wà aà dàkpɛu Elodia yã́i.
<range>
Elodia sↄ̃ a Zãa kpɛ̃nɛ kũa, a ye à aà dɛ, ãma i zɛ'eo,
asa Elodi dↄ̃̀ kɛ́ Zãaá Lua gbɛ̃́ zálalaɛ, ↄ̃ ìↄ vĩakɛɛ̀, ìli tó wà ĩadawào. Tó à gɛ̀ aà yãmai, làasoo ì gɛ̃aàguɛ. Ń beeo ìↄ ye faaiboaaànↄi.
Elodia zɛ'è Elodi ia dikpɛgↄↄzĩ. Elodi gbãadeↄ ń sosa gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ń Galile gbɛ̃́ gbiaↄ kã̀aa pↄnablɛwa.
Ɔ̃ Elodiapi nɛnↄɛ gɛ̃̀ ↄ̃wã̀. À kɛ̀ Elodiɛ na ń a nibↄↄ píi, ↄ̃ kípi ò nɛ́piɛ: Pↄ́ pↄ́ ń yei ǹ a wabikɛa, má n gba.
Ɔ̃ à ɛ̀a òɛ̀: Ń ma iao pↄ́ pↄ́ ń a wabikɛ̀a píi, má n gbaɛ, baa ma kpala guoɛ.
Ɔ̃ nɛ́pi bↄ̀ gɛ̀ a da là à mɛ̀: Bↄ́ má a wabikɛwài? Ɔ̃ aà da òɛ̀, Zãa Da'ilɛna miɛ.
Wegↄ̃ↄ à ɛ̀a sù ń wãao, a ò kíaɛ: Zãa Da'ilɛna mi má ye ǹ ma gba pɛlɛntiu la tiatia.
Ɔ̃ kí pↄ yà dúuduu, ↄ̃ i fↄ̃ gì lↄo lɛ́ pↄ́ á gbɛ̃̀ nibↄↄ wáa yã́i.
Ɔ̃ kípi a dↄaie zĩ̀ gↄ̃̀ↄ, a òɛ̀ aà gɛ aà mi sɛ mↄò. Ɔ̃ à gɛ̀ aà mi zↄ̃̀ kpɛ́u,
a dà pɛlɛntiu, à mↄ kpà nɛ́piwa, ↄ̃ a kpà a dawa.
Kɛ́ Zãa ìwaↄ yã́pi mà, ↄ̃ aa mↄ̀ wà aà gɛ sɛ̀ aa vĩ̀.
Zĩnapiↄ sù Yesu kĩ́i, ↄ̃ aa yã́ pↄ́ aa kɛ̀ↄ ń yã́ pↄ́ aa dànɛ́ↄ òɛ̀ píi.
Wàlɛ mↄ́, wàlɛ tá, ↄ̃ Yesu ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ aai zɛ'e baa wà pↄblèo dasi yã́i. Ɔ̃ a ònɛ́: À mↄ wà gɛ́ gusaɛna wátɛ̃ɛ, wí kã́mabo yↄↄ.
Ɔ̃ aa gɛ̃̀ gó'ilɛnau aa dàzɛu, aalɛ gɛ́ gusaɛna ńtɛ̃ɛ.
Kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ↄ ń gɛa è, aa ń dↄ̃́, ↄ̃ bↄa wɛ̃́lɛ píi guu wà bàalɛ̀ dↄ̀aanɛ́ we kɛ̀sɛ.
Kɛ́ Yesu bↄ̀ gó guu, à bíla è, ↄ̃ aa kɛ̀ɛ̀ wɛ̃naũ, asa aa dɛ lán sã pↄ́ aa dãna vĩoↄwaɛ. Ɔ̃ àlɛ yãdadanɛ́ maamaa.
Kɛ́ ĩatɛ̃ bùsa, ↄ̃ aà ìwaↄ sↄ̃̀aàzi aa mɛ̀: Guɛá sɛ̃gbãɛ mɛ́ ĩatɛ̃ i gↄ̃ bíla lↄo.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ gbaɛ aa ta bualoũↄ ń zↄ̃ɛwia pↄ́ kú kãi laↄu, aai pↄ́ wɛɛlɛ lú aa ble.
Ɔ̃ Yesu a zãsìmá à mɛ̀: À pↄ́ kpámá aa ble. Ɔ̃ aa òɛ̀: Ń ye wà gɛ pɛ̃ɛ lu ã́nusu ↄwatɛ̃ ↄ̀aa do, wí mↄ́ kpámá aa ble yã̀?
Ɔ̃ Yesu ń lá à mɛ̀: Pɛ̃ɛ mɛ̀n ũma á vĩi? À gɛ gwa. Kɛ́ aa kà, aa mɛ̀: Pɛ̃ɛ ku mɛ̀n sↄo ń kpↄo mɛ̀n pla.
Ɔ̃ a ònɛ́: À gbɛ̃́ↄ zↄ̃lɛzↄ̃lɛ sɛ̃̀bↄlↄwa booloboolo.
Ɔ̃ aa zↄ̃̀lɛzↄ̃lɛ gã ń gão, booloeↄ gbɛ̃ↄn basↄo, booloeↄ gbɛ̃ↄn blakwi.
Ɔ̃ Yesu pɛ̃ɛ mɛ̀n sↄo ń kpↄ̀ mɛ̀n plapio sɛ̀, à wɛsɛ̀ musu à báaadàu. Ɔ̃ à pɛ̃ɛpi ɛ̀'ɛ kpà a ìwaↄwa, aa bìilɛ gbɛ̃́piↄnɛ. Ɔ̃ à kpↄ̀ mɛ̀n plapiↄ kpaalɛ̀nɛ́ ḿpii.
Ampii aa pↄblè wà kã̀.
Ɔ̃ wà pɛ̃ɛ miↄnaↄ ń kpↄ̀ kĩni pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ↄ sɛ̀lɛ gbí kuɛpla pai.
Gↄ̃ɛ pↄ́ aa pↄblèↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ sↄoɛ (5.000).
Ɔ̃ Yesu nàɛ a ìwaↄwa gↄ̃̀ↄ aa gɛ̃ gó guu aa dↄaaɛ Bɛsaida ísida baale e àↄ bíla gbaɛ.
Kɛ́ à lɛzà gbɛ̃́ↄwa a làa, ↄ̃ à dɛ̀dɛ sĩ̀sĩwa, à gɛ̀ wabikɛi.
Ĩatɛ̃ gɛ̃a kpɛ́u gó'ilɛna kú ísidaa mɛ́ Yesu kú sĩ̀sĩa ado.
Ɔ̃ a è gofĩa lɛ́ ĩadamá, kɛ́ ĩ́an gbãa lɛ́ gínɛ́ yã́i. Gufɛ̃nɛ ↄ̃ à gɛ̀ ń kĩ́i, àlɛ táa'o ía, ↄ̃ a kɛ̀ lá á ye gɛ̃máwa.
Kɛ́ aa aà è, àlɛ táa'o ía, aalɛ e gyaadeɛ, ↄ̃ aa wiilɛ̀.
Kɛ́ aa aà è ḿpii, gili gɛ̃̀ńgu. Ɔ̃ Yesu ònɛ́ gↄ̃̀ↄ: À sↄ̃dilɛ, mámɛ. Ásu to vĩa á kũo.
Kɛ́ à gɛ̃̀ gó guu, ↄ̃ ĩ́ana làa, ↄ̃ yã́pi ń kṹ gbãa,
asa an wɛ́ i kɛ̃ pɛ̃ɛ yã́ musuo, kɛ́ aa nↄ̀sɛ vĩo yã́i.
Kɛ́ aa bùa baa aa kà Gɛnɛzalɛti, ↄ̃ aa godↄ̀ we.
Kɛ́ aa bↄ̀lɛ gó guu, wà Yesu dↄ̃̀ gↄ̃̀ↄ,
ↄ̃ wà bàalɛ̀ gɛ̀ bùsupi kɛ̀ɛlɛ, wà gyãeↄ sɛ̀lɛ ń mákɛlɛo, gu pↄ́ wa mà a kuu píi wìↄ mↄoɛ̀.
Gua pↄ́ à gɛ̀u píi, zↄ̃ɛwiaↄ ge mɛɛwiaↄ ge bualoũↄ, wìↄ mↄɛ̀ ń gyãeↄɛ, wìↄ ń kálɛ gãaɛ, ↄ̃ wì wabikɛwà aà to aa ↄkã baa aà ula lɛ́wa. Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ↄkã̀wàↄ ì gbã́gbã píi.
Falisiↄ ń Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛde pↄ́ aa bↄ̀ Yelusalɛũeↄ mↄ̀ Yesu kĩ́i.
Aa è aà ìwaeↄ lɛ́ pↄble ↄpia ń gbãbↄ'io sai.
Asa Falisiↄ ń Yudaↄ píi aa ń deziↄ fɛlɛkaayã kũaɛ, aali pↄble ↄpia ń gbãbↄ'io saio.
Aali su ń ɛlɛo aa pↄblè zu'osaio. Aa fɛlɛkaayã pãleↄ kũa dasi. Beewa aaì gbãbↄ imibↄↄ ń taↄ ń ooↄnɛ.
Ɔ̃ Falisiↄ ń Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdepiↄ Yesu là aa mɛ̀: Bↄ́yãi n ìwaↄ líↄ wá deziↄ fɛlɛkaayã kũao ni? Aaì pↄble ↄpia ń gbãbↄ'io saiɛ.
Yesu wèmá à mɛ̀: Á mↄafilideↄ, Isaia dↄ̀aa á yã'ò wásawasa, lá a kɛ̃̀ láuwa à mɛ̀: Buipi ì ma kpɛla ń lɛ́oɛ, an sↄ̃ kua lↄo.
Aaì ma sísi pãɛ, gbɛ̃nazĩna ikoyãↄ ↄ̃ aaì danɛ́.
A pãkpà Lua ikoyãi, ↄ̃ á gbɛ̃nazĩna fɛlɛkaayã kũa.
Ɔ̃ Yesu ònɛ́ lↄ: Á pãa Lua yã́a kɛ́ à e àↄ á fɛlɛkaayã kũa maan wea?
Mↄizi mɛ̀ àli misiilɛ á de ń á daoɛ. À mɛ̀ lↄ, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a de ge a da kpɛbↄ̀, wà ade dɛ.
Ápiↄ sↄ̃ i mɛ tó gbɛ̃́ ò a de ge a daɛ pↄ́ pↄ́ á vĩ à dↄońlɛá Kↄↄbaniɛ,
a zɛvĩ à a de ń a dao kpɛlaò lↄo. (Kↄↄbani bee mɛ̀, à Lua gbà.)
Beewa i Lua yã́ bãdɛ á fɛlɛkaayã pↄ́ i dadanɛ́ yã́i. Yã́ bee taaↄ ↄ̃ i kɛ dasi.
Ɔ̃ Yesu ɛ̀a bíla laai sìsi à mɛ̀: À swã́kpa à ma yãma, ápii.
Pↄe ku kɛ́ à gɛ̃ gbɛ̃́ guu à to aà gbãlɛo. Pↄ́ pↄ́ bↄ̀ gbɛ̃́ guu ↄ̃mɛ ì to aà gbãlɛ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ nↄ̀sɛ vĩ aà yã́pi ma.
Kɛ́ à bíla tò we, à tà bɛ, ↄ̃ aà ìwaↄ yã́pi mi gbɛ̀awà.
A ònɛ́: Ápiↄ, i ↄ̃nↄkũ sↄ̃oa? Kɛ́ pↄe ku à gɛ̃ gbɛ̃́ guu à to ade gbãlɛo, á dↄ̃o lé?
Pↄ́pi lí gɛ̃ aà sↄ̃ guuo, sema aà gbɛɛu, ↄ̃ ì a bĩ́ikpɛkɛ. (Màa Yesu gbãbↄ̀ blɛ píiɛ.)
Ɔ̃ à mɛ̀: Yã́ pↄ́ ì bↄ gbɛ̃́ guu mɛ́ ì to ade gbãlɛ.
Za gbɛ̃nazĩna sↄ̃ guu ↄ̃ làasoo vãi ì bↄu: Káaluakaa, kpã́i'oa, gbɛ̃dɛa,
gbãsĩkɛa, bĩi, nↄ̀sɛvãi, mↄafili, wisaiyã, wɛbↄbↄa pↄ́i, gbɛ̃́sↄ̃sↄ̃a, makamaka ń mìsaiyão.
Yãvãipiↄ ì bↄ gbɛ̃nazĩna sↄ̃ guuɛ píi, ↄ̃ ì to aà gbãlɛ.
Yesu bↄ̀ we à gɛ̀ Tii bùsuu, ↄ̃ à pìla uaeu. A ye wà a dↄ̃o, ãma ìli e ùlɛo.
Nↄɛ pↄ́ a nɛnↄɛna tã́a vĩ Yesu bao mà gↄ̃̀ↄ, ↄ̃ à mↄ̀ wùlɛ aà gbázĩ.
Nↄɛpiá buipãleɛ, wà aà ì Silifinisi bùsuuɛ. À wabikɛ̀ Yesuwa aà tã́a goɛ a nɛ́wa.
Ɔ̃ Yesu òɛ̀: To wà blɛ kpá nɛ́ↄwa gĩa, asa a maa wà nɛ́ↄ blɛ sɛ wà zu gbɛ̃ↄnɛo.
Ɔ̃ nↄɛpi a zãsìwà à mɛ̀: Dii, baa gbɛ̃ pↄ́ wúlɛańziↄ ì nɛ́ↄ blɛ kasonaↄ pɛɛlɛɛ.
Yesu òɛ̀: N yãwea maa yã́i, tá, n nɛ́ tã́a gòwà.
Kɛ́ à kà bɛ, à a nɛ́ è wúlɛa pɛwa, tã́api gòwà sĩana.
Ɔ̃ Yesu fɛ̀lɛ Tii bùsuu à gɛ̀ Sidↄ̃, ↄ̃ à bↄ̀lɛ ń Wɛ̃́lɛmɛnkwi bùsuo e à gɛ̀ kà Galile ísidai.
Ɔ̃ wà mↄ̀ɛ̀ ń swãdo pↄ́ yã'o zĩ'ũaànↄo, wà wabikɛ̀wà aà ↄnawà.
Yesu bↄ̀aànↄ bíla guu ḿpla, à ↄtona pɛ̀pɛ aà swã́u. Kɛ́ à lɛ́'i kɛ̀ a ↄwa, ↄ̃ à kã̀ aà lɛ́nawa.
À wɛsɛ̀ musu à wè fɛ̀ɛɛ, ↄ̃ a òɛ̀: Ɛfata. (Bee mɛ̀ wɛ̃.)
Wegↄ̃ↄ gↄ̃ɛpi swã́ wɛ̃̀, aà lɛ́na gòlɛ, ↄ̃ à yã'ò wásawasa.
Yesu ò gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ aasu o gbɛ̃e mao, ãma aa gɛ̀ lɛ́ a kpàwakɛnɛ́ maamaa dɛ lá à gìnɛ́la.
Yã́pi dìmá maamaa à kɛ̀ zài, ↄ̃ aa mɛ̀: Aà yã́pii kɛa ìↄ maaɛ. Ì to baa swãdoↄ yãma, mɛ́ ì to lɛ́nanaalɛadeↄ yã'o.
I gɛ̃gɛ̃o bíla ɛ̀a kã̀aaaàzi lↄ. Aa pↄbleae vĩ lↄo, ↄ̃ Yesu a ìwaↄ sìsi a ònɛ́:
Gbɛ̃́piↄ kɛ̀mɛɛ wɛ̃naũ, asa a gↄↄ àaↄ̃n la kɛ́ aa kumanↄ, aa pↄe vĩ aa ble lↄo.
Tó ma ń gbáɛ aa ta bɛ ń nↄanao, an yɛ̃̀ɛɛ a láa zɛ́ guuɛ, asa an gbɛ̃eↄ bↄkĩi zã̀ɛ.
Ɔ̃ aà ìwaↄ aà là aa mɛ̀: Mákĩi wa blɛ eu sɛ̃gbãu la à gbɛ̃́piↄ kãi?
Ɔ̃ Yesu ń lá à mɛ̀: Pɛ̃ɛ mɛ̀n ũma á vĩi? Aa mɛ̀: Mɛ̀n soplaɛ.
Ɔ̃ a ò bílaɛ aa zↄ̃lɛ tↄↄlɛ. Ɔ̃ à pɛ̃ɛ mɛ̀n soplapi sɛ̀ à sáaukpà, a ɛ̀'ɛ kpà a ìwaↄwa aa kpaalɛ bílaɛ, ↄ̃ aa kpaalɛ̀nɛ́.
Aa kpↄ̀ nɛ́naↄ vĩ yↄↄ lↄ. Kɛ́ à báaadàu, a ònɛ́ aa ɛa bee kpaalɛnɛ́ lↄ.
Ɔ̃ aa blè aa kã̀, ↄ̃ wà a miↄna pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ↄ sɛ̀lɛ sↄ̀ sopla.
Gbɛ̃́piↄ kà ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ síiↄ̃ (4.000) taawa. Kɛ́ Yesu ń gbáɛ,
ↄ̃ à gɛ̃̀ gó'ilɛna guu ń a ìwaↄ, aa gɛ̀ Damanuta bùsuu.
Ɔ̃ Falisiↄ mↄ̀ lɛ́ lɛkpaakɛaànↄ, aalɛ líkpalɛwà, aalɛ wɛɛlɛ aà seelakɛnɛ́ ń Lua gbãao.
Ɔ̃ à wè fɛ̀ɛɛ à mɛ̀: Bↄ́yãi gbãgbɛ̃ↄ lɛ́ seela wɛɛlɛai? Sĩana málɛ oɛ́, má seelae kɛ gbãgbɛ̃ↄnɛo.
Ɔ̃ à ń tó we, à ɛ̀a gɛ̃̀ gó'ilɛna guu à tà baale.
À sã̀ aà ìwaↄgu aa pɛ̃ɛ kũ̀sũa sɛ́. Pɛ̃ɛ mɛ̀ndo mɛ́ gↄ̃̀nɛ́ gó guu.
Ɔ̃ Yesu lɛdàmá à mɛ̀: Àↄ kú ń laaio. À laaika Falisiↄ ń Elodiↄ pɛ̃ɛsɛ'ɛsɛi.
Ɔ̃ aalɛ okↄ̃ɛ aa mɛ̀: Kɛ́ wá pɛ̃ɛ vĩo yã́i a òi màa.
Yesu dↄ̃̀má, ↄ̃ à ń lá à mɛ̀: Bↄ́yãi álɛ o kɛ́ á pɛ̃ɛ vĩo yã́iɛi? E tia á wɛ́ i kɛ̃ á dↄ̃̀oa? Á nↄ̀sɛ vĩoa?
Á wɛ́ vĩ, ili gu'eoa? Á swã́ vĩ, ili yãmaoa? Yãe lí dↄáguoa?
Kɛ́ ma pɛ̃ɛ mɛ̀n sↄo ɛ̀'ɛ má kpà gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ sↄoↄwa (5.000), a a miↄna sɛ̀lɛ gbí ũma ni? Aa wèwà aa mɛ̀: Gbí kuɛplaɛ.
Yesu ɛ̀a ń lá à mɛ̀: Kɛ́ ma pɛ̃ɛ mɛ̀n sopla ɛ̀'ɛ má kpà gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ síiↄ̃ↄwa (4.000), a a miↄna sɛ̀lɛ sↄ ũma ni? Aa wèwà aa mɛ̀: Sↄ̀ soplaɛ.
Ɔ̃ a ònɛ́: E tia á wɛ́ i kɛ̃oa?
Kɛ́ aa kà Bɛsaida, ↄ̃ wà mↄ̀ɛ̀ ń vĩ̀ao, wà wabikɛ̀wà aà ↄkãwà.
Ɔ̃ à vĩ̀api kũ̀ a ↄwa, à bↄ̀aànↄ wɛ̃́nkpɛ. À lɛ́'i kɛ̀ aà wɛ́wa à ↄnàwà, ↄ̃ à aà là à mɛ̀: Ńlɛ gu'ea?
Ɔ̃ gↄ̃ɛpi wɛsɛ̀ musu à mɛ̀: Málɛ gbɛ̃́ↄ e, aa dɛ lán líↄ mɛ́ lɛ́ táa'o'owa.
Ɔ̃ Yesu ɛ̀a ↄnà aà wɛ́wa lↄ. Kɛ́ gↄ̃ɛpi wɛbìi, ↄ̃ aà wɛ́ wɛ̃̀, àlɛ pↄ́pii e sa wásawasa.
Ɔ̃ Yesu aà gbàɛ bɛ à mɛ̀: Ńsu bↄlɛ wɛ̃́lɛ guuo.
Kɛ́ Yesu lɛ́ gɛ́ ń a ìwaↄ Sezale Filipi bùsu zↄ̃ɛwiaↄ guu, ↄ̃ à a ìwaↄ là zɛ́ guu à mɛ̀: Dé wàlɛ o má dɛ a ũi?
Aa wèwà aa mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃eↄ ì mɛ Zãa Da'ilɛnaɛ, gbɛ̃eↄ ì mɛ Ɛlia. Wì ɛa mɛ lↄ ãnabi yãaen n ũ.
Ɔ̃ à ń lá à mɛ̀: Ápiↄ sↄ̃, dé i mɛ má dɛ a ũi? Piɛɛ wèwà à mɛ̀: Mɛsiin n ũ.
Ɔ̃ Yesu ń lɛpàpa aasu o gbɛ̃e mao.
Ɔ̃ à nà yãdaanɛ́wa à mɛ̀: Sema Gbɛ̃nazĩn Nɛ́ taasikɛ maamaa, gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ń sa'onkiaↄ ń Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdeↄ giaàzi, wi aà dɛ, a gↄↄ àaↄ̃de zĩ́ i vu.
À yã́pi ònɛ́ wásawasaɛ, ↄ̃ Piɛɛ gɛ̀aànↄ gusaɛ, àlɛ giɛ̀.
Kɛ́ Yesu lìli à a ìwaↄ gwà, ↄ̃ à gì Piɛɛɛ à mɛ̀: Gomɛɛ we Setãu! Lua làasoo lɛ́ dↄaanɛo, sema gbɛ̃nazĩna pↄ́.
Bee gbɛa Yesu bíla laai sìsi ń a ìwaↄ, a ònɛ́: Tó gbɛ̃́ ye kɛ ma ìwa ũ, aà gi azĩa wɛ̃nii, i a lipãakↄ̃a sɛ́, i tɛmazi.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ye àↄ a wɛ̃ni kũa, a kua a wɛ̃nipiwaɛ. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gì a wɛ̃nii ma yã́i ń ma baona yã́o lↄ, ade mɛ́ aↄ ku.
Tó gbɛ̃́ gↄ̃̀ dṹnia bṹu vĩ mɛ́ à kùa ziawa, bↄ́ ài bee vĩi?
Bↄ́ gbɛ̃́ a fĩaboò à zia'ei?
Tó gbɛ̃́ zɛamanↄ ge ń ma yã́ↄ widɛ̀ gbãgbɛ̃ duunde luanaaikɛnsaiↄ guu, Gbɛ̃nazĩn Nɛ́ a zɛaaànↄ widɛ sↄ̃ɛ, gↄↄ pↄ́ a mↄ a Mae gawi guu ń a malaikaↄ.
Ɔ̃ a ònɛ́: Sĩana málɛ oɛ́, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú laeↄ ga kía pↄ́ Lua kpà mↄa ń gbãao esaio.
Gↄↄ soolo gbɛa Yesu Piɛɛ ń Zaakio ń Zãao sɛ̀ à dɛ̀dɛńnↄ gbɛ̀sĩsĩ lɛsĩwa ńtɛ̃ɛ. Ɔ̃ à lì ń wáa,
aà pↄkasaↄ lɛ́ tɛkɛ púntaitai. Gbɛ̃e ku dṹnia guu kɛ́ a fↄ̃ pↄ́ pí à puakũ màao.
Bee kpɛ Ɛlia ń Mↄizio bↄ̀ mↄ̀má, aalɛ yã'o ń Yesuo.
Ɔ̃ Piɛɛ ò Yesuɛ: Dii, wá kua la maaɛ. Wà lákpɛ dↄ mɛ̀n àaↄ̃, n pↄ́ do, Mↄizi pↄ́ do, Ɛlia pↄ́ do.
A dↄ̃ lá álɛ oo, asa vĩa ń kṹ maamaaɛ.
Luabɛpuana pìla kùńla, ↄ̃ aa lↄↄe mà a guu à mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃́ɛ beeá ma Nɛ́ mɛ̀ndona yenzideɛ, à aà yãma.
Kã́ndo gↄ̃̀ↄ kɛ́ aa gugwàgwa, aai gbɛ̃e e lↄo, sema Yesu ado.
Kɛ́ aalɛ pila gbɛ̀sĩsĩpiwa, ↄ̃ Yesu ònɛ́ aasu yã́ pↄ́ aa èpi o gbɛ̃e mao e Gbɛ̃nazĩn Nɛ́ gɛ bↄò gau.
Aa yã́pi kũa, ń beeo aalɛ kↄ̃ lala aa mɛ̀: Bↄa gau yã́ bee dɛa ni?
Ɔ̃ aa aà là aa mɛ̀: Bↄ́yãi Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdeↄ ì o Ɛlia mɛ́ a dↄaa mↄi?
A wèmá à mɛ̀: Ɛlia a dↄaa mↄ́, i yã́pii kɛkɛ zɛ́zɛ, ãma kɛ́ a kɛ̃a láu wà mɛ̀ wa saka Gbɛ̃nazĩn Nɛ́gu, i taasikɛ maamaa sↄ̃ bɛ?
Málɛ oɛ́, Ɛlia mↄ̀ kↄ̀, ↄ̃ wà ń pↄeã dàɛ̀ lá wà aà yã'ò taalauwa.
Kɛ́ aa sù ń gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄwa, aa è bíla liaańzi mɛ́ Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdeↄ lɛ́ lɛkpaakɛńnↄ.
Kɛ́ bíla Yesu è, aà yã́ bↄ̀ ń saɛ, ↄ̃ aa bàalɛ̀ gɛ̀ fↄkpàwà gↄ̃̀ↄ ḿpii.
Ɔ̃ à a ìwaↄ là à mɛ̀: Bↄ́ lɛkpaa álɛ kɛńnↄi?
Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú zã guue wèwà à mɛ̀: Dii, ma mↄnɛ ń ma nɛ́oɛ, tã́a mɛ́ aà lɛ́na nàalɛ.
Tó à dɛ̀dɛwà, ì aà nɛ zĩ́lɛɛ, ↄ̃ ìↄ lɛ́'ifula bↄlɛ, ìↄ swaalↄlↄkↄ̃wa, ì gbã́gbã tèlele. Ma mↄò n ìwaↄnɛ aa tã́api go, ↄ̃ aa fùa.
Ɔ̃ Yesu ònɛ́: Gbãgbɛ̃ luanaaikɛnsaiↄ, máↄ kúánↄ e bↄɛ ni? Máↄ mɛnakɛánↄ e bↄɛ ni? À mↄmɛɛ ń nɛ́pio la.
Kɛ́ wà mↄ̀oɛ̀, kɛ́ tã́api Yesu è gↄ̃̀ↄ, ↄ̃ à nɛ́pi zĩ̀azĩa à aà pã̀lɛ zĩ́lɛ kpɛ̃̀baũ. Ɔ̃ àlɛ gbeembo, àlɛ lɛ́'ifula bↄlɛ.
Yesu nɛ́pi mae là à mɛ̀: À aà lè màa za bↄɛ ni? A wèwà à mɛ̀: Za aà nɛ́fɛ̃nɛn zĩ́ɛ.
Ìↄ aà zu tɛ́ ń ío guu mↄ̀ↄmↄↄɛ, ìↄ ye aà dɛɛ. Tó ńyↄ̃ fↄ̃ ǹ pↄe kɛ, wá wɛ̃nagwa, ní dↄwálɛ.
Yesu òɛ̀: N mɛ̀ tó má fↄ̃ɛ lò? Yã́pii zɛvĩ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ ma náaikɛɛ.
Ɔ̃ nɛ́pi mae ò gↄ̃̀ↄ: Má n náai vĩ. Ǹ n náai pↄ́ lɛ́ kɛ̃́sãa kã́fĩmɛɛ.
Kɛ́ Yesu è bíla lɛ́ naɛmá, à gì tã́apiɛ à mɛ̀: Tã́a swãdo, málɛ onɛ, go nɛ́piwa. Ńsu ɛa suwà lↄo.
Ɔ̃ tã́api wiilɛ̀ à aà zĩ̀a pãsĩpãsĩ, ↄ̃ à gòwà. Nɛ́pi gↄ̃̀ lán gɛwa, ↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ daside mɛ̀ à gàɛ.
Ɔ̃ Yesu aà kũ̀ a ↄwa à aà fɛ̀lɛ, ↄ̃ à gↄ̃̀ zɛa.
Kɛ́ Yesu gɛ̃̀ ua, zĩ̀loe kúńnↄ lↄo, ↄ̃ aà ìwaↄ aà là aa mɛ̀: Bↄ́yãi wa fua tã́api goi?
Ɔ̃ a wèmá à mɛ̀: Wabikɛa ado mɛ́ ì fↄ̃ tã́a bee taa go.
Kɛ́ aa bↄ̀ we, ↄ̃ aa pã̀ Galilea. Yesu ye wàↄ a kúkĩi dↄ̃o,
asa àlɛ yãdada a ìwaↄnɛɛ. A ònɛ́: Wa Gbɛ̃nazĩn Nɛ́ kpámá, wi aà dɛ, i vu a gↄↄ àaↄ̃dezĩ.
Aai aà yã́pi midↄ̃o, mɛ́ aa yã́pi laawà vĩakɛ̀.
Ɔ̃ aa kà Kapɛnaũ. Gↄↄ pↄ́ a ku bɛ, à a ìwaↄ là à mɛ̀: Bↄ́ lɛkpaa álɛ kɛ zɛ́ guui?
Aa nì kpã̀uu, asa zɛ́ guu aalɛ lɛkpaakɛ dɛnla yã́ musuɛ.
Ɔ̃ à zↄ̃̀lɛ à gbɛ̃ↄn kuɛplapiↄ kã̀aa à mɛ̀: Tó gbɛ̃́ ye kɛ mide ũ, aàↄ kɛ̃́sãa gbɛ̃́piizi, i kɛ an baade píi dↄnlɛde ũ.
À nɛ́ sɛ zɛ̀ ń aɛ, ↄ̃ à aà sɛ kpà a kùɛ a ònɛ́:
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ nɛ́ɛ beeↄ do dìlɛ ma ìwakɛ yã́i, ade ma dilɛɛ. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ma dilɛ sↄ̃ i ma dilɛ madoo, à gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ma zĩ dìlɛ sↄ̃ɛ.
Ɔ̃ Zãa òɛ̀: Dii, wa gbɛ̃e è, àlɛ tã́ago ń n tↄ́o, ↄ̃ wá ye giɛ̀, asa wá gbɛ̃́ no.
Ɔ̃ Yesu mɛ̀: Ásu giɛ̀o, asa gbɛ̃e a fↄ̃ dabudabukɛ ń ma tↄ́o, a ɛa ma tↄbɛ̃ɛsi gↄ̃̀ↄo.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ i íbɛlɛsɛwanↄo, wá bàakpɛɛɛ.
Sĩana málɛ oɛ́, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ á gbá imia á dɛa Kilisi pↄ́ ũ yã́i, ade a kua a aseawao.
Tó gbɛ̃́ tò nɛ́ pↄ́ lɛ́ ma náaikɛɛ́ↄ do fù, a maa yãa ń adeo wà wísilↄgbɛ gbɛ̃̀nɛ dↄ aà nↄɛɛ, wi aà zu ísiu.
Tó n ↄ mɛ́ ì to ǹ fu, zↄ̃. Gɛ̃a àizãna guu kↄ̃̀ↄ ũ maa dɛ n taa tɛ́ gasai guu ń ↄ mɛ̀n plaola.
<range>
Tó n gbá mɛ́ ì to ǹ fu, zↄ̃. Gɛ̃a àizãna guu ɛɛ ũ maa dɛ wà n zu tɛ́ guu ń gbá mɛ̀n plaola.
<range>
Tó n wɛ́ mɛ́ ì to ǹ fu, bↄ. Gɛ̃a kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i guu wɛdode ũ maa dɛ wà n zu tɛ́ guu ń wɛ́ mɛ̀n plaola.
Wekĩi an kↄ̀ↄbii lí láao, mɛ́ a tɛ́ lí gao.
Wa tɛmↄ baadeɛ an kɛkɛa ń wisio ũ.
Wisiá pↄ́ naɛ. Ń beeo tó wisi í na tà, kpelewa wa kɛ à nakũ lↄi? À to wisi àↄ kú á guu, íↄ na ń kↄ̃o.
Ɔ̃ Yesu bↄ̀ we à gɛ̀ Yude bùsuu e Yuudɛ̃ baale. Bíla ɛ̀a kã̀aaaàzi we, ↄ̃ à yãdànɛ́ lá ìↄ kɛwa.
Falisieↄ mↄ̀ líkpalɛiwà, ↄ̃ aa aà là aa mɛ̀: Gↄ̃ɛ zɛvĩ à a na yáa?
A wèmá à mɛ̀: Mↄizi dìlɛɛ́ kpelewa ni?
Aa mɛ̀: Mↄizi gↄ̃ɛ gbà zɛ́ aàli gínzila kɛ̃́, aàli a na yaòɛ.
Ɔ̃ Yesu ònɛ́: Á swã́gbãa yã́i Mↄizi bee dìlɛiɛ́.
Za dṹnia daalɛgↄↄ Lua gↄ̃ɛ kɛ̀ ń nↄɛoɛ.
Ayãmɛto gↄ̃ɛ ì go a de ń a daowa, ì na a nawa,
ↄ̃ aaì gↄ̃ lán sàwakula ń gbalaowa. Beewa aa ku dodo lↄo, aa gↄ̃̀ mɛdoũɛ.
A yã́i gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua ń nákↄ̃waↄ, gbɛ̃e su ń kɛ̃aao.
Kɛ́ Yesu tà bɛ, aà ìwaↄ aà là yã́pi mii.
Ɔ̃ a ònɛ́: Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a na yà à a pãle sɛ̀ gbãsĩkɛ̀ a nↄ sɛ̃́ia yã́ musun we.
Nↄɛ pↄ́ gì a zã́zi à zã́ pãle kɛ̀ sↄ̃, à gbãsĩkɛ̀n we.
Wàlɛ mↄ́ Yesuɛ ń nɛ́ↄ aà ↄnamá, ↄ̃ aà ìwaↄ gìnɛ́.
Kɛ́ Yesu è màa, aà pↄ pà a ònɛ́: À to nɛ́ↄ mↄ ma kĩ́i, ásu gínɛ́o, asa kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́iá gbɛ̃́ bee taaↄ pↄ́ɛ.
Sĩana málɛ oɛ́, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ i kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i sí lán nɛ́wao a gɛ̃uo.
Ɔ̃ a nɛ́ↄ sɛ kpàkpa a kùɛ, à ↄnànamá à báaadàńgu.
Kɛ́ Yesu dàzɛu àlɛ gɛ́, ↄ̃ gↄ̃ɛe bàalɛ̀ mↄ̀ kùlɛ aà aɛ, à aà là à mɛ̀: Mɛtulu maa, kpelewa má kɛ mà àizãna ei?
Ɔ̃ Yesu òɛ̀: Àkɛa ń òmɛɛ má maai? Gbɛ̃e maao, sé Lua ado.
Ń ikoyãↄ dↄ̃: Ńsuli gbɛ̃dɛo, ńsuli wúlɛ ń gbɛ̃pãle nↄoo, ńsuli kpã́i'oo, ńsuli yãdↄ n gbɛ̃́deewao, ńsuli gbɛ̃bleo, nìli n de ń n dao kpɛla.
Ɔ̃ à mɛ̀: Mɛtulu, za ma nɛ́fɛ̃nɛngↄↄ má yã́ beeↄ kũa píiɛ.
Ɔ̃ Yesu aà gwà ń yenzi wɛ́o a òɛ̀: Yã́ gↄ̃̀nɛ mɛ̀ndo. Gɛ ǹ pↄ́ pↄ́ ń vĩↄ yía píi, ní a ↄ̃a kpá taasideↄwa, ní mↄ tɛmazi, ńyↄ̃ↄ àizɛɛ vĩ luabɛ.
Ɔ̃ gↄ̃ɛpi oosìsi yã́pi yã́i, à tà ń pↄsiao, kɛ́ aà àizɛɛↄ dasi yã́i.
Ɔ̃ Yesu wɛpã̀ a ìwaↄla a ònɛ́: Àizɛɛde gɛ̃a kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́iu zĩ'ũ.
Yã́pi bↄ̀ aà ìwaↄ saɛ, ↄ̃ Yesu ɛ̀a ònɛ́: Gbɛ̃́ↄ, gɛ̃a kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i guu zĩ'ũ fá!
Yiongo gɛ̃a abaawɛu àa dɛ ↄde gɛ̃a kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́iula.
Ɔ̃ yã́pi aà ìwaↄ kũ̀ gbãa, aalɛ okↄ̃ɛ aa mɛ̀: Tó màaɛ, démɛ a bↄi?
Yesu ń gwá soee à mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃nazĩna a fↄ̃o, ãma Lua a fↄ̃ wá bↄ, asa Lua apii gbãa vĩɛ.
Ɔ̃ Piɛɛ òɛ̀: Wápiↄ sↄ̃ bɛ? Wa pↄ́pii tò wa bↄ tɛnziɛ.
Yesu mɛ̀: Sĩana málɛ oɛ́, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a bɛ tò we ge a vĩ̀iↄ ge a dãunaↄ ge a da ge a mae ge a nɛ́ↄ ge a bua ma yã́i ń ma baona yã́o,
ade a ɛa bɛↄ ń vĩ̀iↄ ń dãunaↄ ń daↄ ń nɛ́ↄ ń buaↄ e lɛɛ basↄo dṹniaɛ bee guu ń ĩadamao lↄ, i àizãna e dṹnia pↄ́ a mↄ guu.
Dasi pↄ́ dↄaaaↄ gↄ̃ zã́ mɛ́ dasi pↄ́ tɛ́ zã́ↄ gↄ̃ dↄaaa.
Aa ɛ̀a dàzɛu, aalɛ gɛ́ Yelusalɛũ. Yesu dↄaaa a ìwaↄnɛ, ↄ̃ yã́pi bↄ̀ ń saɛ, mɛ́ vĩa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ tɛ́ aà kpɛↄ kũ̀. Ɔ̃ Yesu lìlɛ ń a ìwa gbɛ̃ↄn kuɛplaↄ, à ɛ̀a yã́ pↄ́ a su a le ònɛ́ lↄ
à mɛ̀: À ma! Wálɛ gɛ́ Yelusalɛũɛ. Wa Gbɛ̃nazĩn Nɛ́ kpá sa'onkiaↄ ń Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdeↄwa, aai yãdaaàla, aai aà kpa luayãdↄ̃nsaiↄwa aa aà dɛ.
Aa aà kɛ pↄ́ↄpↄↄ, aa lɛ́'ikakawà, aa aà gbɛ̃ ń flàalao, aai aà dɛ, a gↄↄ àaↄ̃de zĩ́ i vu.
Ɔ̃ Zebedee nɛ́ↄ Zaaki ń Zãao sↄ̃̀ Yesuzi aa òɛ̀: Mɛtulu, wá ye ǹ yã́ pↄ́ wálɛ a wabikɛma kɛwɛ̃ɛ.
Ɔ̃ à ń lá à mɛ̀: Bↄ́ á ye mà kɛɛ́i?
Aa wèwà aa mɛ̀: Wá gba zɛ́ wà zↄ̃lɛnnↄ ń kpala guu, gbɛ̃do n ↄplaai, gbɛ̃do zɛɛi.
Yesu ònɛ́: Á yã́ pↄ́ álɛ a wabikɛa dↄ̃o. Taasi kɛɛona pↄ́ má a imi, á fↄ̃ mia? Ga pↄ́ má siu, á fↄ̃ siua?
Aa wèwà aa mɛ̀: Wá fↄ̃́. Ɔ̃ Yesu ònɛ́: Í pↄ́ má mi, á mi, mɛ́ ga pↄ́ má siu, á siu,
ãma zↄ̃lɛa ma ↄplaai ge zɛɛiá ma yã́ no. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua kɛ̀kɛnɛ́ↄ pↄ́ɛ.
Kɛ́ ìwa gbɛ̃ↄn kwi kĩniↄ yã́pi mà, an pↄ pà Zaaki ń Zãaozi.
Ɔ̃ Yesu ń kãaa a ònɛ́: Á dↄ̃ kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wàlɛ ń gwa bùsu gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ũↄ ì gbãable ń gbɛ̃́ↄwaɛ. Màa gbãadeↄ ì kiblemá lↄ.
Ãma a dɛánↄ màao. Á guu gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ye gↄ̃ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ, aà kɛ á dↄnlɛde ũ.
Màaɛ lↄ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ye gↄ̃ á dↄaana ũ, aà kɛ ápii zↄ̀blena ũ.
Asa Gbɛ̃nazĩn Nɛ́ i mↄ wà dↄnlɛkɛɛ yã́io, à mↄ̀ dↄnlɛkɛi gbɛ̃́ↄnɛɛ, i gi a wɛ̃nii kɛ́ à e gbɛ̃́ↄ bo dasi yã́i.
Aa kà Yeliko. Lá Yesu lɛ́ bↄ we ń a ìwaↄ ń bílao, vĩ̀a baakɛna Timɛ nɛ́ Baatimɛ zↄ̃lɛa zɛ́ lɛ.
Kɛ́ a mà Yesu Nazalɛti mɛ́ lɛ́ gɛ̃, ↄ̃ à nà lɛ́ gbãa zuawa à mɛ̀: Davidi Bui Yesu, ma wɛ̃nagwa!
Ɔ̃ dasilɛ giɛ̀, aalɛ mɛ aà nílɛ. Ɔ̃ aà lɛzua gbãa kã̀fĩ à mɛ̀: Davidi Bui, ma wɛ̃nagwa.
Yesu zɛ̀ à mɛ̀: À aà sísi. Ɔ̃ wà vĩ̀api sìsi wa òɛ̀: Sↄ̃dilɛ fɛlɛ. Àlɛ n sisi.
Ɔ̃ vĩ̀api a zwãa wòlo à vĩ̀ pɛ̀lɛ à mↄ̀ Yesu kĩ́i.
Ɔ̃ Yesu aà là à mɛ̀: Bↄ́ ń ye mà kɛnɛi? Vĩ̀api wèwà à mɛ̀: Dii, má ye màↄ gu'eɛ.
Ɔ̃ Yesu òɛ̀: Gɛ́, ma náai pↄ́ ń kɛ̀ mɛ́ n gbãgbã. Wegↄ̃ↄ à gu'è, ↄ̃ à bↄ̀ tɛaàzi.
Kɛ́ aa kãikũ̀ ń Yelusalɛũo, aa kà Bɛfaze ń Bɛtani pↄ́ kú Kùkpɛ sĩ̀sĩpↄlɛuo. Ɔ̃ Yesu a ìwaↄ gbɛ̃ↄn pla zĩ̀
a ònɛ́: À gɛ́ wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ kálɛ wá aɛ kee guu. Tó a gɛ̃ gↄ̃̀ↄ, á zàa'ĩn bↄlↄ e dↄa we, gbɛ̃e i dikpɛ yãao. À polo suò.
Tó wà á lá, bↄ́ álɛ kɛ wei, í mɛ Dii mɛ́ ye a mↄaoi, a ɛa suò tia.
Ɔ̃ aa gɛ̀ wà zàa'ĩna è dↄa kpɛɛlɛ gãaɛ. Kɛ́ aalɛ polo,
ↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ zɛa weↄ ń lá aa mɛ̀: Bↄ́ álɛ kɛ ń zàa'ĩnapio, ↄ̃ álɛ poloi?
Aa wèmá lá Yesu ònɛ́wa, ↄ̃ wà ń tó we.
Aa sù ń zàa'ĩnapio Yesuɛ. Aa ń ulaↄ kpàlɛ zàa'ĩnapiwa, ↄ̃ Yesu dìkpɛ.
Gbɛ̃eↄ lɛ́ ń ulaↄ kpálɛ zɛ́ guu, gbɛ̃eↄ lɛ́ láↄ zↄ̃ sɛ̃u, aalɛ kpálɛ lↄ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dↄaaaↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ tɛ́ zã́ↄ lɛ́ wiilɛ wàlɛ mɛ: Gbãa kɛ! Báaaden gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ mↄ́ ń Dii tↄ́o ũ.
Lua báaada wá dezi Davidi kpala pↄ́ lɛ́ vugu. Wà gbãakpaaàzi à zↄ̃ luawa.
Kɛ́ Yesu kà Yelusalɛũ, à gɛ̃̀ Lua ua, ↄ̃ à wɛpã̀ pↄ́piila. Kɛ́ ĩatɛ̃ i gↄ̃ bíla lↄo yã́i ↄ̃ à bↄ̀ gɛ̀ Bɛtani ń a ìwa gbɛ̃ↄn kuɛplaↄ.
Kɛ́ gu dↄ̀, aa bↄ̀ Bɛtani, ↄ̃ nↄana lɛ́ Yesu dɛ.
À kaadↄɛnli è kãaa, a lá pàɛ. À gɛ̀ gwai tó a nɛ́ mà. Kɛ́ à kà we, i pↄe eo, sema a lá, asa a magↄↄ i ka yãao.
Ɔ̃ a ò lípiɛ: Gbɛ̃e a n nɛ́ ble bau lↄo. Aà ìwaↄ yã́pi mà.
Kɛ́ aa kà Yelusalɛũ, Yesu gɛ̃̀ Lua ua, ↄ̃ à laayianaↄ ń laalunaↄ yà ń bↄ́lɛ, à ↄlɛũkpakɛnaↄ táabũnuↄ ń felenyianaↄ kìlaↄ fuangba.
I wei gbɛ̃e a aso sɛ̀ à bↄ̀ ń Lua uaoo.
Ɔ̃ à yãdà gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ à mɛ̀: A kɛ̃a Lua taalau à mɛ̀: Ma kpɛ́ aↄ dɛ ma sísikpɛ ũ bui píiɛ. Ápiↄ sↄ̃ á kɛ̀ gbɛ̃blenaↄ tòo ũ.
Sa'onkiaↄ ń Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdeↄ yã́pi mà, ↄ̃ aalɛ zɛwɛɛlɛ wà aà dɛ. Aalɛ vĩakɛɛ̀, asa aà yãdaanɛ́ ì di bílawa píiɛ.
Kɛ́ oosi kɛ̀, ↄ̃ Yesu ń a ìwaↄ bↄ̀lɛ wɛ̃́lɛu.
Kɛ́ gu dↄ̀ aa bɛ zɛ́u, ↄ̃ aa kaadↄɛnlipi è, à giigàga e a zĩ́nau.
Kɛ́ a yã́ dↄ̀ Piɛɛgu, ↄ̃ a ò Yesuɛ: Dii, kaadↄɛnli pↄ́ ń kà gwae, à giigàga.
Yesu ònɛ́: Àↄ Lua náai vĩ.
Sĩana málɛ oɛ́, tó gbɛ̃́ ò sĩ̀sĩɛ beeɛ aà fɛlɛ azĩa zu ísiau, tó i seakɛ a nↄ̀sɛ guuo, tó a a náai vĩ kɛ́ yã́ pↄ́ a òpi a kɛ, a kɛɛ̀.
Bee yã́i málɛ oɛ́, tó álɛ lousisi, yã́ pↄ́ a a wabikɛ̀ píi, à dilɛ á è kↄ̀, í e.
Tó a fɛlɛ álɛ lousisi, tó á ĩ́ikũa ń gbɛ̃eo, à sùuukɛaànↄ, á Mae pↄ́ kú musu i sùuukɛánↄ ń á tàaeↄ sↄ̃.
Tó i sùuukɛ ń gbɛ̃́ↄo, á Mae pↄ́ kú musu a sùuukɛánↄ ń á tàaeↄ sↄ̃o.
Ɔ̃ aa kà Yelusalɛũ. Lá Yesu lɛ́ bɛbɛ Lua ua, sa'onkiaↄ ń Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdeↄ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ sↄ̃̀aàzi
aa aà là aa mɛ̀: Iko kpele ńlɛ yã́piↄ kɛòi? Démɛ n gba yã́pi kɛa zɛ́i?
Yesu wèmá à mɛ̀: Má yã́ mɛ̀ndoe gbɛawá. À wea, mí iko pↄ́ málɛ yã́piↄ kɛò oɛ́ sa.
À omɛɛ. Zãa gbɛ̃́ↄ da'ilɛkɛa bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i yã̀, ge gbɛ̃nazĩna kĩ́iɛ?
Ɔ̃ aa lɛkpàaĩ aa mɛ̀: Tó wa mɛ̀ Lua kĩ́iɛ, a mɛ bↄ́yãi wi Zãa yã́ sio niɛ.
Tó wa mɛ̀ gbɛ̃nazĩna kĩ́iɛ sↄ̃, too. Aa bíla vĩa vĩ, asa gbɛ̃́pii Zãa ãnabikɛ sìɛ.
Ɔ̃ aa wè Yesuwa: Wá dↄ̃o. Ɔ̃ Yesu ònɛ́: Mapi sↄ̃ má iko pↄ́ málɛ yã́piↄ kɛò oɛ́o.
Ɔ̃ Yesu fɛ̀lɛ yãlɛ̀ɛũnɛ́ à mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃e mɛ́ vɛ̃ɛbu vĩ, à kaa lìai, à ɛyↄ̃̀ vɛ̃ɛfɛ̃kĩi ũ à gbadà, ↄ̃ à búpi nà zĩkɛnaↄnɛ ń ↄzĩ, ↄ̃ à fɛ̀lɛ ń táo.
Kɛ́ vɛ̃ɛkↄzↄ̃zↄ̃gↄↄ kà, ↄ̃ à a ìwae zĩ̀ zĩkɛnapiↄwa, aà a vɛ̃ɛpi asea símáɛ.
Ɔ̃ zĩkɛnapiↄ aà kũ̀ wa gbɛ̃̀ wa gbàɛ ↄgii.
Ɔ̃ à ɛ̀a ìwa pãle zĩ̀má. Ɔ̃ aa gbɛ̃́ bee mi fↄ̃̀ aa widàwà.
À ɛ̀a a pãle zĩ̀ lↄ, ↄ̃ aa gbɛ̃́ bee dɛ̀. Màa à gbɛ̃pãleↄ zĩ̀ dasi, aa ń gbɛ̃eↄ gbɛ̃̀, aa ń gbɛ̃eↄ dɛ̀.
Budepi nɛ́ mɛ̀ndona mɛ́ gↄ̃̀ɛ̀ sa, ↄ̃ à aà zĩ̀ gbɛzã à mɛ̀: Aa ma nɛ́ yãda.
Ɔ̃ zĩkɛnapiↄ òkↄ̃ɛ aa mɛ̀: Túbiblenan kee. À to wà aà dɛ, bú i gↄ̃wɛ̃ɛ.
Ɔ̃ aa aà kũ̀ wa dɛ̀, wà aà gɛ sɛ̀ wa zù kaa kpɛ.
Tòo, kpelewa budepi a kɛ sai? A gɛ zĩkɛnapiↄ dɛdɛ, i búpi kpa gbɛ̃pãleↄwaɛ.
I Lua yã́ɛ bee kyokɛo lé? Wà mɛ̀: Gbɛ pↄ́ ɛ̃bonaↄ pãkpài mɛ́ gↄ̃̀ gbɛↄ mide ũ.
Dii mɛ́ bee kɛ̀, ↄ̃ à kɛ̀wɛ̃ɛ yãbↄnsaɛ ũ.
Ɔ̃ aa zɛwɛ̀ɛlɛ wà aà kṹ, asa aa dↄ̃̀ ń yã́i à yã́pi lɛ̀ɛũi. Ń beeo aa vĩakɛ̀ bílaɛ, ↄ̃ aa aà tò we aa tà.
Ɔ̃ wà Falisieↄ ń Elodi kpala zɛnkpɛdeeↄ zĩ̀ Yesuwa ↄ̃nↄkɛiɛ̀ a yã'oa guu.
Kɛ́ aa kà, ↄ̃ aa òɛ̀: Mɛtulu, wá dↄ̃ kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ náaiden n ũ. Nili yã́si ń gbɛ̃́o ublembɛkɛ yã́io, asa nili gbɛ̃e wɛgwao. Lua zɛ́ ni ↄlↄnɛ́ wásawasa. A zɛvĩ wà wɛ̃̀'ↄ̃a kpá Sezaawaa, ge a zɛvĩo? Wà kpa yã̀, ge wásu kpao?
Yesu ń mↄafili dↄ̃̀, ↄ̃ a ònɛ́: Bↄ́yãi álɛ filifilimbakpamɛɛi? À ↄ̃api do dↄmɛɛ mà gwa.
Kɛ́ aa dↄ̀ɛ̀, ↄ̃ à ń lá à mɛ̀: Dé mi ń aà tↄ́on lai? Aa wèwà aa mɛ̀: Sezaa pↄ́ɛ.
Ɔ̃ Yesu ònɛ́: À Sezaa dee pↄ́ kpawà, í Lua pↄ́ kpawà. Aà yã́ bↄ̀ ń saɛ.
Ɔ̃ Saduse pↄ́ aaì gɛↄ vua ɛɛboeↄ mↄ̀ Yesu lè aa aà là aa mɛ̀:
Mɛtulu, Mↄizi òwɛ̃ɛ a lá guu à mɛ̀, tó gbɛ̃́ vĩ̀i gà à a nↄ tò nɛ́sai, aà dãuna gyaapi da'uakɛ à a vĩ̀i gɛ̃ɛ kɛò.
Màaɛ, vĩ̀i ń dãunaↄ ku gbɛ̃ↄn sopla. Woo nↄsɛ̀, ↄ̃ à aà tò we nɛ́sai.
Se aà da'uakɛ̀, ↄ̃ à gà à nↄpi tò we lↄ nɛ́sai. Ɔ̃ Bíↄ kɛ̀ màa lↄ
e à gɛ̀ kà an sopladewa. Ampii aa aà tò nɛ́sai. Ampii gbɛa ↄ̃ nↄpi gà.
Gɛↄ vugↄↄzĩ an démɛ aↄ nↄpi vĩi? Asa an gbɛ̃ↄn sopla ḿpii aa aà dↄ̃ nↄ ũɛ.
Yesu wèmá à mɛ̀: Á Lua yã́ ń a gbãao dↄ̃sai yã́i a sãsãio lò?
Tó gɛↄ vù, aa nↄsɛo, aa zãkɛo, aaↄ ku lán malaikaↄ kua luabɛwaɛ.
Kɛ́ gɛↄ bↄ gau sↄ̃ bɛ, i Mↄizi lá kyokɛ gua pↄ́ à kàelɛ yã'òuo lé? Lua òɛ̀ à mɛ̀ ámɛaa Ablahaũ ń Izaakio ń Yakↄbuo Lua.
Luaá gɛↄ Lua no, gbɛ̃́ bɛ̃́ɛↄ pↄ́ɛ. A sãsã à kɛ̀ zài.
Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdee ku we, à lɛkpaapi mà. Kɛ́ a è Yesu yãmaa wèmá, ↄ̃ à sↄ̃̀aàzi à aà là à mɛ̀: Ikoyã kpele mɛ́ dɛńlai?
Yesu wèwà à mɛ̀: A miden kɛ: À ma, Isailiↄ. Dii wá Lua mɛ́ Dii mɛ̀ndona ũ.
Àↄ ye Dii á Luazi ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo teasisai á gbãa pua lɛ́u, á sↄ̃ iↄ kuwà.
A plaaden kɛ: Àↄ ye á gbɛ̃́deezi lá ázĩa wɛ̃niwa. Ikoyãe dɛ beeↄlao.
Ɔ̃ yãdanɛdepi òɛ̀: Yãmaaɛ, Mɛtulu. N sĩana'ò, n mɛ̀ Lua mɛ̀ndoɛ, a plaade kuo, sema aàpi.
Yea Luazi ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo ń n ↄ̃nↄo píi n gbãa pua lɛ́u ń yea n gbɛ̃́deezi lá nzĩa wɛ̃niwao dɛ sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ ń sa'oa bui píiola.
Kɛ́ Yesu è à yãwèwa ń laaio, a òɛ̀: Gɛ̃a kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́iu zã̀nnↄo. Bee kpɛ gbɛ̃e i we yãe làwà lↄo.
Yesu ɛ̀a lɛ́ yãdadanɛ́ Lua ua, ↄ̃ à gbɛ̃́ↄ là à mɛ̀: Bↄ́yãi Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdeↄ ì o Mɛsiiá Davidi buiɛi?
Kɛ́ Lua Nisĩna dɛ̀dɛ Davidiwa à mɛ̀: Dii ò ma Diiɛ aà zↄ̃lɛ a ↄplaai e àↄ aà ibɛɛↄ kálɛɛ̀ a gbá zíɛ.
Lá Davidi aà sìsi Dii màa, kpelewa aↄ dɛ aà bui ũ lↄi? Ɔ̃ bíla lɛ́ aà yãma ń pↄnao.
Aà yãdaanɛ́ guu à mɛ̀: À laaika Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdeↄzi. Aaìↄ ye bɛbɛa ń uladao daa wàↄ fↄkpakpamá gãaɛ.
Aaìↄ wɛɛlɛ zↄ̃lɛ lousisikpɛ zↄ̃lɛkĩi maaↄ guu ń blɛble zↄ̃lɛkĩi maaↄ.
Aaì lou gbã̀a sísi gbɛ̃́ↄ wɛ́ yã́i, ↄ̃ aaì gyaaↄ kpɛ́ siomá. An ĩadama pãsĩ aↄ dɛńla.
Ɔ̃ Yesu zↄ̃̀lɛ Lua ua ↄsikpagolo aɛ, àlɛ gbɛ̃́ↄ gwa, lá aalɛ ↄ̃a dau. Ɔde saↄ lɛ́ ↄ zↄ̃ↄ dau.
Ɔ̃ gyaa taaside mↄ̀ tãnga dàu mɛ̀n pla, i ka dalao.
Ɔ̃ Yesu a ìwaↄ kã̀aa a ònɛ́: Sĩana málɛ oɛ́, gyaa taasidepi ↄ̃a dà kpagolo guu dɛ gbɛ̃́piila.
Asa ↄ dia ↄ̃ aa dã̀ wà kàu ḿpii. Nↄɛpi sↄ̃, aà taasidekɛ guu pↄ́ pↄ́ a vĩ à pↄbleò ↄ̃ a dàu we píi.
Kɛ́ Yesu lɛ́ bↄ Lua ua, aà ìwae òɛ̀: Mɛtulu, gwa lá wà kpɛ́ maaↄ dↄ̀ ń gbɛ̀ kɛfɛnaeↄ taaↄ.
Ɔ̃ Yesu òɛ̀: N kpɛ́ zↄ̃ↄpi è píia? Gbɛe a gↄ̃ dikↄ̃a weo, wa a dúuzↄ̃ píiɛ.
Yesu zↄ̃lɛa Kùkpɛ sĩ̀sĩpↄlɛu, aà aɛ dↄa Lua uawa. Piɛɛ ń Zaakio ń Zãao ń Ãndeleeo mɛ́ kuaànↄ ńtɛ̃ɛ, ↄ̃ aa aà là aa mɛ̀:
Owɛ̃ɛ, bee a kɛ bↄɛ ni? Bↄ́mɛ aↄ dɛ apii kɛgↄↄ seela ũi?
Ɔ̃ Yesu ònɛ́: À laaika, ásu to wà á sã́são.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ mↄ́ ń ma tↄ́o dasi, aa mɛ Mɛsiin ń ũ, aai gbɛ̃́ↄ sã́sã dasi.
Tó a zĩkakↄ̃fĩ mà ge a bao, ásu bílikɛo. Sema bee kɛ, ãma dṹnia láaan we gĩao.
Bui ń buio aa fɛlɛ ń kↄ̃o, màaɛ lↄ bùsu ń bùsuo. Tↄↄlɛ a lualua gueↄ mɛ́ nↄana aↄ ku. Yã́pi aↄ dɛ lán nↄwãwã daalɛawaɛ.
Àↄ kú ń laaio. Wa á kṹkũ wà yã́kpalɛkɛánↄ, wi á gbɛ̃ lousisikpɛↄ guu. Áↄ zɛa bùsu gbãadeↄ ń kíaↄ aɛ ma yã́i, íↄ dɛnɛ́ ma seeladeↄ ũ.
Sema wà baonakpa bui píiɛ gĩa.
Tó wà gɛ̀ánↄ yã́kpalɛu, ásu dↄaa bílikɛ yã́ pↄ́ ásu owao. À yã́ pↄ́ Lua a sóso káɛ́ á lɛ́u gↄↄbeezĩ o, asa i kɛ ámɛ á yã'oo, Lua Nisĩnaɛ.
Vĩ̀i ń dãunaↄ kↄ̃ kpámá dɛa yã́i. Màa maeↄ ń nɛ́ↄ kpámá. Nɛ́ↄ bↄ ń deↄ ń ń daↄ kpɛ wà ń dɛ.
Gbɛ̃́pii a zaágu ma yã́i. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ mɛnafↄ̃̀ e a lɛ́wa, ade mɛ́ a bↄ.
Tó a tɛ̃̀ gudɛna è gu pↄ́ dɛ àↄ kuuo, (kyokɛna yã́pi da), gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú Yudeↄ bàalɛ mipɛ sĩ̀sĩↄwa.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú a kpɛ́ musu su pila gɛ̃ kpɛ́u a pↄe sɛ́io.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kpɛ́ bua su ɛa bɛ a ula sɛ́io.
Waiyoo nɛadeↄ ń nↄsindeeↄ gↄↄ beezĩ.
À wabikɛ kɛ́ yã́piↄ su á le buziɛo,
asa wɛ́tɛ̃a pↄ́ aↄ ku gↄↄpi aↄ zↄ̃ↄɛ. Za gↄↄ pↄ́ Lua dṹnia kɛ̀ e gbã a taa i kɛo, mɛ́ a kɛ bau lↄo.
Tó Dii i gↄↄpiↄ laoo, dↄ̃ gbɛ̃e a bↄo. À gↄↄpiↄ lào a gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ à ń sɛ́ↄ yã́iɛ.
Gↄↄ bee tó wà su òɛ́ Mɛsii gwa kɛ, ge Mɛsii ku le, ásu sio.
Asa Mɛsii ɛgɛnaↄ ń ãnabi ɛgɛnaↄ mↄ dabudabuↄ ń yãbↄnsaɛↄ kɛ, kɛ́ baa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua ń sɛ́ↄ aa ń sã́sãò, tó a zɛ́ kú.
Àↄ kú ń laaio, ma yã́pii lɛzàwá za káauɛ.
Gↄↄ bee wɛ́tɛ̃api gbɛa ĩatɛ̃ a siakũ, mↄvua a ikɛo,
saanaↄ wolo luawa, pↄ́ pↄ́ kú luawapiↄ zã ń pɛ́kĩiwa.
Wi Gbɛ̃nazĩn Nɛ́ mↄa e luabɛpuanau ń gbãa zↄ̃ↄo ń gawio,
i a malaikaↄ zĩ aa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua ń sɛ́ↄ kãaa za dṹnia gola síiↄ̃ guu, za dṹnia lɛ́la ń a lɛ́leo.
À yã́ pↄ́ kaadↄɛnli lɛ́ daɛ́ ma. Tó a gↄ̃naↄ busɛkũ̀ mɛ́ a lá lɛ́ paɛ, ↄ̃ i dↄ̃ guantɛ̃na kãikũ̀.
Màaɛ lↄ, tó á è yã́piↄ lɛ́ kɛ, àↄ dↄ̃ kɛ́ aà mↄa kãikũ̀ɛ, a ku kpɛɛlɛ.
Sĩana málɛ oɛ́ gↄↄbeedeↄ gɛ̃lɛ yã́piↄ píi kɛsaio.
Luabɛ ń tↄↄlɛo a gɛ̃lɛ, ãma ma yã́ↄ gɛ̃lɛa vĩo.
Gbɛ̃e a gↄↄ ge a zaa dↄ̃o, baa malaika pↄ́ aa ku luabɛↄ ge Lua Nɛ́, sema Mae Lua.
Àↄ kú ń laaio à itɛ̃kɛ, asa á dↄ̃ zĩ́ pↄ́ gↄↄpi a kao.
A dɛ lán gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ gɛ́ wɛ̃́lɛuwaɛ. À a bɛ tò a zĩkɛnaↄnɛ baade ń a zĩo, ↄ̃ a ò a gudↄ̃anaɛ aà itɛ̃kɛ.
Ápiↄ sↄ̃ á uabele sugↄↄ dↄ̃o, oosin nò, wɛɛdon nò, ko ↄ́ↄlↄan nò, gufɛ̃nɛn nò. Ayãmɛto à itɛ̃kɛ,
kɛ́ asu su kã́ndo, i á le álɛ i'oo yã́i.
Yã́ pↄ́ málɛ oɛ́, málɛ o gbɛ̃́piiɛɛ, à itɛ̃kɛ.
Gɛ̃amusu dikpɛ ń Kàaso dikpɛo gↄ̃̀ gↄↄ pla, ↄ̃ sa'onkiaↄ ń Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdeↄ lɛ́ zɛwɛɛlɛ wà gbɛ̃́ↄ zãmakɛ wà e Yesu kṹ wà dɛ.
Asa aa mɛ̀: Wásu wà aà kũ dikpɛgↄↄzĩo, kɛ́ wasu fɛlɛ ń zↄaoo yã́i.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ Yesu kú Simↄↄ Kusude bɛ Bɛtani, àlɛ pↄble, ↄ̃ nↄɛe sↄ̃̀aàzi a tulale bui maa ↄde loona kũa. Ɔ̃ à loonapi waa ɛ̀ à tulalepi kà Yesu miwa.
Gbɛ̃eↄ ku we, yã́pi ↄ̃̀má, ↄ̃ aa mɛ̀: Bↄ́yãi à tulalepi pãkɛ̀i màai?
Tulale pↄ́ a ↄ̃a dɛ ã́nusu ↄwatɛ̃ ↄ̀aa do ń basↄooa, dↄ̃ yãa wa yìa wà a ↄ̃a kpà taasideↄwa. Ɔ̃ aa zↄadↄ̀wà.
Ɔ̃ Yesu mɛ̀: À aà to we. Bↄ́yãi álɛ ĩadaiwài? À yãmaakɛ̀mɛɛɛ.
Taasideↄ kúánↄ gↄↄpiiɛ. Gↄↄ pↄ́ á yei, á fↄ̃ na kɛnɛ́, ãma máↄ kúánↄ gↄↄpiio.
A kɛ̀ a gbãa lɛ́uɛ, à dↄ̀aa tulale kà ma mɛwa ma gɛ kpɛlaa yã́iɛ.
Sĩana málɛ oɛ́, gu pↄ́ wàlɛ ma baokpau dṹnia guu píi, waↄ yã́ pↄ́ nↄɛpi kɛ̀ o aà yã́ dↄańgu yã́i.
Bee gbɛa Yudasi Isaliↄti pↄ́ dɛ gbɛ̃ↄn kuɛplaↄ gbɛ̃do ũ gɛ̀ sa'onkiaↄ kĩ́i Yesu kpaamá yã́i.
Kɛ́ aa aà yãmà, an pↄ kɛ̀na, ↄ̃ aa lɛgbɛ̃̀ɛ̀ wa ↄ̃a kpawà. Ɔ̃ àlɛ zɛwɛɛlɛ à Yesu kpámá.
Kàaso dikpɛgↄↄ sɛ̃́ia zĩ́, gↄↄ pↄ́ wì Gɛ̃amusu sã kòlokpa, Yesu ìwaↄ òɛ̀: Má ń ye wà gɛ Gɛ̃amusu blɛ sↄukɛunɛi?
Yesu a ìwaↄ gbɛ̃ↄn pla zĩ̀ a ònɛ́: À gɛ́ wɛ̃́lɛdau. Á kpaaũ ń gbɛ̃eo í sɛa lo guu. À tɛaàzi
e ua pↄ́ a gɛ̃u, í o uabeleɛ, Mɛtulu mɛ̀ má á pilaui, gua pↄ́ á Gɛ̃amusu blɛ bleu ń a ìwaↄ?
A kpɛdiakↄ̃a kpɛa zↄ̃ↄ musu pↄ́ wa kɛ̀kɛ ↄlↄɛ́, í sↄukɛwɛ̃ɛ we.
Kɛ́ ìwapiↄ dàzɛu, ↄ̃ aa kà wɛ̃́lɛpi guu, aa è lá a ònɛ́wa. Ɔ̃ aa Gɛ̃amusu blɛ sↄukɛ̀ we.
Kɛ́ oosi kɛ̀, Yesu kà we ń a ìwa gbɛ̃ↄn kuɛplaↄ.
Kɛ́ aa zↄ̃̀lɛ lɛ́ pↄble, ↄ̃ Yesu mɛ̀: Sĩana málɛ oɛ́, á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wálɛ pↄble sãnuↄ do a ma kpámá.
An pↄ yà, ↄ̃ aalɛ aà la dodo: Asa mámɛo yó?
Ɔ̃ a ònɛ́: Á gbɛ̃ↄn kuɛplaↄ doɛ, wálɛ ↄkãaa ta doũ.
Gbɛ̃nazĩn Nɛ́ a ta lá wà a yã'ò taalauwa, ãma waiyoo gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a Gbɛ̃nazĩn Nɛ́ kpámápi. A maa wà ade ì yãao.
Kɛ́ aalɛ pↄble, Yesu kàa sɛ̀ à báaadàu, ↄ̃ a ɛ̀'ɛ kpàmá à mɛ̀: À sí, beeá ma mɛɛ.
Ɔ̃ à imibↄ sɛ̀ à Lua sáaukpà a kpàmá, ↄ̃ aa mì ḿpii.
Ɔ̃ a ònɛ́: Beeá ma auɛ, Lua bàa kua ń gbɛ̃́ dasiↄ au pↄ́ a bↄaɛ.
Sĩana málɛ oɛ́, má vɛ̃ɛbɛ'i mi lↄo e kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i bↄ gupuau, ↄ̃ má a dafu mi.
Kɛ́ aa lɛsì aa làa, ↄ̃ aa bↄ̀lɛ gɛ̀ Kùkpɛ sĩ̀sĩpↄlɛu.
Ɔ̃ Yesu ònɛ́: Ápii á ma to we, asa a kɛ̃a láu Lua mɛ̀: Má sãdãna lɛ́, sãↄ i fãaa.
Ń beeo ma vua gbɛa má dↄaaɛ́ Galile.
Ɔ̃ Piɛɛ òɛ̀: Baa tó wa n to we píi, má n to weo.
Ɔ̃ Yesu òɛ̀: Sĩana málɛ onɛ, gwãasĩnaa e ko àↄ gɛ́ lɛ́ gɛ̃n pla zui, ńyↄ̃ lelekpamazi gɛ̃n àaↄ̃.
Ɔ̃ Piɛɛ lɛgbɛ̃̀ à mɛ̀ máũmaũɛ: Baa tó má su málɛ gannↄ, má lelekpanzi bauo. Ɔ̃ aa ò màa sↄ̃ ḿpii.
Kɛ́ aa kà gu pↄ́ wì mɛ Gɛsɛmani, ↄ̃ Yesu ò a ìwaↄnɛ: À zↄ̃lɛ la e màↄ wabikɛ.
Ɔ̃ à Piɛɛ ń Zaakio ń Zãao sɛ̀ gɛ̀ńnↄ. Iwãa kà aà pↄa, tòlobi zùaàgu,
ↄ̃ a ònɛ́: Pↄsia ma kũ gbãa e ma ka gaa. À zɛ la à itɛ̃kɛ.
Kɛ́ à gɛ̀ aɛ yↄↄ, ↄ̃ à wùlɛ a gbɛɛu à wabikɛ̀, tó a zɛ́ kú, gↄↄpi gɛ̃ala.
À mɛ̀: Baa, ma Mae, ń yã́ píi zɛ́ vĩ. To taasi kɛɛonapi dↄmazi, ãma ma pↄeã no, sema n pↄ́.
Kɛ́ à ɛ̀a sù a gbɛ̃ↄn àaↄ̃piↄ kĩ́i, a è aalɛ i'o. Ɔ̃ a ò Piɛɛɛ: Simↄↄ, ńlɛ i'o yã̀? Ni fↄ̃ n itɛ̃kɛ̀ baa yↄↄoa?
À itɛ̃kɛ àↄ wabikɛ, kɛ́ ásu fu yↄ̃awao yã́i. Nisĩna yei, ãma mɛ busɛ.
À ɛ̀a gɛ̀ wabikɛi, ↄ̃ à yã́ doũpi ò lↄ.
Kɛ́ à ɛ̀a sù, a è aalɛ i'o, asa an wɛ́ gbiakũ̀ɛ. Ɔ̃ aai dↄ̃ lá wa oɛ̀o.
Aà ɛa sua gɛ̃n àaↄ̃de a ònɛ́: Álɛ i'o álɛ kã́mabo e tiaa? Bee mↄ̀. Gↄↄ kà sa. À gwa, wàlɛ Gbɛ̃nazĩn Nɛ́ kpá duunkɛnaↄwa.
À fɛlɛ wà gɛ́. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ ma kpámá lɛ́ mↄ́ kee.
Kɛ́ Yesu lɛ́ yã́pi o gↄ̃̀ↄ, ↄ̃ aà ìwapiↄ gbɛ̃do Yudasi kà ń bíla pↄ́ bↄ̀ sa'onkiaↄ ń Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdeↄ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ kĩ́iↄ. Aa fɛ̃ndaↄ kũa ń goↄ.
Bↄnkpɛdepi sↄ̃ à dↄ̀aa seela ònɛ́ à mɛ̀ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a su lɛpɛ̀wà, aàpin we. Aa aà kũ gbãa aa taò.
Kɛ́ à kà we, ↄ̃ à táa'ò Yesuwa gↄ̃̀ↄ, a òɛ̀: Mɛtulu! Ɔ̃ à lɛpɛ̀wà.
Ɔ̃ wà ↄpɛ̀lɛwà wà aà kũ̀ gíũgiũ.
Zã guu gbɛ̃e a fɛ̃nda wò à sa'onkia zĩkɛnae lɛ̀ò à aà swã́ gò.
Ɔ̃ Yesu ònɛ́: Kpã́i wɛliwɛn ma ũ, ↄ̃ a mↄ ma kṹi ń fɛ̃ndaↄ ń goↄa?
Má kúánↄ Lua ua lá gu lɛ́ dↄ, miↄ yãdaɛ́, i ma kũo. Ãma bee kɛ̀ kɛ́ yã́ pↄ́ kɛ̃a Luayãtaalau e kɛ yã́iɛ.
Ɔ̃ aà ìwaↄ bàalɛ̀ píi aa aà tò we.
Ɛ̀waasoe tɛaàzi, aà zwãa kuaaàla pↄeyesai. Kɛ́ wà aà kũ̀,
ↄ̃ à a zwãa tònɛ́ we, à bàalɛ̀ puizi.
Ɔ̃ wà gɛ̀ ń Yesuo sa'onkia bɛ. Sa'onkiaↄ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ń Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdeↄ kãaaa we ḿpii.
Piɛɛ tɛ́ ń kpɛ kãaa e à gɛ̀ gɛ̃̀ sa'onkia bɛ'ua. À zↄ̃̀lɛ we, àlɛ tɛ́kpakpa ń dↄaiↄ sãnu.
Sa'onkiaↄ ń Yuda yã́kpalɛkɛnaↄ píi lɛ́ yã́ wɛɛlɛ wà dↄ Yesuwa wà e wà aà dɛ, ↄ̃ aai eo.
Wà yãdↄ̀dↄwà dasi, ãma an yãe i kↄ̃sɛo.
Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃eↄ fɛ̀lɛ yãdↄ̀wà lↄ aa mɛ̀:
Wá mà dee mɛ̀ á Lua kpɛ́ pↄ́ gbɛ̃nazĩna dↄ̀ wí, i a pãle pↄ́ gbɛ̃nazĩna i dↄo dↄ gↄↄ àaↄ̃ɛ.
Baa ń beeo an lɛ́ i kɛ doũo.
Ɔ̃ sa'onkia fɛ̀lɛ zɛ̀ zã guu à Yesu là à mɛ̀: Ńyↄ̃ yãe zã́sioa? Yã́ pↄ́ wàlɛ dↄdↄmapiↄ dɛa ni?
Yesu nílɛ kpɛ̃́, i yãe wewào, ↄ̃ sa'onkiapi ɛ̀a aà là à mɛ̀: Ḿmɛ ń Lua báaade Nɛ́ Mɛsii ũa?
Ɔ̃ Yesu mɛ̀: Mámɛ má aà ũ. Á Gbɛ̃nazĩn Nɛ́ e zↄ̃lɛa Gbãapiide ↄplaai, mɛ́ á aà mↄa e luabɛpuanau.
Ɔ̃ sa'onkiapi a ulaↄ ga kɛ̃̀ à mɛ̀: É'e, wá bàa kú ń seeladeↄ lↄe?
Á mà lá à dↄ̀ɛ ń Luao weó? Kpelewa a zɛòi? Ɔ̃ aa yã́ dìɛ̀ ḿpii aa mɛ̀ wà aà dɛ.
Ɔ̃ wà fɛ̀lɛ lɛ́ lɛ́'ikakawà. Ɔ̃ wà pↄkùɛ̀ aà wɛ́wa, wàlɛ aà lɛlɛ ń ↄkũo, wàlɛ oɛ̀: Ãnabikɛkɛ, ní gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ n lɛ o. Ɔ̃ dↄaiↄ aà kũ̀ aa aà sãnkɛkɛ.
Piɛɛ ku zĩ́lɛ ua, ↄ̃ sa'onkia bɛ nↄɛ zĩkɛnaↄ do mↄ̀ we.
Kɛ́ à Piɛɛ è, àlɛ tɛ́kpakpa, ↄ̃ à aà gwà soee, a òɛ̀: Mpi sↄ̃, iↄ sãnu ń Yesu Nazalɛtipioɛ.
Ɔ̃ à lelekpà à mɛ̀: Má dↄ̃o, mi ma lá ńlɛ oo. Ɔ̃ à fɛ̀lɛ gɛ̃̀ gↄ̃u guu.
Nↄɛpi ɛ̀a aà è we, ↄ̃ a ò gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ zɛa weↄnɛ à mɛ̀: Gↄ̃ɛpiá an gbɛ̃doɛ.
Ɔ̃ Piɛɛ lelekpà lↄ. Kɛ́ à kɛ̀ sàa yↄↄ, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ zɛa weↄ ò Piɛɛɛ: Sĩanaɛ an gbɛ̃don n ũ, asa Galile gbɛ̃́n n ũ.
Piɛɛ vãikpàaĩ ń azĩao, ↄ̃ à mɛ̀: Má sì ń Luao, má gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ álɛ aà yã'opi dↄ̃o.
Wegↄ̃ↄ ↄ̃ ko lɛ́ gɛ̃n plaade zù, ↄ̃ yã́ pↄ́ Yesu ò dↄ̀ Piɛɛgu, kɛ́ à mɛ̀ e ko àↄ gɛ́ lɛ́ gɛ̃n plaade zui, a lelekpaazi gɛ̃n àaↄ̃. Ɔ̃ à nà ↄↄlↄwa.
Kɛ́ gu dↄ̀ gↄ̃̀ↄ sa'onkiaↄ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ń Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdeↄ ń gbãadeↄ píi lɛkpàaĩ, ↄ̃ aa Yesu yè aa gɛ̀ aà kpà Pilatiwa.
Ɔ̃ Pilati aà là à mɛ̀: Yudaↄ kían n ũa? Yesu wèwà à mɛ̀: Ń òn we.
Sa'onkiaↄ lɛ́ yãdↄdↄwà,
ↄ̃ Pilati ɛ̀a aà là à mɛ̀: Ńyↄ̃ yãe ooa? Yã́ pↄ́ wàlɛ dↄdↄma ma fá!
Kɛ́ Yesu i yãe zã́simáo, ↄ̃ aà yã́ bↄ̀ Pilati saɛ.
Gɛ̃amusu dikpɛgↄↄzĩ Pilati ì dakpɛunaↄ do pↄ́ wa yei kɛ̃́nɛ́ɛ.
Bùsudɛna pↄ́ aa bↄ̀ gbãadeↄ kpɛ aa gbɛ̃dɛ̀ↄ ku kpɛ́u. An gbɛ̃do tↄ́n Balaba.
Ɔ̃ bíla sↄ̃̀ Pilatizi aa wabikɛ̀wà aà kɛ lá ì kɛnɛ́wa.
Ɔ̃ Pilati ń lá à mɛ̀: Á ye mà Yudaↄ kía kɛ̃́ɛ́ yã̀?
Asa a dↄ̃ sã́asã kɛ́ sa'onkiaↄ wɛdↄ Yesuɛ yã́i ↄ̃ aa aà kpàiwa.
Ɔ̃ sa'onkiaↄ tɛkpà bílagu, ↄ̃ aa òɛ̀ aà Balaba kɛ̃́nɛ́.
Ɔ̃ Pilati ń lá à mɛ̀: Kpelewa á ye mà kɛ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wì mɛ Yudaↄ kíaoi?
Ɔ̃ aa ɛ̀a wiilɛ̀: Ǹ aà páliwa!
Ɔ̃ Pilati ń lá à mɛ̀: Bↄ́yãii? Vãi kpele a kɛ̀i? Ɔ̃ an wiilɛa kã̀fĩ aa mɛ̀: Ǹ aà páliwa!
Pilati ye yã́ pↄ́ a káńgu kɛ, ↄ̃ à Balaba kɛ̃̀nɛ́. À Yesu kpà sosaↄwa aa aà gbɛ̃ ń flàalao, aai aà páliwa.
Ɔ̃ sosapiↄ gɛ̀aànↄ bùsu gbãadepi bɛ'ua, aa ń gãli kã̀aa píi.
Aa gomusu tɛ̃a dàɛ̀, ↄ̃ aa fùa tã̀ ń lɛo aa kpàɛ̀.
Ɔ̃ aalɛ fↄkpakpawà aa mɛ̀: Yudaↄ kía fↄↄ!
Aalɛ aà gbɛ̃ a miwa ń feeo, aalɛ lɛ́'ikakawà, aalɛ kúlɛkulɛ aà aɛ, aalɛ lɛ́mawà.
Kɛ́ aa aà kɛ̀ pↄ́ↄpↄↄ aa làa, ↄ̃ aa gomusu tɛ̃api bↄ̀aàla, aa aàzĩa pↄkasa dàɛ̀. Ɔ̃ aa bↄ̀aànↄ, aalɛ gɛ́ aà páiliwa.
Kɛ́ aalɛ gɛ́, gↄ̃ɛe bↄ̀ sɛ̃̀ oi, àlɛ dↄńzi, ↄ̃ aa teasidàɛ̀ aa Yesu lipãakↄ̃a dìɛ̀. Gↄ̃ɛpi tↄ́n Simↄↄ, Silɛni bùsu gbɛ̃́ɛ, Alɛsãnda ń Lufuo de'iaɛ.
Ɔ̃ aa gɛ̀ ń Yesuo gu pↄ́ wì mɛ Gↄgↄta. (Bee mɛ̀ mitↄↄnagu.)
Ɔ̃ aa vɛ̃ɛ pↄ́ wà lí'ↄ kàu dↄ̀ɛ̀, ãma i mio.
Kɛ́ aa aà pàliwa, ↄ̃ aa aà pↄkasaↄ kpaalɛ̀ kàlɛ, aa tɛ́lɛpà a sɛa yã́ musu.
Aa aà pàliwa ĩatɛ̃ muuwãamigↄↄɛ.
Yã́ pↄ́ wa dↄ̀wa ↄ̃ wa kɛ̃̀ wa nà aà mia wà mɛ̀: Yudaↄ Kía.
Wà kpã́iwɛliwɛↄ pàliwa we lↄ gbɛ̃ↄn pla, ado aà ↄplaai, ado zɛɛi.
Ɔ̃ yã́ pↄ́ kɛ̃a láuɛ bee pà wà mɛ̀: Wà aà gwà doũ ń tàaekɛnaↄ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ gɛ̃ weↄ lɛ́ ń midɛ, aalɛ aà sↄ̃sↄ̃ aa mɛ̀: Ɛ̃hɛ̃! Tò! N mɛ̀ ńyↄ̃ Lua kpɛ́ wí, ní ɛa dↄ gↄↄ àaↄ̃ nolo?
Ǹ nzĩa suaba! Pila líwa mɛ̀!
Màa lↄ sa'onkiaↄ ń Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdeↄ lɛ́ aà kɛ pↄ́ↄpↄↄ aa mɛ̀: À gbɛ̃pãleↄ suabà, ãma a fↄ̃ à azĩa suabao.
Tó wá è Isailiↄ kía pↄ́ wì mɛ Mɛsiipi pìla líwa, wá aà náaikɛ sa. Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wà ń páliwa sãnuↄ lɛ́ aà sↄ̃sↄ̃ lↄ.
Sɛa za ĩatɛ̃ minanguo e aua gɛ̀ pìlaò gu siakũ̀ bùsupiu píiɛ.
Ĩatɛ̃'auapilaa ↄ̃ Yesu wiilɛ̀ gbã́ugbãu à mɛ̀: Ɛloi, Ɛloi, lɛma sabatani! Bee bↄↄlɛ mɛ̀: Ma Lua, ma Lua, àkɛa n ma to wei?
Kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ zɛa weeↄ yã́pi mà, ↄ̃ aa mɛ̀: Ma we, àlɛ Ɛlia sisiɛ.
Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃e bàalɛ̀ gɛ̀ sao zↄ̃̀ vɛ̃ɛ kũ̀mawa, a pɛ̀ feea a dↄ̀ Yesuɛ à mɛ̀: À zɛ gĩa wà gwa, tó Ɛlia a mↄ aà pila.
Yesu wii gbãa lɛ̀, ↄ̃ à gà.
Ɔ̃ Lua kpɛ́ zwãa pↄ́ daa luakukĩi aɛ pàa pla za musu e zĩ́lɛ.
Kɛ́ sosaↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ pↄ́ zɛ Yesu aɛ we aà gaa è màa à mɛ̀: Gↄ̃ɛpiá Lua Nɛ́ɛ sĩana.
Nↄɛeↄ ku we lↄ, aalɛ gugwa kãaa. An guu Maliama Madelɛni kuu ń Maliama pↄ́ dɛ Yosɛfu ń Zaaki Nɛ́nao da ũo ń Salomɛɛo.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ Yesu kú Galile, aamɛ aaìↄ tɛaàzi wàↄ blɛkɛɛ̀. Nↄɛ pãleↄ mↄ̀aànↄ Yelusalɛũ aa ku we lↄ dasi.
Ãsↄ̃adazĩ oosi lɛ́ kɛ. Lá kã́mabogↄↄ ye daalɛi,
Yosɛfu Alimate mↄ̀. Gbɛ̃́ tↄdeɛ Yuda gbãadeↄ guu, mɛ́ àlɛ kpala pↄ́ a bↄ Lua kĩ́i dã́. À sↄ̃dìlɛ à gɛ̀ Pilati kĩ́i, à Yesu gɛ wabikɛ̀wà.
Kɛ́ Pilati mà Yesu gà kↄ̀, à bↄ̀ aà saɛ. Ɔ̃ à sosaↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ sìsi, à aà là tó Yesu gà kↄ̀.
Kɛ́ Pilati gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi yãmà, ↄ̃ à Yosɛfu gbà zɛ́ aà gɛpi sɛ́.
Yosɛfu gɛ̀ bàabaa lù, ↄ̃ à gɛ̀ à aà bùa à bàabaapi fĩ̀wà. À aà dà gbɛ̀'ɛ pↄ́ wa sↄ̀ mia ũ guu, ↄ̃ à gbɛ̀ gbɛ̃̀nɛ gbeembo tà ɛpilɛ.
Maliama Madelɛni ń Maliama Yosɛfu dao lɛ́ gwa, aa è gua pↄ́ wà Yesu gɛpi dàu.
Kã́mabogↄↄzĩ láaa ĩatɛ̃ gɛ̃a kpɛ́u Maliama Madelɛni ń Maliama Zaaki dao ń Salomɛɛo nísi gĩnana lù, kɛ́ wà gɛ ma Yesu mɛwa.
Ãsↄ̃anɛnzĩ kↄↄkↄↄ ĩatɛ̃ bilɛa ↄ̃ aa bↄ̀ gɛ̀ miapi kĩ́i.
Aalɛ kↄ̃ la zɛ́u aalɛ mɛ: Démɛ a gbɛpi gbeembo à gowɛ̃ɛ mia'ɛ lɛ́i?
Asa gbɛpi gbɛ̃̀nɛɛ. Kɛ́ aa wɛsɛ̀, ↄ̃ aa è wà gbɛpi gbeembò kↄ̀.
Kɛ́ aa gɛ̃̀ mia'ɛpi guu, ↄ̃ aa ɛ̀waasoe è zↄ̃lɛa ↄplaa oi, a ulatao pua daa. Ɔ̃ iwãa kà ń pↄa.
A ònɛ́: Ásu to iwãa ká á pↄao. Yesu Nazalɛti pↄ́ wa pàliwa álɛ wɛɛlɛo lò? À vù. A gu pↄ́ wà aà dìlɛu èa? A ku lao.
À tá, í o aà ìwaↄnɛ ń Piɛɛo, a dↄaanɛ́ Galile. Aa aà e we lá a ònɛ́wa.
Iwãa kà ń pↄa, aalɛ kpakpanaga, ↄ̃ aa bↄ̀lɛ miapiu ń bao. Aai yãe o gbɛ̃eɛo, kɛ́ vĩa ń kṹ yã́i.
Kɛ́ Yesu bↄ̀ gau ãsↄ̃anɛnzĩ gufɛ̃nɛ, à azĩa ↄ̀lↄ Maliama Madelɛni pↄ́ à tã́a mɛ̀n sopla gòɛ̀ɛ káau.
Ɔ̃ nↄɛpi gɛ ò aà gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ an pↄ yaa, aalɛ ↄ́ↄlↄↄnɛ.
Kɛ́ aa mà Yesu vù, nↄɛpi aà è ń wɛ́o, ↄ̃ aai sio.
Bee gbɛa gↄↄ pↄ́ an gbɛ̃ↄn plaↄ bɛ zɛ́ guu, aalɛ gɛ́ wɛ̃́lɛu, à azĩa ↄ̀lↄnɛ́ lán gbɛ̃pãlewa.
Kɛ́ aa ɛ̀a sù ń wɛ̃́lɛpio, aa ò gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄnɛ. Ń beeo aai ń yã́ sio.
Gbɛzã ↄ̃ à azĩa ↄ̀lↄ a gbɛ̃ↄn kuɛdoↄnɛ gↄↄ pↄ́ aalɛ pↄble. Ɔ̃ à zↄadↄ̀má, kɛ́ an swã́ gbãa mɛ́ aai a náaikɛo yã́i. Asa aai gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa aà è à vùↄ yã́ sio.
Ɔ̃ a ònɛ́: À gɛ́ dṹnia guu píi, í ma baokpa gbɛ̃́piiɛ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ sì mɛ́ à da'ilɛkɛ̀ a bↄ. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ i sio sↄ̃, yã́ a zↄ̃lɛwà.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa yã́pi sìↄ yãkɛaↄn kɛ: Aali tã́ago ń ma tↄ́o, aali yãebui'o.
Tó aa mlɛ̃ kũ̀ ń ↄo ge tó aa kona í mì, a pↄe kɛnɛ́o. Aali ↄna gyãeↄwa, aai aafiaʼe.
Kɛ́ Dii Yesu yã'ònɛ́ a làa, ↄ̃ Lua aà sɛ̀ tàò musu, à zↄ̃̀lɛ Luapi ↄplaai.
Ɔ̃ aà ìwapiↄ bↄ̀ gɛ̀ waasokpà gupiiu. Dii zĩkɛ̀ńnↄ, ↄ̃ an dabudabukɛaↄ yã́ pↄ́ aa ò sĩanapìliwànɛ́.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ ↄkpà yã́ pↄ́ kɛ̀ wá guu dau siua lá guu zɛ́zɛwa dasi,
lá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa dɛ yã́pi seeladeↄ ń a baokpanaↄ ũ za káauↄ òwɛ̃ɛwa.
Tiasa mapi sↄ̃, lá ma wɛtɛ̀ yã́piↄi dodo za a daalɛawa, má è a maa mà kɛ̃nɛ zɛ́zɛ, ma gbɛ̃́ bɛɛɛde Teofili,
kɛ́ ǹ e ǹ yã́ pↄ́ wa dànɛ sã́asã dↄ̃.
Yude bùsu kí Elodi gↄↄ sa'onae ku, aà tↄ́n Zakali. A ku Abia sa'onaↄ gãli guuɛ. Aà na tↄ́n Ɛlizabɛti. Aalona buiɛ lↄ.
An pla ḿpii aa maa Luaɛ. Aaìↄ ku tàaesai, aa Dii ikoyã ń yã́ pↄ́ a dìlɛↄ kũa.
Aa nɛ́ vĩo, asa Ɛlizabɛtiá fĩiɛ, mɛ́ an pla ḿpii aa zikũ̀.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ sa'oa kà an gãliwa, Zakali mɛ́ lɛ́ Lua gbagba.
Lá sa'onapiↄ ì kɛwa, aa likpà, ↄ̃ lí Zakali sɛ̀ aà gɛ́ tulaletikai tɛ́a Dii kpɛ́u.
Tulaletikpasagↄↄ bíla kã̀aa kpɛɛlɛ píi, aalɛ wabikɛ.
Ɔ̃ Dii malaikae bↄ̀ mↄ̀wà, à zɛ̀ tulaletikatɛakĩi ↄplaai.
Kɛ́ Zakali aà è, à bílikɛ̀, vĩa aà kũ̀.
Ɔ̃ malaikapi òɛ̀: Ńsu to vĩa n kũo Zakali. Lua n wabikɛa sì, n na Ɛlizabɛti a nɛ'i gↄ̃ɛ ũ, ní tↄ́kpaɛ̀ Zãa.
N pↄ a kɛ na, ńyↄ̃ yáalↄ, gbɛ̃́ↄ pↄnakɛ aà ia yã́ musu dasi,
asa aↄ dɛ Diiɛ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũɛ. A wɛ̃ ge í gbãae mio, Lua Nisĩna aↄ dɛdɛawà za aà da gbɛɛuɛ.
A to Isailiↄ zɛ ń Dii ń Luao dasi,
a dↄaa Diiɛ ń Lua Nisĩna gbãa pↄ́ Ɛlia vĩ yãao. A to maeↄ lɛdoũkɛ ń ń nɛ́ↄ, a to swã́yãmansaideↄ gbɛ̃maaↄ ↄ̃nↄ sɛ́. A gbɛ̃́ↄ kɛkɛ aaↄ ku sↄu guu Diiɛ.
Ɔ̃ Zakali ò malaikapiɛ: Kpelewa má yã́pi sĩana dↄ̃i? Asa maezinan ma ũ, mɛ́ ma na zikũ̀ lↄ.
Ɔ̃ malaikapi wèwà à mɛ̀: Mámɛ má Gabliɛli, miↄ zɛa Lua aɛ. Ɔ̃mɛ ma zĩ yã́pi oinɛ, mà baonapi kpanɛ.
Ma, n lɛ́na a naalɛ, ńyↄ̃ fↄ̃ yã'oo e yã́pi gɛ kɛò, kɛ́ ni ma yã́ pↄ́ a kɛ a gↄↄwa sio yã́i.
Gↄↄ bee sↄ̃ wàlɛ Zakali dã́. Aà gɛ̃gɛ̃a Lua kpɛ́u bↄ̀ ń saɛ.
Kɛ́ à bↄ̀, i fↄ̃ yã'òńnↄo, ↄ̃ wa dↄ̃̀ kɛ́ à wɛ́pungu'è Lua kpɛ́uɛ. Lá aà lɛ́na nàalɛ, ↄ̃ àlɛ yã'onɛ́ ń ↄo.
Kɛ́ Zakali sa'ogↄↄ lɛ́ kà, ↄ̃ à tà a bɛ.
Bee gbɛa aà na Ɛlizabɛti nↄsì, ↄ̃ à azĩa ùlɛ e mↄ sↄo à mɛ̀:
Dii kɛ̀, à ma wɛ̃nagwà, à wibↄ̀mɛɛ.
A mↄ soolode guu Lua malaika Gabliɛli zĩ̀ Galile wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ wì mɛ Nazalɛti guu.
À gɛ̀ nɛnↄɛ lɛ́so pↄ́ aà tↄ́n Maliama kĩ́i. A gↄ̃kpama vĩ Davidi bui ũ, aà tↄ́n Yosɛfu.
Kɛ́ malaikapi gɛ̃̀ aà kĩ́i, a òɛ̀: Fↄↄ báaade! Dii kunnↄɛ.
Maliama bílikɛ̀ yã́piwa, à làasookɛ̀ à mɛ̀: Fↄ bee mi dɛa ni?
Ɔ̃ malaikapi òɛ̀: Maliama, ńsu to vĩa n kũo, asa Lua báaadànguɛ.
Ma! Ńyↄ̃ nↄsi, ní nɛ'i gↄ̃ɛ ũ, ní tↄ́kpaɛ̀ Yesu.
Aↄ dɛ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ, wàli oɛ̀ Musude Nɛ́. Dii Lua a aà kpa aà dezi Davidi kpalau,
iↄ dɛ Yakↄbu buiↄ kía ũ gↄↄpii, aà kpala aↄ láaa vĩo.
Ɔ̃ Maliama ò malaikapiɛ: Lá mi gↄ̃ɛ dↄ̃ yãao, bee a kɛ kpelewa ni?
Malaika wèwà à mɛ̀: Lua Nisĩna a dinɛ, Musude gbãa i mↄma. A yã́i nɛ́ pↄ́ ńyↄ̃ ipi kua aↄ adoa, wàli oɛ̀ Lua Nɛ́.
N daɛ Ɛlizabɛti nɛgↄ̃ɛ nↄsia sↄ̃ a zikũ guu. Nↄɛ pↄ́ wa dìlɛ fĩi ũpi kú ń nↄ̀ mↄ sooloo tia.
Asa Lua lí fu yãewao.
Ɔ̃ Maliama mɛ̀: Dii zↄ̀blenan ma ũ. Aà kɛmɛɛ lá ń òwa. Ɔ̃ malaikapi aà tò we.
Gↄↄ bee Maliama fɛ̀lɛ gɛ̀ wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ kú Yude bùsu gusĩsĩdeu gↄ̃̀ↄ.
À gɛ̀ Zakali bɛ, ↄ̃ à fↄkpà Ɛlizabɛtiwa.
Kɛ́ Ɛlizabɛti Maliama fↄpi mà, aà nɛ́ vĩ̀vĩ aà gbɛɛ guu, ↄ̃ Lua Nisĩna dɛ̀dɛ Ɛlizabɛtiwa,
Ɛlizabɛti wii gbãa lɛ̀ à mɛ̀: Báaaden n ũ dɛ nↄɛ píila. Báaaden nɛ́ pↄ́ kú ń gbɛɛu ũ lↄ.
Bↄ́n ma ũ kɛ́ ma Dii da mↄ̀ ma gwaii?
Gↄↄ pↄ́ ma swã́lɛ̀ n fↄwa lé, nɛ́ pↄ́ kú ma gbɛɛu vĩ̀vĩ ń pↄnaoɛ.
Báaaden n ũ, asa ń sì yã́ pↄ́ Dii ònɛ a kɛ.
Ɔ̃ Maliama mɛ̀: Báaaden n ũ, asa Málɛ Dii tↄbↄ ma sↄ̃ guu,
ma nↄ̀sɛ lɛ́ yáalↄ Lua ma Suabanawa,
asa à ma yãdà, mapi aà zↄ̀blena pↄ́ mi ka pↄe ũo. Za tia e gↄↄpii wàli omɛɛ báaadeɛ,
asa Lua Gbãadepi yãzↄ̃ↄkɛ̀mɛɛ. Aà tↄ́ kua adoa.
Ì wɛ̃nadↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaì vĩakɛɛↄnɛ e ń buiwa.
À a gã̀sĩ pòo à a gbãa ↄ̀lↄnɛ́, à waladeↄ fã̀aa ń ń làasooↄ.
À gbãadeↄ bↄ̀ kpalau, à táaaↄ kã̀fĩ.
À pↄmaaↄ kpà nↄandɛnaↄwa aa kã̀, à ↄdeↄ gbàɛ ↄgii.
À a zↄ̀blena Isailiↄ ĩ̀a, an yã́ i sãaàguo.
À wɛ̃nadↄ̃̀ Ablahaũ ń a buipiↄnɛ lá à a lɛgbɛ̃̀ wá deziↄnɛwa.
Maliama zↄ̃̀lɛ ń Ɛlizabɛtio lán mↄ àaↄ̃wa, ↄ̃ à gbàsa tà a bɛ.
Ɛlizabɛti nɛ'igↄↄ kà, ↄ̃ à nɛ'ì gↄ̃ɛ ũ.
Kɛ́ aà fã́anideↄ ń aà daɛↄ mà lá Dii wɛ̃nadↄ̃̀ɛ̀, aa pↄnakɛ̀aànↄ.
A gↄↄ swaaↄ̃de zĩ́ aa mↄ̀ tↄ̃zↄ̃i nɛ́piɛ, aai aà mae Zakali tↄ́kpaɛ̀,
ↄ̃ aà da mɛ̀: Aawo! Wàli oɛ̀ Zãa.
Aa òɛ̀: Gbɛ̃e ku n daɛↄ guu, a tↄ́ bee vĩo.
Ɔ̃ aa yã'ò aà maeɛ ń ↄo, kɛ́ aa e dↄ̃ lá a ye wà tↄ́kpaɛ̀.
Zakalipi pↄ́ pↄ́ á e lákɛ̃wà gbɛ̀a, ↄ̃ a kɛ̃̀wà: Aà tↄ́n Zãa. Yã́pi bↄ̀ ń saɛ ḿpii.
Wegↄ̃ↄ aà lɛ́na gòlɛ, à lɛbↄ̀ lɛ́ yã'o, àlɛ Lua sáaukpa.
Ɔ̃ vĩa ń fã́anideↄ kũ̀ píi, ↄ̃ Yude bùsu gusĩsĩde gbɛ̃́ↄ lɛ́ yã́pi galikɛ píi.
Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa yã́pi màↄ kũa ń nↄ̀sɛ guu aa mɛ̀: Bↄ́ nɛ́pi aↄ dɛ a ũ ziai? Asa Dii ↄliaaaàziɛ.
Lua Nisĩna dɛ̀dɛ aà mae Zakaliwa, ↄ̃ à ãnabikɛkɛ̀ à mɛ̀:
Wà Dii Isailiↄ Lua sáaukpa! À mↄ̀ a gbɛ̃́ↄ bò.
À Suaban gbãade bↄ̀wɛ̃ɛ a zↄ̀blena Davidi bui guu,
lá a dà a ãnabiↄnɛ aa ò za ziwa.
Aa mɛ̀ a wá sí wá ibɛɛↄwa, a wá bↄ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ zawágupiↄ ↄzĩ.
Màa à wá deziↄ wɛ̃nagwà, aà bàa pↄ́ kúńnↄ yã́ i sãaàguo.
À lɛgbɛ̃̀ wá dezi Ablahaũɛ
à mɛ̀ á wá bↄ wá ibɛɛↄ ↄzĩ, í wá gba zɛ́ wà zↄbleɛ vĩasai,
wá kua iↄ adoaɛ̀ gbɛ̃maaↄ ũ e wá wɛ̃ni lɛ́u.
Mpi sↄ̃ ma nɛ́, wàli onɛ Musude ãnabi, asa ḿmɛ ńyↄ̃ dↄaa ǹ zɛkɛkɛ Diiɛ.
Ńyↄ̃ to aà gbɛ̃́ↄ dↄ̃ lá a ń suaba, lá a ń duuna kɛ̃́má,
kɛ́ wá Lua nↄ̀sɛ sósobi vĩ yã́i. Bↄa musu a mↄ wá gwai lá gu ì dↄwa,
i gupu gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú gusiauↄnɛ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú ga lɛ́zĩↄ, i wá gbá pɛ́lɛ aafia zɛ́u.
Nɛ́pi zↄ̃ↄkũ̀ à gↄ̃̀ kã́gbãade ũ. A ku gbáau e gↄↄ pↄ́ à bↄ̀ gupuau Isailiↄwa.
Gↄↄ bee Sezaa Ogusi bↄ̀ ń yã́o à mɛ̀ wà dṹnia gbɛ̃́pii nao.
Wà nao sɛ̃́iapi kɛ̀ gↄↄ pↄ́ Kilini dɛ Sili bùsu gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũɛ.
Baade píi gɛ̀ a bɛ wɛ̃́lɛu wà a tↄ́ dalau.
Yosɛfu sↄ̃ à bↄ̀ Nazalɛti, Galile bùsuu, à gɛ̀ Davidi bɛ wɛ̃́lɛ Bɛtɛlɛũ, Yude bùsuu, kɛ́ a dɛ Davidi bui ũ yã́i.
À gɛ̀ wà a tↄ́ dalau we ń a nↄkpama Maliamao. A nↄsia,
ↄ̃ gↄↄ pↄ́ aa ku we, aà nɛ'igↄↄ kà,
ↄ̃ à a yoa ì gↄ̃ɛ ũ. À zwãa fĩ̀wà à aà wùlɛ pↄtuoↄ pↄblebↄu, kɛ́ aai gu e nibↄↄ pilakĩio yã́i.
Sãdãnaↄ ku bùsu doũpi guu, aalɛ i sɛ̃u, gwãasĩna aalɛ ń sãↄ dↄ̃́a.
Ɔ̃ Dii malaikae bↄ̀ mↄ̀má, Dii gawi gupùńzi, ↄ̃ vĩa ń kṹ maamaa.
Malaikapi ònɛ́: Ásu to vĩa á kũo, asa ma mↄ baonakpaiɛ́ɛ, gbɛ̃́pii pↄ i kɛ na maamaa.
Wà Suabana ìɛ́ Davidi wɛ̃́lɛu gwã́a, ↄ̃mɛ Mɛsii ũ, Dii ũ.
Seela pↄ́ a to à aà dↄ̃n kɛ: Á nɛ́tɛ̃na e wúlɛa pↄtuoↄ pↄblebↄu, zwãa fĩfĩwà.
Kã́ndo luabɛ ìwaↄ ku sãnu ń malaikapio dasidasi, aalɛ Lua táasilɛ aa mɛ̀:
Wà Lua tↄbↄ musu, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ an yã́ kɛ̀ɛ̀ↄ i aafiaʼe tↄↄlɛ.
Kɛ́ malaikapiↄ gòńla aa tà luabɛ, ↄ̃ sãdãnaↄ òkↄ̃ɛ aa mɛ̀: Wà gɛ́ Bɛtɛlɛũ wà yã́ pↄ́ kɛ̀pi e, yã́ pↄ́ Dii tò wá dↄ̃̀.
Ɔ̃ aa fɛ̀lɛ gɛ̀ kpakpa, aa bↄ̀ Maliama ń Yosɛfuowa ń nɛ́tɛ̃napio wúlɛa pↄtuoↄ pↄblebↄu.
Kɛ́ aa aà è, aa yã́ pↄ́ wa ònɛ́ nɛ́tɛ̃napi yã́ musu ò.
Ɔ̃ yã́ pↄ́ sãdãnaↄ òpi bↄ̀ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa màↄ saɛ píi.
Maliama yã́pi kũa a nↄ̀sɛ guu píi, àlɛ làasookɛwà.
Sãdãnaↄ ɛ̀a tà, aalɛ Lua tↄbↄ, aalɛ aà sáaukpa yã́ pↄ́ aa mà mɛ́ aa è musu, asa à kɛ̀ lá wa ònɛ́waɛ.
Kɛ́ a gↄↄ la sù, nɛ́ tↄ̃zↄ̃gↄↄ kà, ↄ̃ wà tↄkpàɛ̀ Yesu, tↄ́ pↄ́ malaika ò zadↄ̃ wi aà nↄsio.
Kɛ́ an gbãbↄgↄↄ kà, aa aà sɛ̀ gɛ̀ ↄlↄi Diiɛ Yelusalɛũ lá Mↄizi ikoyã'òwa.
Asa a ku Dii ikoyãu wà mɛ̀ wà nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́iaↄ kpawàɛ.
Aa sa pↄ́ wa dìlɛ Dii ikoyãu ò, wà mɛ̀ felena mɛ̀n pla ge felenguulu nɛ́ bↄlↄ mɛ̀n pla.
Gbɛ̃e ku Yelusalɛũ, aà tↄ́n Simɛↄ. Gbɛ̃maaɛ, a Lua vĩa vĩ, mɛ́ aà wɛ́ dↄ Isailiↄ misiai. Lua Nisĩna diɛ̀,
ↄ̃ Nisĩnapi òɛ̀ a ga kía pↄ́ Dii kpà esaio.
Nisĩnapi dↄ̀aaɛ̀, ↄ̃ à gɛ̃̀ Lua ua. Kɛ́ Maliama ń Yosɛfuo mↄ̀ ń ń nɛ́ Yesuo yã́ pↄ́ wa dìlɛ ikoyãu kɛa yã́i,
ↄ̃ Simɛↄ aà sì a ↄzĩ, à Lua sáaukpà à mɛ̀:
Mapi n zↄ̀blena gbaɛ niɛ guu sa lá ń òmɛɛwa Dii,
asa ma wɛsì Suabana pↄ́ ń dìlɛ
n aà yã́ kɛ̀kɛ bui píi wáalɛ.
Aↄ dɛ gupua ũ à gupu buiↄnɛ, i n gbɛ̃́ Isailiↄ tↄbↄ.
Yã́ pↄ́ a ò nɛ́pi musu bↄ̀ aà de ń aà dao saɛ.
Simɛↄ samaa'ònɛ́, ↄ̃ a ò nɛ́pi da Maliamaɛ à mɛ̀: Ɔ̃mɛ aↄ dɛ seela pↄ́ Isailiↄ gii ũ, pↄsia i n sↄ̃ zↄ̃ lán fɛ̃ndawa. Isailiↄ lao ge aa kã́fĩ aà yã́i, an nↄ̀sɛ guu yã́ i bↄ gupuau.
<range>
Nↄɛ ãnabie ku we, aà tↄ́n Ãna, Fanuɛli nɛ́, Asɛɛ buiɛ. Nↄɛpi zikũ̀ɛ táotao. À zãkɛ̀ ń a gↄ̃kpamao wɛ̃̀ soplaɛ,
ↄ̃ à gↄ̃̀ò gyaa ũ e wɛ̃̀ basiiↄ̃ ń síiↄ̃o. Ìli bↄ Lua uao, ìↄ lousisi fãanɛ ń gwãasĩnao ń lɛyeao ń wabikɛao.
Zĩbeezĩ gↄ̃̀ↄ à sↄ̃̀ńzi à Lua sáaukpà, àlɛ nɛ́pi yã'o gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ an wɛ́ dↄ Yelusalɛũ boaiↄnɛ píi.
Kɛ́ Yosɛfu ń Maliamao kɛ̀ lá a ku Dii ikoyã láuwa píi aa làa, aa ɛ̀a tà ń bɛ wɛ̃́lɛu Nazalɛti, Galile bùsuu.
Nɛ́pi fɛ̀lɛ à gbãakũ̀. Ɔ̃nↄ pàɛ̀, mɛ́ ìↄ kú ń Lua báaao.
Wɛ̃ ń wɛ̃o Yesu de ń aà dao aaì gɛ́ Gɛ̃amusu dikpɛkɛi Yelusalɛũɛ.
Kɛ́ Yesu kà wɛ̃̀ kuɛpla, aa ɛ̀a gɛ̀ dikpɛkɛi lá aaì kɛwa.
Kɛ́ dikpɛ làa, aalɛ tá, ↄ̃ an nɛ́ Yesu gↄ̃̀ Yelusalɛũ, aa dↄ̃o.
Aalɛ e a kú ń gbɛ̃́ↄ guuɛ. Kɛ́ aa táa'ò gↄↄ do, ↄ̃ aa gbàsa lɛ́ aà wɛɛlɛ ń daɛↄ ń ń gbɛ̃́ dↄ̃aↄ guu.
Kɛ́ aai aà eo, aa ɛ̀a gɛ̀ aà wɛɛlɛi Yelusalɛũ.
A gↄↄ àaↄ̃de zĩ́ ↄ̃ aa aà è Lua ua zↄ̃lɛa yãdanɛdeↄ guu, àlɛ yãmamá, àlɛ yãlalamá.
Aà yãdↄ̃a ń aà yãweamáo dì gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ aà yãmaↄwa píi.
Kɛ́ aà de ń aà dao aà è, à bↄ̀ ń saɛ, ↄ̃ aà da òɛ̀: Bↄ́yãi ń kɛ̀wɛ̃ɛ màai? N mae ń mapio, wá pↄ yà n wɛɛlɛa guu.
A wèmá à mɛ̀: Bↄ́yãi álɛ ma wɛɛlɛi? Kɛ́ à kũ̀ màↄ ku ma Mae kpɛ́u, á dↄ̃o lé?
Ãma aai yã́ pↄ́ a ònɛ́pi dↄ̃o.
Yesu ɛ̀a tàńnↄ Nazalɛti, à misìilɛnɛ́. Aà da yã́piↄ kũa a nↄ̀sɛ guu píi.
Yesu zↄ̃ↄkũ̀, aà ↄ̃nↄ kã̀fĩ, mɛ́ a na ń Luao ń gbɛ̃nazĩnaↄ.
Sezaa Tibelia kpalablea wɛ̃̀ gɛ̃ode guu Pↄ̃nsi Pilati mɛ́ Yude bùsu gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ, Elodi lɛ́ kible Galile, aà dãuna Filipi lɛ́ kible Itule bùsu ń Takↄni bùsuowa, mɛ́ Lisania lɛ́ kible Abilɛni bùsuwa.
Anasi ń Kaaifao mɛ́ sa'onkiaↄ ũ. Gↄↄ bee ↄ̃ Lua yã'ò Zakali nɛ́ Zãaɛ gbáau.
Ɔ̃ à fɛ̀lɛ lɛ́ bɛbɛ Yuudɛ̃ baale ń baalao píi, àlɛ waasokɛ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ. A ònɛ́ aa nↄ̀sɛlilɛ aa da'ilɛkɛ, Lua i ń duuna kɛ̃́má.
Màa yã́ pↄ́ ãnabi Isaia ò a lá guu kɛ̀ à mɛ̀: Kpàwakɛna lↄↄ ma dↄ gbáau, àlɛ mɛ à zɛkɛkɛ Diiɛ, à zɛ́wɛwɛnaↄ pooɛ̀ súsu.
Guzulɛ píi a tata, gbɛ̀ lɛsĩↄ ń sĩ̀sĩↄ daaĩ píi. Zɛ́ koleaↄ poo súsu, zɛ́ tòũtoũↄ daaĩ,
gbɛ̃́pii i e lá Lua ì ń suaba.
Bíla ìↄ mↄ aà kĩ́i da'ilɛkɛi, ↄ̃ ì onɛ́: Gbɛ̃nazĩn píligonaↄ! Démɛ lɛdàwá à bàasi pↄkũma pↄ́ Lua a bↄbↄmáɛi?
À nↄ̀sɛlilɛa yã́ kɛ, wi dↄ̃ kɛ́ a lilɛ. Kɛ́ Ablahaũ dɛ á dezi ũ, ásu dilɛ bee mɛ́ a á bↄo. Málɛ oɛ́, Lua a fↄ̃ gbɛɛ beeↄ kɛ Ablahaũ buiↄ ũ.
Mↄo dilɛa líↄzi kↄ̀. Lí pↄ́ lɛ́ nɛ́ maa io, wa zↄ̃ zu tɛ́uɛ.
Bíla aà là: Tó màaɛ, wá kɛ kpelewa ni?
A wèmá à mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ula vĩ mɛ̀n pla, aà ado kpa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ vĩowa. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ pↄblea vĩ, aà kɛ màa lↄ.
Ɔsinaↄ mↄ̀ da'ilɛkɛi, ↄ̃ aa aà là aa mɛ̀: Mɛtulu, wá kɛ kpelewa ni?
A wèmá à mɛ̀: Ásu ↄ̃asimá dɛ lá wa dìlɛlao.
Sosaↄ aà là aa mɛ̀: Wápiↄ sↄ̃ wá kɛa ni? A ònɛ́: Ásu gbãamↄ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ à ń bleo. À zɛ ń fĩa pↄ́ wì boɛ́o.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ pↄna lɛ́ dɛdɛ. Gbɛ̃́pii lɛ́ làasookɛ a nↄ̀sɛ guu Zãa yã́wa, tó aↄ dɛ Mɛsii ũ.
Zãa ònɛ́ píi à mɛ̀: Mi á da'ilɛkɛ ń íoɛ, ãma gbɛ̃e lɛ́ mↄ́, aà iko dɛmala, mi ka mà aà sabala bↄbↄɛ̀o. Ɔ̃mɛ a á da'ilɛkɛ ń Lua Nisĩnao ń tɛ́o.
A gbaana kũa à pↄ́ fãò, i pↄ́wɛna ká a dↄ̃u, i a sào ka tɛ́ gasai guu.
Zãa baonakpaanɛ́ guu, à nàɛmá ń yãpãleↄ dasi.
Kɛ́ à yã́ pↄ́ kí Elodi kɛ̀ a dãuna na Elodia yã́ musu ń vãi pãle pↄ́ a kɛ̀ↄ bↄ̀ɛ̀ gupuau píi,
ↄ̃ Elodi ɛ̀a yãvãikɛ̀ lↄ, à Zãa dàkpɛu.
Kɛ́ Zãa lɛ́ gbɛ̃́ↄ da'ilɛkɛ píi, à Yesu da'ilɛkɛ̀ sↄ̃. Gↄↄ pↄ́ Yesu lɛ́ wabikɛ, luabɛ wɛ̃̀aa,
ↄ̃ Lua Nisĩna sù lán felenawa à dìɛ̀. Ɔ̃ wà yã'o mà bↄa luabɛ à mɛ̀: Ma Nɛ́n n ũ, má yenzi, ma pↄ kɛ̀ma na.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ Yesu a zĩ dàalɛ, a wɛ̃̀ baakwi taa vĩ. Wàlɛ e Yosɛfu nɛ́ɛ. Yosɛfupi sↄ̃ Heli nɛ́ɛ,
Helipi sↄ̃ Mata nɛ́ɛ, Matapi sↄ̃ Levii nɛ́ɛ, Leviipi sↄ̃ Mɛlɛki nɛ́ɛ, Mɛlɛkipi sↄ̃ Yana nɛ́ɛ,
Yanapi sↄ̃ Yosɛfu nɛ́ɛ, Yosɛfupi sↄ̃ Matatia nɛ́ɛ, Matatiapi sↄ̃ Amↄsi nɛ́ɛ, Amↄsipi sↄ̃ Nauũ nɛ́ɛ, Nauũpi sↄ̃ Ɛsɛli nɛ́ɛ, Ɛsɛlipi sↄ̃ Nage nɛ́ɛ,
Nagepi sↄ̃ Maatu nɛ́ɛ, Maatupi sↄ̃ Matatia nɛ́ɛ, Matatiapi sↄ̃ Sɛmɛi nɛ́ɛ, Sɛmɛipi sↄ̃ Yosɛku nɛ́ɛ, Yosɛkupi sↄ̃ Yoda nɛ́ɛ, Yodapi sↄ̃ Yohanani nɛ́ɛ,
Yohananipi sↄ̃ Lesa nɛ́ɛ, Lesapi sↄ̃ Zolobabɛli nɛ́ɛ, Zolobabɛlipi sↄ̃ Salatiɛli nɛ́ɛ, Salatiɛlipi sↄ̃ Nɛli nɛ́ɛ, Nɛlipi sↄ̃ Mɛlɛki nɛ́ɛ,
Mɛlɛkipi sↄ̃ Adi nɛ́ɛ, Adipi sↄ̃ Kosaũ nɛ́ɛ, Kosaũpi sↄ̃ Ɛlɛmadaũ nɛ́ɛ, Ɛlɛmadaũpi sↄ̃ Ɛɛ nɛ́ɛ, Ɛɛpi sↄ̃ Yozuee nɛ́ɛ,
Yozueepi sↄ̃ Ɛliɛzɛɛ nɛ́ɛ, Ɛliɛzɛɛpi sↄ̃ Yoliũ nɛ́ɛ, Yoliũpi sↄ̃ Mata nɛ́ɛ, Matapi sↄ̃ Levii nɛ́ɛ, Leviipi sↄ̃ Simɛↄ nɛ́ɛ,
Simɛↄpi sↄ̃ Yuda nɛ́ɛ, Yudapi sↄ̃ Yosɛfu nɛ́ɛ, Yosɛfupi sↄ̃ Yonaũ nɛ́ɛ, Yonaũpi sↄ̃ Ɛliakiũ nɛ́ɛ, Ɛliakiũpi sↄ̃ Mɛlɛa nɛ́ɛ,
Mɛlɛapi sↄ̃ Mɛna nɛ́ɛ, Mɛnapi sↄ̃ Matata nɛ́ɛ, Matatapi sↄ̃ Natã nɛ́ɛ, Natãpi sↄ̃ Davidi nɛ́ɛ, Davidipi sↄ̃ Yɛse nɛ́ɛ,
Yɛsepi sↄ̃ Ɔbɛdi nɛ́ɛ, Ɔbɛdipi sↄ̃ Bↄazu nɛ́ɛ, Bↄazupi sↄ̃ Salamↄ nɛ́ɛ, Salamↄpi sↄ̃ Naasↄ̃ nɛ́ɛ, Naasↄ̃pi sↄ̃ Aminadabu nɛ́ɛ,
Aminadabupi sↄ̃ Adami nɛ́ɛ, Adamipi sↄ̃ Aani nɛ́ɛ, Aanipi sↄ̃ Ɛsɛlↄũ nɛ́ɛ, Ɛsɛlↄũpi sↄ̃ Pɛlɛzi nɛ́ɛ, Pɛlɛzipi sↄ̃ Yuda nɛ́ɛ, Yudapi sↄ̃ Yakↄbu nɛ́ɛ,
Yakↄbupi sↄ̃ Izaaki nɛ́ɛ, Izaakipi sↄ̃ Ablahaũ nɛ́ɛ, Ablahaũpi sↄ̃ Tela nɛ́ɛ, Telapi sↄ̃ Nakↄↄ nɛ́ɛ, Nakↄↄpi sↄ̃ Selugi nɛ́ɛ,
Selugipi sↄ̃ Leu nɛ́ɛ, Leupi sↄ̃ Pɛlɛgi nɛ́ɛ, Pɛlɛgipi sↄ̃ Ɛbɛlu nɛ́ɛ, Ɛbɛlupi sↄ̃ Sela nɛ́ɛ, Selapi sↄ̃ Kena nɛ́ɛ,
Kenapi sↄ̃ Aapasa nɛ́ɛ, Aapasapi sↄ̃ Sɛũ nɛ́ɛ, Sɛũpi sↄ̃ Nↄee nɛ́ɛ, Nↄeepi sↄ̃ Lemɛki nɛ́ɛ, Lemɛkipi sↄ̃ Mɛtusela nɛ́ɛ,
Mɛtuselapi sↄ̃ Ɛnↄki nɛ́ɛ, Ɛnↄkipi sↄ̃ Yɛlɛdi nɛ́ɛ, Yɛlɛdipi sↄ̃ Maalalee nɛ́ɛ, Maalaleepi sↄ̃ Kena nɛ́ɛ, Kenapi sↄ̃ Ɛnↄsi nɛ́ɛ,
Ɛnↄsipi sↄ̃ Sɛti nɛ́ɛ, Sɛtipi sↄ̃ Adamu nɛ́ɛ, Adamupi sↄ̃ Lua nɛ́ɛ.
Yesu lɛ́ su ń Yuudɛ̃o Lua Nisĩna pɛɛawà guu, ↄ̃ Nisĩnapi gɛ̀aànↄ gbáau.
Ibiisi aà yↄ̃̀ we e gↄↄ bla. Gↄↄpi i pↄe bleo. Kɛ́ gↄↄ blapi pà, nↄana lɛ́ aà dɛ.
Ɔ̃ Ibiisi òɛ̀: Tó Lua Nɛ́n n ũ, o gbɛɛ bee li pɛ̃ɛ ũ.
Yesu wèwà à mɛ̀: A kɛ̃a Lua taalau wà mɛ̀: Pↄblea ↄ̃ gbɛ̃nazĩna kuò adoo.
Ɔ̃ Ibiisi aà sɛ̀ gɛ̀aànↄ musu, ↄ̃ à dṹnia kpalaↄ ↄ̀lↄɛ̀ píi a zɛgbɛu gↄ̃̀ↄ
à mɛ̀: Má n gba iko beeↄ píi ń a gawio. A ku ma ↄzĩɛ, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ má yei má kpawàɛ.
Tó n kulɛmɛɛ lé, a gↄ̃ n pↄ́ ũɛ píi.
Yesu wèwà à mɛ̀: A kɛ̃a Lua taalau wà mɛ̀: Kúlɛ Dii n Luaɛ, níↄ zↄbleɛ̀ ado.
Ɔ̃ à gɛ̀aànↄ Yelusalɛũ, à aà zɛ̀ Lua kpɛ́ misonaa à mɛ̀: Tó Lua Nɛ́n n ũ, ↄkpa nzĩai,
asa a kɛ̃a láu wà mɛ̀: Lua a n yã'o a malaikaↄnɛ aa n dↄ̃́a.
Wà mɛ̀ lↄ: Aa ↄdama, kɛ́ ńsu gɛ̃nalɛ gbɛwao yã́i.
Yesu wèwà à mɛ̀: Wà mɛ̀, ńsuli Dii n Lua lɛ ǹ gwao.
Kɛ́ Ibiisi Yesu yↄ̃̀ ń yã́piio a làa, ↄ̃ à aà tò we e gↄↄ pãle.
Yesu ɛ̀a tà Galile ń Lua Nisĩna gbãao, ↄ̃ aà tↄ́ lì bùsupia píi.
Ì yãdadanɛ́ ń lousisikpɛↄ guu, mɛ́ gbɛ̃́pii ì aà tↄnasi.
Ɔ̃ à gɛ̀ Nazalɛti, gu pↄ́ à nɛblèu. Kã́mabogↄↄzĩ à gɛ̀ lousisikpɛu lá ì kɛwa. À fɛ̀lɛ à kyokɛ,
ↄ̃ wà ãnabi Isaia taala kpàwà. Kɛ́ a pòo, à bↄ̀ gu pↄ́ wà yã́ɛ bee kɛ̃̀uwa à mɛ̀:
Dii Nisĩna kua. À ma sɛ mà baonakpa taasideↄnɛ, à ma zĩ mà gↄ̃a wɛ̃́ɛↄ ũ kpàwakɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa ńzĩa vĩoↄnɛ, mà wɛwɛ̃a kpàwakɛ vĩ̀aↄnɛ, mà gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ yeaↄ polo,
mí Dii gbɛ̃kɛkɛnɛgↄↄ kpàwakɛ.
Ɔ̃ à lápi kòo a kpà dↄnlɛdewa, ↄ̃ à zↄ̃̀lɛ. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa ku kpɛ́uↄ wɛ́ fĩwà píi.
Ɔ̃ à yãsɛ̀ à mɛ̀: Lua yã́ɛ bee pà gbã, lá álɛ maɛwa.
Yãmaa pↄ́ dↄ aà lɛ́u bↄ̀ ń saɛ píi, ↄ̃ aalɛ aà tↄnasi. Ɔ̃ aa mɛ̀: Yosɛfu nɛ́ nolo?
Ɔ̃ a ònɛ́: Má dↄ̃ sã́asã kɛ́ á yáasiɛ bee kɛmɛɛ. Tó ń lòotoo ũ, ǹ nzĩa gbã́gbã. Á omɛɛ mà yã́ pↄ́ á mà má kɛ̀ Kapɛnaũ kɛ ma bɛ wɛ̃́lɛu la lↄ.
Sĩana málɛ oɛ́, ãnabi líↄ gbia a bɛ wɛ̃́lɛuo.
Málɛ oɛ́ sĩana guu, kɛ́ luabɛ zɛ́ tà Ɛlia gↄↄ, gyaa gbɛ̃andoↄ ku dasi. Lou i mao e wɛ̃̀ àaↄ̃ ń mↄ sooloo, mɛ́ nↄan zↄ̃ↄ kà Isaili bùsuu píi,
kási Lua i Ɛlia zĩ ń keewao, sema gyaa pↄ́ kú Salɛpa wɛ̃́lɛu Sidↄ̃ saɛ.
Ãnabi Ɛlizi gↄↄ sↄ̃, Isaili bùsu kusudeↄ diɛ, kási i ń kee gbã́gbão, sema Sili bùsu gbɛ̃́ Naama.
Kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú lousisikpɛuↄ yã́pi mà píi, an pↄ pà maamaa.
Ɔ̃ aa bↄ̀ ń Yesuo wɛ̃́nkpɛ, aa gɛ̀aànↄ sĩ̀sĩ pↄ́ ń wɛ̃́lɛ kálɛwà misonaa, kɛ́ aa ↄzↄ̃aàzi zĩ́lɛ yã́i.
Ɔ̃ à bↄ̀ ń guu à tà.
Yesu tà Kapɛnaũ, ↄ̃ àlɛ yãdadanɛ́ Galile bùsu wɛ̃́lɛpiu kã́mabogↄↄzĩ.
Aà yãdaanɛ́ bↄ̀ ń saɛ, asa aà yã́ iko vĩɛ.
Gↄ̃ɛ tã́adee ku lousisikpɛu we, ↄ̃ à wii gbãa lɛ̀ à mɛ̀:
Ée! Bↄ́ wá vĩ ń kↄ̃oi Yesu Nazalɛti? N mↄ wá kaalɛi yã̀? Má dↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ń dɛ a ũ, Lua gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a kua adoan n ũ.
Ɔ̃ Yesu gì tã́apiɛ à mɛ̀: Nílɛ! Go gↄ̃ɛpiwa. Ɔ̃ tã́api gↄ̃ɛpi nɛ̀ dasi guu à gòwà, i aà kɛ'ĩao.
Bíli gbɛ̃́pii kũ̀, aalɛ kↄ̃ lala aa mɛ̀: Bↄtaa bui yã́n wei? Gwa, ì yãdilɛ tã́aↄnɛ ń iko gbãao, ↄ̃ aaì gɛ̃zɛa.
Ɔ̃ aà bao lì bùsupia gupiiu.
Kɛ́ à bↄ̀ lousisikpɛu, ↄ̃ à tà Simↄↄ bɛ. Simↄↄ nada lɛ́ mɛ̀wãakɛ maamaa, ↄ̃ wà a yã'òɛ̀.
Yesu zɛ̀ aà mizĩ à gì mɛ̀wãapiɛ, ↄ̃ aà mɛ nìni. Wegↄ̃ↄ à fɛ̀lɛ blɛkɛ̀nɛ́.
Kɛ́ ĩatɛ̃ gɛ̃̀ kpɛ́u, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gyãe vĩↄ mↄ̀ńnↄ Yesuɛ, ↄ̃ à ↄnàna ń baadewa, à ń gbãgbã ń ń gyã bui dasio.
Tã́aↄ lɛ́ go gbɛ̃́ↄwa ń wiio dasi lↄ aa mɛ̀: Lua Nɛ́n n ũ. Ɔ̃ à gìnɛ́ aa yã'o, kɛ́ aa aà dↄ̃̀ Mɛsii ũ yã́i.
Kɛ́ gu dↄ̀, Yesu bↄ̀ wɛ̃́lɛu à gɛ̀ gusaɛna, ↄ̃ bíla lɛ́ aà wɛɛlɛ. Kɛ́ aa bↄ̀wà, aalɛ giɛ̀ aà ń tó we.
Ɔ̃ a ònɛ́: Sema mà kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i baokpa wɛ̃́lɛ kĩniↄnɛ lↄ, asa a yã́i Lua ma zĩi.
Ɔ̃ à gɛ̀ lɛ́ waasokɛ Yudaↄ lousisikpɛↄ guu.
Zĩewa Yesu zɛa Gɛnɛzalɛti ísida gↄ̃sↄ̃lɛ, ↄ̃ bíla kã̀aaaàzi Lua yãmaa yã́i, aalɛ naɛwà.
Ɔ̃ à gó'ilɛna è kálɛa gↄ̃sↄ̃lɛ mɛ̀n pla, kpↄ̀wɛnaↄ bↄ̀lɛ lɛ́ ń táaluↄ pipi.
Ɔ̃ à gɛ̃̀ gópiↄ do pↄ́ dɛ Simↄↄ pↄ́ ũ guu, à wabikɛ̀wà aà ↄzↄ̃i aà go gↄ̃sↄ̃wa yↄↄ. Ɔ̃ zↄ̃lɛa gópi guu à yãdà bílaɛ.
Kɛ́ à yã'ò a làa, ↄ̃ a ò Simↄↄɛ: Gɛ́ ń góo ísia à táalu zu, á kpↄ kṹ.
Simↄↄ wèwà à mɛ̀: Mae, wa zĩkɛ̀ e gu gɛ̀ dↄ̀ò, wi pↄe kũo, ãma lá ń ò, má kpá.
Kɛ́ aa kɛ̀ màa, aa kpↄ nàaa gìligili e an táaluↄ ye kɛ̃́kɛ̃i.
Ɔ̃ aa ↄkɛ̀ ń zĩkɛndee pↄ́ kú gópi do guuↄnɛ aa mↄ dↄńlɛ. Kɛ́ aa mↄ̀, aa kpↄ kà gó mɛ̀n plapiↄ pai e aa ye kpálɛi.
Kɛ́ Simↄↄ Piɛɛ è màa, à kùlɛ Yesu gbázĩ à mɛ̀: Go ma saɛ Dii, asa duunkɛnan ma ũ.
Bíli Simↄↄ kũ̀ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa sãnuↄ píi kpↄ̀ gìligili pↄ́ aa kũ̀pi yã́i.
Màa Zaaki ń Zãao, Zebedee nɛ́ pↄ́ aa dɛ kↄ̃gbɛ̃ↄ ũ ń Simↄↄo bílikɛ̀ lↄ. Ɔ̃ Yesu ò Simↄↄɛ: Ńsu to vĩa n kũo. Za gbã gbɛ̃nazĩna ↄ̃ ńyↄ̃ↄ wɛɛlɛ.
Kɛ́ aa kà ń ń góo gↄ̃sↄ̃lɛ, ↄ̃ aa apii tò we, aa bↄ̀ tɛaàzi.
Zĩewa Yesu kú wɛ̃́lɛe guu ↄ̃ gↄ̃ɛ pↄ́ kusu lìaàla mↄ̀. Kɛ́ à Yesu è, à wùlɛ a gbɛɛu à wabikɛ̀wà à mɛ̀: Dii, tó n wei, ńyↄ̃ fↄ̃ gbãbↄmɛɛ.
Ɔ̃ Yesu ↄbↄ̀ nàwà à mɛ̀: Ma wei, gↄ̃ gbãlɛsai. Wegↄ̃ↄ aà kusu làa.
Ɔ̃ Yesu òɛ̀: Ńsu o gbɛ̃e mao. Gɛ ǹ ńzĩa ↄlↄ sa'onaɛ, ní sa pↄ́ Mↄizi dìlɛ o n gↄ̃a gbãlɛsai seela ũ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ.
Yesu bao lìgua dɛ yãala. Bíla ì kãaa, kɛ́ aa aà yãma mɛ́ kɛ́ aà ń gbã́gbã ń ń gyãↄ yã́i.
Ɔ̃ Yesu ì kɛ̃́má à gɛ wabikɛ gusaɛ.
Zĩewa Yesu lɛ́ yãdanɛ́. Falisieↄ ń Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdeeↄ zↄ̃lɛa we. Aa bↄ̀ Galile ń Yude wɛ̃́lɛↄ guu píiɛ ń Yelusalɛũo. Lua gbãa kuaànↄ, ↄ̃ àlɛ gyãeↄ gbãgbã.
Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃eↄ mↄ̀, aa gbɛ̃kaaũa sɛa ń mákɛlɛo, aalɛ zɛwɛɛlɛ wà gɛ̃aànↄ aa aà dilɛ Yesu aɛ.
Lá aai gɛ̃kĩi eo dasi yã́i, ↄ̃ aa dɛ̀dɛaànↄ kpɛ́ musu. Aa kpɛ́pi fↄ̃̀, ↄ̃ aa aà pìla ń a mákɛlɛo zã guu Yesu aɛ.
Kɛ́ Yesu è aalɛ a náaikɛ, à mɛ̀: Ma gbɛ̃́, n duuna kɛ̃̀ma.
Yãdanɛdepiↄ ń Falisipiↄ an làasoo guu aa mɛ̀: Dén gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ dↄ́ɛ ń Luao bee ũi? Démɛ a fↄ̃ duunakɛ̃mái, Lua ado bàasioi?
Yesu ń làasoo dↄ̃̀, ↄ̃ à ń lá à mɛ̀: Bↄ́yãi álɛ làasoo bee taa kɛ á sↄ̃ guui?
Tó má ò aà duuna kɛ̃̀wà, ge tó má ò aà fɛlɛ táa'o, a kpele mɛ́ àai?
Má ò màa kɛ́ àↄ dↄ̃ Gbɛ̃nazĩn Nɛ́ duunakɛ̃ama iko vĩ dṹniau la. Ɔ̃ a ò gbɛ̃kaaũapiɛ: Má ònɛ, fɛlɛ ǹ ń mákɛlɛ sɛ́ tá n bɛ.
Wegↄ̃ↄ à fɛ̀lɛ zɛ̀ ń wáa, à a wúlɛbↄpi sɛ̀ à tà a bɛ, àlɛ Lua sáaukpa.
Baade píi lɛ́ gↄ̃̀ ɛlɛa, ↄ̃ aa Lua sáaukpà. Vĩa guu aa mɛ̀: Wa dabu è gbã.
Bee gbɛa Yesu bↄ̀, ↄ̃ à ↄsina pↄ́ wì mɛ Levii è zↄ̃lɛa ↄsikpɛu. Yesu òɛ̀: Mↄ tɛmazi.
Ɔ̃ à fɛ̀lɛ à pↄ́pii tò we à tɛ̀aàzi.
Ɔ̃ à pↄnablɛ zↄ̃ↄ kɛ̀ a bɛ, à Yesu sìsiwà ń ↄsinaↄ ń gbɛ̃pãleↄ dasi, aalɛ pↄble.
Ɔ̃ Falisiↄ ń ń Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdeↄ yã́kũtɛ̃kà aà ìwaↄzi aa mɛ̀: Bↄ́yãi álɛ pↄble álɛ imi ń ↄsinaↄ ń luayãdansaiↄi?
Ɔ̃ Yesu a zãsìmá à mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃́ gbãa bàa kú ń lòotoooo, sema gyãe.
Mi mↄ gbɛ̃maaↄ sísii aa nↄ̀sɛlilɛo, sema duunkɛnaↄ.
Ɔ̃ wa òɛ̀: Zãa ìwaↄ ìↄ lɛye, aaↄ wabikɛ kↄ̃sↄ̃kↄ̃sↄ̃. Màaɛ ń Falisiↄ ìwaↄ lↄ. Ãma n gbɛ̃́ↄ ìↄ pↄble aaↄ imiɛ.
Ɔ̃ Yesu wèmá à mɛ̀: Á we to nↄsɛna gbɛ̃́ↄ lɛye gↄↄ pↄ́ nↄsɛnapi kúńnↄe?
A gↄↄ a mↄ́ kɛ́ wa nↄsɛnapi bↄ ń guu. Gↄↄ bee ↄ̃ aa lɛye sa.
Yesu yãlɛ̀ɛũnɛ́ lↄ à mɛ̀: Wìli pↄkasa dafu lí wa dì a zi guuo. Tó wa kɛ̀ màa lé, pↄkasa dafu a yaaɛ, mɛ́ a zi a kↄ̃sɛ ń a dafu pↄ́ wa dìupioo.
Wìli vɛ̃ɛ dafu ká báa tùu zi guuo. Tó wa kɛ̀ màa, vɛ̃ɛ dafu a tùu pũnaɛ, i kↄ́lɛ, tùu i ↄ̃̀ↄkpa.
Wì vɛ̃ɛ dafu ká báa tùu dafu guuɛ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dↄ́ɛkɛ̀ ń vɛ̃ɛ zio lí a dafu sáaukpao, ì mɛ a zi mɛ́ na.
Kã́mabogↄↄe zĩ́ Yesu lɛ́ pã blɛ bua, ↄ̃ aà ìwaↄ pↄ́wɛna wòlo aa a suumpà ń ↄu, aalɛ só.
Ɔ̃ Falisieↄ ònɛ́: Bↄ́yãi álɛ yã́ pↄ́ dɛ wà kɛ kã́mabogↄↄzĩo kɛi?
Yesu wèmá à mɛ̀: Lá Davidi ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ kɛ̀ gↄↄ pↄ́ nↄana lɛ́ ń dɛ, i a kyokɛo lé?
À gɛ̃̀ Lua ua, à pɛ̃ɛ pↄ́ wa kàlɛ Luaɛ sɛ sò, a kpà a gbɛ̃́ↄwa, pɛ̃ɛ pↄ́ gbɛ̃e lí sóo, sema sa'onaↄ bàasio.
Ɔ̃ Yesu ònɛ́: Gbɛ̃nazĩn Nɛ́ mɛ́ iko vĩ kã́mabogↄↄwa.
Kã́mabogↄↄ pãle zĩ́ lↄ Yesu gɛ̃̀ lousisikpɛu, àlɛ yãdanɛ́. Gↄ̃ɛe ku we, aà ↄplaa imia.
Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdeↄ ń Falisiↄ lɛ́ Yesu kpakpa, tó a gbɛ̃́pi gbã́gbã kã́mabogↄↄzĩ, wi e yãdaaàla.
À ń làasoo dↄ̃̀, ↄ̃ a ò gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a ↄ imiapiɛ: Fɛlɛ zɛ zã guu. Kɛ́ à fɛ̀lɛ zɛ̀ we,
ↄ̃ Yesu ònɛ́: Málɛ á láɛ. A zɛvĩ wà yãmaakɛ kã́mabogↄↄzĩ yã̀, ge yãvãiɛ? Wà gbɛ̃́ misi yã̀, ge wà aà dɛɛ?
Yesu wɛpã̀ńla ḿpii, ↄ̃ a ò gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a ↄ imiapiɛ: Ǹ n ↄpi poo. Kɛ́ a pòo, ↄ̃ aà ↄ sù a gbɛu.
Falisiↄ pↄ fɛ̃̀ maamaa, ↄ̃ aa lɛkpàaĩ Yesuzi lá aa kɛɛ̀ yã́ musu.
Gↄↄ bee Yesu bↄ̀ gɛ̀ wabikɛi sĩ̀sĩ musu, ↄ̃ a kú ń wabikɛa Luawao e gu gɛ̀ dↄ̀ò.
Kɛ́ gu dↄ̀, ↄ̃ à a ìwaↄ kã̀aa, à gbɛ̃ↄn kuɛplaↄ sɛ̀ ń guu à ń dílɛ zĩnaↄ ũ.
Gbɛ̃́piↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Simↄↄ pↄ́ à tↄkpàɛ̀ Piɛɛ, aà dãuna Ãndelee, Zaaki, Zãa, Filipi, Batelemii,
Matiee, Tomaa, Alafe nɛ́ Zaaki, Simↄↄ pↄ́ wì oɛ̀ Gínzĩao,
Zaaki nɛ́ Yudasi ń Yudasi Isaliↄti pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ Yesu bↄnkpɛde ũo.
Yesu pìlańnↄ à zɛ̀ gusalalaa, gu pↄ́ aà ìwa kĩniↄ ń bílao kuu. Aa bↄ̀ Yelusalɛũɛ ń Yude bùsuo píi ń ísialɛ wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ kú Tii ń Sidↄ̃o saɛↄ.
Aa mↄ̀ aà yãmai, mɛ́ kɛ́ aà ń gbã́gbã ń ń gyãↄ yã́i. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ tã́a lɛ́ ĩadamáↄ gbã̀gbã lↄ.
Gbɛ̃́pii lɛ́ wɛɛlɛ ↄkãwà, asa gbãa lɛ́ bↄ aà guu, àlɛ gbɛ̃́pii gbãgbãɛ.
Ɔ̃ à wɛsɛ̀ a ìwaↄ gwà à mɛ̀: Báaadeↄn á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ álɛ taasikɛↄ ũ, asa kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i dɛ á pↄ́ ũɛ.
Báaadeↄn á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ nↄana lɛ́ á dɛ gbãↄ ũ, asa á kã́. Báaadeↄn á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ álɛ ↄ́ↄlↄ gbãↄ ũ, asa á yáalↄ.
Báaadeↄn á ũ, tó wà zàágu mɛ́ wà gìázi, mɛ́ wà á sↄ̃sↄ̃ mɛ́ wà á tↄbɛ̃ɛsì Gbɛ̃nazĩn Nɛ́ yã́i.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ yã́ beeↄ á lé, àↄ vĩvĩ ń pↄnao, asa á asea zↄ̃ↄ luabɛ. Beewa an deziↄ kɛ̀ ãnabiↄnɛ.
Waiyoo á ↄdeↄ, a mɛ nama è kↄ̀.
Waiyoo á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ á kãa gbãↄ, nↄana a á dɛ. Waiyoo á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ álɛ yáalↄ gbãↄ, á wɛ̃nakɛ, á ↄ́ↄlↄ.
Waiyoo ápiↄ, tó gbɛ̃́pii lɛ́ á tↄnasi, asa beewa an deziↄ kɛ̀ ãnabi ɛgɛnaↄnɛ.
Málɛ o á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ álɛ ma yãmaↄnɛɛ, àↄ ye á ibɛɛↄzi, à maakɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ zaáguↄnɛ.
À samaa'o gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaì savãi'oɛ́ↄnɛ. À wabikɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaì ĩadawáↄnɛ.
Tó gbɛ̃́ n sãnkɛ n gɛɛ dowa, ǹ ado dↄɛ̀ lↄ. Tó gbɛ̃́ n ulada sìma, ńsu giɛ̀ ń n danziioo.
Pↄ́ pↄ́ gbɛ̃́ gbɛ̀ama píi kpawà. Tó gbɛ̃́ n pↄ́ sìma, ńsu gbɛawào.
Lá á ye wà kɛɛ́, à kɛnɛ́ màa sↄ̃.
Tó gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa yeáziↄ ↄ̃ áliↄ yeńzi, bↄ́ sáau bee vĩi? Baa luayãdansaiↄ ìↄ ye gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ yeńziↄziɛ.
Tó gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaì maakɛɛ́ↄ ↄ̃ áli maakɛnɛ́, bↄ́ sáau bee vĩi? Baa luayãdansaiↄ ì kɛ màaɛ.
Tó gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ á wɛ́ dↄi à pↄ́ emáↄ ↄ̃ áli pↄ́ sɛ̃anɛ́, bↄ́ sáau bee vĩi? Asa luayãdansaiↄ ì pↄ́ sɛ̃akↄ̃ɛ a ea a lɛ́ gbɛu yã́iɛ.
Àↄ ye á ibɛɛↄzi à maakɛnɛ́, à pↄ́ sɛ̃anɛ́ wɛdↄisai, í asea zↄ̃ↄ e, íↄ dɛ Musude nɛ́ↄ ũ, asa ì maakɛ guluↄnɛ ń gbɛ̃vãiↄɛ.
Àↄ sósobi vĩ lá á Mae sósobi vĩwa.
Ásuli gbɛ̃́ tàae eo, Lua a á tàae e sↄ̃o. Ásuli yãda gbɛ̃́ao, Lua a yãdaálao. À sùuukɛ ń gbɛ̃́ↄ, Lua i sùuukɛánↄ.
À gbɛ̃́ gba pↄ́, Lua i á gba. A zaa maa pↄ́ á gbɛ̃̀gbɛ̃ à wɛ̃̀ à pà yɛlɛlɛ káɛ́ á ula lɛ́u. Asa zaa pↄ́ ń yↄ̃̀u gbɛ̃́ɛ ↄ̃ Lua a yↄ̃unɛ sↄ̃.
Ɔ̃ à yãtaa ònɛ́ à mɛ̀: Vĩ̀a a fↄ̃ dↄaa vĩ̀aɛe? An pla ḿpii aa zu ɛuo lé?
Ìwa líↄ dɛ a diilao. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ yãdàda a làa dɛ lá a diiwaɛ.
Bↄ́yãi ńlɛ sɛ̃̀kↄna pↄ́ da n gbɛ̃́dee wɛ́u e, mɛ́ ńlɛ lí miↄna pↄ́ da n wɛ́u yãdao ni?
N gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ńlɛ lí miↄna pↄ́ da n wɛ́u eo, kpelewa ńyↄ̃ e o n gbɛ̃́deeɛ aà to ǹ sɛ̃̀kↄna pↄ́ da aà wɛ́u bↄɛ̀i? Mↄafilide! Limiↄna pↄ́ da n wɛ́u bↄ gĩa, ní gu'e wásawasa kɛ́ ǹ sɛ̃̀kↄna pↄ́ kú n gbɛ̃́dee wɛ́u bↄɛ̀.
Lí maa lí nɛ́ vãi io, lí vãi lí nɛ́ maa io.
Wì lí píi dↄ̃ a bɛwaɛ. Wìli kpa bo lɛ̀ líwao, wìli kukɛ kàelɛwao.
Gbɛ̃maa ì maa bↄ a sↄ̃̀ làasoo maaↄ guuɛ. Gbɛ̃vãi sↄ̃ ì vãi bↄ a sↄ̃̀ làasoo vãiↄ guuɛ. Asa yã́ pↄ́ kↄ̃̀ sↄ̃ guu ↄ̃ lɛ́ ì o.
Bↄ́yãi iↄ ma sisi Dii, Dii, mɛ́ ili yã́ pↄ́ má ò kɛo ni?
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ mↄ̀ ma kĩ́i à ma yãmà mɛ́ a kɛ̀, má ↄlↄɛ́ lá ade dɛ.
A dɛ lán ɛ̃bona pↄ́ ɛyↄ̃̀ zã̀zã à kpɛ́ kpàlɛ gbɛwawaɛ. Kɛ́ swa pà, í dàgua à kà kpɛ́pizi, i deeo, kɛ́ wa bò maa yã́i.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ ma yãma mɛ́ àlɛ kɛo dɛ lán ɛ̃bona pↄ́ kpɛ́ kpàlɛ tↄↄlɛa pã ɛ̃yↄ̃saiwaɛ. Kɛ́ swa'i kài, ↄ̃ à kwɛ̀ gↄ̃̀ↄ. Kpɛ́pi ↄ̃̀ↄkpaa kɛ̀ zↄ̃ↄ.
Kɛ́ Yesu yã́ beeↄ ò gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ píi a làa, ↄ̃ à gɛ̀ Kapɛnaũ.
Sosaↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄe ku we, a zĩkɛna vĩ, a yeaàziɛ maamaa, ↄ̃ àlɛ gyãkɛ à kà gaa.
Kɛ́ aà diipi Yesu bao mà, à Yuda gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ zĩ̀ wabikɛiwà aà mↄ a zĩkɛnapi misiɛ.
Kɛ́ aa kà Yesu kĩ́i, aa wabikɛ̀wà kↄ̃sↄ̃kↄ̃sↄ̃ aa mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃́pi kà ǹ dↄaàlɛ.
A ye wá buizi, ↄ̃mɛ lousisikpɛ dↄ̀wɛ̃ɛ.
Ɔ̃ Yesu gɛ̀ńnↄ. Kɛ́ à kà kãi ń aà bɛo, ↄ̃ sosaↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi a gbɛ̃naↄ zĩ̀ a ònɛ́: À oɛ̀ asu ĩada azĩawao, mi ka kɛ́ aà gɛ̃ ma kpɛ́uo.
Ayãmɛto má dìlɛ mi ka mà mↄ aà kĩ́i mazĩao. À oɛ̀ aà yã'o, ma zĩkɛna i gbã́gbã.
Asa mapi sↄ̃, wa iko vĩaɛ, mɛ́ má iko vĩ sosaↄwa. Mi o an gbɛ̃doɛ aà gɛ́, ↄ̃ ì gɛ́. Mi o a pãleɛ aà mↄ́, ↄ̃ ì mↄ́. Mi o ma zĩkɛnaɛ aà kɛ́ bee kɛ, ↄ̃ ì kɛ.
Kɛ́ Yesu yã́pi mà, à bↄ̀ aà saɛ. Ɔ̃ à lìli a ò bíla pↄ́ tɛaziɛ: Málɛ oɛ́, mi e gbɛ̃e ma náaikɛ̀ kɛ́wao, baa Isailiↄ guu.
Kɛ́ zĩnapiↄ ɛ̀a sù, aa è zĩkɛnapi gbã̀gbã.
Bee gbɛa Yesu gɛ̀ wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ wì mɛ Naini. Aà ìwaↄ ń gbɛ̃pãleↄ gɛ̀aànↄ dasidasi.
Kɛ́ à kà kãi ń wɛ̃́lɛpi bĩ́ibↄlɛo, a è wa gɛ sɛa wà bↄ̀ò. Gyaa nɛ́ mɛ̀ndonaɛ. Wɛ̃́lɛpideↄ kú ń nↄɛpio dasi.
Kɛ́ Dii aà è, ↄ̃ à kɛ̀ɛ̀ wɛ̃naũ a òɛ̀: Ńsu ↄ́ↄlↄo.
Ɔ̃ à sↄ̃̀ gɛpizi à ↄkã̀ aà pɛwa. Kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ sɛaↄ zɛ̀, ↄ̃ à mɛ̀: Ɛ̀waaso, má ònɛ vu.
Ɔ̃ gɛpi fɛ̀lɛ zↄ̃̀lɛ à nà yã'oawa. Ɔ̃ Yesu aà kpà aà dawa.
Vĩa gbɛ̃́pii kũ̀, aa Lua sáaukpà aa mɛ̀: Wa ãnabi zↄ̃ↄ è wá guu. Aa mɛ̀ lↄ: Lua mↄ̀ a gbɛ̃́ↄ gwai.
Ɔ̃ Yesu bao lì Yude bùsua ń bùsu pↄ́ liaaiↄ píi.
Zãa ìwaↄ yã́ bee dàu aa sìuɛ̀ píi. Ɔ̃ Zãa ń gbɛ̃ↄn plaↄ sìsi,
à ń zĩ́ Diiwa aa aà la, aàpi mɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a mↄ ũa, ge wàↄ wɛdↄ gbɛ̃pãleziɛ?
Kɛ́ gbɛ̃́piↄ kà Yesu kĩ́i, aa òɛ̀: Zãa Da'ilɛna mɛ́ wá zĩ́ wà n la, ḿmɛ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a mↄ ũa, ge wàↄ wɛdↄ gbɛ̃pãleziɛ?
Wegↄ̃ↄ Yesu gbɛ̃́ↄ gbã̀gbã dasi ń ń gyãↄ ń ń wãwãↄ ń ń tã́aↄ. A tò vĩ̀aↄ gu'è dasi lↄ.
Ɔ̃ a ò Zãa zĩnaↄnɛ: À gɛ yã́ pↄ́ á è mɛ́ á màↄ dau siuɛ̀. À oɛ̀ vĩ̀aↄ lɛ́ gu'e, ɛɛↄ lɛ́ táa'o, málɛ gbãbↄ kusudeↄnɛ, swãdoↄ lɛ́ yãma, gɛↄ lɛ́ vu, taasideↄ lɛ́ baona waaso ma.
Báaaden gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lí fuao ũ.
Kɛ́ Zãa zĩnaↄ tà, Yesu nà aà yã'oa bílaɛwa à mɛ̀: Bↄ́ a gɛ gwai gbáaui? Fee pↄ́ ĩ́ana lɛ́ deedee yã̀?
Bↄ́ a gɛ gwai wei? Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ pↄkasa zãɛ naaàzi yã̀? Namablena pↄ́ aaì pↄkasa maa daↄ ìↄ ku kibɛɛ.
Bↄ́ a gɛ gwai wei? Ãnabi yã̀? Ao! Málɛ oɛ́ a dɛ ãnabia se.
Asa Zãapi wà aà yã́ kɛ̃̀ láu wà mɛ̀: Má a zĩna gbaɛ aà dↄaa zɛkɛkɛnɛ.
Málɛ oɛ́, nↄɛ nɛ'ia guu wi nɛ́e i à kà Zãawao. Ń beeo gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛ gbɛ̃́ kpɛɛ ũ kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i guu dɛaàla.
Kɛ́ gbɛ̃́pii aà yãmà, baa ↄsinaↄ, ↄ̃ aa yãnakpà Luawa, ↄ̃ Zãa ń da'ilɛkɛ̀.
Falisiↄ ń Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdeↄ sↄ̃ aa gì yã́ pↄ́ Lua dìlɛ à kɛnɛ́i, ↄ̃ aai wei Zãa ń da'ilɛkɛ̀o.
Bↄ́ má gbãgbɛ̃ↄ lɛɛũòi? Bↄ́ aa bↄ̀wài?
Aa bↄ̀ nɛ́ pↄ́ kú gãaɛ aalɛ lɛzukↄ̃iↄwaɛ aalɛ mɛ: Wa kulɛ pɛ̀ɛ́, i ↄ̃wão. Wa wɛ̃nalɛ sìɛ́, i ↄ́ↄlↄo.
Asa Zãa Da'ilɛna mↄ̀, i pɛ̃ɛ soo, i vɛ̃ɛmio, ↄ̃ a mɛ̀ tã́adeɛ.
Gbɛ̃nazĩn Nɛ́ mↄ̀, ì pↄble, ì imi, ↄ̃ a mɛ̀ asiade wɛ̃minaɛ, ↄsinaↄ ń luayãdansaiↄ gbɛ̃naɛ.
Wì ↄ̃nↄ dↄ̃ ↄ̃nↄnaↄ yãkɛawaɛ.
Falisie Yesu gbɛ̀a aà mↄ pↄbleanↄ. Yesu gɛ̀ aà bɛ, ↄ̃ àlɛ pↄble gɛngɛsɛkɛa.
Nↄɛ dↄ́ɛ'ĩidee ku wɛ̃́lɛpi guu. Kɛ́ a mà Yesu lɛ́ pↄble Falisipi bɛ, ↄ̃ à gɛ̀ we tulale loona kũa.
À zɛ̀ aà kpɛ aà gbázĩ, àlɛ ↄ́ↄlↄ. Aà wɛ́'i lɛ́ ká aà gbakpɛaa, ↄ̃ a wàa ń a mikão, à lɛpɛ̀pɛ aà gbáwa, ↄ̃ à tulalepi kàwà.
Kɛ́ Falisi pↄ́ aà sìsipi è màa, ↄ̃ a ò a sↄ̃ guu: Tó gbɛ̃́piá ãnabiɛ, dↄ̃ à nↄɛ pↄ́ lɛ́ ↄkãwapi taa dↄ̃̀, kɛ́ dↄ́ɛ'ĩideɛ.
Ɔ̃ Yesu ò Falisipiɛ: Simↄↄ, má yãe vĩ mà onɛ. Simↄↄ mɛ̀: O, Mɛtulu.
Yesu mɛ̀: Dakɛnae mɛ́ kú, gbɛ̃ↄn plaↄ aà fĩa kũa, gbɛ̃do ã́nusu ↄwatɛ̃ ↄ̀aa pla ń basↄoo, gbɛ̃do sↄ̃ ã́nusu ↄwatɛ̃ blakwi.
Lá aa pↄe vĩ aa fĩaboòo, ↄ̃ à ń kɛ̃́ an pla ḿpii. An guu, démɛ aↄ yeaàzi dɛ a deelai?
Simↄↄ wèwà à mɛ̀: Málɛ e gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wà aà kɛ̃̀ ń ↄ zↄ̃ↄoɛ. Yesu òɛ̀: N wè maaɛ.
Ɔ̃ Yesu aɛdↄ̀ nↄɛpiwa, a ò Simↄↄɛ: N nↄɛpi èa? Kɛ́ ma gɛ̃ n bɛ, ni í kpaa n ma gbá pìpio, ↄ̃ nↄɛpi ma gbá pìpi ń a wɛ́'io, a wàa ń a mikão.
Ni lɛ́pɛao. Nↄɛpi sↄ̃, za gↄↄ pↄ́ ma gɛ̃ la, i kã́mabo ń lɛ́pɛa ma gbáwaoo.
Ni nísidↄↄ ma miwao. Nↄɛpi sↄ̃ à tulale kà ma gbáↄwa.
Ayãmɛto málɛ onɛ, a yemazi maamaa kɛ́ aà duun zↄ̃ↄ kɛ̃̀wà yã́iɛ. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wà aà kɛ̃̀ ń a yↄↄnao sↄ̃, aↄ ye adei yↄↄnnↄ sↄ̃ɛ.
Ɔ̃ a ò nↄɛpiɛ: N duuna kɛ̃̀ma.
Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ pↄble sãnuↄ òkↄ̃ɛ: Dén gbɛ̃́pi ũ kɛ́ àlɛ duunakɛ̃mái?
Ɔ̃ Yesu ò nↄɛpiɛ: Ma náai pↄ́ ńlɛ kɛ n suabà. Ta bɛ aafia.
Bee gbɛa Yesu bɛ̀bɛ wɛ̃́lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛo, mɛɛwiaↄ ń zↄ̃ɛwiaↄ píi, àlɛ waasokɛ, àlɛ kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i baokpanɛ́. Aà ìwa gbɛ̃ↄn kuɛplaↄ gɛ̀aànↄ
ń nↄɛ pↄ́ à tã́agònɛ́ à ń gbãgbã ń ń gyãↄↄ. Maliama pↄ́ wì mɛ lↄ Maliama Madelɛni, Yesu tã́a mɛ̀n soplaↄ gòɛ̀ kú ń guu
ń Elodi ziia Kuza na Yoanao ń Suzãnao ń nↄɛ pãleↄ dasi. Aaìↄ Yesu ń a ìwaↄ gwa ń pↄ́ pↄ́ aa vĩo.
Wà bↄ̀ wɛ̃́lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛo wà kã̀aa Yesuzi, ↄ̃ à yãlɛ̀ɛũnɛ́ à mɛ̀:
Zↄ̃ɛe mɛ́ bↄ̀ gɛ̀ pↄ́wɛnakɛɛlɛi. Kɛ́ àlɛ kɛɛlɛ, a keeↄ lɛ̀lɛ zɛ́ guu, wà táa'òwà, ↄ̃ bãↄ mↄ blè.
A keeↄ lɛ̀lɛ gbɛsɛɛna musu. Kɛ́ aa bↄ̀lɛ, ↄ̃ aa giigàga, kɛ́ aai mↄ̀sɛ eo yã́i.
A keeↄ lɛ̀lɛ lɛↄ guu, ↄ̃ lɛpiↄ fɛ̀lɛńnↄ sãnu, aa kũ̀aamá.
A keeↄ lɛ̀lɛ tↄↄlɛ maawa, ↄ̃ aa bↄ̀lɛ aa nɛ'ì lɛɛ basↄo. Kɛ́ a ò màa, à pũ̀na à mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ nↄ̀sɛ vĩ aà yã́pi ma.
Aà ìwaↄ aà là yã́pi bↄↄlɛi.
Ɔ̃ à mɛ̀: Lua á gbá zɛ́ à kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ a kĩ́i asiiↄ dↄ̃, ãma mi o gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄnɛ ń yãlɛɛũanɛoɛ, kɛ́ aa gugwa pↄe'esai, aa yãma dↄ̃sai.
Yã́pi bↄↄlɛn kɛ: Pↄ́wɛnapiá Lua yã́ɛ.
Zɛ́ guu pↄ́ↄ dɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa Lua yãmàↄ ũ, ↄ̃ Ibiisi mↄ̀ yã́pi bↄ̀ ń sↄ̃ guu, kɛ́ aasu Lua náaikɛ, i ń suabao yã́i.
Gbɛsɛɛna pↄ́ↄ dɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa Lua yãmà aa sì ń pↄnaoↄ ũ, ãma yã́pi líↄ zĩ́na vĩ ń guuo. Aaì Lua náaikɛ gĩa, ãma tó wà ń yↄ̃́, aaì pↄ̀ↄbↄzãkɛɛ.
Lɛ guu pↄ́ↄ dɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa Lua yãmàↄ ũ, ↄ̃ yãkãakɛa ń àizɛɛ yã́o ń dṹnia pↄnakɛao ì kũaamá, aali fↄ̃ nɛ'ì à mào.
Tↄↄlɛ maa pↄ́ↄ dɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa Lua yãmà ń nↄ̀sɛpuao ↄ̃ aa kũa ń nↄ̀sɛmaaoↄ ũ. Aaì mɛnafↄ̃ e aa gɛ kã́fĩakɛò.
Wìli filia na wà ta kúlɛwào ge wà dilɛ lii zíɛo. Wì di bábanawaɛ, kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ gɛ̃ↄ gupua e yã́i.
Pↄe ku ulɛa kɛ́ à gí bↄi gupuauo. Asiiyãe ku kɛ́ wà gí mai wà o balu guuo.
Bee yã́i à yãma ń laaio. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ pↄ́ vĩ ↄ̃ Lua a kã́fĩɛ̀. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ pↄe vĩ sↄ̃o, pↄ́ pↄ́ àlɛ e á vĩ Lua a siwàɛ.
Yesu da ń aà dãunaↄ mↄ̀ aà kĩ́i, ↄ̃ aai e sↄ̃̀aàzio dasi yã́i.
Ɔ̃ wa ò Yesuɛ: N da ń n dãunaↄ ku bàasi, aa ye n kↄ̃'eai.
Ɔ̃ a ònɛ́: Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaì Lua yãma aa zĩkɛwàↄ mɛ́ ma da ń ma dãunaↄ ũ.
Zĩewa Yesu gɛ̃̀ gó'ilɛna guu ń a ìwaↄ, ↄ̃ a ònɛ́: Wà bua ísida baale. Ɔ̃ aa dàzɛu.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ aalɛ gɛ́, Yesu gɛ̃̀ ń io. Ɔ̃ zàa'ĩana fɛ̀lɛ ísidaa, í lɛ́ ká gó guu, aa ku kai guu.
Ɔ̃ aa sↄ̃̀aàzi aa aà vù aa mɛ̀: Mae! Mae! Wálɛ kaalɛ! Ɔ̃ à fɛ̀lɛ gì ĩ́anaɛ ń í pↄ́ lɛ́ ń gó zãampapao, ↄ̃ à zɛ̀, gu kɛ̀ kílikili.
Ɔ̃ a ònɛ́: Á ma náai vĩoa? Ɔ̃ yã́pi dìmá, vĩa ń kṹ, ↄ̃ aa òkↄ̃ɛ: Dén gbɛ̃́pi ũi mↄ́ↄ? Baa ĩ́ana ń ío, ì yãdilɛnɛ́, aaì aà yãmaɛ.
Ɔ̃ aa kà Gadala bùsuu ísida baale, Galile bùsu gukpɛ oi.
Kɛ́ Yesu bùa sĩ̀sĩa, à kpàaũ ń wɛ̃́lɛpi gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ tã́aↄ vĩo. À gↄↄplakɛ̀ ń pↄnaaazio, mɛ́ ìliↄ ku bɛo, sema miagbɛ'ɛↄ guu.
Wì aà yeye ń mↄdaonaↄ, wì aà daliu aà zùukɛa yã́i, kási ì mↄdaonapiↄ kɛ̃́kɛ̃ɛ, tã́api i aà zu sɛ̃u. Kɛ́ à Yesu è, ↄ̃ à wiilɛ̀ à kùlɛ aà aɛ, ↄ̃ à pũ̀na à mɛ̀: Lua Musude Nɛ́ Yesu, bↄ́mɛ wá daaai? N yã́ na! Ńsu ĩadaao. À bee ò kɛ́ Yesu lɛ́ o tã́api gowà yã́iɛ.

Ɔ̃ Yesu aà là à mɛ̀: N tↄ́n kpelewai? Ɔ̃ à mɛ̀: Ma tↄ́n Dasi. Asa tã́aↄ kuwà dasiɛ.
Ɔ̃ tã́apiↄ wabikɛ̀ Yesuwa asu onɛ́ wà si gbã́o guuo.
Sàwakusan waiↄ ku we, aa kpɛ̀ɛsɛ, aalɛ pↄble sĩ̀sĩpↄlɛu. Ɔ̃ tã́apiↄ wabikɛ̀ Yesuwa aà ń gba zɛ́ wà dinɛ́. Ɔ̃ Yesu ń gbá zɛ́.
Ɔ̃ tã́aↄ gò gbɛ̃́piwa aa dì sàwaↄnɛ. Ɔ̃ sàwapiↄ wì ń bao aa sì sòonau, aa kà ísiu aa kpàlɛ.
Kɛ́ an dãnaↄ è màa, aa bàalɛ̀ gɛ̀ yã́pi oinɛ́ wɛ̃́lɛ guu ń bualoũↄ.
Ɔ̃ wà bↄ̀lɛ yã́ pↄ́ kɛ̀pi gwai. Kɛ́ aa kà Yesu kĩ́i, aa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ tã́aↄ gòwàpi è zↄ̃lɛa Yesu gbázĩ. A pↄkasa naaazi, à gↄ̃̀ a laaiwa. Ɔ̃ vĩa ń kṹ.
Kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ yã́pi kɛ̀ ń wáaↄ ònɛ́ lá wà tã́adepi gbã̀gbã,
ↄ̃ Gadala bùsu gbɛ̃́pii awakpà Yesuɛ aà gońla, asa vĩa ń kṹ maamaaɛ. Ɔ̃ à gɛ̃̀ gó guu, a ye tá.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ à tã́aↄ gòɛ̀ awakpàɛ̀ à e àↄ kuaànↄ. Yesu gìɛ̀ à mɛ̀:
Ɛa ta n bɛ, ní yã́ pↄ́ Lua kɛ̀nɛ dau ǹ siunɛ́ píi. Ɔ̃ à tà à yã́ pↄ́ Yesu kɛ̀ɛ kpàwakɛ̀ wɛ̃́lɛpi guu píi.
Kɛ́ Yesu ɛ̀a sù, ↄ̃ bíla gbãakpàaàzi, asa gbɛ̃́pii lɛ́ aà dãɛ.
