Ɔ̃ Lua bↄ̀ ń kpɛ a tò aa kùlɛ luabɛ pↄ́ↄnɛ lá a ku ãnabiↄ lá guuwa à mɛ̀: Isailiↄ, i kɛ mámɛ a sa'òa guwaiwaiu wɛ̃̀ blao.
Tã́a Mↄlↄku zwã̀akpɛ ↄ̃ á sɛa ń saana Lamfã pↄ́ a zɛò taao. Dii pↄ́ á pì a kúlɛnɛ́ↄ yã́i ↄ̃ má tò wà tàánↄ Babiloni kpɛle.
Wá deziↄ zwã̀akpɛ vĩ guwaiwaiu. Lua a taa ↄ̀lↄ Mↄiziɛ, ↄ̃ wa kɛ̀ lá Lua òɛ̀wa.
Kpɛ́pi gↄ̃̀ Yozueeɛ ń wá deziↄ, ↄ̃ aa mↄ̀ buipãle pↄ́ Lua ń yánɛ́ↄ bùsu sìomá. Kpɛ́pi ku we e Davidi gↄↄ.
Davidipi na ń Luao, ↄ̃ à wabikɛ̀wà à e aà kpɛ́ dↄ Isailiↄnɛ.
Salomↄↄ mɛ́ kpɛ́pi dↄ̀ɛ̀.
Ãma Musude líↄ ku kpɛ́ pↄ́ gbɛ̃nazĩnaↄ dↄ̀ guuo, lá ãnabi òwà:
Dii mɛ̀: Musuá ma kpalabaaɛ, tↄↄlɛá ma gbadibↄɛ. Kpɛ́ kpeletaa á dↄmɛɛi? Gu kpele má e pilaui?
Mámɛ mi pↄ́pii kɛo lé?
Luayãdansaiↄn á ũ! Á nↄ̀sɛ paaao! Á swã́ gbãaɛ! Iↄ gi Lua Nisĩnai, iↄ kɛ lá á deziↄwa.
Ãnabi kpele á deziↄ i aà wɛtão ni? Aa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dↄ̀aa Gbɛ̃ Maa mↄa yã'òↄ dɛ̀dɛ. Aàpi ↄ̃ a bↄ aà kpɛ a aà dɛ̀ sa.
A Lua ikoyã pↄ́ malaikaↄ ònɛ́ mà, ãma á kũao.
Kɛ́ aa yã́pi mà, an pↄ fɛ̃̀aàzi, aa lɛ́sakã̀aàzi.
Ɔ̃ Lua Nisĩna dɛdɛa Ɛtiɛ̃ɛwa guu à wɛpɛ̀ luabɛwa, ↄ̃ à Lua gawi è ń Yesuo zɛa aà ↄplaai.
Ɔ̃ à mɛ̀: À ma! Ma luabɛ è wɛ̃a, Gbɛ̃nazĩn Nɛ́ zɛa Lua ↄplaai.
Ɔ̃ aa ↄtà ń swã́lɛ aa wii gbãa lɛ̀, ↄ̃ aa kùsiwà sãnusãnu.
Aa aà gàlɛ bↄ̀ò wɛ̃́nkpɛ, ↄ̃ aalɛ aà papa ń gbɛo wà aà dɛ. Aa ń uladaↄ bↄ kàlɛ ń ɛ̀waaso pↄ́ wì mɛ Sↄluo.
Kɛ́ aalɛ Ɛtiɛ̃ɛ papa ń gbɛo, à wabikɛ̀ à mɛ̀: Dii Yesu, ma nisĩna sí.
Ɔ̃ à kùlɛ à wii gbãa lɛ̀ à mɛ̀: Dii, ńsu ǹ ń duunaɛ bee dao. Yã́ bee oa gbɛa ↄ̃ à gà.
Sↄlupi ku gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa Ɛtiɛ̃ɛ dɛ̀ↄ kpɛɛ. Zĩbeezĩ wà nà wɛ́tɛ̃a zↄ̃ↄ mↄa Yelusalɛũ Yesudeↄnɛwa. Mɛ́ i kɛ zĩnaↄ bàasio, gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ fã̀aa píiɛ Yude ń Samali bùsuↄ guu.
Luayãmanaeↄ Ɛtiɛ̃ɛ vĩ̀, aa aà gaa ↄ́ↄlↄ̀ ń wii gbãao.
Ɔ̃ Sↄlupi ãiakɛ̀ ń Yesudeↄ kaalɛao. Ìↄ gɛ̃ ua ń uao àↄ gↄ̃ɛↄ ń nↄɛↄ kũkũ, iↄ ń gálɛ gɛ ń ká kpɛ́u.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ fã̀aaↄ gɛ̀ Yesu baokpà gupiiu.
Filipi gɛ̀ Samali bùsu wɛ̃́lɛeu, ↄ̃ à Mɛsii waasokɛ̀nɛ́.
Kɛ́ bíla Filipi yãmà mɛ́ aa dabudabu pↄ́ a kɛ̀ↄ è, aa laaidↄ̀ yã́ pↄ́ àlɛ owa ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo.
Asa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ an tã́aↄ gòmá ń wii gbãaoↄ dasi, mɛ́ gbɛ̃kaaũaↄ ń ɛɛↄ gbã̀gbã dasi.
Ɔ̃ wà pↄna zↄ̃ↄ kɛ̀ wɛ̃́lɛpiu.
Gↄ̃ɛe ku we za zi wì mɛ Simↄↄ, ìↄ dabudabuna kɛ ì bↄ Samaliↄ saɛ, ↄ̃ à azĩa dìlɛ gbɛ̃́ gbia ũ.
Nɛ́fɛ̃nɛn gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ píi wì laaidↄ aà yã́wa wì mɛ: Gbɛ̃́pi gbãaá Lua gbãa pↄ́ wì mɛ Gbãa Zↄ̃ↄɛ.
Dabudabuna pↄ́ ìↄ kɛ ń guu à gɛ̃̀gɛ̃ ń kṹ.
Ãma kɛ́ aa kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i bao pↄ́ Filipi kpànɛ́ ń Yesu Kilisi tↄ́o mà, aa sì, ↄ̃ aa da'ilɛkɛ̀ gↄ̃ɛↄ ń nↄɛↄ píi.
Baa Simↄↄpi yã́pi sì à da'ilɛkɛ̀, ↄ̃ à nà Filipiwa. Kɛ́ à dabudabu ń iko zↄ̃ↄ pↄ́ Filipi lɛ́ kɛↄ è, à bↄ̀ aà saɛ.
Kɛ́ zĩnaↄ mà za Yelusalɛũ Samaliↄ Lua yã́ sì, aa Piɛɛ ń Zãao zĩ̀má.
Kɛ́ aa kà we, aa wabikɛ̀nɛ́ kɛ́ aa Lua Nisĩna e yã́i.
Wà ń da'ilɛkɛ̀ ń Dii Yesu tↄ́o, ãma Lua Nisĩna i di an gbɛ̃eɛ yãao.
Kɛ́ aa ↄnàmá, ↄ̃ aa Lua Nisĩna è sa.
Kɛ́ Simↄↄ è wà Lua Nisĩna è ń zĩnaↄ ↄnaamáo, ↄ̃ à mↄ̀nɛ́ ń ↄ̃ao
à mɛ̀: À ma gba ikopi sↄ̃, kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ma ↄnàwà, ade lí Lua Nisĩna e.
Ɔ̃ Piɛɛ òɛ̀: N ↄ̃a a kaalɛnnↄ, asa ńlɛ e ńyↄ̃ Lua gba e ń ↄ̃aoɛ.
N ↄ ku zĩpi guuo, n bàa ku a guuo, asa n nↄ̀sɛ maa Luaɛo.
Kpɛ li n yãvãipiɛ, ní wabikɛ Diiwa. Wìliↄ dↄ̃o à gí sùuukɛinnↄ ń n làasoo bee taaoa?
Asa má è gↄ̃izĩna kú n guuɛ, duuna bakã̀nɛ.
Ɔ̃ Simↄↄ mɛ̀: À wabikɛmɛɛ Diiwa ázĩa, kɛ́ yã́ pↄ́ á ò su ma leo yã́i.
Kɛ́ Piɛɛ ń Zãao Dii seeladekɛ kɛ̀ aa aà yã́ dànɛ́, ↄ̃ aa ɛ̀a lɛ́ tá Yelusalɛũ, aalɛ baonakpa Samali wɛ̃́lɛↄ guu dasi.
Dii malaikae yã'ò Filipiɛ à mɛ̀: Fɛlɛ gɛ́ gɛↄmidↄkĩi oi. Zɛ́ pↄ́ bↄ̀ Yelusalɛũ à pã̀ gbáaa à gɛ̀ Gaza sɛ́.
Ɔ̃ à dàzɛu. Etiopi gbɛ̃e bɛ zɛ́piu. Etiopi bùsu nↄɛ kía pↄ́ wì mɛ Kandase ziiaɛ, mɛ́ aà àizɛɛ dↄ̃̀anaↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄɛ. À mↄ̀ lousìsi Yelusalɛũ,
ↄ̃ à ɛ̀a lɛ́ tá zↄ̃lɛa a sↄ̃́go guu, àlɛ ãnabi Isaia lá kyokɛ.
Ɔ̃ Lua Nisĩna ò Filipiɛ: Gɛ ǹ na sↄ̃́go keewa.
Ɔ̃ Filipi bàalɛ̀ gɛ̀. A mà àlɛ ãnabi Isaia lá kyokɛ, ↄ̃ à aà là à mɛ̀: Ń kyó pↄ́ ńlɛ kɛ bↄↄlɛ dↄ̃a?
A wèwà à mɛ̀: Tó gbɛ̃e i a zɛ́ ↄlↄmɛɛo, kpelewa má fↄ̃ mà dↄ̃i? Ɔ̃ à Filipi sìsi, à gɛ̃̀ zↄ̃̀lɛ aà saɛ.
Yã́ pↄ́ àlɛ a kyokɛpin kɛ: Lán sã pↄ́ wàlɛ gɛ́ a kòlokpaiwa, lán sã pↄ́ wàlɛ a kãkɛ̃ɛlɛwa, a nílɛ kpɛ̃́, i a lɛ́ wɛ̃aao.
Wà widàwà, wi yã́kpalɛkɛaànↄ a zɛ́wao. Démɛ a fↄ̃ aà gↄↄ gbɛ̃́ↄ yã'oi? Asa wà aà kua dṹnia guu mìdɛɛ.
Ɔ̃ gↄ̃ɛpi ò Filipiɛ: Omɛɛ, dé musu ãnabi bee òui? Aà zĩa yã̀ ge gbɛ̃pãleɛ?
Ɔ̃ sɛa Lua yã́piwa Filipi Yesu baokpàɛ̀.
Kɛ́ aalɛ gɛ́ aɛ, aa kà í kĩ́i, ↄ̃ gↄ̃ɛpi mɛ̀: Í gwa kɛ. Bↄ́mɛ a kpamɛɛ mà da'ilɛkɛi?
Ɔ̃ Filipi òɛ̀: Tó n yã́pi sì ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo, ńyↄ̃ fↄ̃́. A wèwà à mɛ̀: Má sì Yesu Kilisiá Lua Nɛ́ɛ.
Ɔ̃ à mɛ̀ wà gó zɛ. Ɔ̃ an pla ḿpii aa pìla aa gɛ̃̀ íu. Ɔ̃ à aà da'ilɛkɛ̀.
Kɛ́ aa bùa sĩ̀sĩa, ↄ̃ Dii Nisĩna Filipi kpàɛ̀ gui, gↄ̃ɛpi i aà e lↄo, ↄ̃ pↄna guu à gɛ̃̀zɛa.
Filipi su è á kú Azota, ↄ̃ à gɛ̀ Yesu baokpà wɛ̃́lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛo e à gɛ̀ kàò Sezale.
Gↄↄ bee sↄ̃ Sↄlu lɛ́ pↄbↄ a níu, àlɛ yãpãsĩ o Dii ìwaↄ dɛdɛa yã́ musu. À gɛ̀ sa'onkia kĩ́i,
a gbɛ̀awà aà lákɛ̃ Damasi lousisikpɛdeↄnɛ aà kpawa, kɛ́ tó a su zɛ́pideↄ è we, gↄ̃ɛↄ ń nↄɛↄ píi, a ń kṹkũ suńnↄ Yelusalɛũ.
Kɛ́ à dàzɛu, à kãikũ̀ ń Damasio, ↄ̃ kã́ndo gupua bↄ̀ luabɛ à kùlɛwà.
À bↄ̀lɛlɛ, ↄ̃ à lↄↄ mà, wàlɛ òɛ̀: Sↄlu, Sↄlu, bↄ́yãi ńlɛ ĩadaai?
Ɔ̃ à mɛ̀: Ḿmɛnn déi Dii? Ɔ̃ a wèwà à mɛ̀: Mámɛ má Yesu pↄ́ ńlɛ ĩadawà ũ.
Fɛlɛ gɛ̃ wɛ̃́lɛ guu, wi yã́ pↄ́ ńyↄ̃ kɛ onɛ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa bɛaànↄↄ gↄ̃̀ sã́ii. Aa lↄↄpi mà, ãma aai gbɛ̃e eo.
Kɛ́ Sↄlu fɛ̀lɛ, ↄ̃ à a wɛ́ wɛ̃̀, i gu'eo. Ɔ̃ wà aà kũ̀ a ↄwa, wà gɛ̀aànↄ Damasi.
À kɛ̀ gↄↄ àaↄ̃ gu'esai, i pↄbleo, i imio.
Yesudee ku Damasi wì mɛ Ãnania. Dii yã'òɛ̀ wɛ́pungu'ea guu à mɛ̀: Ãnania. Ɔ̃ a wèwà à mɛ̀: Má kɛ́ Dii.
Ɔ̃ Dii òɛ̀: Fɛlɛ gɛ́ zɛ́ pↄ́ wì mɛ Súsu guu e Yuda bɛ'ua, ní Taasu gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wì mɛ Sↄlu gbɛa. Àlɛ wabikɛa we.
Wɛ́pungu'ea guu a è n mↄ n ↄnàwa kɛ́ a wɛ́ gu'e.
Ɔ̃ Ãnania òɛ̀: Dii, má mà wà gbɛ̃́pi yã'ò dasi, lá à yãvãikɛ̀ n gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú Yelusalɛũↄnɛ.
Sa'onkia aà gbà zɛ́ aà gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ n sisi laↄ kṹkũ. A yã́i à mↄ̀i.
Ɔ̃ Dii òɛ̀: Gɛ́, asa ma gbɛ̃́pi sɛ̀ aà gɛ́ ma tↄbↄi buipãleↄnɛ ń ń kíaↄ ń Isailiↄɛ.
Lá a taasikɛ ma tↄbↄa yã́i, má ↄlↄɛ̀.
Ɔ̃ Ãnania bↄ̀ à gɛ̀ gɛ̃̀ uapiu, à ↄnà Sↄluwa à mɛ̀: Sↄlu ma gbɛ̃́, Dii Yesu pↄ́ bↄ̀ mↄ̀ma zɛ́u gↄↄ pↄ́ ńlɛ mↄ́ la mɛ́ ma zĩ, kɛ́ ǹ gu'e yã́i, Lua Nisĩna i dinɛ.
Wegↄ̃ↄ pↄ́ bↄ̀lɛ aà wɛ́u lán kpↄ̀tɛɛↄwa aa lɛ̀lɛ, ↄ̃ à gu'è. Ɔ̃ à fɛ̀lɛ da'ilɛkɛ̀.
Kɛ́ à pↄblè, à gbãa è, ↄ̃ à gↄↄplakɛ̀ ń Yesude pↄ́ kú Damasiↄ.
Ɔ̃ Sↄlu nà Yesu yã́ waasokpaawa gↄ̃̀ↄ Yudaↄ lousisikpɛↄ guu à mɛ̀, Yesu mɛ́ Lua Nɛ́ ũ.
Yã́pi bↄ̀ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ màↄ saɛ aa mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃́ bee mɛ́ i gbɛ̃́pi sìsinaↄ ásookɛ Yelusalɛũo lò? I mↄ la à ń kṹkũ à táńnↄ sa'onkiaↄ kĩ́io lò?
Sↄlu sↄ̃, aà gbãa ìↄ kã́fĩ, à Yesu Mɛsiikɛyã bìiwànɛ́, ↄ̃ aà yã́ Yuda pↄ́ kú Damasiↄ fù.
Gↄↄpla gbɛa Yudaↄ lɛkpàaĩaàzi kɛ́ aa e wà aà dɛ,
ↄ̃ à ń lɛkpaaĩapi mà. Aa wɛ̃́lɛ bĩ́ibↄlɛↄ dↄ̃̀a fãanɛ ń gwãasĩnao, kɛ́ aa e wà aà dɛ yã́i.
Gwãasĩna ↄ̃ Sↄlu gbɛ̃́ↄ aà dà gbíu, aa aà gbàɛ ń bao bàasi bĩ́i musu.
Kɛ́ à kà Yelusalɛũ, a wɛ̀ɛlɛ à na Yesudeↄwa, ↄ̃ aa vĩakɛ̀ɛ̀ ḿpii, aalɛ aà Yesudekɛ náaikɛo.
Ɔ̃ Baanaba aà sɛ̀ gɛ̀aànↄ zĩnaↄ kĩ́i, a dàu a sìunɛ́ lá Sↄlu Dii è zɛ́u ń yã́ pↄ́ Dii òɛ̀o ń lá à Yesu yã'ò gupuau Damasio.
Ɔ̃ Sↄlu gɛ̃̀ Yesudeↄ guu, à bɛ̀bɛńnↄ Yelusalɛũ, à yã'ò gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ gupuau ń Dii tↄ́o.
Kɛ́ à yã'ò Yuda Gɛlɛki yãmanaↄnɛ, à lɛkpaakɛ̀ńnↄ, ↄ̃ aalɛ aà wɛ.
Kɛ́ Yesudeↄ dↄ̃̀, aa gɛ̀ zɛ̀ɛ̀ Sezale, ↄ̃ à tà Taasu.
Bee gbɛa Yesudeↄ gↄ̃̀ dↄdↄa Yude ń Galileo ń Samali bùsuo píi, aalɛ zɛdↄ, aalɛ gɛ́ aɛ vĩakɛa Diiɛ guu, aalɛ kã́fĩ ń Lua Nisĩna dↄnlɛo.
Piɛɛ ì bɛbɛ wɛ̃́lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛo píi, ↄ̃ à gɛ̀ Lua gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú Lidaↄ gwai.
À gↄ̃ɛ pↄ́ wì mɛ Enɛɛ è we, à kàaũ kálɛa wɛ̃̀ swaaↄ̃.
Ɔ̃ Piɛɛ òɛ̀: Enɛɛ, Yesu Kilisi lɛ́ n gbãgbã. Fɛlɛ ǹ n pɛ koo. Ɔ̃ à fɛ̀lɛ gↄ̃̀ↄ.
Lidadeↄ ń Salↄnadeↄ aà è, ↄ̃ aa zɛ̀ ń Diio.
Nↄɛ Yesudee ku Zope, aà tↄ́n Tabita. Ń Gɛlɛki yã́o sↄ̃ Dↄↄkasi. Bee mɛ̀ tue. Yãmaakɛa pɛ̀ɛwà mɛ́ ì wɛ̃nadↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ.
Gↄↄ bee ↄ̃ à gyãkɛ̀ à gà. Kɛ́ wà aà bↄ̀ í pãsĩu, wà aà sɛ wùlɛ kpɛdiakↄ̃au musu.
Zope sↄ̃ a zã̀ ń Lidaoo. Kɛ́ Yesudeↄ mà Piɛɛ ku we, aa ń gbɛ̃ↄn plaↄ zĩ̀wà aa wabikɛ̀wà aa mɛ̀: Mↄ wá bɛ kpakpa.
Ɔ̃ Piɛɛ fɛ̀lɛ gɛ̀ńnↄ. Kɛ́ à kà, wà dɛ̀dɛaànↄ kpɛ́pi musu. Ɔ̃ gyaaↄ sↄ̃̀aàzi ḿpii ń ↄↄlↄo, aa ula ń pↄkasa pↄ́ Tabita kɛ̀ gↄↄ pↄ́ a kúńnↄↄ ↄ̀lↄɛ̀.
Piɛɛ ń yá ń bↄ́lɛ bàasi. À kùlɛ à wabikɛ̀, ↄ̃ à aɛdↄ̀ gɛpiwa à mɛ̀: Tabita fɛlɛ! À wɛ́ wɛ̃̀ à Piɛɛ è, ↄ̃ à fɛ̀lɛ zↄ̃̀lɛ.
Piɛɛ aà kũ̀ a ↄwa à aà fɛ̀lɛ zɛ̀. Ɔ̃ à Lua gbɛ̃́piↄ sìsi ń gyaaↄ, ↄ̃ à aà kpàmá bɛ̃́ɛ.
Yã́pi lì Zopea píi, ↄ̃ wà Dii náaikɛ̀ we dasi.
Piɛɛ gↄↄplakɛ̀ we Simↄↄ báatotona bɛ.
Gbɛ̃e ku Sezale, aà tↄ́n Kↄↄnɛi. Aàpi mɛ́ sosa gãli pↄ́ wì mɛ Itali sosa gbɛ̃ↄn basↄoↄ dↄaana ũ.
Gbɛ̃́piá luayãmanaɛ, a Lua vĩa vĩ, aàpi ń a bɛdeↄ píi. Ì wɛ̃nadↄ̃nɛ́ maamaa, mɛ́ ìↄ wabikɛ Luawa mↄ̀ↄmↄↄ.
Gↄↄewa ĩatɛ̃ auapilaa, wɛ́pungu'ea guu à Lua malaikae è wásawasa, à gɛ̃̀ a bɛ a òɛ: Kↄↄnɛi.
Kↄↄnɛi wɛ́ gↄ̃̀ biiwà, vĩao aà kũ̀, ↄ̃ à mɛ̀: Bↄ́ ni, Dii? A wèwà à mɛ̀: N wabikɛa ń n wɛ̃nadↄ̃a gbɛ̃́ↄnɛo kà Luagu, ↄ̃ a sìnnↄ.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ zĩ Zope sa, aa Simↄↄ pↄ́ wì mɛ Piɛɛ sísi.
À pìla gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wì mɛ Simↄↄ báatotonawa. Aà bɛ ku ísialɛ.
Kɛ́ malaikapi tà, Kↄↄnɛi a zĩkɛna gbɛ̃ↄn plaↄ sìsi ń sosa luayãmana pↄ́ nawao.
Kɛ́ a dàu a sìunɛ́ píi, ↄ̃ à ń zĩ́ Zope.
Kɛ́ a gu dↄ̀, ↄ̃ aa dàzɛu, aa kà kãi ń wɛ̃́lɛpio. Gↄↄ bee Piɛɛ dɛ̀dɛ kpɛ́ musu ĩatɛ̃ minanguo wabikɛi.
Nↄana lɛ́ aà dɛ, a ye pↄble, ↄ̃ gↄↄ pↄ́ wàlɛ blɛkɛ, à wɛ́pungu'è.
À luabɛ è wɛ̃a, pↄe lɛ́ pila lán zwã̀a zↄ̃ↄwa. Wà ba dↄ̀dↄ a swã́ mɛ̀n síiↄ̃ↄwa píi, wàlɛ gbaɛ zĩ́lɛ.
Nↄ̀bↄↄ ń pↄ́taa'onkuawaↄ ń bãↄ píi ká a guu.
Ɔ̃ wa òɛ̀: Piɛɛ, fɛlɛ dɛ ǹ só.
Ɔ̃ Piɛɛ mɛ̀: Bauo Dii, mi tɛ̃e ge pↄ́ gbãlɛa ble ziio.
Ɔ̃ à lↄↄpi mà a gɛ̃n plaade wà mɛ̀: Pↄ́ pↄ́ Lua gbãbↄ̀ɛ̀, ńsu ǹ a tɛ̃boo.
À kɛ̀ màa gɛ̃n àaↄ̃, ↄ̃ kã́ndo wà pↄ́pi gà wà tàò luabɛ.
Piɛɛ lɛ́ bílikɛ wɛ́pungu pↄ́ a è yã́wa, ↄ̃ Kↄↄnɛi zĩna pↄ́ aa Simↄↄ bɛ gbɛ̀aↄ kà gↄ̃̀ↄ, aa zɛa bↄlɛu.
Aa lɛzù aa gbɛ̀a tó wekĩi Simↄↄ pↄ́ wì mɛ Piɛɛ pìlau.
E tia Piɛɛ lɛ́ làasookɛ wɛ́pungu pↄ́ á èwa, ↄ̃ Lua Nisĩna òɛ̀: Gbɛ̃ↄn àaↄ̃ↄ lɛ́ n gbɛa.
Pila gɛ́ńnↄ seasai, asa mámɛ ma ń zĩ́ma.
Ɔ̃ Piɛɛ pìla gɛ̀ gbɛ̃́piↄ kĩ́i à mɛ̀: Mámɛ má gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ álɛ gbɛa ũ. Bↄ́yãi a mↄi lai?
Aa mɛ̀: Sosaↄ dↄaana Kↄↄnɛi mɛ́ wá zĩ́. Gbɛ̃maaɛ, a Lua vĩa vĩ. Yudaↄ píi ì aà tↄnasi. Lua malaikae òɛ̀ aà n sísi a bɛ, aà n yãma.
Ɔ̃ Piɛɛ gɛ̃̀ńnↄ ua à ń yàaekɛ̀. Kɛ́ a gu dↄ̀, à fɛ̀lɛ dàńnↄ zɛ́u. Zope Yesudeeↄ gɛ̀ aà kpái.
A gↄↄ àaↄ̃de aa kà Sezale. Kↄↄnɛi a daɛↄ ń a gbɛ̃na fɛ̃̀ɛɛↄ kã̀aa, àlɛ ń dã́.
Kɛ́ Piɛɛ gɛ̃̀ ua, ↄ̃ Kↄↄnɛi gɛ̀ dàaàlɛ à kùlɛɛ̀.
Ɔ̃ Piɛɛ aà fɛ̀lɛ à mɛ̀: Fɛlɛ zɛ. Gbɛ̃nazĩnan ma ũ sↄ̃.
Àlɛ yã'oaànↄ e aa gɛ̀ gɛ̃̀ kpɛ́u, ↄ̃ à gbɛ̃́ↄ lè kãaaa we dasidasi.
A ònɛ́: Á dↄ̃ kɛ́ Yudaↄ zɛvĩ aa yãalɛ ń buipãleo ge aa gɛ̃ aà uao. Ãma Lua ↄ̀lↄmɛɛ másu gbɛ̃e gbãsĩ bo ge mà aà tɛ̃boo.
A yã́i tò kɛ́ wà ma sisi, ma mↄ zĩ́ozĩonakɛsai. Má ye mà yã́ pↄ́ a ma sisiwà ma sa.
Ɔ̃ Kↄↄnɛi mɛ̀: A gↄↄ síiↄ̃n la, kɛ́ málɛ wabikɛ ma bɛ e ĩatɛ̃ gɛ̀ aua pìlaò maa'i kɛ́wa. Ɔ̃ kã́ndo ma gbɛ̃e è zɛa ma aɛ pↄ́ tɛkɛa daa
à mɛ̀: Kↄↄnɛi, Lua n wabikɛa sì, mɛ́ n wɛ̃nadↄ̃anɛ kàaàgu.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ zĩ Zope Simↄↄ pↄ́ wì mɛ Piɛɛ sísii. À pìla Simↄↄ báatotona bɛ ísialɛ.
Ɔ̃ ma gbɛ̃́ↄ zĩ̀ma gↄ̃̀ↄ. Lá n mↄ, à kɛ̀ maa. Tia kɛ́wa, wápii wá kú la Lua dↄ̃a guu, kɛ́ wà yã́ pↄ́ Dii ònɛ ma yã́i.
Piɛɛ yãsɛ̀ à mɛ̀: Má sì sĩana sa kɛ́ Lua lí gbɛ̃e zãboo.
Bui píi guu gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ vĩakɛɛ̀ mɛ́ ì yãmaakɛ, ade yã́ mɛ́ ì kaaàgu.
Lua a yã́ dà Isailiↄnɛ, à kɛaanↄ na Yesu Kilisi sabai baokpànɛ́. Aàpi mɛ́ bui píi Dii ũ.
Á yã́ pↄ́ kɛ̀ Yude bùsu píi guu dↄ̃, lá à dàalɛ Galile Zãa kpàwakɛa ń gbɛ̃́ↄ da'ilɛkɛao gbɛa.
Á dↄ̃ lá Lua a Nisĩna pìsi Yesu Nazalɛtiwa, ↄ̃ a kú ń gbãao, à gɛ̀ wɛ̃́lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛo à yãmaakɛ̀nɛ́, à gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Ibiisi ń gã lìnɛ́ ń kpɛↄ gbã̀gbã, asa Lua kuaànↄɛ.
Wá dɛ yã́ pↄ́ a kɛ̀ Yude bùsuu ń Yelusalɛũo píi seeladeↄ ũ. Wà aà lòo líwa wa dɛ̀,
ↄ̃ Lua aà vù a gↄↄ àaↄ̃de zĩ́, a tò à azĩa ↄ̀lↄwɛ̃ɛ.
I kɛ gbɛ̃́piiɛ no, wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua dↄ̀aa wá sɛ́ aà seelade ũↄnɛ. Aà bↄa gau gbɛa wa pↄblèaànↄ, wa imìaànↄ.
Ɔ̃ a dìlɛwɛ̃ɛ wà waasokɛ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ, wí onɛ́ ámɛ á dɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua dìlɛ gbɛ̃́ bɛ̃́ɛↄ ń gyaadeↄ píi yã́kpalɛkɛna ũ.
Ãnabiↄ píi aà yã'ò aa mɛ̀, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa aà náaikɛ̀ↄ duuna a kɛ̃́má aà tↄ́ yã́i.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ Piɛɛ lɛ́ yã́pi onɛ́, Lua Nisĩna dì gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ yã́pi maↄnɛ píi.
Yã́pi dì Yuda Yesude pↄ́ mↄ̀ ń Piɛɛoↄwa, kɛ́ baa buipãleↄ, Lua a Nisĩna pìsimá gba ũ yã́i.
Asa aa mà, aalɛ yãebui'o, aalɛ Lua yãbↄnsaɛkɛaↄ o. Ɔ̃ Piɛɛ mɛ̀:
Gbɛ̃́piↄ Lua Nisĩna è láwáwa. Démɛ a fↄ̃ gínɛ́ aa da'ilɛkɛi?
Ɔ̃ a ò wà ń da'ilɛkɛ ń Yesu Kilisi tↄ́o. Ɔ̃ aa wabikɛ̀wà aà gↄↄplakɛńnↄ.
Zĩnaↄ ń Yesude pↄ́ kú Yudeↄ mà lá buipãleↄ Lua yã́ sì sↄ̃.
Kɛ́ Piɛɛ sù Yelusalɛũ, an gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ zɛ̀ ń tↄ̃zↄ̃yãoↄ aà tàae è
aa mɛ̀: N gɛ̃ gyafↄↄdeↄ bɛ n pↄblèńnↄ.
Ɔ̃ Piɛɛ fɛ̀lɛ lɛ́ yã́pi bↄↄlɛkɛnɛ́ zɛ́zɛ à mɛ̀:
Má kú Zopeɛ, málɛ wabikɛ, ↄ̃ ma wɛ́pungu'è. Ma pↄe è lán zwã̀a zↄ̃ↄwa, ba dↄdↄa a swã́ mɛ̀n síiↄ̃ↄwa. À bↄ̀ luabɛ, àlɛ pila ma kĩ́i.
Ma wɛpɛ̀wà tíũu, ma nↄ̀bↄↄ è a guu, sɛ̃̀a pↄ́ↄ ń pↄ́taa'onkuawaↄ ń bãↄ.
Ɔ̃ ma lↄↄ mà, wa òmɛɛ: Piɛɛ, fɛlɛ dɛ ǹ só.
Ɔ̃ ma mɛ̀, bauo Dii, asa tɛ̃ ge pↄ́ gbãlɛa i gɛ̃ ma lɛ́u ziio.
Lↄↄpi bↄa luabɛ gɛ̃n plaade wà mɛ̀, pↄ́ pↄ́ Lua gbãbↄ̀ɛ̀, másu mà a tɛ̃boo.
À kɛ̀ màa gɛ̃n àaↄ̃, ↄ̃ wà ɛ̀a gà tàò luabɛ píi.
Gↄↄ bee gↄ̃̀ↄ gbɛ̃ↄn àaↄ̃ pↄ́ wà ń zĩ́a bↄa Sezaleↄ mↄ̀ ua pↄ́ má kúu.
Ɔ̃ Lua Nisĩna òmɛɛ mà gɛ́ńnↄ seasai. Wá gbɛ̃́ gbɛ̃ↄn sooloɛ beeↄ gɛ̀ ma kpái sↄ̃, ↄ̃ wa gɛ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gbɛ̃́piↄ zĩ̀a bɛ.
Ɔ̃ a òwɛ̃ɛ lá a malaika è, à bↄ̀ mↄ̀wa a kpɛ́u, a òɛ à gbɛ̃́ zĩ Zope ma sísii,
mà yã́ pↄ́ a api ń a bɛdeↄ píi suaba oɛ.
Kɛ́ ma na yã'oawa, Lua Nisĩna dìnɛ́ lá a dìwɛ̃ɛ a daalɛgↄↄwa.
Ɔ̃ yã́ pↄ́ Dii ò dↄ̀magu à mɛ̀, Zãa gbɛ̃́ↄ da'ilɛkɛ̀ ń íoɛ, api sↄ̃ á wá da'ilɛkɛ ń Lua Nisĩnao.
Lá Lua gba doũ pↄ́ á dàwɛ̃ɛ gↄↄ pↄ́ wa Dii Yesu Kilisi náaikɛ̀ dànɛ́ lↄ, dén ma ũ mà fↄ̃ giɛ̀i?
Kɛ́ aa yã́pi mà, aa nìlɛ, ↄ̃ aa Lua tↄbↄ̀ aa mɛ̀: Wá è Lua buipãleↄ gbà zɛ́ lↄ aa nↄ̀sɛlilɛ, aai wɛ̃ni láasai e.
Wɛ́tɛ̃amↄanɛ́ pↄ́ fɛ̀lɛ Ɛtiɛ̃ɛ gaa guu mɛ́ tò gbɛ̃́ↄ fã̀aa tà Fenisi bùsuu ń Sipi bùsuo ń Antiↄsio, aalɛ Lua yã'o Yudaↄnɛ ńtɛ̃ɛ.
Ɔ̃ an gbɛ̃eↄ bↄ̀ Sipi bùsuu ń Silɛni bùsuo aa gɛ̀ Antiↄsi, ↄ̃ aalɛ yã'o buipãleↄnɛ sↄ̃, aalɛ Dii Yesu baokpanɛ́.
Dii lɛ́ ↄdamá, ↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ↄ yã́pi sì dasi aa zɛ̀ ń Diipio.
Yelusalɛũ Yesudeↄ swã́ kã̀ yã́piwa, ↄ̃ aa Baanaba zĩ̀ Antiↄsi.
Kɛ́ à kà we, a è lá Lua gbɛ̃kɛkɛ̀nɛ́, ↄ̃ aà pↄ kɛ̀na. À lɛdàmá ḿpii aa zɛ ń Diio ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo.
Baanabaá gbɛ̃maaɛ, Lua Nisĩna ń luanaaikɛao pɛ̀ɛwà, ↄ̃ wà kà Dii gbɛ̃́ↄ guu dasi.
Ɔ̃ Baanaba gɛ̀ Taasu Sↄlu wɛɛlɛi.
Kɛ́ à aà è, ↄ̃ à sùaànↄ Antiↄsi. Aaìↄ kãaa ń Yesudeↄ dasi, aaↄ yãdanɛ́ e wɛ̃̀ bṹu do. Antiↄsi we wà dↄ̀aa tↄkpàu Yesu ìwaↄnɛ Kilisideↄ.
Gↄↄ bee ãnabiↄ bↄ̀ Yelusalɛũ aa mↄ̀ Antiↄsi.
An gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wì mɛ Agabu fɛ̀lɛ zɛ̀ à dↄ̀aa nↄana zↄ̃ↄ pↄ́ a ka dṹnia guu píi yã'ònɛ́ ń Lua Nisĩna gbãao. Kolodi kpalablea gↄↄ ↄ̃ nↄanapi kà.
Ɔ̃ Yesudeↄ zɛ̀ò wà ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú Yudeↄ kámasa ká lá baade gbãa fↄ̃̀, wi kpã́sãnɛ́.
Ɔ̃ aa kɛ̀ màa, aa Baanaba ń Sↄluo zĩ̀ò kpái an gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄwa.
Gↄↄ bee kí Elodi ↄpɛ̀lɛ Yesudeeↄwa pãsĩpãsĩ.
À Zãa vĩ̀i Zaaki dɛ̀ ń fɛ̃ndao.
Kɛ́ a è yã́ bee kà Yudaↄgu, ↄ̃ à ɛ̀a Piɛɛ kũ̀ lↄ. À bee kɛ̀ Kàaso dikpɛ zĩ́ɛ.
Kɛ́ à Piɛɛ kũ̀ a dàkpɛu, à aà nà sosaↄnɛ ń ↄzĩ aa aà dↄ̃́a. Sosapiↄ gãli do gbɛ̃ↄn síiↄ̃siiↄ̃ɛ e lɛɛ síiↄ̃. A dìlɛ à yã́kpalɛkɛaànↄ bíla wáa Gɛ̃amusu dikpɛ gbɛa.
Ɔ̃ wa Piɛɛ kũa kpɛ́u, Yesudeↄ lɛ́ wabikɛɛ̀ Luawa zɛsai.
Gu pↄ́ a dↄ Elodi bↄaànↄ, a gwã́ Piɛɛ lɛ́ i'o sosa gbɛ̃ↄn plaↄ zãnguo yea ń mↄdaonao mɛ̀n pla, mɛ́ gbɛ̃ↄn plaↄ ku kpɛɛlɛ, aalɛ kpɛ́pi dↄ̃́a.
Kã́ndo gↄ̃̀ↄ Dii malaikae gɛ̃̀ we, ↄ̃ kpɛ́pi pù. À Piɛɛ lɛ̀ a gbã̀tɛ̃ɛwa à aà vù à mɛ̀: Fɛlɛ kpakpa. Ɔ̃ mↄdaonapiↄ wòlo aà ↄwa.
Ɔ̃ malaikapi òɛ̀: Ǹ n ula da, ní n kyale kpá. Piɛɛ kɛ̀ màa, ↄ̃ malaikapi mɛ̀: Ǹ n ula kãaa ǹ kṹ, ní tɛmazi.
Ɔ̃ Piɛɛ bↄ̀ tɛaàzi. I yã́ pↄ́ malaika lɛ́ kɛɛ dↄ̃ sĩana ũo, àlɛ e nana álɛ o.
Aa gɛ̃̀ gudↄ̃ana sɛ̃́iala ń a plaadeo, ↄ̃ aa kà bↄlɛu. Bↄlɛpi gbaá mↄɛ, ↄ̃ à wɛ̃̀nɛ́ ń azĩao, aa bↄ̀lɛ lɛ́ gɛ̃ wɛ̃́lɛu. Kã́ndo gↄ̃̀ↄ ↄ̃ malaikapi Piɛɛ tò zɛa guu we.
Kɛ́ Piɛɛ wɛ́ dↄ̀dↄ à mɛ̀: Má dↄ̃ sã́asã sa kɛ́ Dii a malaika zĩ̀, à ma bↄ Elodi ↄzĩ ń yã́ pↄ́ Yudaↄ wɛ́ dↄi wà kɛmɛɛo píi.
Kɛ́ aà wɛ́ kɛ̃̀, à gɛ̀ Zãa pↄ́ wì mɛ lↄ Maaku da Maliama bɛ. Wa kãaaa we dasi, wàlɛ wabikɛ.
Kɛ́ à bↄlɛ gba lɛ̀, ↄ̃ nↄɛ zĩkɛna pↄ́ wì mɛ Loda gɛ̀ gwai.
Kɛ́ à Piɛɛ lↄↄ dↄ̃̀, pↄna guu i zɛ́ wɛ̃o, à ɛ̀a bàalɛ̀ gɛ ònɛ́ Piɛɛ mɛ́ kú bↄlɛu we.
Wa òɛ̀: Ĩana kàma yã̀? Ɔ̃ à zɛ̀ò kɛ́ sĩanaɛ. Ɔ̃ wà mɛ̀: Aà malaikaɛ.
Piɛɛ gì lɛ́ gbalɛ. Kɛ́ aa wɛ̃̀, aa aà è, ↄ̃ yã́pi dìmá.
À ↄkɛ̀nɛ́ aa nílɛ, ↄ̃ a dàu a sìunɛ́ lá Dii a bↄ kpɛ́u. Ɔ̃ à mɛ̀: À gɛ o Zaakiɛ ń wá gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ. Ɔ̃ à bↄ̀ gɛ̀ gupãlei.
Kɛ́ gu dↄ̀, kↄ̃fĩ gbãa dà sosaↄ zãnguo, aalɛ kↄ̃ lala aa mɛ̀: Bↄ́ Piɛɛ kɛ̀ a ũi?
Elodi ò wà aà wɛɛlɛ. Kɛ́ wi aà eo, ↄ̃ à yãlàla gudↄ̃anapiↄwa, ↄ̃ a ò wà ń dɛdɛ. Bee gbɛa Elodi bↄ̀ Yude, à gɛ̀ gↄↄplakɛ̀ Sezale.
Aà pↄ pà Tiideↄ ń Sidↄ̃deↄzi maamaa, ↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ beeↄ lɛdoũkɛ̀ aa mↄ̀ aà gwai sãnu. Aa gɛ̀ kíapi bɛ ziia Blasitu kĩ́i. Kɛ́ Blasitu ń yã́zɛ è, aa gɛ̀ lɛdoũkɛi ń Elodio, asa an bùsu pↄblea ì bↄ aà bùsuuɛ.
Kɛ́ gↄↄ pↄ́ wa dìlɛ kà, Elodi a kible'ulaↄ dà, à gɛ̀ zↄ̃̀lɛ a gĩ́naa, ↄ̃ à yã'ò bílaɛ.
Bíla wiilɛ̀ à mɛ̀: Luae mɛ́ lɛ́ yã'o, i kɛ gbɛ̃nazĩna no.
Wegↄ̃ↄ Dii malaikae aà lɛ nɛ̀, kɛ́ i zↄ̃ↄkɛ dↄ̃ Luaɛo yã́i, ↄ̃ aà mɛ kↄ̀ↄkà à gà.
Lua yã́ ìↄ ligua, ìↄ kã́fĩ.
Baanaba ń Sↄluo sↄ̃, kɛ́ aa ń kámasa yã́ kɛ̀kɛ aa làa, aa bↄ̀ Yelusalɛũ aa Zãa pↄ́ wì mɛ Maaku sɛ̀ tàò.
Ãnabiↄ ń yãdanɛdeↄ ku Antiↄsi Yesudeↄ guu, an tↄ́ↄn kɛ: Baanaba ń Simɛↄ pↄ́ wì mɛ Báasiao ń Silɛni bùsu gbɛ̃́ Lusiuo ń Manaɛ pↄ́ nɛblè ń kí Elodio sãnuo ń Sↄluo.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ aalɛ Dii sisi ń lɛyeao, Lua Nisĩna mɛ̀: À Baanaba ń Sↄluo dilɛ ńdoa zĩ pↄ́ ma ń sɛ́wà yã́i.
Kɛ́ aa lɛyè aa wabikɛ̀, ↄ̃ aa ↄnàmá aa ń gbáɛ, aa dàzɛu.
Kɛ́ Lua Nisĩna Baanaba ń Sↄluo zĩ̀ màa, aa gɛ̀ Sɛlusi. Za we aa gɛ̃̀ gó'ilɛnau aa gɛ̀ Sipi bùsuu.
Kɛ́ aa kà Salami, aa Lua yã́ waasokɛ̀ Yudaↄ lousisikpɛↄ guu. Zãa Maaku kúńnↄ dↄnlɛde ũ.
Aa ísia gũgũnapi baa vĩ̀ e Pafↄsi, ↄ̃ aa kpàaũ ń Yuda dabudabukɛna pↄ́ dɛ ãnabi ɛgɛna ũo we. Aà tↄ́n Yesunɛ.
Ìↄ kú ń bùsupi gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ Sɛɛziu Pↄluo. Gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpiá ↄ̃nↄnaɛ, ↄ̃ à Baanaba ń Sↄluo sìsi, kɛ́ a ye Lua yãma yã́i.
Dabudabukɛnapi tↄ́n Ɛlima ń Gɛlɛki yã́o. À íbɛlɛsɛ̀ńnↄ, àlɛ wɛɛlɛ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi swãfɛ̃, kɛ́ asu Yesu náaikɛo.
Ɔ̃ Sↄlu pↄ́ wì mɛ Pↄlu sↄ̃, Lua Nisĩna dɛ̀dɛwà, ↄ̃ à wɛpɛ̀wà à mɛ̀:
Ibiisi nɛ́ↄ do! Maa píi ibɛɛ! Gbɛ̃nazĩn vãi píi paɛmade! Wɛzɛ̃n pãsĩ! Ńyↄ̃ Dii zɛ́ súsu kpaanlaboa too lé?
Tiasa Dii a ↄkulɛma, ní vĩ̀akũ. Ńyↄ̃ gↄↄplakɛ ńyↄ̃ ĩatɛ̃ eo. Wegↄ̃ↄ Ɛlima wɛ́ gↄ̃̀ dã̀adãa, gusia kùlɛwà. Ɔ̃ àlɛ ↄmalɛmalɛ, àlɛ gbɛ̃́ wɛɛlɛ aà a ↄ kṹ.
Kɛ́ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi yã́ pↄ́ kɛ̀pi è, à Dii náaikɛ̀, asa aà yã́ pↄ́ wa dàɛ̀ aà kũ̀ gbãaɛ.
Ɔ̃ Pↄlu gɛ̃̀ gó'ilɛnau ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ, aa bↄ̀ Pafↄsi aa gɛ̀ Pɛɛga, Pãmfili bùsuu. We Zãa Maaku ń tóu, à ɛ̀a tà Yelusalɛũ.
Bↄa Pɛɛga aa gɛ̀ Antiↄsi pↄ́ kú Pisidi bùsuu. Kã́mabogↄↄzĩ aa gɛ̀ zↄ̃̀lɛ lousisikpɛu.
Mↄizi ikoyã ń ãnabiↄ láↄ kyokɛa gbɛa lousisikpɛ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ gbɛ̃́ zĩ̀ wà onɛ́, tó aa kã́fĩa yãe vĩ aa o bílaɛ, aa o.
Ɔ̃ Pↄlu fɛ̀lɛ ↄkɛ̀nɛ́ à mɛ̀: Isailiↄ ń buipãle lousisinaↄ à ma yãma.
Isailiↄ Lua wá deziↄ sɛ̀, ↄ̃ à ń bui kↄ̃̀ an kua Egipi bùsuu. Ɔ̃ à ń bↄ́lɛ we ń a gbãa zↄ̃ↄo.
À ń gwá guwaiwaiu wɛ̃̀ bla taawa.
À gbãamↄ̀ Kanaa bùsu bui mɛ̀n soplaↄnɛ, ↄ̃ à ń bùsupi kpàmá.
Apii kà wɛ̃̀ ↄ̀aa pla ń blakwio taawa. Bee gbɛa à dↄaanaↄ dìlɛnɛ́ e à gɛ̀ pɛ̀ò ãnabi Samuɛliwa.
Kɛ́ aa kía gbɛ̀a, ↄ̃ Lua Kisi nɛ́ Saulu, Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ bui dìlɛnɛ́. À kpalablè wɛ̃̀ bla,
ↄ̃ Lua aà bↄ̀ kpalau, à Davidi kpà aà gbɛu. Lua Davidi yã'ò à mɛ̀, á è Yɛse nɛ́ Davidi làasoo doũanↄ, a a pↄeã píi kɛɛ.
Aà bui guu à Yesu bↄ̀u Isailiↄnɛ Suabana ũ, lá à a lɛgbɛ̃̀wa.
E Yesupi àↄ gɛ́ mↄ́i Zãa dↄ̀aa waasokɛ̀ Isailiↄnɛ píi, a ònɛ́ aa nↄ̀sɛlilɛ aa da'ilɛkɛ.
Kɛ́ Zãa zĩ ye láai à mɛ̀: Dé álɛ e má dɛ a ũi? Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ á wɛ́ dↄin ma ũo. À ma! Àlɛ mↄ́ ma gbɛa, mi ka mà aà sabala bↄbↄɛ̀o.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, Ablahaũ buiↄ ń buipãle lousisinaↄ, wámɛ Lua suabayãɛ bee kpã̀sãwɛ̃ɛ.
Yelusalɛũdeↄ ń ń gbãadeↄ aai Yesu dↄ̃o, aai ãnabiↄ lá pↄ́ wìↄ a kyokɛ kã́mabogↄↄzĩ píi zɛ́ dↄ̃o, ↄ̃ aa ãnabipiↄ yã́ pàpa, aa yãdàaàla.
Aai yãe ewà à kà wà aà dɛo, ↄ̃ aa gbɛ̀a Pilatiwa wà aà dɛ.
Kɛ́ aa yã́ pↄ́ wa kɛ̃̀ aà yã́ musu kɛ̀ píi, wà aà bùa líwa wà aà dà mia'ɛu.
Lua aà bↄ̀ gau.
A gↄↄ dasi kɛ́ à bↄ̀ mↄ̀ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa bↄ̀ Galile aa gɛ̀aànↄ Yelusalɛũↄwa. Aamɛ aà seeladeↄ ũ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ.
Wápiↄ sↄ̃, ↄ̃ wa mↄ aà baokpaiɛ́. Lɛ́ pↄ́ Lua gbɛ̃̀ wá deziↄnɛ,
a kɛ̀ wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wá dɛ an buiↄ ũↄnɛ, à Yesu vù lá wa ò Soũ plaade guuwa. Lua mɛ̀: Ma nɛ́n n ũ, n Maen ma ũ gbã.
Lá a yaikɛo, mɛ́ Lua a aà bↄ gau, a yã́ ↄ̃ Luapi ò yãa à mɛ̀: Má báaa seasai pↄ́ ma a lɛgbɛ̃̀ Davidiɛ daágu.
Ɔ̃ wa ò guei lↄ: Ńyↄ̃ wei n gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a kua adoa yaikɛo.
Davidipi sↄ̃ à Lua pↄeã kɛ̀ a gↄↄ. Kɛ́ à gà, wà aà mia kpàkↄ̃i ń a deziↄ, ↄ̃ à yaikɛ̀.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua aà vùpi sↄ̃ i yaikɛo.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, àↄ dↄ̃ kɛ́ duunakɛ̃ama waaso pↄ́ wálɛ kɛɛ́ kú aà kĩ́iɛ.
Mↄizi ikoyã lí fↄ̃ tò yã́ bↄńnↄ nao, ãma gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ Yesu náaikɛↄ, yã́pii i bↄńnↄ na.
À laaika kɛ́ yã́ pↄ́ ãnabiↄ ò su á leo
aa mɛ̀: À ma, á gbɛ̃́ awiambↄnaↄ, à gilikɛ, í sãalɛ, asa má yãe kɛ á gↄↄ, baa tó wa dàu lɛ́ siuɛ́, á sio.
Kɛ́ Pↄlu ń Baanabao lɛ́ bↄlɛ lousisikpɛu, wà wabikɛ̀má aa ɛa mↄ yã́pi onɛ́ kã́mabogↄↄ sìa lↄ.
Kɛ́ wàlɛ fãaa Yudaↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì lousisińnↄↄ bↄ̀ tɛ Pↄlu ń Baanabaozi dasi. Aa yã'ònɛ́, aalɛ lɛdamá aaↄ gɛ́ aɛ ń gbɛ̃kɛ pↄ́ Lua kɛ̀ńnↄo.
Kã́mabogↄↄ sìa wɛ̃́lɛdeↄ kã̀aa píi Dii yãmaa yã́i.
Kɛ́ Yudaↄ bílapi è, à kɛ̀nɛ́ ĩ́i maamaa, ↄ̃ aalɛ Pↄlu yã́ bɛ̃̀ɛbo, aalɛ aà sↄ̃sↄ̃.
Ɔ̃ Pↄlu ń Baanabao yã'ònɛ́ vĩasai aa mɛ̀: Ámɛ à kũ̀ wà Lua yã'oɛ́ gĩa. Lá a gi, álɛ e i ka à wɛ̃ni láasai eo, wá ɛa aɛdↄ buipãleↄwaɛ sa.
Asa Dii yã́ɛ bee dìlɛwɛ̃ɛɛ à mɛ̀: Ma n dilɛ gupua ũ buipãleↄnɛ, kɛ́ ǹ gɛ́ ń suabayão e tↄↄlɛ lɛ́wa.
Kɛ́ buipãleↄ yã́pi mà, an pↄ kɛ̀na, aa Dii yã́ sì sĩana ũ, ↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua ń dílɛ wɛ̃ni láasai pↄ́ ũↄ Yesu náaikɛ̀.
Ɔ̃ Dii yã́ lì bùsupia píi.
Yudaↄ ↄzↄ̃̀ buipãle nↄɛ lousisin gbiaↄ ń wɛ̃́lɛ gbãadeↄzi, ↄ̃ aa ĩadà Pↄlu ń Baanabaowa, aa ń yá ń bùsuu.
Aa kↄↄlɛ̀má ń tàae seela ũ, ↄ̃ aa gɛ̀ Ikↄniu.
Yesudeↄ sↄ̃, pↄna ń Lua Nisĩnao pɛ̀ɛmá.
Aa kɛ̀ Ikↄniu lá aaì kɛwa, aa gɛ̃̀ Yudaↄ lousisikpɛu aa yã'ò e Yudaↄ ń buipãleↄ Dii náaikɛ̀ dasidasi.
Ɔ̃ Yuda pↄ́ aa gì yã́pi síiↄ buipãleↄ swãfɛ̃̀ Yesudeↄnɛ, aa ĩ́isɛ̀ńnↄ.
Ń beeo Pↄlu ń Baanabao gↄↄplakɛ̀ we, aa yã'ò vĩasai daa Dii gã̀u, ↄ̃ Dii ń gbá zɛ́ an yãbↄnsaɛkɛaↄ ń ń dabudabukɛaↄ a gbɛ̃kɛ yã́ pↄ́ aalɛ onɛ́ sĩanapìliwànɛ́.
Ɔ̃ wɛ̃́lɛdeↄ kↄ̃kpaalɛ̀, gbɛ̃eↄ zɛ̀ ń Yudaↄ, gbɛ̃eↄ ń zĩnaↄ.
Ɔ̃ Yudaↄ ń buipãleↄ ń ń gbãadeↄ zɛ̀ò wà ĩadamá wà ń pápa ń gbɛo.
Kɛ́ Pↄlu ń Baanabao ń yã́ dↄ̃̀, ↄ̃ aa bàasi tà Likaoni bùsu wɛ̃́lɛↄu, Lisita ń Dɛɛbɛo ń a zↄ̃ɛwiaↄ.
Ɔ̃ aa gì lɛ́ baonapi kpánɛ́ we.
Gↄ̃ɛe ku Lisita, aà gbáↄ imia. Zaa wà aà ì, a dɛ ɛɛ ũɛ, i táa'oo.
Àlɛ swã́kpa Pↄlu yã́i, ↄ̃ Pↄlu wɛpɛ̀wà soee, a è aà Yesu náaikɛa kà à aà gbã́gbã,
ↄ̃ a òɛ̀ ń lↄↄ gbãao: Fɛlɛ zɛ n gbáwa. Ɔ̃ à vĩ̀ zɛ̀, à bↄ̀ ń táo.
Kɛ́ bíla è lá Pↄlu kɛ̀, ↄ̃ aa kã̀aa wiiwa ń Likaoni yã́o aa mɛ̀: Tã́aↄ lì gbɛ̃nazĩnaↄ ũ aa pìlawá.
Aa tↄkpà Baanabaɛ Zupitɛɛ, Pↄlu sↄ̃ Mɛɛkiu, kɛ́ ↄ̃mɛ ì dↄaa ń yã'oao yã́i.
Zupitɛɛpi kpɛ́ kú wɛ̃́nkpɛ, ↄ̃ aà gbàgbana mↄ̀ ń zuswana pↄ́ à lávu zãblèmáↄ wɛ̃́lɛ bĩ́ibↄlɛu. A ye dasi sa'o zĩnaↄwa.
Kɛ́ Baanaba ń Pↄluo yã́pi mà, aa ń ulaↄ ga kɛ̃̀kɛ̃, ↄ̃ aa sì dasi guu ń wiio
aa mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃́ↄ, bↄ́yãi álɛ kɛ beewai? Gbɛ̃nazĩnaↄn wá ũ sↄ̃ lááwa. Baona wálɛ kpáɛ́, kɛ́ à kpɛ lí pↄ́ gianaɛ beeↄnɛ, í zɛ ń Lua bɛ̃́ɛo. Ɔ̃mɛ musu kɛ̀ ń tↄↄlɛo ń ísiao ń pↄ́ pↄ́ kúuↄ píi.
À bui píi tò yãa, aa ńzĩa zɛ́ sɛ̀.
Ń beeo à azĩa ↄ̀lↄnɛ́ maakɛa guu. Ì to lou maɛ́ à pↄkɛkɛ a gↄↄwa. Ì á gba blɛ àↄ ku pↄna guu.
Baa ń yã́ bee oao, dɛ̃ɛ ń dɛ̃ɛo ↄ̃ aa gì gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ aa sa'omá.
Ɔ̃ Yudaↄ bↄ̀ Antiↄsi ń Ikↄniuo aa mↄ̀ wà bíla swãfɛ̃̀. Ɔ̃ aa Pↄlu pàpa ń gbɛo aa aà gàlɛ bↄ̀ò wɛ̃́nkpɛ, aalɛ e à gàɛ.
Kɛ́ Yesudeↄ kã̀aaaàzi, ↄ̃ à fɛ̀lɛ gɛ̃̀ wɛ̃́lɛ guu. Kɛ́ a gu dↄ̀, aàpi ń Baanabao aa gɛ̀ Dɛɛbɛ.
Kɛ́ aa baonakpànɛ́ wɛ̃́lɛpi guu, aa gbɛ̃́ↄ è dasi. Ɔ̃ aa ɛ̀a gɛ̀ Lisita ń Ikↄniuo ń Antiↄsio,
aalɛ Yesudeↄ gba gbãa, aalɛ lɛdamá aa wɛtã Yesu náaikɛawa aa mɛ̀: Sema wà taasikɛ maamaa, wí gbasa gɛ̃ kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i guu.
Aa gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ dìlɛnɛ́ wɛ̃́lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛo, ↄ̃ aa wabikɛ̀nɛ́ ń lɛyeo, aa ń ná Dii pↄ́ aa aà náaikɛ̀ɛ̀ ↄzĩ.
Kɛ́ aa pã̀ Pisidi bùsua, aa kà Pãmfili bùsuu.
Aa Lua yã'ò Pɛɛga, ↄ̃ aa gɛ̀ Atali.
We aa gɛ̃̀ gó'ilɛnau aa tà Antiↄsi, gu pↄ́ wà ń náu Luaɛ a ↄzĩ yãa aà gbɛ̃kɛkɛnɛ́ zĩ pↄ́ aa kɛ̀ aa làa tia yã́ musu.
Kɛ́ aa kà, aa Yesudeↄ kã̀aa aa yã́ pↄ́ Lua kɛ̀nɛ́ ònɛ́ píi, lá à buipãleↄ gbà zɛ́ aa a náaikɛ̀.
Ɔ̃ aa gↄↄplakɛ̀ńnↄ we.
Gbɛ̃eↄ bↄ̀ Yude aa mↄ̀ Antiↄsi, ↄ̃ aa yãdà Yesudeↄnɛ aa mɛ̀: Tó i tↄ̃zↄ̃ lá Mↄizi dìlɛwao, á zia'eo.
Pↄlu ń Baanabao zↄadↄ̀má aa lɛkpaakɛ̀ńnↄ maamaa yã́pi musu. Ɔ̃ Yesudeↄ zɛ̀ò Pↄlu ń Baanabao ń ń gbɛ̃eↄ gɛ́ Yelusalɛũ yã́pi gↄ̃́gↄ̃i ń zĩnaↄ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ.
Aa gɛ̀ zɛ̀nɛ́, ↄ̃ aa pã̀ Fenisi ń Samalio bùsuↄla. Aa buipãleↄ nↄ̀sɛlilɛa yã́ dàu a sìu ń gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ we, ↄ̃ an pↄ kɛ̀na zↄ̃ↄ.
Kɛ́ aa kà Yelusalɛũ, Yesudeↄ ń zĩnaↄ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ gbãakpàńzi, ↄ̃ aa yã́ pↄ́ Lua kɛ̀nɛ́ píi baokpànɛ́.
Ɔ̃ Falisi Yesudeeↄ fɛ̀lɛ mɛ̀: Sema buipãleↄ tↄ̃zↄ̃, wi onɛ́ aaↄ Mↄizi ikoyã kũa.
Ɔ̃ zĩnaↄ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ kↄ̃ kã̀aa, aalɛ yã́pi gwa.
Kɛ́ lɛkpaaĩa gbã̀akũ̀, Piɛɛ fɛ̀lɛ zɛ̀ a ònɛ́: Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, á dↄ̃ kɛ́ Lua ma dilɛ á guu à gɛ̃̀gɛ̃, kɛ́ buipãleↄ Yesu bao ma ma lɛ́u, aai aà náaikɛ.
Lua dee gbɛ̃́pii nↄ̀sɛ dↄ̃, ↄ̃ à ń gbá a Nisĩna a siańnↄ seela ũ, lá à wá gbáwa.
Lua i ń dilɛ dodoa ń wápiↄo. À ń nↄ̀sɛ pìpinɛ́, kɛ́ aa Yesu náaikɛ̀ yã́i.
Bↄ́yãi álɛ Lua wɛi tiai? Aso pↄ́ wá deziↄ fùa sɛ́i ń wápiↄ ↄ̃ á ye dinɛ́a?
Màa no! Wá a náai vĩ kɛ́ wá bↄ Dii Yesu gbɛ̃kɛ yã́iɛ, lá ampiↄwa sↄ̃.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ kɛ̀ kílikili píi, ↄ̃ aa swãkpà Baanaba ń Pↄluozi, aalɛ seelaↄ ń dabudabu pↄ́ Lua kɛ̀nɛ́ buipãleↄ guuↄ o.
Kɛ́ aa yã'ò aa làa, Zaaki fɛ̀lɛ yãsɛ̀ à mɛ̀: Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, à ma yãma.
Simↄↄ ò lá Lua dↄ̀aa buipãleↄ wɛgwà, ↄ̃ à gbɛ̃́ↄ sɛ̀ ń guu a pↄ́ ũ.
Ãnabiↄ yã́ↄ kↄ̃sɛ̀ ń beeo, asa aa mɛ̀:
Bee gbɛa má ɛa mↄ Davidi bɛzĩ bo, mí a gufooↄ kɛkɛ tata lↄ,
kɛ́ buipãleↄ ma kĩ́i wɛɛlɛ, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ma ń sisi ma ń sɛ́piↄ píi.
Dii pↄ́ lɛ́ yã́pi kɛ mɛ́ ò, a tò wa yã́pi dↄ̃ za káau.
Ayãmɛto má è a maa wà yã́ zĩ'ũ dilɛ buipãle pↄ́ aa zɛ̀ ń Luaoↄnɛo.
Wà lákɛ̃nɛ́ aa mikɛ̃ pↄ́ pↄ́ gbãlɛ̀ tã́a kĩ́iwa ń gbãsĩkɛao ń nↄ̀ↄ kòlokpasaio ń kpàao.
Asa à gɛ̃̀gɛ̃ wìↄ Mↄizi lá kyokɛ lousisikpɛↄ guu kã́mabogↄↄzĩ píi, wìↄ aà yã́ waasokɛ wɛ̃́lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛo.
Ɔ̃ zĩnaↄ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ń Yesudeↄ píi zɛ̀ò wà gbɛ̃́ↄ sɛ́ ń guu, wà ń zĩ Antiↄsi ń Pↄluo ń Baanabao. Ɔ̃ aa ń dↄaanaeↄ sɛ̀, Yuda pↄ́ wì mɛɛ̀ Baasaba ń Silivɛ̃ɛo.
Wà taala dìnɛ́, yã́ pↄ́ wa kɛ̃̀ a guu mɛ̀: Wá zĩnaↄ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ wa fↄkpà wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa dɛ buipãleↄ ũ Antiↄsi ń Sili bùsuo ń Silisi bùsuoↄwa.
Wá mà wá gbɛ̃eↄ gɛ̀ á kĩ́i aa á nↄ̀sɛ ↄ̃̀ↄkpàɛ́, aa á dá bíliu ń yã'oa guu. Wá lɛ́ kú a guuo,
ↄ̃ wa lɛdoũkɛ̀ wa zɛò kɛ́ wà gbɛ̃́ↄ sɛ wà ń zĩwá ń wá gbɛ̃́ yenzideↄ Baanaba ń Pↄlu
pↄ́ aa gì ń wɛ̃nii wá Dii Yesu Kilisi tↄbↄa yã́io.
Ayãmɛto wálɛ Yuda ń Silivɛ̃ɛo zĩwá, aa yã́ pↄ́ wá kɛ̃̀ láu oɛ́ ń lɛ́o.
Asa Lua Nisĩna ń wápiↄ wa zɛò wà asoe diɛ́o, sema a pↄ́ zɛvĩɛ beeↄ.
À mikɛ̃ nↄ̀ↄ pↄ́ wà sa'òò tã́awa soawa ń kpàao ń nↄ̀ↄ kòlokpasaio ń gbãsĩkɛao. A maa à mikɛ̃ beeↄwa. Wà kↄ̃'e aafia!
Ɔ̃ wà ń gbáɛ, aa gɛ̀ Antiↄsi. Aa Yesudeↄ kã̀aa píi, ↄ̃ aa lápi kpàmá.
Kɛ́ aa a kyokɛ̀, ↄ̃ an pↄ kɛ̀na maamaa ń nↄ̀sɛ níniyãpio.
Yuda ń Silivɛ̃ɛoá ãnabiↄnɛ, ↄ̃ aa lɛdà ń gbɛ̃́piↄwa maamaa, aa ń gbá gbãa.
Kɛ́ aa gↄↄplakɛ̀ we, Yesudeↄ lɛzàmá, ↄ̃ aa tà ń zĩnaↄ kĩ́i aafia.
Pↄlu ń Baanabao gↄ̃̀ Antiↄsi. Ń gbɛ̃́ dasi pãleↄ aa Dii yãdànɛ́ aa baonakpànɛ́.
<range>
Gↄↄpla gbɛa Pↄlu ò Baanabaɛ: Wà ɛa gɛ́ Yesudeↄ gwai wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ wa Dii yã́ waasokɛ̀u yãaↄ guu, wíↄ dↄ̃ lá aa dɛ.
Baanaba ye Zãa Maaku sɛ aà gɛ́ńnↄ,
ↄ̃ Pↄlu lɛ́ e a maa wà gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kɛ̃̀má Pãmfili, i tɛ́ńzi ń zĩ guuo sɛ lↄo.
Aai makↄ̃ɛo, ↄ̃ aa kɛ̃̀kↄ̃wa. Baanaba Maaku sɛ̀ aa gɛ̃̀ gó'ilɛnau aa gɛ̀ Sipi.
Ɔ̃ Pↄlu Silivɛ̃ɛ sɛ̀. Yesudeↄ ń ná Diiɛ a ↄzĩ aà gbɛ̃kɛkɛnɛ́, ↄ̃ aa dàzɛu.
Aa pã̀ Sili ń Silisiola, aa Yesudeↄ gbà gbãa.
Pↄlu kà Dɛɛbɛ ń Lisitao. Wekĩi Yesudee ku wì mɛɛ̀ Timↄtee. Aà daá Yuda Yesudeɛ, mɛ́ aà maeá Gɛlɛkiɛ.
Yesude pↄ́ aa ku Lisita ń Ikↄniuoↄ aà tↄnasì.
Pↄlu ye aà gɛanↄ, ↄ̃ à tↄ̃zↄ̃̀ɛ̀ Yuda pↄ́ kú wɛ̃́lɛpiↄ guuↄ yã́i, asa ampii aa dↄ̃ kɛ́ aà maeá Gɛlɛkiɛ.
Wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ aa gɛ̀u píi, aa yã́ pↄ́ zĩnaↄ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ dìlɛ Yelusalɛũ ò Yesudeↄnɛ aaↄ kũa.
Ɔ̃ aalɛ gbãakũ ń Yesu náaikɛa guu, aalɛ dasikũ lá gu lɛ́ dↄ.
Lua Nisĩna gìnɛ́ aa gɛ́ Lua yã'oi Azi bùsuu, ↄ̃ aa pã̀ Filizi ń Galatio bùsuↄla.
Kɛ́ aa kà Misi bùsu zↄ̃lɛu, aa yↄ̃̀wà wà gɛ̃ Bitini bùsuu, ↄ̃ Yesu Nisĩna i weinɛ́o.
Kɛ́ aa Misi bùsu baa vĩ̀, ↄ̃ aa kà Toloasi.
Gwãasĩna Pↄlu Masedoni bùsu gbɛ̃e è zɛaala iu, àlɛ awakpaɛ̀ à mɛ̀: Buawá Masedoni, dↄwálɛ.
Kɛ́ a è iu màa, ↄ̃ wa Masedoni sↄukɛ̀ gↄ̃̀ↄ, asa wá dↄ̃̀ sa, kɛ́ Lua mɛ́ lɛ́ wá sisi wà gɛ baonakpanɛ́.
Ɔ̃ wa gɛ̃ gó'ilɛnau Toloasi, wa mipɛ̀ Samↄtasiwa. Kɛ́ a gu dↄ̀ wa ka Nɛapↄli.
Bↄa we wa gɛ Filipi, Masedoni bùsu saalopi mɛɛwia pↄ́ Lomadeↄ vĩ, ↄ̃ wa gↄↄplakɛ̀ wɛ̃́lɛpiu.
Kã́mabogↄↄzĩ wa bↄ wɛ̃́nkpɛ, wa gɛ swa saɛ, gu pↄ́ wálɛ e wì lousisiu. Ɔ̃ wa zↄ̃lɛ wa yã'ò nↄɛ pↄ́ kãaaa weↄnɛ.
Nↄɛe ku we, wì mɛɛ̀ Lidia. Tiatii gbɛ̃́ zwã̀a tɛ̃a yìanaɛ, mɛ́ lousisinaɛ. Àlɛ yã́ pↄ́ Pↄlu lɛ́ o ma, ↄ̃ Dii aà sↄ̃ wɛ̃̀ɛ̀, à yã́pi sì.
À da'ilɛkɛ̀ ń a bɛdeↄ, ↄ̃ à wabikɛ̀wá à mɛ̀: Tó a ma Dii náaikɛa sìɛ, à mↄ pila ma bɛ. Ɔ̃ wa aà yã́zɛ èɛ.
Zĩewa kɛ́ wálɛ gɛ́ wabikɛkĩi, wa kpaaũ ń zↄnↄɛ pↄ́ tã́a mlɛ̃ vĩo. Aà diiↄ ì ↄ̃a e maamaa aà àsi'oanɛ́ yã́ musu.
Ɔ̃ à bↄ̀ tɛ́wázi, wápiↄ ń Pↄluo, àlɛ wiilɛ à mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃́ beeↄá Lua Musude zↄ̀blenaↄnɛ, aalɛ suabazɛ kpàwakɛɛ́.
Ìↄ kɛ màa lá gu lɛ́ dↄ, ↄ̃ yã́pi Pↄlu wã̀. À lìli ò tã́apiɛ: Má ònɛ ń Yesu Kilisi tↄ́o, go nↄɛpiwa. Ɔ̃ à gòwà gↄ̃̀ↄ.
Kɛ́ aà diiↄ è ài'ea aà yã́ musu tãmaa ń nɛ́, ↄ̃ aa Pↄlu ń Silivɛ̃ɛo kũ̀ aa ń gálɛ gɛ̀ńnↄ gbãadeↄ kĩ́i gãaɛ.
Aa gɛ̀ńnↄ yã́kpalɛkɛnaↄ kĩ́i aa mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃́ɛ beeↄá Yudaↄnɛ, mɛ́ aalɛ wá wɛ̃́lɛ ↄ̃̀ↄkpa.
Fɛlɛkaayã pↄ́ wá Lomadeↄ ikoyã gì wà si ge wà kɛ ↄ̃ aalɛ danɛ́.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ fɛ̀lɛńnↄ dasi, ↄ̃ yã́kpalɛkɛnapiↄ mɛ̀ wà ń ulaↄ wolomá, wà ń gbɛ̃ ń goo.
Kɛ́ wà gbɛ̃a gbãa kɛ̀nɛ́, ↄ̃ wà ń dá kpɛ́u, wa ò kpɛ́pi dↄ̃̀anaɛ aà ń dↄ̃́a maamaa.
Kɛ́ wa òɛ̀ màa, ↄ̃ à ń dá kpɛ́pi guonau, à ń gbáↄ dàliu gíũgiũ.
Wɛɛdo taawa Pↄlu ń Silivɛ̃ɛo lɛ́ wabikɛ Luawa, aalɛ aà táasilɛ, mɛ́ dakpɛunaↄ lɛ́ swã́kpa ń yã́i.
Kã́ndo tↄↄlɛ lùalua ń gbãao e kpɛ́pi gĩↄ dèe. Wegↄ̃ↄ a gbaↄ wɛ̃̀wɛ̃ píi, ↄ̃ dakpɛunaↄ mↄdaonaↄ pòlomá píi.
Kɛ́ kpɛdↄ̃ana vù, à gbaↄ è wɛ̃wɛ̃a píi, ↄ̃ à a fɛ̃nda wò, a ye azĩa dɛ, asa àlɛ e dakpɛunaↄ bàasiɛ.
Ɔ̃ Pↄlu pũ̀na ń lↄↄ gbãao à mɛ̀: Ńsu ĩakpa nzĩaio. Wá kú la wápii.
Kpɛdↄ̃anapi mɛ̀ wà mↄ́ ń filiao, ↄ̃ à sìńzi ń bao à kùlɛ Pↄlu ń Silivɛ̃ɛo aɛ, àlɛ kpakpanaga.
À bↄ̀ńnↄ bàasi, ↄ̃ à mɛ̀: Maeↄ, kpelewa má kɛ mà zia'ei?
Aa òɛ̀: Dii Yesu náaikɛ, ńyↄ̃ zia e, mpi ń n bɛdeↄ píi.
Ɔ̃ aa Dii yã'òɛ̀ ń a bɛ gbɛ̃́ↄ píi.
Wɛɛdo bee, kpɛdↄ̃anapi ń sɛ́ à gɛ̀ ń gu'ĩaↄ pìpinɛ́, ↄ̃ à da'ilɛkɛ̀ gↄ̃̀ↄ ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ ḿpii.
Ɔ̃ à gɛ̃̀ńnↄ a bɛ à blɛkɛ̀nɛ́. Aàpi ń a bɛdeↄ an pↄ kɛ̀na maamaa, kɛ́ aa Lua náaikɛ̀ yã́i.
Kɛ́ gu dↄ̀, yã́kpalɛkɛnaↄ dↄaiↄ zĩ̀ aa gɛ o wà gbɛ̃́piↄ gbaɛ.
Ɔ̃ kpɛdↄ̃anapi ò Pↄluɛ: Yã́kpalɛkɛnaↄ gbɛ̃́ↄ zĩ̀a mà á gbaɛ. À bↄlɛ, í á taanankɛ.
Ɔ̃ Pↄlu ò dↄaipiↄnɛ: Aa wá gbɛ̃́ bíla wáa yã́kpalɛkɛawanↄ sai, aa wá dá kpɛ́u, wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lomadeↄn wá ũ. Tiasa ↄ̃ aa ye wá bↄlɛ asii guua? Ó'o! A kɛ màao. Sema aa mↄ wá bↄlɛ ńzĩa.
Dↄaipiↄ yã́pi sɛ̀lɛ ò yã́kpalɛkɛnaↄnɛ. Kɛ́ aa mà Lomadeↄn ń ũ, ↄ̃ vĩa ń kṹ.
Ɔ̃ aa mↄ̀ awakpànɛ́ aa ń bↄ́lɛ kpɛ́u, ↄ̃ aa wabikɛ̀má aa bↄnɛ́ ń wɛ̃́lɛu.
Kɛ́ aa bↄ̀lɛ kpɛ́u, aa gɛ̀ Lidi bɛ. Aa Yesudeↄ lè we, ↄ̃ aa ń nↄ̀sɛ nìninɛ́ aa gɛ̃̀zɛa.
Aa bↄ̀lɛ ń Amfipↄlio ń Apↄlonio, ↄ̃ aa kà Tɛsaloni, gu pↄ́ Yudaↄ lousisikpɛ kúu.
Ɔ̃ Pↄlu gɛ̃̀ lousisikpɛu lá ìↄ kɛwa, à waasokɛ̀nɛ́ yã́ pↄ́ kɛ̃a Luayãtaalau musu kã́mabogↄↄ là àaↄ̃.
Àlɛ a bↄↄlɛkɛnɛ́ lá à kũ̀ Mɛsii taasikɛ, i bↄ gau, à mɛ̀: Yesu pↄ́ málɛ aà yã'oɛ́ mɛ́ Mɛsiipi ũ.
An gbɛ̃eↄ yã́pi zɛ́ è, ↄ̃ aa nà Pↄlu ń Silivɛ̃ɛowa. Màa Gɛlɛki lousisin dasiↄ nàmá sↄ̃ ń nↄɛ tↄde bílaↄ lↄ.
Ɔ̃ Yudaↄ ĩ́isɛ̀ńnↄ, aa bɛ̀bɛmpãdeↄ kã̀aa aa dasikũ̀, ↄ̃ aa wɛ̃́lɛ lòo. Aa gɛ̀ lìa Zasↄ̃ bɛi, aalɛ Pↄlu ń Silivɛ̃ɛo wɛɛlɛ ń kũ bↄńnↄ balu guu.
Kɛ́ aai ń eo, aa Zasↄ̃ ń Yesude pãleↄ gàlɛ bↄ̀ńnↄ wɛ̃́lɛ gbãadeↄ kĩ́i, aalɛ wiilɛ: Gbɛ̃́piↄá dṹniadɛnaↄnɛ. Aa mↄ̀ la,
ↄ̃ Zasↄ̃ ń dílɛ a bɛ. Gbɛ̃́piↄ lɛ́ pã Sezaa ikoa ḿpii, aaì mɛ kía pãle ku wì mɛ Yesu.
Yã́pi zↄ̃̀ bíla ń wɛ̃́lɛ gbãadeↄ pↄwa.
Ɔ̃ aa ↄ̃asì Zasↄ̃ ń gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄwa aa ń gbáɛ.
Gwãasĩna bee gↄ̃̀ↄ Yesudeↄ Pↄlu ń Silivɛ̃ɛo gbàɛ Belee. Kɛ́ aa kà we, ↄ̃ aa gɛ̃̀ Yudaↄ lousisikpɛu.
Gbɛ̃́ beeↄ nↄ̀sɛ maa dɛ Tɛsalonideↄla, aa Lua yã́ sì ↄplapla. Lá gu lɛ́ dↄ aaìↄ wɛ́tɛ Luayãtaalai, kɛ́ aa e dↄ̃ tó Pↄlu yã́piↄ sĩana vĩ.
An gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Dii náaikɛↄ dasi ń Gɛlɛki nↄɛ gbiaↄ ń Gɛlɛki gↄ̃ɛↄ dasidasi lↄ.
Kɛ́ Tɛsaloni Yudaↄ mà Pↄlu lɛ́ Lua yã́ waasokɛ Belee lↄ, ↄ̃ aa mↄ̀ we, aa yãkele dà aa bíla pↄ fɛ̀lɛ.
Ɔ̃ Yesudeↄ Pↄlu gbàɛ gↄ̃̀ↄ ísia oi, ãma Silivɛ̃ɛ ń Timↄteeo gↄ̃̀ we.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gɛ̀ zɛi Pↄluɛↄ gɛ̀aànↄ Atɛni, ↄ̃ aa ɛ̀a tà Silivɛ̃ɛ ń Timↄteeowa ń Pↄlu lɛgbɛo, à mɛ̀ aa mↄ a le kpakpa.
Kɛ́ Pↄlu lɛ́ ń dã́ Atɛni, aà kã́ fɛ̀lɛ sĩ̀, kɛ́ a è tã́a di wɛ̃́lɛpiu yã́i.
Ɔ̃ à waasokɛ̀ Yudaↄnɛ ń buipãle lousisinaↄ lousisikpɛu ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ìↄ ń le ɛlɛu lá gu lɛ́ dↄↄ.
Pↄlu lɛ́ yãbↄbↄ kↄ̃ lɛ́u ń yãwaaipana pↄ́ wì mɛnɛ́ Ɛpikuliↄ ń Sitoisiↄ. Ɔ̃ an gbɛ̃eↄ mɛ̀: Bↄ́ yã́ dàobãnapi lɛ́ bↄlɛi? Gbɛ̃eↄ mɛ̀: Wálɛ e tã́a dafuↄ yã́ kpàwa àlɛ kɛ. Aa ò màa kɛ àlɛ Yesu yã́ ń aà bↄa gau yã́o baokpanɛ́ yã́iɛ.
Ɔ̃ aa Pↄlu sɛ̀ gɛ̀ò gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ kĩ́i Aleopaga aa mɛ̀: Ńyↄ̃ yã́ dafu pↄ́ ni danɛ́ owɛ̃ɛo lé?
Wa yãbↄnsaɛ màma, wá ye a bↄↄlɛ dↄ̃.
Atɛnideↄ píi ń nibↄ pↄ́ kú weↄ, aaliↄ ye yãpãleio, sema yã́ dafu maa ń a wàaipaao bàasio.
Ɔ̃ Pↄlu fɛ̀lɛ zɛ̀ Aleopagadepiↄ guu à mɛ̀: Atɛnideↄ, má è á misiilɛa tã́aↄnɛ ãia vĩ maamaa yã́pii guu.
Kɛ́ má bɛ á wɛ̃́lɛu, málɛ pↄ́ pↄ́ i kúlɛnɛ́ↄ tàasika, ↄ̃ ma sa'okĩie è, wà lakɛ̃̀wà wà mɛ̀: Lua pↄ́ wá dↄ̃o pↄ́. Lua pↄ́ á aà dↄ̃o mɛ́ álɛ misiilɛɛ̀, aà bao málɛ kpáɛ́.
Lua dṹnia kɛ̀ ń pↄ́ pↄ́ kú a guuↄ píi. A dɛ musu ń tↄↄlɛo Dii ũ, ìliↄ ku kpɛ́ pↄ́ gbɛ̃nazĩnaↄ dↄ̀ɛↄ guuo.
Aà bàa kú ń gbɛ̃nazĩna dↄnlɛeoo. Aàpi mɛ́ ì wɛ̃ni ń nisĩnao ń pↄ́piio kpa gbɛ̃́piiwa.
À bui píi bↄ̀ gbɛ̃́ mɛ̀ndo kĩ́iɛ, ↄ̃ aa ku dṹnia gola síiↄ̃ píiu. À dↄ̀aa gↄↄdìlɛdilɛ bui píiɛ ń gu pↄ́ aaↄ kuu lɛ́o.
À ń kɛ́ kɛ́ aaↄ a wɛɛlɛ aa ↄmalɛmalɛ e aa gɛ bↄwa. Baa ń beeo a zã̀ ń wá gbɛ̃eoo.
Asa aàpi mɛ́ ì to wàↄ wɛ̃ni vĩ, wíↄ ku, wí fↄ̃ wà wá mɛ sɛ́. Lá á lakɛ̃naeↄ ò aa mɛ̀: Wá dɛ aà buiↄ ũ sↄ̃.
Lá Lua buiↄn wá ũ, wásu wàↄ e a dɛ lán tã́a pↄ́ gbɛ̃nazĩna kɛ̀ ń vuao ń ã́nusuo ń gbɛo à gↄ̃inakɛ̀wà lá a yeiwawao.
Lua wɛkpà a vĩ̀ wá wɛ́siagↄↄ yã́la, ↄ̃ àlɛ lɛda gbɛ̃́ↄwa gupiiu tia aa nↄ̀sɛlilɛ.
Asa à gↄↄdìlɛ, kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ á sɛ̀ a yã́kpalɛkɛ ń dṹniao a zɛ́wa. Lua gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a sɛ̀pi bↄ̀ gau, kɛ́ gbɛ̃́pii e dↄ̃.
Kɛ́ aa bↄa gau yã́pi mà, an gbɛ̃eↄ aà láanikɛ̀, ãma an gbɛ̃eↄ mɛ̀: Wá n yã́pi ma zĩewa lↄ.
Ɔ̃ Pↄlu bↄ̀ ń kĩ́i.
Gbɛ̃eↄ nàwà aa Yesu náaikɛ̀. Aleopaga gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ do pↄ́ wì mɛ Denisi kú ń guu ń nↄɛ pↄ́ wì mɛɛ̀ Damalio ń gbɛ̃eↄ lↄ.
Bee gbɛa Pↄlu bↄ̀ Atɛni à gɛ̀ Kↄlɛni.
À kpàaũ ń Yudaeo we, Pↄ̃ntu bùsu gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wì mɛɛ̀ Akilasi ń a na Pisiio. Aa sù ń Itali bùsuo dafu, kɛ́ Sezaa Kolodi dìlɛ Yudaↄnɛ aa bↄlɛ Loma yã́i. Pↄlu gɛ̀ ń kĩ́i,
ↄ̃ à pìlamá, àlɛ zĩkɛńnↄ, kɛ́ ↄzĩdoũkɛnaↄn ń ũ yã́i. Asa zwã̀akpɛkɛnaↄn ń ũ ḿpii.
Kã́mabogↄↄzĩ píi ì waasokɛ lousisikpɛu, àlɛ wɛɛlɛ Yudaↄ ń Gɛlɛkiↄ a yã́zɛ e.
Kɛ́ Silivɛ̃ɛ ń Timↄteeo bↄ̀ Masedoni bùsuu aa kà, Pↄlu zɛ̀ ń waasokɛao, àlɛ o Yudaↄnɛ wásawasa Yesu mɛ́ Mɛsii ũ.
Kɛ́ Yudaↄ ĩ́isɛ̀aànↄ aa aà sↄ̃̀sↄ̃, ↄ̃ à a pↄkasaↄ kpòɛńla à mɛ̀: Yã́ pↄ́ á kɛ̀ wí á musu, ma yã́n lↄo. Za tia má gɛ́ buipãleↄ kĩ́iɛ.
Bↄa we à gɛ̀ pìla buipãle lousisina pↄ́ wì mɛɛ̀ Titiu Yusitu bɛ lousisikpɛpi saɛ.
Lousisikpɛ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ Kilisipu Dii náaikɛ̀ ń a bɛdeↄ píi. Kↄlɛnideↄ Pↄlu yãmà dasi, ↄ̃ aa Yesu náaikɛ̀ aa da'ilɛkɛ̀.
Gwãasĩna Dii ò Pↄluɛ iu à mɛ̀: Ńsu to vĩa n kũo, ńsu kã́mabo ń yã'oanɛ́oo,
asa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛ ma pↄ́ ũ wɛ̃́lɛɛ bee guuↄ dasi. Má kunnↄ, gbɛ̃e a n kũ à ĩadamao.
Ɔ̃ Pↄlu wɛ̃̀ do ń mↄ sooloo kɛ̀ we, ìↄ Lua yãda gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ Loma gbɛ̃́ Galiↄ̃ dɛ Gɛlɛsi bùsu gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ, Yudaↄ lɛdoũkɛ̀ aa ã̀na Pↄluwa, aa gɛ̀aànↄ yã́kpalɛkɛkĩi
aa mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃́ɛ bee lɛ́ tɛ́kpa gbɛ̃́ↄgu aaↄ lousisiyã pↄ́ pãa wá ikoyãla kũaɛ.
Kɛ́ Pↄlu ye yã'o, ↄ̃ Galiↄ̃ ò Yudaↄnɛ à mɛ̀: Yudaↄ, tó dàae ge tàae zↄ̃ↄeɛ yãa, à kũ̀ mà mɛnakɛánↄ.
Lá álɛ yãkeletã gbɛ̃́ↄ tↄ́ yã́ musu ń ázĩa ikoyão, à gↄ̃̀ á yã́ ũɛ. Ma gi yã́ bee taa gↄ̃́gↄ̃iɛ.
Ɔ̃ à ń yá ń bↄ́lɛ yã́kpalɛkɛkpɛu.
Ɔ̃ aa ã̀na lousisikpɛ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ Sↄsɛniwa ḿpii, aa aà gbɛ̃̀gbɛ̃ yã́kpalɛkɛkpɛ kpɛɛlɛ. Galiↄ̃ i a yãdao.
Pↄlu gↄↄplakɛ̀ Kↄlɛni lↄ, ↄ̃ à lɛzà Yesudeↄwa à gɛ̃̀ gó'ilɛnau, àlɛ tá Sili bùsuu. Pisii ń Akilasio gɛ̀aànↄ. À mibò Sãkele lɛ́ pↄ́ a kɛ̀ Luawa yã́i.
Kɛ́ aa kà Ɛfɛsɛ, Pↄlu Pisii ń Akilasio tò we. À gɛ̀ lousisikpɛu à waasokɛ̀ Yudaↄnɛ,
ↄ̃ aa wabikɛ̀wà aà gↄↄplakɛńnↄ. I weio,
ãma kɛ́ àlɛ lɛzamá à mɛ̀: Tó Lua wèi, má ɛa mↄ́ á gwai. Ɔ̃ à bↄ̀ Ɛfɛsɛ ń gó'ilɛnao.
Kɛ́ à kà Sezale, à gɛ̀ fↄkpà Yesudeↄwa Yelusalɛũ, ↄ̃ à tà Antiↄsi.
Kɛ́ à gↄↄplakɛ̀ we, à ɛ̀a dàzɛu à gɛ̀ wɛ̃́lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛo Galati bùsuu ń Filizi bùsuo, à Yesudeↄ gbà gbãa ḿpii.
Yudae ku, aà tↄ́n Apoloo, Alɛsãndi gbɛ̃́ɛ. Aà lɛ́ na mɛ́ a Lua yã́ dↄ̃ maamaa.
Wà Dii zɛ́ yãdàdaɛ̀, ↄ̃ Yesu yã'oanɛ́ aà kãsì. Ì dadanɛ́ a zɛ́wa, ãma Zãa gbɛ̃́ↄ da'ilɛkɛa ↄ̃ a dↄ̃. À mↄ̀ Ɛfɛsɛ,
ↄ̃ à nà yã'oawa lousisikpɛu vĩasai. Kɛ́ Pisii ń Akilasio aà yãmà, ↄ̃ aa aà sìsi aa Lua zɛ́ bↄↄlɛkɛ̀ɛ̀ wásawasa.
Kɛ́ Apoloo ye gɛ́ Gɛlɛsi bùsuu, Yesudeↄ aà gbà sↄ̃, ↄ̃ aa lakɛ̃ Yesude pↄ́ kú weↄnɛ aa aà kũ ↄplapla. Kɛ́ à kà we, à ↄdà gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua gbɛ̃kɛkɛ̀nɛ́ aa Yesu náaikɛ̀ↄwa maamaa.
Asa aà yã́ Yudaↄ wɛ̃̀ dasi wáa máũmaũ, à ↄ̀lↄnɛ́ Luayãtaalau kɛ́ Yesu mɛ́ Mɛsii ũ.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ Apoloo ku Kↄlɛni, Pↄlu Azi bùsu sĩ̀sĩↄ baa vĩ̀, ↄ̃ à kà Ɛfɛsɛ. À Yesudeeↄ lè we,
ↄ̃ à ń lá à mɛ̀: Kɛ́ a Dii náaikɛ̀, aà Nisĩna dìɛ́a? Aa wèwà aa mɛ̀: Aawo, wi aà Nisĩna kua yãma seo.
Ɔ̃ à ń lá à mɛ̀: Da'ilɛ kpele á kɛ̀i? Aa wèwà aa mɛ̀: Zãa pↄ́ɛ.
Ɔ̃ Pↄlu ònɛ́: Zãa gbɛ̃́ↄ da'ilɛkɛ̀ an nↄ̀sɛlilɛa seela ũɛ. A ò gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ aa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a mↄ a kpɛ náaikɛ. Yesu àlɛ o.
Kɛ́ aa yã́pi mà, aa da'ilɛkɛ̀ ń Dii Yesu tↄ́o.
Kɛ́ Pↄlu ↄnàmá, Lua Nisĩna dìnɛ́, ↄ̃ aa yãebui'ò aa ãnabikɛkɛ̀.
Gbɛ̃́piↄ píi kà lán gbɛ̃ↄn kuɛpla taawa.
Pↄlu ìↄ gɛ́ lousisikpɛu e mↄ àaↄ̃. À yã'ònɛ́ vĩasai, àlɛ waasokɛ kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i yã́ musu, kɛ́ aa a yã́zɛ e.
Ãma an gbɛ̃eↄ swã́gbãakɛ̀, aai Lua yã́ sio, ↄ̃ aa zɛ́pi bɛ̃̀ɛbò dasi guu. Ɔ̃ Pↄlu gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Yesu náaikɛ̀ↄ sɛ̀lɛ aa bↄ̀ ń guu. Ɔ̃ ìↄ waasokɛ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ Tilanu kyókpɛu lá gu lɛ́ dↄ.
A kɛ̀ màa e wɛ̃̀ pla, ↄ̃ Azi bùsudeↄ Dii yãmà, Yudaↄ ń Gɛlɛkiↄ píi.
Lua Pↄlu gbà zɛ́ à dabudabu bↄnsaɛↄ kɛ̀.
Beewa baa tó wà isimawaabↄↄ ge fùaↄ nà Pↄlu mɛwa wà gɛ nà gyãeↄwa, aaì gbã́gbãɛ, an tã́aↄ ì gɛ̃zɛa.
Yuda tã́agona pↄ́ aaìↄ bɛbɛeↄ wɛ̀ɛlɛ tã́a gò ń Dii Yesu tↄ́o aa mɛ̀: Wá òɛ́ ń Yesu pↄ́ Pↄlu ì a yã́ waasokɛ tↄ́o, à go.
Yudaↄ sa'onkia pↄ́ wì mɛ Seva nɛgↄ̃ɛ gbɛ̃ↄn soplaↄ mɛ́ ì kɛ màa.
Ɔ̃ tã́a ònɛ́: Má Yesu dↄ̃ mɛ́ ma Pↄlu bao mà. Ápiↄ sↄ̃, dén á ũi?
Ɔ̃ tã́adepi kùsimá à gbãamↄ̀nɛ́, à ń kwɛ́ píi à ń kɛkɛ'ĩa, ↄ̃ aa bàalɛ̀ bↄ̀lɛ uapiu puizi.
Kɛ́ Ɛfɛsɛdeↄ yã́pi mà, Yudaↄ ń Gɛlɛkiↄ píi, vĩa ń kṹ, ↄ̃ Dii Yesu tↄbↄ̀ maamaa.
Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa Yesu náaikɛ̀ↄ mↄ̀ dasi, aalɛ ń yãkɛaↄ o gupuau.
Gbɛ̃kↄↄlɛkɛnaeↄ ń taalaↄ nàaa mↄ kàtɛu bíla wáa. Kɛ́ wà lápiↄ ↄ̃a dↄ̀dↄ, wa è à kà ã́nusu ↄwatɛ̃ ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ blakwi (50.000).
Beewa ↄ̃ Dii yã́ ìↄ kã́fĩ, ìↄ ↄta ń gbãao.
Yã́ bee gbɛa Pↄlu zɛ̀ò a nↄ̀sɛ guu à bↄlɛ ń Masedoni bùsuo ń Gɛlɛsi bùsuo, i gɛ́ Yelusalɛũ, à mɛ̀: Tó ma gɛ we, sema mà gɛ́ Lomadeↄ gwai.
Ɔ̃ à a dↄnlɛde gbɛ̃ↄn plaeↄ Timↄtee ń Elasao zĩ̀ Masedoni. Aàpi sↄ̃ à gↄ̃̀ Azi bùsuu gĩa.
Gↄↄ bee ↄ̃ yãkele fɛ̀lɛ maamaa Dii zɛ́ yã́ musu.
Ãnusupinae ku wì mɛɛ̀ Demɛtiu, ì Aatɛmi tã́akpɛ taa pí ń ã́nusuo. Aà zĩkɛnaↄ ì ài zↄ̃ↄ e zĩpiwa.
Ɔ̃ à ń kãaa ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì zĩ bee taa kɛↄ, a ònɛ́: Gbɛ̃́ↄ, á dↄ̃ kɛ́ ↄzĩɛ bee mɛ́ wá blekĩi ũ.
Álɛ e mɛ́ álɛ ma lá Pↄlupi lɛ́ kɛ, à mɛ̀: Tã́a pↄ́ wà ń píↄá luaↄ no. Ɔ̃ à gbɛ̃́ dasiↄ mi lìaa, wà aà yã́zɛ è. I kɛ Ɛfɛsɛ la ado no, ń Azi bùsuo píiɛ.
Yã́ bee a fↄ̃ músi'iwɛ̃ɛ. I kɛ wá ↄzĩ yãfũkũa ado no, a yã́ a to tã́a nↄɛzↄ̃ↄ Aatɛmi kpɛ́ gↄ̃ pↄe ũo, tã́a pↄ́ Azi bùsudeↄ ń dṹnia gbɛ̃́piio ì kúlɛɛ̀pi gawi a láaɛ.
Kɛ́ aa yã́pi mà, an pↄ pà, ↄ̃ aa nà wiiwa aa mɛ̀: Ɛfɛsɛdeↄ Aatɛmi zↄ̃ↄ.
Wɛ̃́lɛ lòo, gbɛ̃́ↄ bàalɛ̀ lɛ́ si kↄ̃kãaakɛkĩiu, ↄ̃ wà Masedoni bùsu gbɛ̃ↄn pla Gaiusi ń Alisaka pↄ́ aaì gɛ́ wɛ̃́lɛu ń Pↄluoↄ kũ̀ gɛ̀ńnↄ.
Pↄlu ye gɛ̃ zã guu, ↄ̃ Yesudeↄ i weiɛ̀o.
Azi bùsu gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄeↄ dɛ aà gbɛ̃naↄ ũ, ↄ̃ aa gbɛ̃́ↄ zĩ̀ aa lɛdàwà asu gɛ̃ zãuo.
Kↄ̃kãaa yà, wàlɛ wiilɛ, wàlɛ kↄ̃ yãmao, asa gbɛ̃́ daside dↄ̃ bↄ́yãi wà kã̀aaio.
Yudaↄ ↄzↄ̃̀ Alɛsãndazi aà yã'o, ↄ̃ bíla guu gbɛ̃eↄ lɛ́ lɛdↄdↄwà. Alɛsãndapi ↄkɛ̀nɛ́ aa nílɛ, a ye Yudaↄ mi bↄ bíla wáa.
Kɛ́ wà aà dↄ̃̀ Yuda ũ, ↄ̃ ampii aa wiilɛ̀ sãnusãnu mↄ̀ pla taawa aa mɛ̀: Ɛfɛsɛdeↄ Aatɛmi zↄ̃ↄ.
Ɔ̃ wɛ̃́lɛ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ń zↄa zɛ̀ à mɛ̀: Ɛfɛsɛdeↄ, gbɛ̃́pii dↄ̃ kɛ́ á dɛ tã́a zↄ̃ↄ Aatɛmi kpɛ́ dↄ̃̀ana ũ ń luakimↄo pↄ́ kú weo.
Lá gbɛ̃e a fↄ̃ bↄ bee kpɛo, à ázĩa kũ tɛɛɛ. Ásu yãe kɛ ń nↄnwãaoo.
A mↄ́ ń gbɛ̃́ɛↄ la, aai ↄkã wá tã́akpɛ pↄewao, aai wá tã́a tↄbɛ̃ɛsio.
Ayãmɛto tó Demɛtiu ń a zĩkɛnaↄ yãvĩ ń gbɛ̃eo, yã́kpalɛkɛgↄↄↄ kú ń yãkɛkɛnaↄ. Aa gɛ́ kↄ̃ gbɛa we.
Tó á yãpãle vĩ lↄ, wa gↄ̃́gↄ̃ɛ́ kↄ̃kãaa pↄ́ gbãadeↄ gbɛ̀a guu.
Asa wa fↄ̃ wá tàae e zↄa pↄ́ kɛ̀ gbãɛ bee musu. Wá yã́zɛde e o zↄapi musuo, asa a gbá vĩo.
Kɛ́ zↄa làa, Pↄlu Yesudeↄ kã̀aa à ń gba sↄ̃, à lɛzàmá, ↄ̃ à gɛ̀ Masedoni.
Kɛ́ àlɛ pã bùsupia, à gbɛ̃́ↄ gbà sↄ̃ ń yã́ↄ dasi, ↄ̃ à gɛ̀ kàò Gɛlɛsi,
ↄ̃ à mↄ àaↄ̃ kɛ̀ we. Kɛ́ àlɛ gɛ́ gɛ̃i gó'ilɛnau à ta Sili bùsuu, a mà Yudaↄ lɛkpàaĩazi, ↄ̃ à zɛ̀ò à ɛa tá ń Masedonio.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gɛ̀aànↄↄ tↄ́n kɛ: Belee gbɛ̃́ Pilusi nɛ́ Sↄpatɛɛ ń Tɛsaloni gbɛ̃́ↄ Alisaka ń Sɛkↄ̃duo ń Dɛɛbɛ gbɛ̃́ Gaiusio ń Timↄteeo ń Azi bùsu gbɛ̃́ↄ Tisiki ń Tↄfiũo.
Gbɛ̃́ beeↄ dↄ̀aa gɛ̀ lɛ́ wá dã́ Toloasi.
Wápiↄ sↄ̃, Kàaso dikpɛ gbɛa wa gɛ̃ gó'ilɛnau Filipi, ↄ̃ gↄↄ sↄo gbɛa wa ń lé Toloasi. We wa ãsↄ̃a do dɛ̀u.
Ãsↄ̃anɛnzĩ wa kↄ̃ kã̀aa wà Dii dↄngubↄ ble. Pↄlu lɛ́ waasokɛnɛ́, a ye ta tó gu dↄ̀ɛ, ↄ̃ à dàyãla e wɛɛdo.
Filia dasi kú kpɛ́ lɛsĩ pↄ́ wá kãaaaupiu.
Ɛ̀waasoe zↄ̃lɛa fɛnɛntiu, wì mɛɛ̀ Ɛtiki, àlɛ igofampa. Kɛ́ Pↄlu waasokɛa kɛ̀ gbã̀a, i aà lɛ̀, ↄ̃ à bↄ̀ za kpɛdiakↄ̃api àaↄ̃de fɛnɛntiu à lɛ̀lɛ, ↄ̃ wà aà sɛ̀ gɛ̀.
Ɔ̃ Pↄlu pìla à kùsiwà, ↄ̃ à aà sɛ kpà a kùɛ à mɛ̀: Ásu gilikɛo, a bɛ̃́ɛ.
Kɛ́ à ɛ̀a dɛ̀dɛ musu, wa Dii dↄngubↄ blè. Pↄlu yã'ò maamaa e gu gɛ̀ dↄ̀ò, ↄ̃ à dàzɛu.
Ɔ̃ wà tà ń ɛ̀waasonapio bɛ̃́ɛ, gbɛ̃́ↄ nↄ̀sɛ nìni a dɛ beeao.
Wápiↄ sↄ̃ wa gɛ gɛ̃ gó'ilɛnau, wa dↄaa Pↄluɛ Aso, wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ wá aà sɛu. Màa à zɛ̀ò, asa a ye gɛ́ we kɛ̀sɛɛ.
Kɛ́ à wá lé Aso, ↄ̃ wa aà sɛ̀ wa gɛ Mitilɛni.
Kɛ́ a gu dↄ̀, wa bↄ we ń gó'ilɛnao, wa gɛ Kio. Gu sìa dↄa wa gɛ Samↄ, a gↄↄ àaↄ̃de ↄ̃ wa ka Milɛti.
Pↄlu zɛ̀ò yãa à dↄ Ɛfɛsɛzi, kɛ́ gↄↄ su gɛ̃wa Azi bùsuuo yã́i, asa àlɛ wã à e ka Yelusalɛũ e Pãteko dikpɛ àↄ kaɛ, tó a zɛkɛ̀.
Pↄlu gbɛ̃́ↄ zĩ̀ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄwa Ɛfɛsɛ, à mɛ̀ aa mↄ Milɛti.
Kɛ́ aa kà, ↄ̃ a ònɛ́: Á dↄ̃ lá mi kɛ gↄↄ pↄ́ má kúánↄ za zĩ́ pↄ́ ma gbapɛ̀lɛ Azi bùsula.
Ma zĩkɛ̀ Diiɛ zĩabusaa guu ń wɛ́'io. Ma taasikɛ̀ lɛ́ pↄ́ Yudaↄ kpàaĩmaziↄ yã́i.
Mi kã́fĩa yãe ulɛɛ́o, ma waasokɛ̀ɛ́, má dàdaɛ́ balu guu ń á bɛↄ.
Ma lɛdà Yudaↄwa ń Gɛlɛkiↄ píi aa zɛ ń Luao, aai wá Dii Yesu náaikɛ.
Tiasa málɛ gɛ́ Yelusalɛũ, lá Lua Nisĩna ma dauwa, yã́ pↄ́ a ma le we dↄ̃sai.
Wɛ̃́lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛo Lua Nisĩna lɛ́ omɛɛ, yea ń mↄdaonao ń wɛ́tɛ̃ao lɛ́ ma dã́.
Ãma ma wɛ̃ni gbiamɛɛ lↄo, sema mà yã́ pↄ́ málɛ yá le, mà zĩ pↄ́ Dii Yesu dàmɛɛ kɛ mà a midɛ. Ɔ̃mɛ Lua gbɛ̃kɛ baokpaa gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ ũ.
Á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ma bɛbɛ á guu, ma kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i waasokɛ̀ɛ́ↄ, má dↄ̃ tiasa kɛ́ wá wɛsikↄ̃lɛ lↄo.
Ayãmɛto má òɛ́ gbã, tó á gbɛ̃e su vũaa, ma yã́n bee ũ lↄo.
Ma Lua pↄeã píi òɛ́, mi a kee ulɛɛ́o.
À laaidↄ ázĩawa ń sã pↄ́ Lua Nisĩna á dílɛ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ũↄ píi. À Lua gãlide pↄ́ à ń bó ń azĩa auopiↄ gwa.
Má dↄ̃ kɛ́ ma taa gbɛa àwalɛwan pãsĩↄ siágu, mɛ́ aa sãↄ wɛ̃na vĩo.
Baa á gbɛ̃eↄ fɛlɛ yã́ kolea danɛ́, aa gbɛ̃́ↄ ga namá.
Ayãmɛto à itɛ̃kɛ. Lá ma lɛdà á baadewa ń wɛ́'io gwãasĩna ń fãanɛo e wɛ̃̀ àaↄ̃ kã́mabosai, a yã́ àↄ dↄágu.
Tiasa málɛ á na Luaɛ a ↄzĩ ń a gbɛ̃kɛyã pↄ́ a fↄ̃ gbãa kã́fĩɛ́o, i á gba zɛ́ á baa àↄ daaa ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ píi.
Mi gbɛ̃e ↄ̃a ge aà pↄkasae nidɛo.
Á dↄ̃ ázĩawa, kɛ́ ma zĩkɛ̀ ń mazĩa ↄoɛ, ↄ̃ ma pↄ́ pↄ́ wálɛ a nidɛ ń ma gbɛ̃́ↄ è.
Má ↄ̀lↄɛ́ apii guu à zĩkɛ beewa, í dↄ yɛ̃̀ɛɛsaideↄlɛ. Yã́ pↄ́ Dii Yesu ò àↄ dↄágu à mɛ̀, gbadaa pↄna vĩ dɛ gba'eala.
Yã́ bee oa gbɛa à kùlɛ a kosowa ń ń baade píio, aa wabikɛ̀.
Aa wɛ́'ikàu ḿpii, aa Pↄlu kpàkpa ń kùɛ, aa lɛpɛ̀pɛwà.
Yã́ pↄ́ ń pↄ siakũ̀ zↄ̃ↄ mɛ́ dɛ kɛ́ à mɛ̀ ń wɛ́ a sikↄ̃lɛ lↄo ũ. Ɔ̃ aa gɛ̀ zɛiɛ̀ e gó'ilɛna kĩ́i.
Wá kɛ̃amá gbɛa wa gɛ̃ gó'ilɛnau wa dazɛu, wa mipɛ̀ Kosuwa. Gu sìa dↄa wa ka Lode, ↄ̃ bↄa we wa gɛ Patala.
We wa gó'ilɛna pↄ́ lɛ́ gɛ́ Fenisi bùsuu èu, ↄ̃ wa gɛ̃u wa dazɛu.
Kɛ́ wa Sipi è kãaa, wá gbà ↄzɛɛ, wálɛ gɛ́ Sili bùsuu, ↄ̃ wa ka Tii, gu pↄ́ wà gó'ilɛna aso bↄ̀lɛu.
Wa Yesudeↄ wɛ̀ɛlɛ, ↄ̃ wa ãsↄ̃a do kɛ̀ńnↄ. An gbɛ̃eↄ ò Pↄluɛ ń Lua Nisĩna gbãao asu gɛ́ Yelusalɛũo.
Ãma kɛ gↄↄ beeↄ lɛ́ pà, wa fɛlɛ, wálɛ tá. Aa gɛ̀ zɛiwɛ̃ɛ ḿpii ń ń naↄ ń ń nɛ́ↄ wɛ̃́nkpɛ e ísialɛ. Ɔ̃ wa kulɛ wá kosowa wa wabikɛ̀.
Kɛ́ wa lɛzàkↄ̃wa, wa gɛ̃ gó'ilɛnau. Ampiↄ sↄ̃ aa ɛ̀a ń bɛ.
Bↄa Tii wa ɛa dazɛu e wa ka Tↄlɛmai. Wa fↄkpà Yesudeↄwa wa kɛńnↄ gↄↄ do.
Kɛ́ a gu dↄ̀, wa fɛlɛ gɛ Sezale, wa gɛ pila baonakpana Filipi bɛ. A dɛ gbɛ̃ↄn sopla pↄ́ wà ń sɛ́ yãaↄ do ũ.
A nɛnↄɛ ãnabiↄ vĩ gbɛ̃ↄn síiↄ̃, aai zãkɛ yãao.
Wa gↄↄplakɛa we guu ãnabi pↄ́ wì mɛɛ̀ Agabu bↄ̀ Yude bùsuu à mↄ̀.
Kɛ́ à mↄ̀ wá kĩ́i, à Pↄlu ula ba sɛ̀ à azĩa gbáↄ ń a ↄↄ yèò à mɛ̀: Lá Lua Nisĩna òn kɛ: Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ baɛ bee vĩ, màa Yudaↄ aa aà ye Yelusalɛũ, aai aà kpa buipãleↄwa.
Kɛ́ wa yã́pi mà, wá ń beleↄ wa awakpà Pↄluɛ asu gɛ́ Yelusalɛũo.
Ɔ̃ à mɛ̀: Bↄ́yãi álɛ ↄ́ↄlↄ álɛ ma nↄ̀sɛ ↄ̃̀ↄkpamɛɛi? Asu àↄ yea ũ seo. Baa tó ma ga Yelusalɛũ Dii Yesu tↄ́ yã́i, ma sↄu mà.
Kɛ́ wi fↄ̃ wa aà fùo, wa kã́mabò wa mɛ̀: Dii pↄeã kɛ.
Bee gbɛa wa sↄukɛ̀, ↄ̃ wa gɛ Yelusalɛũ.
Yesude pↄ́ kú Sezaleeↄ gɛ̀ pìlawanↄ Sipi gbɛ̃́ Manasↄ̃ bɛ. A dɛ Yesude ũ za zi.
Kɛ́ wa ka Yelusalɛũ, Yesudeↄ wá sí ń pↄnao.
Kɛ́ a gu dↄ̀, Pↄlu gɛ̀wanↄ Zaaki bɛ. Gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ kãaaa we ḿpii.
Pↄlu fↄkpàmá, ↄ̃ à yã́ pↄ́ Lua kɛ̀ a zĩ musu buipãleↄ guu dàu a sìunɛ́ dodo píi.
Kɛ́ aa yã́pi mà, aa Lua sáaukpà. Ɔ̃ aa òɛ̀: Yã́pi gwa, wá gbɛ̃́. Yudaↄ Yesu náaikɛ̀ ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ ũma'ũma, mɛ́ ampii aaì kã́asikɛ Mↄizi ikoyãwa.
Wà n yã'ònɛ́ wà mɛ̀, ńlɛ yãda Yuda pↄ́ kú buipãleↄ guuↄnɛ aa bↄ Mↄizi ikoyã kpɛ, aasu tↄ̃zↄ̃ ń nɛ́ↄnɛo, aasu wàↄ ń fɛlɛkaayãↄ kũao.
Wá kɛa ni? Asa aa gí n mↄa maio.
Kɛ lá wá onɛwa. Wá guu gbɛ̃ↄn síiↄ̃eↄ lɛkɛ̀ Luawa.
Ǹ ń sɛ́ à gɛ gbãbↄ ázĩaɛ, ní ń fĩabo aa e mibo, gbɛ̃́pii iↄ dↄ̃ kɛ́ yã́ pↄ́ aa mà n musuá sĩana no. Aa e mpi sↄ̃ ń tɛ́ Mↄizi ikoyãi.
Buipãle Yesudeↄ sↄ̃, wa lakɛ̃ wá ònɛ́ wa zɛò aa laaika sa'onↄↄi ń kpàao ń nↄ̀ↄ kòlokpasai sóao ń gbãsĩkɛao.
Ɔ̃ Pↄlu gbɛ̃́piↄ sɛ̀ tàńnↄ. Kɛ́ a gu dↄ̀ aa gbãbↄ̀ ńzĩaɛ, ↄ̃ à gɛ̃̀ Lua ua, à gbãbↄ láagↄↄ sa pↄ́ wa o an baadeɛ yã'ò.
Kɛ́ gbãbↄa gↄↄ sopla bee kà láaa, Azi bùsu Yudaeↄ Pↄlu è Lua ua. Aa tɛkpà bílagu, ↄ̃ aa aà kũ̀.
Aalɛ wiilɛ aalɛ mɛ: Isailiↄ, à wá leò. Gbɛ̃́ɛ bee mɛ́ ìↄ yãda gbɛ̃́piiɛ gupiiu, ì Isailiↄ awiambↄ ń Mↄizi ikoyão ń guɛ beeo. Bee gbɛa à dↄ̀ɛ Lua uawa lↄ, à gɛ̃̀u ń Gɛlɛkiↄ.
Aa ò màa kɛ́ aa Ɛfɛsɛ gbɛ̃́ Tↄfiũ è ń Pↄluo wɛ̃́lɛ guu yãa yã́iɛ, ↄ̃ aalɛ e Pↄlu gɛ̃̀aànↄ Lua uaɛ.
Wɛ̃́lɛ lòo, gbɛ̃́ↄ wì ń bao za gupiiu, aa mↄ̀ Pↄlu kũ̀ Lua ua, aa aà gàlɛ bↄ̀ò. Wegↄ̃ↄ wà a gbaↄ tàta.
Kɛ́ aa ye aa aà dɛ, yã́pi bao Loma sosaↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ lè, a mà Yelusalɛũ lòo.
Wegↄ̃ↄ à sosa badeↄ sɛ̀ ń sosa nɛ́ↄ, ↄ̃ aa gɛ̃̀má ń bao. Kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ↄ sosaↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi è ń sosaↄ sãnu, aa Pↄlu gbɛ̃a tò.
Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi sↄ̃̀ Pↄluzi, à aà kũ̀ à mɛ̀ wà aà ye ń mↄdaonaↄ mɛ̀n pla. À ń lá à mɛ̀: Dén gbɛ̃́pi ũi? Bↄ́ yã́ a kɛ̀i?
Ɔ̃ bíla guu gbɛ̃́ↄ lɛ́ wiilɛ, aalɛ yã́ doũ oo. Kɛ́ zↄa tò gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi fↄ̃ lɛ́ a súsu mao, à mɛ̀ wà gɛaànↄ sosaↄ bɛ.
Kɛ́ wà kàaànↄ dɛdɛkĩi, sosaↄ mɛ́ sù aà sɛ̀ gbɛ̃́ↄ nↄnↄaaa yã́i.
Asa gbɛ̃́pii tɛaàzi ń wiio, aalɛ mɛ: À aà dɛ.
Kɛ́ wa ye gɛ̃ ń Pↄluo sosaↄ bɛ, ↄ̃ à gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi là à mɛ̀: Ńyↄ̃ we mà yã'onɛ́a? Ɔ̃ a òɛ̀: Ni Gɛlɛki yãmaa?
Egipi gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ fɛ̀lɛ ń gbãadeↄ zĩ́azĩa à gɛ̀ guwaiwaiu ń bùsudɛnaↄ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ síiↄ̃n n ũo lò?
Pↄlu wèwà à mɛ̀: Yudan ma ũ. Wà ma i Taasu, Silisi bùsuuɛ. Wɛ̃́lɛ tↄsaide no. Ma wabikɛ̀ma, ma gba zɛ́ mà yã'o gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ.
À aà gbà zɛ́, ↄ̃ Pↄlu zɛ̀ dɛdɛkĩi, à ↄkɛ̀ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ. Kɛ́ aa nìlɛ kílikili, à yã'ònɛ́ ń Ɛbɛlu yã́o à mɛ̀:
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ ń ma maeↄ, à swã́kpa à ma yã́zɛ ma sa.
Kɛ́ aa mà àlɛ yã'onɛ́ ń Ɛbɛlu yã́o, aa zɛ̀ kílikili. Ɔ̃ Pↄlu mɛ̀:
Yudan ma ũ, wà ma i Taasu, Silisi bùsuuɛ, ↄ̃ ma nɛblè wɛ̃́lɛu la. Gamaliɛli kĩ́i ma ikoyã pↄ́ wá deziↄ kũa dàdau a zɛ́wa. Má ãiavĩ Luaɛ lá á kú gbã ápiiwa.
Ma ĩadà Yesu zɛdeↄwa e an gbɛ̃eↄ gà, ma gↄ̃ɛↄ ń nↄɛↄ kũ̀kũ ma ń ká kpɛ́u.
Sa'onkia ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ mɛ́ ma seeladeↄ ũ ḿpii. Ma lá pↄ́ aa kɛ̃̀ Damasi Yudaↄnɛ sì ń ↄzĩ, málɛ gɛ́ we mà zɛ́pideↄ kṹkũ mà suńnↄ Yelusalɛũ wà ń wɛtã.
Kɛ́ má bɛ zɛ́u, ma kãikũ̀ ń Damasio ĩatɛ̃ minanguo taawa, ↄ̃ kã́ndo gupua zↄ̃ↄ bↄ̀ luabɛ à kùlɛa.
Ma bↄ lɛlɛ tↄↄlɛ, ↄ̃ ma lↄↄ mà, wa òmɛɛ: Sↄlu, Sↄlu, àkɛa ńlɛ ĩadaai?
Ɔ̃ ma mɛ̀: Ḿmɛnn déi Dii? Ɔ̃ a òmɛɛ: Mámɛmaa Yesu Nazalɛti. Mámɛ ńlɛ ĩadaa.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kumanↄↄ gupuapi è, ãma aai gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ yã'omɛɛ lↄↄ mao.
Ɔ̃ ma aà là, kpelewa má kɛi, Dii? Ɔ̃ a òmɛɛ mà fɛlɛ gɛ̃ Damasi, we wa yã́ pↄ́ a dìlɛmɛɛ mà kɛ omɛɛ píi.
Gupuapi í gbãa tò ma wɛ́ lɛ́ gu'e lↄo, ↄ̃ ma gbɛ̃́ↄ ma kũ ma ↄwa, aa gɛ̃̀manↄ Damasi.
Lousisinae ku we wì mɛɛ̀ Ãnania. Ì misiilɛ Lua ikoyãɛ mɛ́ Damasi Yudaↄ píi ì aà tↄnasi.
À mↄ̀ ma kĩ́i à zɛ̀ ma saɛ, ↄ̃ a òmɛɛ: Sↄlu ma gbɛ̃́, ɛa gu'e. Wegↄ̃ↄ ma wɛ́ wɛ̃̀, ↄ̃ ma aà è.
À mɛ̀ wá deziↄ Lua mɛ́ ma sɛ, kɛ́ mà wɛsi Gbɛ̃maalɛ, mà yãma aà lɛ́u, mí aà pↄeã dↄ̃.
À mɛ̀ máↄ dɛ aà seelade ũ, míↄ yã́ pↄ́ má è ń yã́ pↄ́ má mào o gbɛ̃́piiɛ.
Ɔ̃ à mɛ̀ bↄ́ málɛ dã́ lↄi, mà fɛlɛ da'ilɛkɛ, ma duuna i woloa ń a sísiao?
Kɛ́ ma ɛa Yelusalɛũ, málɛ lousisi Lua ua, ↄ̃ ma wɛ́pungu'è.
Ma Dii è, a òmɛɛ mà kɛ mà bↄ Yelusalɛũ kpakpa, asa gbɛ̃́ↄ yã́ pↄ́ málɛ o a musu sio.
Ɔ̃ má ò Diiɛ, aa dↄ̃ sã́asã kɛ́ miↄ gɛ̃ lousisikpɛ ń lousisikpɛo màↄ aà náaikɛnaↄ ká kpɛ́u wàↄ ń gbɛ̃.
Kɛ́ wàlɛ aà seelade Ɛtiɛ̃ɛ dɛ sↄ̃, mapi má kú weɛ, ma zɛ ń aà dɛnaↄ, má ń ulaↄ kũanɛ́.
Ɔ̃ Dii òmɛɛ mà gɛ́, a ma zĩ e buipãleↄ kĩ́i zã̀zãɛ.
Aa swãkpà aà yã́i e à gɛ̀ kà buipãleↄ yã́piwa, ↄ̃ aa nà wiiwa aa mɛ̀: À aà dɛ! Gbɛ̃́ɛ bee taa kua zɛvĩo!
Aalɛ wiilɛ, aalɛ ń ulaↄ gbãɛ, aalɛ bùsuti zu musu.
Ɔ̃ Loma sosaↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ mɛ̀ wà gɛ̃ ń Pↄluo ń bɛ, wà aà gbɛ̃ ń flàalao e aà sĩana'o, wi e yã́ pↄ́ wàlɛ wiidↄwà a yã́i ma.
Kɛ́ wàlɛ Pↄlu ↄↄ poo wà aà ye, a ò sosa bade pↄ́ kú weɛ: Á a zɛ́ vĩ à Loma gbɛ̃́ gbɛ̃ yã́kpalɛkɛsaia?
Kɛ́ sosapi yã́pi mà, à gɛ̀ a ò ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄɛ à mɛ̀: Ńlɛ kɛ kpelewa ni? Gbɛ̃́piá Loma gbɛ̃́ɛ.
Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi mↄ̀ Pↄlu là à mɛ̀: Omɛɛ, Loma gbɛ̃́n n ũa? A wèwà à mɛ̀: Ao.
Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi òɛ̀: Ma ↄ zↄ̃ↄ kpàɛ, ↄ̃ ma gↄ̃ Loma gbɛ̃́ ũ. Ɔ̃ Pↄlu òɛ̀: Mapi, wà ma i a ũɛ.
Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa ye yãlalawà yãaↄ bↄ̀zã gↄ̃̀ↄ. Kɛ́ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi dↄ̃̀ Pↄluá Loma gbɛ̃́ɛ, vĩa aà kũ̀, kɛ́ a tò wà mↄkàwà yã́i.
A gu dↄ̀, kɛ́ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi ye à yã́ pↄ́ Yudaↄ mↄ̀ò sã́asã ma, à mↄpòlowà, ↄ̃ à sa'onkiaↄ ń Yuda gbãadeↄ kã̀aa, à mↄ̀ ń Pↄluo ń aɛ.
Pↄlu wɛpɛ̀ gbãadeↄwa à mɛ̀: Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, yãe lɛ́ ma sↄ̃ vĩ Lua aɛo e ń a gbão.
Ɔ̃ sa'onkia Ãnania ò a dↄaiↄnɛ aa aà lɛ a lɛ́wa.
Ɔ̃ Pↄlu òɛ̀: Lua n lɛ sↄ̃, gbɛ̃nazĩn kaadↄɛmbɛ. Ń zↄ̃lɛ ńlɛ yã́kpalɛkɛmanↄ ikoyã musu, mɛ́ mpi sↄ̃, n bↄ a kpɛ, ń ò wà ma lɛ́.
Ɔ̃ dↄaipiↄ mɛ̀: Ḿmɛ ńlɛ Lua gbàgbankia sↄ̃sↄ̃ màaa?
Pↄlu mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃́ↄ, mi dↄ̃ sa'onkia no, asa a kɛ̃a láu wà mɛ̀, wásuli wá bùsu gbãade tↄbɛ̃ɛsio.
Pↄlu dↄ̃ kɛ́ gbãadepiↄ gbɛ̃eↄá Saduseↄnɛ, an gbɛ̃eↄ sↄ̃ Falisiↄnɛ, ↄ̃ a ònɛ́ gbã́ugbãu: Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, Falisin ma ũ, Falisiↄ nɛ́n ma ũ. Gɛↄ vua yã́ pↄ́ ma wɛ́ dↄi yã́i ↄ̃ álɛ yã́kpalɛkɛmanↄ.
Kɛ́ à yã́pi ò, Falisiↄ ń Saduseↄ fɛ̀lɛkↄ̃wa ń lɛkpaao, ↄ̃ kãaakɛnaↄ kɛ̃̀aa lɛɛ pla.
Saduseↄ ì mɛ gɛↄ lí vuo, mɛ́ malaikaↄ ń nisĩnaↄ kuo. Falisiↄ sↄ̃ aa zɛ̀ ń beeↄ kuao.
Wii gbãa da ń guu, ↄ̃ Falisi pↄ́ aaì Mↄizi ikoyã danɛ́eↄ fɛ̀lɛ ń lɛkpaa gbãao aa mɛ̀: Wi yãvãie e gbɛ̃́ɛ beewao. Tó nisĩna ge malaika mɛ́ yã'òɛ̀ sↄ̃ bɛ?
Kɛ́ lɛkpaa gbãakũ̀, sosaↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ lɛ́ vĩakɛ, kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ↄ su Pↄlu taitaikↄ̃ɛo, ↄ̃ a ò a sosaↄnɛ aa pila gɛ̃ ń guu, aa aà kũ gɛaànↄ ń bɛ.
A gwã́ Dii bↄ̀ mↄ̀ Pↄluwa à mɛ̀: Sↄ̃dilɛ! Lá n ma yã'ò Yelusalɛũ la, sema ǹ o Loma lↄ.
Kɛ́ a gu dↄ̀ Yudaeↄ kã̀aa asii guu, aa lɛgbɛ̃̀ aa mɛ̀ wa pↄbleo, wa imio e gↄↄ pↄ́ wà Pↄlu dɛ̀.
Lɛkpaaĩnapiↄ dɛ gbɛ̃ↄn blala.
Aa gɛ̀ sa'onkiaↄ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ kĩ́i, aa ònɛ́: Wá sì ń Luao wa mɛ̀, tó wi Pↄlu dɛo, tó wa pↄblè, Lua láaikɛwá.
Ápiↄ ń gbãadeↄ píi à gɛ o sosaↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄɛ aà mↄ́ɛ́ ń Pↄluo lá á ye à aà yã́ↄ tàasika dɛ a káaulawa. Wápiↄ sↄ̃ wáↄ ku sↄu guu wà aà dɛ zɛ́u e àↄ gɛ́ kái la.
Pↄlu dãe nɛgↄ̃ɛ ń baikpaapi mà, ↄ̃ à gɛ̀ gɛ̃̀ sosaↄ bɛ, a ò Pↄluɛ.
Ɔ̃ Pↄlu sosa badee sìsi a òɛ̀: Gɛ́ ń ɛ̀waasoɛo á gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ kĩ́i, asa a ye baoe kpaɛ̀.
Ɔ̃ à aà sɛ̀ gɛ̀aànↄ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ kĩ́i à mɛ̀: Pↄlu dakpɛuna ma sisi, a gbɛ̀aa mà mↄ n kĩ́i ń ɛ̀waasoɛo. A yãe vĩ a ye onɛ.
Ɔ̃ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi ɛ̀waasopi kũ̀ a ↄwa à gɛ̀aànↄ gusaɛ ḿpla, ↄ̃ à aà là à mɛ̀: Bↄ́ yã́ ń vĩ ǹ omɛɛi?
Ɔ̃ à mɛ̀: Yudaↄ mɛ́ lɛkpàaĩ, aa ye gbɛama ǹ mↄ́ ń Pↄluo ń gbãadeↄnɛ zia, lá aa ye aà yã́ gwa dɛ a káaulawa.
Ńsu we ń yã́io, asa an gbɛ̃́ↄ lɛ́ aà dã́ zɛ́u, aa dɛ gbɛ̃ↄn blala. Aa lɛgbɛ̃̀ aa mɛ̀ wa pↄbleo, wa imio e gↄↄ pↄ́ wà aà dɛ̀. An sↄu mà kↄ̀, n yã́ an swã́ dↄi.
Gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi ò ɛ̀waasopiɛ: Ńsu to gbɛ̃e dↄ̃ ń òmɛɛo. Ɔ̃ à aà gbàɛ.
Ɔ̃ à sosa bade gbɛ̃ↄn plaↄ sìsi, a ònɛ́: À o sosa fɛ̃ndade gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa doↄnɛ aa sↄukɛ aa gɛ́ Sezale oosi ublegↄↄ ń sↄ̃de gbɛ̃ↄn bàaↄ̃kwiↄ ń sↄ̃nde gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa doↄ.
À sↄ̃́ yã́ kɛkɛ Pↄluɛ aà dikpɛ gɛò bùsu gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ Felisi kĩ́i yãkelesai.
Ɔ̃ à lakɛ̃̀ɛ̀ à mɛ̀:
Bùsu gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ Felisi, mapi Kolodi Lisia, ma láɛ bee kɛ̃̀nɛ, ma fↄkpàma.
Yudaↄ mɛ́ gbɛ̃́ɛ bee kũ̀, aa ye aa aà dɛ. Kɛ́ ma aà dↄ̃̀ Loma gbɛ̃́ ũ, ↄ̃ ma gɛ ń sosaↄ ma aà sìmá.
Kɛ́ má ye mà aà yã́ pↄ́ aa mↄ̀oa ma, ma aà sɛ̀ ma gɛò an yã́kpalɛkɛnaↄ kĩ́i.
We má dↄ̃̀u aà yã́ pↄ́ aa mↄ̀oa dɛ an ikoyã ũɛ, i yã́ pↄ́ kà wà a dɛ ge wà a dakpɛu kɛo.
Kɛ́ wà lɛkpàaĩaàzi, wà a kpã́i kɛ̀mɛɛ, ↄ̃ ma aà gbàɛoma gↄ̃̀ↄ, má ò yãdeↄnɛ aa gɛ́ ń aà yã́o n kĩ́i we.
Ɔ̃ sosaↄ kɛ̀ lá wa ònɛ́wa, aa Pↄlu sɛ̀ gɛ̀ò Antipati gwãasĩna.
Kɛ́ gu dↄ̀, sosa pↄ́ bɛ kɛ̀sɛↄ Pↄlu nà sↄ̃deↄnɛ ń ↄzĩ aa gɛaànↄ aɛ, ↄ̃ aa ɛ̀a tà ń bɛ.
Kɛ́ sↄ̃deↄ kà Sezale, aa lápi kpà bùsu gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpiwa, ↄ̃ aa Pↄlu nàɛ̀ a ↄzĩ.
Bùsu gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi lápi kyokɛ̀, ↄ̃ à Pↄlu là bùsu pↄ́ à bↄ̀u. A mà Silisi bùsu à bↄ̀u,
ↄ̃ a òɛ̀: Tó gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ yãvĩnnↄↄ mↄ̀, má ma lá aa o. Ɔ̃ à mɛ̀ wàↄ aà dↄ̃́a ua. Elodi mɛ́ uapi kpà yãa.
Gↄↄ sↄo gbɛa sa'onkia Ãnania mↄ̀ Sezale ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄeↄ ń ikoyãdↄ̃na pↄ́ wì mɛɛ̀ Tɛɛtuluo. Aa mↄ̀ ń Pↄlu yã́o bùsu gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ kĩ́i.
Kɛ́ wà Pↄlu sìsi, Tɛɛtulu fɛ̀lɛ lɛ́ yãdaaàla à mɛ̀: Felisi, ń n báaao wá bùsu na à kɛ̀ zài. N zia làasookɛa mɛ́ mↄ̀ ń wá kálɛa maao.
Wì n tↄnasi, wàↄ n sáaukpa gupiiu gↄↄpii.
Kɛ́ má ye mà n gágao, má wabikɛma, sùuukɛwanↄ, wá yã́ yↄↄnaɛ ma.
Wá è gbɛ̃́piá gbɛ̃nazĩn èbeɛ. Ì zↄada Yudaↄ guu dṹnia guu píi, a dɛ lousisizɛ ɛɛ pↄ́ wì mɛ Nazalɛtideↄ dↄaanaↄ do ũ.
Baa se a ye Lua ua gbãlɛ, ↄ̃ wa aà kũ̀.
Tó n gↄ̃ɛpi làla nzĩa, ńyↄ̃ aà yã́ pↄ́ wa mↄò sĩana dↄ̃.
<range>
Ɔ̃ Yudaↄ yã́'idìa aa mɛ̀ lá yã́piↄ dɛn we.
Ɔ̃ bùsu gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄpi mikɛ̀ Pↄluɛ aà yã'o. Ɔ̃ Pↄlu mɛ̀: Lá má n dↄ̃ yã́kpalɛkɛna ũ bùsuɛ bee guu a wɛ̃ gɛ̃̀gɛ̃, ↄ̃ málɛ a mibↄayã'ò ma laaiwa.
Tó ń gbɛ̀a, wa onɛ ma gɛa Yelusalɛũ lousisii dɛ gↄↄ kuɛplalao.
Wi ma e málɛ lɛkpaakɛ ń gbɛ̃eo Lua uao. Wi ma e málɛ zↄada lousisikpɛↄ guu ge wɛ̃́lɛ guuo.
Gbɛ̃́piↄ fↄ̃ yã́ pↄ́ aa lìamazi seelade enɛo.
Sĩana má ònɛ, zɛ́ pↄ́ aalɛ mɛ lousisizɛ ɛɛɛ guu ↄ̃ málɛ zↄble wá deziↄ Luaɛ. Má yã́ pↄ́ wa kɛ̃̀ Mↄizi ikoyã guu ń ãnabiↄ pↄ́ↄ náai vĩ.
Ma wɛ́ dↄ Luai lá ampiↄwa, kɛ́ gbɛ̃maaↄ ń gbɛ̃vãiↄ bↄ gau píi.
Ayãmɛto miↄ azĩa toto gↄↄpii kɛ ma sↄ̃ su àↄ vĩ Lua aɛ ge gbɛ̃nazĩna aɛo.
Ma wɛ̃kɛa ń ma bùsuo gbɛa ma ɛa su ↄdama kɛ̀nɛ́, ma sa'ò
Lua ua. Kɛ́ málɛ sa'o ma gbãbↄa gbɛa, ↄ̃ wà ma le we. Mi bíla kãaao, mɛ́ zↄa kuo.
Azi bùsu Yudaeↄ mɛ́ yãdeↄ ũ. Sema aa mↄ wà yãbↄ kↄ̃ lɛ́u n kĩ́i.
Tó màa no, tó gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa ku laↄ dàa pↄ́ aa èa gↄↄ pↄ́ aa yã́kpalɛkɛ̀manↄ o.
Sema yã́ mɛ̀ndo pↄ́ má ònɛ́ ń lↄↄ gbãao ma mɛ̀, gɛↄ vua yã́ musu ↄ̃ aalɛ yã́kpalɛkɛimanↄ bàasio.
Felisi Yesu zɛ́ bↄↄlɛ dↄ̃, ↄ̃ à lakà Yudaↄ yã́a à mɛ̀: Tó sosaↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ Lisia mↄ̀, má á yã́ midɛɛ́.
A ò sosa badeɛ aàↄ Pↄlu dↄ̃́a, ãma aà aà gba ĩ́ana, i to aà gbɛ̃́ↄ dↄaàlɛ.
Gↄↄpla gbɛa Felisi mↄ̀ ń a Yuda nↄ pↄ́ wì mɛɛ̀ Dusiio. À Pↄlu sìsi, ↄ̃ à Kilisi Yesu náaikɛa yãmàwà.
Pↄlu lɛ́ yã'o maakɛa musu ń zĩakũadↄ̃o ń yã́kpalɛkɛa ń gbɛ̃́ↄ pↄ́ lɛ́ mↄo, ↄ̃ vĩa Felisi kũ̀ à mɛ̀: Fɛlɛ tá gĩa. Gↄↄ pↄ́ ma ↄ'è, má ɛa n sísi.
Aà wɛ́ dↄi Pↄlu a gbagusaɛdaɛɛ, ↄ̃ ìↄ aà sisi mↄ̀ↄmↄↄ aà mↄ faaiboanↄ.
Kɛ́ à kɛ̀ wɛ̃̀ pla, Pↄↄsiu Fɛsɛtu zↄ̃̀lɛ Felisi gbɛu. Kɛ́ Felisi ye àↄ na ń Yudaↄ yã́i, ↄ̃ à Pↄlu tò dakpɛu.
Fɛsɛtu zↄ̃lɛa kpalau gↄↄ àaↄ̃ gbɛa, à fɛ̀lɛ Sezale à gɛ̀ Yelusalɛũ.
Wekĩi sa'onkiaↄ ń Yuda gbãadeↄ mↄ̀ aà kĩ́i, aa fɛ̀lɛ ń Pↄlu yã́o. Aa wabikɛ̀wà
aà sùuukɛ, aà to Pↄlu mↄ́nɛ́ Yelusalɛũ. Asa aa zɛ̀ò wà baikpaɛ̀ zɛ́u wà aà dɛɛ.
Ɔ̃ Fɛsɛtu ònɛ́: Pↄlu ku kpɛ́u Sezale, mapi sↄ̃ má tá we tia.
Á gbãadeeↄ mↄ gɛmanↄ, tó à yãvãikɛ̀ɛ, í o.
Fɛsɛtu kɛ̀ńnↄ gↄↄ swaaↄ̃ ge kwi taawa, ↄ̃ à ɛ̀a tà Sezale. Kɛ́ a gu dↄ̀, à zↄ̃̀lɛ a gĩ́naa à mɛ̀ wà mↄ́ ń Pↄluo.
Kɛ́ à mↄ̀, Yuda pↄ́ bↄ̀ Yelusalɛũↄ lìaaàzi, ↄ̃ aa yãzↄ̃ↄ pↄ́ wi fↄ̃ a seela èoↄ dↄ̀wà dasidasi.
Pↄlu yã́zãsìmá à mɛ̀: Mi zã Yudaↄ ikoyã ge Lua ua yã́wao. Mi zã yãewa Sezaaɛo.
Fɛsɛtu lɛ́ wɛɛlɛ àↄ na ń Yudaↄ ↄ̃ à Pↄlu là à mɛ̀: Ńyↄ̃ we gɛ́ Yelusalɛũ mà yã́kpalɛkɛnnↄ we yã́ɛ beeↄ musua?
Pↄlu mɛ̀: Sezaa ikoyã pↄ́ kũ̀ wà yã́kpalɛkɛmanↄ ↄ̃ má kúu la. Mi tàaekɛ Yudaeɛo, lá mpi ń dↄ̃ sã́asãwa.
Tó ma tàaekɛ̀ à kà wà ma dɛɛ, má gí wà ma dɛo. Ãma lá mi yã́ pↄ́ gbɛ̃́ɛↄ lɛ́ o ma musue kɛo, gbɛ̃e zɛvĩ à ma kpámáo. Gɛa Sezaa kĩ́i ↄ̃ ma zɛò.
Kɛ́ Fɛsɛtu lɛkpàaĩ ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ à mɛ̀: Sezaa n zɛò, aà kĩ́i ńyↄ̃ gɛ́u.
Gↄↄpla gbɛa kí Agipa ń Beenisio mↄ̀ Sezale fↄkpai Fɛsɛtuwa.
Kɛ́ aalɛ gↄↄplakɛ we, Fɛsɛtu bↄ̀ ń Pↄlu yã́o kípiɛ à mɛ̀: Gↄ̃ɛe ku la, Felisi aà tò dakpɛu.
Kɛ́ ma gɛ Yelusalɛũ, sa'onkiaↄ ń Yuda gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ fɛ̀lɛmɛɛ ń aà yã́o, aa mɛ̀ mà sùuukɛ mà yãdaaàla.
Má ònɛ́, tó gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wà yãdↄ̀wà i kↄ̃'e ń a yãdↄmadeↄo mɛ́ i zɛ'è à yã́pi zãsìmáo, wá Lomadeↄ wili aà kpámáo.
Kɛ́ aa sùmanↄ la, mi zɛzɛo. Kɛ́ a gu dↄ̀ gↄ̃̀ↄ, ↄ̃ ma zↄ̃lɛ ma gĩ́naa ma mɛ̀ wà mↄ́ ń gbɛ̃́pio.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ yãvĩaànↄpiↄ yã'ò, aai yãvãi pↄ́ málɛ e wa dↄwà o aà yã́ musuo.
Aa yãkele vĩaànↄ ń lousisizɛ yã́ musu ń gↄ̃ɛ pↄ́ wì mɛɛ̀ Yesu yã́o. À gà, ↄ̃ Pↄlu zɛ̀ ń aà kua bɛ̃́ɛ yã́o.
Ma bílikɛ̀ yã́pi zɛ́ dↄ̃awa, ↄ̃ ma aà là tó a ye gɛ́ Yelusalɛũ wà yã́pi gↄ̃́gↄ̃ɛ̀ we.
Ɔ̃ Pↄlu mɛ̀ Loma kí ↄ̃ a zɛò, wàↄ a kũa. Ɔ̃ ma mɛ̀ wàↄ aà dↄ̃́a e màↄ gɛ́ aà gbaɛi Sezaawa.
Ɔ̃ Agipa ò Fɛsɛtuɛ: Má ye mà gbɛ̃́pi yãma mazĩa. Ɔ̃ Fɛsɛtu mɛ̀: Ńyↄ̃ yãma aà lɛ́u zia.
Kɛ́ a gu dↄ̀ Agipa ń Beenisio mↄ̀ ń gawi zↄ̃ↄo, ↄ̃ aa gɛ̃̀ kↄ̃kãaakɛkpɛu ń sosaↄ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ń wɛ̃́lɛ gbɛ̃́ gbiaↄ. Kɛ́ Fɛsɛtu lɛsì, wà mↄ̀ ń Pↄluo.
Ɔ̃ Fɛsɛtu yãsɛ̀ à mɛ̀: Kí Agipa ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kúwanↄ laↄ píi, a gbɛ̃́ɛ bee èa? Yuda pↄ́ kú Yelusalɛũↄ ń laↄ píi gbɛ̃́pi yã́ sɛ̀ mↄ̀oa, aalɛ wiilɛa aa mɛ̀, a maa àↄ ku lↄo.
Mapi, mi e à yãe kɛ̀ à kà wà aà dɛo, ↄ̃ lá à zɛ̀ ń Sezaao, ma zɛò mà aà gbaɛwà.
Mi yã́pi gbadↄ̃ mà lákɛ̃ kíɛ aà yã́ musuo. A yã́i tò ma mↄaànↄ á aɛ, atɛ̃sa mpi kí Agipa, kɛ́ yãlalaawà gbɛa mà yã́ e mà a lákɛ̃.
Asa dakpɛuna gbaɛama yã́ pↄ́ wa dàaàla oa wásawasa sai, i kɛmɛɛ zɛvĩo.
Ɔ̃ Agipa ò Pↄluɛ: Ń zɛvĩ ǹ n yã'o. Ɔ̃ Pↄlu ↄsɛ̀ à azĩa yã́ bↄↄlɛkɛ̀ à mɛ̀:
Kí Agipa, má è ma minakɛ̀, kɛ́ má è málɛ mazĩa yã́ bↄↄlɛkɛ n aɛ gbã, yã́ pↄ́ Yudaↄ lìamazi musu píi.
Atɛ̃sa kɛ́ ń Yudaↄ fɛlɛkaayã dↄ̃ píi ń ń yãkeleↄ. Bee yã́i ma wabikɛ̀ma, ma yã́ɛ mamɛɛ.
Yudaↄ ma kua dↄ̃ za ma nɛ́fɛ̃nɛnzĩ daalɛa ma bùsuu e Yelusalɛũ.
Aa ma dↄ̃ à gɛ̃̀gɛ̃. Tó aa yei, aa fↄ̃ o má dɛ wá lousisin gãli pↄ́ gbãa ń Lua yã́o wì mɛ Falisiↄ gbɛ̃́ ũ.
Tiasa wàlɛ yã́kpalɛkɛmanↄ, kɛ́ ma wɛ́ dↄ lɛ́ pↄ́ Lua gbɛ̃̀ wá deziↄnɛzi yã́i.
Wá bui kuɛplaↄ aaìↄ zↄble Luaɛ gwãasĩna ń fãanɛo wɛdↄa lɛgbɛ̃a doũpizi guu. Kí, wɛdↄa yã́pizi yã́i Yudaↄ fɛ̀lɛmanↄ.
Bↄ́yãi Lua gɛↄ vua kɛ̀ɛ́ yã́zɛsai ũi?
Mapi yãa, ma zɛò kɛ́ yã́ pↄ́ a bↄ Yesu Nazalɛti yã́ kpɛ píi ↄ̃ máliↄ kɛ.
Màa má kɛ̀ Yelusalɛũ. Sa'onkiaↄ ma gba zɛ́, ↄ̃ ma Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ kà kpɛ́u dasi. Tó wàlɛ ń dɛdɛ sↄ̃, ma lɛ́ ìↄ ku a guuɛ.
Miↄ gɛ́ lousisikpɛ ń lousisikpɛo mↄ̀ↄmↄↄ màↄ wɛ́tɛ̃amↄnɛ́, mi gãnamá aa dↄ́ɛ ń Luao. Ma pↄ fɛ̃ańzi, ↄ̃ mi gɛ́ ĩadaimá ń wɛ̃́lɛ baaↄ.
Beewa málɛ gɛ́ Damasi ń iko pↄ́ sa'onkiaↄ ma gbaɛoo.
Kí, kɛ́ má bɛ zɛ́u ĩatɛ̃ minanguo, ma gupua è à bↄ̀ luabɛ à kùlɛa ń ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, a pãsĩ dɛ ĩatɛ̃a.
Wa lɛlɛ zĩ́lɛ wápii, ↄ̃ ma lↄↄ mà, wa òmɛɛ ń Ɛbɛlu yã́o wà mɛ̀: Sↄlu, Sↄlu, bↄ́yãi ńlɛ ĩadaiai? Lípanazↄ̃a ń teo mɛ́ lɛ́ ĩakpanzi fá!
Ma mɛ̀: Ḿmɛnn déi, Dii? Ɔ̃ Dii mɛ̀: Mámɛ má Yesu pↄ́ ńlɛ ĩadawà ũ.
Fɛlɛ zɛ. Ma bↄ mↄma kɛ́ mà n sɛ ma zĩkɛna ũɛ, níↄ dɛ yã́ pↄ́ ń è ń yã́ pↄ́ má ↄlↄnɛo seelade ũ.
Má n suaba Yudaↄ ↄzĩ ń buipãleↄ. Málɛ n zĩmá,
kɛ́ ǹ ń wɛ́ kɛ̃́nɛ́, aa bↄ gusiau aa gɛ̃ gupuau, aa bↄ Setãu ikou aa gɛ̃ Lua pↄ́u, an duuna i kɛ̃́má, an bàa iↄ kú ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ an kua adoaↄ ma náaikɛa yã́i.
Kí Agipa, Ayãmɛto mi gí luabɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ bↄ̀ mↄ̀a yã'onɛ maio.
Ma waasokɛ̀ Damasi gĩa ń Yelusalɛũo, ↄ̃ má kɛ̀ Yude bùsu gupiiu ń buipãleↄ kĩ́io. Má ònɛ́ aa nↄ̀sɛlilɛ aa zɛ ń Luao, aai yã́ pↄ́ a to wà dↄ̃ aa nↄ̀sɛlìlɛ kɛ.
Bee yã́i Yudaↄ ma kũ Lua ua, aa ye ma dɛ.
Lua dↄnlɛ má kuò e ń a gbão, ↄ̃ má zɛa aà seelade ũ nɛ́fɛ̃nɛn gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄnɛ píi. Mili yãpãle oo, sema yã́ pↄ́ ãnabiↄ ń Mↄizio ò à kɛ̀ bàasio.
Aa mɛ̀ Mɛsii a taasikɛ, ↄ̃mɛ a bↄ gau sɛ̃́ia, i gupua yã'o Yudaↄnɛ ń buipãleↄ.
Kɛ́ Pↄlu lɛ́ azĩa yã́ bↄↄlɛkɛ màa, Fɛsɛtu wiidↄ̀wà à mɛ̀: Ĩana kàma yã̀ Pↄlu? N dↄ̃a zↄ̃ↄ mɛ́ lɛ́ n mi liaa.
Ɔ̃ Pↄlu mɛ̀: Ĩana i kaao, Fɛsɛtu. Yã́zɛde málɛ o mɛ́ sĩanaɛ.
Kí, lá ń yã́ beeↄ dↄ̃, má fↄ̃ mà a yã'onɛ wásawasa bakũaanakɛsai. Má dↄ̃ kɛ́ a kee i kɛ n mi kpɛo, asa yã́piá gusaɛ yã́ no.
Kí Agipa, n yã́ pↄ́ ãnabiↄ ò sìa? Má dↄ̃ kɛ́ ń sì.
Ɔ̃ Agipa ò Pↄluɛ: Ń ye ma dɛdɛnlɛa kɛ mà gↄ̃ Yesude ũ gↄ̃̀ↄ yã̀?
Pↄlu mɛ̀: Gↄ̃̀ↄ ge zã́ má yei, tó Lua wèi. I kɛ ndo no, ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ ma yãma gbãↄ píi, aa gↄ̃ lá má dɛwa, mↄdaonaɛ beeↄ bàasi.
Ɔ̃ kípi ń bùsu gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄo ń Beenisio ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kãaaa weↄ fɛ̀lɛ bↄ̀lɛ.
Kɛ́ aa bↄ̀lɛ, aalɛ o'okↄ̃ɛ: Gbɛ̃́pi i yãe kɛ à kà dɛa ge wà dakpɛuo.
Ɔ̃ Agipa ò Fɛsɛtuɛ: Tó gbɛ̃́pi i mɛ a yã́pi a gɛ́ Sezaa kĩ́iɛ yãao, wá aà gbaɛɛ.
Kɛ́ wà zɛ̀ò wà da Itali zɛ́u, ↄ̃ wà Pↄlu ń dakpɛuna kĩnieↄ nà sosa bade pↄ́ wì mɛɛ̀ Zuliuɛ a ↄzĩ. A dɛ sosa gãli pↄ́ wì mɛ Sezaa sosaↄ dↄaanaↄ do ũ.
Wa gɛ̃ gó'ilɛna pↄ́ bↄ̀ Adamiti, àlɛ bↄlɛ ń Azi bùsu wɛ̃́lɛↄ guu, ↄ̃ wa dazɛu. Masedoni bùsu gbɛ̃́ Alisaka Tɛsaloni kúwanↄ.
Kɛ́ a gu dↄ̀ wa ka Sidↄ̃. Zuliu Pↄlu kũa ń nↄ̀sɛdoũo, ↄ̃ à aà gbà zɛ́ aà gɛ́ a gbɛ̃́ↄ gwai, kɛ́ aa e ↄdawà.
Bↄa we wa pɛlɛ í guo. Kɛ́ ĩ́ana lɛ́ dawálɛ yã́i wa dↄ Sipi bùsu kpɛ oi.
Bɛa ísia guo wa dↄ Silisi ń Pãmfili bùsuↄzi, ↄ̃ wa ka Mila, Lisi bùsuu.
Wekĩi sosa badepi Alɛsãndi gó'ilɛna pↄ́ lɛ́ gɛ́ Itali è, ↄ̃ à wá káu.
Gↄↄ plae dà wá tá kↄↄnkũ̀. Dɛ̃ɛ ń dɛ̃ɛo wa ka Sinidi lɛ́i. Kɛ́ ĩ́ana i weiwɛ̃ɛ wà gɛ́ súsuo, wa pãalɛ wa bↄ Kɛlɛti bùsu kpɛ oi Samↄnɛ saɛ.
Dɛ̃ɛ ń dɛ̃ɛo wálɛ dↄ Kɛlɛtizi, ↄ̃ wa ka gu pↄ́ wì mɛ Godↄkĩi Maau. A kãi ń wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ wì mɛ Laseo.
Lá wa gɛ̃gɛ̃ zɛ́u, wá táa'o gɛa aɛ gↄ̃̀ kai yã́ ũ, asa Yudaↄ lɛyegↄↄ gɛ̃̀ kↄ̀. Ayãmɛto Pↄlu lɛdàmá
à mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃́ↄ, má è táɛ bee a mↄ́ ń ásoo zↄ̃ↄo ń músio. I kɛ gópi ń a asoↄɛ adoo, ń wápiↄɛ lↄ.
Ãma sosa bade gobↄna ń godeo yã́ sì dɛ Pↄlu pↄ́a.
Gupi maa wà godↄu wà buziɛble weo, ↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ daside zɛ̀ ń daa zɛ́uo. Aa ye wà ka Feniki, wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ kú Kɛlɛti bɛ'aɛ oi, tó a zɛkɛ̀, wí buziɛble we.
Kɛ́ ĩ́an busɛ fɛ̀lɛ gɛↄmidↄkĩi oi, aalɛ e wà fↄ̃ ń pↄeã kɛɛ. Ɔ̃ aa ń gó pòlo aa dàzɛu, aalɛ dↄ Kɛlɛtizi kãikãi.
I gɛ̃gɛ̃o, zàa'ĩan gbãa pↄ́ wì mɛ ĩ́an pãsĩ pìla Kɛlɛti gbɛwa.
À golìaa, wi fↄ̃ dàɛ lↄo, ↄ̃ wa gↄ̃ tɛi.
Kɛ́ à wá kpá gũgũn nɛ́na pↄ́ wì mɛ Kodai, wa dáama'è yↄↄ. Dɛ̃ɛ ń dɛ̃ɛo wa wá gónɛ suababↄ è wá kũ̀ we.
Kɛ́ aa yè wa nà gó zↄ̃ↄpiwa, ↄ̃ aa kɛ̀kɛ bakã̀ gó zↄ̃ↄpiɛ. Kɛ́ aalɛ vĩakɛ pãa Libii bùsu isaaaɛ, ↄ̃ aa gó kúla pɛ̀lɛ íu, ↄ̃ aa gↄ̃̀ tɛ́ ĩ́anai.
Kɛ́ a gu dↄ̀, lá zàa'ĩana gì lɛ́ wá gó zãampapa gbã́ugbãu, ↄ̃ aa nà asoↄ zuzua íuwa.
A gↄↄ àaↄ̃de zĩ́ aa ń gó zĩkɛbↄↄ bↄ̀lɛ kↄ̀lɛ ńzĩa.
À kà gↄↄ ũma ĩatɛ̃ ń saanaↄ i bↄo, mɛ́ ĩ́an pãsĩpi ń louo i kpálɛo. Buaa aafia pↄ́ wá wɛ́ dↄi yãa kɛ̀ fama.
Wa gↄↄplakɛ̀, wi e pↄblèo, ↄ̃ Pↄlu fɛ̀lɛ ònɛ́: Gbɛ̃́ↄ, tó a ma yãmà yãa, dↄ̃ wi fɛlɛ Kɛlɛti, músi ń ásooɛ beeↄ gbàsa wá léo.
E tia málɛ lɛdawá, à sↄ̃dilɛ! Á gbɛ̃e a gao, sema gópi wíwi bàasio.
Gĩa gwã́ Lua pↄ́ má dɛ aà pↄ́ ũ mɛ́ mi zↄbleɛ̀, aà malaika bↄ̀ mↄ̀a
à mɛ̀: Ńsu vĩakɛo, Pↄlu. Sema ǹ Sezaa aɛ le. Lua gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kúńnↄ gó guuↄ bↄ̀nɛ aafia ḿpii.
Ayãmɛto gbɛ̃́ↄ, à sↄ̃dilɛ! Má Lua náai vĩ kɛ́ a kɛ lá a òmɛɛwa.
Sema wà ka gũgũnae isaaa.
A gↄↄ gɛ̃o mɛ̀ndosaide gwã́ ĩ́an pãsĩpi lɛ́ wá gálɛ Adiati ía e tia. Ɔ̃ wɛɛdo ígbɛ̃ↄ lɛ́ e wa kãikũ̀ ń gↄ̃sↄ̃lɛoɛ.
Ɔ̃ aa bà i'ɛgwabↄ gbàɛ íu, aa è a ɛ gã̀sĩsuu basiiↄ̃. Kɛ́ à kɛ̀ sàa yↄↄ aa gbàɛ lↄ, aa è a ɛ gã̀sĩsuu bàaↄ̃.
Aalɛ pãa gbɛwa vĩakɛ, ↄ̃ aa kúla mɛ̀n síiↄ̃ gbàɛ gó pↄ̀ↄkpɛ, ↄ̃ aalɛ Lua sisi gu dↄnɛ́ kpakpa.
Gópi zĩkɛnaↄ lɛ́ zɛwɛɛlɛ wà bↄlɛ gó guu wà bàalɛ, ↄ̃ aalɛ gó suababↄpi pila aa da ía, aalɛ kɛ lá wa ye kúlaↄ gbaɛ go'aɛwa.
Ɔ̃ Pↄlu ò sosa badeɛ ń aà sosanɛↄ: Tó gbɛ̃́ beeↄ i gↄ̃ gó guuo, á e bↄo.
Ɔ̃ sosaↄ gó suababↄ baↄ zↄ̃̀zↄ̃, aa tò à lɛ̀lɛ íu.
Kɛ́ gu ye dↄi, Pↄlu awakpànɛ́ ḿpii aa pↄble à mɛ̀: A gↄↄ gɛ̃o mɛ̀ndosain gbã a gↄ̃ looa pↄblesai.
Málɛ awakpaɛ́ à pↄble, asa a maa á pↄlɛba àↄ dↄaɛ, í e bↄ aafia. Baa á mikã mɛ̀ndo a vũaao.
Pↄlu yã́pi oa gbɛa à pɛ̃ɛ sɛ̀ à Lua sáaukpà gbɛ̃́pii wáa, ↄ̃ a ɛ̀ àlɛ só.
Ampii aa sↄ̃dìlɛ aa pↄblè sa.
Wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wá kú gó guuↄ píi, wa ka gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa do ń basiiↄ̃ síiↄ̃saio (276).
Kɛ́ aa pↄblè aa kã̀, aa pↄ́wɛna bↄ̀lɛ zù íu, kɛ́ gó e yãfũkũ yã́i.
Kɛ́ gu dↄ̀ aa gↄ̃sↄ̃e è, aai dↄ̃o. Kɛ́ aa ísia sↄ̀ↄmiboa è a gↄ̃sↄ̃ daaĩa, ↄ̃ aa zɛ̀ò wà gɛ́ ń góo isaaa we, tó wa fↄ̃́.
Aa kúlaↄ wòlo aa tò í guu, ↄ̃ aa golilibↄↄ ba pòlo gↄ̃̀ↄ. Aa go'aɛ zwãa pòo ĩ́anaɛ, ↄ̃ aa mipɛ̀ gↄ̃sↄ̃piwa.
Ɔ̃ aa sì ũfãau ń saɛ, ↄ̃ gó zɛ̀ we. Ũfãapi go'aɛ kũ̀ gíũgiũ, i fↄ̃ dèeo, ↄ̃ ikooa pↄ́ lɛ́ vĩvĩ ń gbãao lɛ́ gó pↄ̀ↄkpɛ wiwi.
Sosaↄ zɛ̀ò wà dakpɛunaↄ dɛdɛ, kɛ́ an gbɛ̃e su kpáa'o pilimáo yã́i.
Ãma sosa bade ye Pↄlu misi, ↄ̃ à gìnɛ́ aa ń pↄeã kɛ. A ò kpadↄ̃naↄ dↄaa kusi íwa aa bua,
gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ iↄ tɛ́ ń kpɛ lipɛpɛɛↄ ge gó kasoↄ musu. Beewa ↄ̃ gbɛ̃́pii baa lè aafia.
Kɛ́ wa baa lè aafia, wá mà gũgũnapi tↄ́n Malita.
Beleↄ wá kṹ ↄplapla ń yeawázio. Aa gbãakpàwázi, aa tɛ́ sa kàwɛ̃ɛ, asa lou nà maawa mɛ́ ĩ́ana bↄ̀lɛ.
Pↄlu yàa kele nàaa mↄ̀ lɛ́ kátɛu, píligona ku a guu. Kɛ́ tɛ́ pusu aà pà, à bↄ̀ Pↄlu kũ̀ a ↄwa.
Kɛ́ beleↄ mlɛ̃pi è dↄ aà ↄwa, aa òkↄ̃ɛ: Gbɛ̃́ beeá gbɛ̃dɛnaɛ sĩana. Baa kɛ́ à bùa íwa aafia, sĩana i weiɛ̀ àↄ kuo.
Ãma Pↄlu mlɛ̃pi gbã̀ɛ a dà tɛ́u, i yãe kɛɛ̀o.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ wɛ́ dↄi aà ↄ a ka à lɛ́lɛ gɛ ũ wegↄ̃ↄɛ. Kɛ́ à gɛ̃̀gɛ̃, aa è pↄe i aà leo, ↄ̃ aa lɛ́ lìlɛ aa mɛ̀ gbɛ̃́piá luaeɛ.
Gupi saɛ gũgũna gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ pↄ́ wì mɛɛ̀ Publiu bɛ kuu. À wá dílɛ gↄↄ àaↄ̃, à nibↄ kɛ̀wɛ̃ɛ ń yeawázio.
Publiu mae wúlɛa ń mɛ̀wãao, àlɛ bãnubãnukɛ. Ɔ̃ Pↄlu gɛ̃̀ aà kĩ́i, à wabikɛ̀ɛ̀ à ↄnàwà à aà gbã̀gbã.
Kɛ́ à gbã̀gbã màa, gũgũnapi gyãe kĩniↄ mↄ̀ aà kĩ́i, ↄ̃ aa gbã̀gbã sↄ̃.
Aa wá kpɛlà maamaa. Kɛ́ wálɛ tá, aa kũ̀sũakɛ̀wɛ̃ɛ lↄ.
Wá kua gũgũnapiu mↄ àaↄ̃ gbɛa wa gɛ̃ gó'ilɛna pↄ́ buziɛblè weu, wa dazɛu. Gópi bↄ̀ Alɛsãndi, wà tã́asiaↄ seela kɛ̀wà.
Kɛ́ wa ka Silakusa, wa gↄↄ àaↄ̃ kɛ̀ we.
Bↄa we wa dↄ gↄ̃sↄ̃lɛi e wa gɛ kaò Lɛgio. Kɛ́ a gu dↄ̀ ĩ́ana bↄ̀ gɛↄmidↄkĩi oi, a gↄↄ plaade wa ka Puzↄli.
Wɛ̃́lɛpi guu wa Yesudeↄ lèu. Aa mɛ̀ wà sùuukɛ wà ãsↄ̃a do kɛńnↄ. Wá kɛ̀ màa, ↄ̃ wa da Loma zɛ́u.
Loma Yesudeↄ wá bao mà, ↄ̃ aa mↄ̀ daiwálɛ. Gbɛ̃eↄ wá lé Apiu'ɛlɛu, gbɛ̃eↄ sↄ̃ gu pↄ́ wì mɛ Pilakĩi'aaↄ̃u. Kɛ́ Pↄlu ń é, à Lua sáaukpà, aà sↄ̃ nìni.
Kɛ́ wa ka Loma, wà Pↄlu gbà zɛ́ aàↄ ku adoa ń sosa pↄ́ ìↄ aà dↄ̃́ao.
Gↄↄ àaↄ̃ gbɛa Pↄlu Yuda gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ sìsi. Kɛ́ aa kã̀aa, a ònɛ́: Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, mi zã Yudaↄnɛ yãewao. Mi bↄ wá deziↄ fɛlɛkaayãe kpɛo, ↄ̃ wà ma kũ Yelusalɛũ wà ma kpa Lomadeↄwa.
Aa yãlàlaa, aai yãe e ma musu à kà wà ma dɛo, ↄ̃ aa ye ma gbaɛ.
Ɔ̃ Yudaↄ bↄ̀ ma kpɛ. Teasi ma zɛ ń gɛa Sezaa kĩ́io, i kɛ má yãvĩ ń ma bùsu gbɛ̃́ↄ no.
Ayãmɛto ma á gbɛ́a wà kↄ̃'e mà oánↄ, asa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Isailiↄ wɛ́ dↄi yã́i wà mↄɛ bee kàia.
Ɔ̃ aa òɛ̀: Wi taalae e à bↄ̀ Yude bùsuu n yã́ musuo. Wá gbɛ̃e sↄ̃ i bↄ we à sùwá ń n bao vãioo.
Wá è a maa wà yã́ pↄ́ ń kũa ma n lɛ́u, asa wá mà wì lousisizɛpi bɛ̃̀ɛbo gupiiuɛ.
Aa gↄↄdìlɛkↄ̃ɛ ń Pↄluo, ↄ̃ aa mↄ̀ aà kĩ́i ua pↄ́ à pìlau dasidasi. A ye aa a yã́zɛ dↄ̃ Yesu yã́ musu, ↄ̃ à dàalɛ Mↄizi ikoyãwa ń ãnabiↄ yã́ↄ, à kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i yã'ònɛ́, à a bↄↄlɛkɛ̀nɛ́ za kↄↄkↄↄ e oosi.
Gbɛ̃eↄ yã́ pↄ́ àlɛ oↄ zɛ́ è, ãma gbɛ̃eↄ gìi.
Kɛ́ aalɛ kɛ̃aa ń lɛkpaao, Pↄlu yã́ mɛ̀ndo kã̀fĩnɛ́ à mɛ̀: Yã́ pↄ́ Lua Nisĩna dà ãnabi Isaiaɛ a ò á deziↄnɛá sĩanaɛ à mɛ̀:
Gɛ ǹ o gbɛ̃́ beeↄnɛ, aa swã́kpa aaↄ gɛ́ yãemasai, aa wɛ́tɛi aaↄ gɛ́ yãe'esai.
An nↄ̀sɛ paaao, kɛ́ aasu ↄ̃nↄkũo yã́i, an swã́ gbãa, kɛ́ aasu yãmao yã́i, an wɛ́ kũaaa, kɛ́ asu kɛ̃o yã́i, asa aa ye ɛa sua mà ń gbã́gbão.
Ayãmɛto, àↄ dↄ̃ kɛ́ Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ zĩ̀ ń suabayão buipãleↄwa. Aamɛ aa sí.
<range>
Pↄlu kɛ̀ kpɛ́ pↄ́ àlɛ a fĩabo guu wɛ̃̀ bṹu pla. Ìↄ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaì mↄ faaiboianↄↄ kũ ↄplapla píi.
À kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i yã́ waasokɛ̀nɛ́, à Dii Yesu Kilisi yãdànɛ́ ń laaio kpálɛa, gbɛ̃e i kpaɛ̀o.
Mámɛmaa Pↄlu, Kilisi Yesu zↄ̀blena, Lua ma sisi à ma dilɛ a zĩna ũ baona
pↄ́ à dↄ̀aa à a lɛgbɛ̃̀ a ãnabiↄnɛ, aa kɛ̃̀ a yã́ taalau kpana ũ.
Aà Nɛ́ Yesu Kilisi wá Dii yã́ mɛ́ baonapi ũ. Aà dɛa gbɛ̃nazĩna ũ guu à bↄ̀ Davidi bui guuɛ. Aà luakɛ guu sↄ̃ aà bↄa gau ń gbãao mɛ́ ↄ̀lↄwɛ̃ɛ kɛ́ Lua Nɛ́n aà ũ.
<range>
Kilisipi mɛ́ gbɛ̃kɛkɛ̀mɛɛ à ma zĩ bui píi kĩ́i, kɛ́ aa e a náaikɛ, aai gↄ̃ a yãmanaↄ ũ, i tↄbↄ.
Á kú ń guu sↄ̃, á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Yesu Kilisi á sisi à á sɛ́ↄ.
Mámɛ ma láɛ bee kɛ̃̀ á Lomade pↄ́ Lua yeázi à á sisi, a gↄ̃ a gbɛ̃́ↄ ũ píiɛ. Lua wá Mae ń Dii Yesu Kilisio gbɛ̃kɛkɛɛ́, aai á gba aafia.
Sɛ̃́ia gĩa ma Lua sáaukɛ̀ ń Yesu Kilisi gbãao ápii yã́ musu, kɛ́ á luanaaikɛa lì dṹniaa píi yã́i.
Tó málɛ wabikɛ píi, á yã́ lí sãmaguo. Lua mɛ́ ma seelade ũ. Aàpi málɛ zↄbleɛ̀ ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo, málɛ aà Nɛ́ baokpa.
Miↄ wabikɛwà aà zɛkɛkɛmɛɛ lá a yeiwa, mà e mↄ á gwai sa,
asa wɛsiaálɛ ni lɛ́ ma dɛ maamaaɛ, kɛ́ mà Lua Nisĩna gbae daɛ́ á zɛdↄa yã́i.
Beewa á luanaaikɛa ń ma pↄ́o a wá baade gba sↄ̃.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, má ye àↄ dↄ̃ kɛ́ miↄ dilɛ mↄ̀ↄmↄↄ mà mↄ á gwai kɛ́ mà a zĩ gbɛ e á guu, lá má è buipãleↄ guuwa, ↄ̃ e tia mi zɛ'eo.
Gɛlɛki yãmanaↄ ń Gɛlɛki yãmansaiↄ píi, ladↄ̃naↄ ń ladↄ̃nsaiↄ píi, an yã́ gↄ̃̀ ma yã́ ũɛ.
Bee yã́i ma mɛ wã̀ mà baonapi kpá á Lomadeↄnɛ sↄ̃.
Mili widɛ ń baonapi yã́oo. Ɔ̃mɛ gbãa pↄ́ Lua ì gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ a náaikɛↄ suabaò ũ, atɛ̃sa Yudaↄ, an gbɛa buipãleↄ.
Baonapi ì owɛ̃ɛ lá Lua ì to yã́ bↄńnↄ na. A dɛ luanaaikɛa yã́ ũ adoɛ, lá wa kɛ̃̀ lá guuwa wà mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua tò yã́ bↄ̀aànↄ na a náai pↄ́ àlɛ kɛ yã́i aↄ ku.
Za musu ↄ̃ Lua ì a pↄkũma bↄbↄ gbɛ̃nazĩna pↄ́ an vãikɛa ì zɛzↄ̃ sĩanaɛↄwa an pãkpaaazi ń ń vãikɛao yã́i.
Yã́ pↄ́ wa fↄ̃ dↄ̃ Lua yã́ musu ulɛanɛ́o, Lua mɛ́ yã́pi bↄ̀nɛ́ gupuau.
Za gↄↄ pↄ́ à dṹnia kàlɛ, aà gbãa láasai ń aà luakɛ pↄ́ wìli e ń wɛ́oo bↄ̀ gupuau aà zĩↄ guu wásawasa. Ayãmɛto gbɛ̃nazĩna awa vĩo.
Aa Lua dↄ̃, ãma aali aà kpɛla a zɛ́wa aa aà sáaukpào. An làasooↄ sↄũkũ̀, ↄ̃ aa gↄ̃̀ gusiau an mìsai yã́i.
Aa ńzĩa dìlɛ ↄ̃nↄnaↄ ũ, ↄ̃ aa gↄ̃̀ mìsaideↄ ũ.
Aaì kúlɛ gbɛ̃nazĩna pↄ́ ì gaↄ ń bãↄ ń nↄ̀bↄↄ ń pↄ́taa'onkuawaↄ taaɛ Lua pↄ́ lí gao gbɛu.
Ayãmɛto Lua ń kpá gbãsĩkɛaa, aa wisaiyã kɛ ń kↄ̃o, lá aalɛ a nidɛ ń nↄ̀sɛ guuwa.
Aa Lua sĩande lɛũkpakɛ̀ ń ɛɛo. Aaì kúlɛ Lua pↄkɛaↄnɛ aa zↄblenɛ́ Lua pↄ́ pↄ́pii kɛ̀ gbɛu. Ɛ̀fãaiden aà ũ gↄↄpii! Ãmi.
Ayãmɛto Lua ń kpá wisaiyã nidɛaa. Baa an nↄɛↄ yã́ pↄ́ wì kɛ lɛũkpakɛ̀ ń yã́ pↄ́ wìli kɛoo.
Màa gↄ̃ɛↄ sↄ̃ aa yã́ pↄ́ wì kɛ ń nↄɛↄ tò, aaì luakↄ̃i. Gↄ̃ɛ ń gↄ̃ɛo aaì wisaiyã kɛ ń kↄ̃o, aaì a gbɛ'e ńzĩawa an sã́sãa lɛ́u.
Lá aai we zɛ̀ ń Lua dↄ̃aoo, ↄ̃ à ń kpá làasookpaanlayãa, kɛ́ aaↄ yã́ pↄ́ dɛ wà kɛoↄ kɛ.
Yãvãi píi pɛ̀ɛmá: Nↄ̀sɛpãsĩ, bĩi, ĩ́isɛa ń kↄ̃o, wɛdↄakↄ̃ɛ, gbɛ̃dɛa, sòle, gbɛ̃blea ń kↄ̃nikɛao. Gupɛaanaↄn ń ũ,
gbɛ̃yaanaↄ, Lua ibɛɛↄ, gbɛ̃́ taiinkɛnaↄ, yↄ̃̀ↄdeↄ, ĩ́andãnaↄ, vãi làasookɛnaↄ, de ń dao yãmansaiↄ,
mìsaideↄ, náaisaideↄ, gbɛ̃́yãkɛnsaiↄ, sósobisaideↄ.
Aa dↄ̃ Lua dìlɛ kɛ́ yãbeetaakɛnaↄ kà wà ń dɛdɛ, kási aali zɛ ń a kɛao adoo, aaì tɛ́kpa a kɛnaↄgu lↄɛ.
Ayãmɛto n gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ni gbɛ̃pãle tàae e, ń awa vĩo. Tó n gbɛ̃pãle tàae è, n nzĩa dàyãuɛ, asa n gbɛ̃taae'ena ni kɛ màa sↄ̃ɛ.
Wá dↄ̃ kɛ́ Lua yã́kpalɛkɛa ń yãbeetaakɛnaↄ maaɛ.
N gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ni yãbeetaakɛnaↄ tàae e mɛ́ ni kɛ sↄ̃, ńlɛ e ńyↄ̃ bↄ Lua yã́kpalɛu yã̀?
Ge ńlɛ dↄ́ɛ ń Lua maakɛa zↄ̃ↄo ń aà mɛnao ń aà sùuuo yã̀? Kɛ́ Lua lɛ́ maakɛnɛ kɛ́ ǹ nↄ̀sɛlilɛ, ń dↄ̃o lé?
N swã́gbãakɛ̀, ni nↄ̀sɛlilɛo, ↄ̃ ńlɛ pↄkũma kãaanzi e luapↄkũmabↄbↄmagↄↄzĩ, tó Lua yã́kpalɛkɛa ń gbɛ̃́ↄ a zɛ́wa bↄ̀ gupuau.
A fĩabo baadeɛ a yãkɛawa.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ gawi ń bɛɛɛo ń wɛ̃ni láasaio wɛɛlɛ aalɛ maakɛ ń mɛnaoↄ àizãna e.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ anzĩa pↄeã lɛ́ dↄaanɛ́, aa gì sĩanai aa tɛ vãiwaↄ sↄ̃, Lua a pↄkũma ń pↄkpɛ̃nɛo bↄbↄmá.
Wɛ́tɛ̃a ń wãwão a vãikɛna píi le, atɛ̃sa Yudaↄ, an gbɛa buipãleↄ.
Lua a maakɛna píi gba gawi ń bɛɛɛo ń aafiao, atɛ̃sa Yudaↄ, an gbɛa buipãleↄ.
Asa Lua lí gbɛ̃e zãboo.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ duunakɛ̀ Mↄizi ikoyã dↄ̃sai, a kaalɛ màa ikoyãpi saiɛ. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ duunakɛ̀ naa ikoyãpi ↄzĩ sↄ̃, Lua a yã́kpalɛkɛaànↄ ikoyãpi musuɛ.
I kɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ ikoyã ma ń swã́o mɛ́ maa Luaɛo. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ zĩkɛwà mɛ́ a bↄ maa.
Tó bui pↄ́ aa Mↄizi ikoyã dↄ̃oↄ yã́ pↄ́ kpàaĩo kɛ̀ ń ńzĩao, aa ikoyã vĩ ńzĩawaɛ.
Aalɛ ↄlↄwɛ̃ɛ kɛ́ yã́ pↄ́ kú ikoyãpi guu kú ń nↄ̀sɛuɛ. An làasoo lɛ́ a sĩana o lↄ, asa an làasoo mɛ̀ndoo, a keeↄ ì ń dayãu, a keeↄ ì ń bↄu.
Màa yã́kpalɛkɛgↄↄzĩ Lua a yã́kpalɛkɛ ń gbɛ̃nazĩnaↄ yã́ pↄ́ ulɛa an nↄ̀sɛu musu ń Kilisi Yesu gbãao, lá baona pↄ́ málɛ kpá òwa.
N Yuda ia, n zɛ ń n Yudakɛo, ń Mↄizi ikoyã náai vĩ, ńlɛ Lua yↄ̃̀ↄkɛ.
Ń Lua pↄeã dↄ̃, ń yãmaa dↄ̃ ikoyãpi guu.
Ńlɛ e ń dɛ vĩ̀aↄ wɛde ũ, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú gusiauↄ filia ũ,
wɛ́siadeↄ yãdanɛde ũ, gbɛ̃́ dafuↄ mɛtulu ũ. Ńlɛ e Lua ikoyã mɛ́ dↄ̃a ń sĩanao mi ũ.
N gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ni yãda gbɛ̃pãleↄnɛ, bↄ́yãi nili da nzĩaɛo ni? N mɛ̀ wasu kpã́i'oo, mɛ́ ni o sↄ̃ bɛ?
Ni mɛ wasu wúlɛ ń gbɛ̃pãle nↄoo, mɛ́ ni wúlɛò sↄ̃ bɛ? Ni saka tã́aↄgu, mɛ́ ni ń kpɛ́ pↄ́ↄ kpã́i'o sↄ̃ bɛ?
Ni yↄ̃̀ↄkɛ Lua ikoyã musu, ↄ̃ n ikoyãpi dasai ì Lua tↄ́ ↄ̃̀ↄkpa.
Asa á yã́i buipãleↄ ìↄ Lua tↄbɛ̃ɛsi lá a kɛ̃a láuwa.
Tó ń Lua ikoyã kũa, ↄ̃ tↄ̃zↄ̃a ài vĩnɛ. Tó ńlɛ a yãda sↄ̃o, ń sáa ń gyafↄↄdeↄɛ.
Tó gyafↄↄde Lua ikoyãↄ kũa, Lua a gyafↄↄdepi gwa sáa ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ tↄ̃zↄ̃̀oo lé?
Baa tó ń iko lápi kũa mɛ́ n tↄ̃zↄ̃̀, tó ni ikoyãpi dao, gyafↄↄde pↄ́ ìↄ kũa a to yã́ zↄ̃lɛmaɛ.
Lá kua Yuda zálala ũá mɛkaa yã́ no, màa tↄ̃zↄ̃a zálalaá mɛkaa yã́n sↄ̃o.
Lá kua Yuda zálala ũá nↄ̀sɛ yã́ɛ, tↄ̃zↄ̃a zálalaá nↄ̀sɛ yã́ɛ sↄ̃. Lua Nisĩna zĩɛ, i kɛ aà ikoyã lá yã́ no. Lua mɛ́ ì gbɛ̃́ bee taa sáaukpa, i kɛ gbɛ̃nazĩna no.
Dɛa Yuda ũ kã́fĩa kpele a vĩi? Ài kpele tↄ̃zↄ̃a vĩi?
A kã́fĩa vĩ zↄ̃ↄ yã́pii guu. Sɛ̃́ia gĩa Lua a yã́ nànɛ́ ń ↄzĩɛ.
Kɛ́ an gbɛ̃eↄ náai vĩo, bↄ́ a vĩi? An náaisai mɛ́ a Lua náai bãdɛa?
Ó! Aawo! Lua náai vĩ, baa kɛ́ gbɛ̃́piiá ɛɛdeɛ, lá a kɛ̃a láuwa wà mɛ̀: Tó n yã'ò, n yã́ aↄ zɛvĩ, tó wà yã́kpalɛkɛ̀nnↄ, n yã́ a ble.
