Tó wá vãikɛ lɛ́ Lua maakɛ bↄ gupuau, bↄ́ yã́ wá oi? Wá o Lua yã́ zɛvĩo, kɛ́ ì pↄkũmabↄbↄwá yã́i yã̀? Gbɛ̃nazĩna yã'oa ↄ̃ málɛ owa.
O! Aawo! Tó Lua yã́ zɛvĩo, kpelewa a fↄ̃ yã́kpalɛkɛ ń dṹniaoi?
Gbɛ̃e a mɛ, tó a ɛɛdekɛ lɛ́ Lua náai kã́fĩ mɛ́ àlɛ aà tↄbↄ, bↄ́yãi a yãdaaàla lán duunkɛnawai?
Tó ń ò màa ńlɛ mɛ wà yãvãikɛ, yãmaa i bↄu. Gbɛ̃eↄ ma tↄbɛ̃ɛsì aa mɛ̀ màa mi o. Lua yãdaanla kↄ̃sìńnↄ.
Too! Wá Yudaↄ wá sã̀ↄ yã̀? Aawo bá! Asa ma bↄbↄ ń Yudaↄ ń buipãleↄ píi kↄ̀, ampiiá duuna zↄↄnɛ.
A kɛ̃a Lua taalau wà mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃e maao, baa do.
Laaidee kuo, luakĩiwɛɛlɛnae kuo.
Aa pã̀alɛ ḿpii, aa fↄkpà, yãmaakɛnae kuo, baa do.
An nↄ̀sɛ dɛ lán kaadↄɛmbɛwaɛ. Aaì lɛnakasanɛ́, mlɛ̃̀ sɛwɛ kú ń lɛ́u,
yã́'ĩi ń gbɛ̃́kaao mɛ́ ń lɛ́ pà.
Aa wãa ń gbɛ̃dɛao,
aaì músi ń pↄsiao kpáńzi,
aa aafia zɛ́ dↄ̃o,
aa Lua vĩa vĩo.
Wá dↄ̃ kɛ́ Lua ikoyã píi dɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú a ↄzĩↄ yã́ ũɛ, kɛ́ gbɛ̃́pii lɛ́ gↄ̃ kpaaũa, dṹnia gbɛ̃́pii i gↄ̃ tàaede ũ Luaɛ.
Asa gbɛ̃e a bↄ maa Luaɛ ikoyãpi kũa yã́io. Lua ikoyã mɛ́ ì to wà duuna dↄ̃.
Lá Lua ì to yã́ bↄńnↄ na bↄ̀ gupuau sa, lá a yã́ kú Mↄizi ikoyã ń ãnabiↄ láↄ guuwa. I kɛ aà ikoyã kũa yã́ no.
Lua ì to yã́ bↄńnↄ na Yesu Kilisi náaikɛa yã́iɛ. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ aà náaikɛ píi yã́ɛ, asa gbɛ̃e adoo.
Gbɛ̃́pii duunakɛ̀, ↄ̃ aa kɛ̃̀sã Lua gawii.
Lua ì to yã́ bↄńnↄ na gba ũ a gbɛ̃kɛ yã́i ń Kilisi Yesu pↄ́ ń bó gbãao.
Aàpi Lua kpà duuna awakpabↄ ũ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ aà au náaikɛↄnɛ, kɛ́ à ↄlↄ gbɛ̃́piiɛ i yãkɛ a zɛ́waɛ. À mɛnakɛ̀ yãa, i duun ziↄ yãdao,
ↄ̃ tia kɛ́wa a ↄ̀lↄnɛ́ i yãkɛ a zɛ́wa. Beewa Lua ì yãkɛ a zɛ́wa mɛ́ ì to yã́ bↄ ń Yesu náaikɛnaↄ na lↄ.
Lá màaɛ, gbɛ̃nazĩna a fↄ̃ ĩ́anadã lↄe? Bee kuo. Bↄ́yãi ni? Kɛ́ a dɛ yãkɛa yã́ ũo, Yesu náaikɛa yã́ɛ yã́i.
Asa má è Lua ì to yã́ bↄ ń gbɛ̃́o na aà Luapi náaikɛa yã́iɛ, ikoyãkũa ku a guuo.
Luaá Yudaↄ Luaɛ ńdoa? Buipãleↄ Luan sↄ̃oa? Ao, buipãleↄ Luaɛ lↄ.
Asa Lua mɛ̀ndoɛ. A to yã́ bↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ tↄ̃zↄ̃̀o na a náai pↄ́ àlɛ kɛ yã́iɛ, mɛ́ a to yã́ bↄ ń gyafↄↄdeo na a náai doũpi musu lↄ.
Wálɛ ikoyã bãdɛ ń luanaaikɛao yã̀? Màa no, wálɛ a kpɛlaɛ.
Wá Yudaↄ, wá o kpelewa wá dezi káau Ablahaũ yã́ musu ni?
Tó Lua tò yã́ bↄ̀aànↄ na yã́ pↄ́ a kɛ̀ yã́iɛ, dↄ̃ à fↄ̃̀ ĩ́anadã̀. Ãma a fↄ̃ dã Luaɛo.
Kpelewa wa ò lá guui? Wà mɛ̀ Ablahaũ Lua náaikɛ̀, ↄ̃ Lua tò yã́ bↄ̀aànↄ na.
Fĩaboa zĩkɛnaɛá gbɛ̃kɛkɛaɛ̀ no, aà aseaɛ.
Baa tó gbɛ̃́ lɛ́ yãe kɛo, tó àlɛ Lua pↄ́ ì to yã́ bↄ ń tàaedeↄ na náaikɛ, Lua a to yã́ bↄaànↄ na a náai pↄ́ àlɛ kɛ yã́iɛ.
Davidi gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua tò yã́ bↄ̀aànↄ na yãekɛsai báaa'ea yã'ò à mɛ̀:
Báaadeↄn gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua ń tàaeↄ wòlomá à ń duuna kɛ̃̀máↄ ũ.
Báaaden gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Dii a aà duuna yãdao ũ.
Báaa beeá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ tↄ̃zↄ̃̀ pↄ́ɛ adoa, ge gyafↄↄde pↄ́ɛ lↄ? Wà mɛ̀ Lua tò yã́ bↄ̀ ń Ablahaũo na, kɛ́ à a náaikɛ̀ yã́iɛ.
Kpelewa Ablahaũ dɛ gↄↄ pↄ́ Lua tò yã́ bↄ̀aànↄ nai? Aà tↄ̃zↄ̃aa ge gyafↄↄdeɛ? I tↄ̃zↄ̃o, gyafↄↄdeɛ.
Ɔ̃ à tↄ̃zↄ̃̀, kɛ́ Lua tò yã́ bↄ̀aànↄ na a gyafↄↄgↄↄ seela ũ. Màa a dɛ gyafↄↄde pↄ́ Lua tò yã́ bↄ̀ńnↄ na Luapi náaikɛa yã́iↄ píi dezi ũ.
A dɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa tↄ̃zↄ̃̀ↄ dezi ũ lↄɛ. I kɛ an tↄ̃zↄ̃a yã́i no, kɛ́ aa tɛ́ wá dezi Ablahaũ pↄ́ Lua náaikɛ̀ a gyafↄↄgↄↄ iai yã́iɛ.
Lua lɛgbɛ̃̀ Ablahaũɛ ń aà buiↄ à mɛ̀ dṹnia a gↄ̃ ń pↄ́ ũ. I kɛ aà ikoyã kũa yã́i no, kɛ́ Lua tò yã́ bↄ̀aànↄ na a náai pↄ́ a kɛ̀ yã́iɛ.
Tó gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa ikoyã kũaↄ mɛ́ aa kible, dↄ̃ luanaaikɛa ài vĩo, mɛ́ Lua lɛgbɛ̃a kɛ̀ famaɛ,
asa ikoyã ì mↄ́ ń Lua pↄkũmaoɛ. Gu pↄ́ ikoyã kúuo, tàae líↄ ku we sↄ̃o.
Ayãmɛto pↄ́ pↄ́ Lua a lɛgbɛ̃̀ eaá aà náaikɛa yã́ɛ, kɛ́ àↄ dɛ aà gbɛ̃kɛyã ũ. Beewa lɛgbɛ̃apiá Ablahaũ buipiↄ píi pↄ́ɛ, i kɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa Mↄizi ikoyã kũa ńtɛ̃ɛↄ no, ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ Lua náaikɛ lán Ablahaũwaↄɛ lↄ. Ablahaũá wápii deziɛ.
A dɛ wá dezi ũ Lua kĩ́i, lá a kɛ̃a láuwa. Lua mɛ̀ a aà dìlɛ bui dasiↄ dezi ũ. Ablahaũ Lua pↄ́ ì wɛ̃ni kpa gɛↄwa ì to pↄ́ pↄ́ kú yãaoↄ àↄ ku náaikɛ̀.
À Lua náaikɛ̀, à wɛdↄ̀ pↄ́ pↄ́ gbɛ̃e wɛ́ dↄiozi, ↄ̃ à gↄ̃̀ bui dasiↄ dezi ũ lá Lua òɛ̀wa à mɛ̀, aà buiↄ aaↄ dasi lán saanaↄwa.
Ablahaũ kà wɛ̃̀ basↄo taawa. Baa tó à làasookɛ̀ a gↄ̃ɛkɛbↄsaiwa ń Sala nɛasakpɛ kákaao, aà luanaaikɛa lí busao.
Ìli seakɛ lɛ́ pↄ́ Lua gbɛ̃̀ɛwao, i gí Lua náaikɛio, ↄ̃ à gbãa'è a luanaaikɛawa à Lua tↄbↄ̀,
asa a dↄ̃ a fɛ̃a vĩo, Lua gbãa kà à lɛ́ pↄ́ á gbɛ̃̀pi kɛ.
Ayãmɛto Lua tò yã́ bↄ̀aànↄ na.
Wi yã́ bↄaaànↄ napi kɛ̃ aà yã́i adoo,
wa kɛ̃̀ wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua a to yã́ bↄwanↄ naↄ yã́iɛ lↄ, wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wálɛ Lua pↄ́ wá Dii Yesu bↄ̀ gau náaikɛↄ.
Lua aà kpàmá kɛ́ à e wá tàaeↄ kɛ̃́wá yã́iɛ, ↄ̃ à aà bↄ̀ gau, kɛ́ yã́ e bↄwanↄ na yã́i.
Lá Lua tò yã́ bↄ̀wanↄ na a náai pↄ́ wálɛ kɛ yã́i, wá naaànↄ sa ń wá Dii Yesu Kilisi gbãao.
Aà náaikɛa guu wa zɛ'è aà sabai wa gɛ̃ Lua gbɛ̃kɛ pↄ́ wá kuopi guu, ↄ̃ wálɛ pↄnakɛ ń Lua gawi pↄ́ wá wɛ́ dↄio.
I kɛ bee ado no, wálɛ pↄnakɛ ń wá taasikɛao lↄ, kɛ́ wá dↄ̃ taasikɛa ì mↄ́ ń mɛnao,
mɛna ì mↄ́ ń dàa maao, dàa maa ì mↄ́ ń wɛdↄa Luazio,
mɛ́ wɛdↄa Luazipi fama vĩo, asa Lua a Nisĩna pìsi wá nↄ̀sɛu, ↄ̃ a tò wá dↄ̃̀ a yewázi.
Wá gbãasai guu Kilisi gà wá vãikɛnaↄ wá gbɛu gↄↄ pↄ́ Lua dìlɛwa.
Baa gaa gbɛ̃maa gbɛu àao. Tó gbɛ̃́ a we ga gbɛ̃maa gbɛu, wá dↄ̃o,
ↄ̃ Lua ↄ̀lↄwɛ̃ɛ lá á yewázi, asa wá duundekɛ guu ↄ̃ Kilisi gà wá gbɛu.
Lá wa bↄ maa sa Kilisi au yã́i, Kilisipi wá sia Lua pↄkũmawa sea vĩ lↄe?
Yãa wá ĩ́i ń Luaoɛ, ↄ̃ wa kɛaànↄ na aà Nɛ́ gaa yã́i. Lá wa kɛaànↄ na sa, wá suabaa aà kua wɛ̃ni guu yã́i sea vĩ lↄe?
I kɛ beeɛ adoo, wálɛ pↄnakɛ ń Luao lↄ ń wá Dii Yesu Kilisi pↄ́ tò wa kɛaànↄ na gbãao.
Gbɛ̃́ mɛ̀ndo mɛ́ tò duuna gɛ̃̀ dṹnia guu, ↄ̃ duuna ga ì. Beewa ga lì gbɛ̃́piia, kɛ́ gbɛ̃́pii duunakɛ̀ yã́i.
Duuna ku dṹnia guu e Lua ikoyã àↄ gɛ́ mↄ́i. Gↄↄ pↄ́ ikoyã kuo, Lua i duuna yãdao,
ãma sɛa Adamuwa e à gɛ̀ pɛ̀ Mↄiziwa ga ikokɛ̀ gbɛ̃́piiwa, baa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aai duunakɛ lán Adamu zãayãwawaoↄ. Adamupiá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a mↄ taaɛ.
Ãma Lua gba muaa ń Adamu tàaeoo, asa lá dasi gà Adamu ado zãa yã́wa yã́i, Lua gbɛ̃kɛ ń a gba pↄ́ lì dasila Yesu Kilisi ado gbɛ̃kɛ yã́io dɛ beea.
Lua gba muaa ń gbɛ̃́ mɛ̀ndo duunapioo. Tàae mɛ̀ndopi mɛ́ mↄ̀ ń yã́kpalɛkɛao, ↄ̃ yã́ zↄ̃̀lɛ gbɛ̃nazĩnaↄwa. Tàaeↄ mↄ̀ ń Lua gbɛ̃kɛkɛanɛ́o, ↄ̃ yã́ bↄ̀ ń gbɛ̃́ↄ na.
Lá Adamu ado tàae mɛ́ tò ga ikokɛ̀, Yesu Kilisi ado yã́ pↄ́ à mↄ̀ò zↄ̃ↄ dɛ beea. Aà yã́i gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua gbɛ̃kɛkɛ̀nɛ́ a tò yã́ bↄ̀ńnↄ na gba ũↄ kible àizãna guu.
Beewa lá tàae mɛ̀ndopi tò yã́ zↄ̃̀lɛ bui píiwa, màa lↄ maakɛa mɛ̀ndopi ì to bui píi bↄ maa, aai àizãnable.
Lá gbɛ̃́ mɛ̀ndo swã́gbãa mɛ́ tò dasi gↄ̃̀ duundeↄ ũ, màa lↄ gbɛ̃́ mɛ̀ndo yãmaa mɛ́ a to dasi bↄ maa.
Ikoyã mↄ̀ kɛ́ tàae e àↄ kã́fĩ yã́iɛ. Lá duuna lɛ́ kã́fĩ, Lua gbɛ̃kɛ ìↄ diadiɛ.
Lá duuna kiblea mↄ̀ ń gao, màa lↄ Lua gbɛ̃kɛ kiblea ì to wà bↄ maa, wí àizãnable ń wá Dii Yesu Kilisi gbãao.
Wá o kpelewa ni? Wá gi wàↄ tɛ duunawa kɛ́ Lua gbɛ̃kɛ e àↄ kã́fĩ yã̀?
Ó'o! Aawo! Wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wá dɛ gɛↄ ũ duuna yã́ musu, kpelewa wá gi wàↄ tɛ duunawa lↄi?
Wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wa da'ilɛkɛ̀ Kilisi Yesu pↄ́ ũↄ, á dↄ̃ kɛ́ wá sãnuaànↄ aà ga guuo lé?
Wa gaaànↄ, wà wá vĩ́aànↄ da'ilɛkɛa guu, lá Kilisi bↄ̀ gau ń a Mae gbãa gawideo, kɛ́ wápiↄ sↄ̃ wàↄ kú ń wɛ̃ni dafuo màa.
Lá wa naawà lán sàwakula ń gbalaowa aà ga guu, wá gↄ̃aànↄ màa aà vua guu lↄ.
Wá dↄ̃ kɛ́ wà wá kua zi pà lipãakↄ̃awa ń Kilisio, wá mɛ̀ duunde i midɛ, kɛ́ wásu wàↄ zↄble duunaɛ lↄo,
asa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gà bↄ̀ duuna yã́uɛ.
Lá wa ga ń Kilisio, wá a náai vĩ kɛ́ wáↄ kuaànↄ lↄ.
Wá dↄ̃ lá Kilisi bↄ̀ gau, a gaa vĩ lↄo, ga iko vĩwà lↄo.
Asa kɛ́ à gà, à gà duuna yã́ musu gɛ̃n doɛ, mɛ́ lá a ku tia, a ku Lua pↄ́ ũ.
Màa ápiↄ sↄ̃, à ázĩa dilɛ gɛↄ ũ duuna yã́ musu, íↄ ku Lua pↄ́ ũ naa Kilisi Yesuwa.
A yã́i ásu to duuna kible á mɛ̀ gɛwa, a dↄ́ɛ'ĩi dↄaaɛ́ lↄo.
Ásu à á mɛgue kpa duunawa vãikɛbↄ ũo. À ázĩa kpa Luawa gàbↄↄ ũ, í á mɛguↄ kpawà yãmaakɛbↄↄ ũ.
Ásu to duuna àↄ iko vĩwá lↄo, asa á na ikoyã ↄzĩo, sema Lua gbɛ̃kɛ.
Kpelewan wei? Lá wá kú ikoyã ↄzĩ lↄo, sema Lua gbɛ̃kɛ ↄzĩ, wáↄ tɛ duunawa yã̀? Ó'o! Aawo!
Á dↄ̃ tó a ázĩa kpà gbɛ̃́wa, álɛ misiilɛɛ̀, á dɛ ade zↄ ũo lé? Tó duuna a ázĩa kpàwà, á gaɛ. Tó a misìilɛ Luaɛ sↄ̃, á bↄ maa.
Wa sáaukɛ̀ ń Luao, asa duuna zↄↄn á ũ yãa, ↄ̃ a misìilɛ yã́ pↄ́ wa dàɛ́ zɛ́zɛɛ ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo.
A bↄ duuna yã́u, a gↄ̃ maakɛa zↄↄ ũ.
Málɛ bee o gbɛ̃nazĩna yã'oawa á gbãasai yã́iɛ. Lá a á mɛ kpà yãa gbãsĩ ń yãvãiↄwa zↄↄ ũ, a vãikɛ̀, màa tia lↄ à á mɛ kpa maakɛawa zↄↄ ũ, á kua iↄ adoa.
Kɛ́ á dɛ duuna zↄↄ ũ yãa, á bàa kú ń yãmaakɛaoo.
Ài kpele á è yã́ pↄ́ á kɛ̀ yãa, à kɛ̀ɛ́ wíyã ũ tiaↄ musui? Yã́piↄ midɛaá gaɛ.
Tiasa lá a bↄ duuna yã́u, álɛ zↄble Luaɛ, ài pↄ́ á e mɛ́ kua adoa pↄ́ a midɛ ń wɛ̃ni láasaio ũ.
Duuna aseaá gaɛ, ãma gba pↄ́ Lua ì dawɛ̃ɛ naa wá Dii Kilisi Yesuwa guu mɛ́ wɛ̃ni láasai ũ.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, málɛ yã'oɛ́ lán gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Mↄizi ikoyã dↄ̃ↄwa. Á dↄ̃ kɛ́ ikoyãpi iko vĩ gbɛ̃́wa gↄↄ pↄ́ a ku noa?
Màa ikoyãpi nↄzãe yè a zã́wa gↄↄ pↄ́ a bɛ̃́ɛ. Tó gↄ̃ gà, ↄ̃ ikoyãpi ì polowà.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ aà zã́ kú, tó à gↄ̃̀ gↄ̃ pãle pↄ́ ũ, wa oɛ̀ dↄ́ɛ'ĩideɛ. Tó aà zã́ gàɛ sↄ̃, ikoyãpi pòlowàn we. Tó à gↄ̃̀ gↄ̃ pãle pↄ́ ũ sa, beeá dↄ́ɛ'ĩi yã́n lↄo.
Màa ápiↄ sↄ̃ ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, a ga ikoyã musu Kilisi mɛ guu, ↄ̃ a gↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ bↄ̀ gaupi pↄ́ ũ, kɛ́ wà e kã́fĩakɛ Luaɛ.
Kɛ́ wá dàa dↄ̀aawɛ̃ɛ yãa, ikoyã mɛ́ tò duuna ni wá dɛ́ wá mɛ guu, ↄ̃ wa kã́fĩakɛ̀ gaɛ.
Tia sↄ̃ wa ga pↄ́ pↄ́ wá kṹ zↄ ũpi yã́ musu, wa bↄ ikoyãu, ↄ̃ wálɛ zↄble Luaɛ zɛ́ dafu guu ń aà Nisĩna gbãao, i kɛ ikoyã lá zɛ́ zi no.
Wá o kpelewa ni? Lua ikoyãá duuna yã̀? Aawo bá! Ikoyãpi mɛ́ tò ma duuna dↄ̃̀. Tó ikoyã i mɛ wasu pↄ́ bĩikɛoo, dↄ̃ mi dↄ̃ lá pↄ́ bĩikɛa dɛo.
Duuna zɛkĩi è yã́ pↄ́ Lua dìlɛpiwa, ↄ̃ a tò pↄ́pii ni ma dɛ. Asa kɛ́ má ikoyã dↄ̃o, duuna dɛmɛɛ yãe ũo.
Yãa kɛ́ má ikoyã dↄ̃o, má bɛ̃́ɛɛ. Kɛ́ ma yãdilɛapi mà, duuna vù iu,
ↄ̃ ma ga. Yãdilɛa pↄ́ dɛ à wɛ̃ni kpaapi ga ìmɛɛ.
Duuna zɛkĩi è yãdilɛapiwa, ↄ̃ à ma sãsã à ma dɛ yã́pi sabai.
Beewa ikoyãpi kua adoa, mɛ́ yã́ pↄ́ Lua dìlɛpi kua adoa, a zɛvĩ mɛ́ a maa.
Yãmaa mɛ́ tò ma gaa? Aawo bá! Kɛ́ duuna e bↄ gupuau, ↄ̃ à yãmaa mↄaokɛ̀, a tò ma ga. Beewa wa duuna dↄ̃̀ duuna ũ yãdilɛapi sabai.
Wá dↄ̃ kɛ́ ikoyãpiá Lua yã́ɛ. Mapi sↄ̃, dàaden ma ũ, má na duuna ↄzĩ.
Miliↄ yã́ pↄ́ málɛ kɛ gbadↄ̃o, asa mili yã́ pↄ́ má ye mà kɛ kɛo, yã́ pↄ́ má ye mà kɛo ↄ̃ mi kɛ.
Tó yã́ pↄ́ má kɛ̀ i kpaaĩ ń ma pↄeãoo, ma we ikoyãpi maakɛi.
I kɛ mámɛ málɛ kɛo, duuna pↄ́ kú ma guuɛ.
Má dↄ̃ yãmaa ku ma guuo, ma dàa maao. Miↄ ye mà yãmaakɛ, ãma mili fↄ̃ má kɛ̀o.
Yãmaa pↄ́ má ye mà kɛ, mili kɛo. Yãvãi pↄ́ má yeio ↄ̃ mi kɛ.
Tó yã́ pↄ́ má yeio ↄ̃ málɛ kɛ, i kɛ mámɛ málɛ kɛo, duuna pↄ́ kú ma guuɛ.
Má è tó má ye mà maakɛ, vãi mɛ́ ì dↄaamɛɛ.
Lua ikoyã mɛ́ ì kɛmɛɛ na ma sↄ̃ guu,
ãma má è iko pãle ku ma mɛ guu, ìↄ zĩka ń iko pↄ́ kú ma nↄ̀sɛ guuo, a tò má na duuna iko pↄ́ kú ma mɛ guu ↄzĩ.
Ma wɛ̃nade ia, démɛ a ma si ma mɛ̀ gɛɛ beewai?
Ma sáaukɛ̀ ń Luao! Ń wá Dii Yesu Kilisi gbãao. Beewa ↄ̃ mi zↄble Lua ikoɛ ma làasoo guu, mɛ́ mi zↄble duuna ikoɛ ma dàa guu.
Yã́ a zↄ̃lɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa naa Kilisi Yesuwaↄwa lↄo,
asa naa Kilisi Yesuwa Lua Nisĩna Wɛ̃nikpamade gbãa ma bↄ gbãa pↄ́ duuna ń gao lɛ́ mↄmɛɛ guu.
Yã́ pↄ́ Mↄizi ikoyã i fↄ̃ kɛ̀o gbɛ̃nazĩna gbãasaikɛ yã́i Lua kɛ̀. À azĩa Nɛ́ zĩ̀ gbɛ̃nazĩna ũ lán wá duundeↄwa duuna woloawá yã́i, ↄ̃ à widà duunawa a Nɛ́ mɛpi guu,
kɛ́ yã́ pↄ́ ikoyã lɛ́ wɛɛlɛ sĩana kɛ wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wá dàa lɛ́ dↄaawɛ̃ɛ lↄo, sema Lua Nisĩnaↄwa.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ an dàa lɛ́ dↄaanɛ́ↄ ì laaidↄ ń dàa yã́wa. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua Nisĩna lɛ́ dↄaanɛ́ↄ ì laaidↄ Lua Nisĩna yã́wa.
Laaidↄa dàa yã́waá gaɛ. Laaidↄa Lua Nisĩna yã́waá wɛ̃ni ń aafiaoɛ.
Laaidↄa dàa yã́waá ĩ́isɛa ń Luaoɛ. Ade lí misiilɛ Lua ikoyãɛo, a fↄ̃ seo.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ an dàa lɛ́ dↄaanɛ́ↄ yã́ lí ká Luaguo.
Ápiↄ sↄ̃, á dàa lɛ́ dↄaaɛ́o, sema Lua Nisĩna, tó a kú á guu sĩana. Tó gbɛ̃́ Kilisi Nisĩna vĩ sↄ̃o, a dɛ Kilisi gbɛ̃́ ũo.
Tó Kilisi kú á guu, baa tó á mɛ dɛ gɛ ũ duuna yã́i, Lua Nisĩna dɛɛ́ wɛ̃ni ũɛ, kɛ́ Lua tò yã́ bↄ̀ánↄ na yã́i.
Tó Lua pↄ́ Yesu bↄ̀ gau Nisĩna kú á guu, Lua pↄ́ Kilisipi bↄ̀ gau a wɛ̃ni kpá á mɛ̀ gɛpiwa ń a Nisĩna pↄ́ kú á guu gbãao.
Ayãmɛto ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, wá tɛ́ wá dàai teasi no.
Tó á tɛ́ á dàai, á gaɛ. Tó a á yãvãikɛaↄ mìdɛ ń Lua Nisĩna gbãao sↄ̃, áↄ ku.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua Nisĩna ì dↄaanɛ́ↄ mɛ́ Lua nɛ́ↄ ũ.
Asa tã́a pↄ́ ì to wà zↄble ń vĩao mɛ́ diɛ́o, Lua Nisĩna pↄ́ tò a gↄ̃ Lua nɛ́ↄ ũ ↄ̃ á vĩ, ↄ̃ wi wiilɛ Luawa ń aà gbãao wi mɛ: Baa, wá Mae.
Nisĩnapi mɛ́ ì owɛ̃ɛ wá sↄ̃u Lua nɛ́ↄn wá ũ.
Lá nɛ́ↄn wá ũ, àizɛɛblenaↄn wá ũ. Lua àizɛɛblenaↄn wá ũ, wá ble sãnu ń Kilisioɛ. Tó wa taasikɛ̀aànↄ, wáↄ kuaànↄ aà gawi guu.
Má è wá fↄ̃ gↄↄɛ bee taasi lɛɛũ ń gawi pↄ́ Lua a bↄowɛ̃ɛoo.
Lua pↄkɛaↄ píi wɛ́ dↄ aà nɛ́ↄ bↄa gupuaui láasai.
Asa Lua tò a pↄkɛaↄ píi gↄ̃̀ dↄ̀ↄsaiɛ. I kɛ an pↄeã no, Lua mɛ́ kɛ̀ màa, kɛ́ wɛdↄaaàzi guu
dṹnia a bↄ ↄ̃̀ↄkpaa pↄ́ àlɛ zↄbleɛ̀u, i dɛ̀ɛpoo Lua nɛ́ↄ gawi guu.
Wá dↄ̃ Lua pↄkɛaↄ píi lɛ́ aaukɛ ń wãwão e tia.
I kɛ dṹnia ado no, wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wa Lua Nisĩna è gba sɛ̃́ia ũↄ, wálɛ aaukɛ kpã́ikpãi sↄ̃ e Lua àↄ gɛ́ wá boi, i wá sí a nɛ́ↄ ũ.
Lua wá suabà, kɛ́ wà wɛdↄ beei. Pↄ́ pↄ́ wa è ń wɛ́oá wɛdↄia yã́ɛ lↄo. Démɛ ì wɛdↄ pↄ́ pↄ́ a èi lↄi?
Tó wá wɛ́ dↄ pↄ́ pↄ́ wi eozi sↄ̃, wiↄ dã́ ń mɛnaoɛ.
Beewa sↄ̃ Lua Nisĩna ì dↄwálɛ wá gbãasai guu, asa wá wabikɛa dↄ̃ a zɛ́wao, ↄ̃ Lua Nisĩna ì kulɛkɛwɛ̃ɛ Luaɛ ń aau pↄ́ a yã́ gɛ̃̀ oaao.
Lua ì nↄ̀sɛ guu e, mɛ́ a a Nisĩna làasoo dↄ̃, asa Lua Nisĩna ì kulɛkɛ Lua gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ lá Lua yeiwaɛ.
Wá dↄ̃ kɛ́ yã́pii ì bↄ maa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ye Luaziↄnɛ, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ à ń sisi à ń sɛ́ lá àlɛ yáwaↄ.
Asa Lua dìlɛ za káau gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a dↄaa ń dↄ̃ↄ bↄ a Nɛ́wa, kɛ́ aàↄ dɛ vĩ̀i ũ dãuna dasiↄnɛ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ à ń dílɛ za káaupiↄ ↄ̃ à ń sisi, ↄ̃ a tò yã́ bↄ̀ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ à ń sisipiↄ na, ↄ̃ à a gawi lì gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a tò yã́ bↄ̀ńnↄ napiↄnɛ.
Wá o kpelewa yã́ beeↄ musu ni? Lá Lua zɛ̀wanↄ, démɛ a bↄ wá kpɛi?
Lá i gí ń azĩa Nɛ́oo, à aà kpà wápii yã́i, a wá gba pↄ́pii lↄo lé?
Démɛ a bↄbↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua ń sɛ́ↄi? Luapi mɛ́ tò yã́ bↄ̀wanↄ na.
Démɛ a yãdawálai? Kilisi Yesu gà à ɛ̀a vù. A ku Lua ↄplaai, àlɛ kulɛkɛɛ̀wɛ̃ɛ.
Bↄ́mɛ a wá kɛ̃́ Kilisi yeawáziwai? Taasi ge wɛ́tɛ̃a ge ĩadama ge nↄana ge taasidekɛ ge kai ge fɛ̃nda, an kee a fↄ̃́e?
A ku lá guu wà mɛ̀: N yã́i wá kú ga lɛ́zĩ za kↄↄ e oosi, wì wá dilɛ lán sã pↄ́ wa ń kòlokpaↄwa.
Yã́ beeↄ píi guu wálɛ zĩble àannↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ yewázi gbãao.
Asa má dↄ̃ sã́asã kɛ́ ga ge wɛ̃ni ge malaikaↄ ge tã́aↄ ge tia yã́ ge zia yã́ ge gbãadeↄ
ge musupↄↄ ge zĩ́lɛpↄↄ ge Lua pↄkɛa pãleↄ, an kee a fↄ̃ wá kɛ̃́ Lua yeawáziwa naa wá Dii Kilisi Yesuwa guuo.
Málɛ sĩana'o naa Kilisiwaɛ, málɛ ɛɛtoo. Lua Nisĩna pↄ́ dↄ̀aa ma làasooɛ mɛ́ dɛmɛɛ yã́pi seelade ũ.
Ma pↄsia kɛ̀ zài, ma nↄ̀sɛ ìↄ yaa gↄↄpiiɛ.
Má fↄ̃ wabikɛ Luawa aà ma kɛ̃ Kilisiwa, aà láaikɛa ma Isaili deeↄ gbɛu.
Ampiↄ ↄ̃ Lua ń sɛ́ a nɛ́ↄ ũ, à a gawi ↄ̀lↄnɛ́, aà bàa kúńnↄ, à a ikoyã kpàmá, à lousisia dànɛ́, à lɛgbɛ̃̀nɛ́.
Aa dɛ Lua gbɛ̃́ káauↄ buiↄ ũ, mɛ́ an bui guu ↄ̃ Kilisi pↄ́ dɛ pↄ́piia bↄ̀u gbɛ̃nazĩna ũ. Ɔ̃mɛ Lua pↄ́ kũ̀ wàↄ a sáaukpa gↄↄpii ũ. Ãmi.
I kɛ yã́ pↄ́ Lua ò lɛ̀lɛ pã no, asa Isaili píi mɛ́ Isaili zálala ũo.
I kɛ Ablahaũ bui píi mɛ́ Ablahaũpi nɛ́ↄ ũ Luaɛo, asa Lua ò Ablahaũɛ à mɛ̀, Izaaki buiↄ ↄ̃ wàli onɛ́ aà buiↄ.
Beewa i kɛ nɛ́ pↄ́ à ń í ń pↄeãoↄ mɛ́ Lua nɛ́ↄ ũo, nɛ́ pↄ́ à ń í Lua lɛgbɛ̃a musuↄ mɛ́ dɛ buipiↄ ũ.
Asa Lua lɛgbɛ̃̀ à mɛ̀: Má ɛa mↄ zii maa'i, Sala i nɛ'i gↄ̃ɛ ũ.
I kɛ beeɛ adoo. Lua ì gbɛ̃́ↄ sɛ lá àlɛ yáwaɛ, i kɛ an yãkɛa yã́i no, kɛ́ à ń sisiɛ. Beewa kɛ́ Lɛbɛka sìaↄ nↄsì ń wá dezi káau Izaakio, e àↄ gɛ́ ń ii, e aaↄ gɛ́ maa ge vãikɛi, Lua ò Lɛbɛkaɛ a pↄ́ bↄ̀ káau a gↄ̃ nɛ́ ũ gbɛ̃́ zã́ɛ.

Lá a kɛ̃a láuwa wà mɛ̀: Má ye Yakↄbuzi, Esau sↄ̃, má yeio.
Wá o kpelewa ni? Yãvãi ku Lua kĩ́i yã̀? Aawo bá!
Asa a ò Mↄiziɛ, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ á ye sùuukɛaànↄ ↄ̃ á kɛ, mɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ á ye wɛ̃nadↄ̃ɛ̀ ↄ̃ á dↄ̃ɛ̀.
Ayãmɛto Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ sɛa i bↄ gbɛ̃nazĩna pↄeã guuo ge an kↄaikɛa, à bↄ̀ Lua sùuu guuɛ.
Asa lá guu Lua ò Falaↄ̃ↄɛ à mɛ̀: Ma n kpa kpalau kɛ́ mà a gbãa ↄlↄ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ n musuɛ, ma tↄ́ i li dṹniaa píi.
Beewa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a ye sùuukɛaànↄ ì kɛaànↄɛ, mɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a ye aà swã́gbãa kṹ, ì kṹ.
Á gbɛ̃e a ma la, bↄ́yãi Lua lɛ́ gbɛ̃́ↄ tàae e lↄi? Démɛ a fↄ̃ gi Lua pↄeãi?
N gbɛ̃nazĩna ia, dén n ũ n gbasa n yã́zãsì Luawai? Oo a a bona la, bↄ́yãi n ma bo kɛ́waia?
Oobona zɛvĩ à oo swãde ń oo swãsaio bo ń gĩ̀ doũ pↄ́ á tòtooo lé?
Tó Lua ye à a pↄkũma ↄlↄnɛ́ kɛ́ aa a gbãa dↄ̃, mɛ́ à mɛna zↄ̃ↄ kɛ̀ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛ à pↄkũmabↄbↄmá à ń kaalɛↄ sↄ̃ bɛ!
Tó à bee kɛ̀, kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛ à sùuukɛńnↄ à dↄ̀aa ń kɛkɛ aa gɛ̃ a gawi guuↄ a gawi zↄ̃ↄ dↄ̃ɛ sↄ̃ bɛ!
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua ń sisi à ń sɛ́piↄn wá ũ. I kɛ Yudaↄnɛ ńdoo, ń buipãleↄɛ sↄ̃.
Lá Lua ò ãnabi Ozee lá guuwa à mɛ̀: Bui pↄ́ dɛ ma gbɛ̃́ↄ ũoↄ ↄ̃ má onɛ́ ma gbɛ̃́ↄ. Bui pↄ́ má yeńzioↄ ↄ̃ máↄ yeńzi.
Gua pↄ́ Lua ònɛ́ aa dɛ a gbɛ̃́ↄ ũo, we wa ounɛ́ Lua bɛ̃́ɛpi nɛ́ↄ.
Isaia wiilɛ̀ Isailiↄ yã́ musu à mɛ̀: Baa tó Isailiↄ dasi lán ísialɛ ũfãawa, an kↄ̃naↄ mɛ́ a bↄ.
Asa Dii a yã́ pↄ́ a ò kɛ dṹniau, mɛ́ a a midɛ zɛzɛsaiɛ.
Lá Isaia dↄ̀aa òwa à mɛ̀: Tó Dii Zĩgↄ̃de i wá buieↄ to yãao, dↄ̃ wa gↄ̃ lán Sↄdↄũdeↄwa, wí bↄ Gↄmↄↄdeↄwa.
Wá o kpelewaɛ sa? Buipãleↄ lɛ́ wɛɛlɛ Lua to yã́ bↄńnↄ nao, ↄ̃ a tò à bↄ̀ńnↄ na. A tò yã́ bↄ̀ńnↄ na a náai pↄ́ aa kɛ yã́iɛ.
Isailiↄ sↄ̃ aalɛ wɛɛlɛ Lua to yã́ bↄńnↄ na ikoyã musu, ↄ̃ i bↄńnↄ nao.
Bↄ́yãi ni? Kɛ́ aa ye Lua to yã́ bↄńnↄ na an yãkɛa yã́ yã́iɛ, i kɛ aà náaikɛa yã́i no. Aa gɛ̃mbↄlɛ gbɛ pↄ́ ì ń pã́lɛwa,
lá a kɛ̃a láuwa: Gwa, málɛ gbɛ pↄ́ ì to wà gɛ̃mbↄlɛ dilɛ Siↄna, gbɛsi pↄ́ ì to wà fu. Wí a gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ aà náaikɛ kũo.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, yã́ pↄ́ má yei ma sↄ̃ guu, málɛ a wabikɛ Luawa mɛ́ Isailiↄ suabaa ũ.
Má dɛ a seelade ũ, kɛ́ aa ãiavĩ ń Lua yã́o, ãma an wɛ́ kɛ̃ao.
Asa aa lá Lua ì to yã́ bↄńnↄ na dↄ̃o, ↄ̃ aaìↄ wɛɛlɛ yã́ bↄńnↄ na ń ńzĩa gbãao. Aai lá Lua ì to yã́ bↄńnↄ na sio.
Asa Kilisi Mↄizi ikoyã lɛpàpa, ↄ̃ yã́ ìↄ bↄ ń aà náaikɛnaↄ na.
Lá ikoyã ì to yã́ bↄńnↄ na ↄ̃ Mↄizi ò a taalau à mɛ̀, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ yã́pi kũa aↄ ku a sabai.
Lá luanaaikɛa ì to yã́ bↄńnↄ na a ò à mɛ̀: Ńsu o n nↄ̀sɛu, démɛ a gɛ́ luabɛ à Kilisi pilaio,
ge démɛ a gɛ́ bɛdau à Kilisi bↄ gauio.
Yã́ pↄ́ a òn kɛ: Yã́pi kunnↄ kãi, a kú ń lɛ́u ń n nↄ̀sɛo. Luanaaikɛa yã́ pↄ́ wi a waasokpa ↄ̃n yã́pi ũ.
Tó ń ò ń lɛ́o gupuau Yesu mɛ́ Dii ũ, mɛ́ ń a náai vĩ n nↄ̀sɛu Lua aà bↄ̀ gau, a n suaba.
Asa yã́pi náai vĩa nↄ̀sɛu ì to gbɛ̃́ bↄ maa, mɛ́ yã́pi oa ń lɛ́o ì gbɛ̃́ suaba.
A kɛ̃a Luayãtaalau wà mɛ̀, wí a gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ aà náaikɛ kũo.
Yudaↄ ń buipãleↄ dodoa kↄ̃ɛo, asa ampii an Dii doũɛ, ì kã́fĩakɛ a sìsinaↄnɛ píi.
Asa Dii sìsinaↄ bↄ píiɛ.
Kpelewa aa aà sísi aà náaikɛsaii? Kpelewa aa aà náaikɛ aà yã́ masaii? Kpelewa aa aà yã́ ma waasokɛnasaii?
Tó wi waasokɛnaↄ zĩmáo, kpelewa aa waasokɛnɛ́i? A kɛ̃a Lua taalau wà mɛ̀: Baonakpanaↄ mↄa na.
Ãma gbɛ̃́pii i baonapi sio. Ɔ̃ Isaia mɛ̀: Dii, démɛ wá yã́ sìi?
Beewa luanaaikɛa ì bↄ aà yãmaa kĩ́iɛ, mɛ́ yã́piá Kilisi yã́ɛ.
Ma mɛ̀ yóo! Aai mao lé? Aa mà. An lↄↄ tà dṹnia guu píi, an yã'oa gɛ̀ e tↄↄlɛ lɛ́wa.
Ma mɛ̀ yóo! Isailiↄ i dↄ̃o lé? Mↄizi dↄ̀aa ò à mɛ̀: Má tó bui pↄ́ aa dɛ ma gbɛ̃́ ũoↄ á pↄ fɛlɛɛ́, má tó á pↄ pa bui wɛ́siadeↄ yã́ musu.
Ɔ̃ Isaia sↄ̃dìlɛ à Lua lɛdↄɛkɛ̀ à mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ ma kĩ́i wɛɛlɛoↄ mɛ́ ma e, ma azĩa ↄ̀lↄ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ ma gbɛaoↄnɛ.
Isailiↄ yã́ musu sↄ̃ Lua ò: Za kↄↄ e oosi ma ↄdↄ̀ bui swã́gbãade pↄ́ fɛ̃̀manↄↄzi.
Ma mɛ̀ yóo! Lua azĩa gbɛ̃́ↄ vũ̀aa yã̀? Aawo bá! Mapi, Isailin ma ũ. Ablahaũ buin ma ũ Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ bui guu.
Lua i a gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ à dↄ̀aa ń dↄ̃ↄ vũaao. Á Ɛlia yã́ pↄ́ kú lá guuɛ bee dↄ̃o lé? Kɛ́ à gɛ̀ ń Isailiↄ yã́o Lua kĩ́i à mɛ̀:
Dii, aa n ãnabiↄ dɛ̀dɛ, aa n gbagbakĩiↄ dɛ̀ɛlɛ. Mámɛ ma gↄ̃ mado, ↄ̃ aalɛ ma wɛ.
Lua ò Ɛliaɛ kpelewa ni? À mɛ̀ á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aai kúlɛ tã́aɛoↄ kũa a pↄ́ ũ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ sopla (7.000).
Màa an kↄ̃na pↄ́ Lua ń sɛ́ a gbɛ̃kɛ guuↄ gↄ̃̀ gbã lↄ.
Lá à ń sɛ́ a gbɛ̃kɛ guu, i kɛ an yãkɛa yã́i no. Tó màa no, dↄ̃ Lua gbɛ̃kɛaↄ gbɛ̃kɛ ũo.
Kpelewan wei? Isailiↄ i yã́ pↄ́ wàlɛ wɛɛlɛ eo, ãma an gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua ń sɛ́ↄ è. Gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ nↄ̀sɛ tàta,
lá a kɛ̃a láuwa wà mɛ̀: Lua kɛmazĩ'ũ kpàńzi, ↄ̃ an wɛ́ lɛ́ gu'eo, an swã́ lɛ́ yãmao e ń a gbão.
Davidi ò lↄ: To an dikpɛkɛa gↄ̃nɛ́ bai ũ, wà ń kṹ, to à yã'inɛ́, wà tↄsimá.
To an wɛ́ siakũ kɛ́ aasu gu'eo, to an wó gↄ̃ koolonnↄ gↄↄpii.
Ma mɛ̀ yóo! Kɛ́ Isailiↄ fùa, aa lɛ̀lɛ míↄmiↄ yã̀? Aawo bá! An tàaeↄ yã́i Lua buipãleↄ suabà, kɛ́ Isailiↄ nↄ̀sɛ fɛlɛ yã́i.
Lá an tàaeↄ mɛ́ tò dṹnia kã́fĩa è, mɛ́ an lɛ́lɛa mɛ́ tò buipãleↄ kã́fĩa è, tó Isailipiↄ sù ń pá ziu, wa bee o lↄa?
Málɛ yã'o á buipãleↄnɛ sa. Lá má dɛ zĩna ũ á buipãleↄ kĩ́i, máↄ ma zĩ sáaukpaɛ,
kɛ́ mà azĩa buiↄ nↄ̀sɛ fɛlɛ, mí ń gbɛ̃eↄ suabaɛ.
Lá Lua gia Isailiↄzi mɛ́ tò dṹnia kɛ̀anↄ na, tó à ɛ̀a ń sí lↄ, bee aↄ dɛai? Bee aↄ dɛ wɛ̃ni ũ gɛↄnɛɛ.
Tó wà pↄ́wɛn káau kpà Luawa, a bṹu gↄ̃̀ aà pↄ́ ũɛ. Tó lízĩna dɛ Lua pↄ́ ũ, a gↄ̃naↄ dɛ aà pↄ́ ũ lↄɛ.
Lua kuli zálala gↄ̃naeↄ zↄ̃̀zↄ̃, ↄ̃ à n gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ń dɛ kuna lí ũ pɛ̀ an gbɛu, kɛ́ ǹyↄ̃ kú ń kuli maa zĩ́na gbãao.
Ńsu saka kuli zálala gↄ̃na pↄ́ a zↄ̃̀zↄ̃ↄguo. Kpelewa ńyↄ̃ ĩ́anadãi? Ń kú lízĩna sabaiɛ, i kɛ lízĩna mɛ́ kú n sabaio.
N mɛ̀ à ligↄ̃napiↄ zↄ̃̀zↄ̃ kɛ́ à n pɛ an gbɛu yã́iɛ.
Màaɛ, à ń zↄ̃zↄ̃ kɛ́ aai a náaikɛo yã́iɛ. Mpi sↄ̃ n gↄ̃ n luanaaikɛa yã́i. Ńsu wala kɛo. Laaika!
Lá Lua i gí lí zálala gↄ̃naↄ zↄ̃zↄ̃io, a gí n zↄ̃i sↄ̃o.
Gwa lá Lua maa mɛ́ a pãsĩ. A pãsĩ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa fùwaↄ, mɛ́ a maanɛ, tó n zɛ ń aà maao. Tó màa no, a n zↄ̃ sↄ̃ɛ.
Tó Isailiↄ ń luanaaikɛsai tò, a ɛa ń pɛ́ n gbɛuɛ, asa a ń pɛa ń gbɛu gbãa vĩ.
Lua n zↄ̃ kuna líwa à n pɛ kuli zálalawa, lá wìli kɛowa. Lá a kɛ̀ màa, kù ligↄ̃n zálalaↄ ɛa pɛa ńzĩa líwa zɛvĩ dɛ beelao lé?
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, má ye àↄ asiiyãɛ bee dↄ̃, kɛ́ á wɛ́ su àↄ sia, à ázĩa dilɛ waladeↄ ũo yã́i. Isaili kĩniↄ swã́ gbãakũ̀ gĩa e buipãleↄ gɛ̃a kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́iu lɛ́ kaɛ.
Bee gbɛa Lua a Isailiↄ suaba píi lá a kɛ̃a láuwa wà mɛ̀: Suabana a bↄ Siↄna, a Yakↄbu buiↄ kɛ̃ luadↄ̃saiwa.
Ma bàakuańnↄ gↄↄ pↄ́ má ń duuna kɛ̃́má yã́n we.
Baona yã́ musu aa dɛ Lua ibɛɛↄ ũ á yã́i. Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ sɛa yã́ musu aa dɛ Lua yenzideↄ ũ an deziↄ yã́i.
Asa Lua lí déndↄ̃mɛɛ kɛ gba pↄ́ á dàↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a ń sisi a ń sɛ́ↄ yã́ musuo.
Á buipãleↄ i Lua yãma yãao. Tiasa Lua sùuukɛ̀ánↄ kɛ́ Isailiↄ i aà yãmao yã́i.
Màa Isailiↄ lɛ́ Lua yãma tiao, kɛ́ Lua e sùuukɛánↄ, i gbasa sùuukɛńnↄ.
Lua yãmasai kpà gbɛ̃́piizi, kɛ́ aà e sùuukɛńnↄ píi yã́iɛ.
Lua ↄ̃nↄ ń a dↄ̃ao zↄ̃ↄkɛ lɛ́ vĩo. Gbɛ̃e yã́ pↄ́ àlɛ yá yáasi dↄ̃ píio. Gbɛ̃e a fↄ̃ à aà zɛ bↄↄlɛkɛo.
Démɛ Dii làasoo dↄ̃i? Démɛ yãdàɛ̀ aà lɛdamade ũi?
Dé Dii fĩasɛ̀wà a gbasa boɛ̀i?
Pↄ́pii bↄ̀ aà kĩ́iɛ, aa kú ń aà gbãao, mɛ́ aa ku aà pↄ́ ũ. Wàↄ aà tↄbↄ gↄↄpii. Ãmi.
Ayãmɛto ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, lá Lua wɛ̃nadↄ̃̀wɛ̃ɛ màa, ma wabikɛ̀wá à ázĩa kpawà sa'obↄ bɛ̃́ɛ sãasai pↄ́ ì kaaàgu ũ. Beewa wì kúlɛɛ̀ a zɛ́wa.
Ásu tɛ dṹnia tiaɛ bee tufaio. À to Lua á lilɛ, á làasoo i dafukũ, kɛ́ à e à aà pↄeã dↄ̃, yã́ pↄ́ maa mɛ́ ì kɛɛ̀ mɛ́ à àsaa.
Gbɛ̃kɛ pↄ́ Lua kɛ̀mɛɛ yã́i ↄ̃ málɛ o ápiiɛ, ásu ázĩa maabo dɛ a maa lɛ́ao. Á baade azĩa dilɛ a sĩana lɛ́u, lá Lua aà gbà zɛ́ aà a náaikɛwa.
Gbɛ̃nazĩna mɛ̀ mɛ̀ndo guↄ vĩ dasi, an baade ń a zĩoɛ.
Màaɛ, baa ń wá dasikɛo, wá mɛ doũ naa Kilisiwaɛ, wá dɛ kↄ̃ mɛguↄ ũ.
Wá gba dodoa kↄ̃ɛ lá Lua dàwɛ̃ɛ a gbɛ̃kɛ guuwa. Tó ãnabikɛkɛgba ń vĩ, kɛ n luanaaikɛa lɛ́u.
Tó dↄnlɛdekɛɛ, dↄńlɛ. Tó yãdaanɛ́ɛ, danɛ́.
Tó lɛdaamaɛ, damá. Tó gbadaaɛ, da bĩisai. Tó dↄaanakɛɛ, kɛ ń ãiao. Tó wɛ̃nadↄ̃anɛɛ, dↄ̃nɛ́ ń pↄnao.
Àↄ yekↄ̃i ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo. À mikɛ̃ vãiwa, í zɛ ń maao.
Àↄ gbɛ̃kɛ vĩ ń kↄ̃o nana. Àↄ kↄ̃ kpɛla ń pↄnao.
Àↄ ãiavĩ zígbiasai, á mɛ iↄ wãa Dii zĩ guu.
À pↄnakɛ yã́ pↄ́ á wɛ́ dↄi yã́ musu. À mɛnafↄ̃ taasikɛa guu. À mɛkpa wabikɛawa.
À dↄnlɛkɛ Lua gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ pↄ́ lɛ́ kɛ̃́sãmáↄnɛ. À wɛtã ń nibↄfↄ̃ao.
À samaa'o á ĩadamadeↄnɛ. À samaa'onɛ́, ásu ń kao.
À pↄnakɛ ń pↄnakɛnaↄ. À ↄ́ↄlↄ ń ↄↄlↄnaↄ.
À nↄ̀sɛdoũkɛ ń kↄ̃o. Ásuli dɛnlawɛɛlɛo. À gbɛ̃́kpa ń yɛ̃̀ɛɛsaideↄ. Ásuli ázĩa dilɛ yãdↄ̃naↄ ũo.
Ásuli vãi fĩabo ń vãioo. Àli yã́ pↄ́ maa gbɛ̃́piiɛ kɛ.
Tó a kɛ, àↄ na ń gbɛ̃́piio lá á fↄ̃́ lɛ́u.
Ma gbɛ̃́ yenzideↄ, ásuli tↄsi gbɛ̃́wao, à aà tó ń Luao. A ku lá guu wà mɛ̀: Dii mɛ̀ ámɛ á tↄsimá, ámɛ á fĩabonɛ́.
Tó nↄana lɛ́ n ibɛɛ dɛ, blɛ kpawà. Tó imiɛ, ǹ aà gba í. Tó ń kɛ̀ màa, ńlɛ aà ↄ kaɛ̀ a lɛ́uɛ.
Ńsu to vãi zĩblemao. Zĩ blewà ń maao.
Gbɛ̃́pii misiilɛ bùsu gbãadeↄnɛ, asa ikoe ku Lua lɛ́ saio. Lua mɛ́ gbãade pↄ́ kúↄ dìlɛ píi.
Ayãmɛto gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ bↄ̀ gbãade yã́ kpɛ, ade bↄ̀ yã́ pↄ́ Lua dìlɛ kpɛɛ. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ bↄ̀ ń kpɛ́ↄ ńzĩa dàyãuɛ.
I kɛ maakɛnaↄ mɛ́ lí vĩakɛ kpalablenaↄnɛo, sema vãikɛnaↄ. Tó ń ye ǹ vĩakɛ gbãadeɛo, maakɛ, i n sáaukpa.
Gbãadeá Lua zĩkɛnaɛ n aafia yã́i. Tó n vãikɛ̀ sↄ̃, vĩakɛɛ̀, asa a fɛ̃nda looa pã no. Lua zĩkɛnaɛ, ì tↄsiɛ̀ vãikɛnawaɛ.
A yã́i tò a maa àli misiilɛnɛ́. I kɛ ĩadama yã́i ado no, á làasoo yã́iɛ lↄ.
Bee yã́i i wɛ̃̀'ↄ̃a kpái sↄ̃, asa gbãadeↄá Lua zĩkɛnaↄnɛ, aalɛ zĩpi kɛɛ̀ɛ.
Àli fĩabonɛ́ píi. Àli wɛ̃̀'ↄ̃a kpá a sinawa, íli á pↄ́ↄ lá sí lↄ. Àli misiilɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛ à misiilɛɛ̀. Àli gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛ à aà yãda yãda.
Ásuli gbɛ̃e fĩa sɛo, sema yeakↄ̃i bàasio. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ye a gbɛ̃́deezi, Lua ikoyã pɛ̀ɛwàɛ.
Wà mɛ̀ ńsuli wúlɛ ń gbɛ̃pãle nↄoo, ńsuli gbɛ̃dɛo, ńsuli kpã́i'oo, ńsuli pↄ́ bĩikɛo. Yã́piↄ ń yãdilɛa pãle pↄ́ kúↄ píi kú yã́ɛ bee guuɛ wà mɛ̀: Ǹyↄ̃ ye n gbɛ̃́deezi lá nzĩa wɛ̃niwa.
Tó gbɛ̃́ ye gbɛ̃́i, ìli vãikɛ a gbɛ̃́deeɛo. Yeakↄ̃i mɛ́ Lua ikoyãpapaa ũ.
À kɛ màa, asa á gↄↄ pↄ́ wá kuwàɛ dↄ̃. Á vua iu gↄↄ kà, asa wá suabaa kãi tia dɛ gↄↄ pↄ́ wa Yesu náaikɛ̀la.
Gwãasĩna kà zã̀, gudↄa mɛ́ kãi. Wà gusia yã́ kↄ́lɛ, wí gupua gↄ̃kɛbↄↄ sɛ́lɛ.
Wàↄ kú wá dↄ̀ↄwa fãanɛ gbɛ̃́ↄ ũ lalasi kↄ̃̀ↄ ń wɛ̃dɛkɛao sai nↄdãakpaa ń wisaiyão sai, lɛkpaa ń zaakↄ̃uo sai.
À Dii Yesu Kilisi ↄlɛsɛ́. Ásuli tó á dàa zi dↄaaɛ́ à dↄ́ɛ'ĩi kɛo.
À gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ busɛ luanaaikɛa guu dilɛ yãkelesai.
Gbɛ̃e kũa á fↄ̃ pↄ́pii ble, mɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a luanaaikɛa busɛ lí nↄ̀ↄ soo.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì pↄ́pii ble suli saka gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lí pↄ́pii bleoguo, mɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lí pↄ́pii bleo suli gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì pↄ́pii ble tàae eo, asa Lua aà sìɛ.
Dén n ũ kɛ́ ńlɛ gbɛ̃pãle zĩkɛna tàae ei? Tó a fↄ̃́ ge a fↄ̃o no, aà Dii yã́ɛ. A fↄ̃́, asa Dii gbãa a to aà fↄ̃́.
Gbɛ̃e kũa gↄↄ na dɛkↄ̃a, mɛ́ gbɛ̃pãle kũa gↄↄpii sáaɛ. Baade a sↄ̃ dadoũ ń yã́ pↄ́ à zɛ̀òo.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì gↄↄ bↄ ì bↄ Dii yã́iɛ. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì pↄ́pii ble, ì ble ń Dii gbãaoɛ, ì Lua sáaukpa. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì pↄ́ tɛ̃́ ì tɛ̃ Dii yã́iɛ, ì Lua sáaukpa.
Gbɛ̃e líↄ ku azĩa yã́io, gbɛ̃e lí ga azĩa yã́io. Tó wá kú, wá kú Dii pↄ́ ũɛ,
tó wa ga, wa ga Dii pↄ́ ũɛ. Wá kún nò, wa gan nò, wá dɛ Dii pↄ́ ũɛ.
Asa Kilisi gà à vù kɛ́ àↄ dɛ gyaadeↄ ń gbɛ̃́ bɛ̃́ɛↄ Dii ũɛ.
Kɛ́ ńlɛ n gbɛ̃do tàae e sↄ̃ bɛ? Mpi sↄ̃ ńlɛ saka n gbɛ̃dogu sↄ̃ bɛ? Lua aↄ zↄ̃lɛa a gĩ́naa, wápii wí bↄ zɛ aà aɛ,
lá wa kɛ̃̀ lá guuwa, Dii mɛ̀: Lá má kú, gbɛ̃́pii a kúlɛmɛɛ, gbɛ̃́pii a ma luakɛ dↄ̃.
Beewa wá baade a azĩa yã́ sɛ́lɛ siu Luaɛ.
A yã́i wásuli kↄ̃ tàae e lↄo. Kↄ̃ tàae'ea gbɛu à zɛò kɛ́ á yã́ pↄ́ a tó á gbɛ̃do fu kɛo.
Kua Dii Yesu guu má dↄ̃ sã́asã kɛ́ pↄe líↄ gbãlɛa ń azĩaoo. Tó gbɛ̃́ dìlɛ pↄ́ gbãlɛa, ↄ̃ ìↄ gbãlɛaɛ̀.
Tó n n gbɛ̃do nↄ̀sɛ ↄ̃̀ↄkpàɛ̀ pↄ́ pↄ́ ń blè yã́ musu, ń yeaàzio. Blɛ pↄ́ ń blè yã́i ńsu gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Kilisi gà aà yã́i ↄ̃̀ↄkpao.
Ásu to wà sakaɛ́ pↄ́ pↄ́ maauo,
asa kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́iá pↄblea ń imiao yã́ no. Yãkɛa a zɛ́wa ń kɛa ń kↄ̃o nao ń pↄna pↄ́ Lua Nisĩna ì inɛ́o yã́ɛ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ zↄble Kilisiɛ màa yã́ ì ka Luagu, mɛ́ wì aà sáaukpa.
A yã́i tò wàli wɛɛlɛ wàↄ na ń kↄ̃o, wíↄ gbãa kã́fĩkↄ̃ɛ.
Ńsu Lua zĩ ↄ̃̀ↄkpa blɛ yã́io. Blɛ píi maaɛ, ãma pↄ́ pↄ́ ńyↄ̃ ble n gbɛ̃do fu maao.
Nↄ̀ↄsoan nò, wɛ̃mian nò, yã́ pↄ́ a to n gbɛ̃do fu píi, a maa ǹ tɛ̃ɛ.
Yã́ pↄ́ ń a náai vĩ, ǹyↄ̃ kũa e Lua kĩ́i. Báaaden gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ yã́ pↄ́ à zɛ̀ò lí aà sↄ̃ vĩo ũ.
Tó gbɛ̃́ lɛ́ seakɛ blɛ pↄ́ àlɛ blewa sↄ̃, à azĩa dàyãuɛ, kɛ́ i kpaaĩ ń aà luanaaikɛaoo yã́i. Yã́ pↄ́ i kpaaĩ ń gbɛ̃́ luanaaikɛaooá duunaɛ.
Wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wá gbãa luanaaikɛa guuↄ, sema wà gbɛ̃́ busɛↄ fↄ̃ an gbãasai guu. Wásuli yã́ pↄ́ ì ká wázĩagu kɛo.
Wá baade lí yã́ pↄ́ a ka a gbɛ̃dogu kɛ, kɛ́ aà e maakũ, i zɛdↄ yã́i.
Asa Kilisi i azĩa pↄeã kɛo. A kɛ̃a Lua taalau wà mɛ̀, Lua sↄ̃́sↄ̃a gↄ̃̀ɛ̀.
Yã́ pↄ́ wa kɛ̃̀ yãa píi, wa kɛ̃̀ lɛdaawá yã́iɛ. Yã́pi ì wá gba mɛna, ì wá gba sↄ̃ kɛ́ wàↄ wɛdↄ ziai.
Lua pↄ́ ì ń gba mɛna, ì ń gba sↄ̃ to àↄ nↄ̀sɛdoũkɛ ń kↄ̃o lá Kilisi Yesu kɛ̀wa,
í Lua wá Dii Yesu Kilisi Mae tↄbↄ ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo ń lɛdoũo.
À kↄ̃ sí lá Kilisi á síwà Lua tↄbↄa yã́i.
Málɛ oɛ́, Kilisi gↄ̃̀ Yudaↄ dↄnlɛde ũ, kɛ́ à lɛ́ pↄ́ Lua gbɛ̃̀ an deziↄnɛ kɛ, aai dↄ̃ Lua náai vĩ,
buipãleↄ i Lua tↄbↄ aà sùuu yã́i, lá a kɛ̃a láuwa wà mɛ̀: A yã́i tò má n sáaukpa buipãleↄnɛ, mí n táasilɛ.
Wà mɛ̀ lↄ: Buiↄ, à pↄnakɛ ń Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ.
Wà mɛ̀ lↄ: Bui píi, à Dii táasilɛ, bùsu gbɛ̃́pii à aà tↄ́ gbia bↄ.
Isaia ò lↄ: Yɛse miↄna a vlãpa, i fɛlɛ kible buipãleↄwa, an wɛ́ iↄ dↄaàzi.
Lua pↄ́ gbɛ̃́pii wɛ́ dↄi to pↄna ń aafiao pɛɛwá a náai pↄ́ álɛ kɛ yã́i, kɛ́ á wɛdↄaaàzi kã́fĩ ń a Nisĩna gbãao.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, má dↄ̃ sã́asã kɛ́ maakɛa pɛ̀ɛwá, á yã́pii dↄ̃ wásawasa, á fↄ̃ lɛdakↄ̃wa.
Ma láɛ bee kɛ̃aɛ́ guu ma yãeↄ kɛ̃̀ ń sↄ̃o dilɛa kɛ́ àↄ dↄágu yã́i, asa Lua gbɛ̃kɛkɛ̀mɛɛ,
ↄ̃ ma gↄ̃ Kilisi Yesu zĩkɛna ũ buipãleↄnɛ. Málɛ bao pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i kpánɛ́, kɛ́ an kua e àↄ adoa ń Luapi Nisĩna gbãao. Málɛ bee kɛ Luaɛ aà gbagbaa pↄ́ ì kaaàgu ũɛ.
Ma naa Kilisi Yesuwa guu má fↄ̃ ĩ́anadã zĩ pↄ́ málɛ kɛ Luaɛ yã́ musu.
Asa má yãe oa vĩo, mɛ́ i kɛ yã́ pↄ́ Kilisi kɛ̀ ma kĩ́i bàasio. A tò buipãleↄ Lua yãmà ma yã'oa ń ma yãkɛao guu
ń dabudabuↄ ń yãbↄnsaɛↄ gbãao ń Lua Nisĩna gbãao. Bↄa Yelusalɛũ ma bɛbɛ wɛ̃́lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛo e ma pɛɛò Ilili bùsuu Kilisi bao kpàwakɛa guu.
Miↄ ye mà baonapi kpa gu pↄ́ wi Kilisi yãmau yãaoɛ, kɛ́ másu buba gbɛ̃pãle pↄ́ gã̀uo yã́i.
Lá a kɛ̃a láuwa wà mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wi aà yã'onɛ́ yãaoↄ wɛ́ a kɛ̃́, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aai aà bao ma yãaoↄ dↄ̃.
Yã́ pↄ́ ìↄ kpamɛɛ mↄ̀ↄmↄↄ mà mↄ á kĩ́in we.
À kà wɛ̃̀ ũma, kɛ́ miↄ ye mà mↄ á gwai. Tiasa lá yãe ma dↄa bùsuɛ beeↄ guu lↄo,
ma wɛ́ dↄi wà wɛsikↄ̃lɛ sa ma gɛa Ɛsipayã bùsuu guu. Tó ma gↄↄplakɛ̀ánↄ ń pↄnao, í gɛ́ zɛimɛɛ we.
Tia kɛ́wa sↄ̃ málɛ gɛ́ ń dↄnlɛo Lua gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ Yelusalɛũ,
asa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa ku Masedoni ń Gɛlɛsiↄ zɛ̀ò wà Lua gbɛ̃ taaside pↄ́ aa ku Yelusalɛũↄ kámasa kaɛ.
Aa zɛ̀ò, ãma teasiɛ, asa lá Yudaↄ Lua àizɛɛ lì buipãleↄnɛ, a maa buipãleↄ ń dṹnia àizɛɛ lí Yudaↄnɛ sↄ̃ɛ.
Tó ma gbapi nànɛ́ ń ↄzĩ má làa, ma gɛa Ɛsipayã guu má bↄlɛ á kĩ́i.
Má dↄ̃ kɛ́ tó málɛ mↄ́ á kĩ́i, Kilisi báaa pɛɛaa guu ↄ̃ má mↄ́wá.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, ma naɛ́ wá Dii Yesu Kilisizi ń yeakↄ̃i pↄ́ Lua Nisĩna ì iwɛ̃ɛo, à dɛ̃ɛka àↄ wabikɛmɛɛ Luawa,
kɛ́ aà ma bↄ Yude luayãdansaiↄ guu, mɛ́ dↄnlɛ pↄ́ málɛ gɛò Yelusalɛũ Lua gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ kɛnɛ́ pↄmaa ũ,
mí á le ń pↄnao, tó Lua wèi, mí kã́mabo á kĩ́i.
Lua aafiade aàↄ kúánↄ ápii. Ãmi!
Málɛ wá dãe Febe, Sãkele gãlideↄ dↄnlɛde sáaukpaɛ́.
À aà si Dii yã́i, lá a maa Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ kɛ ń kↄ̃owa. À dↄaàlɛ ń pↄ́ pↄ́ a yei á kĩ́io píi, asa à dↄnlɛkɛ̀nɛ́ dasi ń mapio lↄ.
Ma fↄkpà Pisii ń Akilasiowa. Ma zĩkɛndeeↄnɛ Kilisi Yesu zĩ guu.
Aa sì ń mi sãalɛ, mapi mà bↄ. I kɛ mámɛ má adoo, wɛ̃́lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛo buipãle gãlideↄ lɛ́ ń sáaukpa píi lↄɛ.
Ma fↄkpà gãli pↄ́ aaì kãaa an kpɛ́u gbɛ̃́ↄwa. Ma fↄkpà ma gbɛ̃́ yenzide Ɛpɛnɛwa. Aàpi mɛ́ Kilisi náaikɛ̀ Azi bùsuu sɛ̃́ia.
Ma fↄkpà Maliamawa. À kↄaikɛ̀ɛ́ maamaa.
Ma fↄkpà Andↄniku ń Zuniaowa. Ma bui pↄ́ wà wá dá kpɛ́u sãnuↄnɛ. Aa tↄbↄ̀ zĩnaↄ guu, mɛ́ aa naa Kilisiwa ma ãa.
Ma fↄkpà Ampilia pↄ́ dɛ ma gbɛ̃́ yenzide ũ naa Diiwa guu.
Ma fↄkpà Ubɛ̃ pↄ́ dɛ wá zĩkɛndee ũ Kilisi zĩ guuwa ń ma gbɛ̃́ yenzide Setakio.
Ma fↄkpà Apɛlɛwa, asa náaideɛ naa Kilisiwa guu. Ma fↄkpà Alisↄbu bɛdeↄwa.
Ma fↄkpà ma bui Elodiↄ̃wa. Ma fↄkpà Naasisi bɛde pↄ́ aa naa Diiwaↄwa.
Ma fↄkpà Tifɛna ń Tifosaowa. Nↄɛpiↄ kↄaikɛ̀ Diiɛ. Ma fↄkpà Pɛɛsidiwa. Nↄɛ yenzidepi kↄaikɛ̀ Diiɛ.
Ma fↄkpà Lufu pↄ́ tↄbↄ̀ Dii zĩ guuwa ń aà da pↄ́ málɛ gwa ma da ũo.
Ma fↄkpà Asikitiwa ń Felegↄ̃o ń Ɛɛmɛo ń Patobao ń Ɛɛmao ń ń Yesude dee pↄ́ aa sãnuↄ píi.
Ma fↄkpà Fililↄguwa ń Zulio ń Nɛlɛo ń aà dãeo ń Ɔlimpao ń Lua gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa sãnuↄ píi.
À fↄkpakↄ̃wa ń Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ lɛ́pɛakↄ̃wao. Wɛ̃́lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛo Yesudeↄ fↄkpàwá ḿpii.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, málɛ oɛ́, à laaika gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa bↄ̀ yã́ pↄ́ á dada kpɛↄzi. Aaì gbɛ̃́ↄ kɛ̃kↄ̃wa, aaì gbɛ̃́ↄ sã́sã. À kɛ̃́má,
asa gbɛ̃́ bee taaↄ lí zↄble wá Dii Kilisiɛo, sema ń gbɛɛ yã́. Aaì yãesaideↄ sã́sã ń lɛnao ń yãdↄ̃o.
Gbɛ̃́pii á misiilɛa Diiɛ bao mà. Málɛ pↄnakɛ á yã́ musu. Má ye àↄ maakɛa ↄ̃nↄ vĩ, íↄ wɛ́siadeↄ ũ vãikɛa musu.
Lua aafiade a Setãu úlↄ á gbá zíɛ tia. Wá Dii Yesu gbɛ̃kɛkɛɛ́.
Ma zĩkɛndee Timↄtee ń ma buiↄ Lusiu ń Zasↄ̃o ń Sosipatɛɛo fↄkpàwá.
Ma Tɛɛtiu, ma gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ma lápi kɛ̃̀, ma fↄkpàwá naa Diiwa guu.
Ma uabele Gaiusi pↄ́ Yesudeↄ ì kãaa aà bɛ fↄkpàwá. Wɛ̃́lɛ ↄ'ulɛna Elasa fↄkpàwá ń wá gbɛ̃do Kaatuo.

Lua a fↄ̃ á gba gbãa lá a ku Yesu Kilisi bao pↄ́ mi kpa guuwa. Asiiyãpi ulɛa za káauɛ,
tiasa ↄ̃ Lua pↄ́ ìↄ ku gↄↄpii dìlɛ wà yã́ pↄ́ kú ãnabiↄ láↄ guupi bↄ gupuau, kɛ́ bui píi e dↄ̃, aai Lua náaikɛ, aa gↄ̃ aà yãmanaↄ ũ.
Wà Lua mɛ̀ndona ↄ̃nↄde tↄbↄ ń Yesu Kilisi gbãao e gↄↄpii! Ãmi.
Mámɛmaa Pↄlu, Lua ma sisi à ma sɛ a pↄeãwa, ma gↄ̃ Kilisi Yesu zĩna ũ. Mapi ń wá gbɛ̃do Sↄsɛnio,
wámɛ wa láɛ bee kɛ̃̀ Lua gãlide pↄ́ kú Kↄlɛniↄnɛ. Lua á sisi a gↄ̃ a gbɛ̃́ↄ ũ, á kua adoa naa Kilisi Yesuwa ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ìↄ wá Dii Yesu Kilisipi sisi gupiiuↄ, wá Dii doũdeↄ.
Lua wá Mae ń Dii Yesu Kilisio gbɛ̃kɛkɛɛ́, aai á gba aafia.
Miↄ Lua sáaukpa gↄↄpii á yã́ musu gbɛ̃kɛ pↄ́ a kɛ̀ɛ́ á naa Kilisi Yesuwa yã́i.
Á naawà guu pↄ́pii kã̀fĩɛ́, yã'oa píi ń dↄ̃a píio,
asa wá Kilisi yã'oaɛ́ zɛ̀dↄ á guu,
ↄ̃ Lua Nisĩna gbae i kɛ̃́sãwáo, gↄↄ pↄ́ á wɛ́ dↄ wá Dii Yesu Kilisi mↄai.
Wá Dii Yesu Kilisipi a to à zɛ gbãa e a lɛ́wa, íↄ ku tàaesai aà mↄgↄↄ.
Lua náai vĩ. Ɔ̃mɛ á sisi à gbɛ̃́kpa ń a Nɛ́ Yesu Kilisi wá Diio.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ, ma awakpàɛ́ ń wá Dii Yesu Kilisi tↄ́o, àↄ lɛdoũ vĩ ń kↄ̃o ápii, kɛ́ kↄ̃kpaalɛa e láa á guu, í nakↄ̃wa ń làasoo doũo ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo.
Má mà Koloe gbɛ̃́ↄ kĩ́i, yãkele kú á guu.
Lá má màn kɛ: Á gbɛ̃eↄ mɛ̀ wà zɛ̀manↄ. Gbɛ̃eↄ mɛ̀ wà zɛ̀ ń Apolooo. Gbɛ̃eↄ mɛ̀ wà zɛ̀ ń Piɛɛo. Gbɛ̃eↄ mɛ̀ wà zɛ̀ ń Kilisio.
Kilisi kpaalɛa yã̀? Wà ma paliwa á yã́ia? A da'ilɛkɛ̀ ń ma tↄ́o yã̀?
Ma Lua sáaukɛ̀, kɛ́ mi á gbɛ̃e da'ilɛkɛo, sema Kilisipu ń Gaiusio bàasio.
Lá màaɛ, gbɛ̃e a e o a da'ilɛkɛ̀ a gↄ̃ ma ìwa ũo.
Ao, ma Sefana bɛdeↄ da'ilɛkɛ̀ lↄ. Bee bàasio, tó ma gbɛ̃pãle da'ilɛkɛ̀, a dↄmagu lↄo.
Kilisi i ma zĩ gbɛ̃́ da'ilɛkɛa yã́io, sema a bao kpàwakɛaɛ. I kɛ ń yãdↄ̃o no, kɛ́ aà gaa líwa su kɛ famao yã́iɛ.
Kilisi gaa líwaá mìsaiyãɛ gbɛ̃́ vũaaaↄnɛ. Wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua lɛ́ wá suabaↄ sↄ̃, a dɛwɛ̃ɛ aà gbãa ũ.
A kɛ̃a Lua taalau wà mɛ̀: Má ↄ̃nↄnaↄ ↄ̃nↄ midɛ, má wɛzɛ̃naↄ wɛzɛ̃ suumpa.
Ɔ̃nↄna ku máɛ? Ladↄ̃na ku máɛ? Dṹnia tiaɛ bee yã́piidↄ̃na ku máɛ? Lua i dṹnia ↄ̃nↄ dilɛ mìsaiyã ũo lé?
Lua ↄ̃nↄ guu, i to dṹnia gbɛ̃́ↄ a dↄ̃ ń ńzĩa ↄ̃nↄoo. À kàaàgu à gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ a náaikɛↄ suaba waaso pↄ́ wa dìlɛ mìsaiyã ũpi musu.
Yudaↄ ye dabudabui, Gɛlɛkiↄ ì ↄ̃nↄ wɛɛlɛ,
wápiↄ sↄ̃, Kilisi gaa líwa kpàwa wi kɛ, ↄ̃ Yudaↄ ì fuwà, buipãleↄ ì mɛ mìsaiyãɛ,
ãma gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua ń sisi à ń sɛ́ↄ, Yudaↄ ń Gɛlɛkiↄ píi, Kilisi dɛnɛ́ Lua gbãa ń a ↄ̃nↄo ũ.
Lua yã́ pↄ́ dɛnɛ́ mìsaiyã ũpi dɛ gbɛ̃nazĩna ↄ̃nↄla. Lua yã́ pↄ́ dɛnɛ́ gbãasaiyã ũpi dɛ gbɛ̃nazĩna gbãala.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ, à gwa lá á dɛ gↄↄ pↄ́ Lua á sisi. Dãↄ kĩ́i á daside ↄ̃nↄna ũo, á daside gbãade ũo, á daside kíabui ũo.
Lua gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛ dṹniaɛ mìsaide ũↄ sɛ̀, kɛ́ à wida ↄ̃nↄnaↄwaɛ. À gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛ dṹniaɛ gbãasaide ũↄ sɛ̀, kɛ́ à wida gbãadeↄwaɛ.
À gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dṹnia ń dílɛ kpɛɛ, ì sakáńgu an yã́ líↄ kuoↄ sɛ̀, kɛ́ à gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ an yã́ ìↄ kuↄ kpa kpɛɛ.
Màa gbɛ̃e a e lí ĩ́anadã Lua aɛo.
Ápiↄ sↄ̃, Lua tò á naa Kilisi Yesuwa, ↄ̃ à gↄ̃̀ wá ↄ̃nↄ ũ. Naa Kilisipiwa Lua tò yã́ bↄ̀wanↄ na, wá kua adoa mɛ́ à wá suabà.
Ayãmɛto lá a kɛ̃a láuwa, tó gbɛ̃́ ye ĩ́anadã, aà dã Dii yã́ musu.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ, kɛ́ ma mↄ á kĩ́i, ma mↄ Lua yã́ kpàwakɛiɛ́ɛ, i kɛ mi mↄ ↄ̃nↄ gbãa ge lɛna kɛiɛ́o.
Ma zɛò má yãe oɛ́o, sema Yesu Kilisi yã́ bàasio, atɛ̃sa aà gaa líwa.
Ma mↄa á kĩ́i guu ma mↄ ń sↄ̃̀deedeeo ń vĩao ń lualuaoɛ.
Ma waasokɛa guu mi yã'o ń lɛnakɛao ge ↄ̃nↄo. Má ò ń gbãa pↄ́ Lua Nisĩna ↄ̀lↄɛ́oɛ,
kɛ́ á luanaaikɛa su bↄ gbɛ̃nazĩna ↄ̃nↄ guuo, sema Lua gbãa.
Ń beeo wi ↄ̃nↄyã'ò gbɛ̃́ kàsaaↄnɛ. I kɛ dṹnia tiaɛ bee ↄ̃nↄ ge a gbãade pↄ́ an gbãa lɛ́ midɛↄ pↄ́ no.
Lua ↄ̃nↄ wálɛ o, aà pↄeã pↄ́ ulɛa yãapi. À dↄ̀aa dìlɛ wá gawi ea yã́ musu zadↄ̃ i dṹnia kálɛo.
Dṹnia tiaɛ bee gbãadee ↄ̃nↄpi dↄ̃o. Tó aa dↄ̃ yãaɛ, aa Dii gawide páliwao.
Lá a kɛ̃a láuwa wà mɛ̀: Pↄ́ pↄ́ wi wɛsiɛo, mɛ́ gbɛ̃e swã́ i a yã́ mao, mɛ́ a làasoo i gɛ̃ gbɛ̃e sↄ̃uo, ↄ̃ Lua a sↄukɛ̀ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ yeaziↄnɛ.
Lua ↄ̀lↄwɛ̃ɛ ń a Nisĩna gbãao, asa Nisĩnapi yã́pii taasi kũa, baa Lua asii zↄ̃ↄↄ.
Gbɛ̃e a dee nↄ̀sɛ guu yã́ dↄ̃o, mɛ́ i kɛ aà nisĩna pↄ́ kú aà guu bàasio. Màa gbɛ̃e Lua nↄ̀sɛ guu yã́ dↄ̃o, mɛ́ i kɛ Luapi Nisĩna bàasio.
Dṹniaɛ bee nisĩna wá èo, Nisĩna pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i ↄ̃ wá è, ↄ̃ wa gba pↄ́ Lua dàwɛ̃ɛ dↄ̃̀.
Yã́ beeↄ wálɛ o, i kɛ ń yã́ pↄ́ gbɛ̃nazĩna ↄ̃nↄ ì dawɛ̃ɛo no, yã́ pↄ́ Lua Nisĩna dàwɛ̃ɛɛ. Màa wi Lua Nisĩna yã́ bↄↄlɛkɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua Nisĩna vĩↄnɛ.
Dṹnia gbɛ̃́ lí Lua Nisĩna yã́ↄ sio, a dɛɛ̀ mìsaiyã ũɛ. Àli fↄ̃ ma seo, asa Lua Nisĩnapi gbãa ↄ̃ wì aà yã́zɛ dↄ̃ò.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua Nisĩna dↄaaaɛ̀ ì yã́pii zɛ́ dↄ̃, mɛ́ gbɛ̃e zɛvĩ à aà bɛ̃̀ɛboo.
A kɛ̃a Lua taalau wà mɛ̀: Démɛ Dii làasoo dↄ̃ à lɛdawài? Kási wápiↄ, wá Kilisi làasoopi vĩ.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ, mi fↄ̃ yã'òɛ́ lá mi o gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua Nisĩna dↄaaanɛ́ↄnɛwao, ↄ̃ má òɛ́ lán dṹnia gbɛ̃́ↄwa, asa nɛ́tɛ̃naↄn á ũ naa Kilisiwa.
Vĩ má kpàwá, i kɛ blɛ yↄ̃unde no, asa i ka gĩao. Baa e tia i kao,
asa dàadeↄn á ũ e tia. Lá á zakↄ̃u, mɛ́ á yãkele vĩ, dàadeↄn á ũo lé? Á dàa mɛ́ dↄaaaɛ́.
Kɛ́ á gbɛ̃e mɛ̀ a zɛmanↄ, mɛ́ gbɛ̃pãle mɛ̀ a zɛ ń Apolooo, á kú ń ázĩa dàaon weo lé?
Dén Apoloo? Dén mapi? Zĩkɛnaↄn wá ũ, ↄ̃ a Kilisi náaikɛ̀ wá sabai. Wá baade lɛ́ zĩ pↄ́ Dii dàɛ kɛɛ.
Ma pↄtↄ̃̀, Apoloo ikàwà, ↄ̃ Lua tò à gbã̀.
Beewa pↄtↄ̃na ń ikawanao dɛ pↄe ũo, sema Lua pↄ́ tò à gbã̀.
Pↄtↄ̃na ń ikawanao sáaɛ. An baade a ài'e a zĩ lɛ́uɛ.
Zĩdoũkɛnaↄn wá ũ ń Luao. Lua bugbɛn á ũ, Lua kpɛ́n á ũ.
Gbɛ̃kɛ pↄ́ Lua kɛ̀mɛɛ mɛ́ tò ma ɛ̃ kpàlɛ lán ɛ̃bon gↄ̃idewa, ↄ̃ gbɛ̃pãle mↄ̀ lɛ́ kpɛ́pi bo. Baade laaidↄ a kpɛ́ boawa,
asa gbɛ̃e a fↄ̃ ɛ̃e kpálɛ lↄo, sema ɛ̃ pↄ́ kpálɛa Yesu Kilisi ũ kↄ̀ bàasio.
Tó gbɛ̃́ kpɛ́pi dↄ̀ ń vuao ge ã́nusu ge gbɛ̀ bɛɛɛde ge tó a dↄ̀ ń lío ge zàa ge sɛ̃,
baade zĩ sĩana a bↄ gupuau. Wa e yã́kpalɛkɛgↄↄzĩ, asa gupi a dↄ ń tɛ́oɛ, mɛ́ wa baade zĩ taa gwa tɛ́pi guu.
Tó gbɛ̃́ zĩ pↄ́ a kɛ̀ bↄ̀ tɛ́kũsai, ade a ài'e.
Tó gbɛ̃́ zĩ tɛkũ̀, a músi e, ade i bↄ ↄgii lá wì bↄ tɛ́uwa.
Á dↄ̃ Lua kpɛ́n á ũ Lua Nisĩna kú á guuo lé?
Tó gbɛ̃́ Lua kpɛ́pi ↄ̃̀ↄkpà, Lua a ade ↄ̃̀ↄkpa sↄ̃ɛ, asa kpɛ́pi kua adoaɛ, mɛ́ ámɛ á kpɛ́pi ũ.
Gbɛ̃e su azĩa sã́são. Tó á gbɛ̃e lɛ́ azĩa dilɛ dṹniaɛ bee ↄ̃nↄna ũ, aà gↄ̃nɛ́ mìsai, kɛ́ à e ↄ̃nↄkũ.
Asa dṹniaɛ bee ↄ̃nↄ dɛ Luaɛ mìsaiyã ũɛ. A kɛ̃a Lua taalau wà mɛ̀: Ì ↄ̃nↄnaↄ kṹ ń kↄ̃nikɛa guu.
Wà mɛ̀ lↄ: Dii dↄ̃ kɛ́ ↄ̃nↄnaↄ làasoo pã.
Ayãmɛto gbɛ̃e su ĩ́anadã a gbɛ̃nazĩn dee yã́ musuo. Pↄ́piiá á pↄ́ɛ:
Pↄlu, Apoloo, Piɛɛ, dṹnia, wɛ̃ni, ga, tia pↄ́ↄ, zia pↄ́ↄ, a píiá á pↄ́ɛ.
Ápiↄ sↄ̃, Kilisi pↄ́n á ũ, Kilisi sↄ̃, Lua pↄ́ɛ.
Ayãmɛto à wá gwa Kilisi zĩkɛnaↄ ũ, Lua asiiyã ziiaↄ ũ.
À kũ̀ ziiaↄ aaↄ náai vĩɛ.
Lá á kũamanↄ ge tó gbãadeↄ lɛ́ yã́kpalɛkɛmanↄ, i ka ma bakanswãua ũo. Mili mazĩa maa ge bɛ̃̀ɛboo.
Yãe lɛ́ ma sↄ̃ vĩo, ãma bee a ma bↄo, Dii mɛ́ ma yã́kpalɛkɛna ũ.
Ayãmɛto ásu dↄaa lí gbɛ̃e tàae e Dii mↄgↄↄ saio. Ɔ̃mɛ a gupua bii pↄ́ pↄ́ ulɛa gusiauwa, i nↄ̀sɛ yã́ bↄ gupuau. Zĩ́ bee baade a ma lá Lua a a sáaukpa.
Yã́ pↄ́ má òɛ́ɛ bee, má ò mapi ń Apolooo yã́ musuɛ, kɛ́ àↄ yã́ɛ bee dↄ̃: Wasu Lua yã́ baa vĩo. Á gbɛ̃e su ĩ́anadã à zɛ ń gbɛ̃doo à bↄ gbɛ̃do kpɛo.
Bↄ́ ń dɛońlai? Ń pↄe vĩ nzĩaɛ kɛ́ wi n gbaoa? Wà n gba, ↄ̃ ńlɛ ĩ́anadã lá wi n gbaowaa?
A kãn we kↄ̀a? A kɛ ↄdeↄ ũn we kↄ̀a? Álɛ kible wá sain wea? Má ye àↄ kible, wíↄ sãnu.
Asa má è wá Lua zĩnaↄ, Lua wá dílɛ kpɛɛ lán gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wì ń dɛ dasi wáaↄwaɛ. Dṹnia gbɛ̃́pii wɛ́ fĩ̀wá, malaikaↄ ń gbɛ̃nazĩnaↄ píi.
Mìsaideↄn wá ũ Kilisi yã́i, ↄ̃ naa Kilisipiwa á dɛ ↄ̃nↄnaↄ ũn wea? Wá busɛ ↄ̃ á gbãa vĩn wea? Wá kpɛbↄa ↄ̃ á kpɛlaaa?
E tia nↄana ń imio lɛ́ wá dɛ, wá kú puizi, wa gↄ̃ pↄgbɛ̃aↄ ũ, bɛsaideↄ ũ.
Wi zĩ gbãa kɛ e wà kpasa. Tó wà wá ká, wi samaa'onɛ́ɛ. Tó wà ĩadàwá, wi mɛnafↄ̃.
Tó wà wá sↄ̃sↄ̃, wi awakpanɛ́ɛ. E tia wàlɛ wá dilɛ dṹnia bↄlↄ ũ, gbɛ̃́pii bìsa ũ.
Málɛ yã́ɛ bee kɛ̃́ɛ́ widaawá yã́i no. Málɛ á gba laai ma nɛ́ yenzideↄ ũɛ.
Baa tó naa Kilisiwa á gwanaↄ kà ũma'ũma, á de'ia dasio. Mámɛ ma á í ń Kilisi Yesu baokpaaɛ́o, ↄ̃ á naawà.
A yã́i málɛ awakpaɛ́, àↄ ma kɛa kɛ.
Ayãmɛto ma a nɛ́ yenzide Timↄtee zĩ̀wá. Aàpiá náaideɛ naa Diiwa guu, ↄ̃mɛ a ma naa Kilisiwa kɛkɛá dↄágu. Yã́ pↄ́ mi da Yesudeↄnɛ wɛ̃́lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛon we.
Á gbɛ̃eↄ lɛ́ ĩ́anadã lá má mↄ́ á gwaiowa.
Tó Dii wèi, má mↄ́ á gwai tia, mí ĩ́andãnapiↄ gbãa e, i kɛ an yã'oa no.
Asa kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́iá yã'o'o yã́ no, sema gbãa.
Kpelewa á yeii? Mà mↄ́wá ń goo yã̀, ge mà mↄ́ ń yeaázio ń nↄ̀sɛniɛoɛ?
Má mà gbãsĩ gɛ̃̀ á guu, yã́ pↄ́ a taa kú baa luadↄ̃nsaiↄ guu seo. Wà mɛ̀ á gbɛ̃do gↄ̃̀ a mae nↄ vĩ.
Ɔ̃ álɛ ĩ́anadãa? À kũ̀ á pↄ yaɛ, í gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ yã́pi kɛ̀ bↄ á guu.
Mapi, baa tó má kúánↄo, á làasoo kua, ↄ̃ ma yã́kpalɛkɛ̀ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ yã́pi kɛ̀o gↄ̃̀ↄ lá má kú wewa.
Tó a kↄ̃ kã̀aa mɛ́ wá Dii Yesu gbãa kúánↄ, mɛ́ á kú ń ma làasooo, à gbɛ̃́pi kpa Setãuwa ń wá Dii Yesu tↄ́o, kɛ́ aà dàa e midɛ, aà nisĩna i bↄ aafia Dii mↄ́zĩ.

Á ĩ́andãa maao. Kɛ́ pɛ̃ɛsɛ'ɛsɛ yↄↄna ì pɛ̃ɛti zↄ̃ↄ sɛ́, á dↄ̃o lé?
À pɛ̃ɛsɛ'ɛsɛ zi kↄ́lɛ, í gↄ̃ pɛ̃ɛti dafu ũ a sɛ'ɛsɛ sai, lá à kũ̀ àↄ dɛwa, asa Kilisi gà wá Gɛ̃amusu sã ũɛ.
Ayãmɛto wàↄ ku Kàaso dikpɛkɛnaↄ ũ sĩana guu ń nↄ̀sɛpuao. Wásu wàↄ ku pɛ̃ɛsɛ'ɛsɛ zi dikpɛkɛnaↄ ũ mↄafili ń vãikɛao guuo.
Lá pↄ́ má kɛ̃̀ɛ́ guu ma mɛ̀ ásuli yãalɛ ń nↄdãakpanaↄo.
I kɛ dṹnia nↄdãakpanaↄ ge bĩideↄ ń gbɛ̃blenaↄ ge sa'onaↄ no, asa tó gbɛ̃́ beeↄnɛ, á bↄ dṹnia guuɛ.
Aawo, má òɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wà mɛ̀ wá gbɛ̃́ɛ, mɛ́ a dɛ nↄdãakpana ge bĩide ge sa'ona ge lɛvãide ge wɛ̃dɛna ge gbɛ̃blena ũ, ásu yãalɛaànↄo, ásu ↄkãaaaànↄ seo.
Ma bàa ũma ń yã́kpalɛkɛa ń Yesusaideↄi? Á zĩa gbɛ̃́ↄ mɛ́ kũ̀ à yã́kpalɛkɛńnↄo lé?
Lua mɛ́ a yã́kpalɛkɛ ń Yesusaideↄ. À gbɛ̃vãipi bↄ á guu.
Tó á gbɛ̃e yãvĩ ń a gbɛ̃́deeo, bↄ́yãi ìli gɛ́ yã́kpalɛkɛi ń adeo Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ kĩ́io, sema luadↄ̃nsaiↄ kĩ́ii?
Á dↄ̃ kɛ́ Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ mɛ́ aa yã́kpalɛkɛ ń dṹniaoo lé? Lá ámɛ á yã́kpalɛkɛ ń dṹniao, i ka à yã́ yↄↄnaↄ kɛkɛo lé?
Á dↄ̃ kɛ́ wámɛ wá yã́kpalɛkɛ ń malaikaↄo lé? Wa dṹniaɛ bee pↄ́ o lↄa?
Tó á yã́ bee taa kɛkɛa vĩ, ↄ̃ á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aai ka pↄe ũ á gãli guuoↄ sɛ yãkɛkɛnaↄ ũa?
Ma bee ò widaawá yã́iɛ. Á gbɛ̃e vĩ á guu a ↄ̃nↄ kà à a gbɛ̃́ↄ yã́ kɛkɛnɛ́oa?
Sema á gbɛ̃do a gbɛ̃́ sísi yã́kpalɛu Yesu náaikɛnsaiↄ kĩ́ia?
Lá á yãvĩ ń kↄ̃o, a zã yã́wa kↄ̀ míↄmiↄ. Bↄ́yãi i we taiinaio ni? Bↄ́yãi i to wà á bleo ni?
Ápiↄ i gbɛ̃́ taiinkɛ, i gbɛ̃ble, baa á kↄ̃tɛ̃ɛ.
Kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ taiinkɛnaↄ gɛ̃ kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i guuo, á dↄ̃o lé? Ásu ázĩa sã́são, nↄdãakpanaↄ ge sa'onaↄ ge gbãsĩkɛnaↄ ge gↄ̃ɛ káaluaↄ ge gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaì wúlɛ ń ń gↄ̃ɛ deeoↄ
ge kpã́iↄ ge bĩideↄ ge wɛ̃dɛnaↄ ge lɛvãideↄ ge gbɛ̃blenaↄ, an gbɛ̃e a gɛ̃ kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i guuo.
Á gbɛ̃eↄ dɛ màa yãaɛ, ↄ̃ a zu'ò a gↄ̃ Lua pↄ́ ũ, a bↄ maa ń Dii Yesu Kilisi tↄ́o ń wá Lua Nisĩna gbãao.
I mɛ á yã́pii kɛa zɛ́ vĩɛ. Ãma yãeↄ ài vĩo. I mɛ á yã́pii kɛa zɛ́ vĩɛ. Ãma ásu to yãe bakaɛ́ á níuo.
I mɛ lↄ blɛá nↄ̀sɛ pↄ́ɛ mɛ́ nↄ̀sɛá blɛ pↄ́ɛ. Ń beeo Lua a ḿpii midɛ. Mɛá gbãsĩkɛbↄ no, Dii pↄ́ɛ, mɛ́ Dii mɛ́ mɛpi gwana ũ.
Lua wá Dii bↄ̀ gau mɛ́ a wá bↄ gau ń a gbãao sↄ̃.
Á dↄ̃ kɛ́ á mɛ mɛ́ Kilisi mɛguↄ ũo lé? Wa Kilisi mɛgu sɛ wà kɛ káalua mɛgu ũ yã̀? Aawo!
Á dↄ̃ kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ nà káaluawa gↄ̃̀aànↄ mɛdoũo lé? A kɛ̃a Lua taalau wà mɛ̀, an pla ḿpii aaì gↄ̃ lán sàwakula ń gbalaowa.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ nà Diiwa gↄ̃̀aànↄ nisĩna doũɛ.
À mikɛ̃ nↄdãakpaawa. Duun pãle pↄ́ gbɛ̃́ ì kɛ píi, ì kɛ mɛ guu yã́ no. Nↄdãakpana sↄ̃ ì yã'i a mɛɛ.
Á dↄ̃ kɛ́ á mɛ mɛ́ Nisĩna pↄ́ Lua á gbá a kú á guu kpɛ́ ũo lé? Á ázĩa vĩo,
Lua á lú à fĩabò. Ayãmɛto à Lua kpɛla ń á mɛo.
Lá pↄ́ á kɛ̃̀ yã́ musu, tó gↄ̃ɛ kú ↄnanↄɛwa sai, a maaɛ.
Ãma kɛ́ nↄdãakpaa di yã́i, gↄ̃ɛ píi aàↄ azĩa na vĩ, nↄɛ píi aàↄ azĩa gↄ̃ vĩ.
Gↄ̃ɛ lí wei a naɛ a zɛ́wa. Nↄɛ lí wei a gↄ̃ɛ màa lↄ.
Nↄɛ mɛ dɛ azĩa pↄ́ ũo, sema aà gↄ̃. Màa lↄ gↄ̃ɛ mɛ dɛ azĩa pↄ́ ũo, sema aà na.
Ásu gikↄ̃ɛo, sema á màkↄ̃ɛ kɛ́ à laaidↄ wabikɛawa gĩa, í gbasa á kɛa kɛ, kɛ́ Setãu su ↄ̃nↄkɛɛ́ à fu mɛnawao yã́i.
Lɛ́ má dàwá, i kɛ teasi no.
Má ye gbɛ̃́pii àↄ dɛmawa, ãma baade ń a gba pↄ́ Lua dàɛoɛ, gbɛ̃́ɛ bee ń a pↄ́o, gbɛ̃́ kee ń a pↄ́o.
Málɛ yã́ɛ bee o pↄsɛↄ ń gyaaↄnɛ. A maa aaↄ kú ńdo lamawaɛ,
ãma tó aa fↄ̃ ńzĩa kũo, aa nↄsɛ, aa zãkɛ, asa kↄ̃sɛa maa dɛ kua ń kↄ̃ nidɛaola.
Málɛ yãdilɛ nↄdeↄ ń gↄ̃deↄnɛ, i kɛ mámɛo, Diiɛ. Nↄɛ su gi a zã́zio,
gↄ̃ɛ su a na yao. Tó nↄɛ sù gì a zã́zi, aà zↄ̃lɛ ge aà ɛa kɛaànↄ na.
Málɛ o gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄnɛ, i kɛ Dii mɛ́ òo. Tó á gbɛ̃e nↄ luanaaikɛnsai vĩ, mɛ́ nↄpi ye àↄ kuaànↄ, asu yao.
Màa lↄ tó nↄɛe gↄ̃ luanaaikɛnsai vĩ, mɛ́ gↄ̃pi ye aàↄ kuanↄ, asu gio.
Asa Lua ì gↄ̃ luanaaikɛnsai sí a na yã́i, mɛ́ ì nↄ luanaaikɛnsai sí a zã́ yã́i. Tó màa no, an nɛ́ↄ aaↄ gbãlɛaɛ. Sĩana guu an kua adoa.
Tó a luanaaikɛnsai gì, aà gí. Yã́ bee taa guu an kua ń kↄ̃oá teasi no. Lua á sisi à á sɛ́ àↄ ku aafiaɛ.
Nↄɛ, ńyↄ̃ n zã́ suaban lò, ń dↄ̃a? Gↄ̃ɛ, ńyↄ̃ n na suaban lò, ń dↄ̃a?
Lá baade kú ń Lua kpaalɛo e Dii àↄ aà sisi, aà zɛò màa. Màa mi da Yesudeↄnɛ wɛ̃́lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛo píi.
Lua gbɛ̃́ sìsi tↄ̃zↄ̃an lò? Asu gyafↄↄdekɛ wɛɛlɛo. Lua gbɛ̃́ sìsi gyafↄↄde ũn lò? Asu tↄ̃zↄ̃o.
Tↄ̃zↄ̃a yãe vĩo mɛ́ gyafↄↄ yãe vĩo, sema yã́ pↄ́ Lua dìlɛↄ kũa.
Lá baade kú Lua aà sìsi à aà sɛ̀ò, aà zɛò màa.
Lua n sisi zↄ ũn lò? Ńsu bílikɛo. Ãma tó ńsu n gↄ̃a wɛ̃́ɛ ũ zɛ́ è, bↄ zↄbleu.
Zↄ pↄ́ Dii aà sìsi gↄ̃̀ wɛ̃́ɛ ũ Diipi guuɛ. Màa lↄ wɛ̃́ɛ pↄ́ Dii aà sìsi gↄ̃̀ zↄ ũ naa Kilisiwaɛ.
Lua á lú à fĩabò. Ásu gↄ̃ gbɛ̃nazĩna zↄ ũo.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ, lá baade kú Lua aà sìsiò, aà zɛ ń Luao màa.
Pↄsɛↄ yã́ musu mi yãe ma Dii kĩ́io, ãma lá má náai vĩ Dii sùuu guu, lá ma làasoo dɛ má oɛ́.
Taasi pↄ́ kú tia mɛ́ tò málɛ e a maa kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ zɛ ń a kuao.
Tó ń nↄ vĩ, ńsu wɛɛlɛ ǹ gbaɛo. Tó ń vĩ sↄ̃o, ńsu wɛɛlɛo.
Tó ń sɛ̀, ni duunakɛ no. Tó wɛ̃́ndia zãkɛ̀ sↄ̃, i duunakɛo. Gbɛ̃́ beeↄ yã'e dṹniau, mɛ́ má ye bee á leo.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, yã́ pↄ́ málɛ on kɛ: Gↄↄ i gↄ̃ zã̀o. Za tia nↄdeↄ gↄ̃ lá aa vĩowa.
Ɔↄlↄnaↄ gↄ̃ lá aalɛ ↄ́ↄlↄowa. Pↄnadeↄ gↄ̃ lá an pↄ naowa. Pↄlunaↄ gↄ̃ lá aa pↄe vĩowa.
Dṹnia pↄ́ mↄaokɛnaↄ gↄ̃ lá aalɛ kɛowa, asa dṹnia tiaɛ bee lɛ́ gɛ̃zɛaɛ.
Má ye àↄ ku yãkãakɛsaiɛ. Pↄsɛ ì laaidↄ Dii yã́ↄwa, ì lá a ka Diigu kɛ.
Nↄde ì laaidↄ dṹnia yã́ↄwa, ì lá a ka a nagu kɛ,
ↄ̃ ìↄ kú ń làasoo plao. Nↄɛ pↄsɛ ge nↄɛ lɛ́so ì laaidↄ Dii yã́ↄwa, ì a mɛ ń a nisĩnao kpawà. Nↄzãe sↄ̃ ì laaidↄ dṹnia yã́ↄwa, ì lá a ka a zã́gu kɛ.
I kɛ málɛ galakpaɛ́ no. Ma bee ò á aafia yã́iɛ, kɛ́ à yãkɛ a zɛ́wa, í ázĩa kpa Diiwa gupãle gwasai.
Tó gbɛ̃́ nↄkpama vĩ, tó àlɛ gɛ̃ sɛaa mɛ́ à kɛ̀ɛ̀ wí ũ, tó à aà kàka beewa, aà aà sɛ́, lá à kɛ̀ɛ̀wa, àlɛ duunakɛo. Aa kↄ̃sɛ.
Ãma tó à yã́pi bↄ̀ a nↄ̀sɛɛɛ, mɛ́ teasi lɛ́ aà kakao, mɛ́ a azĩa kũa dↄ̃, tó a dà a sↄ̃u á a wɛ̃́ndiapi sɛo, a kɛ̀ maaɛ.
Beewa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a pↄ́ sɛ̀ a kɛ̀ maaɛ, ãma gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ i a pↄ́ sɛo maa dɛ beea.
Nↄɛá a zã́ pↄ́ɛ gↄↄ pↄ́ aà zã́ kú píi. Tó aà zã́ sù ã́nuatò, a zɛvĩ à zãkɛ ń gↄ̃ pↄ́ a yeio, sema gↄ̃pi aàↄ dɛ Dii pↄ́ ũ.
Ń beeo tó à gↄ̃̀ pↄsɛ, málɛ e aà pↄ àↄ na dɛ tó à zãkɛ̀la. Málɛ e mapi, má Lua Nisĩna vĩ sↄ̃.
Sa'oblɛ yã́ musu, wá dↄ̃ kɛ́ á yã́ↄ dↄ̃ ápii. Dↄ̃a sↄ̃ ìↄ yↄ̃̀ↄ vĩ, yeakↄ̃i mɛ́ kã́fĩa vĩ.
Tó gbɛ̃́ lɛ́ e á yã́ dↄ̃, i dↄ̃ lá à kũ̀ à dↄ̃wa gĩao.
Tó gbɛ̃́ ye Luazi, Lua aà dↄ̃.
Too, sa'oblɛblea yã́ musu wá dↄ̃ kɛ́ dṹnia guu tã́aá pↄe no, asa Lua mɛ̀ndo kua wá dↄ̃.
Baa tó pↄ́ pↄ́ wì onɛ́ luaↄ ku musu ń zĩ́lɛo, mɛ́ dãↄ kĩ́i luaↄ diɛ, diiↄ diɛ,
wá kĩ́i Lua mɛ̀ndoɛ, ↄ̃n wá Mae pↄ́ pↄ́pii bↄ̀ aà kĩ́i mɛ́ wá kú aà yã́i ũ. Dii mɛ̀ndoɛ lↄ, ↄ̃n Yesu Kilisi pↄ́ pↄ́pii kɛ̀ mɛ́ wá kú aà sabai ũ.
Ãma gbɛ̃́pii dↄ̃ màao. Gbɛ̃eↄ dↄ́ɛkɛ̀ ń tã́a yã́o e tia, pↄ́ pↄ́ aalɛ ble aaìↄ e sa'oblɛɛ, ↄ̃ an làasoo lí dadoũo, kɛ́ dↄ̃a i panɛ́o yã́i.
Blɛ mɛ́ a wá sↄ̃ Luazio. Tó wi bleo, kɛ̃́sãa no. Tó wá blè, kã́fĩa no.
À laaika gↄ̃a wɛ̃́ɛↄ ũ beei, kɛ́ ásu to gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dↄ̃a i panɛ́oↄ fuo.
N gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ń dↄ̃a vĩ, tó gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dↄ̃a i paɛ̀o n e, ńlɛ pↄble tã́a kùɛ, a aà gba sↄ̃ à sa'oblɛ ble sↄ̃o lé?
Beewa n dↄ̃a n gbɛ̃do pↄ́ dↄ̃a i paɛ̀o Kilisi gà aà yã́i ↄ̃̀ↄkpà.
Tó a duunakɛ̀ á Yesude deeↄnɛ, a ń dↄ̃a pↄ́ i panɛ́o gbá kàso, Kilisi a duunakɛ̀ɛ̀.
Ayãmɛto tó nↄ̀ↄ pↄ́ má só mɛ́ a to ma gbɛ̃do fu, má só bau lↄo, kɛ́ ma gbɛ̃do su fuo yã́i.
Má azĩa vĩo lé? Zĩnan ma ũo lé? Mi wɛsi wá Dii Yesulɛo lé? Ámɛ á dɛ ma zĩ gbɛ ũ naa Diiwa guuo lé?
Baa tó má dɛ zĩna ũ gbɛ̃pãleↄnɛo, má dɛɛ́ a ũ fá. Ma naa Diiwa guu ma zĩnakɛ seelan á ũ.
Lá mi o ma bɛ̃̀ɛbonaↄnɛn kɛ.
Má pↄblea ń imiao zɛ́ vĩ ma zĩ guuo lé?
Má a zɛ́ vĩ màↄ nↄ Yesude kũa gu pↄ́ málɛ gɛ́u, lá zĩna kĩniↄ ń Dii dãunaↄ ń Piɛɛowao lé?
Wá ń Baanabao wá pla, wámɛ wá zɛvĩ wà wá ↄzĩ to weoa?
Démɛ ì sosa ble ń azĩa gwaaoi? Démɛ li'bà mɛ́ ìli a bɛ bleo ni? Démɛ ìↄ zudã mɛ́ ìli a vĩ mio ni?
Baa kɛ́ gbɛ̃nazĩna yãkɛaↄ má lɛ̀ɛũoɛ́, a ku màa Mↄizi ikoyã guu lↄo lé?
Mↄizi ikoyã láu à mɛ̀, ásuli lɛsↄkpa zu pↄ́ lɛ́ pↄgbɛ̃ɛo. Zuↄ yã́i ↄ̃ Lua yã́pi òia?
Wá yã́i à yã́pi òio lé? Ao, wá yã́i wà yã́pi kɛ̃̀i, kɛ́ sɛ̃̀wana lí sɛ̃wa ń wɛdↄa pↄ́io, mɛ́ pↄgbɛ̃na lí pↄgbɛ̃ ń wɛdↄa pↄ́io, i a baa e a guu.
Tó wa Lua yã́ tↄ̃̀ á guu, mɛ́ wa wá baa è á guu, yãe yã̀?
Tó dãↄ zɛ́ bee vĩwá, wa wá pↄ́ o lↄe? Wi sɛ́lɛ zɛ́ bee kĩ́io, wa yã́pii fↄ̃̀ kɛ́ wásu zɛzↄ̃ Kilisi baoɛo yã́iɛ.
Á dↄ̃ kɛ́ Lua ua zĩkɛnaↄ lí Lua ua blɛ bleo lé? Lua gbagbakĩi sa'onaↄ lí ń baa e gbagbakĩipi guuo lé?
Beewa Dii dìlɛ a baokpanaↄ aaↄ ble baopi kpaa yã́ musu.
Ń beeo mi zɛ́piↄ kee sɛ́lɛo, mɛ́ mi bee o wà kɛmɛɛ yã́i no. Ga maamɛɛ dɛ beea. Gbɛ̃e a e kpa ma ĩ́andãapiɛo.
Kilisi baokpaa dɛmɛɛ ĩ́andãa yã́ ũo, teasi mɛ́ gbadàa. Waiyoo mapi, tó málɛ baopi kpao.
Tó mazĩa zĩ málɛ kɛ, ma wɛ́ dↄ aseaiɛ. Lá Lua mɛ́ dìlɛmɛɛ, à kũ̀ mà kɛɛ.
Bↄ́mɛ ma asea ũi? Tó ma baopi kpà ↄsãsãsai, mɛ́ mi iko pↄ́ má vĩ baopi kpaa guu blemáo, ma asean we.
Gbɛ̃e ma vĩo, ma azĩa dìlɛ zↄ ũ gbɛ̃́piiɛ, kɛ́ mà gbɛ̃́ e dasi yã́i.
Kɛ́ má kú ń Yudaↄ, ma gↄ̃ńwa, kɛ́ aa ma yã́zɛ e yã́i. Kɛ́ má kú ń Mↄizi ikoyãdanaↄ, ma gↄ̃ a dana ũ, baa kɛ́ a iko vĩao, kɛ́ a yãdanaↄ e ma yã́zɛ e yã́i.
Kɛ́ má kú ń ikoyãpi dànsaiↄ, ma gↄ̃ńwa, kɛ́ aa ma yã́zɛ e yã́i. I kɛ lua'ikoyãdansain ma ũo, Kilisi mɛ́ iko vĩa.
Kɛ́ má kú ń gbɛ̃́ busɛↄ, ma busa kɛ́ aa ma yã́zɛ e yã́i. Mi gↄ̃ pↄ́pii ũ gbɛ̃́piiɛ, baa lá à kɛ̀ píi, kɛ́ mà e ń gbɛ̃eↄ suaba.
Yã́ pↄ́ mi kɛ píi, mi kɛ Kilisi baokpaa yã́iɛ, ma ↄ iↄ ku a guu.
Bakpaaĩa guu, gbɛ̃́pii ì bàalɛɛ, ãma kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ mɛ̀ndo mɛ́ ì ble, á dↄ̃o lé? À bàalɛ màa sↄ̃, kɛ́ à e ble.
Ampii aaì dɛ̃ɛka aaↄ ńzĩa kũa dↄ̃ yã́pii musu. Aaì kɛ màa fùa pↄ́ ì ↄ̃̀ↄkpa ea yã́i. Wápiↄ sↄ̃, a pↄ́ pↄ́ lí ↄ̃̀ↄkpao yã́iɛ.
Ayãmɛto ba pↄ́ málɛ lɛ́, má dↄ̃ pↄ́ pↄ́ málɛ yá, i kɛ málɛ dɛ̃ɛka gugiiu no.
Mi ĩada ma mɛwa, mi ikoblewà, kɛ́ ma waasokɛa dãↄnɛ gbɛa, másu bↄ pão yã́i.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, má ye wá deziↄ yã́ɛ bee dↄágu. Aa tɛ̀ tɛlui ḿpii, aa bùa ísiawa ḿpii.
Lua ń da'ilɛkɛ̀ tɛlupi guu ísiapi guu ḿpii Mↄizi ìwaↄ ũ.
Aa Lua blɛ doũ blè ḿpii,
aa Lua í doũ mì ḿpii, asa aa Lua gbɛsi pↄ́ lɛ́ ń tàlakpa í mìɛ. Gbɛsipiá Kilisiɛ.
Kási an daside i ka Luaguo, ↄ̃ an gɛ gↄ̃̀ kpálɛ guwaiwaiu.
Yã́pi dɛwɛ̃ɛ seela ũ, kɛ́ wásu yãvãi nidɛ lá aa a nidɛ̀wao.
Ásu àↄ dɛ tã́agbagbanaↄ ũ lá an gbɛ̃eↄwao. A kɛ̃a Lua taalau wà mɛ̀: Gbɛ̃́ↄ zↄ̃̀lɛ lɛ́ pↄble, aalɛ imi, ↄ̃ aa fɛ̀lɛ lɛ́ kↄ̃̀ↄ'o.
Wásu wàↄ dɛ nↄdãakpanaↄ ũ lá an gbɛ̃eↄwao. Aa kpà, ↄ̃ aa gàga gↄↄ doũ zĩ́ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aasↄsↄo lɛɛ bao ń àaↄ̃o (23.000).
Wásu Dii lɛ wà gwa lá an gbɛ̃eↄwao. Aa aà lɛ̀ aa gwà, ↄ̃ mlɛ̃ↄ ń soso aa gàga.
Ásu zↄaka lá an gbɛ̃eↄwao. Aa zↄakà, ↄ̃ ga malaika ń dɛdɛ.
Yã́pi ń lé seela ũ wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wá kú gↄↄ vlã́waↄnɛɛ, ↄ̃ wa kɛ̃̀ láu wá gbaa laai yã́i.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ e á zɛa gbãa, aà laaika lɛ́lɛai.
Yↄ̃ae i á leo, sema a pↄ́ pↄ́ ì gbɛ̃́pii le bàasio. Lua náai vĩ, a to wà á yↄ̃ dɛ á gbãa lɛ́ao. A á gba zɛ́ à yↄ̃a fↄ̃, í bↄu.
Ayãmɛto ma gbɛ̃́ yenzideↄ, à mikɛ̃ tã́agbagbaawa.
Málɛ yã'oɛ́ laaideↄ ũ. À wɛ́tɛ yã́ pↄ́ málɛ oɛ́i ázĩawa à gwa.
Imibↄ báaade pↄ́ wi sáaukpaò, tó wá a imì, wá baa ku Kilisi au guuo lé? Kàa pↄ́ wi ɛ́'ɛ, tó wá sò, wá baa ku Kilisi mɛ guuo lé?
Lá kàa mɛ̀ndoɛ, baa ń wá dasikɛo wá mɛ̀ doũɛ, asa wá baade a baa vĩ kàa doũpi guuɛ.
À gwa Isailiↄwa. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ sa'oblɛ blè bàa kú ń Lua gbagbakĩio lé?
Má ò kpelewa ni? Málɛ o tã́a sa'oblɛá pↄe yã̀? Ge an diiↄá pↄe yã̀?
Aawo, málɛ o pↄ́ pↄ́ wà sa'òò wa ò tã́awaɛ, i kɛ Lua no. Má ye á bàa àↄ kú ń tã́aoo.
Á fↄ̃ Dii imibↄ í mi ń tã́a pↄ́oo. Á fↄ̃ Dii blɛ ble ń tã́a pↄ́oo.
Ge wá ye wà Dii pↄ fɛlɛ yã̀? Wá gbãa dɛaàla yã̀?
I mɛ yã́pii zɛ́ vĩ. Màaɛ, ãma yã́pii ài vĩo. I mɛ yã́pii zɛvĩ. Màaɛ, ãma yã́pii kã́fĩa vĩo.
Gbɛ̃e zĩa yã́ su dↄaaɛ̀o, sema a gbɛ̃́dee yã́.
À pↄ́ pↄ́ wàlɛ yia ɛlɛu ble yãe gbɛasai á làasoo yã́i,
asa tↄↄlɛ ń pↄ́ pↄ́ kuwàↄ píiá Dii pↄ́ɛ.
Tó Yesusaide á sisi blɛwa, tó à kɛ̀ɛ́ mɛ́ a gɛ, à pↄ́ pↄ́ wa kpàwá ble yãe gbɛasai á làasoo yã́i.
Tó wà su òɛ́ sa'oblɛɛ, ásu bleo làasoo yã́i ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ òɛ́ yã́o.
Málɛ bee o ade làasoo yã́iɛ, i kɛ á pↄ́ no. Gbɛ̃pãle làasoo yã́i ↄ̃ máↄ mazĩa vĩoa?
Tó ma pↄblè ń sáaukpaao, bↄ́yãi wa ma bɛ̃̀ɛbo pↄ́ pↄ́ ma sáaukpàpi yã́ musui?
Yã́ pↄ́ álɛ kɛ píi, álɛ pↄblen nò, álɛ imin nò, àↄ apii kɛ Lua tↄbↄa yã́i.
Ásu to Yudaↄ ge Gɛlɛkiↄ ge Lua gãlideↄ fu á yãkɛa yã́io.
Màa mi kɛ. Apii guu mi wɛtã ma yã́ ká gbɛ̃́piiguɛ. Mili mazĩa maa wɛɛlɛo, sema bíla pↄ́, kɛ́ aa e bↄ yã́i.
À ma kɛa kɛ lá mi Kilisi kɛa kɛwa.
Ma á sáaukɛ̀ kɛ́ ma yã́ dↄágu yã́pii guu, mɛ́ á kɛ̀tokↄ̃ɛ pↄ́ má dàɛ́ↄ kũa.
Má ye àↄ dↄ̃ kɛ́ Kilisi mɛ́ gↄ̃ɛ píi mi ũ, gↄ̃ɛ mɛ́ nↄɛ mi ũ, mɛ́ Lua mɛ́ Kilisi mi ũ.
Gↄ̃ɛ pↄ́ lɛ́ wabikɛ ge àlɛ ãnabikɛkɛ ń pↄ́o kua a miwa lɛ́ a mi kpɛbↄɛ.
Nↄɛ pↄ́ lɛ́ wabikɛ ge àlɛ ãnabikɛkɛ pↄ́kummusukɛsai lɛ́ a mi kpɛbↄɛ, a dɛ lá à mipoloobòwaɛ.
Tó nↄɛ i pↄ́kummusukɛo, aà a mi kɛ̃ɛlɛ. Lá mikɛ̃ɛlɛa ge miboa dɛ nↄɛɛ wí ũ, aà pↄ́kummusukɛ.
I kũ gↄ̃ɛ pↄ́kummusukɛo, kɛ́ a dɛ Lua taa ń aà gawio ũ yã́i. Nↄɛ sↄ̃, ↄ̃mɛ gↄ̃ɛ gawi ũ.
Asa Lua i gↄ̃ɛ bↄ nↄɛ kĩ́io, nↄɛ a bↄ̀ gↄ̃ɛ kĩ́i.
I gↄ̃ɛ kɛ nↄɛ yã́io, nↄɛ a kɛ̀ gↄ̃ɛ yã́i.
Bee yã́i ń malaikaↄ yã́o sema nↄɛ lí pↄ́kummusukɛ a zã́ iko seela ũ.
Yã́pi guu naa Diiwa nↄɛ mɛ́ gↄ̃ɛ ũ, gↄ̃ɛ mɛ́ nↄɛ ũ.
Asa lá nↄɛ bↄ̀ gↄ̃ɛ guu, màa lↄ gↄ̃ɛ ì bↄ nↄɛ guu, mɛ́ pↄ́pii bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́iɛ.
À wɛ́tɛ yã́pizi à gwa. Nↄɛ wabikɛa pↄ́kummusukɛsai maaa?
Á dↄ̃ ázĩawa kɛ́ mikã gbã̀a dɛ gↄ̃ɛɛ wí ũ,
ãma tó nↄɛ vĩ, a dɛɛ̀ gawi ũɛ. Asa Lua mikã kpà nↄɛwa à kuaàla.
Tó gbɛ̃e ye lɛkpaakɛ, aàↄ dↄ̃ kɛ́ wápiↄ ń Lua gãlideↄ píi, bee bàasio wá yãpãle kũao.
Yã́ pↄ́ má ye daɛ́ tia guu, má á sáaukpao, asa á kↄ̃kãaa ì vãi iɛ́ dɛ maala.
Sɛ̃́ia má mà, tó a á gãli kã̀aa, i bↄ kↄ̃ kpɛ gã ń gãoɛ. Ma yã́pi sì yↄↄ.
Sema kↄ̃kpaalɛa àↄ kú á guu, kɛ́ sĩandeↄ e bↄ gupuau.
Tó a kãaa, i kɛ Dii blɛ ↄ̃ ili bleo,
asa á baade ì wã àↄ a pↄbleɛ. Nↄa ì gbɛ̃eↄ dɛ, wɛ̃ ì gbɛ̃eↄ dɛ.
Á bɛ vĩ à pↄbleu à imiuo lé? Ge i saka Lua gãlideↄgu à wida pↄesaideↄwa yã̀? Má oɛ́ kpelewa ni? Má á sáaukpa yã̀? Má á sáaukpa yã́ bee musuo.
Yã́ pↄ́ má mà Diiwa má dàɛ́n kɛ: Zĩ́ pↄ́ wa Dii Yesu kpámá, a gwãasĩna ↄ̃ à kàa sɛ̀
à Lua sáaukpà a ɛ̀'ɛ, ↄ̃ à mɛ̀ bee dɛ a mɛ pↄ́ á kpá wá yã́i ũɛ, wàliↄ bee kɛ a yã́ dↄawágu yã́i.
Màa lↄ kɛ́ aa pↄblè aa làa, à imibↄ sɛ̀ à mɛ̀, Luabaakuańnↄ tia a au sabai ↄ̃n ípi ũ. Tó wálɛ mi, wàliↄ mi a yã́ dↄawágu yã́i.
Asa tó a kàapi sò, mɛ́ a ípi mì, álɛ Dii ga baokpa e àↄ gɛ́ mↄ́iɛ.
Ayãmɛto tó gbɛ̃́ kàapi sò mɛ́ à Dii ípi mì kàa ń ípio yãdasai, à tàaekɛ̀ Diiɛ aà mɛ ń aà auo yã́ musu.
Baade azĩa yã́ gwagwa, i gbasa kàapi só, i ípi mi,
asa tó gbɛ̃́ sò mɛ́ a mì mɛpi gbadↄ̃sai, à yãdà azĩalaɛ.
Bee yã́i gyãeↄ ń yɛ̃̀ɛɛsaideↄ dasi á guu, mɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gɛ̀ gɛ́kĩiↄ fàao.
Tó wa wázĩa yã́ gwàgwa, Dii a wá tàae eo.
Ì wá tàae e, ì wá toto, kɛ́ yã́ su zↄ̃lɛwá ń dṹniaoo yã́iɛ.
Ayãmɛto ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, tó a kãaa álɛ Dii blɛ ble, àli kↄ̃ dã́.
Tó nↄa lɛ́ gbɛ̃dɛ, aà pↄble bɛ, kɛ́ á kↄ̃kãaa su yã'iɛ́o yã́i. Má yã́ pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ↄ bↄↄlɛkɛɛ́, tó ma mↄ.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ, Lua Nisĩna gbaↄ yã́ musu, má ye àↄ sĩana dↄ̃.
Á dↄ̃ kɛ́ gↄↄ pↄ́ á Lua dↄ̃o, tã́a pↄ́ aali yã'ooↄ mɛ́ ìↄ á gálɛ, aaìↄ dↄaaaɛ́.
Ayãmɛto má òɛ́, Lua Nisĩna lí dɛdɛ gbɛ̃́wa à láaizĩ̀ Yesuwao, mɛ́ gbɛ̃e a fↄ̃ o Yesu mɛ́ Dii ũo, mɛ́ i kɛ Lua Nisĩna dↄaaaɛ̀ bàasio.
Gba ku kpaalɛa, ãma Lua Nisĩna mɛ̀ndoɛ.
Zĩ ku kpaalɛa, ãma Dii mɛ̀ndoɛ.
Gbãa ku kpaalɛa, ãma Lua mɛ̀ndoɛ, ↄ̃mɛ ì apii kɛ baadeɛ.
Lua Nisĩna ì dɛdɛ baadewa gbɛ̃́pii kã́fĩa yã́iɛ.
Lua Nisĩna ì gbɛ̃́ɛ bee gba zɛ́ aà ↄ̃nↄyã'ò, mɛ́ Nisĩna doũpi ì gbɛ̃́ kee gba zɛ́ aà dↄ̃ayã'ò.
Nisĩna doũpi ì gbɛ̃pãle gba luanaaikɛa zɛ́, ì gbɛ̃́ gba gbɛ̃́gbãgbãa zɛ́.
Ì gbɛ̃́ gba dabudabukɛa zɛ́, ì gbɛ̃́ gba ãnabikɛkɛa zɛ́, ì gbɛ̃́ gba zɛ́ aà nisĩnaↄ dↄ̃kↄ̃ɛ, ì gbɛ̃́ gba zɛ́ aà yãebui'o, ì gbɛ̃́ gba yãe buipi bↄↄlɛkɛa zɛ́.
Nisĩna mɛ̀ndona doũpi mɛ́ ì apii kɛ, ì gbapi da baadeɛ lá a yeiwaɛ.
Mɛ̀ mɛ̀ndo guↄ dasi. Baa ń a dasikɛo, mɛ̀ doɛ píi. Màa wá naa Kilisiwa dɛ sↄ̃.
Wápiↄ píi, Yudaↄ ge buipãleↄ, zↄↄ ge wɛ̃́ɛↄ, Lua wá kɛ́ mɛ̀ doũ ń a Nisĩna mɛ̀ndonapi gbãaoɛ, à wá gbá a Nisĩna mɛ̀ndonapi, ↄ̃ wá mì wápii.
Mɛguↄ dasi, i kɛ mɛ̀ndo no.
Tó gbá mɛ̀ lá ↄn a ũo, á dɛ mɛ̀ pↄ́ ũo, bee yã́i àↄ dɛ mɛ̀ pↄ́ ũoa?
Tó swã́ mɛ̀ lá wɛ́n a ũo, á dɛ mɛ̀ pↄ́ ũo, bee yã́i àↄ dɛ mɛ̀ pↄ́ ũoa?
Tó mɛ̀ bṹu dɛ wɛ́ ũ, wa yãmae? Tó mɛ̀ bṹu dɛ swã́ ũ, wa pↄ́ gĩmae?
Lá a dɛwa, Lua guↄ pɛ̀pɛkↄ̃wa mɛ guu, ampii, lá a yeiwa.
Tó ampii dɛ mɛgu doũ ũ, mɛ̀n we má ni?
Lá a dɛwa mɛguↄ dasi, mɛ́ mɛ mɛ̀ndoɛ.
Wɛ́ a fↄ̃ o ↄɛ a bàa kuaànↄoo. Màa lↄ mi a fↄ̃ o gbáɛ a bàa kuaànↄoo.
Aawo, mɛgu pↄ́ wì e kɛ̃́sãańzi, mɛ a fↄ̃ àↄ a saio.
Mɛgu pↄ́ wì e gawisai, wì a kpɛla dɛńla. A gu pↄ́ wì a ea dilɛ wíyã ũ, wì pↄ́ nai dɛńla,
ãma a pↄ́ pↄ́ maa bàa kú ń beeoo. Kɛ́ Lua mɛ kã̀aa, à gawi kã̀fĩ pↄ́ pↄ́ gawi lɛ́ kɛ̃́sãmáↄnɛ dɛńla.
Beewa mɛ kpaalɛao, a guↄ kↄ̃ yã́ dↄ̃.
Tó mɛgu do lɛ́ taasikɛ, a guↄ píi ì kɛaànↄɛ. Tó wà mɛgu do kpɛlà, a guↄ píi ì pↄnakɛaànↄɛ.
Ámɛ á Kilisi mɛ ũ, mɛ́ á baade dɛ mɛpi guↄ ũ.
Gĩa sɛ̃́ia, Lua zĩnaↄ dìlɛ a gãlideↄ guu, a plaade ãnabiↄ, a àaↄ̃de yãdanɛdeↄ, bee gbɛa dabudabukɛnaↄ, bee gbɛa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ à ń gbá gbɛ̃́gbãgbãa zɛ́ↄ ń dↄnlɛdeↄ ń dↄaanaↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì yãebui'oↄ.
Zĩnaↄn ń ũ píie? Ãnabiↄn ń ũ píie? Yãdanɛdeↄn ń ũ píie? Dabudabukɛnaↄn ń ũ píie?
Lua gbɛ̃́gbãgbãa gbadànɛ́ ḿpiie? Aaì yãebui'o ḿpiie? Aaì yãe bui bↄↄlɛkɛ ḿpiie?
À wɛbii gba pↄ́ dɛńlaↄwa. Tiasa má a pↄ́ pↄ́ dɛńla zɛ́ ↄlↄɛ́.
Tó ma yãebui'ò, gbɛ̃nazĩna ge malaika pↄ́, tó miliↄ ye gbɛ̃́eo, ma kↄ̃fĩkɛ̀ lán mↄlɛa ge sɛ̃́sɛ̃napaawaɛ.
Tó ma ãnabikɛkɛgba è, tó ma yã́pii asii mà mɛ́ má dↄ̃a píi vĩ, tó ma luanaaikɛa kà mà gbɛ̀sĩsĩ sↄ̃, tó miliↄ ye gbɛ̃eo, pↄen ma ũo.
Tó ma pↄ́ pↄ́ má vĩↄ kpaalɛ̀nɛ́ píi, tó má tò wà ma kpasa, tó miliↄ ye gbɛ̃eo, a ài vĩmɛɛo.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ìↄ yeńzi ìↄ mɛna vĩ, a gbɛ̃kɛ vĩ. Ìli wɛdↄnɛ́o, ìli káadao, ìli yↄ̃̀ↄkɛo.
Ìli widamáo, ìli azĩa maa wɛɛlɛo, ìli fɛ̃ńzio, ìliↄ yã́kũańnↄo.
Ìli yãvãi yáalↄo, ì pↄnakɛ ń sĩanao.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ìↄ yeńzi ì yã́pii fↄ̃́, ì yã́pii náaikɛ, ì wɛdↄ yã́pii bↄa maai, ì mɛnakɛ ń yã́piio.
Yeakↄ̃i láaa vĩo. Ãnabikɛkɛa a midɛ, yãebui'oa lɛ́ a ká, dↄ̃a a gɛ̃zɛa.
Asa wá dↄ̃a ń wá ãnabikɛkɛao i pao.
Tó pↄ́ lɛ́so mↄ̀, pↄ́ pↄ́ i pao a gɛ̃zɛaɛ.
Kɛ́ má dɛ nɛbↄlↄna ũ, mi nɛ́ yã'o lan nɛbↄlↄnawa, mi làasookɛ lán nɛbↄlↄnawa, mi yã́ gwa lán nɛbↄlↄnawa. Kɛ́ ma ka gbɛ̃nazĩna ũ, ma ↄkpà nɛbↄlↄn yã́i.
Tia kɛ́wa wálɛ gu'e díi guu dùuduu, zĩ́ bee wá wɛsi Lualɛ. Tia kɛ́wa ma dↄ̃a i pao, zĩ́ bee má yã́ dↄ̃ wásawasa lá Lua ma dↄ̃wa.
Tiasa yã́ mɛ̀n àaↄ̃ɛ beeↄ mɛ́ gↄ̃̀: Luanaaikɛa ń wɛdↄaaàzio ń yeakↄ̃io, ãma yeakↄ̃i mɛ́ dɛńla.
À to yeakↄ̃i yã́ dↄaaɛ́, í wɛbii Lua Nisĩna gbaↄwa, atɛ̃sa ãnabikɛkɛa.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ yãebui'o lɛ́ yã'o gbɛ̃́ↄnɛo, sema Lua, asa gbɛ̃e lɛ́ mao, àlɛ asiiyã'ò ń Lua Nisĩna gbãaoɛ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ ãnabikɛkɛ lɛ́ yã'o gbɛ̃́ↄnɛɛ, àlɛ ń zɛdↄɛ, àlɛ lɛdamáɛ, àlɛ ń nↄ̀sɛ nininɛ́ɛ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ yãebui'o lɛ́ azĩa kã́fĩɛ, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ ãnabikɛkɛ lɛ́ Lua gãlideↄ kã́fĩɛ.
Má ye à yãebui'o ápii, ãma má ye à ãnabikɛkɛ dɛ beea. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ ãnabikɛkɛ dɛ yãebui'onala, sema wàlɛ a bↄↄlɛkɛ kɛ́ gãlidepiↄ e kã́fĩ a musu bàasio.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ, tó ma mↄ á kĩ́i mɛ́ ma yãebui'òɛ́, bↄ́ ài a vĩɛ́i? Sema ma yã'oa àↄ dɛ yã́wɛwɛ̃a ũ ge dↄ̃a ge ãnabikɛkɛa ge yãdaanɛ́.
Màa a dɛ ń pↄ́'ↄbↄnaↄ lↄ. Kulɛ ge mↄↄnan nò, tó àlɛ ↄbↄ súsuo, kpelewa wa fↄ̃ dↄ̃ lá àlɛ oi?
Tó mↄ ↄbↄ̀ yayaa, sosaↄ zĩ̀ sↄukɛo.
Màa ápiↄ sↄ̃, tó álɛ yãebui'o, wàlɛ mao, kpelewa wa yã́ pↄ́ álɛ o gbadↄ̃i? Á yã́ a gɛ̃ ń ĩ́anaoɛ.
Yã́ↄ bui dasi dṹnia guu, an kee bↄↄlɛsai sↄ̃o.
Tó wàlɛ bui pↄ́ mili a yãmao o, máↄ dɛ a ònaɛ nibↄ ũɛ, mɛ́ aↄ dɛmɛɛ nibↄ ũɛ.
Màa ápiↄ sↄ̃, lá á ãiavĩ ń Lua Nisĩna gbaↄ, à ãiakɛ àↄ gɛò aɛ, kɛ́ Yesudeↄ e zɛdↄ.
Ayãmɛto yãebui'ona wabikɛ aà e a bↄↄlɛkɛ.
Tó ma wabikɛ̀ ń yãebui'oao, ma nisĩna mɛ́ kɛ̀, ma làasoo dↄaaamɛɛo.
Too, yã́pi dɛai? Má wabikɛ ń nisĩnao, mí kɛ ń laaio lↄ. Má lɛsi ń nisĩnao, mí sí ń laaio lↄ.
Tó n Lua tↄnasì ń nisĩnao, kpelewa gbɛ̃́ dafu pↄ́ kú we a o, ãmi, sáau pↄ́ ń kpà yã́ musui? Asa i yã́ pↄ́ ń ò dↄ̃o.
Baa tó n sáaukpà a zɛ́wa, i to n gbɛ̃do zɛ̀dↄo.
Ma Lua sáaukɛ̀, kɛ́ mi yãebui'o dɛála píi,
ãma gãli guu tó ma yã́ mɛ̀n sↄo ò ń laaio ma yãdàonɛ́, a maamɛɛ dɛ mà yã́ mɛ̀n ũma'ũma o ń yãebui'oaola.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ, á làasoo su àↄ dɛ lán nɛ́ↄwao. Àↄ dɛ nɛbↄlↄnaↄwa vãi yã́ musu, ãma á làasoo àↄ dɛ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ pↄ́ ũ.
Mↄizi ikoyã láu Dii mɛ̀: Má yãebui'o gbɛ̃́piↄnɛ nibↄↄ lɛ́u, ń beeo aa swã́sɛ ma yã́io.
Ayãmɛto yãebui'oa dɛ seela ũ Yesudeↄnɛo, sema Yesusaideↄ. Màa lↄ ãnabikɛkɛa dɛ seela ũ Yesusaideↄnɛo, sema Yesudeↄ.
Tó gãlideↄ kã̀aa píi, mɛ́ aalɛ yãebui'o ḿpii, tó gbɛ̃́ dafuↄ ge Yesusaideↄ mↄ̀ we, aa mɛ ĩ́ana kàmáɛo lé?
Tó gbɛ̃́pii lɛ́ ãnabikɛkɛ sↄ̃, mɛ́ Yesusaide ge gbɛ̃́ dafu mↄ̀ we, ampii yã́ a aà da làasoou a aà wɛ́ kɛ̃́,
asiiyã pↄ́ kú aà nↄ̀sɛu i bↄ gupuau, i wúlɛ a gbɛɛu à misiilɛ Luaɛ, i gbasa mɛ Lua kú á guu sĩanaɛ.
A dɛai gbɛ̃́ↄ? Tó a kãaa, á baade líↄ lɛ ge yãdaanɛ́ ge yã́wɛwɛ̃a ge yãebui'oa ge yãe buipi bↄↄlɛkɛa vĩ. À apii kɛ kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ↄ e zɛdↄ.
Tó wàlɛ yãebui'o, gbɛ̃ↄn pla ge àaↄ̃, asuli dɛ beeao. Aa kↄ̃ gba zɛ́, gbɛ̃́ mɛ̀ndo i a bↄↄlɛkɛ.
Tó a bↄↄlɛkɛna kuo, aà kã́mabo gãli guu, i a pↄ́ o ado ń Luao.
Ãnabiↄ gbɛ̃ↄn pla ge àaↄ̃ yã'o, gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ i làasookɛ an yã́wa.
Tó Lua yã'ò gbɛ̃pãleɛ, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ yã'o nílɛ.
Ápii á fↄ̃ ãnabikɛkɛ dodo, í yãdadakↄ̃ɛ ápii, í kↄ̃ sɛ lɛsĩ.
Ãnabiↄ fↄ̃ ń ãnabikɛkɛa zùukɛ,
asa Lua ye yãyaaaio, sema a zɛde. Lá Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ ì kɛ wɛ̃́lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛo píiwa,
nↄɛↄ lɛ́ líↄ kpaaũa gãli guu, asa aa yã'oa zɛ́ vĩo. Aa misiilɛ lá wa ò Mↄizi ikoyã guuwa.
Tó aa ye yãe dↄ̃, aa ń zã́ gbɛai bɛ, asa nↄɛ yã'oa gãli guuá wíɛ.
Á kĩ́i Lua yã́ dàalɛua? Ge á mɛ̀ndo yã́i à mↄ̀ia?
Tó gbɛ̃́ lɛ́ e á dɛ ãnabi ge gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua Nisĩna dↄaaaɛ̀ ũ, aàↄ dↄ̃ kɛ́ yã́ pↄ́ má kɛ̃̀ɛ́piá Dii yãdilɛaɛ.
Tó gbɛ̃́ pãkpài, à pãkpaaàziɛ.
Ayãmɛto ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, à wɛbii ãnabikɛkɛawa, ãma ásu gi yãebui'oaio.
À yã́pii kɛ a zɛ́wa súsu.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ, baona pↄ́ má kpàɛ́ á sì a zɛò ↄ̃ má ye mà ɛa dↄágu.
Baonapi mɛ́ a á suaba, tó á waaso pↄ́ má kpàɛ́pi kũa. Tó màa no, á Yesu náaikɛa kɛ̀ pãɛ.
Yã́ gbia pↄ́ má mà má dàɛ́n kɛ: Kilisi gà wá duuna yã́i lá a kɛ̃a Luayãtaalauwa.
Wà aà vĩ̀, ↄ̃ à vù a gↄↄ àaↄ̃de zĩ́ lá a kɛ̃a Luayãtaalauwa.
À azĩa ↄ̀lↄ Piɛɛɛ, ↄ̃ à azĩa ↄ̀lↄ a ìwa gbɛ̃ↄn kuɛplaↄnɛ lↄ.
Bee gbɛa à azĩa ↄ̀lↄ wá gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ kɛ́ aa kãaaa gudoũ, aa dɛ gbɛ̃ↄn ↄ̀aa pla ń basↄoola (500). An daside ku e tia, ãma an gbɛ̃eↄ ã́nuatò.
Bee gbɛa à azĩa ↄ̀lↄ Zaakiɛ, ↄ̃ à azĩa ↄ̀lↄ zĩnaↄnɛ píi.
Ampii gbɛa à bↄ̀ mↄ̀a, ma gↄ̃ kↄ̃nsɛ ũ.
Asa zĩnaↄ guu mámɛ má kpɛɛ, mi ka wà omɛɛ zĩnao, asa ma ĩadà Lua gãlideↄwa.
Gbɛ̃kɛ pↄ́ Lua kɛ̀mɛɛ yã́ mɛ́ tò má dɛ kɛ́wa gbã, mɛ́ gbɛ̃kɛ pↄ́ a kɛ̀mɛɛpi i kɛ pão, asa ma dɛ̃ɛkà dɛńla píi. Mámɛ má kɛ̀o, gba pↄ́ Lua dàmɛɛ mɛ́ tò má kɛ̀.
Ayãmɛto à bↄ̀ ma kĩ́i ge an kĩ́in nò, yã́ pↄ́ wálɛ a waasokɛ á sìn we.
Lá wálɛ Kilisi bↄa gau waasokɛ, àkɛa á gbɛ̃eↄ lɛ́ o gɛↄ vuo ni?
Tó gɛↄ vuo, dↄ̃ Kilisi i vuo.
Tó Kilisi i vuoɛ, dↄ̃ wá waasokɛa gia, mɛ́ á Kilisi náaikɛa gia,
wí gↄ̃ Lua seelade ɛgɛnaↄ ũ, kɛ́ wá ò à Kilisi vù yã́i. Asa tó gɛↄ vuo, dↄ̃ i aà vuo.
Tó Lua lí gɛ vuo, Kilisi i vuo.
Tó Kilisi i vuo, á Kilisi náaikɛaá pãɛ, á kú á duuna guuɛ e tia,
mɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ã́nuatò naa Kilisiwaↄ kàalɛɛ.
Tó wá kuaɛ bee yã́i ↄ̃ wá wɛ́ dↄi Kilisizi ado, wɛ̃nadeↄn wá ũ dɛ gbɛ̃́piia.
Sĩana guu Kilisi bↄ̀ gau, ↄ̃mɛ dↄ̀aa vù sɛ̃́ia gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gàↄnɛ.
Lá gbɛ̃e mɛ́ tò ga mↄ̀, màa lↄ gbɛ̃e tò gɛↄ vua mↄ̀.
Kua Adamu bui ũ tò ga lì gbɛ̃́piia. Màa lↄ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ naa Kilisiwaↄ wɛ̃ni e ḿpii.
Baade ń a dↄ̀ↄoɛ. Kilisi mɛ́ dↄ̀aa vù sɛ̃́ia, a gbɛa aà gbɛ̃́ↄ vu aà mↄgↄↄ.
Ɔ̃ dṹnia a láa, Kilisi i kíakɛ midɛ píi ń ikoↄ ń gbãaↄ, i a kpala kpa Mae Luawa.
Asa à kũ̀ Kilisi àↄ kibleɛ e Lua gɛ̀ aà ibɛɛↄ kɛɛ̀ aà gbadibↄ ũ.
Ibɛɛ pↄ́ a a midɛ gbɛzã mɛ́ ga ũ,
asa Lua pↄ́pii nà Kilisiɛ a ↄzĩɛ. Kɛ́ à mɛ̀ pↄ́pii kú aà ↄzĩ, wá dↄ̃ kɛ́ Lua pↄ́ pↄ́pii nàɛ̀ a ↄzĩpi bàasi.
Tó à pↄ́pii nàɛ̀ a ↄzĩ, aàpi ↄ̃ aà Nɛ́ pↄ́ à pↄ́pii nàɛ a ↄzĩpi a misiilɛɛ̀, Luapi iↄ dɛ apii ũ pↄ́piiɛ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaì da'ilɛkɛ gɛↄ gɛ̃ɛ ũ sↄ̃ bɛ? Tó gɛↄ vu sĩanao, bↄ́yãi wì da'ilɛkɛ an gɛ̃ɛ ũi?
Wápiↄ sↄ̃, bↄ́yãi wiↄ ku kai guu gↄↄpiii?
Ń ĩ́ana pↄ́ mi dã́ á yã́ musu naa Kilisi Yesu wá Diiwao, miↄ ku ga lɛ́zĩ lá gu lɛ́ dↄɛ.
Tó mazĩa yã́i ma dɛ̃ɛkài ń wàiↄ Ɛfɛsɛ, bↄ́ ài a vĩmɛɛi? Tó gɛↄ vuo, wà pↄble, wà imi, asa wá ga ziaɛ.
Ásu to à sã́são, gbɛ̃na vãi ì dàa maa ↄ̃̀ↄkpaɛ.
À su á laaiwa súsu, ásu duunakɛ lↄo, asa á gbɛ̃eↄ Lua dↄ̃o. Ma bee ò kɛ́ à á wípi dↄ̃ yã́iɛ.
Gbɛ̃e a mɛ kpelewa gɛↄ vui? Mɛ kpele aaↄ vĩi?
Sↄũ yã́ɛ! Wìli pↄ́tↄ̃ à bↄ̀lɛ fↄ̃mbasikɛsaio.
Tó wà pↄtↄ̃̀, mase ge pↄpãlen nò, ìli bↄlɛ pↄ́ wɛ́tɛ̃ ũo.
Lua ì to à bↄlɛ lá a dìlɛwaɛ, ampii ń a buio.
Pↄ́ wɛ̃nideↄ píi mɛ̀ doũo. Gbɛ̃nazĩnaↄ pↄ́ ńdo, nↄ̀bↄↄ pↄ́ ńdo, bãↄ pↄ́ ńdo, kpↄↄ pↄ́ ńdo.
Luabɛ pↄ́ↄ ku, dṹnia pↄ́ↄ ku. Luabɛ pↄ́ↄ gawi ńdo, dṹnia pↄ́ↄ gawi ńdo.
Ĩatɛ̃ gawi ado, mↄvua pↄ́ ado, saanaↄ pↄ́ ńdo. Baa saanapiↄ gawi dodo kↄ̃ɛɛ.
Màa àↄ dɛ gɛↄ vugↄↄzĩ. Wì gɛ vĩ à yaikɛ, a vu yaikɛsai.
Wì gɛ vĩ bɛɛɛsai, a vu ń gawio. Wì gɛ vĩ gbãasai, a vu gbã́ugbãu.
Wì gɛ vĩ ń dṹnia mɛo, a vu ń àizãna mɛo. Lá dṹnia mɛ ku, àizãna mɛ ku lↄɛ.
A kɛ̃a Lua taalau wà mɛ̀, gbɛ̃́ sɛ̃́ia Adamu gↄ̃̀ gbɛ̃́ bɛ̃́ɛ ũ, ãma Adamu gbɛzã gↄ̃̀ Nisĩn wɛ̃nikpamade ũ.
I kɛ àizãna mɛ mɛ́ lí dↄaao, dṹnia mɛ mɛ́ ì dↄaa, a gbɛa sa àizãna mɛ.
Gbɛ̃nazĩn sɛ̃́ia bↄ̀ bùsutiuɛ, a plaade bↄ̀ luabɛɛ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛ tↄↄlɛ gbɛ̃́ ũↄ bↄ̀ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ bↄ̀ tↄↄlɛuwa. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛ luabɛ gbɛ̃́ ũↄ bↄ̀ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ bↄ̀ luabɛwa.
Lá wá dɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ bↄ̀ tↄↄlɛu taa ũ, màa lↄ wáↄ dɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ bↄ̀ luabɛ taa ũ.
Yã́ pↄ́ má òn kɛ gbɛ̃́ↄ. Tó kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i bↄ̀ gupuau, wá e ble ń wá mɛoo. Wá e wàↄ ku guyaikɛsai guu ń wá mɛ pↄ́ ì yaikɛoo.
À ma, má asiiyã'òɛ́. Wá ga píio, ãma wá li píi
kã́ndo lán wɛdɛawa kã̀ae gbɛzã pɛ́zĩ. Asa kã̀ae a ↄbↄ, gɛↄ i vu yaikɛsai, wápiↄ sↄ̃ wí li.
Sema wá mɛ pↄ́ ì yaikɛɛ bee gɛ̃ a yaikɛsai guu. Sema wá mɛ̀ gɛɛ bee gɛ̃ a gasai guu.
Tó wá mɛ pↄ́ ì yaikɛ gɛ̃̀ a yaikɛsai guu, mɛ́ wá mɛ̀ gɛ gɛ̃̀ a gasai guu, ↄ̃ yã́ pↄ́ kɛ̃a láuɛ bee a pa wà mɛ̀: Wà zĩblè gawa, à mìdɛ.
Ga, n zĩblea tↄ́n lái? Ga, n sɛwɛ kú máɛ?
Duuna mɛ́ ga sɛwɛ ũ, mɛ́ duuna gbãa ì bↄ ikoyã guuɛ.
Wà Lua sáaukpa, kɛ́ ì to wà zĩble ń wá Dii Yesu Kilisi gbãao.
Ayãmɛto ma gbɛ̃́ yenzideↄ, à zɛ gbãa gíũgiũ bↄzãsai, í wɛtã Dii zĩwa gↄↄpii, asa á dↄ̃ kɛ́ zĩ pↄ́ álɛ kɛ Diiɛ pão.
Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ kámasakaa yã́ musu, lá má ò Galati bùsu Yesudeↄnɛ, à kɛ màa sↄ̃.
Ãsↄ̃anɛna ń ãsↄ̃anɛnao á baade lí ↄ̃a pↄ́ a è a gbãa lɛ́u bↄ adoa, iↄ kãaa, kɛ́ ásu kámasapi wɛɛlɛ gↄↄ pↄ́ ma mↄo.
Tó ma mↄ, má gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a ń dílɛ aa gɛ́ↄ zĩ Yelusalɛũ ń taalao ń kámasa pↄ́ á kàpio.
Tó à kũ̀ mà gɛɛ sↄ̃, aai gɛ́ ma kpái.
Tó ma bↄlɛ ń Masedonio, má mↄ́ á kĩ́i, asa má bↄlɛ ń Masedonioɛ.
Málɛ e má gↄↄplakɛánↄ, baa buziɛ se máↄ ye bleánↄ, í gɛ́ zɛimɛɛ gu pↄ́ má gɛ́u.
Tia kɛ́wa má ye mà gɛ̃ála bàlalao, málɛ e má gↄↄplakɛánↄ, tó Dii wèi.
Má gↄ̃ Ɛfɛsɛ e Pãteko dikpɛ zĩ́ɛ,
asa Lua zɛpòomɛɛ maamaa mà zĩ maa kɛ, mɛ́ ibɛɛↄ dasi.
Tó Timↄtee sù mↄ̀, ásu kɛɛ̀ bùubuu aà vĩakɛɛ́o, asa àlɛ zĩkɛ Diiɛ lamawaɛ.
Á gbɛ̃e su sakaaàguo. À kũ̀sũakɛɛ̀ aà e ka ma kĩ́i aafia, asa mapi ń ma gbɛ̃́ↄ wá wɛ́ dↄaàzi.
Wá gbɛ̃do Apoloo sↄ̃, miↄ naɛwà mↄ̀ↄmↄↄ aà mↄ á gwai ń wá gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ. A ye mↄai gĩao. Tó a zɛkɛ̀, a mↄ́.
À itɛ̃kɛ, íↄ zɛa Yesu náaikɛa guu. À gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ yã́ kɛ, íↄ gbãa.
À yã́pii kɛ ń yekↄ̃io.
Á Sefana bɛdeↄ dↄ̃, kɛ́ aa dɛ Yesude sɛ̃́iaↄ ũ Gɛlɛsi bùsuu mɛ́ aa dìlɛ wàↄ dɛ Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ dↄnlɛdeↄ ũ. Gbɛ̃́ↄ, ma wabikɛ̀wáɛ,
à misiilɛ gbɛ̃́ bee taaↄnɛ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ kↄaikɛ kua zĩ doũpi guuↄ píi.
Ma pↄ kɛ̀na Sefana ń Fↄↄtunatuo ń Akaikuo mↄawa, asa aa gↄ̃̀mɛɛ á gɛ̃ɛ ũɛ.
Aa tò ma nↄ̀sɛ dàdoũ ń á pↄ́o. À gbɛ̃́ bee taaↄ kpɛla.
Azi bùsu Yesudeↄ fↄkpàwá. Akilasi ń Pisiio ń gãlide pↄ́ aaì kãaa ń bɛↄ fↄkpàwá maamaa naa Diiwa guu.
Wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wá sãnuↄ fↄkpàwá ápii. À fↄkpakↄ̃wa ń Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ lɛ́pɛakↄ̃wao.
Ma Pↄlu, fↄɛ beeá ma ↄgbɛɛ.
Tó gbɛ̃e ye Diizio, Lua láaikɛwà. Wá Dii lɛ́ mↄ́.
Dii Yesu gbɛ̃kɛkɛɛ́.
Má yeázi píi naa Kilisi Yesuwa.
Mámɛmaa Kilisi Yesu zĩna Pↄlu lá Lua yeiwa ń wá gbɛ̃do Timↄteeo, wámɛ wa láɛ bee kɛ̃̀ Lua gãlide pↄ́ kú Kↄlɛniↄnɛ ń Lua gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú Gɛlɛsi bùsuuↄ píi.
Lua wá Mae ń Dii Yesu Kilisio gbɛ̃kɛkɛɛ́, i á gba aafia.
Wà Lua wá Dii Yesu Kilisi Mae sáaukpa, Mae Lua sósobide gbɛ̃nↄsɛnininapi.
Ì wá nↄ̀sɛ níniwɛ̃ɛ wá ĩadama píi guu, kɛ́ wà e gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú baa ĩadama kpeletaa guuↄ nↄ̀sɛ níninɛ́ sↄ̃ ń nↄ̀sɛ nínibↄ pↄ́ Lua wá nↄ̀sɛ nìniowɛ̃ɛo.
Lá taasi pↄ́ Kilisi kɛ̀ ì liwázi, màa lↄ wá nↄ̀sɛ ì níni maamaa Kilisi yã́i.
Tó wà wá wɛtã̀, á nↄ̀sɛninia ń á bↄao yã́iɛ. Tó Lua wá nↄ̀sɛ nìni, á nↄ̀sɛninia yã́iɛ, kɛ́ à e taasi doũ pↄ́ wálɛ kɛ fↄ̃́.
Wá á náai vĩ seasai, asa wá dↄ̃ lá á bàa kú ń taasi pↄ́ Kilisi kɛ̀o, á bàa kú ń nↄ̀sɛniniapio lↄ.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ, wá ye àↄ dↄ̃ lá wà wá wɛtã̀ Azi bùsuu. À tↄ̃̀wá maamaa, a dɛ wá gbãa lɛ́a, baa wá wɛ̃ni wá wɛ́ dↄi lↄ seo.
Yã́ daawála, wálɛ e wa gaɛ. Bee wá lé kɛ́ wásu zɛ ń wázĩa gbãaoo, sema Lua pↄ́ ì gɛↄ vu gbãa.
À wá bↄ́ kai zↄ̃ↄ guu, mɛ́ a wá bↄu. Aàpi wá wɛ́ dↄi aà wá bↄu lↄ
wabi pↄ́ álɛ kɛwɛ̃ɛ sabai. Beewa gbɛ̃́ↄ Lua sáaukpa dasi wá yã́ musu gbɛ̃kɛ pↄ́ a kɛ̀wɛ̃ɛ gbɛ̃́ dasiↄ wabikɛawɛ̃ɛ yã́i.
Yã́ pↄ́ wi a ĩ́anadãn kɛ: Wá làasoo daa doũ, asa ń Lua gbãao wá kú ń nↄ̀sɛpuao mↄafilisai dṹnia guu, atɛ̃sa á kĩ́i. Dṹnia ↄ̃nↄ wá kuòo, sema Lua gbɛ̃kɛ.
Wili láe kɛ̃́ɛ́o, sema pↄ́ i a kyokɛ á dↄ̃ bàasio.
Lá á wá dↄ̃ gĩa yↄↄ, má ye à wá dↄ̃ sã́asã, kɛ́ à ĩ́anadã wá yã́ musu Dii Yesu mↄ́zĩ, lá wá dã á yã́ musuwa.
Kↄ̃ náaikɛapi guu má dìlɛ yãa ma Masedoni gɛa guu mà bↄlɛ á gwai káau, mí ɛa su ń á kĩ́io, í báaa e gɛ̃n pla, í dↄnlɛkɛmɛɛ ma Yude gɛa guu.
