Kɛ́ ma gɛa bee dìlɛ, ma lɛplayã'ò yã̀? Tó má dìlɛ mà yãkɛ, dṹnia yã́ ì dↄaamɛɛ, ↄ̃ ì kɛmɛɛ kã́ndo ao ao ge aawo aawo ũa?
Lá Lua náai vĩ, yã́ pↄ́ wá òɛ́ dɛ ao aawo ũo.
Lua Nɛ́ Yesu Kilisi pↄ́ mapi ń Silivɛ̃ɛo ń Timↄteeo wa aà yã́ waasokɛ̀ɛ́ á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì mɛ ao aawo no, Lua pↄ́ ì mɛ aon aà ũ.
Asa lɛ́ pↄ́ Lua gbɛ̃̀ píi sĩana ì kɛ aà guuɛ. Ayãmɛto ń Yesu Kilisipi tↄ́o ↄ̃ wì mɛ ãmi, Lua tↄbↄa yã́i.
Lua mɛ́ wá zĩ́napɛ̀lɛ naa Kilisiwa ń ápiↄ, à wá dílɛ adoa,
à a seela kɛ̀wá, à a Nisĩna dà wá sↄ̃u gba pↄ́ Lua dↄ̀aa dàwɛ̃ɛ ũ.
Lua mɛ́ ma seelade ũ, a ma nↄ̀sɛ dↄ̃. Kɛ́ má ye ĩadawáo yã́i mi gɛ́ Kↄlɛni lↄo.
I kɛ wálɛ gbãamↄɛ́ á luanaaikɛa guu no, asa a zɛ̀dↄu kↄ̀, wálɛ zĩkɛánↄ á pↄna yã́iɛ.
Ɔ̃ má è mazĩawa a maa mà mↄ́ á kĩ́i ń pↄyao lↄo.
Tó ma á pↄ yàɛ́, démɛ a ma pↄ kɛ nai, mɛ́ i kɛ á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ma á pↄ yàɛ́ↄ bàasio?
Ma lakɛ̃̀ɛ́ màa, kɛ́ tó ma mↄ á gwai, á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ á dɛ à ma pↄ kɛ naↄ su ma pↄ yaoɛ. Má á náai vĩ ápii, kɛ́ ma pↄna dɛ á pↄna ũ.
Ma lápi kɛ̃̀ɛ́ ń pↄsiao ń nↄ̀sɛpusuo ń wɛ́'ioɛ, i kɛ kɛ́ mà á pↄ ya yã́i no, kɛ́ àↄ dↄ̃ lá ma yeaázi kà yã́iɛ.
Lá gbɛ̃e pↄyayã kɛ̀, i kɛ ma pↄ a yào, ápiiɛ, ge á gbɛ̃eↄ, kɛ́ ma yã'oa su gɛ̃agɛ̃o.
Ĩa pↄ́ á daside dà gbɛ̃́piwa mↄ̀wà.
Ayãmɛto à sùuukɛaànↄ sa, à aà nↄ̀sɛ níniɛ̀, kɛ́ aà pↄsia zↄ̃ↄ su aà mↄ ĩ́io yã́i.
Bee yã́i ma awakpàɛ́, à ↄlↄɛ̀ wásawasa kɛ́ á yeaàzi.
A yã́i ma lápi kɛ̃̀ɛ́, ma likpàlɛwá mà e dↄ̃ tó á yã́ pↄ́ má òɛ́ kũa píi.
Tó a sùuukɛ̀ ń gbɛ̃́o, mi kɛaànↄ sↄ̃ɛ. Sùuu pↄ́ má kɛ̀, tó yãe su ku, má kɛ̀ á yã́i Kilisi gɛ̃ɛ ũɛ,
kɛ́ Setãu su ↄ̃nↄkɛwɛ̃ɛo yã́i, asa wá gí aà kↄ̃ni dↄ̃io.
Kɛ́ ma gɛ Kilisi baokpai Toloasi, Dii zɛpòomɛɛ,
ãma ma nisĩna zɛao, kɛ́ mi a gbɛ̃do Titu eo yã́i. Ɔ̃ ma lɛzàmá we, ma da Masedoni zɛ́u.
Ma sáaukɛ̀ ń Luao, asa ìↄ dↄaawɛ̃ɛ gↄↄpiiɛ, wiↄ zĩ̀blenaↄ ũ naa Kilisiwa, wi aà dↄ̃a gĩ fã́ɛ gupiiu.
Asa wá dɛ tulaleti gĩ na pↄ́ Kilisi kpàsa Luaɛ ũ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ àlɛ ń suabaↄ ń gbɛ̃́ vũaaaↄ guuɛ.
Wá gɛ̀ gĩ ũ gbɛ̃eↄnɛ, ↄ̃ ì ga inɛ́. Wá wɛ̃ni gĩ ũ gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄnɛ, ↄ̃ ì wɛ̃ni inɛ́. Wá démɛ kà bee kɛai?
Wá dɛ lán gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaìↄ Lua yã́ laataↄwao. Naa Kilisiwa wi yã'o ń nↄ̀sɛpuao ń Lua dↄ̃ao a zĩnaↄ ũ.
Wa ɛa su wázĩa sáaukpaawa yã̀? Wá bàa kú ń seela lá pↄ́ wa kɛ̃̀ɛ́ ge pↄ́ á kɛ̃̀nɛ́o lán gbɛ̃eↄwa yã̀?
Ámɛ á wá taalapi ũ, a kɛ̃a wá sↄ̃wa. Gbɛ̃́pii a fↄ̃ dↄ̃, i a kyokɛ.
Á yã́ bↄ̀ gupuau, á dɛ lá pↄ́ Kilisi kɛ̃̀ a nà wá ↄzĩ ũ. I lápi kɛ̃́ ń gàalula ío no, a kɛ̃̀ ń Lua bɛ̃́ɛ Nisĩnaoɛ. I kɛ̃ gbɛ̀ pɛ̀pɛɛwa no, a kɛ̃̀ á sↄ̃waɛ.
Wá a náai vĩ màa Lua aɛ ń Kilisi gbãao.
I kɛ ń wázĩao wi ka wà mɛ zĩpi bↄ̀ wá gã̀uɛo, Lua mɛ́ wá káwà.
Ɔ̃mɛ wá káwà, ↄ̃ wá dɛ aà bàa kua ń gbɛ̃́ↄ yã́ dafu zĩkɛnaↄ ũ. I kɛ ikoyã no, Lua Nisĩna yã́ɛ. Asa ikoyã ì ga inɛ́ɛ, Nisĩnapi sↄ̃ ì wɛ̃ni inɛ́.
Kɛ́ Lua ikoyã kɛ̃̀ gbɛ̀ pɛ̀pɛɛwa, a gawi bↄ̀ Mↄizi oawa. Ń a tɛkɛa gɛ̃azɛakɛo Isailiↄ i fↄ̃ gwào. Tó zɛ́ pↄ́ ì ga inɛ́pi bↄ̀ ń gawi bee taao,
Nisĩnapi zɛ́ gawi dɛai?
Lá zɛ́ pↄ́ ì yãdańla gawi vĩ, zɛ́ pↄ́ ì to yã́ bↄńnↄ na gawi dɛa zↄ̃ↄ.
Pↄ́ pↄ́ gawi vĩ yãa gawi vĩ lↄo, gawi pↄ́ dɛaàlapi yã́i.
Tó pↄ́ gↄↄsoplana bↄ̀ ń gawio, pↄ́ pↄ́ ìↄ ku gawi dɛa zↄ̃ↄ.
Wɛdↄa beei guu wi yã'o seasai.
Wá dɛ lán Mↄiziwao. À sálana kù a oaa, kɛ́ Isailiↄ su a oa tɛkɛa pↄ́ lɛ́ gɛ̃zɛa láaa eo.
An nↄ̀sɛ tàta, asa e gbã tó aalɛ Luabaakuańnↄ lá kyokɛ, sálana doũpi ìↄ kua ń làasooaɛ. Ìli goo, sema tó gbɛ̃́ naa Kilisiwa bàasio.
E tia tó wàlɛ Mↄizi yã́ kyokɛ, sálanapi ìↄ kua ń làasooaɛ.
Ãma tó aa zɛ̀ ń Diio, sálanapi a go ń làasooa.
Diipi mɛ́ Lua Nisĩnapi ũ, mɛ́ gu pↄ́ Dii Nisĩnapi kuu, we wì gↄ̃ wɛ̃́ɛↄ ũ.
Wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ pↄ́ gò wá oawaↄ, wálɛ Dii gawi ↄlↄnɛ́ lán díiwa, wiↄ li laaàwa, wá gawi iↄ kã́fĩ. Dii pↄ́ dɛ Lua Nisĩna ũpi zĩn we.
Ayãmɛto lá Lua zĩ bee dàwɛ̃ɛ a sùuu guu, wá kúsu lí kwɛ́o.
Wa ↄkpà asii wisaiyãↄzi, wili yãkɛ ń wɛzɛ̃oo, mɛ́ wili Lua yã́ koleo. Wi sĩana'ònɛ́ wásawasa wà wázĩa kɛkɛ gbɛ̃́piiɛ Lua dↄ̃a guuɛ.
Tó baona pↄ́ wálɛ kpá ulɛaɛ, gbɛ̃́ vũaaaↄ ↄ̃ a ulɛanɛ́.
Asa dṹniaɛ bee dii Yesusaideↄ wɛ́ vĩ̀akũ̀, kɛ́ aasu baona sí, Kilisi pↄ́ dɛ Lua taa ũ gawi gupunɛ́o yã́iɛ.
Wá zĩa kpàwa wálɛ kɛo, Yesu Kilisi diikɛ kpàwa wálɛ kɛ, mɛ́ wálɛ zↄbleɛ́ aà yã́i.
Lá Lua ò yãa, gu pu gusiau, à gupù wá sↄ̃u màa lↄ. Gupuapi dɛ aà gawi pↄ́ lɛ́ tɛkɛ Kilisi oawa dↄ̃a ũ.
Ń beeo wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wá àizɛɛ bee kũaↄ, wá dɛ lán gĩ̀ oowa, kɛ́ wà e dↄ̃ gbãa zↄ̃ↄ ì bↄ Lua kĩ́iɛ, wá kĩ́i no.
Wìↄ ĩadawá gupiiuɛ, ń beeo wili fuo. Wi bílikɛ, ãma wá wɛ́ dↄa Luazi lí busao.
Wì wá wɛtã, ãma Lua lí wá tó weo. Wì wá pã́lɛ, ãma wili gao.
Gↄↄpii wá kú Yesu ga suawá guu, kɛ́ aà wɛ̃ni e bↄ gupuau wá mɛwa yã́i.
Wá gbɛ̃́ bɛ̃́ɛↄ wiↄ ku ga lɛ́zĩ Yesu yã́i, kɛ́ aà wɛ̃ni e bↄ gupuau wá mɛ pↄ́ a ga guu yã́i.
Màa gapi lɛ́ zĩkɛ wá guu, mɛ́ wɛ̃nipi lɛ́ zĩkɛ á guu.
A kɛ̃a Lua taalau wà mɛ̀: Ma Lua náaikɛ̀ ↄ̃ ma yã'ò. Wápiↄ sↄ̃ wa Lua náai doũpi kɛ̀, ↄ̃ wálɛ yã'o a yã́i.
Asa wá dↄ̃ lá Lua Dii Yesu bↄ̀ gau, a wá bↄaànↄ gau sↄ̃, i wá kpá a kùɛ sãnu ń ápiↄ.
Beeↄ lɛ́ wá le píi á yã́i, Lua gbɛ̃kɛ i li gbɛ̃́ dasidea, aà sáaukpaa i kã́fĩ aà tↄbↄa yã́i.
Ayãmɛto wá kúsu lí kwɛ́o. Baa tó wá mɛkaa lɛ́ yaikɛ, wá guu ìↄ dafukũ lá gu lɛ́ dↄɛ.
Wá ĩadama gↄↄ do lɛɛnaɛ bee lɛ́ gawi zↄ̃ↄ láasai iwɛ̃ɛ, a dɛ beeao.
Wá wɛ́ kú pↄ́ pↄ́ wì wɛsiɛ kĩ́io, sema pↄ́ pↄ́ wìli wɛsiɛo. Asa pↄ́ pↄ́ wì wɛsiɛá gↄↄpla pↄ́ɛ. Pↄ́ pↄ́ wìli wɛsiɛo sↄ̃ ìↄ ku gↄↄpiiɛ.
Wá dↄ̃ tó wá sↄ pↄ́ wá kúu kpɛ́ ũ dṹnia guuɛ bee yàa, Lua a kpɛ́ pↄ́ wi dↄ ń ↄoo kpáwá a bɛ e gↄↄpii.
Wi we sↄpi guu fɛ̀ɛɛ, wá ye luabɛ pↄ́pi daɛ,
asa tó wa bↄ sↄu, wáↄ ku mɛsaio.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ wá kú sↄɛ bee guu, wi we fɛ̀ɛɛ lá wá asosɛawa. I kɛ wá ye bↄ a guu no, wá ye luabɛ pↄ́ daɛ, kɛ́ wɛ̃ni wá sↄ pↄ́ ì gapi mↄ́.
Bee yã́i ↄ̃ Lua wá kɛ́i, ↄ̃ à a Nisĩna kpàwá gba pↄ́ à dↄ̀aa dàwɛ̃ɛ ũ.
A yã́i tò wá sↄ̃ ìↄ dilɛa. Wá dↄ̃ gↄↄ pↄ́ wá mɛɛ bee ku, wá kú Dii kĩ́io.
Asa Dii náai wá kuò, i kɛ wɛsia pↄelɛ yã́ no.
Wá sↄ̃ ìↄ dilɛa. Bↄa sↄu gɛa Dii kĩ́i mɛ́ maawɛ̃ɛ.
Kua mɛ guun nò, bↄa a guun nò, wiↄ wɛɛlɛ wá yã́ kaaàgu.
Asa Kilisi aↄ zↄ̃lɛa a gĩ́naa, wápii wí bↄ zɛ aà aɛ, i fĩabo wá baadeɛ aà kua mɛ guu yãkɛawa, a maa ge a vãi.
Lá wálɛ vĩakɛ Diiɛ màa, wi wɛɛlɛ gbɛ̃́ↄ yã́pi zɛ́ e. Lua wá sã́asã dↄ̃, mɛ́ wá ye à wá dↄ̃ á sↄ̃u màa.
Wálɛ wázĩa sáaukpaɛ́ lↄ no, wálɛ á gba zɛ́ à ĩ́anadã wá yã́ musuɛ, í e yã́zãsi gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì ĩ́anadã pↄ́ pↄ́ àlɛ e ń wɛ́o, i kɛ sↄ̃̀ yã́ nowa.
Tó álɛ e wá liaaaɛ, Lua yã́iɛ. Tó wa su wá dↄ̀ↄwa, á yã́iɛ.
Asa Kilisi yeawázi yã́ mɛ́ wá kũa gbãa. Wá è tó gbɛ̃́ mɛ̀ndo gà gbɛ̃́pii gɛ̃ɛ ũ, aa gà ḿpiin we.
À gà gbɛ̃́pii gɛ̃ɛ ũ, kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ↄ su wàↄ kú ńzĩa pↄ́ ũ lↄo, sema gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gà ń gɛ̃ɛ ũ à vù pↄ́.
Bee yã́i wili gbɛ̃e gwa lá dṹnia ì aà gwawa tia lↄo. Baa kɛ́ wá Kilisi dↄ̃ lá dṹnia aà dↄ̃wa yãa, wá aà dↄ̃ màa tia lↄo.
Tó gbɛ̃́ naa Kilisiwa, gbɛ̃́ dafuɛ. Aà kua zi gɛ̃̀, a dafu mɛ́ mↄ̀.
Bee bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i píiɛ. À wá kɛanↄ na ń Kilisi gbãao, ↄ̃ à gbɛ̃́ↄ kɛa naanↄ zĩ dàwɛ̃ɛ.
Kilisi sabai Lua dṹnia kɛ̀anↄ na gbɛ̃́ↄ tàaeↄ yãdasai. À gbɛ̃́ↄ kɛaanↄ napi yãdàwɛ̃ɛ.
Beewa Kilisi gɛ̃ɛↄn wá ũ. Lua lɛ́ gbɛ̃́ↄ sisi wá musu. Wa wabikɛ̀wá Kilisi gbɛu, à kɛ na ń Luao.
Lua tò duunsaide gↄ̃̀ duuna awakpabↄ ũ wá yã́i, kɛ́ naawà guu Lua i to yã́ bↄwanↄ na.
Lá wálɛ zĩkɛ Luaɛ, wa awakpàɛ́, ásu to gbɛ̃kɛ pↄ́ Lua kɛ̀ɛ́ kɛ pão.
Asa Lua mɛ̀: Ma n yãmà a gↄↄwa, ma dↄnlɛ suabagↄↄ. Gↄↄ kà sa, gbã mɛ́ suabagↄↄpi ũ.
Wili yã́ pↄ́ a to gbɛ̃́ fu kɛo, kɛ́ wasu wá zĩ sãa eo yã́i.
Wi wá luazĩkɛnkɛ ↄlↄ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ yã́pii guu. Wi mɛnafↄ̃ maamaa ń ĩadaawáo ń taasio ń wɛ́tɛ̃ao.
Wà wá gbɛ̃́, wà wá ká kpɛ́u, wà fɛ̀lɛwanↄ. Wa zĩ gbãa kɛ̀, wi e i'òo, nↄana wá dɛ́.
Wá ↄ̀lↄnɛ́ ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo ń dↄ̃ao ń sùuuo ń maakɛao ń nↄ̀sɛpuao ń yenzi mↄafilisaio
ń sĩana'oao ń Lua gbãao. Wá maakɛbↄↄ kũa wá ↄplaau ń zɛɛo.
Wì wá kpɛla, wì wá kpɛbↄ. Wì wá tↄ́ vãi sí, wì wá tↄnasi. Sĩandeↄn wá ũ, ↄ̃ wì wá dilɛ mↄafilideↄ ũ.
Tↄdeↄn wá ũ, ↄ̃ wì wá dilɛ gbɛ̃andoↄ ũ. Wá bɛ̃́ɛɛ fá, ↄ̃ wì wá dilɛ gɛↄ ũ. Wì wá dilɛ pↄgbɛ̃aↄ ũ, ãma wìli wá dɛo.
Wá pↄ ìↄ naɛ, ↄ̃ wìↄ wá dilɛ pↄsiadeↄ ũ. Wi gbɛ̃́ↄ kɛ ↄdeↄ ũ dasi, ↄ̃ wìↄ wá dilɛ taasideↄ ũ. Wá pↄ́pii vĩ, ↄ̃ wìↄ wá dilɛ pↄesaideↄ ũ.
Kↄlɛnideↄ, wa yã'òɛ́ wásawasa, wa wá nↄ̀sɛ wɛ̃̀ɛ́.
Wi wá nↄ̀sɛ kṹkpaɛ́o, ámɛ a á pↄ́ kũ̀kpawɛ̃ɛ.
Ma yã'òɛ́ lán ma nɛ́ↄwaɛ. Lá wa wá nↄ̀sɛ wɛ̃̀ɛ́, à á nↄ̀sɛ wɛ̃wɛ̃ɛ sↄ̃.
Ásu nakↄ̃wa ń Yesusaideↄo. Kpelewa maa ń vãio aa gbɛ̃́kpa ń kↄ̃oi? Baa kpele gupua ń gusiao vĩ ń kↄ̃oi?
Kilisi yã́ a kↄ̃sɛ ń Setãu pↄ́o kpelewa ni? Bↄ́ Yesude ń Yesusaideo vĩ ń kↄ̃oi?
Kpelewa Lua kpɛ́ lɛ́ a kɛ doũ ń tã́aↄi? Lua bɛ̃́ɛ kpɛ́n wá ũ, lá a òwa à mɛ̀: Máↄ kúńnↄ, máↄ bɛbɛ ń guu, míↄ dɛ ń Lua ũ, aaiↄ dɛ ma gbɛ̃́ↄ ũ.
Ayãmɛto Dii mɛ̀: À kɛ̃́má, àliↄ kú ádoa, ásu ↄkã pↄ́ gbãlɛawao, mí á sí,
míↄ dɛ á Mae ũ, íↄ dɛ ma nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ ń ma nɛnↄɛↄ ũ. Dii Gbãapiide mɛ́ ò.
Ma gbɛ̃́ yenzideↄ, lá Lua lɛgbɛ̃̀wɛ̃ɛ màa, wà kɛ̃ yã́ pↄ́ ì mɛ ń nisĩnao gbãlɛwa míↄmiↄ, wí wɛɛlɛ wà wá kua adoa lɛpapa vĩakɛa Luaɛ guu.
À wá kṹ ↄplapla. Wi tàaekɛ gbɛ̃eɛo, wi gbɛ̃e ↄ̃̀ↄkpao, wi gbɛ̃e taiinkɛo.
Mi bee o mà yãdaála no. Má ò kↄ̀, wa gan nò, wá kún nò, á yã́ dↄ wá sↄ̃waɛ.
Má á náai vĩ zↄ̃ↄ, mi ĩ́anadã á yã́ musu maamaa. Wɛ́tɛ̃a mↄawɛ̃ɛ guu píi ma nↄ̀sɛninia kpɛ lↄo, ma pↄ kɛ̀na yã́iyãi.
Baa kɛ́ wa ka Masedoni bùsuu, wá mɛ i e dↄ̀o. Wɛ́tɛ̃a píi wá lé, wà fɛ̀lɛwá ń sòleo, ↄ̃ wá kú sↄ̃̀deedee guu.
Ɔ̃ Lua pↄ́ ì yɛ̃̀ɛɛsaideↄ nↄ̀sɛ níni wá nↄ̀sɛ nìniwɛ̃ɛ Titu mↄa guu.
I kɛ aà mↄa ado no, kɛ́ a aà nↄ̀sɛ nìniɛ̀ yã́iɛ lↄ. A òwɛ̃ɛ álɛ ma bɛɛkɛ, á kú déndↄ̃mɛɛ guu, a zɛmanↄ sa, ↄ̃ ma pↄna kã̀fĩ.
Baa kɛ́ lá pↄ́ má kɛ̃̀ɛ́ á pↄ yà, má làasoo pãle dao. Ma làasoo pãle dà yãa, kɛ́ má è lápi á pↄ yà gↄↄpla,
ãma ma pↄ kɛ̀na sa. I kɛ kɛ́ ma á pↄ yàɛ́ yã́i no, kɛ́ á pↄsia tò a nↄ̀sɛlìlɛ yã́iɛ. Á pↄyaapi bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́iɛ. Bee yã́i ásoo wá kɛ̀ɛ́o.
Pↄsia pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i ì to gbɛ̃́ nↄ̀sɛlilɛ Luapi i aà suaba líↄ déndↄ̃mɛɛ vĩo. Dṹnia pↄsia mɛ́ ì ga inɛ́.
À gwa lá pↄsia pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́ipi zĩkɛ̀ á guu. Á mɛ wã̀ sa, a gi ń ázĩao, á pↄ fɛ̀lɛ, vĩa á kṹ, a ma bɛɛkɛ̀, a wɛtã̀, a vãikɛna swãgàga. Apii guu a ázĩa ↄ̀lↄnɛ́ kɛ́ á tàae vĩ yã́pi guuo.
Baa kɛ́ ma lápi kɛ̃̀ɛ́, i kɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ tàaekɛ̀ ge gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ à tàaekɛ̀ɛ̀ yã́i no, má kɛ̃̀ Lua dↄ̃a guu, kɛ́ á yeawázi e bↄ gupuauɛ.
Wá nↄ̀sɛninia bee bàasi, wá pↄna kã̀fĩ maamaa Titu pↄna yã́ musu, kɛ́ ápii á tò aà nisĩna sù yã́i.
Ma ĩ́anadã̀ɛ̀ yãa á yã́ musu, i to wí ma kũo. Lá wa sĩana'òɛ́ yã́pii guu, màa wá ĩ́andãa Tituɛ kɛ̀ sĩana ũ.
Lá a aà dìlɛ gbia a aà kpɛlà, mɛ́ a aà yãmà ápii, tó à làasookɛ̀ yã́piwa, aà nↄ̀sɛ ì ɛa yáalↄwáɛ.
Ma pↄ kɛ̀na, kɛ́ má á náai vĩ yã́pii guu yã́i.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ, wá ye àↄ gbɛ̃kɛ pↄ́ Lua kɛ̀ Yesude pↄ́ aa ku Masedoni bùsuu wɛ̃́lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛoↄnɛ dↄ̃.
An yↄ̃a ń ĩadaama pãsĩo guu, an pↄ kɛ̀na maamaa, ↄ̃ baa ń ń taaside búubuukɛo aa gbadà sↄũsↄũ.
Má òɛ́ aa gbadà ń gbãa lɛ́u, a dɛ ń gbãa lɛ́a se.
Aa gbɛ̀awá ńzĩa awa ń awao, wà ń gba zɛ́ ń ↄ e àↄ ku Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ kámasa guu.
Aa kɛ̀ dɛ lá wá wɛ́ dↄia, aa ńzĩa kpà Diiwa gĩa ń wápiↄ lↄ lá Lua yeiwa.
Ɔ̃ wa wabikɛ̀ Tituwa aà gɛ́ kámasa yã́ pↄ́ a dàalɛ á guu lɛkpaaĩi.
Lá á gbãa yã́pii guu, luanaaikɛa ń yã'oao ń dↄ̃ao ń yã́pii ãiao ń á yeawázio, àↄ gbãa kámasapi kaa guu lↄ.
I kɛ ma yãdìlɛɛ́ no, kↄai pↄ́ gbɛ̃pãleↄ kɛ̀ ↄ̃ má òɛ́, kɛ́ mà e mà á yea gbɛ̃́ↄzi sĩana dↄ̃.
Á wá Dii Yesu Kilisi gbɛ̃kɛ dↄ̃. Aà pↄde'ia à gↄ̃̀ pↄsaide ũ á yã́i, ↄ̃ aà pↄsaidekɛ guu à á kɛ́ pↄdeↄ ũ.
Lá má è yã́pi musun we. Bee kↄ̃sì ń á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a zɛ ń yã́pio za muyãa, mɛ́ á kɛ̀ↄ.
À yã́pi lɛkpaaĩ sa. Lá á sↄu mà ń a kɛao, à kɛ á gbãa lɛ́u.
Tó gbɛ̃́ gbadà ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo a pↄvĩa lɛ́u, bee ì ká, i kɛ pↄ́ pↄ́ a vĩo no.
I kɛ áↄ taasikɛ gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ aaↄ namable no. Àↄ kpaaĩa.
Tia kɛ́wa pↄ́ pↄ́ diázi à yoonɛ́ an pↄ́kɛ̃sãama guu. Gↄↄewa sↄ̃, pↄ́ pↄ́ dińzi aai ɛa yooɛ́ á pↄ́kɛ̃sãawá guu. Beewa áↄ kpaaĩa.
Lá a kɛ̃a láuwa wà mɛ̀: Sɛ̀lɛnzↄ̃ↄde pↄ́ i fɛ̃o, yↄↄnde pↄ́ i kɛ̃́são.
Ma sáaukɛ̀ ń Luao, kɛ́ a tò á yã́ dↄ Titu sↄ̃wa lamawa.
À wá yãmà, aà mɛ wã̀ à mↄ á gwai, àlɛ mↄ́ teasi no.
Wá gbɛ̃do pↄ́ aà tↄ́ lìgua Yesudeↄ guu píi baonakpaa musu ↄ̃ wá dàɛ̀.
Bee gbɛa lↄ Yesudeↄ aà sɛ̀ aà gɛ́wanↄ kámasa zĩ pↄ́ wálɛ kɛ kɛi. Wálɛ zĩpi kɛ Dii tↄbↄa yã́iɛ ń nↄ̀sɛmaa pↄ́ wá dào.
Wálɛ gbɛ̃́ↄ wá tàae'ea gba zↄ̃ↄ pↄ́ na wá ↄzĩ yã́ musu abaa bↄ.
I kɛ yã́ pↄ́ maa Diiɛ ↄ̃ wálɛ wɛɛlɛ adoo, ń pↄ́ pↄ́ maa gbɛ̃nazĩnaↄnɛo lↄɛ.
Wa wá gbɛ̃pãle dànɛ́ lↄ. Wa aà laai gwà a gɛ̃na lɛ́ vĩo, wá è a ãiavĩ yã́pii guu, mɛ́ aà ãia ɛ̀a kã̀fĩ tia, kɛ́ a á náai vĩ yã́i.
Titu gbɛ̃́ bee sↄ̃, ma zĩkɛndee pↄ́ wi á maa wɛɛlɛ sãnun aà ũ. Wá gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ sↄ̃, Yesudeↄ zĩnaↄnɛ, aaì Kilisi tↄbↄ.
Ayãmɛto à ↄlↄnɛ́ kɛ́ á yeńzi, Yesudeↄ i dↄ̃ kɛ́ wá ĩ́andãa á yã́ musu sĩana vĩ.
Má lákɛ̃ɛ́ Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ kↄ̃ kámasa pↄ́ wálɛ kápi yã́ musuo,
asa má dↄ̃ a nↄ̀sɛmaa dà, ↄ̃ ma ĩ́anadã̀ Masedoniↄnɛ ma mɛ̀ Gɛlɛkiↄ sↄu mà za muyãa. Á ãiapi ń gbɛ̃́ daside mɛ fɛ̀lɛ.
Ɔ̃ ma wá gbɛ̃́piↄ zĩ̀wá àↄ ku sↄu guu lá má òwa, kɛ́ ĩ́ana pↄ́ wá dã̀ yã́pi musu su kɛ pão.
Tó Masedoniↄ mↄ̀manↄ, tó aa è á sↄu i mao, wí a wá kũɛ, kɛ́ wa á náaikɛ̀ yã́i. Á è, má á pↄ́ o lↄe?
Ayãmɛto má è a maa mà o gbɛ̃́piↄnɛ aa dↄaamɛɛ, aa gba pↄ́ a dↄaa a a lɛgbɛ̃̀ yã́ kɛkɛ káau, a sↄu i ma, iↄ dɛ nↄ̀sɛmɛndo gba ũ, i kɛ gba teaside no.
À làasookɛ yã́ɛ beewa. Tó ń tↄ̃̀ yↄↄ, ni kɛkɛ yↄↄɛ, tó ń tↄ̃̀ zↄ̃ↄ, ni kɛkɛ zↄ̃ↄɛ.
Baade kpá lá à zɛ̀ò a sↄ̃ guuwa oosisisai teasisai. Lua ye gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì gbada ń pↄnaozi.
Lua a fↄ̃ to ɛ̀fãai píi liála, gↄↄpii pↄ́pii i mↄ́wá yã́pii guu e à lìála maakɛa píi guu.
A kɛ̃a Lua taalau wà mɛ̀: Ì pↄ́ fã́ɛ taasideↄnɛ, aà maakɛa ìↄ ku gↄↄpiiɛ.
Lá Lua ì pↄbui kpa pↄtↄ̃nawa mɛ́ ì pↄblea kpa gbɛ̃́piiwa, a pↄbui kpáwá, i kↄ̃́ɛ́, á maakɛa gbɛ i yàasa kṹ.
A á kɛ pↄdeↄ ũ yã́pii guu, íↄ gbada sↄũsↄũ gↄↄpii, gbɛ̃́ↄ i Lua sáaukpa gba pↄ́ á dànɛ́ wá sabai yã́i.
Asa Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ pↄ́kɛ̃sãma bↄↄlɛ ↄ̃ kámasa zĩpi lɛ́ kɛ adoo, a to Lua sáaukpaa ligua maamaa lↄɛ.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ Lua tↄbↄ, asa kámasa pↄ́ á kàpi lɛ́ ↄlↄnɛ́ a misìilɛ Kilisi bao pↄ́ a zɛ̀òɛ, mɛ́ a gbɛ̃kɛkɛ̀nɛ́ ń gbɛ̃́piio ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo,
aai wabikɛɛ́, aai á nidɛ Lua gbɛ̃kɛ pↄ́ tↄ̃̀wá yã́i.
À Lua sáaukpa aà gba pↄ́ gɛ̃̀ oaa yã́i.
Ma Pↄlu, ma awakpàɛ́ ń Kilisi nↄ̀sɛniɛ sùuuo, ma gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ i mɛ má busɛ á guu mɛ́ má pãsĩ á kpɛ.
Ma wabikɛ̀wá, tó ma mↄ, ásu to màↄ pãsĩánↄo, asa má fↄ̃ mà a pãsĩ ↄlↄ á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaì mɛ dṹnia yã́ mɛ́ lɛ́ dↄaawɛ̃ɛↄnɛ.
Wá kú dṹnia guuɛ, ãma wili zĩka lán dṹnia gbɛ̃́ↄwao.
Wá gↄ̃kɛbↄↄá dṹnia pↄ́ no, Lua gↄ̃kɛbↄ gbãa pↄ́ wi zɛgikĩi gbooòↄnɛ. Wi ↄ̃nↄ búinaↄ suumpaò
ń wala pↄ́ ì gínɛ́ wà Lua dↄ̃o píi. Wi làasoo píi kṹ zĩ̀zↄↄ ũ aa misiilɛ Kilisiɛ.
Tó a misìilɛwɛ̃ɛ wásawasa, wá sↄu mà wà swã́gbãadeↄ swã́gaga.
I gbɛ̃́ gwa a bɛawaɛ. Tó gbɛ̃́ dìlɛ Kilisi pↄ́n a ũ, aà ɛa làasookɛ yã́ɛ beewa. Kilisi pↄ́n wá ũ laaàwa sↄ̃.
Baa tó ma ĩ́anadã̀ zↄ̃ↄ iko pↄ́ Dii kpàwá yã́ musu, wí a ma kũo, asa á zɛdↄa yã́iɛ, i kɛ á gbooa yã́i no.
Má ye ma lákɛ̃aɛ́ àↄ dɛɛ́ vĩadadanzi ũo.
Wì mɛ ma láↄ gbia, ì ń gba gbãa, ãma tó wá kú kↄ̃ wɛ́u, ma lɛ́ ìↄ busɛ, ma yã́ lí tↄ̃́máo.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ o màaↄ dↄ̃ kɛ́ lá wá dɛ láↄ guu, màa wáↄ dɛ kua kↄ̃ wɛ́u.
Wá kɛ muaa ge wá wá lɛɛũ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ ńzĩa sáaukpaↄo. Aa ńzĩa kpaaĩa ń kↄ̃o ń ńzĩa lɛɛũa ń kↄ̃o ↄ̃nↄ vĩo.
Wá gbɛ̃́ beeↄ, wá ĩ́anadã dɛ a lɛ́ao. Wá dã kↄↄ pↄ́ Lua dàwɛ̃ɛ lɛ́uɛ. Baa ápiↄ, kↄↄpi á ká.
Lá wa ka á kĩ́i, wálɛ vĩ wá pↄ́ lɛ́ao, asa wa mↄ ń Kilisi baoo e á kĩ́i.
Wili ĩ́anadã dɛ a lɛ́a wa gbɛ̃pãleↄ zĩkàuo. Lá á luanaaikɛa lɛ́ kã́fĩ, wá ye zĩ pↄ́ wálɛ kɛ á guu ↄta maamaa e kↄↄ pↄ́ Lua dàwɛ̃ɛ lɛ́uɛ,
wí gɛ́ baopi kpái bùsu pↄ́ kú á aɛↄ guu, gbɛ̃pãleↄ tàaabaa ĩ́andãsai.
Tó gbɛ̃́ ye ĩ́anadã, aà dã Dii yã́ musu.
I kɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì azĩa sáaukpa mɛ́ maao, sema gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Dii ì aà sáaukpa.
À ma fↄ̃ yↄↄ ń ma sↄũkɛyão, ãma álɛ kɛ kↄ̀.
Lá Lua lí sí sàao, màa ↄ̃ má kũa á yã́ musu. Á gↄ̃ mɛ̀ndoɛ, ↄ̃n Kilisi ũ. Ma á kpã́sãwà wɛ̃́ndia lɛ́so ũɛ.
Lá mlɛ̃ kↄ̃nikɛ̀ Ɛvaɛ à aà sã̀sã, vĩa lɛ́ ma kṹ kɛ́ a su á sã́sã sↄ̃, í á naa Kilisiwa gbãsĩsai ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo tó.
Tó gbɛ̃́ mↄ̀ Yesu yã́ pↄ́ dodo ń wá pↄ́o waasokɛ̀ɛ́, ge nisĩna pↄ́ dodo ń pↄ́ pↄ́ á èo ge baona pↄ́ dodo ń pↄ́ pↄ́ á sìo, i aà gba zɛ́ maamaaɛ.
Má è má kɛ̃́sãa zĩna pↄ́ a ń dílɛ dɛńlaↄzi yãe guuo.
Baa tó ma lɛ́na nao, má dↄ̃a vĩ. Wá ↄ̀lↄɛ́ ápii wásawasa yã́pii musu.
Kɛ́ ma baona pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i waasokɛ̀ɛ́ pↄ́siwásai, mɛ́ ma azĩa bùsa á kã́fĩa yã́i, tàae má kɛ̀a?
Ma Yesude pãleↄ taiinkɛ̀, ma a asea èmá, kɛ́ mà e màↄ zĩkɛ á guu yã́i.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ má kúánↄ, tó pↄ́ lɛ́ kɛ̃́sãa, mili ĩada gbɛ̃ewao. Wá gbɛ̃́ↄ bↄ̀ Masedoni bùsuu, aa mↄ̀mɛɛ ń pↄ́ pↄ́ lɛ́ kɛ̃́sãaↄ. Má azĩa kũa, mi kɛ gbɛ̃eɛ aso ũo, mɛ́ máↄ mazĩa kũa màaɛ.
Ń Kilisi sĩana pↄ́ kú ma guuo, gbɛ̃e a kpa ma ĩ́andãyãpiɛ Gɛlɛsi bùsuuo.
Bↄ́yãi má ò màai? Má yeázi noa? Lua dↄ̃.
Yã́ pↄ́ málɛ kɛ máↄ kɛɛ, kɛ́ mà e zɛzↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ ma lɛ́wɛↄnɛ aa ĩ́anadã láwáwa yã́i.
Gbɛ̃́piↄá zĩna ɛgɛnaↄnɛ! Zĩkɛn mↄafilideↄnɛ! Aaì li Kilisi zĩnaↄ ũ.
Yãbↄnsaɛ no. Baa Setãupi ì li gupua malaika ũɛ.
Lá màaɛ, tó aà zĩkɛnaↄ lì maa zĩkɛnaↄ ũ, yãbↄnsaɛ no. An zia aↄ dɛ ń yãkɛawaɛ.
Ma ɛa lɛ́ o lↄ, gbɛ̃e su ma gwa sↄũ ũo. Tó màan sↄ̃o, àↄ ma kũa màa, kɛ́ mà e ĩ́anadã yↄↄ.
Yã́ pↄ́ málɛ o, Dii mɛ́ ma dauo. Ĩana pↄ́ málɛ dã mazĩa náaikɛa guuɛ bee, málɛ dã mìsaikɛ guuɛ.
Lá gbɛ̃́ↄ lɛ́ ĩ́anadã dasi dṹnia yã́ musu, mapi sↄ̃ má dãɛ.
Asa á ↄ̃nↄnaↄ i mɛnafↄ̃ ń mìsaideↄ ń pↄnao.
Tó wàlɛ á kɛ zↄↄ ũ, tó wàlɛ á só, tó wàlɛ á taiinkɛ, tó wàlɛ gbãablewá, tó wàlɛ á sãnkɛ, i mɛnafↄ̃.
Sĩanaɛ, wá busɛ! À kɛ̀mɛɛ wí ũ! Ãma pↄ́ pↄ́ gbɛ̃́ kũa àlɛ a wↄ́ↄ kɛ, má kũa sↄ̃ɛ. Málɛ o mìsaikɛ guuɛ.
Ɛbɛluↄ no lò? Má a ũ sↄ̃ɛ. Isailiↄ no lò? Má a ũ sↄ̃ɛ. Ablahaũ buiↄ no lò? Má a ũ sↄ̃ɛ.
Kilisi zĩkɛnaↄ no lò? Má a ũ dɛńla. Málɛ yã'o lán ĩ́andewaɛ. Ma zĩkɛ̀ dɛńla, ma daakpɛu dɛńla, má a gbɛ̃a lɛ́ dↄ̃o, ma kua ga lɛ́zĩ gɛ̃na lɛ́ vĩo.
Yudaↄ ma gbɛ̃ flàala lɛ bla mɛ̀ndosai gɛ̃n sↄo.
Wà ma gbɛ̃ ń goo gɛ̃n àaↄ̃. Wà ma papa ń gbɛo gɛ̃n do. Gó kpàlɛmanↄ gɛ̃n àaↄ̃, ma kɛ ísi guu gↄↄ do fãanɛ ń gwãasĩnao.
Ma wɛ̃́lɛ dasi gɛa guu miↄ ku kai guu: Swa kai, kpã́iwɛliwɛↄ kai, Yudaↄ kai, buipãleↄ kai, bɛnanguo kai, sɛ̃̀a kai, ísia kai, Yesude ɛgɛnaↄ kai.
Ma zĩ gbãa kɛ̀ ń wãwão, ma itɛ̃kɛ̀ a gɛ̃na lɛ́ vĩo, nↄana ń imio ma dɛdɛ, ma lɛyè a gɛ̃na lɛ́ vĩo, má kú bṹu ĩ́andɛa guu.
A kĩniↄ bàasi Yesudeↄ píi kã̀akɛa ìↄ tↄ̃aa lá gu lɛ́ dↄ.
Gbɛ̃e bùsa ↄ̃ mi busaoa? Gbɛ̃e fù ↄ̃ i ↄ̃aoa?
Tó a maa mà ĩ́anadãɛ, má dã ma yɛ̃̀ɛɛsaikɛ musuɛ.
Lua wá Dii Yesu Kilisi Mae dↄ̃ kɛ́ málɛ ɛɛtoo. Wàↄ aà sáaukpa gↄↄpii!
Gↄↄ pↄ́ má kú Damasi, kí Aleta ziia ò wà wɛ̃́lɛpi bĩ́ibↄlɛↄ dã wà ma kṹ,
ↄ̃ wà ma bↄ fɛnɛntiu, wà ma pila ń bao gbí guu bĩ́i kpɛ, ↄ̃ ma pilimá.
À kũ̀ mà ĩ́anadãɛ. Baa tó a ài vĩo, má ɛa su wɛ́pungu'eaↄ ń yã́ pↄ́ Dii ↄ̀lↄmɛɛↄwa.
Má gbɛ̃e dↄ̃ naa Kilisiwa, wà aà sɛ̀ gɛ̀ò e luabɛ sĩanau, a wɛ̃̀ gɛ̃o mɛ̀ndosain la. À gɛ̀ ń mɛon nò, mɛsain nò, má dↄ̃o, Lua mɛ́ dↄ̃.
Má dↄ̃ kɛ́ wà gbɛ̃́pi sɛ̀ gɛ̀ò e àizãnablekĩi. À gɛ̀ ń mɛon nò, mɛsain nò, Lua mɛ́ dↄ̃.
À yã́ pↄ́ a oa kɛo mà, gbɛ̃nazĩna a zɛ́ vĩ à sɛ́lɛ siuo.
Má ĩ́anadã gbɛ̃́pi yã́ musuɛ, ãma má ĩ́anadã mazĩa yã́ musuo, sema ma yɛ̃̀ɛɛsaikɛ yã́ bàasio.
Tó má ye ĩ́anadã, má ĩ́anadã mìsaide ũo, asa sĩana má o. Ãma má dão, kɛ́ gbɛ̃e su ma dilɛ dɛ lá á è má dɛ ge lá á mà ma lɛ́ulao.
Kɛ́ másu mà wala kɛ yãzↄ̃ↄ pↄ́ Lua ↄ̀lↄmɛɛↄ musuo yã́i, à lɛ sↄ̀lↄ ma mɛu Setãu ìwa ũ, àↄ ma gbɛ̃.
Ma wabikɛ̀ Diiwa gɛ̃n àaↄ̃ yã́pi musu, aà pↄ́pi gomala,
ↄ̃ a òmɛɛ gbɛ̃kɛ pↄ́ i kɛmɛɛ mↄ̀a, yɛ̃̀ɛɛsaikɛ guu ↄ̃ a gbãa sĩana ì bↄu. Ayãmɛto má ĩ́anadã ń pↄnao ma yɛ̃̀ɛɛsaikɛ musu, kɛ́ Kilisi gbãa àↄ kumala.
Beewa mi pↄnakɛ ń ma yɛ̃̀ɛɛsaikɛo ń widaaao ń taasikɛao ń ĩadaaao ń wɛ́tɛ̃ao Kilisi yã́i, asa gↄↄ pↄ́ ma busa ↄ̃ miↄ gbãa.
Ma mìsaikɛ kɛ̀, ámɛ a ma dau. Ámɛ a maa yãa à ma sáaukpa. Baa tó má pↄe ũo, má kɛ̃́sãa zĩna pↄ́ a ń dílɛ dɛńlapiↄzi yãe guuo.
Ma a zĩnakɛ seela ↄ̀lↄɛ́ ń mɛnao maamaa yãbↄnsaɛↄ ń dabudabukɛaↄ guu.
Bↄ́ ma á kɛ̃́sãò Yesude kĩniↄzii, kɛ́ mi gↄ̃ á gbɛ̃eɛ aso ũo bàasio? À sùuukɛmanↄ ń tàae beeo!
Tia kɛ́wa ma mↄa á kĩ́i gɛ̃n àaↄ̃de sↄu mà, mɛ́ má gↄ̃ á gbɛ̃eɛ aso ũo. Ámɛ málɛ á wɛɛlɛ, i kɛ á pↄ́ↄ no. Asa maeↄ mɛ́ aaì àizɛɛ dilɛ ń nɛ́ↄnɛ, i kɛ nɛ́ↄ mɛ́ aali dilɛnɛ́o.
Má a pↄ́ↄ ble píi, mí azĩa kpáwá ń pↄnao á wɛ̃ni yã́i. Tó ma yeaázi zↄ̃ↄkũ̀, á yeamazi a lao yã̀?
Ɛ̃hɛ̃, mi gↄ̃ɛ́ aso ũo, ãma wà mɛ̀ wɛzɛ̃nan ma ũ, má sìwá ń kↄ̃nioɛ.
Ma á blé gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ma ń zĩ́wáↄ kee sabaia?
Ma wabikɛ̀ Tituwa aà gɛ́ á kĩ́i, ↄ̃ ma wá gbɛ̃dopi dàɛ̀. Titu á blé yã̀? Wá kã́ doũo lé? Wá tufa doũo lé?
Álɛ e yãa wálɛ bↄkĩi wɛɛlɛ yã̀? Aawo! Wálɛ yã'o ń Lua dↄ̃ao naa Kilisiwa guuɛ. Ma gbɛ̃́ yenzideↄ, ma bee òɛ́ píi á zɛdↄa yã́iɛ.
Vĩa lɛ́ ma kṹ, tó ma ka á kĩ́i, kɛ́ másu á le lá má yeiowao, mɛ́ ásu ma e lá á yeiowao. Málɛ vĩakɛ sòleɛ ń zaakↄ̃uo ń pↄkũmao ń dɛnlawɛɛlɛao ń kↄ̃yaaao ń kↄ̃peo ń yↄ̃̀ↄo ń zↄao.
Vĩa lɛ́ ma kṹ kɛ́ tó ma ɛa mↄ, ma Lua a to wí ma kṹ á yã́ musu. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa duunakɛ̀ yãa aa gbãsĩkɛ̀, aa wùlɛ ń gbɛ̃pãle nↄo aa wisaiyã kɛ̀, tó aai mikɛ̃ ń yã́piↄ kɛawao, má ↄ́ↄlↄnɛ́ɛ.
Ma mↄa á gwai gɛ̃n àaↄ̃den kɛ. Wì yã́si seelade gbɛ̃ↄn pla ge gbɛ̃ↄn àaↄ̃ musuɛ.
Má òɛ́ yãa ma kuaánↄ gɛ̃n plaade guu, mɛ́ málɛ oɛ́ lↄ á kpɛ, tó ma ɛa mↄ, má gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa duunakɛ̀ yãaↄ ń gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ kee tɛ̃boo.
Álɛ seela wɛɛlɛ kɛ́ Kilisi mɛ́ lɛ́ yã'o ma guu nolo? Too! I kɛ Kilisi gbãasai no, ìↄ gbãa á guu.
Sĩanaɛ, aà paa líwaá gbãasaikɛyãɛ, ãma a kú ń Lua gbãaoɛ. Màa naawà guu wá busɛ sↄ̃, ãma wáↄ kuaànↄ á guu ń Lua gbãaoɛ.
À ázĩa tàasika à gwa, tó á kú Yesu Kilisi náaikɛa guu. À làasookɛ ázĩawa. I dↄ̃ kɛ́ a kú á guuo lé? Tó màa no, a fuaɛ.
Má ye àↄ dↄ̃ kɛ́ wápiↄ wi fuao.
Wálɛ wabikɛ Luawa ásu vãie kɛo. I kɛ kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ↄ wá maabo yã́i no, kɛ́ à maakɛ yã́iɛ, baa tó wàlɛ wá gwa gbɛ̃́ fuaↄ ũ.
Wá fↄ̃ zɛzↄ̃ sĩanaɛo, sema wà zɛpooɛ̀.
Tó wá busɛ mɛ́ á gbãa, wá pↄ ìↄ naɛ. Yã́ pↄ́ wi a wabikɛ mɛ́ dɛ kɛ́ á yã́ e àↄ bↄlɛia wásawasa.
Ma yã́ beeↄ kɛ̃̀ɛ́, kɛ́ tó ma mↄ, másu wɛbiiwá mà iko pↄ́ Dii kpàa mↄɛ́o. A kpàa á zɛdↄa yã́iɛ, i kɛ á gbooa yã́i no.
Tòo gbɛ̃́ↄ, à gↄ̃̀ zia bàasi. À dɛ̃ɛka á yã́ e àↄ bↄlɛia wásawasa. À ma lɛdama ma. À lɛdoũkɛ àↄ na ń kↄ̃o, Lua yenzide aafiade iↄ kúánↄ.
À fↄkpakↄ̃wa ń Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ lɛ́pɛakↄ̃wao. Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ fↄkpàwá ḿpii.
Dii Yesu Kilisi gbɛ̃kɛkɛɛ́, Lua iↄ yeázi, aà Nisĩna iↄ gbɛ̃́kpaaánↄ ápii.
Ma Lua zĩna Pↄlu ń ma Yesude dee pↄ́ wá sãnuↄ píi wámɛ wa láɛ bee kɛ̃̀ Yesude pↄ́ aa ku Galati bùsuuↄnɛ. Ma zĩnakɛ i bↄ gbɛ̃nazĩna kĩ́io, gbɛ̃nazĩna mɛ́ i a lɛdↄɛkɛo, Yesu Kilisi ń Mae Lua pↄ́ aà bↄ̀ gauo mɛ́ ma zĩ.

Lua wá Mae ń Dii Yesu Kilisio gbɛ̃kɛkɛɛ́, aai á gba aafia.
Kilisipi gì a wɛ̃nii Lua wá Mae pↄeãwa, à wá duuna kɛ̃̀wá, kɛ́ à e wá bↄ dṹnia tia vãiɛ beeu.
Lua mɛ́ gawi vĩ gↄↄpii! Ãmi.
Kɛ́ álɛ bↄ Lua pↄ́ á sisi a gbɛ̃kɛ guu kpɛ màa gↄ̃̀ↄ, álɛ zɛ ń bao koleao, yã́pi dìa maamaaɛ.
Baona pãle kuo. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ye Kilisi baopi lilɛↄ lɛ́ á liaaɛ.
Baa tó wápiↄ ge malaikae bↄ̀ luabɛ à baona pↄ́ i kpaaĩ ń pↄ́ pↄ́ wá òɛ́oo waasokpàɛ́, Lua láaikɛwà.
Wá òɛ́ yãa mɛ́ málɛ oɛ́ lↄ, tó gbɛ̃e baona pↄ́ i kpaaĩ ń pↄ́ pↄ́ á màoo waasokpàɛ́, Lua láaikɛwà.
Málɛ sáau wɛɛlɛ gbɛ̃nazĩnawa yã̀, ge Luaɛ? Málɛ wɛɛlɛ ma yã́ ká gbɛ̃nazĩnagu yã̀? Tó gbɛ̃nazĩna má ye à káńgu e tia, dↄ̃ Kilisi zↄ̀blenan ma ũo.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, má ye à dↄ̃ kɛ́ baona pↄ́ mi kpáɛ́ i bↄ gbɛ̃nazĩna kĩ́io.
Mi ma gbɛ̃nazĩna kĩ́io, gbɛ̃e mɛ́ i damɛɛo, Yesu Kilisi mɛ́ bↄ̀ mↄ̀oa.
Á mà lá má kú yãa Yudaↄ zɛ́u. Ma Yesudeↄ wɛtã̀ wɛ̃́lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛo pãsĩpãsĩ, má wɛ̀ɛlɛ mà ń midɛ.
Ma Yudaↄ zɛ́pi yã́ kũ̀ ↄplapla dɛ ma sáaↄla dasi, ma ãia dɛńla wá deziↄ fɛlɛkaayãpi guu.
Ãma Lua ma dilɛ a pↄ́ ũ za ma da nↄ̀sɛu. Kɛ́ aà ma sísia a gbɛ̃kɛ guu gↄↄ kàɛ̀,
ↄ̃ à a Nɛ́ gbàɛa, kɛ́ mà aà baona kpá buipãleↄnɛ. Mi gɛ́ kpálɛi gbɛ̃e gɛ̃zĩo,
mi gɛ́ Yelusalɛũ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa dɛ zĩnaↄ ũ ma ãaↄ kĩ́io, ma gɛ Laalubuↄ bùsuu gↄ̃̀ↄɛ, ↄ̃ ma ɛa ta Damasi.
Wɛ̃̀ àaↄ̃ gbɛa ↄ̃ ma gɛ Yelusalɛũ, kɛ́ wà kↄ̃ dↄ̃ ń Piɛɛo, ↄ̃ ma kɛaànↄ gↄↄ gɛ̃o.
Mi zĩna pãle eo, sema Dii dãuna Zaaki bàasio.
Yã́ pↄ́ má kɛ̃̀ɛ́pi, má sì ń Luao, ɛɛ málɛ tóo.
Bee gbɛa ma gɛ Sili bùsuu ń Silisi bùsuo.
Gↄↄ bee Yesude pↄ́ kú Yudeↄ i wɛsimalɛo,
ãma aa su mà wà mɛ̀, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ ń wɛtã yãa mɛ́ lɛ́ zɛ́ pↄ́ á wɛ̀ɛlɛ kaalɛpi waasokpa tiasa,
ↄ̃ aa Lua tↄbↄ̀ ma yã́ musu.
Wɛ̃̀ gɛ̃o mɛ̀ndosai gbɛa ma ɛa gɛ Yelusalɛũ ń Baanabao. Ma Titu sɛ̀, à gɛ̀wanↄ lↄ.
Ma gɛ we, kɛ́ Lua mɛ́ bↄ̀ mↄ̀oa à kũ̀ mà gɛɛ. Ɔ̃ ma baona pↄ́ mi kpa buipãleↄnɛ bↄↄlɛkɛ̀ dↄaanaↄnɛ ńtɛ̃ɛ, kɛ́ zĩ pↄ́ má kɛ̀ ń pↄ́ pↄ́ málɛ kɛo su kɛ pão.
Titu pↄ́ wá sãnu ń a Gɛlɛkikɛo, aai gãnawà aà tↄ̃zↄ̃o.
Yesude ɛgɛna pↄ́ gɛ̃̀ wá guu kpã́iↄ mɛ́ aa yã́pi dà. Aa gɛ̃̀ wá naa Kilisi Yesuwa wɛ̃́ɛkɛa tàasikaiɛ. Aa ye wá da zↄbleuɛ,
ↄ̃ wi we wa misìilɛnɛ́o baa yↄↄ, kɛ́ à e àↄ baona sĩana kũa yã́i.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wàlɛ ń gwa dↄaana ũↄ, aai yãe kã́fĩmɛɛo. Lá aa dɛ, i kɛmɛɛ yãe ũo, asa Lua lí gbɛ̃e zãboo.
Aa è Lua a baonakpaa buipãleↄnɛ nàmɛɛ ma ↄzĩ, lá à a kpaa Yudaↄnɛ nà Piɛɛɛ a ↄzĩwa.
Asa lá Lua zĩkɛ̀ Piɛɛ guu a zĩnakɛ yã́ musu Yudaↄ kĩ́i, màa à zĩkɛ̀ ma guu buipãleↄ kĩ́i.
Zaaki ń Piɛɛo ń Zãa pↄ́ wàlɛ ń gwa Lua kpɛ́ gbapɛlɛ ũↄ gbɛ̃kɛ pↄ́ Lua kɛ̀mɛɛ dↄ̃̀, ↄ̃ aa ↄkpàwá, wá ń Baanabao gbɛ̃kɛ vĩa ń kↄ̃o seela ũ. Aa sì wápiↄ wà gɛ́ buipãleↄ kĩ́i, ḿpiↄ sↄ̃ Yudaↄ kĩ́i.
Yã́ pↄ́ aa yei lé, ń taasideↄ yã́ àↄ dↄwágu. Gↄↄ bee sↄ̃ wá mɛ wã̀ ń a kɛao kↄ̀.
Kɛ́ Piɛɛ mↄ̀ Antiↄsi, ma giɛ̀ wɛliwɛ kɛ́ à zã̀ yã́wa yã́i.
Asa e Zaaki zĩnaↄ aaↄ gɛ́ kái, ì pↄble ń buipãleↄɛ. Kɛ́ aa kà, ↄ̃ à bↄ̀zã à kɛ̃̀má, kɛ́ àlɛ vĩakɛ Yuda pↄ́ aa zɛ̀ ń tↄ̃zↄ̃yãoↄnɛ yã́i.
Yuda kĩniↄ nàwà mↄafilipi guu. Baa se aa Baanaba gà nàmá.
Kɛ́ má è aa baona sĩana kũa a zɛ́wao, má ò Piɛɛɛ ampii wáa: N Yuda ia ń kú lán buipãlewa, i kɛ lán Yudawa no. Kpelewa ńyↄ̃ fↄ̃ gãna buipãleↄwa aaↄ Yudaↄ yã́ kũai?
Yudaↄn wá ũ, buipãle pↄ́ aa Lua dↄ̃oↄn wá ũo.
Ãma wá dↄ̃ kɛ́ gbɛ̃e lí bↄ maa zĩkɛa ikoyãpiwa yã́io, sema Yesu Kilisi náaikɛa ado bàasio. Baa wápiↄ, wa Kilisi Yesu náaikɛ̀, kɛ́ wà e bↄ maa wá Kilisi náaikɛapi yã́iɛ, i kɛ zĩkɛa ikoyãpiwa yã́i no, asa gbɛ̃e lí bↄ maa zĩkɛa ikoyãwa yã́io.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ wálɛ wɛɛlɛ wà bↄ maa naa Kilisiwa, tó wá è duunkɛnaↄn wá ũ sↄ̃, bee mɛ̀ Kilisi lɛ́ duuna wɛ̃zĩgba yã̀? Aawo!
Tó ma ɛa lɛ́ ikoyã pↄ́ má gbòo kɛkɛ, a tàaeden ma ũ we.
Asa má dɛ gɛ ũ ikoyãpi musuɛ, ↄ̃ ma bↄ a yã́u kɛ́ màↄ ku Lua pↄ́ ũ yã́i. Ma ga líwa ń Kilisio.
Mapi má kú lↄo, Kilisi mɛ́ kú ma guu. Tiasa ma gbɛ̃nazĩnkɛ guu má kú Lua Nɛ́ pↄ́ yemazi à gì a wɛ̃nii ma yã́i náaikɛa guuɛ.
Málɛ Lua gbɛ̃kɛ bãdɛo. Tó wì bↄ maa ikoyãpi yã́iɛ, Kilisi gà pãɛ.
Galati mìsaideↄ! Wa Yesu Kilisi gaa líwa sã́asã òɛ́ wásawasa. Wà pↄdàwá yã̀?
Má ye mà yã́ mɛ̀ndo gbɛawá. A Lua Nisĩna è zĩkɛa ikoyãwa yã́i yã̀, ge yã́ pↄ́ á màpi náaikɛa yã́iɛ?
Àkɛa a gↄ̃ mìsai kɛ́wai? Á dàalɛ ń Lua Nisĩna gbãaoɛ, ↄ̃ álɛ a midɛ ń ázĩa gbãao saa?
A taasi saɛ kɛ̀ pã yã̀? Aↄ pão.
Lua a Nisĩna kpàwá à dabudabuↄ kɛ̀ á guu á zĩkɛa ikoyãwa yã́i yã̀, ge yã́ pↄ́ á màpi náaikɛa yã́iɛ?
À gwa Ablahaũwa. À Lua náaikɛ̀, ↄ̃ Lua tò yã́ bↄ̀aànↄ na.
Àↄ dↄ̃ kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa Lua náai vĩↄ mɛ́ Ablahaũ buiↄ ũ.
Lua baonakpà Ablahaũɛ à mɛ̀ á báaada bui píigu aà sabai, asa wà dↄ̀aa wa kɛ̃̀ Luayãtaalau wà mɛ̀ Lua a to yã́ bↄ ń buipãleↄ na a náai pↄ́ aa kɛ yã́i.
Beewa Lua ì báaada gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa a náaikɛ̀ↄgu, lá a kɛ̀ a náaikɛna Ablahaũɛwa.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ zɛ̀ ń zĩkɛa ikoyãwao gↄ̃̀ láaipↄ ũɛ, asa a kɛ̃a láu wà mɛ̀, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ líↄ yã́ pↄ́ kú ikoyã lá guuↄ kũa píi a zɛ́waoá láaipↄɛ.
Wá dↄ̃ sã́asã kɛ́ Lua lí tó yã́ bↄ̀ńnↄ na zĩkɛa ikoyãwa guuo, asa wà mɛ̀ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua tò yã́ bↄ̀aànↄ na a náai pↄ́ àlɛ kɛ yã́i mɛ́ aↄ ku.
Ikoyã i kↄ̃'e ń luanaaikɛaoo, asa wà mɛ̀ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ikoyãpi kũa mɛ́ a wɛ̃ni e a guu.
Kilisi gↄ̃̀ láaipↄ ũ wá gbɛu, à wá bↄ́ ikoyã láai guu, asa a kɛ̃a láu wà mɛ̀, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wa lòo líwaá láaipↄɛ.
Bee kɛ̀ màa kɛ́ báaa pↄ́ Lua dà Ablahaũgu e gↄ̃ buipãleↄnɛ Kilisi Yesu sabaiɛ, wí Nisĩna pↄ́ Lua a lɛgbɛ̃̀ e aà náaikɛa yã́i.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, gbɛ̃nazĩn yãkɛa taa málɛ owàɛ́. Tó gbɛ̃́ lɛgbɛ dìlɛ mɛ́ a seeladeↄ vĩ, wa fↄ̃ wà a bãdɛo, wa fↄ̃ yãe kã́fĩuo.
Beewa Lua lɛgbɛ̃̀ Ablahaũɛ ń aà buio. A kɛ̃a Luayãtaalau, wi mɛ ń aà buiↄ lán dasi wàlɛ owao, wà mɛ̀ ń aà buioɛ, gbɛ̃́ mɛ̀ndoɛ, ↄ̃n Kilisi ũ.
Yã́ pↄ́ má ye on kɛ: Lua dↄ̀aa lɛgbɛ̃̀ɛ̀ yãa, à mɛ̀ a bàa àↄ kuaànↄ. A wɛ̃̀ ↄ̀aa pla ń baakwio (430) gbɛa ↄ̃ ikoyã mↄ̀. Ikoyãpi a fↄ̃ lɛgbɛ̃api gbooo, a fↄ̃ à a bãdɛo.
Tó wì Lua báaa e zĩkɛa ikoyãwa guuɛ, báaapi a bↄ aà lɛgbɛ̃a guu lↄo. Lua gbɛ̃kɛkɛ̀ Ablahaũɛ kɛ́ à a lɛgbɛ̃̀ɛ̀ yã́iɛ.
Bↄ́yãi à ikoyã dìlɛ lↄi? A kã̀fĩ e Ablahaũ bui pↄ́ Lua lɛgbɛ̃̀ aà yã́ musu àↄ mↄɛ, kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ↄ e dↄ̃ wa dɛ Luaɛ tàaedeↄ ũ yã́i. Lua a ikoyãpi kpà malaikaↄwa, aa nà kↄ́ↄɛ a ↄzĩ, ↄ̃ a dìlɛ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ.
Lua lɛgbɛ̃a sↄ̃, Luapi yã́ɛ ado, aà bàa kú ń kↄ́ↄeoo.
Tↄ̀ↄ! Ikoyãpi bↄ̀ Lua lɛgbɛ̃a kpɛ yã̀? Màa no! Tó ikoyã pↄ́ ì wɛ̃ni kpámá kú yãa, dↄ̃ wa bↄ maa ikoyãpi sabai.
A kɛ̃a Luayãtaalau wà mɛ̀, duuna gbɛ̃́pii kákpɛukɛ̀, kɛ́ báaa pↄ́ Lua a lɛgbɛ̃̀pi e gↄ̃ Yesu Kilisi náaikɛnaↄ pↄ́ ũ aà náai pↄ́ aalɛ kɛpi yã́i.
Za dↄ̃ Yesu náaikɛa i mↄo, ikoyã wá kákpɛu kɛ̀, a wá kũa dakpɛunaↄ ũ e Yesu náaikɛa pↄ́ lɛ́ mↄ́ gɛ̀ bↄ̀ò.
Beewa ikoyãpi dɛ wá gwana ũ yãa e Kilisi àↄ mↄ́, kɛ́ wà bↄ maa aà náaikɛa yã́i.
Lá Yesu náaikɛa kà sa, wa bↄ wá gwana yã́u.
Á naa Kilisi Yesuwa guu á dɛ Lua nɛ́ↄ ũ ápii aà náai pↄ́ álɛ kɛ yã́i,
asa á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a da'ilɛkɛ̀ Kilisi pↄ́ ũↄ, a Kilisi dàɛ.
Yudaↄ ń buipãleↄ, zↄↄ ń wɛ̃́ɛↄ, gↄ̃ɛↄ ń nↄɛↄ dodoa kↄ̃ɛo, asa ápiiá doũɛ naa Kilisi Yesuwa.
Tó á dɛ Kilisi pↄ́ ũ, á dɛ Ablahaũ buiↄ ũɛ, mɛ́ á dɛ àizɛɛ pↄ́ Lua a lɛgbɛ̃̀ɛ̀ blenaↄ ũ.
Málɛ oɛ́, gↄↄ pↄ́ túbiblena dɛ nɛ́ ũ, baa tó aà mae pↄ́ↄ dɛ aà pↄ́ ũ píi, a zↄ kɛ̃ao.
Ì misiilɛ a gwanaↄnɛ ń ziiaↄ e gↄↄ pↄ́ aà mae dìlɛwa.
Màa sↄ̃ wápiↄ, gↄↄ pↄ́ wi kàsaakũo, wi zↄble fɛlɛkaa pↄ́ pↄ́ wì misiilɛnɛ́ↄnɛ.
Kɛ́ gↄↄ pↄ́ Lua dìlɛ kà, à a Nɛ́ zĩ̀, wà aà ì gbɛ̃nazĩna iawa Mↄizi ikoyã guu,
kɛ́ aà wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Mↄizi yã́ iko vĩwáↄ bo, wí gↄ̃ a nɛ́ↄ ũ.
Lua a Nɛ́ Nisĩna dà wá sↄ̃ guu, kɛ́ wá dɛ a nɛ́ↄ ũ yã́i. Nisĩnapi ì wiilɛ ì mɛ: Baa, ma Mae!
Ayãmɛto zↄn n ũ lↄo, nɛ́n n ũ. Lá Lua Nɛ́n n ũ, à n kɛ a àizɛɛblena ũɛ.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ á Lua dↄ̃o, i zↄble pↄ́ pↄ́ aa dɛ Lua ũoↄnɛ.
Lá a Lua dↄ̃̀ tiasa, atɛ̃sa kɛ́ Lua á dↄ̃́, bↄ́yãi a ɛa lɛ́ zɛ ń pↄ́ gia yãfũna gbãasaipiↄ lↄi? Bↄ́yãi a ɛa á ye zↄblenɛ́ dafu lↄi?
I gↄↄeↄ ń mↄeↄ ń dikpɛeↄ ń wɛ̃eↄ tɛ̃bo.
Vĩa ma kũ á yã́ musu. Asi taasi pã má kɛ̀ á guua?
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, ma wabikɛ̀wá, à gↄ̃mawa, asa ma gↄ̃áwaɛ. Yãa i tàaekɛmɛɛo.
Á dↄ̃ kɛ́ gyãekɛ guu ↄ̃ ma baonakpàuɛ́ sɛ̃́ia.
Baa kɛ́ ma gyãkɛa kɛ̀ɛ́ yↄ̃a ũ, i sakamaguo, i gyaũkɛao, a ma si lán Lua malaika ge Kilisi Yesupiwaɛ.
Báaa pↄ́ álɛ kɛmɛɛ yãa kɛ̀a ni? Má fↄ̃ o á yã́ musu, tó à zɛkɛ̀ yãa, á á wɛ́ bↄbↄ kpaaɛ.
Kɛ́ ma sĩana'òɛ́ yã́i ↄ̃ ma gↄ̃ á zangude ũ saa?
Gbɛ̃́piↄ kɛaɛ́ kɛ̀kɛ, i kɛ á maa yã́i no. Aa ye à kɛ̃́wáɛ, í namá.
Wãa ń yãmaao gↄↄpii mɛ́ na, i kɛ gↄↄ pↄ́ má kúánↄ ado no.
Ma nɛ́ yenzideↄ, málɛ á ia wãwãkɛ lↄ e Kilisi àↄ sadaágu.
Má ye màↄ kúánↄ tia, mí a yã'oa lilɛ, asa ma bílikɛ̀ á yã́waɛ.
À omɛɛ, á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ á ye misiilɛ ikoyãɛↄ, i ma lá a ku Mↄizi ikoyã guuo lé?
Wà mɛ̀ Ablahaũ nɛgↄ̃ɛↄ ì gbɛ̃ↄn pla. À ado ì ń zↄoɛ, mɛ́ à ado ì ń wɛ̃́ɛo.
Zↄpi nɛ'ì gbɛ̃nazĩnkɛ guuɛ, ↄ̃ wɛ̃́ɛ a pↄ́ ì Lua lɛgbɛ̃a yã́i.
Nↄɛpiↄ yã́ dɛwɛ̃ɛ yãtaa ũ, Luabaakuańnↄ yã́ lɛɛ pla ũ. Ado bↄ̀ Sinai gbɛ kĩ́iɛ, ì zↄkɛ inɛ́. Bee mɛ́ Hagaa ũ.
A dɛ Sinai gbɛ pↄ́ kú Laalubuↄ bùsuu yãtaa ũ. Yelusalɛũ tia dɛ a ũ lↄ, asa àlɛ zↄble ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ píiɛ.
Yelusalɛũ pↄ́ kú musu mɛ́ wɛ̃́ɛ ũ. Ɔ̃mɛ wá da ũ.
Asa a kɛ̃a láu wà mɛ̀: Pↄnakɛ, fĩi pↄ́ ni nɛ'io! Gulakɛ, n gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ni nↄwãwãkɛo! Asa n gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ n gↄ̃ pãkpànzi, n nɛ́ dasi aↄ dɛ nↄɛ pↄ́ a gↄ̃ aɛdↄ̀wà pↄ́a.
Ápiↄ sↄ̃ ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, Lua lɛgbɛ̃a nɛ́ↄn á ũ lán Izaakiwa.
Nɛ́ pↄ́ wa ì gbɛ̃nazĩnkɛ guu ĩadà nɛ́ pↄ́ wa ì ń Lua Nisĩna gbãaowa. Màa a dɛ ń a tiao.
A kɛ̃a Luayãtaalau kpelewa ni? Wà mɛ̀: Zↄ yá ń a nɛ́o, asa zↄ nɛ́ a e túbible ń wɛ̃́ɛ nɛ́oo.
Ayãmɛto ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, zↄ nɛ́ↄn wá ũo, wɛ̃́ɛ nɛ́ↄn wá ũ.
Gↄ̃a wɛ̃́ɛↄ ũ yã́i Kilisi wá bói, wa gↄ̃ wɛ̃́ɛↄ ũ. À zɛò gíũgiũ, ásu to wà ɛa bakaɛ́ á níu zↄↄ ũ lↄo.
Mámɛmaa Pↄlu málɛ oɛ́, tó á tò wà tↄ̃zↄ̃̀ɛ́, Kilisi a kã́fĩakɛɛ́o.
Ma ɛa má ò ma idàwàɛ́, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ tò wà tↄ̃zↄ̃̀ɛ, sema aà misiilɛ Mↄizi ikoyãɛ píi.
Á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ álɛ wɛɛlɛ à bↄ maa ikoyã guuↄ, a ázĩa kɛ̃̀ Kilisiwa, a kɛ̃ Lua gbɛ̃kɛwaɛ.
Yesu náaikɛa guu wá dↄ̃ kɛ́ wá bↄ maa, wá wɛ́ dↄi ń aà Nisĩna gbãao.
Naa Kilisi Yesuwa tↄ̃zↄ̃a ge tↄ̃zↄ̃sai yãe vĩo, sema Yesu náaikɛa pↄ́ ì to wàↄ yekↄ̃i.
Álɛ gɛ́ aɛ yãa maamaaɛ. Démɛ tɛa sĩanai zɛzↄ̃̀ɛ́i?
Yã́ pↄ́ álɛ e a zɛvĩpi i bↄ Lua pↄ́ á sisi à á sɛ́ kĩ́io.
Pɛ̃ɛsɛ'ɛsɛ yↄↄna ì pɛ̃ɛti sɛ́ píi.
Má á náai vĩ naa Diiwa guu kɛ́ á làasoo pãle kɛo. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ á liaa sↄ̃, Lua a aà vãipi fĩaboɛ̀, baa dén nò.
Mapi sↄ̃ ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, tó tↄ̃zↄ̃yã waaso málɛ kɛ e gbã, bↄ́yãi wàlɛ ma wɛtãi lↄi? Tó màaɛ, dↄ̃ Kilisi gaa líwa yã́ a ↄ̃ gbɛ̃ewao.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ á liaa ń tↄ̃zↄ̃yão, aa gɛ ńzĩa lɛ wi se.
Ápiↄ sↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ↄ, Lua á sisi à gↄ̃ wɛ̃́ɛↄ ũɛ, ãma ásu tó á gↄ̃a wɛ̃́ɛↄ ũpi gↄ̃ɛ́ pↄeãkɛa zɛ́ ũo. Àↄ misiilɛkↄ̃ɛ àↄ yekↄ̃i,
asa yã́ mɛ̀ndoɛ bee mɛ́ dɛ Mↄizi ikoyã píi mi ũ: Ǹyↄ̃ ye n gbɛ̃́deezi lá nzĩa wɛ̃niwa.
Tó álɛ kↄ̃ soso kↄ̃ níwa, à laaika kↄ̃ kaalɛai.
Málɛ oɛ́ à to Lua Nisĩna dↄaaɛ́, ázĩa pↄeã i midɛ.
Ázĩa pↄeã lí kↄ̃'e ń Lua Nisĩna pↄ́oo, mɛ́ Lua Nisĩna pↄeã lí kↄ̃'e ń á pↄ́oo. Aa gìkↄ̃iɛ, ↄ̃ ili fↄ̃ yã́ pↄ́ á yei kɛ̀o.
Tó Lua Nisĩna dↄaaaɛ́, Mↄizi yã́ iko vĩwáo.
Wá wá dàa dↄ̃ wásawasa: Káaluakaa, gbãsĩkɛa, wisaiyã,
tã́agbagbaa, gbɛ̃kↄↄlɛkɛa, ĩ́isɛa ń kↄ̃o, sòle, zangu, pↄkũma, dɛnlawɛɛlɛa, lɛkpaa, kↄ̃kpaalɛa,
wɛdↄakↄ̃ɛ, wɛ̃dɛkɛa, lalasi kↄ̃̀ↄ ń yã́ bee taaↄ. Málɛ a lɛdawá lá má dàwá yãawa, yãbeetaakɛnaↄ kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i bleo.
Lua Nisĩna sↄ̃ ì yã́ɛ beeↄ inɛ́: Yeakↄ̃i ń pↄnao ń aafiao ń mɛnao ń gbɛ̃kɛo ń maao ń náaio
ń zĩabusaao ń zĩakũadↄ̃o. Ikoyãe lí gí yã́ beeↄ tàaeio.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛ Kilisi Yesu pↄ́ ũↄ ń dàa pàliwa ń a pↄnidɛaↄ ń a pↄeãↄ sãnu.
Lá wá kú Lua Nisĩna sabai, wà aà dↄ̀ↄ sɛ́.
Wásu wàↄ yↄ̃̀ↄ vĩo, wásuli kↄ̃ pɛãao, wásuli wɛdↄkↄ̃ɛo.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ, tó wasu gbɛ̃e kũ̀ ń zãa yã́wao, á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua Nisĩna dↄaaaɛ́ↄ, à gↄ̃́gↄ̃aànↄ busɛbusɛ, í laaika kɛ́ wasu á yↄ̃ sↄ̃o.
À kↄ̃ aso sɛ́. Álɛ Kilisi ikoyã papan we.
Tó gbɛ̃e lɛ́ azĩa gwa pↄ́ ũ mɛ́ a pↄe ũo, àlɛ azĩa sãsãɛ.
Baade a yãkɛa tàasika, i gbasa ĩ́anadã. Asu a yãlɛɛũ ń gbɛ̃pãleoo,
asa baade a azĩa aso sɛɛ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wàlɛ Lua yãdaɛ̀, aà a àizɛɛ lí a yãdanɛdeɛ.
Ásu ázĩa sã́são, wìli kↄ̃nikɛ Luaɛo. Pↄ́ pↄ́ gbɛ̃́ tↄ̃̀ ↄ̃ ì kɛ̃́.
Tó gbɛ̃́ tↄ̃̀ a dàa dↄaaaɛ guu, a kaalɛa iɛ̀. Tó gbɛ̃́ tↄ̃̀ Lua Nisĩna dↄaaaɛ guu sↄ̃, a wɛ̃ni láasai iɛ̀.
Wásu kpasa ń maakɛaoo, asa tó wi kã́maboòo, wá ài'e a gↄↄwa.
Ayãmɛto tó wa zɛ'è, wàli maakɛ gbɛ̃́piiɛ, atɛ̃sa wá Yesu náaikɛn deeↄ.
À wɛ̃̀sã gbɛ̃̀nɛgbɛ̃nɛ pↄ́ má kɛ̃̀ ń mazĩa ↄo gwa sa.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ yãkɛ wɛ́ yã́iↄ mɛ́ lɛ́ gãnawá ń tↄ̃zↄ̃yão, kɛ́ wasu ĩadamá zɛa ń Kilisi gaa líwao yã́ musuo yã́iɛ.
Baa tↄ̃̀zↄ̃napiↄ se, aa ikoyã kũao. Aa ye à tↄ̃zↄ̃ kɛ́ wà e ĩ́anadã á seelapi musu yã́iɛ.
Má ĩ́anadã pↄe yã́ musuo, sema wá Dii Yesu Kilisi gaa líwa yã́ bàasio, asa a yã́i dṹnia gↄ̃̀mɛɛ gɛ ũ mɛ́ ma gↄ̃ gɛ ũ dṹniaɛ.
Tↄ̃zↄ̃a ge tↄ̃zↄ̃sai yãe vĩo, sema gↄ̃a gbɛ̃́ dafu ũ.
Lua gbɛ̃kɛkɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ yã́pi kũaↄnɛ, i ń gba aafia. Aamɛ aa Isaili sĩanaↄ ũ.
Za gbã gbɛ̃e su ma wɛtã lↄo. Ĩa pↄ́ wa dàa Yesu yã́i gbɛ ku ma mɛwa.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ, wá Dii Yesu Kilisi gbɛ̃kɛkɛ á nisĩnaɛ! Ãmi.
Mámɛmaa Pↄlu, Kilisi Yesu zĩna lá Lua yeiwa, ma láɛ bee kɛ̃̀ Lua gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ Kilisi Yesu náaikɛ Ɛfɛsɛↄnɛ.
Lua wá Mae ń Dii Yesu Kilisio gbɛ̃kɛkɛɛ́, aai á gba aafia.
Wà Lua wá Dii Yesu Kilisi Mae sáaukpa! Wá naa Kilisiwa musu Lua báaa píi dàwágu wá nisĩnau.
Wá naawà guu à wá sɛ́ dṹniakalɛa ãa, kɛ́ wá kua àↄ adoaɛ̀ sãasai. Aà yeawázi guu
à dↄ̀aa wá dílɛ a nɛ́ↄ ũ ń Yesu Kilisi gbãao, lá àlɛ yá a pↄeã guuwa,
kɛ́ à tↄbↄ a gbɛ̃kɛ gawide pↄ́ a kɛ̀wɛ̃ɛ a Yenzidepi guu yã́i.
Wá naawà guu wa bↄ aà au sabai. À wá tàaeↄ kɛ̃̀wá a gbɛ̃kɛ zↄ̃ↄ
pↄ́ a kɛ̀wɛ̃ɛ à kɛ̀ zài guu. Ɔ̃nↄ píi ń wɛzɛ̃ píio guu
a tò wà a pↄeã asii dↄ̃̀, lá à zɛ̀ò à kɛ Kilisi sabaiwa.
Tó aà pↄeãpi kɛgↄↄ kà, a pↄ́pii kãaa an mide Kilisiɛ, pↄ́ pↄ́ kú musu ń tↄↄlɛo píi.
Lua pↄ́ ì yã́pii kɛ lá à zɛ̀ò a pↄeã guuwa dↄ̀aa wá dílɛ lá álɛ yáwa, à wá sɛ́ a pↄ́ ũ wá naa Kilisiwa guu,
kɛ́ wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wá wɛ́ dↄ Kilisizi káauↄ, wàↄ dɛ aà tↄbↄnaↄ ũ.
Ápiↄ sↄ̃ a sĩana yãmà, a bao pↄ́ a á suabapi sì. Á naawà guu Lua a seela kɛ̀wá a Nisĩna pↄ́ à a lɛgbɛ̃̀ ũ.
A dɛ gba pↄ́ Lua dↄ̀aa dàwɛ̃ɛ e àↄ gɛ́ a gbɛ̃́ↄ boi ũ, kɛ́ aa aà tↄbↄ yã́i.
Ayãmɛto za gↄↄ pↄ́ ma á Dii Yesu náaikɛa mà ń á yea Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ píizio,
mili kã́mabo ń Lua sáaukpaa á yã́ musuoo. Á yã́ ìↄ dↄmagu wabi pↄ́ mi kɛ Luawa guu.
Mi wabikɛ Mae Gawide, wá Dii Yesu Kilisi Luawa, aà á gba ↄ̃nↄ, i á wɛ́ kɛ̃́ɛ́ ń a Nisĩna gbãao, kɛ́ à e à a dↄ̃ wásawasa.
Mi wabikɛwà aà á nↄ̀sɛ wɛ̃ɛ́, kɛ́ à e zia'ea yã́ pↄ́ à á káwà dↄ̃. À gba zↄ̃ↄ gawidepi dìlɛ a gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ
ń a gbãa zↄ̃ↄ bↄnsaɛ pↄ́ lɛ́ zĩkɛ wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wálɛ a náaikɛↄ guuo. Iko gbãapi zĩkɛ̀ Kilisi guu
gↄↄ pↄ́ Lua aà bↄ̀ gau à aà zↄ̃̀lɛ musu a ↄplaai.
We Kilisi dɛu kpalablenaↄ ń ikodeↄ ń gbãadeↄ ń diiↄla píi ń tↄ́ pↄ́ wì misiilɛnɛ́ↄ píi. I kɛ dṹnia tiaɛ bee ado no, ń a pↄ́ pↄ́ a mↄòɛ lↄ.
Lua tò pↄ́pii mikpàwà, ↄ̃ à aà dìlɛ yã́pii mide ũ Yesudeↄnɛ.
Aamɛ Kilisi mɛ ũ, aa dɛ Kilisi pↄ́ ì gupii pa pɛɛa ũ.
Á dɛ yãa gɛↄ ũ Luaɛ á tàaeↄ ń á duunao yã́i.
Á tɛ́ dṹniaɛ bee tufai, a misìilɛ ĩ́an gbãadeↄ kíaɛ, nisĩna pↄ́ dↄaaa luayãmansaiↄnɛ ń a tiaopi.
Wápii wá dɛńwa yãaɛ sↄ̃. Wi pↄ́ pↄ́ wá mɛ yei ń yã́ pↄ́ wá pↄ gbào kɛ. Wá ia guu wá dɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua a pↄkũmabↄbↄmáↄ ũ lán dãↄwa,
ãma Lua sùuu zↄ̃ↄ, a yewázi maamaa.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ wá dɛɛ̀ gɛↄ ũ wá tàaeↄ yã́i, à wá vú ń Kilisio sãnu. À á suabà a gbɛ̃kɛ guuɛ.
Wá naa Kilisi Yesuwa guu à wá sɛ́ à wá zↄ̃lɛaànↄ musu,
kɛ́ à e a gbɛ̃kɛ zↄ̃ↄ bↄnsaɛ ↄlↄnɛ́ dṹnia pↄ́ a mↄ guu yãmaa pↄ́ a kɛ̀wɛ̃ɛ naa Kilisi Yesu guuwa.
Lua á suabà a gbɛ̃kɛ guu Yesu náai pↄ́ á kɛ̀ yã́iɛ. Bee i bↄ á kĩ́i no, Lua mɛ́ á gbá.
I bↄ á yãkɛa kĩ́i no, kɛ́ gbɛ̃e su ĩ́anadãòo yã́i.
Lua ↄgbɛn wá ũ. Wá naa Kilisi Yesuwa guu à wá kɛ́, kɛ́ wàↄ kú ń yãmaa pↄ́ à dↄ̀aa dìlɛwɛ̃ɛ kɛao.
Á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ á dɛ buipãle ũ ia guuↄ, tↄ̃̀zↄ̃naↄ ì mɛɛ́ gyafↄↄdeↄ, ãma an tↄ̃zↄ̃a dɛ gbɛ̃nazĩna ↄgbɛ ũɛ, à làasookɛ á kua ziwa.
Gↄↄ bee á kú Kilisi kpɛo, á dɛ zĩ̀loↄ ũ Isailiↄnɛ. Á baa ku Luabaakuańnↄ ń aà lɛgbɛ̃anɛ́o guuo. Á kú dṹnia guu wɛdↄa zia'eai sai luadↄ̃sai.
Á naa Kilisi Yesuwa guu tia, á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ á zã̀ ń Luao yãaↄ a sↄ̃aàzi kãi ń Kilisipi au gbãao.
Aàpi mɛ́ wá kua ń kↄ̃o na ũ, a tò Yudaↄ ń buipãleↄ gↄ̃̀ mɛdoũ. Aà mɛ guu à íbɛlɛ pↄ́ da ń zãnguo bĩ́i ũ gbòo,
à Mↄizi ikoyã kpàgui ń a yãdilɛaↄ, kɛ́ à to an pla ḿpii gↄ̃anↄ mɛdoũ gbɛ̃́ dafuↄ ũ. Màa à ń kɛ́ ń kↄ̃o na.
À íbɛlɛ mìdɛ, à ḿpla ḿpii kɛ̀na ń Luao mɛdoũpi guu a gaa líwa musu.
À mↄ̀ kɛa na ń Luao baokpà á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ á zã̀ ń Luaoↄnɛ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kãiaànↄↄ lↄ.
Aà yã́i wápii wá sↄ̃a Mae Luazi zɛ́ vĩ ń aà Nisĩna doũ gbãao.
Ayãmɛto á dɛ nibↄↄ ge bↄ̀mↄↄ ũ lↄo, a gↄ̃ beleↄ ũ ń Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ, aà uadeↄ ũ.
A gↄ̃ kpɛ́ pↄ́ Lua lɛ́ bo ũ. Zĩnaↄ ń ãnabiↄ mɛ́ a ɛ̃daalɛa ũ, mɛ́ Kilisi Yesu mɛ́ ɛ̃pi daalɛgbɛ ũ.
Naawà guu kpɛ́ pↄ́pii ì kↄ̃'eu, ìↄ gbã Lua kpɛ́ ũ naa Diiwa guu.
Ápiↄ sↄ̃ á naawà guu á dɛ kpɛ́pi dↄbↄↄ ũ, kɛ́ àↄ dɛ Lua Nisĩna kúkĩi ũ.
Bee yã́ mɛ́ tò ma Pↄlu, má dɛ dakpɛuna ũ Kilisi Yesu yã́ musu á buipãleↄ yã́i.
I ma lá Lua a gbɛ̃kɛkɛanɛ́ zĩ dàmɛɛ má kɛ̀ á guuo lé?
Lua a asiiyã ↄ̀lↄmɛɛ, má kɛ̃̀ɛ́ yↄↄ kↄ̀.
Tó a a kyokɛ̀, á fↄ̃ dↄ̃ lá ma wɛ́ kɛ̃̀ Kilisi asiiyã musu.
Lua i yã́pi o gbɛ̃eɛ yãao, ↄ̃ tiasa a ↄ̀lↄ a zĩnaↄ ń a ãnabiↄnɛ ń a Nisĩna gbãao.
Yã́ pↄ́ ulɛa yãapin kɛ: Naa Kilisi Yesuwa guu baona maa yã́i buipãleↄ gↄ̃̀ Lua àizɛɛblenaↄ ũ ń Yudaↄ, aa gↄ̃̀ńnↄ mɛdoũdeↄ ũ. An baa ku lɛ́ pↄ́ Lua gbɛ̃̀ guu.
Ma gↄ̃ baonapi kpana ũ gba pↄ́ Lua dàmɛɛ aà gbãa lɛ́ zĩkɛ ma guu yã́i.
Ma gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ má kpɛɛ Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ guu, Lua gbapi dàmɛɛ, ↄ̃ málɛ Kilisi ɛ̀fãai pↄ́ lɛ́ vĩo baonakpa buipãleↄnɛ,
málɛ asiiyã pↄ́ Lua lɛ́ yá ń gbɛ̃́piio bↄnɛ́ gupuau. Asiiyãpi ulɛa Lua pↄ́ pↄ́pii kɛ̀ kĩ́i za asĩnizĩ,
kɛ́ tiasa a to kpalablenaↄ ń ikode pↄ́ kú musuↄ a ↄ̃nↄ bui dasiↄ e a gãlideↄwa.
Kilisi Yesu wá Dii sabai ↄ̃ Lua pↄeã pↄ́ kú gↄↄpiipi bↄ̀lɛi.
Wá naawà guu wá sↄ̃a Luazi zɛ́ vĩ ń sↄ̃o dilɛa aà náaikɛa yã́i.
Ayãmɛto ma wabikɛ̀wá, ásu tó á pↄ ya taasi pↄ́ málɛ kɛ á yã́ musu yã́io. Á kpɛlaa yã́ɛ.
Ayãmɛto mi kúlɛ Mae Luaɛ.
Maepi ↄ̃ maekɛ pↄ́ kú musu ń zĩ́lɛↄ píi ì a ↄlɛsɛ.
Mi wabikɛwà aà á gba gbãa á nↄ̀sɛ guu ń a Nisĩna gbãao a gawi zↄ̃ↄ lɛ́u,
Kilisi e sadaáguu a náai pↄ́ álɛ kɛ yã́i, á zĩ́napɛlɛa ìↄ zɛdↄa aà yeawázi guu,
kɛ́ à e Kilisi yeawázi yàasa ń a gbã̀ao ń a lɛsĩo ń a zã̀o wàaipa ń Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ píi,
í aà yeawázi pↄ́ wa fↄ̃ wà a lɛ́ dↄ̃ píio dↄ̃, Lua kɛkɛá píi i pɛɛwá.
Lua gbãa lɛ́ vĩo, a fↄ̃ kɛwɛ̃ɛ dɛ lá wi a wabikɛ ge wi a làasookɛla maamaa ń gbãa pↄ́ lɛ́ zĩkɛ wá guuo.
Aà tↄbↄ Yesudeↄ ń Kilisi Yesupio musu wɛ̃ ń wɛ̃o e gↄↄpii! Ãmi.
Ma gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ má dɛ dakpɛuna ũ Dii yã́i, ma wabikɛ̀wá, á kua ká lá Lua á sisi àↄ dɛwa.
À kↄ̃ fↄ̃ àↄ yekↄ̃i zĩabusaa ń nↄ̀sɛniɛo guu ń mɛnao.
À wɛtã àↄ lɛdoũ pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua Nisĩna kĩ́i vĩ ba pↄ́ wá dↄkↄ̃wa ũ.
Mɛ mɛ̀ndoɛ, mɛ́ Nisĩnapi mɛ̀ndoɛ. Màa zia'ea yã́ pↄ́ Lua á káwà mɛ̀ndo lↄ.
Dii mɛ̀ndoɛ, mɛ́ Lua zɛ́ mɛ̀ndoɛ ń da'ilɛ mɛ̀ndoo.
Lua mɛ̀ndoɛ wápii Mae ũ, ↄ̃mɛ iko vĩ wá baadewa, ìↄ zĩkɛ wá baade píi guu, a kú ń wá baade píio.
Kilisi gbɛ̃kɛkɛ̀ wá baadeɛ lá à gbadàwɛ̃ɛ lɛ́u.
A yã́i a kɛ̃a láu wà mɛ̀: Kɛ́ à dɛ̀dɛ musu ń a zĩ̀zↄↄ, à gbadà gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ.
Aà dɛdɛa bee mɛ̀ kpelewa ni? Bee mɛ̀ à pìla e tↄↄlɛ nↄnau gĩaɛ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ pìlapi mɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ fɛ̀lɛ mà luabɛa ũ, kɛ́ aà gupii pa.
Aàpi mɛ́ gbɛ̃eↄ gbà zɛ́ aàↄ dɛ zĩnaↄ ũ, gbɛ̃eↄ ãnabiↄ, gbɛ̃eↄ baonakpanaↄ, gbɛ̃eↄ pàsitɛɛↄ ge yãdanɛdeↄ,
kɛ́ Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ e wàↄ ku a zĩ sↄu guu, Kilisi mɛ i zɛdↄ,
e wápii wàↄ ka Lua Nɛ́ náai doũ kɛawa aà dↄ̃a doũ guu, wí gↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ kàsaaↄ ũ Kilisi pↄ́ pↄ́ pɛ̀ɛwà zↄ̃ↄ lɛ́u.
Màa wáↄ dɛ nɛ́fɛ̃nɛna pↄ́ wì ↄ̃nↄ ń kↄ̃nio kɛnɛ́ wà ń sã́sãↄ ũ lↄo. Yã́ dafu daanɛ́ ì ń sɛ́ lán ĩ́ana ge ísↄ̃wa.
Wá sĩana'onɛ́ ń yeańzio, wí gbã́ yã́pii musu naa Kilisi pↄ́ dɛ mi ũwa.
Naawà guu mɛgu píi ì kↄ̃'eu aa nakↄ̃wa kĩↄ zĩ sabai, ↄ̃ mɛguↄ ì zĩkɛ a zɛ́wa, mɛ iↄ gbã́, iↄ zɛdↄ ń yeakↄ̃io.
Ayãmɛto málɛ yã'oɛ́ ń Dii tↄ́o, málɛ á gbaò laai. Ásu àↄ ku lán luadↄ̃nsai pↄ́ an nↄ̀sɛ yãfũna dↄaaanɛ́ↄwao.
An làasoo sↄũkũ̀, aa kɛ̃a wɛ̃ni pↄ́ Lua ì kpámáwa, kɛ́ an wɛ́ sia mɛ́ an swã́ gbãa yã́i.
Aa nↄ̀sɛ vĩo, aa ńzĩa kpà wisaiyãwa, aa dↄ́ɛ'ĩi bui píi kɛa bĩi vĩ.
Ápiↄ sↄ̃ i Kilisi yãdada màao.
A aà yã́ mà, a sĩana pↄ́ a vĩ dàda á Yesudekɛ guu.
Wa òɛ́ à ↄkpa á dàa zi pↄ́ dↄaaaɛ́i, asa a ↄ̃̀ↄkpà á pↄnidɛa vãiↄ yã́i.
À tó á nↄ̀sɛlilɛ, á làasoo i gↄ̃ dafu,
í dàa dafu pↄ́ Lua kɛ̀wɛ̃ɛ kɛ́ wà e wàↄ dɛ láawa sɛ́, á kua iↄ adoa kua sĩande ũ yã́zɛdekɛa guu.
Bee yã́i à ↄkpa mↄafiliyãi, á baade lí sĩana'o a gbɛ̃́deeɛ, asa mɛ̀ doũ guↄn wá ũ.
Tó á pↄ pà, ásu duunakɛo. Ásu to ĩatɛ̃ gɛ̃ kpɛ́u à á pↄpaa leo,
kɛ́ ásu Ibiisi gba gɛ̃kĩio yã́i.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì kpã́i'o yãa kpã́i tó. Aà wɛtã zĩ maa kɛ ń a ↄo, i pↄ́ e à dↄò taasidelɛ.
Ásu to yãvãie bↄ á lɛ́uo, sema a zɛde pↄ́ a gbɛ̃́ kã́fĩ à àikɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ maↄnɛ.
Ásu Lua Nisĩna pↄ yao, asa aà kua adoaɛ. A dɛ seela pↄ́ Lua kɛ̀wá e wá bogↄↄzĩ ũ.
Ásuli ĩ́isɛ ń gbɛ̃eoo. À pↄkũma ń pↄkpɛ̃nɛo ń palaa gbãao ń gbɛ̃́sↄ̃sↄ̃ao ń pãsĩ bui píio tó.
Àↄ gbɛ̃kɛ vĩ ń kↄ̃o. Àↄ kↄ̃ wɛ̃na vĩ. À sùuukɛ ń kↄ̃o lá Lua sùuukɛ̀ánↄwa naa Kilisiwa guu.
Lá á dɛ Lua nɛ́ yenzideↄ ũ, à aà ↄlɛsɛ́.
Lá Kilisi yewázi à gì a wɛ̃nii wá yã́i sa'obↄ pↄ́ a gĩ ì kɛ Luaɛ na ũ, à to yeakↄ̃i dↄaaɛ́ màa sↄ̃.
Lá á dɛ Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ ũ, i kũ wà káaluakaa ń dↄ́ɛ'ĩi bui píio ń bĩikɛao ma dↄ á lɛ́u bauo.
Wisaiyã'oa ń yãdↄↄsai oao ń faai bɛ̃̀ɛ boao maaánↄo lↄ, sema sáau yã́.
Àↄ dↄ̃ sã́asã kɛ́ káaluae ge dↄ́ɛ'ĩidee ge bĩidee a kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i ble ń Kilisioo. Pↄ́ pↄ́ gbɛ̃́ lɛ́ a bĩikɛ gↄ̃̀ aà dii ũ.
Ásu to gbɛ̃e á sã́sã ń yãpã giioo. Yã́ bee taaↄ mɛ́ a to Lua pↄkũmabↄbↄ a yãdansaiↄwa.
Á bàa su àↄ kúńnↄo.
Á kú yãa gusiau, tiasa naa Diiwa guu á kú gupuau. Àↄ ku gupua gbɛ̃́ↄ ũ,
asa gupua ì maa bui píi inɛ́ ń yã́zɛdeo ń sĩanao.
À yã́ pↄ́ ì ka Diigu dada.
Á baa su àↄ kú ń gusia yãkɛa pↄ́ lí kã́fĩakɛnɛ́oo. À bↄ yã́ beeↄ kpɛ wɛliwɛ.
Baa yã́ pↄ́ gbɛ̃́piↄ ì kɛ asii guu oaá wíyãɛ.
Tó wà bↄ̀ yã́ kpɛ gupuau, wì a sã́asã dↄ̃,
asa pↄ́ pↄ́ bↄ̀ gupuau gↄ̃̀ gupua pↄ́ ũɛ. A yã́i tò wì mɛ: I'ona vu fɛlɛ bↄ gɛↄ guu, Kilisi i gupunɛ.
Àↄ á táa'ozɛ dↄ̃ maamaa. Ásu àↄ dɛ sↄũↄ ũo, sema ↄ̃nↄnaↄ.
Àli yã́ pↄ́ Lua a zɛbↄ̀ɛ́ kɛ, asa gↄↄɛ beeↄ maao.
Ayãmɛto ásu àↄ sↄũo, àↄ dↄ̃ lá Dii pↄeã dɛ.
Ásu àↄ kú ń wɛ̃dɛkɛaoo, ì lalasizĩmáɛ. À to Lua Nisĩna paɛwá,
í faaibo ń kↄ̃o ń soũo ń Lua táasilɛao ń lɛ pↄ́ Lua Nisĩnapi ì daɛ́o. À lɛsi, í Dii táasilɛ á sↄ̃ guu,
íↄ Mae Lua sáaukpa gↄↄpii yã́pii guu ń wá Dii Yesu Kilisi tↄ́o.
À misiilɛkↄ̃ɛ Kilisi vĩa pↄ́ á vĩ yã́i.
Nↄɛↄ, á baade lí misiilɛ a zã́ɛ lá i kɛ Diiɛwa.
Asa gↄ̃ɛ mɛ́ nↄɛ mi ũ, lá Kilisi dɛ a gãlide pↄ́ dɛ a mɛ ũↄ mi ũ an Suabana ũwa.
Lá gãlidepiↄ ì misiilɛ Kilisiɛ, màa sↄ̃ nↄɛↄ baade lí misiilɛ a zã́ɛ yã́pii guu.
Gↄ̃ɛↄ sↄ̃, á baade líↄ ye a nazi, lá Kilisi ye a gãlideↄzi à gì a wɛ̃nii ń yã́iwa.
À ń gbãsĩ wòlo da'ilɛkɛa guu ń yã́ pↄ́ aa òo, ↄ̃ aa gↄ̃̀ aà pↄ́ ũ,
kɛ́ à ń kpán'aɛkɛ ń gawio tèbatebasai, yuunkasai, sãasai, gbãsĩsai, tàaesai.
Màa à kũ̀ gↄ̃ɛↄ baade àↄ ye a nazi lá azĩa mɛwa. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ye a nazi ye azĩai.
Gbɛ̃e líↄ za azĩa mɛuo. Ì blɛ kpawà, ì laaidↄwà, lá Kilisi ì kɛ a gãlideↄnɛwa,
kɛ́ wá dɛ aà mɛguↄ ũ yã́i.
Ayãmɛto gↄ̃ɛ ì go a de ń a daowa, ì na a nawa, aaì gↄ̃ lán sàwakula ń gbalaowa.
Yã́ gbia ulɛa yã́pi guu, mɛ́ má è a dɛ Kilisi ń a gãlideↄ yã́ ũ.
Ń beeo a dɛ á yã́ ũ sↄ̃. Á baade líↄ ye a nazi lá azĩawa. Nↄɛ sↄ̃ aàli a zã́ yãda.
Nɛ́ↄ, naa Diiwa guu àli á de ń á dao yãma, asa bee mɛ́ maa.
Àli á de ń á dao kpɛla, kɛ́ àↄ aafia, í gɛ̃gɛ̃ dṹniau. Yã́ pↄ́ Lua dìlɛ ń lɛgbɛ̃ao sɛ̃́ian we.

Maeↄ sↄ̃ ásuli á nɛ́ↄ pↄ fɛ̃o. Àli ń toto, íli lɛdamá Dii gbɛ̃́ↄ nɛgwaa ũ.
Zↄↄ, àli á dṹnia la diiↄ yãma ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo ń vĩao ń lualuao, lá Kilisi álɛ kɛɛ̀wa.
Ásuli zĩ ↄkunwɛiana kɛnɛ́o. Àli Lua pↄeã kɛ ń nↄ̀sɛpuao Kilisi zↄↄ ũ.
Àli zĩkɛ ń ãiao, lá Dii álɛ kɛɛ̀wa, i kɛ gbɛ̃nazĩna no.
Àↄ dↄ̃ kɛ́ Dii a baade maakɛa fĩaboɛ̀, zↄ ge wɛ̃́ɛ.
Diiↄ sↄ̃ àli kɛnɛ́ màa lↄ. À yãpãsĩ'oanɛ́ tó. Àↄ dↄ̃ kɛ́ ampiↄ ń ápiↄ píi, á Dii ku musu, ìli gbɛ̃e zãboo.
Yã́ pↄ́ gↄ̃̀n kɛ: Àↄ gbãa naa Diiwa guu ń aà iko gbãa zↄ̃ↄo.
À gↄ̃kɛbↄ pↄ́ Lua kpàwáↄ da píi, kɛ́ à e zɛ gíũgiũ, í Ibiisi dↄfↄ̃.
Asa i kɛ gbɛ̃nazĩnaↄ wálɛ dɛ̃ɛkańnↄo, sema nisĩn vãi pↄ́ kú musuↄ. Aa dɛ dṹniaɛ bee gusia kiblenaↄ ũ ń ń mideↄ ń ń ikodeↄ.
Ayãmɛto àↄ gↄ̃kɛbↄpiↄ kũa píi, kɛ́ à fↄ̃ zɛ gi gↄↄ vãi zĩ́, í gↄ̃ zɛa gíũgiũ apii kɛ láaa gbɛa.
Àↄ zɛa gbãa, í sĩana dↄ ápi asana ũ, í yã́zɛde da mↄ̀ ula ũ.
À kɛa na ń Luao baokpaa ãia kpa kyale ũ,
íↄ luanaaikɛa kũa sɛ̀ngbao ũ gↄↄpii, kɛ́ à fↄ̃ zɛzↄ̃ Setãu kagbaↄnɛ píi.
À suabaa si kpa mↄ̀ fùa ũ, íↄ Lua yã́ pↄ́ dɛ aà Nisĩna fɛ̃nda ũ kũa.
Àliↄ wabikɛ gↄↄpii, íↄ Lua dↄnlɛ gbɛa yã́pii guu ń aà Nisĩna dↄaaaɛ́o. Àli a itɛ̃kɛ ń mɛna zↄ̃ↄo, íↄ wabikɛ Lua gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ píi.
À wabikɛmɛɛ sↄ̃, kɛ́ tó málɛ yã'o, Lua ma gba lɛ́ mà a bao asii onɛ́ sↄ̃̀deedeesai.
Baonapi yã́i má dɛ kↄ́ↄ pↄ́ wa dàkpɛu ũ. Àↄ wabikɛmɛɛ mà kpa sↄ̃̀deedeesai, lá à kũ̀ mà owa.
Wá gbɛ̃do yenzide Tisiki, Dii zĩkɛnnáaide, a ma yã́ↄ píi baokpaɛ́, kɛ́ à e àↄ ma kua dↄ̃.
Ma aà zĩ̀wá, kɛ́ aà wá kua oɛ́ɛ, á nↄ̀sɛ i níni.
Mae Lua ń Dii Yesu Kilisio wá gbɛ̃́ↄ gba aafia, aa ń yeakↄ̃i kã́fĩnɛ́ ń ń Lua náai pↄ́ aalɛ kɛo.
Lua gbɛ̃kɛkɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ye wá Dii Yesu Kilisizi láasaiↄnɛ ḿpii.
Ma Pↄlu ń Timↄteeo, wá Kilisi Yesu zↄ̀blenaↄ wámɛ wa láɛ bee kɛ̃̀ Lua gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú Filipi naa Kilisi Yesuwaↄnɛ ń ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ń ń dↄnlɛdeↄ.
Lua wá Mae ń Dii Yesu Kilisio gbɛ̃kɛkɛɛ́, aai á gba aafia.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ á yã́ dↄ̀magu píi, miↄ ma Lua sáaukpaɛ.
Ma wabikɛa guu píi miↄ wabikɛɛ́ ápii ń pↄnao,
kɛ́ á ↄ kumanↄ baonakpaa guu za gↄↄ pↄ́ á mà e ń a gbão yã́i.
Má dↄ̃ sã́asã, lá Lua zĩ maa dàalɛ á guu, aↄ kɛ, i a midɛ Kilisi Yesu mↄ́zĩ.
A maa kɛ́ máↄ á yã́ kũa ápii màa, asa á yã́ dↄ ma sↄ̃wa. Ma daakpɛun nò, ma zɛa ń baonapio a sĩana bↄa yã́in nò, ápii á ↄ ku zĩ pↄ́ Lua dàmɛɛ a gbɛ̃kɛu guu.
Málɛ á bɛɛkɛ ápii, lá má kú Kilisi Yesu sↄ̃ guuwa. Lua mɛ́ ma seelade ũ.
Mi wabikɛɛ́ á yeakↄ̃i àↄ kã́fĩ àↄ gɛ́ dↄ̃a ń wɛ́kɛ̃a wásawasao guu,
kɛ́ à e yã́ pↄ́ maa àↄ kɛ dↄ̃, íↄ ku nↄ̀sɛdoũdeↄ ũ tàaesai Kilisi mↄ́zĩ.
Beewa maakɛa pↄ́ Yesu Kilisi ì mↄònɛ́ a liála, wi Lua tↄbↄ, wi aà sáaukpa.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ, má ye àↄ dↄ̃ kɛ́ yã́ pↄ́ ma le tɛkpà baona gɛa aɛuɛ,
ↄ̃ sosa kibɛdↄ̃anaↄ píi ń gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ dↄ̃̀ kɛ́ Kilisi yã́i wà ma dai kpɛ́u.
Ma daakpɛu yã́i wá gbɛ̃́ dasideↄ Dii náaikɛ̀ dɛ yãala, ↄ̃ an sↄ̃dilɛa kã̀fĩ, aalɛ Lua yã'o gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ vĩasai.
Sĩanaɛ, an gbɛ̃eↄ ì Kilisi yã́ waasokɛ dɛnla ń wɛdↄakↄ̃ɛo yã́iɛ, gbɛ̃eↄ sↄ̃ ń nↄ̀sɛmaao.
Gbɛ̃́ beeↄ ì kɛ ń yeamazioɛ, asa aa dↄ̃ kɛ́ zɛa ń Yesu baokpaao yã́i ma yeò kpɛ́u la.
Wɛdↄnɛdepiↄ sↄ̃ aaì Kilisi yã́ waasokɛ dɛnlawɛɛlɛa yã́iɛ, i kɛ ń nↄ̀sɛpuao no. Aalɛ e wàlɛ ma kua kpɛ́u taasi kã́fĩmɛɛɛ.
Yãe yã̀? Mↄafili guun nò, sĩana guun nò, apii lé, wàlɛ Kilisi yã́ waasokɛɛ. Ma pↄ na ń beeo, mɛ́ ma pↄ a ɛa kɛ na lↄ,
asa má dↄ̃ kɛ́ wabi pↄ́ álɛ kɛmɛɛ ń Yesu Kilisi Nisĩna dↄnlɛo a to mà bↄ.
Ma wɛ́ dↄi mɛ́ má a náai vĩ maamaa, kɛ́ wí a ma kũ yãe guuo. Asa máↄ Kilisi tↄbↄ ma kuau ń sↄ̃o dilɛa gↄↄpiiɛ, atɛ̃sa tia, má kún nò, ma gan nò.
Asa Kilisi yã́i má kúi, mɛ́ ga dɛmɛɛ ài ũ.
Ãma tó má kú wɛ̃ni guu, bee dɛmɛɛ zĩ àide ũ. Má dↄ̃ lá má sɛo,
má kú plaplaɛ. Má ye ta màↄ kú ń Kilisio, we maamɛɛ dɛ lakĩia zã̀zã.
Ãma à kũ̀ màↄ ku wɛ̃ni guu á yã́iɛ.
Bee fɛ̃a vĩo. Má dↄ̃ kɛ́ má gↄ̃ màↄ kúánↄ ápii, kɛ́ à e gɛ́ aɛ ń pↄnao luanaaikɛa guu.
Beewa gↄↄ pↄ́ má ɛa mↄ á gwai, á á naa Kilisi Yesuwa ĩ́andãa zɛ́ e maamaa ma yã́i.
Apii lé, tó ma mↄ á gwai ge mi mↄon nò, à tó á kua kpaaĩ ń Kilisi baona yã́o, kɛ́ tó málɛ á bao ma, mà ma á zɛa gíũgiũ ń lɛdoũo, álɛ dɛ̃ɛka ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo baonapi zɛ́ yã́i.
Ásu tó á ibɛɛↄ yãe iwãa ká á pↄao. Bee aↄ dɛnɛ́ seela ũ kɛ́ aa mipɛ̀ kaalɛwa, ápiↄ sↄ̃ bↄa maa. Bee bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́iɛ.
Asa Lua á gbá zɛ́ à taasikɛ Kilisiɛ, i kɛ aà náaikɛa ado no.
Dɛ̃ɛ pↄ́ á è málɛ ká yãa mɛ́ á mà málɛ ká e tia, á kú dɛ̃ɛ doũpi guu.
Lá á naa Kilisiwa kã́fĩa vĩɛ́, lá aà yeaázi lɛ́ tɛ́kpaágu, lá á lɛ́ doũ ń aà Nisĩnao, lá á kↄ̃ wɛ̃na vĩ ń sósobio,
à làasoo doũ kɛ, á yeakↄ̃i iↄ doũ lɛdoũdeↄ ũ, pↄeãdoũdeↄ ũ. Bee a ma pↄ kɛ na à kɛ zài.
Ásu yãe kɛ dɛnla ge yↄ̃̀ↄkɛa yã́io. Zĩabusaa guu àli kↄ̃ da gbia dɛ ázĩala.
Gbɛ̃e su làasookɛ azĩa mɛ̀ndo yã́wao, aà gbɛ̃pãleↄ pↄ́ kɛ lↄ.
Àↄ nↄ̀sɛ pↄ́ Kilisi Yesu vĩ vĩ sↄ̃.
Aà lua'ia, i gbãa'e a sáaa ń Luaokɛwao,
ↄ̃ à azĩa gwea tò à zↄkɛ sɛ̀, à gↄ̃̀ gbɛ̃nazĩna ũ à gbɛ̃nazĩnkɛ sɛ̀.
À azĩa bùsa à misìilɛ e à gɛ̀ gàò, e gaa lipãakↄ̃awa se.
Ayãmɛto Lua aà sɛ̀ lɛsĩ, à tↄ́ pↄ́ dɛ tↄ́ píila kpàɛ̀,
kɛ́ tó wà Yesu tↄ́ sì, gbɛ̃́pii a kúlɛ luabɛ ń tↄↄlɛo ń tↄↄlɛ zíɛo,
gbɛ̃́pii i o Yesu Kilisi mɛ́ Dii ũ Mae Lua tↄbↄa yã́i.
Bee yã́i ma gbɛ̃́ yenzideↄ, lá i ma yãma gↄↄ pↄ́ má kúánↄ, atɛ̃sa lá má kúánↄ tiao, àↄ á bↄa maa lɛpapa ń vĩakɛa Luaɛo ń lualuao.
Asa Lua mɛ́ lɛ́ zĩkɛ á guu, àlɛ á gba a pↄeãkɛa ni ń a kɛa zɛ́o.
À yã́pii kɛ yã́kũtɛ̃ ń zↄao sai,
kɛ́ à gↄ̃ tàaesai yãesaideↄ ũ, Lua nɛ́ sãasaiↄ ũ gbãgbɛ̃ sã́sãa dↄ̀ↄsaiↄ guu. À gupunɛ́ dṹniau lán saanaↄwa,
íↄ wɛ̃ni yã́ kũa, kɛ́ mà e ĩ́anadã á yã́ musu Kilisi mↄ́zĩ. Tó álɛ kɛ màa, mi bà pã lɛo, mi zĩkɛ pão.
Baa tó ma au a tↄ̃́lɛ á luanaaikɛa sa'o'i ũ, ma pↄ na, mɛ́ málɛ pↄnakɛánↄ ápii.
Ápiↄ sↄ̃ à pↄnakɛ màa, wí kɛ sãnu.
Ń Dii Yesu báaao má ye mà Timↄtee zĩwá tia, kɛ́ mà e á bao ma, ma sↄ̃ i níni.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wá làasoo doũ á yã́ↄ dↄ aà sↄ̃wa sĩana kuo, aà bàasio.
Gbɛ̃́pii zĩa yã́ mɛ́ ì dↄaaɛ̀, i kɛ Yesu Kilisi yã́ no.
Á dↄ̃ lá Timↄtee náai vĩ, à zĩkɛ̀manↄ baona yã́ musu lá nɛ́ ì zĩkɛ ń a maeowa.
Tó má a zɛa dↄ̃ súsu, má ye mà aà zĩwá gↄ̃̀ↄ.
Ń Dii báaao málɛ e má mↄ́ á gwai tia mazĩa.
Wá gbɛ̃do Ɛpafↄdi, ma zĩkɛndeeɛ, mɛ́ ma zĩgↄ̃ dee pↄ́ a aà zĩ̀ dↄimalɛ ń pↄ́ pↄ́ málɛ a nidɛↄ, má è a maa mà aà gbaɛwáɛ.
Àlɛ á bɛɛkɛ ápii mɛ́ aà pↄ yà, kɛ́ a aà gyãkɛa bao mà yã́i.
À gyãkɛ̀ sĩana e à kà gaa, ↄ̃ Lua aà wɛ̃nagwà. I kɛ aàpi ado no, ń mapioɛ lↄ, kɛ́ ma pↄsia su zↄ̃ↄkũo yã́i.
Ayãmɛto málɛ kɛ kpakpa mà aà gbaɛwá, kɛ́ à wɛsikↄ̃lɛ, á pↄ i kɛ na, ma nↄ̀sɛ i níni.
À gbãakpaaàzi ń pↄna zↄ̃ↄo naa Diiwa guu. À gbɛ̃́ bee taa kpɛla.
À gↄ̃̀ lɛɛ aà ga Kilisi zĩ yã́iɛ. À gì a wɛ̃nii, kɛ́ à e dↄnlɛ pↄ́ á fↄ̃ kɛmɛɛo kɛmɛɛ yã́i.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, yã́ pↄ́ gↄ̃̀n kɛ: À tó á pↄ àↄ na Diiwa. Yã doũ ɛa oaɛ́ zĩ'ũmanↄo, mɛ́ a dɛ á aafia ũ.
À laaika gbɛ̃nazĩn àwalɛwanaↄzi. À laaika vãikɛna pↄ́ aaì ń taitaipiↄzi!
Wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wi Lua sísi ń aà Nisĩna gbãao, wi ĩ́anadã Kilisi Yesu guu, mɛ́ wiliↄ wázĩa yã́ náai vĩoↄ, wámɛ wá tↄ̃̀zↄ̃n sĩandeↄ ũ.
Mapi, má zɛvĩ màↄ mazĩa náaikɛ. Tó gbɛ̃́ lɛ́ e á azĩa náai vĩ, má vĩ dɛaàla.
Ma tↄ̃zↄ̃̀ ma gↄↄ swaaↄ̃de zĩ́ɛ. Isailin ma ũ ia guu, Bɛ̃yãmɛɛ bui, Ɛbɛlu bui zálala. Mↄizi ikoyã musu má kú Falisiↄ gãli guu.
Má ãiavĩ, ma ĩadà Yesudeↄwa. Yãkɛa a zɛ́wa Mↄizi ikoyã guu gbɛ̃e i fↄ̃ ma tàae èo.
Ãma yã́ pↄ́ má kũa ài ũ yãa beeↄ gↄ̃̀mɛɛ yã́ àisai ũ tia Kilisi yã́i.
Azaiasa ma yã́pii dìlɛ àisai ma Dii Kilisi Yesu dↄ̃a pↄ́ dɛ a píia yã́i. Kilisipi yã́i ma ↄkpà yã́piizi bìsa ũ, kɛ́ màↄ aà vĩ,
míↄ naawà, mà e màↄ na ń Luao Kilisipi náaikɛa yã́i. Asa Lua lí tó yã́ bↄńnↄ na ikoyãdaa yã́i no, ì to yã́ bↄńnↄ na Kilisi náaikɛa yã́iɛ.
Yã́ pↄ́ má yei mɛ́ dɛ mà Kilisi dↄ̃ ń gbãa pↄ́ à bↄ̀ò gauo, mí taasikɛaànↄ, mí gↄ̃ laaàwa aà ga guu
mí gbasa gↄ̃ gàbↄ ũ.
I kɛ má lè má kũ̀ à pɛ̀ɛa no, málɛ yáɛ kɛ́ mà yã́ pↄ́ Kilisi Yesu ma si a pↄ́ ũ yã́i sí ma pↄ́ ũ.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ, mi e má sì gĩao. Yã́ mɛ̀ndo málɛ kɛ, mi nↄnↄ pↄ́ pↄ́ kú ma aɛↄi, pↄ́ pↄ́ kú ma kpɛↄ làasookɛsai.
Málɛ pↄ́ pↄ́ ma wɛ́ dↄi ya mà ài pↄ́ Lua wá sisiwà musu e naa Kilisi Yesuwa guu.
Wá gbɛ̃́ kàsaaↄ wàↄ làasoo bee vĩ. Tó á làasoo pãle vĩ, Lua a á wɛ́ kɛ̃́ɛ́ yã́ bee musu.
Apii lé, lá wá kua kà a lɛ́u, wà gɛ́ aɛ zɛ́ doũpi guu.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ, à ma kɛa kɛ lá wa a taa kɛ̀ɛ́, í wɛ́tɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ an kua kpàaĩòↄzi.
Miↄ oɛ́ yãa mↄ̀ↄmↄↄ, mɛ́ ma ɛa málɛ oɛ́ tia lↄ ń wɛ́'io, gbɛ̃́ↄ ku dasi, an yãkɛa tò aa dɛ Kilisi gaa líwa ibɛɛↄ ũ.
Aa mipɛ̀ kaalɛwa, an gbɛɛ mɛ́ ń dii ũ, wíyã mɛ́ ń ĩ́andãbↄ ũ, dṹnia yã́ an làasoo ìↄ kuwà.
Wápiↄ sↄ̃, luabɛ gbɛ̃́ↄn wá ũ, wá wɛ́ dↄ Suabana pↄ́ a bↄ wezi, ↄ̃n Dii Yesu Kilisi ũ.
A wá mɛ̀ gbãasaiↄ li lá a mɛ̀ gawidewa ń a gbãa pↄ́ a fↄ̃ to pↄ́pii misiilɛɛo.
Ayãmɛto ma gbɛ̃́ yenzideↄ, á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ málɛ á bɛɛkɛ á dɛ ma ĩ́andãbↄ pↄ́ mi pↄnakɛò ũↄ, àↄ zɛa gíũgiũ naa Diiwa guu màa.
Ma awakpà Ɛvↄdiɛ ń Sɛntisio aaↄ lɛdoũ vĩ naa Diiwa guu.
Mpi sↄ̃ ma zĩkɛndee náaide, ma wabikɛ̀ma, dↄ nↄɛpiↄlɛ, asa aa taasikɛ̀manↄ baonakpaa guu ń Kelemaao ń ma zĩkɛndeeↄ. An tↄ́ kú àizãna taalau.
À tó á pↄ àↄ na Diiwa gↄↄpii. Má òɛ́ lↄ, à tó á pↄ àↄ nawà.
À ázĩa busa gbɛ̃́piiɛ. Dii kãi.
Ásuli yãe kã̀akɛo. Yã́pii guu à wabikɛ Luawa, í yãgbɛawà, í aà sáaukpa, í á yã'ↄ̃maↄ oɛ̀,
Lua i á nↄ̀sɛ ń á làasooo daɛ́ doũ naa Kilisi Yesuwa guu. Nↄ̀sɛdaadoũpi kɛ̀ zài, a dɛ gbɛ̃nazĩna dↄ̃aa.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ, yã́ pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ɛ́n kɛ: Yã́ pↄ́ sĩana vĩ mɛ́ a gbia, yã́ pↄ́ zɛvĩ mɛ́ a gbãsĩ vĩo, yã́ pↄ́ na mɛ́ a báaa vĩ, yã́ pↄ́ maa mɛ́ wì a sáaukpa, àli làasookɛ yã́ beeↄwa.
Yã́ pↄ́ má dàdaɛ́ á sì, yã́ pↄ́ á màa mɛ́ á èa, à yã́ beeↄ kɛ, Lua Aafiade iↄ kúánↄ.
Ma pↄ na Diiwa à kɛ̀ zài, asa á làasoo ɛ̀a sùa sa. Á ma yãdaa yãa fá, zɛ́ i eo.
Mi o màa kɛ́ málɛ taasikɛ yã́i no, asa má dàda baa lá a dɛ píi, ma kua kamaguɛ.
Má taasi dↄ̃ mɛ́ má nama dↄ̃. Gↄↄpii gupiiu kãa ge nↄana, pↄdinzi ge pↄ́kɛ̃sãma, a yãe vĩmɛɛ lↄo.
Má yã́pii fↄ̃ naa Kilisi pↄ́ ì ma gba gbãawa.
Ń beeo kɛ́ á bàa kú ń ma taasikɛao, a yãmaakɛ̀.
Filipideↄ, á dↄ̃ ázĩawa, ma baonakpaaɛ́ káau guu ma bↄa á Masedoni bùsuu, Yesu gãlie ↄ kú ń dↄamalɛoo, á bàasio.
Baa gↄↄ pↄ́ má kú Tɛsaloni, a pↄ́ pↄ́ málɛ a nidɛↄ kpã̀sãmɛɛ dɛ gɛ̃n doa.
I kɛ gba málɛ wɛɛlɛo, á ài kã́fĩa Lua kĩ́i málɛ wɛɛlɛ.
Ma pↄ́ pↄ́ á kpã̀sãmɛɛ è, à pà e à dìa. Ɛpafↄdi á gbaↄ kpàa, pↄ́ mↄ̀a sa. A dɛ sa'obↄ pↄ́ a gĩ na Luaɛ ì kaaàgu à si ũ.
Ma Lua a pↄ́ pↄ́ á a ni vĩ kpáwá píi naa Kilisi Yesuwa guu a àizɛɛ gawide lɛ́u.
Wàↄ wá Lua wá Mae tↄbↄ gↄↄpii! Ãmi.
À fↄkpa Lua gbɛ̃́ↄwa píi naa Kilisi Yesuwa. Ma Yesude dee pↄ́ wá sãnuↄ fↄkpàwá.
Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ fↄkpàwá ḿpii, atɛ̃sa an gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú Sezaa bɛↄ.
Dii Yesu Kilisi gbɛ̃kɛkɛɛ́ á nisĩnau.
Mámɛmaa Kilisi Yesu zĩna Pↄlu lá Lua yeiwa ń wá gbɛ̃́ Timↄteeo, wa láɛ bee kɛ̃̀
wá gbɛ̃́ náaide pↄ́ an kua adoa naa Kilisiwa Kↄlↄsiↄnɛ. Lua wá Mae gbɛ̃kɛkɛɛ́, i á gba aafia.
Gↄↄpii wá wabikɛa guu wiↄ Lua wá Dii Yesu Kilisi Mae sáaukpa,
asa wa á Kilisi Yesu náaikɛa bao mà ń á yea wá gbɛ̃́ↄzio píi,
kɛ́ á wɛ́ dↄ pↄ́ pↄ́ dilɛaɛ́ luabɛi yã́i. A yã́ sĩande mà yãa baona pↄ́ wa kpàɛ́ guu.
Baonapi lɛ́ nɛ'i, àlɛ ↄta dṹnia guu píi, lá a kɛ̀ á guu za gↄↄ pↄ́ á mà mɛ́ á Lua gbɛ̃kɛ sã́asã dↄ̃wa.
Ɛpafa wá zĩkɛndee yenzide mɛ́ yã́pi dàɛ́ wá gɛ̃ɛ ũ. Kilisi zĩkɛnnáaideɛ,
ↄ̃mɛ yeakↄ̃i pↄ́ Lua Nisĩna á káwà òwɛ̃ɛ.
A yã́i tò za gↄↄ pↄ́ wa á bao mà, wiↄ wabikɛɛ́ Luawa láasai, aà to à a pↄeã dↄ̃ wásawasa, aà Nisĩna i á gba ↄ̃nↄ ń wɛzɛ̃o píi,
kɛ́ àↄ ku lá Dii yeiwa, á yã́ píi i kaaàgu. Beewa á yãmaa píi kɛa àↄ ↄta, á Lua dↄ̃a iↄ kã́fĩ,
íↄ gbãa yã́pii guu aà gbãa gawide lɛ́u, kɛ́ à yã́pii fↄ̃ ń mɛnao ń pↄnao,
í Mae Lua sáaukpa, asa à wá ká baa pↄ́ a dìlɛ a gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ a gupuauwa.
À wá bↄ́ gusia ikou, à wá kpá a Nɛ́ mɛ̀ndona yenzide kpalau.
Aà sabai wa gↄ̃ wɛ̃́ɛↄ ũ, wá duuna kɛ̃̀wá.
Kilisiá Lua pↄ́ wìli e ń wɛ́oo taaɛ, ↄ̃mɛ yoa ũ Lua pↄkɛaↄ guu píi.
À pↄ́pii kɛ̀ musu ń tↄↄlɛo, pↄ́ pↄ́ wì eↄ ń pↄ́ pↄ́ wìli eoↄ, kpalablenaↄ ge diiↄ ge gbãadeↄ ge ikodeↄn nò. Pↄ́pii bↄ̀ aà kĩ́iɛ, mɛ́ aa ku aà pↄ́ ũɛ.
A ku pↄ́pii ãa, pↄ́pii kú aà sabaiɛ.
Ɔ̃mɛ a gãlide pↄ́ dɛ aà mɛ ũↄ mi ũ. Ɔ̃mɛ dàalɛna ũ, gàbↄ sɛ̃́ia ũ, kɛ́ aà gↄ̃ pↄ́pii dↄaana ũ.
Asa à kà Luagu, ↄ̃ a tò a kɛa píi pɛ̀ɛwà.
A tò pↄ́pii kɛanↄ na aà sabai, pↄ́ pↄ́ kú tↄↄlɛↄ ge musuↄn nò. Aà au pↄ́ bↄ̀lɛ lipãakↄ̃awa mɛ́ mↄ̀ ń aafiapio.
Ápiↄ sↄ̃ á kɛ̃a Luawa yãa. Aà ibɛɛↄn á ũ á làasoo ń á vãikɛaↄ yã́i,
ↄ̃ Lua tò a kɛanↄ na Kilisi gaa a gbɛ̃nazĩnkɛ mɛ guu yã́i sa, kɛ́ à á kpán'aɛkɛ gbãsĩsai, sãasai, tàaesai,
tó á zɛa gbãa á luanaaikɛa guu deesai gíũgiũ, mɛ́ i kɛ̃ zia'ea yã́ pↄ́ á kũa baona pↄ́ á mà guuwao. Wà baonapi kpà gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua kɛ̀ zĩ́lɛ laↄnɛ píiɛ, mɛ́ mapi ma Pↄlu ma gↄ̃ a kpana ũ.
Tiasa málɛ pↄnakɛ ń taasi pↄ́ málɛ kɛ á yã́io. Ĩa pↄ́ wa dà Kilisiwa, málɛ a pↄ́ pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ ma ma mɛwa mà bↄlɛi aà gãlide pↄ́ dɛ aà mɛ ũↄ yã́i.
Lua zĩdàmɛɛ, ↄ̃ ma gↄ̃ gãlidepiↄ dↄnlɛde ũ. Ma aà yã'òɛ́, à pɛ̀ɛwá.
Asiiyã pↄ́ ulɛa gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ za asĩnizĩ zadↄ̃ Lua i dṹnia kálɛo ↄ̃mɛ bↄ̀ Lua gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ gupuau sa.
Lua ye aa dↄ̃ lá asiiyãpi gbia zↄ̃ↄ á buipãleↄnɛ. Asiipin kɛ: Kilisi kú á guu, ↄ̃ á wɛ́ dↄ gawii.
Aà yã́ waaso wi kɛ gbɛ̃́piiɛ, wi lɛdaomá, wi yãdaò gbɛ̃́piiɛ ń ↄ̃nↄ píio, kɛ́ wà gbɛ̃́pii kpán'aɛkɛ naa Kilisiwa wásawasa.
A yã́i tò mi zĩkɛ, mi dɛ̃ɛka ń aà gbãa pↄ́ lɛ́ zĩkɛ ma guu maamaao.
Má ye àↄ dɛ̃ɛ zↄ̃ↄ pↄ́ málɛ káɛ́ dↄ̃, ápiↄ ń Laodisideↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wi wɛsikↄ̃lɛoↄ píi,
kɛ́ aa e ń sↄ̃dilɛ, aa nakↄ̃wa aa yekↄ̃i, mɛ́ wɛzɛ̃ guu aaiↄ Lua asiiyã pↄ́ dɛ Kilisi ũ dↄ̃ wásawasa, aai a ài zↄ̃ↄ e.
Aà guu ↄ̃nↄ ń dↄ̃ao àizɛɛ píi ulɛau.
Málɛ bee oɛ́, kɛ́ gbɛ̃e su á sã́sã ń lɛnaoo.
Baa tó má kúánↄo, ma làasoo ku, má è álɛ yãkɛ a zɛ́wa, mɛ́ á Kilisi náaikɛa gbãa, ↄ̃ ma pↄ kɛ̀na.
Lá a Kilisi Yesu sì á Dii ũ, àↄ naawà màa,
á zĩ́na iↄ pɛ́lɛa aà guu, í zɛdↄu, íↄ gbãa aà náaikɛa guu lá wa dàɛ́wa, íↄ Lua sáaukpa maamaa.
À laaika kɛ́ gbɛ̃e su dↄ̃a gbãa kásaɛ́ à á sã́sã ń gbɛ̃nazĩna fɛlɛkaa ↄ̃nↄ pã giioo. Yã́ beeↄ ì bↄ fɛlɛkaa pↄ́ pↄ́ wì misiilɛnɛ́ↄ kĩ́iɛ, Kilisi kĩ́i no.
Asa luakɛa píi pɛ̀ɛwà aà gbɛ̃nazĩnkɛ guu.
Naa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛ gbãa píi ń iko píio mide ũpiwa, apii pɛ̀ɛwá.
Naawà a tↄ̃zↄ̃̀ bↄa á dàau ũ. I kɛ tↄ̃ pↄ́ wì zↄ̃ ń ↄo no, pↄ́ Kilisi ì zↄ̃nɛ́ɛ.
Asa da'ilɛkɛa guu wà á vĩ́aànↄ mɛ́ a vuaànↄ, kɛ́ a gbãa pↄ́ Lua aà fɛ̀lɛ bↄ̀ò gau náaikɛ̀ yã́i.
Á dɛ gɛↄ ũ yãa Luaɛ á tàaeↄ ń á luanaaikɛsaio yã́i, ↄ̃ Lua á gbá wɛ̃ni dafu ń Kilisio sãnu, à sùuukɛ̀wanↄ ń wá tàaeↄ píi.
Lua wá tàae taala pↄ́ wá dá yã́u bãdɛ̀, a sɛ pà lipãakↄ̃awa.
Kilisi gaa líwa báa bↄ̀ diiↄ ń gbãadeↄla, à bↄ̀ńnↄ gupuau à ń kpán'aɛkɛ̀ zĩ̀zↄↄ ũ.
Ayãmɛto ásu to gbɛ̃e yãdilɛɛ́ pↄblea ge imia ge dikpɛ ge mↄbↄa dafu ge gↄↄbↄa yã́ musuo.
Yã́ beeↄ píiá yã́ pↄ́ wà mɛ̀ a mↄ taaɛ, Kilisi mɛ́ a sĩana ũ sa.
Ásu to gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì giiye gbɛ̃́ↄwa aa ńzĩa busa, aa wabikɛ ń malaikaↄ kɛ̀sɛ kũao á bↄbↄ'ↄsio. Wɛ́pungu'ea yã́ mɛ́ ìↄ gbãa gbɛ̃́ bee taaɛ, ↄ̃ ì ĩ́an gii dã a dṹnia làasoo yã́ musu.
A pɛa Kilisi pↄ́ dɛ mi ũwao. Naawà guu mɛgu píi ì kↄ̃'eu, aa nakↄ̃wa kĩↄ zĩ sabai, ìↄ gbã lá Lua ye à gbãwa.
Lá a ga ń Kilisio fɛlɛkaa pↄ́ pↄ́ wì misiilɛnɛ́ↄ yã́ musu, bↄ́yãi i yãdilɛnɛ ma lán dṹnia gbɛ̃́ↄwai?
Wì mɛ ńsu kɛ́ na n ↄzĩo, ńsu kɛ́ iɛo, ńsu ↄkã kɛ́wao.
Pↄ́ beeↄ píi ì láa an mↄaokɛa guuɛ. Gbɛ̃nazĩna yãdanɛ ↄ̃ wa tɛi we.
Ɔ̃nↄ tↄ́ mɛ́ dↄ yã́ beeↄwa. Wàlɛ lousisiyã kakanɛ́ ń zĩabusaao ń ĩadaanzĩawao. Ń beeo aali kpá wá dàaɛo.
Lá a vu ń Kilisio, à to luabɛ yã́ dↄaaɛ́, asa we Kilisi zↄ̃lɛau Lua ↄplaai.
À tó á làasoo àↄ ku luabɛ yã́piↄwa, asu àↄ ku dṹnia pↄ́wao.
Asa a ga, á wɛ̃ni ulɛa ń Kilisio Lua guu.
Lá Kilisi dɛ á wɛ̃ni ũ, tó à bↄ̀ gupuau, ápiↄ sↄ̃ á bↄaànↄ ń gawio sa.
A yã́i tò à dṹnia yã́ pↄ́ kú á nↄ̀sɛ guu dɛ: Káaluakaa, dↄ́ɛ'ĩi, mɛfɛlɛa, vãi nidɛa ń bĩikɛao. Pↄ́ pↄ́ gbɛ̃́ lɛ́ a bĩikɛ gↄ̃̀ aà dii ũɛ.
Yã́ beeↄ yã́i Lua a pↄkũmabↄbↄ a yãmansaiↄwa.
Ápiↄ sↄ̃ á kú a guu yãa, à dↄ̀aaɛ́.
À ↄkpa yã́ɛ beeↄi sa: Pↄkũma, kpɛ̃nɛ, nↄ̀sɛpãsĩ, gbɛ̃́sↄ̃sↄ̃a ń wisaiyã'oao.
Ásu ɛɛtokↄ̃ɛo, asa a á dàa zi ń a yãkɛaↄ bↄ̀ála,
a a dafu pↄ́ ì á lilɛ gbɛ̃́ dafuↄ ũ dà, kɛ́ à gↄ̃ lán Lua pↄ́ á kɛ́ dafuwaɛ, í aà dↄ̃.
Kua màa Yudaↄ ń buipãleↄ dodo kↄ̃ɛo, ge tↄ̃̀zↄ̃naↄ ń gyafↄↄdeↄ, ge gusↄↄdeↄ, ge ladↄ̃nsaiↄ, ge zↄↄ ń wɛ̃́ɛↄ. Kilisi mɛ́ ń ũ ḿpii, a kú ń guu ḿpii.
Ayãmɛto, lá Lua á sɛ́ a gbɛ̃́ yenzideↄ ũ, yã́ pↄ́ dɛ à dan kɛ: Wɛ̃nadↄ̃anɛ, gbɛ̃kɛ, zĩabusaa, nↄ̀sɛniɛ ń mɛnao.
À kↄ̃ fↄ̃́. Tó yãe sù gɛ̃̀ á zãnguo, à sùuukɛ ń kↄ̃o. Lá Dii sùuukɛ̀ánↄ, à kɛ ń kↄ̃o màa sↄ̃.
Azaiasa àↄ yekↄ̃i, asa bee ì mↄ́ ń lɛdoũ yãkelesaio.
À to aafia pↄ́ Kilisi ì ń gba yã́ dↄaaɛ́ á sↄ̃ guu, asa kua ń kↄ̃o aafia Lua á sisiwà mɛdoũdeↄ ũ. Àↄ Lua sáaukpa.
À to Kilisi yã́ zↄ̃lɛkĩi e á nↄ̀sɛu maamaa, í yãdakↄ̃ɛ, í lɛdakↄ̃wa ń ↄ̃nↄ píio. Lua sáaukpaa guu à lɛsiɛ̀ á sↄ̃ guu ń soũo ń táasilɛao ń lɛ pↄ́ aà Nisĩna ì daɛ́o.
Yã́ pↄ́ álɛ kɛ ge álɛ o píi, à kɛ ń Dii Yesu tↄ́o, í Mae Lua sáaukpa ń aà gbãao.
Nↄɛↄ, á baade lí misiilɛ á zã́ɛ. Màa à kũ̀ àli kɛ naa Diiwa guu.
Gↄ̃ɛↄ, á baade líↄ ye a nazi. Ásu àↄ pãsĩńnↄo.
Nɛ́ↄ, à á de ń á dao yãma yã́pii guu, asa bee mɛ́ ì ka Diigu.
Maeↄ, ásuli á nɛ́ↄ pↄ fɛlɛ à ń kúsu kwɛ́o.
Zↄↄ, à á dṹnia diiↄ yãma yã́pii guu. Ásu zĩ ↄkunwɛiana kɛnɛ́o. À zĩkɛnɛ́ ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo Dii vĩakɛnaↄ ũ.
Yã́ pↄ́ álɛ kɛ píi, àli kɛ ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo, lá Dii álɛ kɛɛ̀wa, i kɛ gbɛ̃nazĩna no.
Àↄ dↄ̃ kɛ́ Dii a fĩaboɛ́ àizãna ũ. Dii Kilisi álɛ zↄbleɛ̀.
Vãikɛna a a vãi gbɛ'e. Lua lí gbɛ̃e zãboo.
Diiↄ, à á zↄↄ gwa a dↄ̀ↄwa súsu. Àↄ dↄ̃ kɛ́ ápiↄ sↄ̃ á Dii vĩ musu.
À ázĩa kpa wabikɛa Luawawa, í itɛ̃kɛò ń aà sáaukpaao.
À wabikɛwàwɛ̃ɛ lↄ, aà zɛwɛ̃wɛ̃ɛ wà a yã́ waasokɛ, wí Kilisi asiiyã'ònɛ́. A yã́i wà ma dai kpɛ́u.
À wabikɛmɛɛ mà yã́pi o wásawasa lá à kũ̀ mà owa.
Àↄ ázĩa kũa dↄ̃ Yesusaideↄ guu ń ↄ̃nↄo. Àli yã́ pↄ́ Lua a zɛbↄ̀ɛ́ kɛ.
À tó á lɛgbɛ'i àↄ na, iↄ kã́fĩa vĩ, íↄ yãwea baadewa dↄ̃.
Wá gbɛ̃́ yenzide Tisiki, ma dↄnlɛde zĩkɛndee náaide Dii zĩ guu, a ma baokpaɛ́ píi.
Bee yã́i málɛ aà zĩwá, aà wá kua oɛ́, á nↄ̀sɛ i níni.
Á gbɛ̃do Ɔnɛziũ, wá gbɛ̃́ náaide yenzide lɛ́ mↄaànↄ. Aa lakĩi yã́ↄ oɛ́ píi.
Alisaka pↄ́ wá sãnu kpɛ́u fↄkpàwá ń Baanaba dãuna Maakuo. Wà Maaku yã'òɛ́ kↄ̀. Tó à kà á kĩ́i, à gbãakpaaàzi.
Yesu pↄ́ wì mɛ Yusitu fↄkpàwá lↄ. Yuda pↄ́ wálɛ kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i zĩ kɛ sãnuↄ lɛ́n we. Aa ma nↄ̀sɛ nìni.
Á gbɛ̃do Ɛpafa, Kilisi Yesu zↄ̀blena fↄkpàwá. Ìↄ dɛ̃ɛka ń wabikɛaɛ́o gↄↄpii, kɛ́ à e zɛ gbãa, í kàsaakũ, Lua pↄeã i pɛɛwá wásawasa.
Má ò àlɛ zĩkɛɛ́ maamaa á ń Laodisideↄ ń Iɛlapↄlideↄ.
Wá lòotoo yenzide Luku ń Demasio fↄkpàwá.
À fↄkpa wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú Laodisiↄwa ń Nimfao ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaì kↄ̃ kãaa aà bɛↄ.
Tó a láɛ bee kyokɛ̀, à kpa Laodisi gãlideↄwa aa a kyokɛ, í ń pↄ́ kyokɛ sↄ̃.
À o Aasipuɛ, aà laaidↄ Dii zĩ pↄ́ wa dàɛwa, i a midɛ.
Ma Pↄlu mámɛ ma fↄkpaawáɛ bee kɛ̃̀ ń mazĩa ↄo: Ma fↄkpàwá. À to ma kua kpɛ́u yã́ àↄ dↄágu. Lua gbɛ̃kɛkɛɛ́.
Má Pↄlu ń Silivɛ̃ɛo ń Timↄteeo wámɛ wa láɛ bee kɛ̃̀ Tɛsaloni Yesude pↄ́ aa na Mae Lua ń Dii Yesu Kilisiowaↄnɛ. Lua gbɛ̃kɛkɛɛ́, i á gba aafia.
Wá wabikɛa guu á yã́ ìↄ dↄwágu gↄↄpii, wíↄ Lua sáaukpa á baade píi yã́ musu.
Kɛ́ i zĩkɛ á luanaaikɛawa, mɛ́ á yea gbɛ̃́iá yã'oa ń lɛ́o yã́ no, mɛ́ á wɛdↄ wá Dii Yesu Kilisizi seasai yã́i, a yã́ ìↄ dↄwágu Lua wá Mae kùɛ.
Wá gbɛ̃́ Lua yenzideↄ, wá dↄ̃ kɛ́ Lua á sɛ́,
asa kɛ́ wa baonakpàɛ́, wi mↄ́ ń yã'oao adoo, wa mↄ ń Lua Nisĩna gbãaoɛ, yã́pi wá kũa gbãa maamaaɛ. Á dↄ̃ lá wá kuò á guu á aafia yã́i,
ↄ̃ a gↄ̃ wápiↄ ń Diio dàdanaↄ ũ. Taasi zↄ̃ↄ guu a yã́pi sì ń pↄna pↄ́ Lua Nisĩna dàáguo,
ↄ̃ a zɛ'ↄ̀lↄ Yesude pↄ́ kú Masedoni bùsuuↄnɛ ń Gɛlɛsi bùsuo píi.
Dii yã́ bↄ̀ á kĩ́i, i zɛ Masedoni ń Gɛlɛsio adoo, á Yesu náaikɛa yã́ lìgua píi, a baokpaa vĩ lↄo.
Wàlɛ o lá wa zɛ'è á kĩ́i, lá a bↄ dii ɛgɛnaↄ yã́u a zɛ̀ ń Luao, ↄ̃ álɛ zↄble Lua bɛ̃́ɛ sĩandepiɛ,
álɛ aà Nɛ́ Yesu pↄ́ à aà bↄ̀ gau dã e aà bↄ luabɛ, i mↄ wá sí pↄkũma pↄ́ Lua a bↄbↄmáwa.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, á dↄ̃ ázĩawa kɛ́ wá zɛ'ea á kĩ́i i kɛ pão.
Á dↄ̃ lá wà ĩadàwá, wa taasikɛ̀ Filipi káau, ↄ̃ wá Lua tò wa sↄ̃dìlɛ, wa baona pↄ́ bↄ̀ aà kĩ́i kpáɛ́ dɛ̃ɛ ń dɛ̃ɛo.
Wá naɛawá dɛ ɛɛ zɛ́ yã́ ũo. Wi kɛ làasoo vãi ge á blea yã́i no.
Lá Lua wá ká a baokpaawa, màa wi kpánɛ́, i kɛ gbɛ̃nazĩna pↄeã wálɛ wɛɛlɛo, sé Lua wá làasoo tàasikana pↄ́.
Á dↄ̃ kɛ́ wi yã́ nana o gbɛ̃eɛo, mɛ́ wi yãe kɛ ń mↄafilio bĩikɛa yã́io. Lua mɛ́ wá seelade ũ.
Wi sáau wɛɛlɛ gbɛ̃nazĩna kĩ́io, ápiↄ ge gbɛ̃pãleↄ.
Baa kɛ́ wá a zɛ́ vĩ wà to à wá iko dↄ̃ wá Kilisi zĩnakɛ yã́i, wá kɛ̀ánↄ busɛbusɛ, lá nↄɛ nɛade ì laaidↄ a nɛ́wawaɛ.
Kɛ́ wá yeázi maamaa yã́i, wi zɛò wà baona pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i kpáɛ́ adoo, ń wázĩa kpaawáoɛ lↄ, asa a gↄ̃ wá gbɛ̃́ yenzideↄ ũɛ.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, à tó wá zĩkɛa ń taasio yã́ dↄágu. Gↄↄ pↄ́ wálɛ bao pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́ipi kpáɛ́, wiↄ zĩkɛ fãanɛ ń gwãasĩnao, kɛ́ wásu gↄ̃ á gbɛ̃eɛ aso ũo yã́i.
Wá seeladeↄn á ũ, ń Luao lↄ, kɛ́ wá kú á Yesudeↄ guu a zɛ́wa luayãmanaↄ ũ tàaesai.
Á dↄ̃ wa yãkɛ̀ á baadeɛ lá mae ì kɛ a nɛ́ↄnɛwa.
Wa lɛdàwá, wa á nↄ̀sɛ nìniɛ́, wa naɛwá á kua ka gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua ń kpá kpala gawide pↄ́ bↄ̀ a kĩ́iuↄ kuawa.
Kɛ́ a Lua yã́ pↄ́ wá òɛ́pi mà, i dilɛ gbɛ̃nazĩna pↄ́ ũo, á sì lá a dɛwa Lua yã́ sĩande ũ. Ɔ̃mɛ lɛ́ zĩkɛ á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ álɛ aà náaikɛↄ guu. Bee yã́ mɛ́ tò lↄ wiↄ Lua sáaukpa láasai.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, á yã́ kɛ̀ doũ ń Lua gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ naa Kilisi Yesuwa Yudeↄ, asa ĩa doũ pↄ́ Yudaↄ dàmá ↄ̃ á bùsudeↄ dàwá sↄ̃.
Yudaↄ Dii Yesu dɛ̀ ń ãnabiↄ lↄ, mɛ́ aa wá yá. An yã́ lí ká Luaguo, aa íbɛlɛsɛ̀ ń gbɛ̃́piio.
Aaì kpáwɛ̃ɛ wà yã́ pↄ́ Lua ì gbɛ̃́ suabao o buipãleↄnɛ. Màa duuna pↄ́ aaìↄ kɛ gↄↄpii ìↄ diadi. Lua pↄkũma wì ń musu sa.
Wápiↄ sↄ̃ ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, kɛ́ wa kɛ̃kↄ̃wa gↄↄpla, wɛ́ mɛ́ gɛ̃̀gɛ̃ ń kↄ̃o, i kɛ sↄ̃ no. Wa á nidɛ̀ maamaa, wa wã wà wɛsikↄ̃lɛ.
Wá ye mↄ́ á gwai lↄ. Mapi ma Pↄlu, ma mↄa zɛwɛ̀ɛlɛ dɛ gɛ̃n do ge gɛ̃n plaa, ↄ̃ Setãu zɛzↄ̃̀wɛ̃ɛ.
Tó wá Dii Yesu mↄ̀, démɛ àↄ dɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wá wɛ́ dↄiↄ ũ ń wá pↄnakɛbↄo ń wá ĩ́andãbↄo aà aɛi? Ápiↄ bàasio,
asa ámɛ á wá ĩ́andãbↄ ń wá pↄnakɛbↄo ũ.
Kɛ́ wá fↄ̃ mɛnakɛ lↄo, wa zɛò wà gↄ̃ Atɛni wátɛ̃ɛ,
wa wá gbɛ̃́ Timↄtee, wá Lua zĩkɛndee Kilisi baokpaa guu zĩ̀wá, kɛ́ aà á gba gbãa, i á nↄ̀sɛ níniɛ́ á luanaaikɛa guu,
kɛ́ gili su gɛ̃ á gbɛ̃egu ĩadamaɛ bee musuo. Á dↄ̃ ázĩawa, kɛ́ Lua bee taa dìlɛwɛ̃ɛ.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ wá kú á kĩ́i, wa dↄaa wá òɛ́ wa mɛ̀ wa gi ĩadaiwáo, ↄ̃ à kɛ̀ lá á dↄ̃wa màa.
Ayãmɛto lá má fↄ̃ mɛnakɛ lↄo, ma aà zĩ̀ á luanaaikɛa gwai. Gbɛ̃yↄ̃na á yↄ̃́, wá zĩkɛ̀ pã yã̀, wá dↄ̃o.
Ɔ̃ Timↄtee sùwá sa, à á luanaaikɛa ń á yeawázio baokpàwɛ̃ɛ. À mɛ̀ wá yã́ ìↄ dↄágu ń làasoo maao, mɛ́ álɛ wá bɛɛkɛ lá wálɛ á bɛɛkɛwa.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, á luanaaikɛ Ayãmɛto wá nↄ̀sɛ nìni á yã́ musu wá ĩadama ń wá taasio píi guu.
Asa lá á zɛa gíũgiũ naa Diiwa guu, wá mɛ sù sa.
Wá fↄ̃ Lua sáaukpa á yã́ musu. Wa wá Lua sáaukpà maamaa ń pↄna zↄ̃ↄ pↄ́ wi kɛ aà aɛ á yã́io.
Gwãasĩna ń fãanɛo wiↄ wabikɛ Luawa maamaa, kɛ́ wà e wɛsikↄ̃lɛ, wí pↄ́ pↄ́ kɛ̃̀sã á luanaaikɛawa bↄↄlɛkɛɛ́.
Lua wá Mae ń wá Dii Yesuo zɛpoowɛ̃ɛ wà e mↄ́ á gwai.
Dii á yeakↄ̃i ń á yea gbɛ̃́piizio kã́fĩɛ́, i liála lá wá yeáziwa,
á sↄ̃ iↄ daa doũ gbãsĩsai, íↄ ku tàaesaideↄ ũ Lua wá Mae aɛ wá Dii Yesu mↄa ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ píi gↄↄzĩ.
Yã́ pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, á mà wá lɛ́u lá a maa á kua ka Luagu. Á kú màa, ãma wálɛ wabikɛwá, wálɛ awakpaɛ́ wá Dii Yesu guu, àↄ ku màa àↄ gɛ́.
Á yã́ pↄ́ wá dìlɛɛ́ ń Dii Yesu tↄ́o dↄ̃.
À tó á kua àↄ adoa, í mikɛ̃ gbãsĩkɛawa, asa bee mɛ́ Lua pↄeã ũ.
Á baade azĩa mɛ kpɛla, àↄ azĩa kũa dↄ̃ gbãsĩsai,
i kɛ ń dↄ́ɛ'ĩi nidɛao lán luayãdↄ̃nsai pↄ́ aa aà dↄ̃oↄwa no.
Yã́pi guu gbɛ̃e su a gbɛ̃́ taiinkɛ ge à tàaekɛɛ̀o, asa Dii mɛ́ a mↄaka gbɛ̃́ bee taaↄwa, lá wa dↄaa wá òɛ́ wa a lɛzàwáwa.
Lua i wá sísi wàↄ ku gbãsĩ guuo, sema wá kua àↄ adoa.
Ayãmɛto gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gì yã́ beei i kɛ gbɛ̃nazĩna à gìio, Lua pↄ́ ì a Nisĩna pↄ́ a kua adoa dawágu ↄ̃ à gìi.
Wá e yeakↄ̃i yã'oɛ́o, asa ázĩawa Lua yeakↄ̃i dàɛ́.
Á kú màa kↄ̀ ń wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kú Masedoni bùsuuↄ píi. Gbɛ̃́ↄ, wa lɛdàwá àↄ ku màa àↄ gɛ́,
í zɛwɛɛlɛ àↄ ku yãkelesai, í ma ázĩawa, í ázĩa zĩ kɛ lá wá dìlɛɛ́wa,
kɛ́ á yãkɛa e ka Yesusaideↄgu, mɛ́ ásu àↄ sↄ̃kpalɛa gbɛ̃ezio.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ, wá ye àↄ sĩana dↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ i'òↄ yã́ musu, kɛ́ á pↄ su àↄ sia lán gbɛ̃́ kĩni pↄ́ aa zia'eoↄwao yã́i.
Lá wá sì Yesu gà à vù, màa lↄ Lua a tó gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ i'ò Yesu guuↄ ɛa mↄaànↄ sãnu.
Yã́ pↄ́ wálɛ oɛ́ɛ beeá Dii yãdanɛɛ. Wá gbɛ̃́ kↄ̃na pↄ́ wáↄ ku e Dii mↄ́zĩↄ, wá dↄaa i'onapiↄnɛo.
Dii mɛ́ a bↄ luabɛ, i pila ń yãdilɛnɛo ń malaika gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ lↄↄo ń Lua kã̀ae ↄ́o, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gà naa Kilisiwaↄ i vu sɛ̃́ia,
a gbɛa wá gbɛ̃́ kↄ̃na pↄ́ wá kúↄ, wa wá sɛ́lɛńnↄ sãnu e luabɛpuanau dai Diilɛ ĩ́ana guu, wíↄ kuaànↄ gↄↄpii.
Ayãmɛto à kↄ̃ nↄ̀sɛ níni ń yã́pio.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ, a gↄↄ ge a zaa oaɛ́ zɛvĩo,
asa á dↄ̃ sã́asã lá kpã́i ì mↄ gwã́, màa aↄ dɛ Dii mↄgↄↄ.
Tó gbɛ̃́ↄ lɛ́ o wa aafia, wa ku dↄdↄa, kaalɛ a mↄ́má kã́ndo lá nɛ'iwãwã ì mↄ nↄsindeewawaɛ, aa bↄo.
Ápiↄ sↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ↄ, á kú gusiau kɛ́ gↄↄpi á le lán kpã́iwao,
asa gupua gbɛ̃́ↄn á ũ, fãanɛ gbɛ̃́ↄn á ũ ápii. Gwãasĩna ge gusia gbɛ̃́ↄn wá ũo.
Ayãmɛto wásuli i'o lán dãↄwao. Wà itɛ̃kɛ, wíↄ kú ń laaio.
I'onaↄ ì i'o gwã́, mɛ́ wɛ̃dɛnaↄ ì wɛ̃dɛ kɛ gwã́,
wápiↄ sↄ̃, lá fãanɛ gbɛ̃́ↄn wá ũ, wàↄ kú ń laaio, wí luanaaikɛa ń yeakↄ̃io da mↄ̀ ula ũ, wí wɛdↄa zia'ea yã́i kpá mↄ̀ fùa ũ.
Asa Lua i wá dilɛ à pↄkũmabↄbↄwáo. À wá dílɛ à wá suaba ń wá Dii Yesu Kilisi gbãaoɛ.
Ɔ̃mɛ gà wá yã́i kɛ́ wàↄ kuanↄ, wá bɛ̃́ɛ ge wa i'òn nò.
Ayãmɛto à lɛdakↄ̃wa, í kↄ̃ gba gbãa, lá álɛ kɛwa.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ, wa wabikɛ̀wá, à bɛɛɛ dↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaì zĩkɛ á guu, aa iko vĩwá an zĩkɛa Diiɛ guu, aalɛ á dazɛwaↄnɛ.
À ń kpɛla maamaa, íↄ yeńzi zĩ pↄ́ aalɛ kɛ yã́i. Àↄ na ń kↄ̃o.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ, wa lɛdàwá à faasaideↄ dazɛwa, à gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ an kúsu kwɛ́ↄ gba sↄ̃, à laaidↄ gbãasaideↄwa, í mɛnakɛ ń gbɛ̃́piio.
À laaika á gbɛ̃e suli vãi fĩabo ń vãioo. À zɛwɛɛlɛ àↄ maakɛkↄ̃ɛ ń gbɛ̃́piio gↄↄpii.
Àↄ ku pↄna guu gↄↄpii.
Àↄ wabikɛ Luawa láasai.
Àↄ Lua sáaukpa yã́ píi musu. Bee mɛ́ dɛɛ́ aà pↄeã ũ naa Kilisi Yesuwa.
Ásuli kpá Lua Nisĩnaɛo,
ásuli saka ãnabikɛguo.
À yã́pii tàasika, íↄ a maa kũa,
í mikɛ̃ vãi bui píiwa.
Lua aafiade to à ázĩa kpawa míↄmiↄ, i á nisĩna ń á wɛ̃nio ń á mɛo dↄ̃́aɛ́ aafia tàaesai e wá Dii Yesu Kilisi mↄ́zĩ.
Lua pↄ́ á sisi à á sɛ́ náai vĩ, a yã́pi kɛɛ́.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ, à wabikɛwɛ̃ɛ.
À fↄkpa wá gbɛ̃́ↄwa píi ń Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ lɛ́pɛakↄ̃wao.
Ma naɛ́ Diizi à láɛ bee kyokɛnɛ́ ḿpii.
Wá Dii Yesu Kilisi gbɛ̃kɛkɛɛ́.
Ma Pↄlu ń Silivɛ̃ɛo ń Timↄteeo, wámɛ wa láɛ bee kɛ̃̀ Tɛsaloni Yesude pↄ́ aa ku Lua wá Mae ń Dii Yesu Kilisio guuↄnɛ.
Mae Lua ń Dii Yesu Kilisio gbɛ̃kɛkɛɛ́, aai á gba aafia.
Wá gbɛ̃́ↄ, a maa wàↄ Lua sáaukpa á yã́ musu gↄↄpiiɛ, lá a maawa, asa á luanaaikɛa lɛ́ zↄ̃ↄkũ maamaa, mɛ́ á yeakↄ̃i lɛ́ kã́fĩ.
A yã́i tò wi ĩ́anadã á yã́ musu Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ kↄ̃kãaaↄ guu, lá i ĩadama ń taasi píio fↄ̃ ń mɛnao ń luanaaikɛao.
Lua ì yã́gↄ̃gↄ̃ ń gbɛ̃́ↄ a zɛ́waɛ. Taasi pↄ́ álɛ kɛ kpala pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i yã́i lɛ́ ↄlↄnɛ́ kɛ́ a ka à gɛ̃u.
Lua ì yãkɛ a zɛ́waɛ. A gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ á wɛtãↄ wɛtã,
i á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wàlɛ á wɛtãↄ gba ĩ́ampakĩi ń wápiↄ. Tó Dii Yesu bↄ̀ luabɛ, a mↄ́ ń a malaika gbãaↄ
ń tɛ́vuao, a mↄakaò luadↄ̃nsai pↄ́ aai wá Dii Yesupi bao sioↄwa.
Kaalɛ láasai ↄ̃ Lua a fĩaboonɛ́. Aaↄ ku zã̀ ń Diio ń aà gbãa gawideo.
Tó à mↄ̀ gↄↄpi zĩ́, a tↄbↄ a gbɛ̃́ↄ yã́ musu, aà náaikɛnapiↄ i aà maabo ḿpii. Áↄ kú ń guu, asa a yã́ pↄ́ wá òɛ́ sìɛ.
Ayãmɛto wiↄ wabikɛɛ́ wá Luawa gↄↄpii, aà tó á kua ka gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ à ń sisi à ń sɛ́ↄ kuawa, i yãmaa pↄ́ a zɛ ń a kɛaↄ ń zĩ pↄ́ álɛ kɛ aà náaikɛa guuↄ píi papaɛ́ ń a gbãao,
Dii Yesu tↄ́ i bↄ á musu, á tↄ́ i bↄ aà musu wá Lua ń Dii Yesu Kilisipio gbɛ̃kɛkɛaɛ́ yã́i.
Wá gbɛ̃́ↄ, Yesu Kilisi mↄa ń wá kãaaaaàzio yã́ musu, wa wabikɛ̀wá,
ásu tó á pↄ ya àannↄo. Tó ãnabi yãe ge waasoe ge taalae pↄ́ wà mɛ̀ à bↄ̀ wá kĩ́i mɛ̀ Dii mↄgↄↄ kà kↄ̀, ásu bílikɛo.
Ásu to gbɛ̃e á sã́sã ń bee taaoo, asa gↄↄ bee a mↄo, sema bↄa Lua kpɛ ka gĩa, luayãdansai pↄ́ mipɛ̀ kaalɛwa bↄ̀ gupuau bàasio.
A íbɛlɛsɛ ń pↄ́ pↄ́ wì ń dilɛ dii ũↄ ń pↄ́ pↄ́ wì kúlɛnɛ́ↄ píi, i azĩa sɛ lɛsĩ dɛńla, i gɛ zↄ̃lɛ Lua kpɛ́u à azĩa dilɛ Lua ũ se.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ má kúánↄ ma yã́pi òɛ́. A dↄáguo lé?
Á dↄ̃ pↄ́ pↄ́ lɛ́ kpaɛ̀ tia, kɛ́ asu bↄ kpóoo,
asa luayãdasai lɛ́ ↄta asii guu kↄ̀. A bↄo, sema gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ kpaɛ̀ tia gɛ̃zɛa bàasio,
luayãdansaipi i bↄ sa. Dii Yesu a aà dɛ ń a lɛ́'ĩanao, a aà míↄnzↄ̃ ń a mↄa gawio.
Luayãdansaipi a mↄ́ ń Setãu gbãaoɛ, i dabudabuↄ ń yãbↄnsaɛↄ ń seela ɛgɛnaↄ kɛ píi.
A kↄ̃ni bui píi kɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa mipɛ̀ kaalɛwaↄnɛ, kɛ́ aa gì sĩana pↄ́ a ń suabai yã́i.
Bee yã́i Lua lɛ́ sã́sãyã zĩmá à ↄta ń guu, aai ɛɛ náaikɛ.
Beewa yã́ a zↄ̃lɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aai sĩana sio aaì pↄnakɛ ń vãioↄwa ḿpii.
Wá gbɛ̃́ Dii yenzideↄ, a maa wàↄ Lua sáaukpa gↄↄpii á yã́ musuɛ, asa Lua á sɛ́ za káau à bↄ ń a Nisĩna pↄ́ tò wa gↄ̃ a pↄ́ ũ gbãao á sĩanasia yã́iɛ.
Lua á sisi à á sɛ́ màa baona pↄ́ wá kpàɛ́ guu, kɛ́ à á baa e wá Dii Yesu Kilisi gawi guuɛ.
Ayãmɛto wá gbɛ̃́ↄ, à zɛ gíũgiũ, íↄ yã́ pↄ́ wá dàɛ́ ń lɛ́o ge lá guu kũa.
Lua wá Mae yewázi, aà gbɛ̃kɛ guu a tò wá nↄ̀sɛ àↄ daa doũ e gↄↄpii, à wá ká zia maawa. Aàpi ń wá Dii Yesu Kilisio
á nↄ̀sɛ níniɛ́, aai á zɛdↄ maakɛa ń yãmaa oao guu píi.
Yã́ pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ wá gbɛ̃́ↄ, à wabikɛwɛ̃ɛ Luawa kɛ́ Dii yã́ e ligua kpakpa, iↄ gawi vĩnɛ́ lá a vĩ á kĩ́iwa.
À wabikɛwɛ̃ɛ aà wá bↄ gbɛ̃vãi mìsaiↄ ↄzĩ, asa i kɛ gbɛ̃́pii mɛ́ Lua náai vĩo.
Dii náai vĩ, a á gba gbãa, i á sí Setãuwa.
Wá naa Diiwa guu wá a náai vĩ kɛ́ álɛ yã́ pↄ́ wá òɛ́ↄ kɛ, mɛ́ áↄ kɛɛ.
Dii tó á laai àↄ ku Lua yeaáziwa ń mɛna pↄ́ Kilisi ì inɛ́o.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ, wa naɛ́ Dii Yesu Kilisizi, à kɛ̃́ wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ màa vĩ aali zĩkɛ yã́ pↄ́ wá dànɛ́waoↄwa.
Á dↄ̃ ázĩawa, a maa à wá kɛa kɛɛ, asa màadeↄn wá ũ á guuo.
Wi gbɛ̃e blɛ si wá blè pão, wa zĩkɛ̀ gwãasĩna ń fãanɛo, wa taasikɛ̀ e wa kpasa, kɛ́ wásu gↄ̃ á gbɛ̃eɛ aso ũo yã́i.
Wá a zɛ́ vĩ à dↄwálɛ, ãma wa a taa kɛ̀ɛ́, kɛ́ à wá ↄlɛsɛɛ.
