Gↄↄ pↄ́ wá kúánↄ, wá dìlɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ye zĩkɛaio a pↄbleo.
Wá mà á gbɛ̃eↄ màa vĩ, aali pↄe woo, sema gudɛ.
Wá dìlɛ gbɛ̃́ bee taaↄnɛ, wa nanɛ́ Dii Yesu Kilisizi, aali zĩkɛ kílikili aa ńzĩa gwa.
Ápiↄ sↄ̃ wá gbɛ̃́ↄ, ásu kpasa ń maakɛaoo.
Tó gbɛ̃e i yã́ pↄ́ wá òɛ́ lápi guu dao, à aà yã́ bↄ dilɛ. Ásu gbɛ̃́ kpaaànↄo, kɛ́ wí e aà kṹ.
Ãma ásu íbɛlɛsɛaànↄo, à lɛdawà á gbɛ̃do ũ.
Dii Aafiade á gba aafia gↄↄpii yã́pii guu. Dii àↄ kúánↄ ápii.
Ma Pↄlu mámɛ ma fↄɛ bee kɛ̃̀ ń mazĩa ↄo. Bee mɛ́ ma lá píi seela ũ, màa mi kɛ̃́.
Wá Dii Yesu Kilisi gbɛ̃kɛkɛɛ́ ápii.
Mámɛmaa Pↄlu, Kilisi Yesu zĩna, lá Lua wá Suabana ń Kilisi Yesu pↄ́ wá wɛ́ dↄaàzipio dìlɛmɛɛwa,
ma láɛ bee kɛ̃̀nɛ Timↄtee, ma nɛ'ia Yesu zɛ́ guu. Mae Lua ń wá Dii Kilisi Yesuo gbɛ̃kɛkɛnɛ ń sùuuo, aai n gba aafia.
Lá ma naɛma gↄↄ pↄ́ málɛ gɛ́ Masedoni bùsuu, gↄ̃ Ɛfɛsɛ, ní onɛ́ aasu yã́ pↄ́ i kpaaĩ ń Lua yã́oo danɛ́ lↄo.
Aasu laaidↄ fĩ ń deziↄ tↄ́ kↄ̃nwɛa pↄ́ lɛ́ vĩoowa lↄo, bee ì mↄ́ ń lɛkpaaoɛ. Ìli mↄ́ ń yã́ pↄ́ Lua lɛ́ yáwanↄoo, aà náaikɛa mɛ́ ì mↄò.
Ma yã́pi dìlɛ kɛ́ aaↄ yekↄ̃i yã́iɛ, yeakↄ̃i pↄ́ ì bↄ nↄ̀sɛpua ń làasoodaadoũo ń luanaaikɛa mↄafilisaio guu.
Gbɛ̃eↄ pã̀alɛ yã́piↄnɛ aa pɛ̀lɛ yã́ àisai bↄlɛau.
Aa ye wàↄ dɛ Mↄizi ikoyãdanɛdeↄ ũ, ãma aa yã́ pↄ́ wàlɛ o dↄ̃o ge yã́ pↄ́ wà zɛ̀wàↄ.
Wá dↄ̃ ikoyãpi maa, tó gbɛ̃́ lɛ́ zĩkɛwà a zɛ́u,
asa wá dↄ̃ kɛ́ Lua i ikoyã dilɛ gbɛ̃maa yã́io, sema yãdansaiↄ ń swã́gbãadeↄ ń lousisinsaiↄ ń duunkɛnaↄ ń luayãdansaiↄ ń dṹnia gbɛ̃́ↄ ń de ń dao dɛnaↄ ń gbɛ̃dɛnaↄ
ń gbãsĩkɛnaↄ ń gↄ̃ɛ pↄ́ aaì gbãsĩkɛ ń ń gↄ̃ɛ deeoↄ ń gbɛ̃nazĩnyianaↄ ń ɛɛdeↄ ń yãdↄmadeↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaì bↄ yã́zɛde kpɛↄ píi.
Yã́zɛdepi mɛ́ baona gawide pↄ́ Lua Báaade gↄ̃̀mɛɛ zĩ́ ũ.
Ma Kilisi Yesu wá Dii pↄ́ ma gba gbãa sáaukɛ̀, asa à ma náaikɛ̀ à zĩdàmɛɛ.
Ma aà tↄbɛ̃ɛsì yãa, ma ĩadà aà gbɛ̃́ↄwa, ma gbãablèmá. Ń beeo à wɛ̃nadↄ̃̀mɛɛ, asa má kɛ̀ wɛ́siakɛ ń aà náaikɛsaio guuɛ.
Ɔ̃ wá Dii Kilisi Yesu gbɛ̃kɛkɛ̀mɛɛ zↄ̃ↄ, a tò ma a náaikɛ̀, míↄ ye gbɛ̃́i naawa guu.
Yã́ɛ bee sĩana vĩ wà sí. Kilisi Yesu mↄ̀ dṹnia guu duunkɛnaↄ suabaa yã́iɛ. Mapi, ma pↄ́ mɛ́ dɛ dãↄla,
ↄ̃ Lua ma wɛ̃nagwà, kɛ́ mɛna zↄ̃ↄ pↄ́ Kilisi Yesu kɛ̀ ń ma gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ma duuna dɛńlao bↄ gupuau seela ũ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa aà náaikɛ aa wɛ̃ni láasai eↄnɛ.
Lua mɛ̀ndona, gↄↄpii Kía pↄ́ lí gao mɛ́ wìli e ń wɛ́oo mɛ́ aↄ bɛɛɛ vĩ ń gawio gↄↄpii, ãmi.
Ma nɛ́ Timↄtee, lá wà dↄ̀aa ãnabikɛkɛ̀ n yã́ musu, málɛ yã́pi danɛ kɛ́ ǹyↄ̃ kũa, ní zĩ̀ maa kaò
luanaaikɛa guu ń làasoodaadoũo. Làasoodaadoũ lí kɛ gbɛ̃eↄnɛ yãe ũo, ↄ̃ an luanaaikɛa ì ↄ̃̀ↄkpa.
Imɛnɛ ń Alɛsãndao kú ń guu. Ma ń kpá Setãuwa kɛ́ aaↄ dↄ̃ wìli dↄ́ɛ ń Luaoo.
Too, gĩa sɛ̃́ia málɛ lɛdama à wabikɛ gbɛ̃́piiɛ, à zɛ́ gbɛanɛ́, à kulɛkɛnɛ́ Luaɛ ń sáaukpaao.
À wabikɛ kíaↄnɛ ń gbãadeↄ píi, kɛ́ wà e wàↄ ku aafia yãkelesai luayãmanaↄ ũ, wá kua iↄ gbia.
Bee mɛ́ maa, ì ka Lua wá Suabanagu.
A ye gbɛ̃́pii suaba, aai sĩana dↄ̃.
Asa Lua mɛ̀ndoɛ, mɛ́ kↄ́ↄ kú mɛ̀ndo Lua ń gbɛ̃nazĩnaↄ zãnguo, ↄ̃n gbɛ̃nazĩna Kilisi Yesu ũ.
À azĩa kpà gbɛ̃́pii fĩabobↄ ũ a gↄↄwa, Lua pↄeãpi seela ũ.
Ayãmɛto Lua ma dilɛ a kpàwakɛna ũ, a zĩna ũ, mà a zɛ́ sĩande da buipãleↄnɛ. Sĩana málɛ o, i kɛ ɛɛ no.
Má ye gↄ̃ɛↄ lousisi gu ń guo píi, aa ↄsɛ musu gbãsĩsai, pↄkũma ń lɛkpaao sai.
Má ye lↄ nↄɛↄ ńzĩa kɛkɛ a zɛ́wa yↄ̃̀ↄsai zĩamↄnɛ sai. I kɛ ń mì yↄ̃̀ↄde tãao ge vua ń òso nↄamblebↄↄ ge zwã̀a ↄdeↄ no.
Aa ńzĩa kɛkɛ ń maakɛao, lá a maa nↄɛ lousisinaↄ kɛwa.
Nↄɛↄ yãdada kílikili, aa misiilɛ yã́pii musu.
Mili we nↄɛↄ yãdàda gↄ̃ɛↄnɛ ge aaↄ iko vĩmáo, sema aaↄ ku kílikili.
Asa Adamu ↄ̃ Lua kɛ̀ sɛ̃́ia, a gbɛa Ɛva.
I kɛ Adamu wa sã̀são, nↄɛ wa sã̀sã, à sì duunau.
Tó nↄɛ wɛtã̀ ń luanaaikɛao ń yea gbɛ̃́ↄzio ń kuaadoakɛo zĩamↄnɛ sai, ali nɛ'i aafia.
Yã́ɛ bee sĩana vĩ: Tó gbɛ̃́ ye kɛ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ ũ, àlɛ zĩ maa nidɛ.
Gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ líↄ ku tàaesai nↄmɛndode ũ, laaide ũ, ìↄ azĩa kũa dↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ dↄ̀ↄde ũ, nibↄfↄ̃na ũ, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a fↄ̃ yãdanɛ́ ũ.
Asu àↄ dɛ igbɛ̃na ge gbɛ̃́ pãsĩ ũo. Aàↄ dɛ nↄ̀sɛdoũde yãkelesaide ũ. Ɔ̃a su dↄaaɛ̀o.
Aàↄ a ua kũa dↄ̃, aà nɛ́ↄ lí misiilɛɛ̀ aaliↄ aà ↄtondↄkĩi gwa.
Asa tó gbɛ̃́ a ua kũa dↄ̃o, kpelewa a fↄ̃ ↄlia Lua gãlideↄzii?
Asu àↄ dɛ gbɛ̃́ dafuna ũo, kɛ́ asu ĩ́anadã, i azĩa dayãu lán Ibiisiwao yã́i.
Aà tↄ́ àↄ na Yesusaideↄ kĩ́i lↄ, kɛ́ wasu aà tↄ́'ĩisi, i zu Ibiisi bauo yã́i.
Màa lↄ dↄnlɛdeↄ aaↄ dɛ gbɛ̃́ gbiaↄ ũ. Aasu wàↄ dɛ lɛplaadeↄ ũo. Wɛ̃ yã́ su dↄaanɛ́o. Aasu wàↄ dɛ ↄwɛɛlɛmbɛ̃ɛↄ ũo.
Aaↄ Yesu yã́ kũa ń làasoodaadoũo.
Wà ń yã́ gwa gĩa, tó wi yãe emáo, wi gbasa ń dilɛ dↄnlɛdeↄ ũ.
Màaɛ ń nↄɛↄ. Aaↄ dɛ nↄɛ gbiaↄ ũ, laaideↄ ũ, aaìↄ náai vĩ yã́pii guu. Aasu wàↄ dɛ gudɛnaↄ ũo.
Dↄnlɛde àↄ dɛ nↄmɛndode ũɛ, aàↄ a ua ń a nɛ́ↄ kũa dↄ̃.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ zĩkɛ̀ a zɛ́wa, ì zɛkĩi maa e, aà sↄ̃ iↄ dilɛa a Kilisi Yesu náaikɛa guu maamaa.
Baa kɛ́ málɛ yã́piↄ onɛ, má dìlɛ má mↄ́ n gwai tia.
Tó ma mↄa su lɛ́ gɛ̃gɛ̃ɛ, má ye ǹyↄ̃ dↄ̃ lá a maa wàↄ ku Lua uadeↄ ũɛ. Wámɛ wá Lua bɛ̃́ɛ gãlideↄ ũ, sĩana zĩ́mpɛlɛ ń a gbãa'ekĩio ũ.
Lua asiiyã pↄ́ bↄ̀ gupuau zↄ̃ↄ sĩanaɛ: À mↄ̀ gbɛ̃nazĩna ũ, Lua Nisĩna aà sĩandekɛ ↄ̀lↄnɛ́, malaikaↄ aà è. Wà aà yã́ waasokɛ̀ buiↄ guu, wà aà náaikɛ̀ dṹnia guu, Lua aà sɛ̀ tàò a kĩ́i gawi guu.
Lua Nisĩna ò wásawasa, gↄↄgbɛzãzĩ gbɛ̃eↄ pãkpa Yesu zɛ́i, aai tɛ sã́sãyã pↄ́ tã́a ì ɛɛdeↄ da a oauzi.
Ɛɛde mↄafilide pↄ́ vãi lí kã̀adańlaoↄ mɛ́ aa ń sãsã.
Aaì gí gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ aa nↄsɛ aa zãkɛ, mɛ́ aaì blɛ tɛ̃́nɛ́, blɛ pↄ́ Lua kɛ̀ a náaikɛna pↄ́ aa sĩana dↄ̃ↄnɛ aa ble ń a sáaukpaao.
Pↄ́ pↄ́ Lua kɛ̀ píi maaɛ. Wásu a kee tɛ̃boo, wà ble ń aà sáaukpaao,
asa Lua yã́ ń wá wabikɛao gbãbↄ̀ɛ̀.
Tó n yã́piↄ dà n gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ, ńyↄ̃ↄ dɛ Kilisi Yesu zĩkɛn maa ũ, asa ńlɛ nzĩa gwa ń Yesu yã́o, ń tɛ́ yãmaa pↄ́ wa dànɛi.
Mikɛ̃ fɛlɛkaa fĩ pↄ́ lí kpaaĩ ń Lua yã́oowa. Ǹ nzĩa toto, kɛ́ ǹyↄ̃ dɛ luayãmana ũ.
Mɛtotoa ài vĩ yↄↄ, ãma dɛa luayãmana ũ ài vĩ yã́pii guuɛ, asa bee ì mↄ́ ń wɛ̃nio gbã ń ziao.
Yã́pi sĩana vĩ, à kà wà si ↄplapla,
wí zĩkɛ wà dɛ̃ɛka a musu. Wá wɛ́ dↄ Lua bɛ̃́ɛzi. Ɔ̃mɛ gbɛ̃́pii Suabana ũ, azaiasa aà náaikɛnaↄ.
Yã́piↄ dilɛnɛ́, ní dadanɛ́.
Ńsu to wà saka n ɛ̀waasokɛguo. To n kua zɛ'ↄlↄ Yesudeↄnɛ yã'oa ń yãkɛao ń yeakↄ̃io ń luanaaikɛao ń kua gbãsĩsaio guu.
E màↄ mↄ́, wɛtã ń Lua yã́ kyokɛao, ní danɛ́, ní lɛdaomá.
Gba pↄ́ Lua dànɛ gↄↄ pↄ́ wà ãnabikɛkɛ̀ n yã́ musu, mɛ́ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ ↄnàma, ńsu niazĩkpaio.
Laaidↄ yã́piↄwa, ní mɛkpawà, gbɛ̃́pii i n gɛa'aɛ e.
Ǹ nzĩa yã́ ń n yãdanɛo tàasika. Zɛ súsu ń yã́piↄ. Tó ń kɛ̀ màa, ńyↄ̃ nzĩa suaba ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ swã́sɛ n yã́iↄ.
Ńsu maezↄ̃ↄ leleo. Lɛdawà n mae ũ, ní da ɛ̀waasoↄwa n vĩ̀i ń n dãunaↄ ũ.
Lɛda nↄɛzↄ̃ↄwa n da ũ, ní da nↄgbãa ge wɛ̃́ndiawa n dãe ũ làasooplasai.
Gyaa gbɛ̃andoↄ kpɛla.
Tó gyaa nɛ́ↄ ge tↄũnaↄ vĩ, aa ń daɛↄ gwaa dada gĩa, aai fĩabo ń maeↄ ń ń daↄnɛ, asa bee ì ka Luagu.
Gyaa gbɛ̃ando wɛ́ ìↄ dↄ Luazi, ì wɛtã lousisia ń wabikɛaowa gwãasĩna ń fãanɛo.
Gyaa pãpãkɛnaá gɛɛ, baa tó a bɛ̃́ɛ.
Yã́piↄ danɛ́, kɛ́ wasu ń tàae eo.
Tó gbɛ̃́ lɛ́ a daɛↄ gwao, atɛ̃sa aà uadeↄ, à bↄ̀ Lua yã́ kpɛɛ, Yesusaide dɛaàla.
Nↄɛ pↄ́ dɛ wà da gyaaↄ guun kɛ: Nↄɛ pↄ́ kà wɛ̃̀ bàaↄ̃ mɛ́ à zãkɛ̀ gɛ̃n do,
wìↄ aà dↄ̃ maakɛna ũ, nɛgwan maa ũ, nibↄfↄ̃na pↄ́ Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ gbá pìpi ũ, taasideↄ dↄnlɛde ũ, nↄɛ pↄ́ mɛkpà maakɛa píiwa ũ.
Ńsu gyaa nↄgbãaↄ dauo, asa tó an gↄ̃ nidɛa fɛ̀lɛ, an naa Kilisiwa a busaɛ, aaiↄ ye zãkɛ,
aai ńzĩa dayãu, kɛ́ aa lɛ́ pↄ́ aa gbɛ̃̀ɛ̀ yãa gbòo yã́i.
Bee gbɛa aaì pãkɛ dada, aaìↄ bɛbɛ wàↄ ualɛkɛ. I kɛ màaden ń ũ adoo, aaì gↄ̃ gbɛ̃pen gudɛnaↄ ũɛ, aaì yã́ pↄ́ dɛ wà oo o.
Ayãmɛto má ye gyaa nↄgbãaↄ zãkɛ, aai nɛ'i, aai laaidↄ bɛwa, kɛ́ aasu wá ibɛɛↄ gba zɛ́ aa wá tↄbɛ̃ɛsio yã́i.
An gbɛ̃eↄ bↄ̀ tɛ Setãuzi kↄ̀.
Tó Yesudee gyaaↄ vĩ a bɛ, aàli dↄńlɛ. Asu to aa gↄ̃ gãlideↄnɛ aso ũo, kɛ́ aa e dↄ gyaa gbɛ̃andoↄlɛ yã́i.
Gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ pↄ́ ì dↄaa a zɛ́wa kà wà fĩaboɛ̀ lɛɛ pla, atɛ̃sa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ waasokɛa ń yãdaanɛ́o ãia vĩ.
Wà yã́ɛ bee kɛ̃̀ láu wà mɛ̀: Ásuli lɛsↄkpa zu pↄ́ lɛ́ pↄgbɛ̃ɛo. Wà mɛ̀ lↄ: Zĩkɛna kà à a asea e.
Ńsu gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ mↄ̀ ń gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ káalao yã́ sio, sema seeladeↄ kà gbɛ̃ↄn pla ge àaↄ̃ bàasio.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ duunakɛ̀ↄ gba laai gbɛ̃́pii wáa, kɛ́ vĩa e gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ kṹ.
Ma nanɛ Lua ń Kilisi Yesuozi ń malaika pↄ́ à ń sɛ́ↄ, ǹyↄ̃ yã́piↄ kũa gbɛ̃e tɛ̃bosai. Ńsu yãe kɛ gbɛ̃eɛ ublembɛkɛa yã́io.
Ńsu wã ↄna gbɛ̃́wa ǹ aà dazĩuo. Ńsu to n lɛ́ àↄ ku gbɛ̃e duunauo. Ǹyↄ̃ nzĩa kũa gbãsĩsai.
Ńsu í pã mi ado lↄo. Nìli vɛ̃ɛ ga yↄↄ n nↄ̀sɛ ń n gyãkɛa mↄ̀ↄmↄↄo yã́i.
Gbɛ̃eↄ duuna ì bↄ gupuau e wàↄ gɛ́ a yãkɛkɛińnↄ, gbɛ̃eↄ pↄ́ sↄ̃, ìli bↄ kpaao.
Màa lↄ maakɛa ì bↄ gupuau, baa a pↄ́ wi eo a e gↄ̃ ulɛao.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛ zↄ ũↄ ń diiↄ dilɛ gbia, aai misiilɛnɛ́ yã́pii guu, kɛ́ wasu Lua tↄ́ ń yã́ pↄ́ wi danɛ́o bɛ̃̀ɛboo yã́i.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ an diiↄ dɛ Yesude ũↄ su dↄ́ɛmá kɛ́ aa dɛ kↄ̃gbɛ̃ↄ ũ yã́io. Aa zↄblenɛ́ maamaa, asa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ ń zĩ baa bleↄ dɛ Yesudeↄ ũɛ, an gbɛ̃́ yenzideↄ ũ. Yã́piↄ danɛ́, ní lɛdaomá.
Tó gbɛ̃e lɛ́ yãpãle danɛ́ mɛ́ i zɛ ń wá Dii Yesu Kilisi yã́ sĩandeo ń wá zɛ́ yãdanɛoo,
yↄ̃̀ↄdeɛ, a yãe dↄ̃o, lɛkpaa gii ń yãgwaa láasaio aà kũ̀ gyã ũ. Yã́ beeↄ ì to gbɛ̃́ↄ wɛdↄkↄ̃ɛ, aaì sòlekɛ, aaì kↄ̃ sↄ̃́sↄ̃, aaì làasoo vãi sɛ́ ń kↄ̃o,
aaìↄ kĩ́iwãi vĩ. Gbɛ̃́piↄ làasoo kolea, sĩana pìlimá, aaìↄ e lousisiaá ↄwɛɛlɛzɛɛ.
Lousisia ài zↄ̃ↄ sĩana, tó gbɛ̃́ zɛ̀ ń pↄ́ pↄ́ á vĩo.
Wi mↄ́ ń pↄeo dṹnia guu lao, mɛ́ wá e tá ń pↄeoo.
Tó wá pↄblea ń pↄkasaↄ vĩ, bee mↄ̀.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ye gↄ̃ ↄde ũↄ ì ńzĩa da yↄ̃a bau. Pↄ́ nidɛa mìsai kaide ì gɛ̃ńgu, i ń kpálɛ músi ń kaalɛo guu.
Yea ↄ̃ai mɛ́ yãvãi píi zĩ́na ũ. Gbɛ̃eↄ lɛ́ a kↄ̃dɛ e aa gɛ̀ zã̀ò Yesu zɛ́wa, aa wãwã zↄ̃ↄ kpà ńzĩai.
Lá Lua gbɛ̃́n n ũ, bàalɛ yã́piↄnɛ, ní tó yãmaa líↄ dↄaanɛ ń yã́ pↄ́ zɛvĩ Luaɛo ń aà náaikɛao ń yea gbɛ̃́ↄzio ń mɛnao ń nↄ̀sɛniɛo.
Dɛ̃ɛ maa ká n Yesu náaikɛa guu, ní wɛ̃ni láasai e, asa ↄ̃ Lua n sisiwà gↄↄ pↄ́ n lɛ́ maa gbɛ̃̀ɛ̀ bíla wáa.
Ma nanɛ Lua pↄ́ ì wɛ̃ni kpa pↄ́piiwazi ń Kilisi Yesu pↄ́ yãmaa ò Pↄ̃nsi Pilatiɛo,
ǹyↄ̃ yã́ pↄ́ wa dìlɛnɛ kũa sãasai tàaesai e wá Dii Yesu Kilisi mↄ́zĩ.
Gbãade mɛ̀ndona Báaade, kíaↄ Kía, diiↄ Dii mɛ́ a Kilisipi bↄ a gↄↄwa.
Ɔ̃mɛ lí gao ado, ìↄ ku gupua pↄ́ wìli fↄ̃ sↄ̃̀io guu. Gbɛ̃e i wɛsiaàlɛo, wa fↄ̃ seo. Ɔ̃mɛ gawi ń gbãao vĩ gↄↄpii, ãmi.
O dṹnia tiaɛ bee ↄdeↄnɛ aasu ĩ́anadão. Aasu gbãa'e ↄda náaisaiwao, aa gbãa'e Lua pↄ́ ì pↄ́pii kpáwá zↄ̃ↄ wà pↄnakɛòwa.
Onɛ́ aa maakɛ, maakɛa i tↄ̃́má. Aaↄ dɛ gbadanaↄ ũ, aaiↄ gbɛ̃kɛ vĩ.
Beewa aa kũ̀sũa maa di ńzĩaɛ àizãna pↄ́ ũ, aai wɛ̃ni pↄ́ dɛ wɛ̃ni ũ sĩana e.
Timↄtee, kàeda yã́ pↄ́ Lua nànɛ n ↄzĩi. Ɛ̃ dṹnia yã́ giiↄnɛ ń yãwaaipaa pↄ́ wì mɛ dↄ̃aɛo.
Gbɛ̃eↄ zɛ̀ò, ↄ̃ aa pã̀alɛ Yesu zɛ́ɛ. Lua gbɛ̃kɛkɛɛ́.
Mámɛmaa Kilisi Yesu zĩna Pↄlu lá Lua yeiwa wɛ̃ni pↄ́ à a lɛgbɛ̃̀ Kilisi Yesupi guu yã́i,
ma láɛ bee kɛ̃̀nɛ, ma nɛ́ yenzide Timↄtee. Mae Lua ń wá Dii Kilisi Yesuo gbɛ̃kɛkɛnɛ ń sùuuo, aai n gba aafia.
Ma sáaukɛ̀ ń ma deziↄ Lua pↄ́ mi kúlɛɛ̀ ń nↄ̀sɛpuaoo, asa n yã́ ìↄ dↄmagu láasai ma wabikɛa gwãasĩna ń fãanɛo guu.
Tó wɛ́'i pↄ́ bↄ̀ma yã́ dↄ̀magu, mi n bɛɛkɛɛ, míↄ ye wà wɛsikↄ̃lɛ, kɛ́ ma pↄna e kɛ zài.
N luanaaikɛa ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo ìↄ dↄmaguɛ. N dazi Loisi ń n da Ɛnisio Lua náaikɛ̀ màa, mɛ́ má dↄ̃ sã́asã ńlɛ Lua náaikɛ màa sↄ̃.
Ayãmɛto málɛ dↄngu, fɛlɛ zɛ ń gba pↄ́ Lua dànɛ gↄↄ pↄ́ ma ↄnàmao,
asa Nisĩna pↄ́ ì wá gba gbãa, ì to wàↄ yekↄ̃i, ì to wàↄ laai vĩ ↄ̃ Lua kpàwá, i kɛ nisĩn fooo no.
A yã́i ńsu widɛ ń wá Dii yã'oanɛ́oo, mɛ́ ńsu widɛ ma gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wà ma dakpɛu aà yã́i yã́ musuo. Taasi pↄ́ wì kɛ aà baokpaa yã́i kɛmanↄ ń Lua gbãao.
Ɔ̃mɛ wá suabà, à wá sisi, wa gↄ̃ aà pↄ́ ũ. I kɛ yã́ pↄ́ wá kɛ̀ yã́i no, aàzĩa pↄeã yã́iɛ, ń gbɛ̃kɛ pↄ́ a kɛ̀wɛ̃ɛ naa Kilisi Yesuwa zadↄ̃ gↄↄ i daalɛoo.
Gbɛ̃kɛpi bↄ̀ gupuau wá Suabana Kilisi Yesupi mↄa guu sa. À ga iko bãdɛ̀, à wɛ̃ni ń kua gↄↄpiio bↄ̀wɛ̃ɛ gupuau a bao pↄ́ wì kpa guu.
Lua ma dilɛ a zĩna ũ mà baopi kpàwakɛ, mí danɛ́.
A yã́i málɛ taasiɛ bee kɛi, ãma wí lí ma kũo, asa má gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ma aà náaikɛ̀ dↄ̃, mɛ́ má dↄ̃ sã́asã kɛ́ a fↄ̃ kàeda yã́ pↄ́ à nàmɛɛ ma ↄzĩi e a mↄgↄↄzĩ.
Ǹyↄ̃ yã́ sĩande pↄ́ ń mà ma kĩ́ipi kũa yã́ zĩ́nda ũ ń luanaaikɛao ń yeakↄ̃io naa Kilisi Yesuwa guu.
Kàeda yãmaa pↄ́ Lua nànɛ n ↄzĩi ń aà Nisĩna pↄ́ kú wá guu gbãao.
Ń dↄ̃ kɛ́ Azi bùsudeↄ píi ma vũaaɛ. Fizɛlɛ ń Ɛɛmↄzɛnio kú ń guu.
Dii wɛ̃nadↄ̃ Ɔnɛsifↄↄ bɛdeↄnɛ! Asa à ma nↄ̀sɛ nìnimɛɛ, a gɛ̃na lɛ́ vĩo, i widɛ ma daakpɛu yã́ musuo.
Kɛ́ à kà Loma gↄ̃̀ↄ, à ma wɛɛlɛ e à gɛ̀ bↄ̀a.
Dii to Lua wɛ̃nadↄ̃ɛ̀ yã́kpalɛkɛgↄↄzĩ. Ń dↄnlɛ zↄ̃ↄ pↄ́ a kɛ̀mɛɛ Ɛfɛsɛ dↄ̃ sã́asã.
Mpi sↄ̃ ma nɛ́, ǹyↄ̃ gbãa ń gbɛ̃kɛ pↄ́ Lua vĩwanↄ naa Kilisi Yesuwao.
Yã́ pↄ́ ń mà má ò dasi wáa na gbɛ̃́ náaide pↄ́ aa fↄ̃ da gbɛ̃pãleↄnɛↄ ↄzĩ.
Taasikɛmanↄ Kilisi Yesu zĩgↄ̃ maa ũ.
Dṹnia yã́ lí dↄaa zĩgↄ̃ pↄ́ kú zĩlauɛo, kɛ́ aà yã́ e ka a diigu yã́i.
Bakpaaĩna sↄ̃, tó i bàalɛ a zɛ́wao, a fùa eo.
Zↄ̃ɛ pↄ́ zĩ gbãa kɛ̀ mɛ́ ì a baa sɛ́ sɛ̃́ia.
Làasookɛ yã́ pↄ́ má òpiↄwa, asa Dii a ń gba ↄ̃nↄ apii guu.
To Davidi bui Yesu Kilisi pↄ́ bↄ̀ gau yã́ àↄ dↄngu. Baona pↄ́ mi kpan we.
A yã́i málɛ taasikɛi. Wà mↄkàa lán dàakɛnawa, ãma wa fↄ̃ mↄka Lua yã́wao.
Ayãmɛto mi yã́pii fↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua ń sɛ́ↄ yã́i, kɛ́ ampiↄ sↄ̃, Lua ń suaba, aai gawi pↄ́ lí láao e naa Kilisi Yesuwa.
Yã́ɛ bee sĩana vĩ: Tó wa gaaànↄ, wáↄ kuaànↄ.
Tó wa mɛnafↄ̃̀, wáↄ kibleaànↄ. Tó wa lelekpàaàzi, aàpi a kpáwázi sↄ̃ɛ.
Tó wá náai vĩo, ìↄ náai vĩɛ, asa a we lelekpa azĩaio.
Yã́piↄ dↄ n gbɛ̃́ↄgu, ní nanɛ́ Luazi aasu lɛkpaa pã kɛ Lua yã́ musuo. A ài vĩo, ì gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ maↄ ↄ̃̀ↄkpaɛ.
Ãiakɛ, kɛ́ Lua e n sáaukpa, zĩkɛna pↄ́ ì yã́ sĩande polonɛ́ wásawasa, wí lí aà kũ aà zĩ yã́ musuo ũ.
Ɛ̃ yãbↄlɛa pã pↄ́ lí kpaaĩ ń Lua yã́ooɛ. Ì gbɛ̃́ↄ luayãdasai kã́fĩnɛ́ɛ,
ↄ̃ yã́ pↄ́ aaì danɛ́ ì ↄtamá lán sã́nɛwa. Imɛnɛ ń Filɛtio kú ń guu.
Aa kɛ̃̀ sĩanawa, aaì mɛ wà bↄ̀ gau kↄ̀, aaì gbɛ̃eↄ luanaaikɛa ↄ̃̀ↄkpaonɛ́.
Gia ń beeo ɛ̃ pↄ́ Lua dàalɛ zɛa gbãa, wà yã́ɛ bee kɛ̃̀wà: Dii gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛ a pↄ́ ũↄ dↄ̃. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì Dii sísi kɛ̃́ yãvãiwa.
Uada ìↄ pↄ́ↄ vĩ dasi. Wà a keeↄ kɛ̀ ń vuao ń ã́nusuo yã́gbiakɛbↄ ũ, mɛ́ wà a keeↄ kɛ̀ ń lío ń gĩo yãyↄↄnakɛbↄ ũ.
Tó gbɛ̃́ ↄbↄ̀lɛ yã́ bɛɛɛsai guu, a gↄ̃ yã́gbiakɛbↄ ũ, Dii zĩkɛbↄ maa ũ, iↄ ku maakɛa píi sↄu guu.
Bàalɛ ɛ̀waaso pↄnidɛaↄnɛ, ní tó maakɛa ń luanaaikɛao ń yea gbɛ̃́ↄzio ń kua ń kↄ̃o na dↄaanɛ sãnu ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaì Dii sísi ń nↄ̀sɛpuaoↄ.
Ɔbↄlɛ yã́ mìsai gwaa ń kↄ̃o guu. A dↄ̃a vĩo, mɛ́ ń dↄ̃ kɛ́ ì lɛkpaa inɛ́.
A maa Dii zↄ̀blena aàↄ lɛkpaa vĩo. Aàↄ busaa gbɛ̃́piiɛ, yãdanɛde maa pↄ́ ì gbɛ̃́ fↄ̃́ ũ,
i gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ a yã́ sioↄ gba laai busɛbusɛ. Wìliↄ dↄ̃o Lua a ń gba nↄ̀sɛlilɛa zɛ́, aai sĩana dↄ̃,
aai pili Ibiisi pↄ́ ń kṹ ń a bao à ń dá a pↄeã guuwa, aai su ń laaiwa.
Ǹyↄ̃ dↄ̃ kɛ́ gↄↄ gbɛzãɛ beeↄ aaↄ zĩ'ũ.
Gbɛ̃́ↄ zĩa yã́ a dↄaanɛ́, ↄ̃a a ń sↄ̃ ble. Aaↄ dɛ waladeↄ ũ, ĩ́andãnaↄ, gbɛ̃sↄ̃sↄ̃naↄ, de ń dao yãmansaiↄ, guluↄ, luayãdansaiↄ,
nↄ̀sɛsaideↄ, awamansaiↄ, gbɛ̃́ tↄbɛ̃ɛsinaↄ, faasaideↄ, ãiapãsĩdeↄ, maa ibɛɛↄ,
bↄnkpɛdeↄ, làasoosaideↄ ń yↄ̃̀ↄdeↄ. Aaↄ ye pↄnakɛai dɛ Lua yã́la.
Aaì lousisi, ãma an yã́ lí kↄ̃sɛ ń Lua gbãaoo. Kɛ̃́ gbɛ̃́piↄwa.
Gbɛ̃́ bee taaↄ ì gɛ̃ nↄɛ pↄ́ lí mi gbãɛoↄzi, aai ikokɛmá. Duuna sadà nↄɛpiↄgu, dↄ́ɛ'ĩi mɛ́ gↄ̃̀nɛ́,
aaìↄ yãdada gↄↄpii, ãma aali sĩana dↄ̃o.
Lá Zanɛsi ń Zãblɛsio bↄ̀ Mↄizi kpɛ, màa gbɛ̃́piↄ ì bↄ sĩana kpɛ. An làasoo kolea, mɛ́ luanaaikɛn gianaↄnɛ.
Aa gɛa'aɛ vĩ lↄo, asa gbɛ̃́pii ń mìsaikɛ dↄ̃, lá wà Zanɛsi ń Zãblɛsio pↄ́ dↄ̃̀wa.
Mpi sↄ̃ ń tɛmazi, ń ma kua dↄ̃ ń ma yãdanɛo ń yã́ pↄ́ málɛ yáo ń ma luanaaikɛao ń ma mɛnakɛao ń ma yea gbɛ̃́ↄzio ń ma zɛa gbãao
ń ĩa pↄ́ wa dàao ń taasi pↄ́ má kɛ̀o. Ń yã́ pↄ́ ma le Antiↄsi ń Ikↄniuo ń Lisitao dↄ̃ ń ĩa zↄ̃ↄ daaa pↄ́ má fↄ̃̀o. Dii ma bↄ apii guu.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa ye wàↄ ku luayãmanaↄ ũ naa Kilisi Yesuwaↄ gí wɛ́tɛ̃a eio.
Gbɛ̃vãiↄ ń kↄ̃nideↄ, an vãi aↄ gbãbↄbↄɛ, aai gbɛ̃́ↄ sã́sã, ampiↄ sↄ̃ aaↄ sã́sãaɛ.
Mpi sↄ̃, zɛ ń yã́ pↄ́ ń dàda ń sì sĩana ũo. Ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dàdanɛ́ↄ dↄ̃,
asa ń Luayãtaala dↄ̃ za n nɛ́zĩ. A fↄ̃ n gba ↄ̃nↄ, i n ka Kilisi Yesu náaikɛa pↄ́ ì ń suabawa.
Yã́ pↄ́ kú lápiↄ guu bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i píiɛ. A ài vĩ, asa ì sĩana danɛ́, ì ń ɛɛkanɛ́ ń ↄzĩ, ì ń gba laai, ì lɛdamá yãkɛa a zɛ́wa musu,
kɛ́ Lua gbɛ̃́ e àↄ wásawasa kua maakɛa píi sↄu guu.
Ma nanɛ Lua ń Kilisi Yesuozi aà ɛa mↄa kpalablei ń aà yã́kpalɛkɛa ń gbɛ̃́ bɛ̃́ɛↄ ń gyaadeↄ yã́i,
Lua yã́ waasokɛ, à zɛkɛ̀ i zɛkɛo, wɛtã. Ǹ ń lele, ǹ ń gba laai, naɛmá, ní yãdanɛ́ ń mɛna zↄ̃ↄo.
Asa gↄↄe a mↄ kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ↄ we swã́sɛ yã́ sĩandeio. Aa yãdanɛdeↄ kãaańzi ńzĩa pↄeãwaɛ, aa yã́ pↄ́ káńgu danɛ́.
Aa gi sĩanai, aai zɛ ń fĩↄ.
Mpi sↄ̃, ǹyↄ̃ laai vĩ yã́pii musu. Taasi fↄ̃́, ní baonakpanakɛa kɛ, ní n zĩ lɛpapa.
Ma gↄↄ pà kↄ̀, wa ma au tↄ̃́lɛ sa'o'i ũ tia.
Ma dɛ̃ɛ maa nɛ̀, ma bakpaaĩ pↄ́ Lua dìlɛ kɛ̀ ma bↄlɛi. Ma Yesu yã́ kũ̀ a zɛ́wa.
Kua maa fùa dilɛa, àlɛ ma dã sa. Dii Yã́kpalɛkɛn maa mɛ́ a kpamɛɛ yã́kpalɛkɛgↄↄzĩ. I kɛ mámɛ má adoo, ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ye aà mↄaiↄ píiɛ.
Zɛwɛɛlɛ mↄ́ ma kĩ́i kpakpa.
Demasi ma to we à tà Tɛsaloni, kɛ́ a ye dṹniai yã́i. Kɛlɛsã tà Galati bùsuu, mɛ́ Titu tà Dalamati bùsuu.
Luku mɛ́ gↄ̃̀manↄ ado. Maaku sɛ à mↄ sãnu, asa ì dↄmalɛ maamaaɛ.
Ma Tisiki gbàɛ Ɛfɛsɛ.
Tó ńlɛ mↄ́, ma ulatao pↄ́ má tò Kaapu bɛ Toloasi sɛ́, ní mↄomɛɛ ń ma láↄ, atɛ̃sa a pↄ́ pↄ́ wa kɛ̀ ń báaoↄ.
Alɛsãnda sia yãvãikɛ̀mɛɛ maamaaɛ. Dii a yã́ pↄ́ a kɛ̀pi fĩaboɛ̀.
Laaikaaàzi, asa à bↄ̀ wá yã́ kpɛ pãsĩpãsĩɛ.
Yã́kpalɛkɛamanↄ sɛ̃́ia guu gbɛ̃e i zɛmanↄo. Wà ma to we píiɛ. Lua su ń yã́pi dao.
Dii zɛ̀manↄ à ma gba gbãa, ↄ̃ ma zɛ'è ma baonakpà wásawasa, buipãleↄ mà píi. À ma bↄ nↄ̀ↄmusu lɛ́zĩ.
Dii a ma bↄ yãvãi guu píi, a ma suaba e ma gɛ kaò aà kpalau musu. Ɔ̃mɛ gawi vĩ gↄↄpii, ãmi.
Fↄkpa Pisii ń Akilasiowa ń Ɔnɛsifↄↄ bɛdeↄ.
Elasa gↄ̃̀ Kↄlɛni. Ma Tↄfiũ tò ń gyão Milɛti.
Zɛwɛɛlɛ mↄ́ e buziɛ àↄ ká. Ebulu ń Pudɛo ń Linuo ń Kolodiao ń wá gbɛ̃́ↄ píi fↄkpàma.
Dii àↄ kunnↄ, i gbɛ̃kɛkɛɛ́ ápii.
Ma Pↄlu, Lua zↄ̀blena, Yesu Kilisi zĩna, à ma zĩ mà gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua ń sɛ́ↄ da a zɛ́u, mí tó aa lousisia sĩana dↄ̃,
an wɛ́ iↄ dↄ àizãna pↄ́ Lua a lɛgbɛ̃̀ zadↄ̃ gↄↄ i daalɛozi, Luapi lí ɛɛto sↄ̃o.
Yã́pi bↄ̀ gupuau a gↄↄwa waaso pↄ́ Lua wá Suabana nàmɛɛ ma ↄzĩ guu, lá a dìlɛwa.
Mámɛ ma láɛ bee kɛ̃̀nɛ Titu, ma nɛ'ia Yesu zɛ́ pↄ́ wá kúu sãnu guu. Mae Lua ń Kilisi Yesu wá Suabanapio gbɛ̃kɛkɛnɛ, aai n gba aafia.
Ma n to Kɛlɛti kɛ́ ǹ yã́ pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ weↄ gↄ̃́gↄ̃, ní gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ dilɛ wɛ̃́lɛ ń wɛ̃́lɛo lá má ònɛwa.
A maa gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ líↄ ku tàaesai nↄmɛndode ũɛ. Aà nɛ́ↄ ìↄ luayãmanaↄ ũ, i kɛ aaↄ dɛ nɛ́ zazaa lalasideↄ ũ no.
Lá dↄaanaá ziiaɛ Lua zĩ guu, a maa aàↄ dɛ tàaede ge swã́gbãade ge pↄkũmade ge igbɛ̃na ge ãiapãsĩde ge ↄwɛɛlɛmbɛ̃ɛ ũo,
sema nibↄfↄ̃na ũ, laaide pↄ́ zɛ̀ ń maakɛao ũ, gbɛ̃maa pↄ́ a kua adoa mɛ́ a azĩa kũa dↄ̃ ũ,
gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ zɛ̀ súsu ń Lua yã́ náaideo lá wì danɛ́wa ũ, kɛ́ à e lɛda gbɛ̃pãleↄwa ń yã́ sĩandepio, i gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ bↄ̀ a yã́ kpɛↄ ɛɛkanɛ́ ń ↄzĩ.
Asa swã́yãmansaide pↄ́ aaì gbɛ̃́ↄ liaa ń ń yã'oaoↄ dasi, atɛ̃sa Yudaↄ guu.
Aaì ua bṹu gbɛ̃́ↄ ↄ̃̀ↄkpa. A maa wà lɛsↄkpanɛ́. Aaì yã́ pↄ́ dɛ wà danɛ́o danɛ́ ↄbɛ̃ɛ'ea yã́i.
Kɛlɛti bùsu ãnabie mɛ̀ Kɛlɛtiↄá ɛɛdeↄnɛ, wài pãsĩↄnɛ, ye'uiade pↄewonsaiↄnɛ.
Yã́piá sĩanaɛ. Ayãmɛto lɛdamá pãsĩpãsĩ, kɛ́ aa zɛ́sɛ súsu.
Aasu laaidↄ Yudaↄ fĩwao ge gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ kɛ̃̀ sĩanawaↄ yãdilɛaↄ.
Pↄe líↄ gbãsĩ gbãsĩsaideↄnɛo, mɛ́ pↄe líↄ gbãsĩsai luayãdansai gbãsĩdeↄnɛo, kɛ́ an làasoo ń ń nↄ̀sɛo vãi yã́i.
Aaì mɛ wa Lua dↄ̃, ↄ̃ an yãkɛa ì ń ɛɛbo. Lua ginzideↄnɛ, aali aà yãmao, aali fↄ̃ yãmaae kɛ̀o.
Mpi sↄ̃, yã́ pↄ́ ì kpaaĩ ń yã́ sĩande daanɛ́o onɛ́.
O maezↄ̃ↄↄnɛ aaↄ ńzĩa kũa dↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ gbiaↄ ũ, laaideↄ ũ. Aa zɛ́sɛ súsu ń yea gbɛ̃́ↄzio ń mɛnao.
O nↄɛzↄ̃ↄↄnɛ lↄ aaↄ ku Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ kuawa. Aasu wàↄ dɛ gudɛna ge vɛ̃ɛ zↄ ũo. Aali yãmaa da nↄgbãaↄnɛ,
aali lɛdamá an baade àↄ ye a zã́zi ń a nɛ́ↄ,
aaↄ dɛ laaideↄ ũ gbãsĩsai, aa laaidↄ ń nↄzãekɛzĩwa, an baade misiilɛ a zã́ɛ, kɛ́ wasu Lua yã́ bɛ̃̀ɛboo yã́i.
Lɛda ɛ̀waasoↄwa lↄ aaↄ laai vĩ yã́pii guu,
ní maakɛa zɛ́ ↄlↄnɛ́. N yãdaanɛ́ àↄ gbia kolesai.
Yã́zɛde pↄ́ wa fↄ̃ a ɛɛboo danɛ́, wí i gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ bↄ̀ n kpɛ kṹ, kɛ́ i e vãi ò n yã́ musuo yã́i.
Lɛda zↄↄwa aali misiilɛ ń diiↄnɛ yã́pii guu, aali yã́ pↄ́ a káńgu kɛ. Aasuli bↄ ń yã́ kpɛo.
Aasu ń kpã́i'oo. Aa to aaↄ ń dↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ náaideↄ ũ maamaa, kɛ́ Lua wá Suabana yã́ pↄ́ wi danɛ́ e tɛkɛ yã́pii guu.
Asa Lua gbɛ̃kɛ pↄ́ mↄ̀ ń gbɛ̃́pii suabaao bↄ̀ gupuau.
Gbɛ̃kɛpi lɛ́ dawɛ̃ɛ wà mikɛ̃ yã́ pↄ́ i kpaaĩ ń Lua yã́ooɛ ń dṹnia pↄnidɛaↄ, wíↄ wázĩa kũa dↄ̃ gbɛ̃maaↄ ũ, luayãmanaↄ ũ dṹnia tiaɛ bee guu,
wíↄ wɛdↄ pↄnakɛgↄↄ pↄ́ wálɛ dã́i. Ɔ̃mɛ wá Lua zↄ̃ↄ wá Suabana Yesu Kilisi mↄgↄↄ gawide ũ.
À azĩa kpà wá gɛ̃ɛ ũ, kɛ́ à wá bↄ vãi píi guu, i wá gbãsĩ wolo a gbɛ̃́ yenzideↄ ũ, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ maakɛa ãia vĩↄ ũ.
Yã́piↄ onɛ́, ní lɛdaomá, ní ń gba laai ń n ikoo píi. Ńsu to gbɛ̃e sakanguo.
Dↄ n gbɛ̃́ↄgu aali misiilɛ gbãadeↄnɛ ń ikodeↄ, aa ń yãma, aaↄ kú ń maakɛa píi sↄuo.
Aasu gbɛ̃e tↄbɛ̃ɛsio. Aaↄ dɛ nↄ̀sɛdoũde yãkelesaide pↄ́ busaa gbɛ̃́piiɛↄ ũ.
Asa wápiↄ sↄ̃ wá faa vĩ yãao, luayãdansaiↄn wá ũ. Wá sã́sãa, wá dɛ pↄnakɛa ń dↄ́ɛ'ĩi píio zↄↄ ũ. Wiↄ ku nↄ̀sɛvãi ń wɛdↄakↄ̃ɛo guu. Wá dɛ gbɛ̃́ giaↄ ũ, wá zakↄ̃u.
Kɛ́ Lua wá Suabana gbɛ̃kɛ ń aà yea gbɛ̃́ↄzio bↄ̀ gupuau,
ↄ̃ à wá suabà. I kɛ wá maakɛa yã́i no, kɛ́ à wɛ̃nadↄ̃̀wɛ̃ɛ yã́iɛ. À wá zu'ò, à wá í dafu, a tò wa gↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ dafuↄ ũ ń a Nisĩna
pↄ́ a pìsiwá gbãao Yesu Kilisi wá Suabana sabai,
ↄ̃ yã́ bↄ̀wanↄ na aà gbɛ̃kɛ yã́i, wa gↄ̃ aà gbablenaↄ ũ, ↄ̃ wá wɛ́ dↄ àizãnai.
Yã́piá sĩanaɛ. Má ye ǹ kã́asikɛ yã́piↄwa maamaa, kɛ́ luayãmanaↄ e wà mɛkpa maakɛawa. Bee maa, a kã́fĩa vĩ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ.
Pãalɛ yã́ mìsai gwaaɛ ń deziↄ tↄ́ kↄ̃nwɛao ń sòleo ń lɛkpaakɛa Mↄizi ikoyã musuo, asa yãpãↄnɛ, aa kã́fĩa vĩo.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì to wà kɛ̃aa gba laai baa gɛ̃n pla, ní gbasa ǹ aà yá.
Ǹyↄ̃ dↄ̃ kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ bee taa ↄ̃̀ↄkpà. Duunkɛnaɛ, à azĩa dàyãu.
Tó ma Aatema ge Tisiki zĩ̀ma, zɛwɛɛlɛ mↄ ǹ ma le Nikↄpↄli, asa ma zɛò mà buziɛble weɛ.
Kↄai kɛ ǹ zɛ́ kũ̀sũa kɛ bùsu ikoyãdↄ̃na Zenasiɛ ń Apolooo, kɛ́ pↄe su kɛ̃́sãmáo.
A maa wá gbɛ̃́ↄ maakɛa dada, aaiↄ kɛ, aai bↄↄlɛ zɛazɛaↄ kɛ, kɛ́ aasu wàↄ ku pão.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wá sãnuↄ fↄkpàma píi. Fↄkpa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa yewázi Yesu zɛ́ guuↄwa. Lua gbɛ̃kɛkɛɛ́ ápii.
Ma Pↄlu, ma gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wà ma dakpɛu Kilisi Yesu yã́i ń ma gbɛ̃do Timↄteeo, wámɛ wa láɛ bee kɛ̃̀nɛ, wá zĩkɛndee yenzide Filemↄↄ,
ń Yesude pↄ́ aaì kↄ̃ kãaa n bɛↄ ń wá nↄɛ yenzide Afiao ń wá zĩ̀kandee Aasipuo.
Lua wá Mae ń Dii Yesu Kilisio gbɛ̃kɛkɛnɛ, aai n gba aafia.
N yã́ ìↄ dↄmagu gↄↄpii ma wabikɛa Luawa guuɛ, ↄ̃ mi aà sáaukpa,
asa ma Dii Yesu náai pↄ́ ńlɛ kɛ bao mà ń n yea Lua gbɛ̃́ↄzio píi.
Mi wabikɛwà, kɛ́ n kuawanↄ Yesu zɛ́u a to n wɛ́ kɛ̃́ báaa pↄ́ wá vĩ píi naa Kilisiwa guu.
Ma gbɛ̃́, n yeańzi ma pↄ kɛ̀na maamaa, à ma nↄ̀sɛ nìnimɛɛ, asa n Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ sↄ̃ dànɛ́ doũ.
Ayãmɛto, baa kɛ́ ma zɛ́ kà naa Kilisiwa mà yã́ pↄ́ maa ǹ kɛ dilɛnɛ,
ń beeo ma awakpànɛ kɛ́ má yenzi yã́i. Mapi ma Pↄlu, ma maezↄ̃ↄ ia ń ma daakpɛu tia Kilisi Yesu yã́io,
ma awakpànɛ Ɔnɛziũ pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ ma nɛ́ ũ kpɛ́u la yã́ musu.
A pãnɛ yãa, ãma tia a ài vĩwɛ̃ɛ, mpi ń mapio.
Ma aà gbàɛma, a dɛ ma sↄ̃ ũɛ.
Ma kua kpɛ́u Yesu baokpaa yã́i guu, má ye aàↄ ku ma saɛ, kɛ́ aàↄ dↄmalɛ n gbɛu,
ãma ma zɛò má yãe kɛ n lɛ́ saio, kɛ́ ńsu yãmaakɛmɛɛ teasio, sema ń pↄeão.
Àↄ Ɔnɛziũ kɛ̃ama yãa gↄↄpla dɛ kɛ́ aà ɛa suma àↄ kunnↄ gↄↄpii yã́iɛ.
A ɛa àↄ dɛnɛ zↄ ũ lↄo, asa a dɛ zↄa, a dɛ n gbɛ̃́ yenzide ũ naa Kilisiwa guuɛ. Ma gbɛ̃́ yenzideɛ. Wa n gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a dɛ n zↄ ũ mɛ́ à gↄ̃̀ Dii pↄ́ ũ pↄ́ o lↄa?
A yã́i tò, tó n ma dilɛ n gbɛ̃́ ũɛ, gbãakpaaàzi, lá ńyↄ̃ kpamaziwa.
Tó à zã̀nɛ yãewa ge tó a n fĩa kũaɛ, bee gↄ̃̀ ma yã́ ũɛ.
Ma Pↄlu mámɛ ma yã́ɛ bee kɛ̃̀ ń mazĩa ↄo, má n fĩabonɛ. Kɛ́ ń ma fĩa kũa n misia ũ, má a yã'o lↄo.
Too, ma gbɛ̃́, maakɛmɛɛ Dii yã́i, ní ma sↄ̃ damɛɛ doũ wá naa Kilisiwa guu yã́i.
Ma lakɛ̃̀nɛ kɛ́ má dↄ̃ ńyↄ̃ ma yãma, mɛ́ ńyↄ̃ kɛ dɛ lá má ònɛa yã́iɛ.
Bee gbɛa pilakĩi kɛkɛmɛɛ lↄ, asa má a náai vĩ Lua a ma bↄɛ́ wabi pↄ́ álɛ kɛwà yã́i.
Ɛpafa pↄ́ wá sãnu kpɛ́u Kilisi Yesu yã́i fↄkpàma
ń ma zĩkɛndeeↄ Maaku ń Alisakao ń Demasio ń Lukuo.
Dii Yesu Kilisi gbɛ̃kɛkɛɛ́.
Lua dↄ̀aa ãnabiↄnɛ yãa dodo dasi, ↄ̃ aa yã́zɛ ò wá deziↄnɛ dasi,
ãma aà Nɛ́ mɛ́ yã'òwɛ̃ɛ gↄↄ gbɛzãɛ beeↄ zĩ́ sa. Nɛ́pi sabai ↄ̃ Lua dṹnia kɛ̀, a dìlɛ ↄ̃mɛ a gↄ̃ pↄ́pii vĩ.
Ɔ̃mɛ Lua gawi tɛkɛa ũ, aà kua ũ zálala. Ɔ̃mɛ pↄ́pii kũa ń a yã'oa gbãao. Gbɛ̃́ↄ duunawoloa gbɛa à gɛ̀ zↄ̃̀lɛ musu Zↄ̃ↄde ↄplaai.
Lá tↄ́ pↄ́ a blè gbia dɛ malaikaↄ pↄ́a, màa aà zↄ̃ↄ dɛńla lↄ.
Lua yã́ɛ bee ò malaikaeɛ yãae? Ma Nɛ́n n ũ, n Maen ma ũ gbã, ge mámɛ máↄ dɛ aà Mae ũ, aàpi iↄ dɛ ma Nɛ́ ũ.
Kɛ́ Lua tò a yoa mↄ̀ dṹnia guu, à mɛ̀ a malaikaↄ kúlɛɛ̀ píi.
Malaikaↄ yã́ musu à mɛ̀, i a ìwaↄ li ĩ́ana ũ, i a zĩkɛnapiↄ li tɛ́vua ũ.
Aà Nɛ́ yã́ musu sↄ̃, à mɛ̀: Lua, ńyↄ̃ↄ zↄ̃lɛa báawa gↄↄpiiɛ, niↄ n kíakɛ lípana kũa yã́zɛde ũ.
Ń ye maakɛai, ń za vãikɛau. A yã́i tò Lua, n Lua, n kpa kpalau, à pↄna pìsima dɛ n gbɛ̃́ↄla.
Wa ò lↄ: Dii, n tↄↄlɛ kàlɛ asĩnizĩ, musuá n ↄzĩkɛaɛ.
Ampii aa gɛ̃, kási ńyↄ̃ↄ kuɛ. Aa zikũ lán pↄkasawa,
ní ń koo lán pɛwa, ní ń lilɛ lán pↄkasawa. Mpi sↄ̃ ńyↄ̃ↄ doũ gↄↄpiiɛ, n gↄↄ láaa vĩo.
À yã́ɛ bee ò malaikaeɛ yãae? Zↄ̃lɛ ma ↄplaai e màↄ n ibɛɛↄ kɛnɛ n gbadibↄ ũ.
Malaikaↄá zĩkɛnaↄnɛ ḿpii, nisĩna pↄ́ Lua ì ń zĩ dↄi gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa bↄ ziaↄlɛɛ.
Ayãmɛto wà yã́ pↄ́ wá mà kũ ↄplapla, kɛ́ wásu zã zɛ́wao yã́i.
Asa lá ikoyã pↄ́ malaikaↄ òá sĩanaɛ, mɛ́ wà fĩabò gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gì mai aa pã̀aↄnɛ a zɛ́wa,
tó wi suabaa zↄ̃ↄpi yãda sao, wá bↄe? Suabayãpi bↄ̀ Dii kĩ́iɛ, ↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ màↄ a sĩanapìliwàwɛ̃ɛ.
Lua suabayãpi seela ↄ̀lↄnɛ́ yãbↄnsaɛↄ ń dabudabu dasi kɛaↄ guu ń a Nisĩna gba pↄ́ a bìilɛwɛ̃ɛ a pↄeãwao.
I kɛ malaikaↄ ↄ̃ Lua dṹnia zia pↄ́ wálɛ a yã'o nànɛ́ ń ↄzĩo.
A ku guei wà mɛ̀: Bↄ́n gbɛ̃nazĩna ũ kɛ́ aà yã́ ìↄ dↄngui? Bↄ́n aà ũ kɛ́ ni laaidↄwài?
N aà kɛ̃̀sã malaikaↄzi gↄↄpla, n aà kpà kpalau ń gawio ń bɛɛɛo.
Ń tò pↄ́pii misìilɛɛ̀. Kɛ́ Lua tò pↄ́pii misìilɛɛ̀, i a kee to misiilɛaɛ̀ saio. Tia kɛ́wa, wi e pↄ́pii misìilɛɛ̀ gĩao,
wá è Yesu yã́ɛ. Lua aà kɛ̃̀sã malaikaↄzi gↄↄpla, kɛ́ Lua gbɛ̃kɛ guu aà ga gbɛ̃́pii gɛ̃ɛ ũ, ↄ̃ à aà kpà kpalau ń gawio ń bɛɛɛo ga taasi pↄ́ a kɛ̀ yã́i.
Lá pↄ́pii bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i mɛ́ pↄ́pii dɛ aà pↄ́ ũ, kɛ́ a ye gɛ̃ ń gbɛ̃́ↄ a gawi guu dasi a nɛ́ↄ ũ, à kũ̀ aà to an Suabanki gↄ̃ wásawasa taasikɛa guuɛ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ gↄ̃ Lua pↄ́ ũↄ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ ń kɛ Luapi pↄ́ ũo an de doũɛ. A yã́i tò aà ń sísia a dãunaↄ ũ lí aà wí kũo.
À mɛ̀: Má n yã'o ma dãunaↄnɛ, má n táasilɛ kↄ̃kãaa guu.
À mɛ̀ lↄ: Má aà náai vĩ. À mɛ̀ lↄ: Má kɛ́, ń nɛ́ pↄ́ Lua kpàaↄ.
Lá nɛ́piↄá gbɛ̃nazĩnaↄnɛ, màa aàpi sↄ̃ à gↄ̃̀ gbɛ̃nazĩna ũ láńwa, kɛ́ à ga, i Ibiisi pↄ́ ì ga gba zɛ́ kaalɛ,
i gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ vĩakɛ gaɛ aa gↄ̃̀ a zↄↄ ũ e ń wɛ̃ni lɛ́uↄ bo.
Sĩana guu malaikaↄ ↄ̃ àlɛ ↄdamáo, Ablahaũ buiↄnɛ.
À kũ̀ aà gↄ̃ lá a dãunaↄwa yã́pii guuɛ, kɛ́ à gↄ̃ Sa'onkia sùuude náaide ũ Lua zĩ guu, i gbɛ̃́ↄ duuna kɛ̃́má.
Lá à taasikɛ̀ à yↄ̃a fↄ̃̀, a fↄ̃ dↄ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wàlɛ ń yↄ̃ↄlɛ.
Bee yã́i ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua á sisi a mↄ aà kĩ́iↄ, à làasookɛ Yesu pↄ́ Lua aà zĩ̀ wá lousisizɛ Sa'onkia ũwa.
A náai vĩ Lua a dìlɛnaɛ, lá Mↄizi kuò Lua uawa.
Lá uakpana bɛɛɛ ìↄ dɛ uaa, màa Yesu gawi zↄ̃ↄ dɛ Mↄizi pↄ́a.
Ua píi a kpana vĩɛ, mɛ́ pↄ́pii Kalɛnan Lua ũ.
Mↄizi náai vĩ Lua ua zĩkɛna ũ yã́ pↄ́ a mↄ seela ũ.
Kilisi sↄ̃, uabelepi nɛ́ɛ. Luapi a ua nàɛ̀ aà ↄzĩɛ. Wámɛ wá uapi ũ, tó wá pↄ́ pↄ́ wá wɛ́ dↄi yã́ kũa ń sↄ̃o dilɛa ń pↄnao.
A yã́i lá Lua Nisĩna òwa, tó a Lua lↄↄ mà gbã,
ásu swã́gbãakɛ lá á deziↄ kɛ̀ aa ma yↄ̃ gↄↄ pↄ́ aa bↄ̀ ma kpɛ guwaiwaiuwao.
Baa kɛ́ aa ma yãkɛaↄ è wɛ̃̀ bla, aa ma yↄ̃ we, aa ma gbãa lɛgwà.
Ɔ̃ ma pↄ pà gbɛ̃́piↄzi, ma mɛ̀ aaìↄ pãalɛmɛɛ gↄↄpiiɛ, aa ma yã́ kũao.
Ɔ̃ má ò ń mazĩao ń pↄfɛ̃o ma mɛ̀, aa gɛ̃ ma kã́mabokĩiuo fá.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, à laaika á gbɛ̃e su àↄ sↄ̃̀ vãi luanaaikɛsai vĩ e aà gɛ kɛ̃ò Lua bɛ̃́ɛwao.
Gu pↄ́ ì dↄ, i mɛ gbã píi, àↄ lɛdakↄ̃wa, kɛ́ duuna su á gbɛ̃e sã́sã aà swã́ gbãakũo yã́i.
Asa Kilisi gbɛ̃́ↄn wá ũ, tó wá zɛa gbãa mɛ́ wá aà náai vĩ lá wá vĩ káauwa e a lɛ́wa.
Lá wa òwa, tó a Lua lↄↄ mà gbã, ásu swã́gbãakɛ lá á deziↄ kɛ̀ gↄↄ pↄ́ aa bↄ̀ ma kpɛwao.
Deↄ mɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa Lua lↄↄ mà aa bↄ̀ aà kpɛↄ ũi, mɛ́ i kɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Mↄizi ń bↄ́lɛ Egipiↄ bàasio?
Deↄ Lua pↄ pàńzi e wɛ̃̀ blai, mɛ́ i kɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa duunakɛ̀, an gɛ gↄ̃̀ kálɛ guwaiwaiuↄ bàasio?
Deↄ a ònɛ́ ń azĩao aa gɛ̃ a kã́mabokĩiuo ni, mɛ́ i kɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gì aà yãmaiↄ bàasio?
Wá è aai e gɛ̃̀uo an luanaaikɛsai yã́i.
Lá gɛ̃a kã́mabokĩiu lɛ́ pↄ́ Lua gbɛ̃̀ gì ku, wà laaika kɛ́ wá gbɛ̃e su kuawào.
Asa wa baona mà láńwaɛ. Yã́ pↄ́ aa màpi i àikɛnɛ́o, kɛ́ aai ma ń luanaaikɛaoo yã́i.
Wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wa yã́pi sìↄ, wi gɛ̃ kã́mabokĩi pↄ́ Lua a yã'ò guu à mɛ̀: Má ò ń mazĩao ń pↄfɛ̃o ma mɛ̀, aa gɛ̃ ma kã́mabokĩiuo. À yã́ bee ò, baa kɛ́ à a zĩ mìdɛ za dṹniakalɛgↄↄ,
asa wà gↄↄ soplade yã'ò guei wà mɛ̀, gↄↄ soplade zĩ́ Lua kã́mabò ń zĩ pↄ́ á kɛ̀o píi.
Wá mà tia à mɛ̀, aa gɛ̃ a kã́mabokĩiuo.
Lá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa baonapi mà káauↄ i gɛ̃uo kɛ́ aai sio yã́i, ↄ̃ a gɛ̃a gↄ̃̀ gbɛ̃pãleↄnɛ.
Ɔ̃ Lua ɛ̀a gↄↄdìlɛ lↄ wì mɛ gbã, asa à gɛ̃̀gɛ̃ a gbɛa ↄ̃ à Davidi gbà lɛ́ a ò lá wa ò tiawa, tó a Lua lↄↄ mà gbã, ásu swã́gbãakɛo.
Tó Yozuee gɛ̃̀ńnↄ kã́mabokĩipiu yãa, dↄ̃ Lua i gↄↄ pãle yã'o gbɛzão.
A yã́i tò kã́mabokĩi gↄ̃̀ Lua gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ.
Asa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gɛ̃̀ Lua kã́mabokĩiu kã́mabò ń a zĩoɛ, lá Lua kã́mabò ń a zĩowa.
Lá màaɛ, wà wɛtã wà gɛ̃ kã́mabokĩipiu, kɛ́ wá gbɛ̃e su gí Lua yãmai aà fu láńwao yã́i.
Lua yã́ bɛ̃́ɛ mɛ́ a gbãa, a lɛ́ na dɛ fɛ̃nda lɛkpɛplaa. Ì ń zↄ̃ à gɛ̃ nↄ̀sɛkpɛau e nisĩnau, ì gɛ̃ gupɛɛkĩiu e bↄ́ↄu, ì làasoo ń nↄ̀sɛ yã́o gwa.
Lua pↄkɛae ulɛaɛ̀o, a kee kpaaɛ̀ guio. Lua pↄ́ wá wá yã́ↄ sɛ́lɛ siuɛ̀, ì pↄ́pii e e a biwà.
Lá wá Sa'onkia zↄ̃ↄ pↄ́ luabɛ kɛ̃̀aa e Lua kĩ́iu vĩ Lua Nɛ́ Yesu ũ, wàↄ zɛ́ pↄ́ wá sɛ̀ yã́ kũa gíũgiũ.
Asa wá Sa'onkia pↄ́ a fↄ̃ wɛ̃nadↄ̃wɛ̃ɛ wá gbãasaikɛ guu vĩ. Wà aà yↄ̃̀ láwáwa yã́pii guu, i duunakɛo.
Ayãmɛto wà sↄ̃ Lua gbɛ̃kɛkɛnɛde kpalabaai ń sↄ̃o dilɛa, kɛ́ aà wá wɛgwa, i gbɛ̃kɛkɛwɛ̃ɛ a gↄↄwa.
Wì Lua ua sa'onkia píi sɛ́ gbɛ̃́ↄ guuɛ, wì aà dilɛ ń yãkɛkɛna ũ Lua kĩ́i, iↄ mↄɛ̀ ń gbaↄ, iↄ aà gbagbanɛ́ ń duuna yã́i.
A fↄ̃ dↄ̃ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa sã̀sã an dↄ̃saikɛ guuↄ, asa aàpi kú ń gbãasaikɛo sↄ̃ɛ.
A yã́i sema aà sa'o azĩa duuna yã́ musu, lá ì o gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ pↄ́ yã́ musuwa lↄ.
Gbɛ̃e lí azĩa kpa kpalapiuo. Lua mɛ́ ì aà kpá lá à Aalona kpàwa.
Màa sↄ̃ Kilisi i azĩa kpa sa'onkia kpalauo, Lua mɛ́ aà kpàu à mɛ̀: Ma Nɛ́n n ũ, n Maen ma ũ gbã.
A ò guei lↄ: Ńyↄ̃ↄ dɛ sa'ona ũ gↄↄpii lán Mɛkizɛdɛwaɛ.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ Yesu kú dṹnia guu, à wabikɛ̀ ń wii gbãao ń wɛ́'io, à kulɛkɛ̀ Lua pↄ́ a fↄ̃ à a si gawaɛ, ↄ̃ Luapi aà yãmà, kɛ́ ì a yã́ da yã́i.
Baa ń aà luanɛkɛo, à misiilɛa Luaɛ dàda a taasikɛa guu.
Kɛ́ maa pɛ̀ɛwà à làa, Lua aà kpà Sa'onkia ũ lán Mɛkizɛdɛwa, ↄ̃ à gↄ̃̀ suabaa láasai mi ũ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ a yãmaↄnɛ píi.
<range>
Yã́ bee musu wá yãvĩ dasi wà oɛ́, ãma a bↄↄlɛkɛa zĩ'ũɛ, asa ili yã́zɛdↄ̃ kpaa lↄo.
Á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a gɛ̃gɛ̃u kɛ́wa, a maa àↄ dɛ yãdanɛdeↄ ũɛ, ãma e tia á dɛ wà ɛa Lua yã́ pↄ́ wì dada gbɛ̃́ dafuↄnɛ daɛ́ lↄɛ. Yↄ̃́ mɛ́ kↄ̃sìánↄ, i ka yↄ̃unableao.
Asa yↄ̃mina píiá nɛ́ɛ, i ka guei yã́zɛde guuo.
Yↄ̃una sↄ̃, gbɛ̃́ kàsaa pↄ́ aa dↄ́ɛkɛ̀òↄ pↄ́ɛ. Aa maa dↄ̃akↄ̃ɛ ń vãio dàda.
Ayãmɛto wà Kilisi yã́ sɛ̃́iaↄ kpa saalo, wí gɛ́ aɛ e wà gↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ kàsaaↄ ũ. I kɛ wá ɛa mikɛ̃a yã́ gianaↄwa ge luanaaikɛa daalɛ lↄ no
ge da'ilɛ yãdadaa ge ↄnaama ge gɛↄ vua ge zia yã́kpalɛkɛa.
Wà yã́ beeↄ kpa saalo, wí gɛ́ aɛ, tó Lua wèi.
Asa tó gbɛ̃́ wɛ́ kɛ̃̀ à Lua gba è, mɛ́ à baa è Lua Nisĩna guu,
tó à Lua yã́ ń dṹnia pↄ́ lɛ́ mↄ́ gbãao ìɛ à a na dↄ̃̀,
tó à gbàsa fù, a zɛ́ kú à ɛa nↄ̀sɛlilɛ lↄo, asa àlɛ Lua Nɛ́ páliwa azĩa lↄɛ, àlɛ widawà gupuauɛ.
Tó lou lɛ́ ma tↄↄlɛwa mↄ̀ↄmↄↄ, àlɛ mↄ̀sɛ e, mɛ́ à pↄ́ pↄ́ àikɛ̀ sɛ̃̀wanaↄnɛ bↄ̀lɛ, Lua ì báaadau.
Tó lɛ ń lɛaao ì bↄlɛ sↄ̃, a giaɛ, a zã̀ ń lɛkɛaɛoo. A midɛ ń tɛ́oɛ.
Ápiↄ sↄ̃ ma gbɛ̃́ yenzideↄ, baa kɛ́ wá ò màa, wá dↄ̃ kɛ́ á kua dɛ beea, á kú suabazɛ guu.
Lua ì yãkɛ a zɛ́wa, á yãkɛaↄ ń á yeaaàzio a sãaàguo, asa a dↄnlɛkɛ̀ aà gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ, mɛ́ álɛ kɛ e tia.
Wá ye á baade àↄ ãiavĩ màa e a lɛ́wa, kɛ́ ásu seakɛ pↄ́ pↄ́ á wɛ́ dↄi yã́ musuo.
Ásu tó á mɛ kɛ kpɛ̀lɛo. À gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ Lua náaikɛ ń mɛnao aalɛ pↄ́ pↄ́ Lua a lɛgbɛ̃̀ eↄ ↄlɛsɛ́.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ Lua lɛ́ lɛgbɛ̃ Ablahaũɛ, lá gbɛ̃e ku dɛaàla aà lɛgbɛ̃ ń aà tↄ́oo, a yã́i a gbɛ̃̀ ń azĩa tↄ́o,
a òɛ̀ faaisai à mɛ̀ á báaadaaàgu, í to aà bui kↄ̃́.
Ablahaũ mɛnakɛ̀, ↄ̃ à pↄ́ pↄ́ Lua a lɛgbɛ̃̀ è.
Wì lɛgbɛ̃ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛńla tↄ́oɛ. Lɛgbɛ̃a mɛ́ ì to wà yã́ sĩana dↄ̃, mɛ́ ì lɛkpaa bↄaanɛ́.
Kɛ́ Lua ye ↄlↄ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a lɛgbɛ̃a a gↄ̃ ń pↄ́ ũↄnɛ wásawasa a lɛ́ lilɛa vĩo, ↄ̃ a ò ń azĩao.
Beewa yã́ mɛ̀n pla ku a lilɛa vĩo, Lua a fↄ̃ ɛɛto a musuo. Yã́piↄ lɛ́ wá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wa naaàziↄ gba sↄ̃ maamaaɛ wàↄ yã́ pↄ́ wá wɛ́ dↄi kũa seasai.
Bee ↄ̃ wá wɛ́ dↄi wá wɛ̃nidↄbↄ ũ. A náai vĩ mɛ́ a gbãa, ì zwãa pↄ́ daa Lua kpɛ́u baavĩwanↄ,
gu pↄ́ Yesu dↄ̀aa gɛ̃̀uwɛ̃ɛ à gↄ̃̀ Sa'onkia ũ e gↄↄpii lán Mɛkizɛdɛwa.
Mɛkizɛdɛpi dɛ yãa Salɛma kía, Lua Musude sa'ona ũɛ. Gↄↄ pↄ́ Ablahaũ zĩblè kíaↄwa, àlɛ su, ↄ̃ Mɛkizɛdɛ gɛ̀ dàaàlɛ, à báaadàaàgu.
Ablahaũ àizɛɛ pↄ́ àlɛ suò píi kwide kpàwà. Mɛkizɛdɛ tↄ́ bee mɛ̀ yãmaa kía. Bee gbɛa Salɛma kía bee mɛ̀, aafia kía.
A de ń dao ń deziↄ vĩo, aà wɛ̃ni daalɛa ge midɛa vĩo. À bↄ̀ lán Lua Nɛ́waɛ, sa'onan aà ũ gↄↄpii.
À gwa lá a zↄ̃ↄ. Wá dezi káau Ablahaũ àizɛɛ pↄ́ a sɛ̀lɛ zĩ guu kwide kpàwà.
Mↄizi ikoyã dìlɛ Levii bui pↄ́ dɛ sa'ona ũↄnɛ aa pↄ́ kwide sí ń Isaili deeↄwa, baa ń ń Ablahaũ buikɛo.
Mɛkizɛdɛá Levii bui no. Ń beeo à Ablahaũ pↄ́ↄ kwide sì à samaa'ò Ablahaũ pↄ́ Lua lɛgbɛ̃̀ɛ.
Seasai gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ samaa'ò gbɛ̃́ɛ zↄ̃ↄ dɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ à samaa'òɛlaɛ.
Sa'ona pↄ́ aaì pↄ́ kwide sipiↄá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì gaↄnɛ. Mɛkizɛdɛ sↄ̃, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wà mɛ̀ ìↄ ku gↄↄpiin aà ũ.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ Mɛkizɛdɛ gɛ̀ dà Ablahaũlɛ, wi Levii i yãao, a ku a dezi mae Ablahaũ plɛuɛ. Ayãmɛto wa fↄ̃ o se, gↄↄ pↄ́ Ablahaũ pↄ́ kwidepi kpà, Levii bui pↄ́ wì pↄ́ kwide kpámáↄ mɛ́ kpà.
<range>
Levii bui sa'onapiↄ mɛ́ Mↄizi ikoyã zĩ́na ũ. Tó aa fↄ̃ to gbɛ̃́ↄ gↄ̃ wásawasa, an bàa àↄ kú ń sa'on pãleo lán Mɛkizɛdɛwa lↄe? Mɛ́ i kɛ Aalona bui bàasio.
Tó sa'onaↄ lìlɛ, sema ikoyã lilɛ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wà yã́ beeↄ ò aà yã́ musuá Isaili bui pↄ́ a gbɛ̃e i sa'ozĩ kɛ yãaoɛ.
Asa wá dↄ̃ sã́asã kɛ́ wá Dii bↄ̀ Yuda bui guuɛ. Wi ma Mↄizi sa'oyã'ò buipi musuo.
Yã́ pↄ́ yã́pi zu'òn kɛ: Sa'on pãle bↄ̀ lán Mɛkizɛdɛwaɛ.
Aà dilɛaá ikoyã ge buikɛyã no. Aà wɛ̃ni láasai gbãa yã́iɛ.
Asa wà mɛ̀: Ńyↄ̃ↄ dɛ sa'ona ũ gↄↄpii lán Mɛkizɛdɛwaɛ.
Màa wà yã́ káau bãdɛ̀, kɛ́ a gbãao mɛ́ a ku a kee lɛ́io.
Asa Mↄizi ikoyã i to gbɛ̃e gↄ̃̀ wásawasao. Ɔ̃ wà suabayã pↄ́ dɛ a káaula zɛbↄ̀wɛ̃ɛ wà sↄ̃ò Luazi.
Bee gbɛa Lua i bee kɛ lɛgbɛ̃saio. Gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄ gↄ̃̀ sa'onaↄ ũ lɛgbɛ̃saiɛ,
ãma Yesu gↄ̃̀ sa'ona ũ ń lɛgbɛ̃aoɛ, asa wà mɛ̀: Dii lɛgbɛ̃̀, a lɛlilɛo, à mɛ̀ ńyↄ̃ↄ dɛ sa'ona ũ gↄↄpiiɛ.
Beewa Yesu kpɛ́gaausìwɛ̃ɛ kɛ́ Lua bàa kua ń gbɛ̃́ↄ tia maa dɛ a káaua.
Bee gbɛa sa'onaↄ dasi yãa, kɛ́ ga lí to aaↄ kú ń zĩ guu gↄↄpiio yã́i.
Ãma lá Yesu ìↄ ku gↄↄpii, aà sa'onkɛ gɛ̃ɛblea vĩo.
A yã́i tò a fↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaì sↄ̃ Luazi ń a gbãaoↄ suaba wásawasa, asa ìↄ ku gↄↄpiiɛ, ìↄ kulɛkɛnɛ́ Luaɛ.
Sa'onkia bee taa mɛ́ kↄ̃sìwanↄ. Aà kua adoaɛ. A yãvãi ge gbãsĩ vĩo. Lua aà kɛ̃̀ duunkɛnaↄwa, à aà sɛ̀ musumusu e a kĩ́i.
Aà bàa kú ń sa'oa lá gu lɛ́ dↄo lán sa'onkia kĩniↄwao. Gbɛ̃́piↄ ì sa'o ńzĩa duuna yã́i ń ń gbɛ̃́ↄ pↄ́ↄ. Aàpi sↄ̃ a kɛ̀ gɛ̃n doɛ, kɛ́ à azĩa kpà.
Mↄizi ikoyã ì gbɛ̃́ↄ kpa sa'onkiaↄ ũ an gbãasaikɛ guuɛ, ãma kɛ́ Lua lɛgbɛ̃̀ ikoyãpi dilɛa gbɛa, ↄ̃ à a Nɛ́ pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ wásawasa e gↄↄpii kpà.
Yã́ pↄ́ wálɛ o min kɛ: Wá sa'onkia bee taa vĩ zↄ̃lɛa báawa musu Lua Zↄ̃ↄde ↄplaai.
Ì zĩkɛ luakukĩi zwã̀akpɛ sĩana pↄ́ Dii dↄ̀u, i kɛ pↄ́ pↄ́ gbɛ̃nazĩnaↄ dↄ̀ no.
Lá mↄa ń gbaↄ ń sa'oao yã́i wì sa'onkia píi kpái, a maa aàpi aàↄ pↄ́ vĩ à kpa sↄ̃ɛ.
Tó a ku dṹniau, àↄ dɛ sa'ona ũo, asa sa'ona pↄ́ aaì mↄ́ ń gbaↄ lá ikoyã dìlɛwaↄ ku kↄ̀.
Zĩ pↄ́ aalɛ kɛá pↄ́ pↄ́ kú musu taaɛ, a zↄzↄnaɛ. A yã́i tò, kɛ́ Mↄizi ye zwã̀akpɛ dↄ, Lua òɛ̀ aà pↄ́ pↄ́ a a taa kɛ̀ɛ̀ gbɛ musu kɛ màa píi.
Yesuá Lua bàakuawanↄ kↄ́ↄɛ. Lá Lua bàakuawanↄpi gbia dɛ aà bàa kua ń gbɛ̃́ↄ káaua, zĩ pↄ́ wa dàɛ̀ gbia dɛ sa'onkiapiↄ pↄ́a. Lua bàakuawanↄpi lɛgbɛ̃a dɛ a zia lↄ.
Tó Luabaakuańnↄ káaupi papaa yãaɛ, a plaade a zɛkɛo.
Kɛ́ Dii Isailiↄ tàae è, à mɛ̀: A gↄↄ lɛ́ mↄ́ kɛ́ má yã́ dafu dilɛ ma bàa kua ń Isailiↄ ń Yudaↄ musu.
Aↄ dɛ lán yã́ pↄ́ má dìlɛ an deziↄnɛ gↄↄ pↄ́ ma ń kṹ ń ↄwa ma ń bↄ́lɛ Egipiwao. Asa aai zɛ ń yã́ pↄ́ má dìlɛnɛ́oo, ↄ̃ ma ń tó we.
Ma bàa kua ń Isailiↄ gↄↄ beeↄ gbɛa yã́n kɛ: Má a ikoyãↄ danɛ́ ń nↄ̀sɛ guu, má kɛ̃́ ń sↄ̃wa. Máↄ dɛ ń Lua ũ, aaiↄ dɛ ma gbɛ̃́ↄ ũ.
An gbɛ̃e a yãdada a deeɛo, an gbɛ̃e a ma dↄ̃a da a gbɛ̃́ɛo, asa ampii aaↄ ma dↄ̃ɛ, nɛ́fɛ̃nɛn gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄ píi.
Má sùuukɛńnↄ ń ń tàaeↄ, má ń duuna yãda lↄo.
Kɛ́ Lua yã́ dafupi ò, à a káau zibòɛ. Pↄ́ pↄ́ zikũ̀ a í kↄ̀lɛ, a kpaa gui zã̀o.
Luabaakuańnↄ káau yãdilɛaↄ vĩ aà sísia ń aà sísikĩi pↄ́ kú tↄↄlɛo yã́ musu.
Filia ń táabũnu pↄ́ wì kàa kálɛwà Luaɛo ku kpɛɛlɛ pↄ́ wì mɛ gu pↄ́ a kua adoau.
Kpɛa pↄ́ wì mɛ luakukĩipi ku zwã̀a plaade kpɛ.
A guu tulaletikatɛakĩi pↄ́ wa pì ń vuao kuu ń Luabaakuańnↄ kpagolo pↄ́ vua kúlɛwà búlubuluo. Vua lo pↄ́ mana ku a guu ku kpagolopi guu ń Aalona go pↄ́ labↄ̀o ń Lua yãdilɛa gbɛ̀ pɛ̀pɛɛↄ.
Kpagolopi musu malaika gã̀sĩade gawideↄ kua duunkɛ̃makĩia. Pↄ́piↄ bↄↄlɛkɛa dodo gↄↄn lao.
An kálɛa màa guu, sa'onaↄ ìↄ gɛ̃ a kpɛɛlɛ mↄ̀ↄmↄↄ ń sa'ozĩ kɛi.
Sa'onkia mɛ́ ì gɛ̃ a kpɛa wɛ̃̀ do gɛ̃n do, mɛ́ ìli gɛ̃ ausaio. Ì aupi fã́fã azĩa duuna yã́i ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ pↄ́ pↄ́ aa kɛ̀ dↄ̃saikɛ guuo.
Lua Nisĩna lɛ́ ↄlↄwɛ̃ɛ gↄↄ pↄ́ kpɛ́pi kpɛɛlɛ yã́ kú, luakukĩi zɛ́ wɛ̃ao.
Bee lɛ́ yãlɛɛũwɛ̃ɛ ń tia yã́o à mɛ̀, pↄ́ pↄ́ wì Lua gbaↄ ń sa'obↄ pↄ́ wì kpaↄ lí fↄ̃ ń nↄ̀sɛ dànɛ́ doũ wásawasao.
Yã́ beeↄá mɛkaa yã́ɛ. Pↄblea ń imiao ń gbãbↄa bui dasio yã́ɛ. Wa dìlɛ e zɛ́ dafu gↄↄ àↄ kaɛ.
Ɔ̃ Kilisi mↄ̀ yãmaa pↄ́ kà tia sa'onkia ũ. À vĩ̀ zwã̀akpɛ pↄ́ zↄ̃ↄ mɛ́ a wásawasa dɛ a káaua kpɛɛlɛa. Gbɛ̃nazĩna mɛ́ i dↄo, dṹniaɛ bee pↄ́ no.
I gɛ̃ luakukĩi ń ble ge zu auoo, à gɛ̃̀ ń azĩa auo gɛ̃n doɛ, à gbɛ̃́ↄ bòò e gↄↄpii.
Lá wì ble ń zuswanao au ń zununu túfuo fã gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gbãlɛ̀ↄwa wà gbãbↄnɛ́,
wa Kilisi pↄ́ o lↄe? À azĩa kpà Luawa sãasai ń Nisĩna pↄ́ ìↄ ku gↄↄpii gbãao. Aà au ì wá sↄ̃ pípiwɛ̃ɛ yã́ gianaↄ làasoo musu, kɛ́ wà zĩkɛ Lua bɛ̃́ɛɛ.
Ayãmɛto Kilisiá Lua bàa kua ń gbɛ̃́ↄ gbɛzã kↄ́ↄɛ, kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua ń sisiↄ àizãna pↄ́ à a lɛgbɛ̃̀ e yã́i. À gà kɛ́ à ń bo, i tàae pↄ́ aa kɛ̀ Luabaakuańnↄ káau yã́ musuↄ kɛ̃́má.
Tó wa ye zĩkɛ lɛgbɛ pↄ́ gbɛ̃́ dilɛwa, sema wà dↄ̃ kɛ́ ade ku lↄo,
asa ga gbɛa ↄ̃ lɛgbɛ ìↄ gbãa vĩ. Tó lɛgbɛdilɛna bɛ̃́ɛ, lɛgbɛ líↄ gbãao.
Ayãmɛto wà yã́ pↄ́ Lua dìlɛnɛ́ káaupi sakɛ̃̀ ń auo.
Kɛ́ Mↄizi ikoyã pↄ́ Lua dìlɛↄ ò gbɛ̃́pii wáa, à sãkã tɛ̃a ń ése ṹao sɛ zↄ̃̀ gáaena ń blesanao au yãalɛa ń íowa, a fã̀ Mↄizi ikoyãwa ń gbɛ̃nazĩnaↄ píi
à mɛ̀ bee mɛ́ Luabaakuańnↄ yã́ sa'o'au ũ.
Màa Mↄizi au fã̀ zwã̀akpɛwa ń sa'o zĩkɛbↄↄ píi.
Ikoyã guu au mɛ́ ì gbãbↄ pↄ́ daside píiɛ. Aubↄlɛsai duunakɛ̃amá kuo.
Lá à kũ̀ wà gbãbↄ pↄ́ pↄ́ kú luabɛ taapiↄnɛ beewa, sa'obↄ pↄ́ a maa dɛ beea kↄ̃sì ń luabɛ pↄ́piↄɛ.
Asa Kilisi i gɛ̃ luakukĩi taa pↄ́ gbɛ̃nazĩna dↄ̀uo, à gɛ̃̀ a sĩanau luabɛɛ, kɛ́ àↄ ku tia wá Zɛnnↄde ũ Lua kĩ́iɛ.
Sa'onkia ì gɛ̃ luakukĩi ń pↄtuo auo wɛ̃ ń wɛ̃oɛ, ãma Kilisi i gɛ̃ azĩa kpaa mↄ̀ↄmↄↄ yã́io.
Tó beewaɛ, dↄ̃ àlɛ taasikɛ mↄ̀ↄmↄↄ za dṹniakalɛgↄↄ. Sĩana guu à mↄ̀ gɛ̃n doɛ gↄↄ pↄ́ dṹnia kà a kákĩi, à azĩa kpà sa'obↄ ũ à duuna mìdɛò.
Lá Lua dìlɛ gbɛ̃nazĩna lí ga gɛ̃n do, i gbasa yã́kpalɛkɛaànↄ,
màa Kilisi azĩa kpà gɛ̃n do, à dasi duuna dì a miwa. A ɛa mↄ a gɛ̃n plaadei, i kɛ duuna yã́n lↄo, kɛ́ à gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ an wɛ́ dↄaziↄ suaba yã́iɛ.
Mↄizi ikoyãá yãmaa pↄ́ lɛ́ mↄ́ nisĩnaɛ, i kɛ yã́piɛ súsuo. A yã́i tò sa doũpi oa mↄ̀ↄmↄↄ wɛ̃ ń wɛ̃o lí fↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ sↄ̃ Luaziↄ gↄ̃̀ wásawasa bauo.
Tó sa bee oa gbãbↄ̀ lousisinaↄnɛ gɛ̃n do e gↄↄpiiɛ, dↄ̃ an nↄ̀sɛ dàdoũ, aa a oa tò.
Sĩana guu sa'oapi mɛ́ ìↄ gbɛ̃́ↄ duuna yã́ dↄńgu wɛ̃ ń wɛ̃o.
Asa zuswana ń blesanao au lí fↄ̃ duunakɛ̃̀má bauo.
A yã́i tò, kɛ́ Kilisi lɛ́ mↄ́ dṹnia guu, a ò Luaɛ: Ń ye sa'oa ge gbaio, ↄ̃ n mɛ dↄ̀mɛɛ.
Sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũ ń sa pↄ́ wì o duuna yã́ musuo lí kánguo.
Ɔ̃ ma mɛ̀, má kɛ́! Lua, ma mↄ n pↄeã kɛiɛ, lá wa kɛ̃̀ Mↄizi ikoyãu ma yã́ musuwa.
A ò gĩa, sa'oa ń gbao ń sa pↄ́ wì a pↄ́ kátɛu à tɛ́kũo ń sa pↄ́ wì o duuna yã́ musuo lí ká Luaguo, a yeio, baa kɛ́ ikoyã mɛ́ dìlɛ.
Ɔ̃ à gbàsa mɛ̀, á kɛ́, a mↄ aà pↄeã kɛiɛ. Màa à a káau bãdɛ̀ a plaade dilɛa yã́i.
Lua pↄeãpi kɛa guu Yesu Kilisi azĩa kpà sa'obↄ ũ gɛ̃n do, a tò wá kua adoa Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ ũ.
Gↄↄpii sa'onaↄ ìↄ kú ń zĩ guuɛ, aaↄ sa doũ pↄ́ lí fↄ̃ duunakɛ̃̀má bauo o mↄ̀ↄmↄↄ.
Kilisi sↄ̃ à sa'ò duuna yã́ musu gɛ̃n doɛ e gↄↄpii, ↄ̃ à gɛ̀ zↄ̃̀lɛ Lua ↄplaai.
Za gↄↄ bee àlɛ dã́ we e Lua àↄ a ibɛɛↄ kɛɛ aà gbadibↄ ũ.
Asa sa gɛ̃n do oapi guu, a tò gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a gbãbↄ̀nɛ́ↄ gↄ̃̀ wásawasa e gↄↄpii.
Lua Nisĩna lɛ́ yã́pi owɛ̃ɛ lↄ à mɛ̀:
Ma bàakuańnↄ gↄↄ beeↄ gbɛa yã́n kɛ: Má a ikoyãↄ danɛ́ ń nↄ̀sɛ guu, má kɛ̃́ ń sↄ̃wa.
Ɔ̃ à gbàsa mɛ̀: Má ń duuna ń ń tàaeↄ yãda lↄo.
Lá à ń duuna kɛ̃̀má, sa'oa ń yã́i zɛvĩ lↄo.
A yã́i tò ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, ń Yesu au gbãao wá gɛ̃a luakukĩi zɛ́ vĩ ń sↄ̃o dilɛa.
À wɛ̃ni zɛ́ dafu pↄ́ Lua kpɛ́ zwãa baa vĩ̀ bↄ̀wɛ̃ɛ a mɛ guu.
Lá wá sa'on zↄ̃ↄ vĩ Lua uakũna ũ,
wà sↄ̃ Luazi ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo ń aà náaikɛa seasaio ń sↄ̃ pↄ́ wa pìpi wà làasoo vãi bↄ̀uo ń mɛ pↄ́ wà a zu'ò ń í wásawasaoo.
Wàↄ zia'ea yã́ pↄ́ wa zɛò kũa sↄ̃̀deedeesai, asa Lua a lɛgbɛ̃̀, mɛ́ náaideɛ.
Wà laaidↄkↄ̃wa, wí tɛ́kpakↄ̃u yeakↄ̃i ń maakɛao yã́ musu.
Wásu pãkpa wá kↄ̃kãaakɛai lá gbɛ̃eↄ ì kɛwao. Wà lɛdakↄ̃wa, atɛ̃sa lá á è Dii mↄgↄↄ lɛ́ kãikũ.
Tó wa sĩana mà mɛ́ wá dↄ̃̀, tó wa gi lɛ́ duunakɛ, sa'oae ku à duunakɛ̃wá lↄo.
Pↄ́ pↄ́ gↄ̃̀wɛ̃ɛ mɛ́ dɛ yã́kpalɛ ń sↄ̃kɛ̃nguo ń tɛ́ gbãa pↄ́ a Lua ibɛɛↄ kaalɛo dãa ũ.
Wì gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gì Mↄizi ikoyã dai dɛ aà wɛgwasai gbɛ̃ↄn pla ge àaↄ̃ seeladekɛ musu.
Tó gbɛ̃́ ↄ̃zↄ̃̀ Lua Nɛ́wa mɛ́ à Luabaakuańnↄ au pↄ́ gbãbↄ̀ɛ gwà foooũ, mɛ́ à Nisĩn gbɛ̃kɛkɛnɛde sↄ̃̀sↄ̃, àↄ dↄ̃ kɛ́ wa ĩadawà zↄ̃ↄ dɛ beea maamaa.
Asa wá yã́ɛbee'ona dↄ̃ à mɛ̀, ámɛ á tↄsimá, ámɛ á fĩabonɛ́. Wa ò lↄ, Dii a yã́kpalɛkɛ ń a gbɛ̃́ↄ.
Lɛ́lɛ daa Lua bɛ̃́ɛ ↄuá yãpãsĩɛ.
À làasookɛ á kua yãawa. Á wɛ́kɛ̃a gbɛa a taasi fↄ̃̀ á dɛ̃ɛ zↄ̃ↄ kaa guu.
Zĩeↄ wì á sↄ̃́sↄ̃, wì á wɛtã dasi guu. Zĩeↄ i zɛ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wàlɛ ń wɛtã màaↄ.
A wɛ̃nadↄ̃̀ dakpɛunaↄnɛ. Kɛ́ wà á pↄ́ↄ sìwá, a zɛò ń pↄnao, asa á dↄ̃ kɛ́ á àizɛɛ maa pↄ́ ìↄ ku gↄↄpii vĩ.
A yã́i tò ásu to sea gɛ̃ wↄ́ↄ pↄ́ ài vĩɛ́ zↄ̃ↄ guuo.
Sema àↄ mɛna vĩ, í pↄ́ pↄ́ Lua a lɛgbɛ̃̀ e aà pↄeã kɛa gbɛa.
Asa à gↄ̃̀ yↄↄɛ, a gɛ̃gɛ̃o, kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ mↄ́ pila.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ má tò yã́ bↄ̀aànↄ na ma náai pↄ́ àlɛ kɛ yã́i aↄ ku, ãma tó à pↄ̀ↄbↄzãkɛ̀, a kamaguo.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaì pↄ̀ↄbↄzãkɛ aa ńzĩa kaalɛↄn wá ũo. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ Lua náaikɛ aa àizãna eↄn wá ũ.
Luanaaikɛa mɛ́ wɛdↄaaàzi seasai ũ. A dɛ yã́ pↄ́ wìli wɛsiɛo sia sĩana ũ ũɛ.
Gbɛ̃́ káauↄ luanaaikɛa mɛ́ tò Lua ń sáaukpà.
Wá luanaaikɛa mɛ́ tò wá dↄ̃ kɛ́ aà yã'oa mɛ́ dṹnia kàlɛ. Pↄ́ pↄ́ wìli wɛsiɛo ↄ̃ à pↄ́ pↄ́ wì wɛsiɛ kɛ̀ò.
Abɛli luanaaikɛa mɛ́ tò aà sa'oa Luawa maa dɛ̀ Kainu pↄ́a. Aà luanaaikɛa yã́i Lua aà sáaukpà, à aà dìlɛ gbɛ̃maa ũ, ↄ̃ à aà gba sì. Baa ń aà gaao, àlɛ yã'owɛ̃ɛ e tia Lua náai pↄ́ a kɛ̀pi yã́i.
Ɛnↄki luanaaikɛa mɛ́ tò Lua aà sɛ̀, kɛ́ asu gao yã́i. Wi aà e lↄo, kɛ́ Lua aà sɛ̀ yã́i. E Lua àↄ aà sɛ́, à aà sáaukpà à mɛ̀ aà yã́ kàagu.
Gbɛ̃e yã́ lí ká Luagu aà náaikɛsaio. Sema gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ sↄ̃aàzi si kɛ́ a ku, mɛ́ ì fĩabo a kĩ́i wɛ̀ɛlɛnaↄnɛ.
Kɛ́ Lua lɛdà Nↄeewa yã́ pↄ́ wi e yãao musu, ↄ̃ à Lua náaikɛ̀ à aà yãmà, à gó'ilɛna kɛ̀ à a uadeↄ mìsiò. Aà luanaaikɛa mɛ́ tò yã́ zↄ̃̀lɛ dṹniawa, mɛ́ Lua tò yã́ bↄ̀aànↄ na a náai pↄ́ a kɛ̀pi yã́i.
Kɛ́ Lua Ablahaũ sìsi aà gɛ́ bùsu pↄ́ á kpawà aàↄ vĩ guu, ↄ̃ Ablahaũ Lua náaikɛ̀ à Lua yã́pi sì. Kɛ́ à bↄ̀ bɛ, a gu pↄ́ àlɛ gɛ́upi dↄ̃ zio.
À Lua náaikɛ̀, ↄ̃ à bɛkpà bùsu pↄ́ Lua a lɛgbɛ̃̀ɛpiu nibↄ ũ zwã̀akpɛde ũ. Màa Izaaki ń Yakↄbuo lↄ, asa Lua lɛgbɛ̃api gↄ̃̀ ń pↄ́ ũɛ.
Asa wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ Lua dɛ a kũna ũ a kalɛna ũ ìↄ zɛdↄa ↄ̃ Ablahaũ wɛ́ dↄi.
Sala luanaaikɛa mɛ́ tò a è nↄsì, baa kɛ́ fĩiɛ mɛ́ à zikũ̀, asa a dↄ̃̀ Lua pↄ́ lɛgbɛ̃̀ɛpi náai vĩ.
Baa kɛ́ à zikũ̀, gↄ̃ɛ mɛ̀ndopi buikɛ̀ dasi lán saanaↄ ge ísialɛ ũfãawa, wa fↄ̃ dↄdↄo.
Gbɛ̃́piↄ gàga píi ń luanaaikɛa guu pↄ́ pↄ́ à a lɛgbɛ̃̀nɛ́ↄ esai. Aa è kãaa aa gbãakpài. Aa mɛ̀ nibↄ bↄ̀mↄↄn ń ũ tↄↄlɛ la.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ o màaↄ lɛ́ ↄlↄwɛ̃ɛ wàlɛ ń de bɛ nidɛɛ.
Tó bùsu pↄ́ aa bↄ̀u bɛɛ aalɛ kɛ, dↄ̃ aa zɛ'è aa ɛ̀a tà we.
Sĩana guu aalɛ bùsu pↄ́ a maa dɛ beea ya luabɛɛ. A yã́i tò, tó wà mɛ̀ Lua dɛ ń Lua ũ, ìli kɛ Luapiɛ wí ũo, asa à wɛ̃́lɛ kɛ̀kɛnɛ́.
Kɛ́ Lua Ablahaũ lɛ̀ a gwà, ↄ̃ Ablahaũ Lua náaikɛ̀ à Izaaki kpà sa'obↄ ũ. Lua lɛgbɛ̃̀ɛ̀ yãa à mɛ̀ Izaaki kĩ́i aà bui a bↄu. Ń beeo à zɛ̀ ń a nɛ́ mɛ̀ndonapi kpaao.
<range>
A è Lua gbãa a fↄ̃ gɛↄ vu, ↄ̃ à ɛ̀a Izaaki è a yáasi ũ.
Izaaki Lua náaikɛ̀, ↄ̃ à Yakↄbu ń Esauo gbà sa'olɛ.
Yakↄbu Lua náaikɛ̀. Kɛ́ à kà gaa, ↄ̃ à gbãa'è a gopanawa, à kùlɛ Yosɛfu nɛ́ↄ gbà sa'olɛ.
Yosɛfu Lua náaikɛ̀. Kɛ́ a ye gai, ↄ̃ à Isailiↄ bↄa Egipi yã'ò ń lá aa kɛ ń a gɛoo.
Mↄizi de ń aà dao Lua náaikɛ̀, ↄ̃ aa aà ùlɛ e mↄ àaↄ̃ aà ia gbɛa, kɛ́ aa è a kɛfɛũ yã́i. Aai vĩakɛ iko pↄ́ kía dìlɛɛo.
Mↄizi Lua náaikɛ̀. Kɛ́ à zↄ̃ↄkũ̀, ↄ̃ à gì wà a dilɛ Falaↄ̃ↄ nɛnↄɛ nɛ́ ũ.
A sì wà a wɛtã ń Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ dɛ kua ń pↄnao duuna guu gↄↄplala.
A dìlɛ kɛ́ wí pↄ́ wì damá Kilisi yã́i dɛ Egipi àizɛɛa, asa zia asea aà wɛ́ pɛ́wà.
Aà luanaaikɛa mɛ́ tò à bↄ̀ Egipi, i vĩakɛ kía pↄkũmaɛo, à zɛ̀ gíũgiũ lá à Lua pↄ́ wìli e ń wɛ́oo èwa.
Aà luanaaikɛa mɛ́ tò à Gɛ̃amusu dikpɛ dìlɛ ń aumamaa kpɛɛlɛ gĩↄwao, kɛ́ gbɛ̃dɛna su ↄkã ń nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́iaↄwao yã́i.
Isailiↄ Lua náaikɛ̀ aa bùa Ísia Tɛ̃awa lán tↄↄlɛ giiwa. Kɛ́ Egipiↄ yↄ̃̀wà màa, ↄ̃ í kũ̀aamá.
Isailiↄ Lua náaikɛ̀ aa lìa Yelikoi e gↄↄ sopla, ↄ̃ a bĩ́i kwɛ̀.
Káalua Lahabu Lua náaikɛ̀ à zãmadeↄ dìlɛ niɛniɛ, ↄ̃ i kaalɛ ń luanaaikɛnsaiↄo.
Má o kpelewa lↄ ni? Má zɛ'e mà Gedeↄ̃ↄ yã'oo ge Balaku ge Sãusↄ̃ↄ ge Zɛfɛte ge Davidi ge Samuɛli ge ãnabiↄ.
Aa Lua náaikɛ̀, ↄ̃ aa zĩblè kíaↄwa, aa yãgↄ̃̀gↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ a zɛ́wa, aa lɛ́ pↄ́ Lua gbɛ̃̀nɛ́ gbɛ'è, aa nↄ̀ↄmusuↄ lɛ́ nàaa,
aa tɛ́ pãsĩ dɛ̀, aa bↄ̀ fɛ̃nda lɛ́zĩ, aa gbãa'è ń yɛ̃̀ɛɛsaikɛ guu, aa pãsĩkũ̀ zĩ guu, aa buipãle zĩgↄ̃ↄ yà,
aa nↄɛↄ nɛ́ gɛↄ vù aa kpàmá. Wà ĩakpà ń gbɛ̃eↄzi, ↄ̃ aa gì bↄkĩi wɛɛlɛi, kɛ́ aa vu, aai bↄ maa yã́i.
Wà ń gbɛ̃eↄ kɛ̀ pↄ́ↄpↄↄ wà ń gbɛ̃́ ń flàalao. Wà mↄkà ń gbɛ̃eↄwa wà ń ká kpɛ́u.
Wà ń papa ń gbɛo wà ń dɛdɛ, wà ń zↄ̃ɛ pla ń siio, wà ń dɛdɛ ń fɛ̃ndao. Aa bɛ̀bɛ sã báa ń blè báao daa. Aa gↄ̃̀ gii, wà ń wɛtã̀ wà ĩadàmá.
Dṹnia i ká ń ũo. Aa lìaaliaa sɛ̃u ń gbɛ̀sĩsĩↄ musuo, aa ku gbɛ̀'ɛↄ ń tↄ̃ↄↄ guu.
Baa kɛ́ Lua gbɛ̃́piↄ sáaukpà ḿpii a náai pↄ́ aa kɛ̀ yã́i, aai pↄ́ pↄ́ à a lɛgbɛ̃̀nɛ́ eo,
kɛ́ aasu gↄ̃ wásawasa wá saio yã́i. Lua dↄ̀aa dìlɛ wà yã́ pↄ́ a maa dɛ ń pↄ́a eɛ.
Ayãmɛto wápiↄ sↄ̃, lá seeladeↄ gupàwázi dasi màa, wà ↄkpa pↄ́ pↄ́ ì kpáwɛ̃ɛzi ń duuna pↄ́ ì kpàlikpawɛ̃ɛ àannↄo píi, wí bakpaaĩ pↄ́ Lua dìlɛwɛ̃ɛ kɛ ń mɛnao.
Wà wɛ́pɛ Yesuwa. Ɔ̃mɛ bↄ̀ ń wá luanaaikɛa zɛ́o mɛ́ à bↄ̀lɛi. À gaa líwa fↄ̃̀, i a wíyã dao pↄna pↄ́ dilɛaɛ ea yã́i, ↄ̃ à gɛ̀ zↄ̃̀lɛ báawa Lua ↄplaai.
À làasookɛ aà yã́wa, lá à mɛnakɛ̀ ń duunkɛna pↄ́ íbɛlɛ bee taa sɛ̀anↄↄ, kɛ́ ásu kpasa á kúsu kwɛ́o yã́i.
Asa á dɛ̃ɛkaa ń duunao guu, i zɛ gi e a gɛ gaò yãao.
Nↄ̀sɛ níniyã pↄ́ wa òɛ́ lá á dɛ nɛ́ↄ ũwaɛ bee sã̀águ yã̀? Wà mɛ̀: Ma nɛ́, tó Dii lɛ́ n toto, ńsu dilɛ pão. Tó àlɛ n gba laai, ńsu to n kã́ gao.
Asa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Dii yei ↄ̃ ì toto, ì gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a sì a nɛ́ ũ swã́gaga.
À ĩadama dilɛ totoa ũ. Lua mɛ́ lɛ́ bee kɛɛ́, kɛ́ á dɛ aà nɛ́ↄ ũ yã́i. Nɛ́e ku aà mae gì aà totoia?
Tó i á toto lá a nɛ́ kĩniↄwao, á dɛ aà nɛ́ↄ ũo, gĩnasↄↄnɛↄn á ũ.
Wá dṹnia la maeↄ vĩ aa wá toto, ↄ̃ wa ń yãmà. Lá màaɛ, wà misiilɛ wá Mae pↄ́ kú musuɛ dɛ beea, wíↄ ku.
Wá maeↄ wá toto gↄↄpla pↄ́ ũ an ↄ̃nↄ lɛ́u. Lua ì wá toto wá kã́fĩa yã́iɛ, kɛ́ wá kua e àↄ adoa láawa.
Totoae líↄ pↄna vĩ a gↄↄo, pↄsia bàasio, ãma gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ totoapi ń kɛkɛↄ ì a gbɛ'e zã́ bↄa maa ń nↄ̀sɛdaadoũo ũ.
Ayãmɛto à á ↄ pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ dↄáziↄ ń á gbá pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ tèeeↄ gba gbãa,
í zɛ́sɛ súsu, kɛ́ á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ tↄ̃ↄlɛↄ su pãalɛo, aai e gↄ̃ ń aafiao.
À wɛɛlɛ àↄ na ń gbɛ̃́piio, á kua iↄ adoa, asa tó gbɛ̃́ kua adoao, a Dii eo.
À laaika á gbɛ̃e su kua Lua gbɛ̃kɛkɛanɛ́wa aà gↄ̃ á guu kona ũ, i ĩada gbɛ̃́ dasiↄwa à ń ↄ̃̀ↄkpao.
Á gbɛ̃e su àↄ dɛ gbãsĩkɛna ũ ge luayãdansai ũ lán Esauwao. À a yoakɛzɛ yìa blɛ gɛ̃n do blea yã́i.
Á dↄ̃ kɛ́ à sa'olɛ wɛ̀ɛlɛ a maewa gbɛzã, ↄ̃ Lua gìɛ̀. Baa kɛ́ a wɛ̀ɛlɛ ń wɛ́'io, i zɛ'e à yã́ pↄ́ á kɛ̀ lìlɛo.
I sↄ̃ Sinai gbɛ̀sĩsĩ pↄ́ wa fↄ̃ ↄkãwàzio. Àlɛ tɛ́kũ, a gusia vĩ ń guduuduuo ń zàao
ń kã̀ae'ↄo ń Lua lↄↄ gbãao. Kɛ́ Isailiↄ lↄↄpi mà, aa awakpàɛ̀ aa mɛ̀, asu yãe onɛ́ lↄo,
asa aa yã́ pↄ́ a dìlɛnɛ́ɛ bee fↄ̃o à mɛ̀: Baa pↄtuo kã̀ gbɛ̀sĩsĩpiwa, wà pápa ń gbɛo wà dɛ.
Lua pilaapiá vĩa yã́ɛ maamaa e Mↄizi mɛ̀ vĩa a kũ, álɛ lualua.
A sↄ̃ Siↄna gbɛ̀sĩsĩi ń Lua bɛ̃́ɛ wɛ̃́lɛ Yelusalɛũ pↄ́ kú musuo ń a malaika dasidasi pↄ́ kãaaa weↄ
ń Lua nɛgↄ̃ɛ sɛ̃́ia pↄ́ an tↄ́ kɛ̃a weↄ ń Lua pↄ́ dɛ gbɛ̃́pii yã́kpalɛkɛna ũo ń gbɛ̃maa pↄ́ aa gↄ̃̀ wásawasa gyaadeↄ
ń Yesu pↄ́ dɛ Luabaakuańnↄ gbɛzã kↄ́ↄ ũo ń aà au fã́fãa pↄ́ lɛ́ yã́ gbia o dɛ Abɛli pↄ́ao.
À laaika, ásu gí yã́pi maio. Lá gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa gì Lua lɛdama mai tↄↄlɛ lapiↄ i bↄo, wápiↄ sↄ̃, lá Lua lɛ́ lɛdawá kua za musu, tó wa bↄ aà kpɛ, wa wá pↄ́ o lↄe?
Aà lↄↄ tↄↄlɛ lùalua yãa, ↄ̃ à lɛgbɛ̃̀ à mɛ̀ á gu lualua gɛ̃n do lↄ, i kɛ tↄↄlɛ ado no, ń musuoɛ sa.
Kɛ́ à mɛ̀ gɛ̃n do lↄ, bee lɛ́ owɛ̃ɛ Lua pↄkɛa pↄ́ a lualuapiↄ gɛ̃zɛaɛ, kɛ́ pↄ́ pↄ́ lí luaoↄ e gↄ̃.
A yã́i tò, lá wálɛ kpala pↄ́ lí deeo ble, wà Lua sáaukpa, wíↄ kúlɛɛ̀ lá a yeiwa, wíↄ misiilɛɛ̀ vĩakɛaɛ̀ guu.
Asa wá Luaá tɛ́ pↄ́ ì kṹmáɛ.
À wɛtã àↄ gbɛ̃kɛ vĩ ń kↄ̃o.
À laaidↄ nibↄyaaekɛawa, asa beewa gbɛ̃eↄ malaikaↄ dìlɛ dↄ̃sai.
À to gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wà ń ká kpɛ́uↄ yã́ dↄágu lá á kúńnↄ kpɛ́uwa, ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wàlɛ ĩadamáↄ lá ámɛ wàlɛ ĩadawáwa.
Baade lí gↄ̃ɛ ń a nↄo kua ń kↄ̃o yãda gbia. Gↄ̃ɛ ń a nao su ń wúlɛkĩi gbãlɛo, asa Lua a yã́kpalɛkɛ ń káaluaↄ ń gbãsĩkɛnaↄɛ.
Yea ↄ̃ai su dↄaaɛ́o. À zɛ ń pↄ́ pↄ́ á vĩo, asa Lua mɛ̀: Má n tó weo, má pãkpanzi bauo.
A yã́i tò, wi sↄ̃dilɛ wà mɛ: Dii mɛ́ ma Mìsina ũ, vĩa a ma kũo. Bↄ́ gbɛ̃nazĩna a fↄ̃ kɛmɛɛi?
À tó á dↄaana pↄ́ aa Lua yã'òɛ́ↄ yã́ dↄágu. À ń kua tàasika e a lɛ́wa, í Lua náaikɛ láńwa.
Yesu Kilisi doũ gĩa ń gbão e gↄↄpii.
Ásu to wà á sã́sã ń yã́kanla dasi daanɛ́ↄo. A maa wá sↄ̃ gbãa'e Lua gbɛ̃kɛ guuɛ, i kɛ sa'oblɛ pↄ́ lí àie kɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ zɛ̀oↄnɛo no.
Zwã̀akpɛ sa'onaↄ zɛvĩ aa sa'okĩi pↄ́ wá vĩ blɛ bleo.
Sa'onkia ì gɛ̃ luakukĩi ń pↄtuo auo duunakɛ̃ama yã́i, ↄ̃ wì a gɛ tɛ́kũ bòo kpɛ.
Ayãmɛto Yesu gà wɛ̃́nkpɛ sↄ̃, à gbãbↄ̀ gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ ń azĩa auo.
Wà bↄ wà gɛ́ aà kĩ́i bòo kpɛ, wí i wá kũaànↄ sↄ̃.
Asa wá wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ ìↄ ku vĩ lao, wɛ̃́lɛ pↄ́ lɛ́ mↄ́ ↄ̃ wá wɛ́ dↄi.
Ayãmɛto wàↄ Lua sáaukpa láasai ń Yesu gbãao wá sa'oa ũ. Gba pↄ́ aà sìsinaↄ ì mↄòn we.
À laaidↄ maakɛa ń gbɛ̃kɛkɛakↄ̃ɛowa. Sa bee taa oa mɛ́ ì ka Luagu.
À á dↄaanaↄ yãma, í misiilɛnɛ́, kɛ́ aa e zĩkɛ ń pↄnao, asa aa dɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa ń zĩ yã́ sɛ́lɛ siu Luaɛↄ ũɛ. Tó aalɛ zĩkɛ ń lɛ́suuo, a àikɛɛ́o.
À wabikɛwɛ̃ɛ. Yãe lɛ́ wá sↄ̃ vĩo, wi wɛɛlɛ wàↄ kú wá dↄ̀ↄwa yã́pii guuɛ.
Má gbɛ̀awá, à wabikɛmɛɛ, atɛ̃sa mà e suwá kpakpa.
Lua aafiade pↄ́ wá Dii Yesu bↄ̀ gau Sãdãnki ũ a bàakuawanↄ gↄↄpii au sabai,
aà á kɛkɛ ń maa píio, kɛ́ à a pↄeã kɛ, i yã́ pↄ́ kàagu kɛ wá guu ń Yesu Kilisi gbãao. Ɔ̃mɛ gawi vĩ gↄↄpii, ãmi.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, ma wabikɛ̀wá, àↄ lɛdama yã́pi kũa ń mɛnao, asa lá pↄ́ má kɛ̃̀ɛ́ bílao.
Àↄ dↄ̃ kɛ́ wà wá gbɛ̃do Timↄtee gbàɛ. Tó à kà la tia, wá mↄ́ á gwai sãnu.
À fↄkpa á dↄaanaↄwa píi ń Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ píi. Itali bùsudeↄ fↄkpàwá.
Lua gbɛ̃kɛkɛɛ́ ápii.
Mámɛmaa Zaaki, Lua ń Dii Yesu Kilisio zↄ̀blena ma fↄkpà Isaili bui kuɛpla pↄ́ fãaaaↄwa.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, taasi bui dasi. A pↄ́ pↄ́ sù á lé, à dilɛ pↄna yã́ ũ,
asa á dↄ̃ lá wàlɛ á lɛ́ wàlɛ gwa á luanaaikɛa musu a mɛna iɛ́.
Ásuli fu mɛnawao, íↄ dɛ gbɛ̃́ kàsaaↄ ũ wásawasa yãe kɛ̃́sãawá sai.
Tó ↄ̃nↄ lɛ́ kɛ̃́sã á gbɛ̃ewa, aà wabikɛ Luawa, a aà gba, asa ì gbɛ̃́pii gba pↄ́ bĩisai yã́gagasai.
Tó à wabikɛ̀wà sↄ̃, aà aà náaikɛ seasai, asa seade dɛ lán ko vlã́waɛ. Gu pↄ́ ĩ́ana yɛ̀ɛlɛu, we ì gɛ́u.
Gbɛ̃́ bee taa su àↄ e á pↄ́ e Diiwao,
asa aà nↄ̀sɛ ku plaplaɛ, ↄ̃ ìↄ ku seasea yã́ pↄ́ àlɛ kɛ píi guu.
Wá gbɛ̃́ taaside pↄnakɛ, kɛ́ Lua aà kã̀fĩ yã́i.
Wá gbɛ̃́ ↄde sↄ̃ aà pↄnakɛ, kɛ́ Lua aà bùsa yã́i, asa ↄdeↄ gɛ̃zɛa lán lávu kwɛawaɛ.
Ĩatɛ̃ ì fɛlɛ ń a pusu gbãao, lá i giigaga, a vú i kwɛ́, a maa i láa. Beewa ↄde a kpagui a bↄↄlɛↄ guu.
Báaade gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì yↄ̃a fↄ̃́, asa aà bↄa maa gbɛa Lua a àizãna pↄ́ à a lɛgbɛ̃̀ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ yeaziↄnɛ kɛɛ̀ yàae ũ.
Tó yↄ̃a gbɛ̃́ lè, asu mɛ Luaɛo, asa wa fↄ̃ Lua yↄ̃ ń vãioo, mɛ́ aàpi lí gbɛ̃e yↄ̃ ń vãio sↄ̃o.
Baade yↄ̃a ì bↄ aà pↄnidɛa kĩ́iɛ, ↄ̃ ì aà wɛ́ ble, ì aà gálɛ.
Ɔ̃ pↄnidɛapi ì nↄsi à nɛ'i duuna ũ. Tó duuna zↄ̃ↄkũ̀ sↄ̃, ì ga iɛ.
Ma gbɛ̃́ yenzideↄ, ásu ázĩa sã́são.
Gba maa sãasai píi ì bↄ musu Mae Lua gupuakũnaↄ Kɛna kĩ́iɛ. Ìli lilɛo, aà gupua iwesa vĩo.
À wá í ń a yã́ sĩandeo a pↄeãwa, kɛ́ wàↄ dɛ gbɛ̃́ sɛ̃́iaↄ ũ pↄ́ pↄ́ àlɛ kɛ dafuↄnɛ.
Ma gbɛ̃́ yenzideↄ, à yã́ɛ bee ma. Àli yãma kpaa ápii, ãma ásu yã'o kpaao, á pↄ su pa kpaao.
Asa gbɛ̃nazĩna pↄkũma lí mↄ́ ń yãmaa pↄ́ Lua yeioo.
A yã́i tò à ↄkpa dↄ́ɛ'ĩi ń yãvãi pↄ́ lìguaↄzi píi, í yã́ pↄ́ wa tↄ̃̀ á sↄ̃u a fↄ̃ á suaba sí ń zĩabusaao.
Ásu ázĩa sã́são, ásu yã́pi ma ń swã́o adoo, à zĩkɛwà.
Asa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì yãma mɛ́ ìli kɛo dɛ lán gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ a oa pↄ́ Lua dↄ̀ɛ gwa díi guuwaɛ.
Asa aàzĩa gwaa gbɛa, tó à gɛ̃̀zɛa, ↄ̃ lá a dɛ ì sãaàgu gↄ̃̀ↄ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì wɛ́tɛ Lua ikoyã wásawasa pↄ́ ì to wà gↄ̃ wɛ̃́ɛↄ ũi, mɛ́ ìↄ gɛò aɛ sↄ̃, ìli ma à sãaàguo, ì zĩkɛwàɛ, Lua a báaada adegu aà yãkɛa guuɛ.
Tó gbɛ̃́ dↄ̃ lousisinan a ũ, mɛ́ ìli a lɛ́ fↄ̃o, àlɛ azĩa sãsãɛ, àlɛ lousisi pãɛ.
Lousisia sĩana pↄ́ sãa vĩ Mae Luaɛon kɛ: Wà laaidↄ tonɛ pↄ́ gwana vĩoↄwa ń gyaa gbɛ̃andoↄ an wɛ̃nakɛa guu, wíↄ wázĩa kũa dↄ̃ sãasai dṹnia yã́ musu.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ álɛ wá Dii gawide Yesu Kilisi náaikɛↄ, ásuli kↄ̃ bↄbↄ'ↄsio.
Tó gbɛ̃́ gɛ̃̀ á kↄ̃kãaa guu vua tãana ń pↄkasa tɛkɛao daa, mɛ́ taaside pↄ́ ulakasa gbãsĩ daa gɛ̃̀ sↄ̃,
tó a wɛtɛ̀ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ pↄkasa tɛkɛa daazi, mɛ́ á òɛ̀ aà mↄ zↄ̃lɛ gumaau, mɛ́ á ò taasideɛ aà gɛ zɛ le, ge aà mↄ zↄ̃lɛ á gbázĩ,
álɛ kↄ̃ bↄbↄ'ↄsiɛ, álɛ yã́ gwa kolean weo lé?
À ma ma gbɛ̃́ yenzideↄ. Lua gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛ gbãasaideↄ ũ dṹnia gbɛ̃́ↄnɛ sɛ̀ aaↄ gbãa a náaikɛa guuɛ, aai kpala pↄ́ à a lɛgbɛ̃̀ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ yeaziↄnɛ ble.
Ápiↄ sↄ̃ álɛ gbãasaidepiↄ kpɛbↄ. Ɔdeↄ mɛ́ ì gbãablewáo lò? Aamɛ aaì á gálɛ gɛ́ánↄ yã́kpalɛuo lò?
Aamɛ aaì gyaalagɛ̃ tↄ́ na pↄ́ kpáwáuo lò?
Lua ikoyã mide mɛ̀ àↄ ye á gbɛ̃́deezi lá ázĩa wɛ̃niwa. Tó á yã́pi kũa sĩana, álɛ yãkɛ a zɛ́waɛ.
Tó álɛ kↄ̃ bↄbↄ'ↄsi sↄ̃, álɛ duunakɛɛ. Ikoyãpi á wɛ̃́, a gↄ̃ tàaedeↄ ũn we.
Asa tó gbɛ̃́ ikoyã kũa píi, mɛ́ a mɛ̀ndo aà fù, à gↄ̃̀ tàaede ũ apii musuɛ.
Lua mɛ̀ ásu wúlɛ ń gbɛ̃pãle nↄoo. À mɛ̀ lↄ ásu gbɛ̃dɛo. Baa tó ni wúlɛ ń gbɛ̃pãle nↄoo, tó n gbɛ̃dɛ̀, n gↄ̃ ikoyãdansai ũɛ.
Á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua a yã́gↄ̃gↄ̃ánↄ ikoyã pↄ́ ì to wà gↄ̃ wɛ̃́ɛↄ ũ musu, àli yã'o, íli yãkɛ lá à kↄ̃sìánↄwa.
Lua a yã́kpalɛkɛ ń sùuusaideↄ sùuusaiɛ, ãma yã́ a bↄ ń sùuudeo na.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, tó gbɛ̃́ mɛ̀ álɛ Lua náaikɛ, mɛ́ ìli yãe kɛo, bↄ́ yã́n wei? Luanaaikɛa bee taa a fↄ̃ aà suabae?
Tó á gbɛ̃do, gↄ̃ɛ ge nↄɛ, lɛ́ pↄkasa ń blɛo wɛ̃nakɛ,
tó á gbɛ̃e òɛ̀: Lua n gba aafia! Ńsu to ĩ́ana n dɛo, ní pↄble ǹ kã́, mɛ́ i wɛ̃nidↄbↄ kpawào, bↄ́n bee ũi?
Màa sↄ̃ luanaaikɛa ado yãekɛsaiá yãgɛɛ.
Tó gbɛ̃́ n mɛ̀ ńlɛ Lua náaikɛɛ, mɛ́ mapi málɛ yãkɛ, má onɛ ǹ n luanaaikɛa yãekɛsai ↄlↄmɛɛ, mí a luanaaikɛa ↄlↄnɛ ma yãkɛa guu.
Ń sì Lua mɛ̀ndo nolo? A maaɛ. Baa tã́aↄ dↄ̃ màa, mɛ́ aaìↄ lualua.
Mìsaide, kɛ́ luanaaikɛa yãekɛsai pã, ń ye mà kanɛ n ↄzĩ yã̀?
Kɛ́ wá dezi sɛ̃́ia Ablahaũ a nɛ́ Izaaki kpà sa'obↄ ũ, yã́ i bↄaànↄ na aà yãkɛapi yã́io lé?
Ń èa? Aà luanaaikɛa ń aà yãkɛao tɛkↄ̃iɛ. Aà yãkɛa mɛ́ aà luanaaikɛa bↄ̀lɛi.
Beewa Lua yã́ɛ bee pà à mɛ̀, Ablahaũ Lua náaikɛ̀, ↄ̃ Lua tò yã́ bↄ̀aànↄ na a náai pↄ́ a kɛ̀pi yã́i. Ɔ̃ wì oɛ̀ Lua gbɛ̃na.
Á èa? Yãkɛa mɛ́ tò yã́ bↄ̀aànↄ na, i kɛ Lua náai pↄ́ a kɛ̀ ado yã́i no.
Màa lↄ káalua Lahabu kɛ̀na ń Luao a yãkɛa yã́i, kɛ́ à zĩnaↄ dìlɛ à ń gbáɛ zɛ́ kpã́inau.
Lá mɛ̀ nisĩnsaiá gɛ̀ɛ, màa luanaaikɛa yãekɛsaiá gɛ̀ɛ lↄ.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, ásu kɛ yãdanɛdeↄ ũ dasio, asa á dↄ̃ kɛ́ Lua a wɛbii wá yãdanɛdeↄwa yã́kpalɛ guu dɛ gbɛ̃́ kĩniↄla.
Wápii wiↄ zã yã́wa mↄ̀ↄmↄↄɛ. Tó gbɛ̃́ lɛ́ lí aà kalikɛ̃o, tàaesaideɛ, a fↄ̃ à a mɛ̀ bṹu fu.
Wi ã̀asĩna ká sↄ̃́ɛ kɛ́ à wá yãma yã́iɛ, ↄ̃ wi aà mɛ̀ bṹu taiinkɛ.
À gwa gó'ilɛnawa ísiaa lↄ. Ń a zↄ̃ↄkɛo, baa ń zàa'ĩan gbãa pↄ́ ì ↄpɛwào, a fĩbↄ dɛ nɛ́nannↄɛ. Ɔ̃mɛ ì a taiinkɛ, ↄ̃ a fĩna i a pↄeã daɛ̀.
Beewa sↄ̃, lɛ́naá mɛgu nɛ́naɛ, ↄ̃ ì ĩ́anadã ń yãzↄ̃ↄo. À gwa lá tɛ́ nɛ́na ì kũ sɛ̃̀ zↄ̃ↄwa.
Lɛ́na dɛ lán tɛ́waɛ, a dɛ dṹnia vãi ũ wá mɛ guu. Ì gbãsĩ gↄ̃́kpa wá mɛwa píi. Bɛda tɛ́ mɛ́ ì naɛ lɛ́nawa, ↄ̃ lɛ́na ì tɛ́kpa wá dṹnia kuau.
Gbɛ̃nazĩna sɛ̃̀anↄbↄↄ tòto píi ń bãↄ ń pↄ́taa'onkuawaↄ ń kpↄↄ, mɛ́ àlɛ kɛ e tia,
ãma gbɛ̃e lí fↄ̃ a lɛ́na tòtoo. A dɛ pↄvãi pↄ́ lí zɛ tɛɛɛo ũɛ. À pà ń sɛwɛtɛ̃o,
ↄ̃ wi Dii wá Mae sáaukpaò, ↄ̃ wi ɛa wà gbɛ̃nazĩna pↄ́ a kɛ̀ láawa kaò lↄ.
Lɛ́ doũpi ↄ̃ sáaukpaa ń gbɛ̃́kaao ì bↄu. Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, asu àↄ dɛɛ́ màao.
Nibↄna ì í na ń í kĩ̀são bↄ ízɛ doũ guua?
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, kaadↄɛna a nɛ'i ku ũa? Vɛ̃ɛli a nɛ'i kaadↄɛna ũa? Beewa lↄ í fĩ̀ii a nakũo.
Á guu, démɛ yãdↄ̃n ↄ̃nↄna ũi? Aà ↄlↄnɛ́ a kua maa ń a yãkɛaↄ guu ń zĩabusaa pↄ́ ì bↄ ↄ̃nↄ guuo.
Tó á wɛdↄakↄ̃u ń pãsĩo ń dɛnlawɛɛlɛao vĩ á sↄ̃ guu sↄ̃, ásu ĩ́anadão, ásu ɛɛdↄ sĩanawao.
Ɔ̃nↄ bee taa lí bↄ musuo, dṹnia pↄ́ɛ, á dàa pↄ́ɛ, tã́a pↄ́ɛ.
Asa gu pↄ́ wɛdↄakↄ̃u ń dɛnlawɛɛlɛao kuu, wekĩi kↄ̃yãmasai ń vãi píio ìↄ kuu.
Tó gbɛ̃́ ↄ̃nↄ pↄ́ ì bↄ musu vĩ, sɛ̃́ia ìliↄ gbãsĩ vĩo, a gbɛa ìliↄ yãkele vĩo, ì busanɛ́, ì gbɛ̃́ yãma, sùuu pɛ̀ɛwà ń maakɛao. Ìli gbɛ̃́ bↄbↄ'ↄsio, mɛ́ ìliↄ mↄafili vĩo.
Íbɛlɛmidɛna ì kɛa ń kↄ̃o na tↄ̃́, ↄ̃ ì bↄlɛɛ̀ bↄa maa ũ.
Á sòle ń á lɛkpaao ì bↄ má ni? Ì bↄ á pↄeã pↄ́ lɛ́ kↄ̃dɛ á mɛuↄ kĩ́i nolo?
I pↄ́ niaka, ili eo, ↄ̃ i gbɛ̃dɛ. Á pↄ́ bĩi vĩ, ↄ̃ ili pↄ́ pↄ́ álɛ yá leo. Ɔ̃ i lɛkpaakɛ, i sòlekɛ. Á vĩo, kɛ́ ili wabikɛ Luawao yã́i.
Tó a wabikɛ̀, ili eo, kɛ́ ili wabikɛ a zɛ́wao yã́i, asa iↄ ye à a mↄaokɛ lá a á pↄ gbàwaɛ.
Náaisaideↄ, á dↄ̃ kɛ́ gbɛ̃́kpaa ń dṹniao dɛ íbɛlɛsɛa ń Luao ũo lé? Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ye kɛ dṹnia gbɛ̃́ ũ gↄ̃̀ Lua ibɛɛ ũɛ.
Kɛ́ a kɛ̃a Luayãtaalau wà mɛ̀ aà Nisĩna pↄ́ kú wá guu lí sí sàao, álɛ e yãpã yã̀?
Ãma gbɛ̃kɛ pↄ́ Lua vĩwanↄ dɛ beea, asa a kɛ̃a Luayãtaalau wà mɛ̀: Lua ì íbɛlɛsɛ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì azĩa sɛ lɛsĩo, mɛ́ ìↄ gbɛ̃kɛ vĩ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì azĩa busao.
A yã́i tò à misiilɛ Luaɛ. À gi Ibiisiɛ, i bàasiɛ́.
À sↄ̃ Luazi, i sↄ̃ázi. Duunkɛnaↄ, à ↄbↄlɛ duunau. Nↄ̀sɛmɛmpladeↄ, à á sↄ̃ pípi.
À ↄ́ↄlↄ ń pↄsiao ń wɛ̃nao. À á yaalↄ lilɛ ↄↄlↄ ũ, í á pↄna lilɛ pↄ'ĩi ũ.
À ázĩa busa Diiɛ, i á kã́fĩ.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, ásuli kↄ̃ tↄbɛ̃ɛsio. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ a Yesude dee tↄbɛ̃ɛsì ge à aà bɛ̃̀ɛbò, à Lua ikoyã seela bɛ̃̀ɛ kɛ̀ à a bɛ̃̀ɛbò. Tó n Lua ikoyã bɛ̃̀ɛbò sↄ̃, a manan n ũo, a bɛ̃̀ɛbonan n ũ.
Lua mɛ́ ikoyãdilɛna ń yã́kpalɛkɛnao ũ. Ɔ̃mɛ gbɛ̃́ suabaa ń aà tↄ̀lↄzↄ̃ao gbãa vĩ. Mpi sↄ̃, dén n ũ, kɛ́ ni n gbɛ̃́dee bɛ̃̀ɛboi?
À yãma sa, á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ i mɛ gbã ge zia á gɛ́ wɛ̃́lɛu, í zↄ̃lɛ we wɛ̃̀ do, í laata à ài'e.
Á yã́ pↄ́ a á le zia dↄ̃e? Á dↄ̃ lá á wɛ̃ni dɛa? A dɛ lán suawaɛ. Tó à kpà yↄↄ, ↄ̃ ì gɛ̃zɛa gↄ̃̀ↄ.
Tó yã́ a zɛ́waɛ, áli o à mɛ: Tó Dii wèi, wáↄ aafia, wí kɛ kɛ́wa ge kɛ́wa.
Tia sↄ̃ álɛ ĩ́anadã, a Lua baa bↄ̀ á dìlɛ. Ĩandãa bee taa maao.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ maakɛa dↄ̃ mɛ́ i kɛo, ì kɛ adeɛ duuna ũɛ.
Á ↄdeↄ, à yãma sa. À ↄ́ↄlↄ à wiilɛ wɛ̃na pↄ́ a á le yã́i.
Á àizɛɛↄ ↄ̃̀ↄkpà, kↄ̀ↄↄ á pↄkasaↄ sòso.
Á ↄ̃a tã́nkpakɛ̀, mɛ́ tã́nkpapi a á dayãu, i kṹ á mɛwa lán tɛ́wa. A àizɛɛ kã̀aaázi gↄↄgbɛzãzĩ.
À ma! A gbɛ̀wina pↄ́ aa á buapↄ́ↄ kɛ̀kɛɛ́ↄ blè, mɛ́ ↄ̃api yã́ Lua lè. Pↄkɛkɛnapiↄ wiilɛa gɛ̃̀ Dii Zĩgↄ̃de swã́u.
A namamà tↄↄlɛ la á pↄeãkɛa guu. A mɛ̀kpa kaalɛgↄↄ pↄ́ ũ.
A yãdà gbɛ̃maaↄla a ń dɛdɛ, aai dɛ̃ɛkao.
Ayãmɛto ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, àↄ mɛna vĩ e Dii mↄgↄↄ. À gwa lá zↄ̃ɛ ì a buapↄ́ bɛɛɛde kɛkɛa dã́. Ì mɛnafↄ̃ za káabuana e saɛ.
Ápiↄ sↄ̃ à mɛnafↄ̃, í á sↄ̃dilɛ, asa Dii mↄgↄↄ kãikũ̀.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, ásu yã́kũtɛ̃kakↄ̃io, kɛ́ Lua su yã́kpalɛkɛánↄo yã́i. Yã́kpalɛkɛnapi zɛa kpɛɛlɛ fá!
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, ãnabi pↄ́ aa yã'ò yãa ń Dii tↄ́oↄ, à mɛna pↄ́ aa kɛ̀ taasikɛa guu ↄlɛsɛ́.
Wi onɛ́ pↄnadeↄ, kɛ́ aa mɛnafↄ̃̀ yã́i. A Yobu mɛnakɛa bao mà, mɛ́ á mà lá Dii kɛ̀ɛ̀ gbɛzã, asa gbɛ̃́ sósobi ń sùuuo pɛ̀ɛ Diiwa.
Atɛ̃sa ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, ásu mɛ á sì ń Luaoo. Ásu mɛ á sì ń luabɛo ge tↄↄlɛ ge pↄpãleo. Tó aoɛ, àli o ao. Tó aawoɛ, àli o aawo, kɛ́ yã́ su daálao yã́i.
Á gbɛ̃e lɛ́ taasikɛ yã̀? Aà wabikɛ. Á gbɛ̃e pↄ kɛ̀na yã̀? Aà Lua táasilɛ.
Á gbɛ̃e lɛ́ gyãkɛ yã̀? Aà á gãli gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄ sísi, aai wabikɛɛ̀, aai nísimawà ń Dii tↄ́o.
Wabi pↄ́ wa kɛ̀ luanaaikɛa guu bee a gyãepi gbã́gbã. Dii a aà gba aafia. Tó à duunakɛ̀ yãaɛ sↄ̃, a kɛ̃wà.
A yã́i tò, à á duunaↄ okↄ̃ɛ, í wabikɛkↄ̃ɛ kɛ́ à e gbã́gbã. Gbɛ̃maa wabikɛa gbãa, ì zĩkɛ maamaaɛ.
Ɛliaá gbɛ̃nazĩnaɛ láwáwa. À wabikɛ̀ maamaa lou su mao, ↄ̃ lou i tↄ̃́lɛ tↄↄlɛwao e wɛ̃̀ àaↄ̃ ń mↄ sooloo.
À ɛ̀a wabikɛ̀ lↄ, ↄ̃ lou'i bↄ̀ maamaa, tↄↄlɛ blɛkɛ̀.
Ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, tó á gbɛ̃do pã̀alɛ sĩana zɛ́ɛ, mɛ́ á gbɛ̃e ɛ̀a aà dàwà,
àↄ dↄ̃ kɛ́ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ tò duunkɛnapi bↄ̀ sã́sãzɛu à ɛ̀a sù, à ade sì gawaɛ, mɛ́ à lakà tàaeↄla dasi.
Mámɛmaa Yesu Kilisi zĩna Piɛɛ, mámɛ ma láɛ bee kɛ̃̀ Lua gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa dɛ nibↄↄ ũ dṹniaɛ bee guu aa fãaaa bùsuɛ beeuↄnɛ: Pↄ̃ntu, Galati, Kapadosi, Azi ń Bitinio.
Mae Lua dↄ̀aa á dↄ̃, ↄ̃ à á sɛ́, a gↄ̃ aà pↄ́ ũ ń aà Nisĩna gbãao, kɛ́ à misiilɛ Yesu Kilisiɛ, aà au i á gbãsĩ wolo. Lua gbɛ̃kɛ ń aafiao kã́fĩɛ́.
Wà Lua wá Dii Yesu Kilisi Mae sáaukpa! Aà sùuu zↄ̃ↄ guu à wá í dafu ń Yesu Kilisi fɛlɛ bↄa gau gbãao, ↄ̃ wá tãmaa pↄ́ lí ń nɛ́o vĩ,
asa gba pↄ́ dilɛaɛ́ luabɛpi lí ↄ̃̀ↄkpao, ìli gbãsĩkpao, a maa lí láao.
Lua sↄu mà à á suaba a náai pↄ́ álɛ kɛ yã́i, ↄ̃ àlɛ á dↄ̃́a ń a gbãao e à gɛ bↄò gↄↄgbɛzãzĩ.
Álɛ pↄnakɛ ń yã́pio, baa kɛ́ álɛ taasikɛ gĩa yↄↄ yã'ĩa bui dasi yã́i.
Lá wì vua maa dↄ̃ tɛ́ guu, màa yã'ĩapiↄ lɛ́ á luanaaikɛa yↄ̃, asa á luanaaikɛapi bɛɛɛ vĩ dɛ vua pↄ́ a gawi ì láaa maamaaɛ. Tó a bↄ maa, Lua a á sáaukpa Yesu Kilisi mↄgↄↄzĩ, a á kpɛla ń gawio.
Baa kɛ́ i aà eo, á yeaàzi. Baa kɛ́ i wɛsiaàlɛ gĩao, álɛ aà náaikɛ, ↄ̃ álɛ pↄna zↄ̃ↄ pↄ́ gɛ̃̀ oaa kɛ,
kɛ́ álɛ á luanaaikɛa gbɛ'e á suabaa ũ yã́i.
Ãnabiↄ dↄ̀aa gbɛ̃kɛ pↄ́ Lua a kɛɛ́ yã'ò, aa suabaapi yã́ gwà aa a tàasikà.
Kilisi Nisĩna kú ń guu, à dↄ̀aa taasi pↄ́ Kilisipi a kɛ ònɛ́ ń gawi pↄ́ a e a gbɛao, ↄ̃ aa wɛ̀ɛlɛ wà yã́pi zɛ́ dↄ̃ ń a kɛgↄↄo.
Ɔ̃ Lua tò aa dↄ̃̀ kɛ́ yã́ pↄ́ aalɛ opi dɛ ń gↄↄ pↄ́ ũo, á pↄ́ɛ. Tiasa baonakpanaↄ yã́pi òɛ́ ń Lua Nisĩna pↄ́ Luapi aà zĩ̀ à bↄ̀ luabɛ gbãao. Baa malaikaↄ ì dɛ̃ɛka yã́pi dↄ̃ai.
Ayãmɛto à á làasoo vu iu, íↄ ázĩa kũa dↄ̃, á wɛ́ iↄ dↄ gbɛ̃kɛ pↄ́ Lua a kɛɛ́ Yesu Kilisi mↄgↄↄzĩzi seasai.
Lá á dɛ Lua Nɛ́ pↄ́ lɛ́ aà yãmaↄ ũ, ásu to dↄ́ɛ'ĩi pↄ́ á vĩ yãa á wɛ́siagↄↄ dↄaaɛ́o.
Lua kua adoaɛ. Lá à á sisi à á sɛ́, á kua líↄ adoa á yãkɛa píi guu màa sↄ̃.
Asa a kɛ̃a láu wà mɛ̀: Á kua líↄ adoa, asa ma kua adoaɛ.
Lá Lua ì yã́kpalɛkɛ ń baadeo a yãkɛawa ń wɛgwasai, tó álɛ aà sisi Mae, à vĩakɛɛ̀ á nibↄkɛ guu la.
Á dↄ̃ lá Lua á bↄ́ kua gii pↄ́ dɛ á fɛlɛkaa ũ guu. Lua i á bo ń pↄ́ pↄ́ a gawi ì láao no, vua ge ã́nusu,
à á bó ń Kilisi pↄ́ dɛ sã sãasai gbãsĩsai ũ au gawideoɛ.
Lua dↄ̀aa aà dìlɛ zadↄ̃ i dṹnia kálɛo, ↄ̃ à bↄ̀ɛ́aànↄ gupuau gↄↄ gbɛzãɛ beeↄzĩ.
Aà yã́ musu ↄ̃ álɛ Lua náaikɛ. Lua aà bↄ̀ gau à gawi kpàwà, kɛ́ à e a náaikɛ, á wɛ́ iↄ dↄazi.
Lá misiilɛa sĩanaɛ á gbãsĩ wòlo, ↄ̃ á gbɛ̃kɛ vĩ ń kↄ̃o mↄafilisai, àↄ yekↄ̃i ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo.
Lua á í dafu ń a yã́ wɛ̃nide pↄ́ ìↄ ku gbãaoɛ. Yã́pi dɛ pↄbui pↄ́ ì ga ũo, pↄbui pↄ́ lí gaoɛ.
Gbɛ̃́pii dɛ lán sɛ̃waɛ, an gawi píi dɛ lán sɛ̃vuwaɛ. Sɛ̃ ì gaga, a vú ì kwɛ́,
ãma Dii yã́ ìↄ ku gↄↄpiiɛ. Yã́pi mɛ́ dɛ baona pↄ́ wa kpàɛ́ ũ.
Ayãmɛto à yãvãi píi tó ń ɛɛ píio ń mↄafilio ń wɛdↄakↄ̃ɛo ń kↄ̃yaaao.
Lá nɛ́tɛ̃naↄ ìↄ yↄ̃́'i nidɛ, àↄ Lua yã́ pↄ́ dɛ lán vĩ'ipu wásawasawa nidɛ màa sↄ̃, kɛ́ à e gbã á suabaa guu,
asa á dↄ̃̀ sa kɛ́ Dii maa.
À sↄ̃aàzi, Gbɛ̀ wɛ̃nide pↄ́ wà pãkpài, Lua aà sɛ̀ bɛɛɛde ũ.
Ápiↄ sↄ̃ ámɛ á gbɛ̀ wɛ̃nide pↄ́ Lua lɛ́ a kpɛ́ ɛ̃booↄ ũ. Ámɛ á aà gbàgbanaↄ ũ, i sa pↄ́ ì kaaàgu o ń aà Nisĩna gbãao Yesu Kilisi sabai.
Asa a kɛ̃a Luayãtaalau wà mɛ̀: Gwa, málɛ gbɛ dilɛ Siↄna, ɛ̃daalɛgbɛ bɛɛɛde pↄ́ má sɛ̀ ũ. Wí a gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ aà náaikɛ kũo.
A dɛ gbɛ̀ bɛɛɛde ũ á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ álɛ aà náaikɛↄnɛ, ãma a dɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ aà náaikɛoↄnɛ màao. Gbɛ pↄ́ ɛ̃bonaↄ pãkpài mɛ́ gↄ̃̀ gbɛↄ mide ũ.
Màa lↄ a dɛ: Gbɛ pↄ́ wì gɛ̃mbↄlɛwà ũ, gbɛsi pↄ́ aaì kpaa aa fu ũ. Aa gɛ̃mbↄlɛwà kɛ́ aai Lua yãdao yã́i. Beewa Lua dìlɛnɛ́.
Ámɛ á bui pↄ́ Lua ń sɛ́ↄ ũ, kíaↄ ũ, aà gbàgbanaↄ ũ, gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ an kua adoaↄ ũ, aà gbɛ̃́ yenzideↄ ũ, kɛ́ à Lua pↄ́ á sisi a bↄ gusiau, à gɛ̃̀ánↄ a gupua bↄnsaɛde guu táasilɛ.
Á dɛ Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ ũ yãao, tiasa ↄ̃ a gↄ̃ a ũ. Lua i sùuukɛánↄ yãao, tiasa ↄ̃ a kɛ̀ánↄ.
Ma gbɛ̃́ yenzideↄ, lá á dɛ nibↄ bↄ̀mↄↄ ũ la, málɛ lɛdawáɛ, à mikɛ̃ á dↄ́ɛ'ĩi pↄ́ aaì zĩkaánↄↄwa.
Àↄ ku gbɛ̃́ bɛɛɛdeↄ ũ luanaaikɛnsaiↄ guu. Beewa baa tó aalɛ á dilɛ vãikɛnaↄ ũ, tó aa yãmaa pↄ́ álɛ kɛↄ è, aa Lua sáaukpa yã́kpalɛkɛgↄↄzĩ.
À misiilɛ iko pↄ́ gbɛ̃nazĩna dìlɛɛ píi Dii yã́i, kía pↄ́ iko vĩ dɛńlan nò,
gbãade pↄ́ a dìlɛ aà vãikɛnaↄ wɛtã aà maakɛnaↄ sáaukpan nò.
Lua pↄeãn kɛ: À yãmaakɛ à lɛsↄkpa sↄũ wɛ́siadeↄnɛ.
A gↄ̃ wɛ̃́ɛↄ ũɛ, ãma ásu tó á gↄ̃a wɛ̃́ɛↄ ũ gↄ̃ɛ́ vãikɛa zɛ́ ũo. Àↄ ku Lua zↄ̀blenaↄ ũ.
À gbɛ̃́pii kpɛla. Àↄ ye á Yesude deeↄzi. À vĩakɛ Luaɛ. À kía kpɛla.
Zĩkɛnaↄ, à misiilɛ á diiↄnɛ, í zↄ̃ↄkɛ dↄ̃nɛ́ yã́pii guu. I kɛ dii maa nↄ̀sɛdoũdeↄ ńtɛ̃ɛ no, ń a pãsĩↄɛ lↄ.
Tó wà ĩadàwá pã, tó a mɛnakɛ̀ò Lua yã́i, bee ài vĩɛ́.
Tó wà á gbɛ̃́ á tàae yã́i, tó a mɛnakɛ̀ò, bee tↄ́ vĩ má ni? Ãma tó a taasikɛ̀ yãmaa pↄ́ á kɛ yã́i, tó a mɛnakɛ̀ò, Lua a á sáaukpa.
Bee yã́i Lua á sisii à á sɛ́. Kilisi taasikɛ̀ɛ́ à zɛ'ↄ̀lↄɛ́, kɛ́ àↄ tɛ a iai yã́iɛ.
I duunakɛo, wi ma à ɛɛtòo.
Kɛ́ wà aà sↄ̃̀sↄ̃, i a zã́simáo. Kɛ́ à taasikɛ̀, i yãpãsĩ onɛ́o, à zɛ̀ ń Lua yã́kpalɛkɛn maaoɛ.
Ɔ̃mɛ wá duuna dì a miwa à gàò líwa, kɛ́ wá bàa su àↄ kú ń duunao lↄo, wíↄ ku maakɛa guu. Aà flàala iaↄ mɛ́ wá gbãgbã.
Asa a sãsã lán sãↄwa yãaɛ, ↄ̃ a ɛa su á Dãna ń á Dↄ̃̀anaowa tiasa.
Nↄɛↄ sↄ̃, à misiilɛ á zã́ↄnɛ. Tó an gbɛ̃eↄ lɛ́ Lua yãdao, á kua a ń lilɛ. Baa tó i yãe onɛ́o,
aa e á kú gbãsĩsai mɛ́ álɛ misiilɛnɛ́.
Á kɛfɛnkɛ wɛɛlɛa su àↄ dɛ mɛkaa yã́ ũo, mitãa ge nↄamblebↄↄ ge pↄkasadaan nò.
Aàↄ dɛ á nↄ̀sɛ guu yã́ pↄ́ lí láao ũ, nↄ̀sɛniɛ ń zĩabusaao. Bee mɛ́ gbia Luaɛ.
Asa beewa nↄɛ lousisina pↄ́ an wɛ́ dↄ Luazi yãaↄ ńzĩa kɛ̀kɛ, aa misìilɛ ń zã́ↄnɛ.
Màa Sala dɛ, ì Ablahaũ yãma ì oɛ̀ Baa. Tó álɛ yãmaakɛ, mɛ́ álɛ pↄ́ pↄ́ wì vĩakɛɛ̀ yãdao, a Sala ↄlɛsɛ̀n we.
Màa gↄ̃ɛↄ sↄ̃ àↄ kúńnↄ nↄɛkɛdↄ̃anɛ́ guu, íli yãmamá, kɛ́ pↄe su kpáɛ́ á wabikɛa guuo, asa á dɛ wɛ̃ni gbablenaↄ ũ sãnuɛ.
Bee gbɛa àↄ lɛdoũ vĩ ń kↄ̃o ápii. Àↄ wɛ̃nadↄ̃kↄ̃ɛ, àↄ yekↄ̃i, àↄ gbɛ̃kɛ vĩ ń kↄ̃o, í busakↄ̃ɛ.
Ásuli vãi fĩabo ń vãioo. Ásuli gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ á sↄ̃sↄ̃ sↄ̃́sↄ̃o. À samaa'oɛ̀, asa Lua á sisi à báaadaágu yã́iɛ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ye a wɛ̃ni àↄ maa, mɛ́ a ye a kua àↄ na, aà a lɛ́ fↄ̃ ń yãvãi oao, asuli to ɛɛ bↄ a lɛ́uo.
Aà mikɛ̃ vãiwa, i maakɛ, aà aafia zɛ́ wɛɛlɛ, iↄ tɛi.
Asa Dii ì wɛ́tɛ gbɛ̃maaↄzi, ì swã́kpa an wabikɛaↄzi. Dii ì mikpɛdↄ vãikɛnaↄnɛ.
Tó á ãiavĩ ń maakɛao, démɛ a á wɛtãi?
Baa tó a su taasikɛ̀ maakɛa yã́i, báaadeↄn á ũ. Ásuli vĩakɛ an wɛ́tɛ̃aɛo, ásu sↄ̃̀deedeekɛo.
À Kilisi dↄ̃ Dii ũ á sↄ̃ guu. Àↄ ku sↄu guu gↄↄpii, kɛ́ à e yãwe gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ lɛ́ á la yã́ pↄ́ á wɛ́ dↄi miiwa.
Àli onɛ́ busɛbusɛ ń bɛɛɛ dↄ̃anɛ́o. À onɛ́ ń nↄ̀sɛpuao lↄ, kɛ́ wí e gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ á sↄ̃sↄ̃ maa pↄ́ álɛ kɛ á Yesudekɛ yã́iↄ kṹ.
Taasikɛa lá Lua yeiwa maakɛa yã́i maa dɛ taasikɛa yãvãikɛa yã́ila.
Kilisi gà gɛ̃n do duunawoloa yã́iɛ. Tàaesaide gà wá tàaedeↄ yã́i, kɛ́ à e gɛ́wanↄ Lua kĩ́i. Wà aà dɛ̀ aà gbɛ̃nazĩnkɛ guu, ↄ̃ Lua aà vù aà nisĩnkɛ guu.
Aà nisĩnkɛpi guu à gɛ̀ waasokɛ̀ nisĩna pↄ́ wà ń ká kpɛ́uↄnɛ.
Aa bↄ̀ Lua yã́ kpɛ yãaɛ, gↄↄ pↄ́ àlɛ mɛnakɛ e Nↄee gɛ̀ a gó'ilɛna kɛ làaò. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ bↄ̀ íu aafia gópi sabaiↄ dasio, gbɛ̃ↄn swaaↄ̃ɛ.
Ípi mɛ́ dɛ á da'ilɛkɛa pↄ́ ì á suaba taa ũ tia. Da'ilɛkɛapiá mɛ̀ gbãsĩwoloa yã́ no. Lɛgbɛ̃a Luaɛ ń nↄ̀sɛpuaoɛ. Ì á suaba kɛ́ Yesu Kilisi bↄ̀ gau yã́i.
À ikokɛ̀ malaikaↄ ń tã́aↄ ń ń gbãadeↄ ń ń ikodeↄwa, ↄ̃ à tà luabɛ, a ku aà ↄplaai.
Lá Kilisi gà a gbɛ̃nazĩnkɛ guu, ápiↄ à bee nↄ̀sɛ da sↄ̃, asa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gà a gbɛ̃nazĩnkɛ yã́ musu kɛ̃̀ duunawaɛ.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ gↄ̃̀ɛ́ á kua guu, á dↄ́ɛ'ĩi suli dↄaaɛ́ lↄo, sema Lua pↄeã.
Á kua luayãdansaiↄ yãkɛa guu yãa mↄ̀ lɛ. Á kú yãa wisaiyãkɛa guu ń dↄ́ɛ'ĩio ń wɛ̃dɛkɛao ń lalasi kↄ̃̀ↄo ń wɛ̃mi wɛ̃zĩgbaao ń tã́agbagbaao, pↄ́ Lua ye a gĩyãio.
Lá ili sińnↄ an lalasi zↄ̃ↄpi kɛa guu lↄo, ì kɛnɛ́ yãbↄnsaɛ ũ, aaì á tↄbɛ̃ɛsi.
Aa ń yãkɛaↄ dau siu Luaɛ. Aà yã́kpalɛkɛa ń gbɛ̃́ bɛ̃́ɛↄ ń gyaadeↄ sↄu mà.
Wà baonakpà gyaadepiↄnɛ lↄ, kɛ́ an gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ yã́ zↄ̃̀lɛmá an gbɛ̃nazĩnkɛ guu lán gbɛ̃́piiwaↄ e aaↄ ku nisĩnkɛ guu lán Luawa.
Pↄ́pii láaa kà kãi. Ayãmɛto àↄ dɛ laaideↄ ũ, íↄ ázĩa kũa dↄ̃, kɛ́ àↄ wabikɛ Luawa yã́i.
Yã́ pↄ́ dɛ a píia, àↄ yekↄ̃i ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo, asa yea gbɛ̃́i ì láka tàaea dasi.
À kↄ̃ yàaekɛ yã́kũtɛ̃kasai.
Lá Lua gbadà á baadeɛ, à dↄkↄ̃lɛ ń gbapiↄ Lua báaa bui dodo ziia maaↄ ũ.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛ waasokɛna ũ, aà Lua yã'onɛ́. Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ dɛ dↄnlɛde ũ, aà dↄńlɛ ń gbãa pↄ́ Lua a gbao, kɛ́ à Lua tↄbↄ yã́pii guu ń Yesu Kilisi gbãao. Ɔ̃mɛ gawi vĩ ń gbãao gↄↄpii! Ãmi.
Ma gbɛ̃́ yenzideↄ, ásu to yↄ̃a pãsĩ pↄ́ lɛ́ á le bↄ á saɛ lándↄ̃ yã́kanla mɛ́ á léwao.
Lá á baa ku Kilisi taasikɛa guu, à pↄnakɛò, kɛ́ à e àↄ pↄna zↄ̃ↄ vĩ gↄↄ pↄ́ Kilisipi a bↄ gupuau ń gawio.
Tó wà á sↄ̃sↄ̃ Kilisi tↄ́ pↄ́ kúwá yã́i, báaadeↄn á ũ, asa Lua Nisĩna gawide diaɛ́ɛ.
Á gbɛ̃e su taasikɛ gbɛ̃dɛa ge kpã́i'oa ge vãikɛa ge gudɛ yã́io.
Tó a taasikɛ̀ á Kilisidekɛ yã́i, asu kɛɛ́ wíyã ũo. À Lua sáaukpa kɛ́ Yesu tↄ́ kúwá yã́i.
Asa ĩadaama pìla, Lua gbɛ̃́ↄ ↄ̃ à dàalɛmá. Lá wámɛ à dàalɛwá sɛ̃́ia, a midɛ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ gì baona pↄ́ bↄ̀ Lua kĩ́i síiↄ kpelewa ni?
Tó gbɛ̃maaↄ suabaa zĩ'ũ, a bↄ ń duunde luayãdansaiↄ kpelewa ni?
Ayãmɛto gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aalɛ taasikɛ Lua pↄeãkɛa yã́iↄ aa ńzĩa na ń Kɛna náaideɛ a ↄzĩ, aai wɛtã wàↄ maakɛ.
Málɛ lɛda á gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄwa sa. Gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄn ma ũ sↄ̃. Má dɛ taasi pↄ́ Kilisi kɛ̀ seelade ũ, mɛ́ ma bàa kú ń gawi pↄ́ a bↄ gupuauo sↄ̃.
Àↄ dɛ kpàsa pↄ́ Lua kàlɛɛ́ dãnaↄ ũ. À ↄliai ń pↄeão teasisai lá Lua yeiwa. I kɛ ↄ̃awɛɛlɛa yã́i no. À kɛ ń nↄ̀sɛmɛndoo.
Ásuli gbãable gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wa nàɛ́ á ↄzĩpiↄwao. À tó á kua á sãↄ dazɛwa,
í kíafua pↄ́ a gawi lí láao e gↄↄ pↄ́ Sãdãnki mↄ̀.
Á ɛ̀waasoↄ sↄ̃, à misiilɛ gbɛ̃zↄ̃ↄↄnɛ. Ápii à ázĩa busakↄ̃ɛ, í dↄkↄ̃lɛ, asa: Lua ì íbɛlɛsɛ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì azĩa sɛ lɛsĩo, mɛ́ a gbɛ̃kɛ vĩ ń gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ ì azĩa busao.
Ayãmɛto à ázĩa busa Lua gbãadeɛ, i á kã́fĩ gↄↄ pↄ́ a dìlɛwa.
À ↄzↄ̃ɛ̀ á yã'ↄ̃mai píi, asa ì laaidↄwá.
À itɛ̃kɛ àↄ kú ń laaio. Á ibɛɛ Ibiisi dɛ lán nↄ̀ↄmusu pↄ́ lɛ́ ↄ́ↄlↄwaɛ. Àlɛ kpálɛkɛázi, àlɛ gbɛ̃́ wɛɛlɛ kṹ.
À giɛ̀, í zɛ gbãa luanaaikɛa guu, asa á dↄ̃ kɛ́ á Yesude dee pↄ́ kú dṹnia guuↄ píi lɛ́ taasi doũpi kɛɛ.
Lua Báaapiide á sisi a gawi pↄ́ lí láaowa naa Kilisiwaɛ. Tó a taasikɛ̀ yↄↄ, a á bↄ maa, i á zɛ gíũgiũ, i á gba gbãa, i á zɛdↄ.
Ɔ̃mɛ gbãa vĩ gↄↄpii! Ãmi.
Wá gbɛ̃do Silivɛ̃ɛ pↄ́ má aà dↄ̃ gbɛ̃́ náaide ũ mɛ́ lá yↄↄnaɛ bee kɛ̃̀ɛ́mɛɛ. Ma lɛdàowá, mɛ́ má dɛ a seelade ũ kɛ́ yã́ pↄ́ má ò dɛ Lua gbɛ̃kɛkɛanɛ́ sĩana ũɛ. À zɛò gíũgiũ.
Babɛli gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua ń sɛ́ lááwaↄ fↄkpàwá. Ma nɛ́ Maaku fↄkpàwá lↄ.
À fↄkpakↄ̃wa ń lɛ́pɛakↄ̃wao yeakↄ̃i guu. Lua á gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ á naa Kilisiwaↄ gba aafia ápii.
Mámɛmaa Lua zĩna Simↄↄ Piɛɛ, Yesu Kilisi zↄ̀blena, mámɛ ma láɛ bee kɛ̃̀ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ wá Lua wá Suabana Yesu Kilisi ń gbá zɛ́ aa a náaikɛ̀ láwáwa a maakɛ yã́iↄnɛ.
Gbɛ̃kɛ ń aafiao pɛɛwá Lua ń wá Dii Yesuo dↄ̃a guu.
Lua wá sɛ́ wàↄ ku a gawi ń a maakɛo guuɛ, a tò wà a dↄ̃, ↄ̃ aà luakɛgbãa wá gbá pↄ́ pↄ́ dɛ wàↄ vĩ, wá kua i kpaaĩ ń aà yã́o.
Beewa à yãzↄ̃ↄ bɛɛɛde pↄ́ à a lɛgbɛ̃̀ kɛ̀wɛ̃ɛ, kɛ́ a yã́i wà bↄ dṹnia dↄ́ɛ'ĩi pↄ́ ì ń ↄ̃̀ↄkpa guu, wíↄ Lua dàa vĩ.
Yã́ bee yã́i à ãiakɛ maamaa, à Lua náaikɛ maakɛa guu, í yãmaakɛ Lua yãdↄ̃a guu,
íↄ Lua yã́ dↄ̃ ázĩa kũa dↄ̃ guu, íↄ ázĩa kũa dↄ̃ mɛna guu, íↄ mɛna vĩ naa Luawa guu,
íↄ naa Luawa kↄ̃gbɛ̃kɛ guu, íↄ gbɛ̃kɛ vĩ ń kↄ̃o ń yeakↄ̃io.
Asa tó á yã́ beeↄ kũa mɛ́ aalɛ kã́fĩɛ́, áↄ ku pã wá Dii Yesu Kilisi dↄ̃a kã́fĩaɛ́ saio.
Gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ yã́ beeↄ kũa sↄ̃o, à a wɛ́ kũ̀aa à gↄ̃̀ vĩ̀a ũɛ. Kɛ́ Lua duuna pↄ́ a kɛ̀ yãaↄ kɛ̃̀wà, à sã̀aàguɛ.
Ayãmɛto ma gbɛ̃́ↄ, à ãiakɛ à gbãakpa sísia pↄ́ Lua á sisi à á sɛ́wa. Tó álɛ yã́ beeↄ kɛ, á fu bauo.
Beewa wa gbãakpaázi maamaa, íↄ kú ń wá Dii wá Suabana Yesu Kilisio aà kpala pↄ́ lí láao guu.
Ayãmɛto baa kɛ́ á yã́ beeↄ dↄ̃, mɛ́ á zɛdↄa sĩana pↄ́ á kũa guu, máↄ yã́piↄ dↄáguɛ.
Gↄↄ pↄ́ má kú ma sↄ guu, málɛ e a maa màↄ tɛ́kpaágu yã́piↄ dↄaágu guuɛ.
Má dↄ̃ kɛ́ ma bↄa ma sↄu gↄↄ a ka tia, lá wá Dii Yesu Kilisi dↄ̀aa òmɛɛwa.
Má ãiakɛ, kɛ́ yã́piↄ e àↄ dↄágu gↄↄpii ma gaa gbɛaɛ.
Kɛ́ wa wá Dii Yesu Kilisi mↄa ń gbãao òɛ́, i kɛ wá tɛ́ fĩ pↄ́ wa dà ń kↄ̃niozi no. Wa wɛsì aà zↄ̃ↄkɛlɛɛ,
gↄↄ pↄ́ Mae Lua aà kpɛlà à aà tↄbↄ̀. À Zↄ̃ↄde Gawide lↄↄ mà à mɛ̀ a Nɛ́ mɛ̀ndona yenziden aà ũ, aà yã́ ì kaagu.
Wa lↄↄ pↄ́ bↄ̀ luabɛpi mà gↄↄ pↄ́ wá kuaànↄ gbɛ̀sĩsĩ pↄ́ a kua adoa musu.
Bee yã́ pↄ́ ãnabiↄ ò sĩanapìliwànɛ́. A maa à laaidↄ yã́piwa filia pↄ́ lɛ́ guduuduu pu ũɛ e gudↄlɛia saana àↄ gɛ́ bilɛi á sↄ̃u, gu i dↄɛ́.
Àↄ dↄ̃ gĩa kɛ́ gbɛ̃e lí fↄ̃ yã́ pↄ́ ãnabi kɛ̃̀ láu bↄↄlɛkɛ̀ ń azĩaoo.
Ãnabiↄ yãe lí bↄ gbɛ̃nazĩna pↄeã guuo, aa Lua yã'ò lá aà Nisĩna dↄ̀aanɛ́waɛ.
Ãnabi ɛgɛnaↄ bↄ̀ yãa Isailiↄ guu. Beewa waasokɛn ɛgɛnaↄ bↄ á guu lↄ, aai ɛɛ pↄ́ ì to wà kaalɛ ká Lua yãdanɛu, aai lelekpa Dii pↄ́ ń bózi, aai ńzĩa kaalɛ kã́ndo.
Wa tɛ́ńzi dasi an wisaiyãkɛa guu, wi sĩana zɛ́ bɛ̃̀ɛbo an yã́i.
An bĩikɛa guu aa á ble ń ɛɛ pↄ́ aaì blewào. Yã́kpalɛ zↄ̃̀lɛmá à gɛ̃̀gɛ̃, i lí na ń Kàalɛna wɛ́uo.
Asa Lua i malaika pↄ́ duunakɛ̀ↄ too, à ń ká gbã́o sia pↄ́ kú zĩ́lɛzĩlɛ guu, àↄ ń kũa e yã́kpalɛkɛgↄↄzĩɛ.
I dṹnia zi ń a yãdansai pↄ́ kú a guuↄ too, a tò í dàńla. Ãma à Nↄee pↄ́ ì maakɛa waasokɛ bↄ̀ ń a gbɛ̃́ gbɛ̃ↄn soplaↄ.
À yãdà Sↄdↄũ ń Gↄmↄↄola, à ń kaalɛ aa gↄ̃̀ túfu ũ yã́ pↄ́ a luayãdansaiↄ le seela ũ.
Ãma à Lↄtu bↄ̀. A dɛ gbɛ̃maa ũ, aà nↄ̀sɛ ↄ̃̀ↄkpà ikoyãdansaipiↄ wisaiyãkɛa yã́i.
Gbɛ̃maapi kú ń guuɛ, yãvãi pↄ́ àlɛ e àlɛ ma lá gu lɛ́ dↄ aà wã̀wã aà nↄ̀sɛmaa yã́i.
Màa Dii gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ naawa bↄa yↄ̃a guu dↄ̃, mɛ́ a gbɛ̃vãi kũa dↄ̃ e àↄ gɛ́ ĩadaiwà yã́kpalɛkɛgↄↄzĩ.
Atɛ̃sa gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aaì saka ikoyãu, an mɛ̀ dↄ́ɛ'ĩiↄ ì dↄaanɛ́ gbãsĩkɛa guuↄ. Waasokɛn ɛgɛnapiↄá sↄ̃gbãade kàamaideↄnɛ. Dↄ́ɛa ń malaika gawideↄ lí ń vĩakũo.
Malaika pↄ́ an gbãa ń ń ikoo dɛ waasokɛnapiↄlaↄ aali we ń tↄbɛ̃ɛsì aa gɛ̀ ń ń káalao Dii aɛo.
Gbɛ̃́piↄ ì yã́ pↄ́ wa a gbadↄ̃o bɛ̃̀ɛboɛ. Gbɛ̃nazĩn báa mɛ́ dańla, aa làasoo vĩo. Wà ń í kɛ́ wà ń kṹ wà ń dɛ yã́iɛ. Aa kaalɛ lán nↄ̀bↄↄwaɛ,
wi vãi pↄ́ aa kɛ̀ fĩabonɛ́. Dↄ́ɛ'ĩikɛa fãanɛ ì kɛnɛ́ yãna ũɛ. Gↄↄ pↄ́ aalɛ blɛbleánↄ, aaì pↄnakɛ ń ń kↄ̃nikɛanɛ́oɛ. An kua á guuá sãaɛ mɛ́ gbãsĩɛ.
An wɛ́ ìↄ pɛa nↄɛ dↄ́ɛ'ĩideↄwa, duuna lí mↄ́máo. Aaì kↄ̃nikɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ Lua yã́ i zɛdↄ ń guuoↄnɛ. Bĩi ń sↄ̃ pà. Lua lɛkɛ̀nɛ́ɛ.
Aa sã̀sã, aa kɛ̃̀ zɛ́ súsuwa, aa zɛ́ doũ sɛ̀ ń Bɛↄↄ nɛ́ Balaaũ pↄ́ ye ↄbɛ̃ɛio.
Zàa'ĩna a pↄ́lɛbũu'ia à yã'òɛ̀ lán gbɛ̃nazĩnawa, à aà gbà laai aà vãikɛa musu, à gìɛ̀ ń aà mìsaiyãkɛao.
Gbɛ̃́ beeↄ dɛ lán nibↄna pↄ́ a í bàwaɛ, lán lousisia pↄ́ gɛ̃̀zɛa ń ĩ́anaowa. Gusia níinii ↄ̃ Lua dìlɛnɛ́ yàae ũ.
Aaì ĩ́an gii zↄ̃ↄ dã, aaì kↄ̃nikɛ gbɛ̃́ pↄ́ aa bↄ̀ sã́sãzɛu dafuↄnɛ ń dↄ́ɛ'ĩio ń wisaiyão.
Yã́ pↄ́ ì ń ↄ̃̀ↄkpa zↄↄn ń ũ, ↄ̃ aaì gↄ̃a wɛ̃́ɛↄ ũ lɛgbɛ̃nɛ́. Asa gbɛ̃́pii dɛ yã́ pↄ́ a sↄ̃ blè zↄ ũɛ.
